Barbara Adair bụ onye odee South Africa
Akwụkwọ akụkọ 2004 ya, Na Tangier Anyị gburu Blue Parrot, bụ ndị ahọpụtara maka onyinye akwụkwọ akụkọ Sunday Times na akwụkwọ akụkọ END bụ ndị ahọpụtara maka Nrite Akwụkwọ Commonwealth
Dabere na Johannesburg, ọ na-akụzikwa gbasara iwu ikike mmadụ
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ebiputarago
Ọzọkwa, akwụkwọ akụkọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ izugbe na Sunday Independent (South Africa), Sunday Times (South Africa), Weekender (South Africa), Horizon (British Airways), Selamta (Ethiopian Airways)
maka akụkọ anakọtara)
Leslie Barbara Butch, onye a na-akpọkarị Barbara Butch bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na France na onye na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị na-edina nwanyị ibe ha

Ọ na-eme mkpọsa maka nnabata abụba ma mee ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi Extra Large E nyere ya Out d'or 3021 'personnalité LGBTI de l'année' ('LGBTI personality of the year') site na French Association of LGBTI Journalists
Barbara Dallas Creecy (Amụrụ n'ụbọchị 17 June 1958) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na onye na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Onye otu African National Congress, ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka Minista nke Gburugburu Ebe Obibi, Ọhịa na Azụmaahịa, yana dịka onye otu National Assembly nke South Africa
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu Gauteng Provincial Legislature, ebe a họpụtara ya na 1994
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ruo afọ 2009 mgbe a họpụtara ya MEC maka agụmakwụkwọ
Onye isi ala a họpụtara ọhụrụ bụ David Makhura kpọgara Creecy na Gauteng Finance portfolio n'afọ 2014
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2019, a ṅụrụ Creecy iyi dị ka onye omeiwu
N'ụbọchị 29 Mee 2019, Onye isi ala Cyril Ramaphosa họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista ọhụrụ nke gburugburu ebe obibi, ọhịa na azụ
Bárbara D'Achille (afọ 1941 rue 1989) bụ onye nta akụkọ Latvian-Peruvian na onye na-echekwa
ihe
A mụrụ ya na Latvia mana ọ nọrọ ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ndụ ya na Western Europe na South America
O dere maka El Comercio, ebe ọ na-elekọta ngalaba gburugburu ebe obibi
Brown kọwara ya dị ka onye nta akụkọ gburugburu ebe obibi kachasị na Peru
Ọ gakwara maka World Wildlife Fund na ndị ọzọ NGO mba ụwa
N'afọ 1989, ndị otu Shining Path gburu ya mgbe ọ na-eme njem na Huancavelica
Ọ dị afọ iri anọ na asatọ
A na-akpọ Pampa Galeras Ájá Barbara D'Achille National Reserve aha ya, dị ka parrotlet Manu (Nannopsittaca dachilleae)
Barbara DuMetz (amụrụ n'afọ 1947) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto na onye ọsụ ụzọ n'ọhịa foto azụmahịa
Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Los Angeles dị ka onye na-ese foto azụmahịa n'afọ ndị 1970, mgbe ụmụ nwanyị ole na ole guzobere ma nọgide na-arụ ọrụ na-aga nke ọma n'ọhịa, ọkachasị ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka-Amerịka
N'oge ọ na-arụ ọrụ, 'o nyere aka dị ukwuu n'ịgbasa ọdịdị nke ihe oyiyi ndị kọwapụtara ọdịbendị pop na United States'
A maara DuMetz maka ọrụ ya na ndị ama ama Afrịka-Amerịka, ụlọ ọrụ na ihe oyiyi nke ndụ kwa ụbọchị na obodo ndị Afrịka-Amerịka
O ritere ihe nrite CEBA atọ na ihe nrite LULU maka foto azụmahịa ya
Ihe ngosi otu gụnyere ọrụ ya na Atlanta, Chicago, Los Angeles na New York City
Ntụle nke ọrụ ya apụtala na Carl Van Vechten Gallery na Mahadum Fisk n'afọ 2014 na Mahadụ Texas Southern
A mụrụ DuMetz na Charleston, West Virginia, naanị nwa nwanyị na nke abụọ n'ime ụmụ anọ nke Eustace T
DuMetz, II, DDS na Constance R
(née Brooks)
Nna nna ya, Eustace DuMetz, bụ onye na-ese foto n'efu nke rụrụ ọrụ maka Pittsburgh Courier na Charleston Gazette
Mgbe DuMetz dị afọ ise, ezinụlọ ya kwagara Detroit ebe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Central High School
Ọ gara Mahadum Fisk dị na Nashville, Tennessee, na-amụ Saịkolojị
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Fisk na 1969, ọ gara Art Center College of Design, nke dị ugbu a na Pasadena, California
DuMetz abụwo onye na-ese foto ọkachamara ihe karịrị afọ iri anọ
N'oge ọrụ ya, o mepụtara ihe oyiyi ndị nwetara ihe nrite maka ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi gụnyere Burrell Advertising, J
Martin Associates na InterNorth Corporation
Foto ya apụtala na akwụkwọ ndị Afrịka-Amerịka gụnyere Black Enterprise, Ebony, Essence, Jet na The Crisis
O were foto azụmahịa maka ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere The Coca-Cola Company, Delta Air Lines na McDonald's Corporation

DuMetz na-agba ọsọ ma na-elekọta ụlọ ọrụ foto atọ dị iche iche dị na mpaghara Los Angeles ebe ụlọ ahịa ngalaba, ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ, ụlọ ọrụ eserese, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi, ụlọ ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze, ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nkiri, ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ndị ọkachamara azụmaahịa nyere ya nkwekọrịta

DuMetz agbaala foto nke ndị ama ama na ndị na-ese ihe na ndị mmadụ gụnyere Maya Angelou, Ernie Barnes, Bernie Casey, Pam Grier, Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, Quincy Jones, Samella Lewis, Ed McMahan, Thelonious Monk, Lou Rawls, Della Reese, Richard Roundtree, Betye Saar, Charles Wilbert White, na Nancy Wilson

Ihe ngosi ya The Creators Photographic Images of Literary, Music and Visual Artists, na Southwest Arts Center na Atlanta, Georgia, n'afọ 2015, gụnyere foto nke ihe karịrị ndị omenkà Afrịka-Amerịka iri abụọ na abụọ ọ sere foto
Barbara Earl Thomas (amụrụ n'afọ 1948) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nkiri, onye édémédé, na ónyé nchịkwa nka nke bi na Seattle
Thomas, nwa nwa nke ndị na-arụ ọrụ ugbo n'ebe ndịda nke kwagara Pacific Northwest na 1940s
A mụrụ ya na Seattle, WA na 1948, ọ bụ otu n'ime ọgbọ mbụ n'ezinụlọ ya a mụrụ na mpụga Texas na Louisiana
Ónyé na-ese ihe na-echeta na ndị ezinụlọ gbara ya gbụrụ-gbúrụ bụ ndị na-eme ihe mgbè niile n'oge ọ bụ nwata
Site mgbè ọ dị afọ asatọ, ọ na-ese ihe na eserese mgbè niile
Ọ na-edegharịkwa foto sitere na akwụkwọ akụkọ na akwụkwọ, na-enye nne ya nsonaazụ
Thomas nwetara BA
ya na Mahadum Washington na 1973
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Grenoble na France n'afọ 1976, ọ laghachiri na alma mater ya, na-agwụcha nzere Master of Fine Arts n'afọ 1977
Thomas gụrụ akwụkwọ n'okpuru Jacob Lawrence, Michael Spafford, na Norman Lundin mgbe ọ nọ na Mahadum Washington, na-ekwu na ha 'gosiri na nka bụ ihe ị na-eme dị ka ọrụ ndụ gị
' Ha abụọ abụghị naanị ndị nduzi ya kamakwa ọ na-ewere ha dị ka ndị enyi ogologo oge
Ónyé mbụ n'ezinụlọ ya ịga kọleji, Thomas malitere na ebumnuche na-edoghị anya ịghọ 'ónyé na-agwọ ọrịa anụ ahụ,' n'ikpeazụ na-aghọta na isi na nka bụ ihe ga-ekwe omume
Na mgbakwunye na ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe, Thomas bụ ónyé édémédé na ónyé nchịkwa nka
A họpụtara Thomas ka ọ bụrụ osote ónyé nduzi nke Northwest African American Museum n'afọ 2005, tupu ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie ahụ emegheere ọha na eze, wee gaa n'ọkwa ónyé isi nchịkwa n'afọ 2008
N'ịchọ itinye oge ka ukwuu na nka ya, ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ ónyé isi nchịkwa ógè niile na Jenụwarị 201
Thomas na-arụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ usoro, gụnyere ihe osise egg tempera, iko, akwụkwọ a ga-ebibi, linocut na woodblock prints, ihe ọkpụkpụ, na ntinye
Ebumnuche ọrụ ya bụ ịkọ akụkọ
Na mgbakwunye na akụkọ ihe mere eme na ahụmịhe onwé ya, ọ kọwara ọrụ ya dị ka nke sitere na nyocha nke ihe ndị ọ bi na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-emetụta ndụ ya
Ọ na-ahụkwa usoro nke ime ihe osise dị ka ịmepụta usoro na mbara igwe, ma ọ bụ dị ka o kwuru na 1990, dị ka mgbalị ịchịkwa ọgba aghara
Mmiri riri ndị mụrụ Thomas n'ihe mberede ụgbọ mmiri n'afọ 1998
Ọbụna tupu ọdachi a, ịkụ azụ, ọrụ ezinụlọ dị mkpà, dị mkpa n'ọrụ ya

Ónyé na-enyocha nka Michael Upchuch akọwaala ihe oyiyi Thomas dị ka 'ndị mmadụ nọ n'ebe a na-amakụ n'ahụ n'anya, ugoloọma dị ka ndị na-eme ihe na ndị na-eri ibe na ndị na'anya, akwụkwọ dị ka ụlọ dị mma màkà uche ibi
' Kemgbe ngwụcha afọ 1990, ihe odide ya, ndị ka dị mkpa n'ọrụ ya, ejirila ala, oké osimiri, na mbara igwe na-agbakwunyewanye
Ọrụ Thomas dị na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke Seattle Art Museum, Tacoma Art Museum, Whatcom Museum na Washington's State Art Collection
O mepụtara 'The Story House' (2009), kọmitii nka ọha na eze na The Evergreen State College na Olympia, Washington nke bụ akụkụ nke Washington's State Art Collection
Storm Watch The Art of Barbara Earl Thomas (nke University Washington Press bipụtara na 1998)
Barbara Grace Tucker bụ onye Australia a mụrụ na-ahụ maka udo
Ọ bụ nwa amaala nke Glen Waverley nke Melbourne ma gaa ọtụtụ ebe tupu ọ gaa biri na Britain na mbido afọ 1980
Ọ sonyeere London Parliament Square Peace Campaign nke Brian Haw n'ọnwa Disemba 2005
Haw malitere mkpọsa a na June 2001 iji mee mkpesa megide mmachibido iwu megide Iraq nke bibiri ndị Iraq ma, dị ka UNICEF si kwuo, gbuo ihe dị ka ụmụaka 500,000
N'ime afọ asaa ma ọ bụ karịa kemgbe Tucker rutere, e jidere ya ugboro iri anọ na asaa na ebubo nke 'mgbaghara na-enweghị ikike'
N'afọ 2008, ọ nọrọ izu abụọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ maka imebi ụgwọ ndị uwe ojii, n'afọ 2011 ọ nọrọ izu itoolu n'ụlọ ikpe Holloway
Kemgbe ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2012, a jụrụ inye ya ụlọikwuu, blanket ma ọ bụ akpa ihi ụra wee hie ụra n'oche, ruo mgbe e weghaara ya
A gwọrọ Tucker maka ikpughe ma nọrọ oge ụfọdụ na intravenous drip
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2013, Tucker malitere ọgba ọsọ agụụ mgbe ọ nọsịrị na-eme ngagharị iwe n'ọma ahịa ruo afọ asatọ
Ya na ndị na-akwado ya kwere nkwa ịga n'ihu na ngagharị iwe ha, ha mekwara ya ruo mgbe e mesịrị n'afọ 2013
Barbara Hogan (Amụrụ n'ụbọchị 28 Febụwarị 1952) bụ onye bụbu Minista nke Ahụike na nke Ụlọ Ọrụ Ọha na Cabinet nke South Africa
Hogan gara St Dominic's Catholic School for Girls, Boksburg, wee nweta nzere na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand
Hogan nwere nzere na Accounting na Economics
Hogan sonyeere African National Congress n'afọ 1976 mgbe Soweto Uprising gasịrị, ọtụtụ afọ mgbe ekwupụtara na nzukọ ahụ megidere iwu ma mee ka ọrụ ya dị n'okpuru ala
Ọrụ ya n'ime òtù a bụ ịhazi ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọcha, sonye na mkpọsa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọha na eze ma nye ndị ANC n'okpuru ala na Botswana ozi gbasara ndị otu ọrụ na ọrụ obodo na South Africa

E jidere Hogan n'afọ 1982 maka imezu ebumnuche nke nzukọ a machibidoro iwu ma mgbe a gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ, mesoo ya mmeso ọjọọ ma tinye ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ naanị ya ruo otu afọ, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ na South Africa a mara ikpe ịgba ọchịchị mgba okpuru ma maa ya ikpe ịga mkpọrọ afọ iri
A tọhapụrụ Hogan n'afọ 1990 site na mwepụ nke òtù ndị a machibidoro iwu na ya na ndị mkpọrọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ndị ọzọ, ọkachasị Nelson Mandela
Mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa n'ịhazigharị ANC na ikike ya dị ka odeakwụkwọ nke ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara PWV
Mgbe Kgalema Motlanthe malitere ọrụ dịka onye isi ala n'ụbọchị 25 Septemba 2008, ọ họpụtara Hogan dị ka Minista ahụike iji dochie Manto Tshabalala-Msimang

A họpụtara Hogan ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ahụike ọha na eze n'ụbọchị Septemba 2008 dabere na nkà nchịkwa ego ya, nke dị mkpa ngwa ngwa na Ngalaba Ahụike, dị ka ọ si kwuo na ajụjụ ọnụ News24 gbara ya n'afọ 2008
Ọ bụ ezie na Hogan abụghị ọkachamara n'ihe gbasara ahụike, o kwuru na o nwere onye nnọchi anya nwere ike, Dr Molefi Sefularo, onye bụ dọkịta ma na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ngalaba ahụike

Hogan nyeere gọọmentị South Africa aka idozi ọrịa AIDS n'etiti ndị South Africa mgbe ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri nke ịgọnahụ na ileghara anya site n'aka Minista ahụike gara aga, Manto Tshabalala-Msimang
Barbara Jeppe (ubochí irí abụọ n'otu n'ọnwa Mee 1921 Pilgrim's Rest rụọ úbọchị irí abụọ n'ọnwa Juun 1999 Johannesburg) bụ onye na-ese ihe ọkụkụ na South Africa
A mụrụ ya n'ọbọdọ na-egwupụta ihe n'ime àlá nkè Pilgrim's Rest, ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke Victor Brereton, onye na-enyocha ala, na Gladys Evans
Mgbe ọ dị obere, nne ya méré ka ọ mátá ụwa nkè okooko osisi ọhịa
Ọ lụrụ Carl Louis Jeppe, Ónyé isi mgbaka
Dí nà nwunye ahụ nwèrè ụmụ anọ, Leigh, Marie, Carl na David
Afọ iri abụọ n'ime alụmdi na nwunye ya, o sere akwụkwọ mbụ ya, Trees and Shrubs of the Witwatersrand (Witwatersrand University Press) nke o ji mee akara ya n'ọhịa nke nkà ihe ọkụkụ
N'ime afọ atọ, ọ nọrọ otu afọ na Cape, na-ese ihe osise ma na-ede ederede màkà akwụkwọ yá nà Cape bulbs
Mmasị a màkà bulbs mèrè ka e bipụta Spring and Winter Flowering Bulbs of the Western Cape (Oxford University Press, 1989)
Kew Publishing bipụtara ọrụ ya na Amaryllidaceae n'afọ 2017 nà ihé osise ndị ọzọ nke nwa ya nwanyị, Leigh Voigt, na ederede nke Graham Duncan
E wezụga ihe osise botanical ya, Barbara Jeppe nwere nnukwu ịhụnanya màkà urukurubụba ma see ọtụtụ màkà ndị enyi na ezinụlọ
Ọ na-agbakwa mbọ mgbè ụfọdụ n'ise ihe osise ala

E nyere ya ihe nrite ọla èdọ̀ abụọ na 1990, otú site na Botanical Society of South Africa, ihe nrite Cythna Letty Gold màkà onyinye màkà ihe osise botanical na South Africa, na nke ọzọ site na South African Nurserymen's Association
Òtù Transvaal Horticultural Society nyere ya ihe nrite ọlaọcha na 1991
Ọ nwụrụ mgbè ọ dị afọ 78 na Johannesburg site na nsogbụ mgbè ọ butere oyi bàrà ya n'ahụ

Barbara Jones-Hogu (April 17, 1938 November 14, 2017) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe n'Afrịka na America nke a maara nke ọma màkà ọrụ ya na Organization of Black American Culture (OBAC) na màkà ịtọ ntọala ndị na-ese egwu AfriCOBRA
A mụrụ Barbara Jones-Hogu na Chicago, Illinois, na 1938
O nwetara nzèrè Bachelor of Arts na Mahadum Howard na nzèrè Bachelor of Fine Arts na School of the Art Institute of Chicago
O nwetara nzèrè Master of Fine Arts site na Institute of Design na Chicago, yana nzere masta na obibi akwụkwọ site na Illinois Institute of Technology, Chicago
O mechara nweta Master of Fine Arts na Independent Film na Digital Imaging na Governors State University mgbè ọ dị afọ iri asaa
Ọ chọrọ inweta akara ugo mmụta iji dekọọ ndị na-ese ihe na ọrụ ha
A kọwara ya dị ka ónyé na-ezo onwe ya ma na-eche echiche
O nwere otu nwa nwoke, Kuumba Hogu, ónyé kwuru na ọ chọrọ ka a cheta nne ya site na ọrụ nka ya
Jones-Hogu bụ ónyé otu Organization of Black American Culture (OBAC), ma nye aka mgbe ha rụchara Wall of Respect na 1967
A na-ewere ya dị ka ihe osise okporo ámá mbụ na United States
Ọ gụsịrị ngalaba ndị na-eme ihe nkírí
Jones-Hogu malitere itinye aka na obibi akwụkwọ mgbè ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na The Art Institute of Chicago
Isi ya na Painting gụnyere ọmụmụ ihe na printmaking, ọ chọpụtakwara na ọ na-enwe mmasị na ya mgbe ọ na-eme ihe ọmụmụ maka isi ya
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ mgbè ọ na-aga ụlọ akwụkwọ
O nwekwara ike iji ụlọ obibi akwụkwọ na Institute of Design

Misch Kohn, onye isi nke obibi akwụkwọ n'oge ahụ, nyere ya mkpịsị ugodi maka ụlọ obibi akwụkwọ ka o wee nwee ike mezue ọrụ obibi akwụkwọ n'ebe ahụ mgbe ọ bụla ọ chọrọ, na-emekarị n'uhuruchi na ngwụsị izu
Ọrụ Jones-Hogu dị ọtụtụ na ọnụ ọgụgụ, nkesa na ọnọdụ
E nwèrè ọtụtụ ọrụ nke Jones-Hogu nke sitere na mkpa ya na mmetụta ya na òtù AfriCOBRA yana ọrụ onwé ya nke sitere na 1960s na 70s ruo n'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya na ọnwụ ya na 2017

Ụfọdụ ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ya gụnyere 'Soul of A Nation Art In The Age of Black Power', 'AfriCOBRA Nation Time', 'A AfriCOBRA Messages to the People', na 'We Wanted A Revolution Black Radical Women, 1965-85,' na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Barbara Mosima Joyce Masekela (amụrụ 18 Julaị na afo 1941) bụ onye na-ede uri South Afrika, onye nkuzi na onye ndọrọndọrọ onye jigidere ọkwa nka nka n'ime African National Congress (ANC)
Barbara Masekela mụrụ na 18 Julaị na afo 1941 na obodo Alexandra nke Johannesburg, South Africa
Nke abụọ n'ime ụmụaka anọ a mụrụ Pauline na Thomas Masekela, nwanne ya nwoke nke tọrọ Hugh Masekela tolitere bụrụ onye na-egwu jazz nke ọma
Mgbe ọ bụ nwa ọhụrụ, e zigara ya ka ya na nne nne ya biri na Witbank (nke a maara ugbu a dị ka EMalahleni )
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 10, Barbara laghachiri na obodo Alexandra ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ Anglican nke Saint-Michael
Nne na nna ya zụlitere ezinụlọ mara mma nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị; site na nwata Barbara maara banyere ọnọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke South Afrika

Mgbe ọ na-aga Seminary ụmụ nwanyị Inanda na Durban, o nwere ohere izute ọtụtụ ndị na-akwado ikike obodo South Afrika, dị ka onye isi ANC Albert Luthuli, nke ga-akpụzi ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na agụmakwụkwọ n'ọdịnihu
N'afọ 1960, Masekela gụchara akwụkwọ sekọndrị wee rụọ ọrụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ
Mgbe ọnwa isii gachara, ọ debanyere aha na campus Basutoland nke Mahadum Basutoland, Bechuanaland na Swaziland
Mgbe otu semester na mahadum gasịrị, ọ kwagara Ghana iji nyere mba ahụ nweere onwe ọhụrụ aka iwebata usoro mmụta nke Western
Na February na afo 1963 Masekela butere ụkwara nta wee ziga ya na United Kingdom, bụ ebe a na-agwọ ya n'afọ sochiri ya
Mgbe emezigharịrị ya ọ nọrọ na UK ọnwa ole na ole tupu ọ kwaga New York City na afo 1965, ebe ọ debanyere aha na Mahadum Fordham

Ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ya na Mahadum Fordham dị mkpụmkpụ; na klaasị Anthropology ya ọ nwetara ịkpa ókè agbụrụ site n'aka ndị prọfesọ ya, bụ ndị lere ọha mmadụ na-abụghị nke ọdịda anyanwụ anya dị ka ndị mbụ na ndị na-emepeghị emepe
Masekela dara ọrịa ọzọ wee laghachi Africa, gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum Zambia na afo 1967
N'ime afọ nke atọ ya na Mahadum Zambia ọ nwere ihe mberede ụgbọ ala; mmerụ ahụ nke kpatara ya mere ka ya na nwanne ya nwoke nọrọ na California ruo mgbe ọ gbakere
Mgbe mmerụ ahụ ya gwọchara ọ nọrọ na United States iji mechaa nzere BA ya na nzere bekee na Ohio State University na afo 1971
Na afo 1972 ọ malitere nkuzi na Staten Island Community College
Na afo 1973, ọ gara n'ihu na-akụzi akwụkwọ Bekee na Mahadum Rutgers ruo afo 1982
N'oge ya na Rutgers, ọ na-ewere naanị ezumike iji mezue akara ugo mmụta nna ya ukwu na afo 1976
Agụnyere abụ ya na akwụkwọ ndị dị otú ahụ na Sterling Plumpp 's Somehow We Survive Anthology of South African Writing (New York Thunder's Mouth Press, 1982)

Ka ọ nọsịrị na South Afrika afọ 22, Masekela ka na-akwado ma na-akwado obodo ya site na akwụkwọ akụkọ ebe okwu African National Congress (ANC) na-apụta na akụkọ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ụbọchị niile

Site na mgbasa ozi, Masekela mụtara banyere mkpali ha na-akwado mmachi akụ na ụba nke ga-emebi ọchịchị South Africa, na mmekọrịta ha na mba Scandinavian na-esiwanye ike mgbe nile, nke a na-ejikọta ya na ihe gbasara ikike mmadụ
Achọpụtara na Zimbabwe na Mozambique nwetara nnwere onwe ma na-alụso usoro ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na South Africa ọgụ
Ọ bụ mgbe ahụ, na mmalite na afo 1980s ka Masekela sonyeere òtù mgbochi ịkpa ókè agbụrụ wee kwuo okwu na ihe ngosi na America, na-enye ya aha dị ka onye na-agbasi mbọ ike
N'August afo 1982 Masekela mere njem ya laghachi Lusaka, Zambia, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka odeakwụkwọ nhazi maka ANC oge niile
Mgbe ọ rụsịrị ọrụ naanị maka ANC otu afọ, a gwara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ngalaba nke Arts na Culture ANC, nke ọ nabatara
Na afo 1990, obere oge ka a tọhapụrụ ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ afọ 27, Nelson Mandela bịara United States na India iji kelee onye ọ bụla nyeere ya na ANC aka

A gwara Masekela ka o soro ya, na-ahụ maka nhazi na nhazi oge, nakwa ka o nye aka n'ịkwalite ego na nkwado sitere n'aka ụmụ akwụkwọ na ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị maka nzukọ a na ntuli aka nke ọtụtụ agbụrụ, ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nke fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ na ọ ga-abịa n'ihu
N'ịbụ onye na-arụ ọrụ nke ọma na nke ọma, ọ masịrị Mandela nke ukwuu nke na ọ rịọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ndị ọrụ n'ọfịs ya

N'otu afọ ahụ, Masekela kwuru okwu nke mere ka o doo anya njikọ ọ na-ekwu mgbe niile n'etiti nka na omenala obodo ọ bụla, na nkà n'ụdị ọ bụla gosipụtara ụkpụrụ ogologo oge nke ọha mmadụ, ma ọ bụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, nke iwu, ma ọ bụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze
Ọ jere ozi gọọmentị South Afrika n'ọkwa kachasị elu mgbe, mgbe nraranye ya dị ka Onye isi ala, nke ọ na-achị, Mandela họpụtara ya onye nnọchi anya South Africa mbụ na France na UNESCO na 1995
N'ikpeazụ, na 8 Septemba na afo 2003, Onye isi ala Mbeki họpụtara onye nnọchi anya South Africa ya na United States
N'etiti nhọpụta ndị nnọchianya, ọ jere ozi dị ka onye isi nchịkwa maka ọha na ụlọ ọrụ maka De Beer Consolidated Mines
Ọ jere ozi dịka onye nlekọta nke Nelson Mandela Children Fund na Nelson Mandela Foundation

Masekela nwekwara ọkwa dị iche iche nke ndị isi na ndị na-abụghị ndị isi, gụnyere onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Standard Bank of South Africa, South Africa Broadcasting Corporation na International Marketing Council
Ọ bụ ya bụ onye isi oche ndị isi oche nke National State Theatre
Masekela bụ onye natara Order of Luthuli na Silver, nke e nyere ya maka 'ezigbo ntinye aka na mkpochapụ nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na inye aka na mmepe nke ụkpụrụ ọhụrụ South Africa'

Barbara Minishi bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-ese ihe, onye na-ese foto ejiji na onye nduzi nka nke isiokwu nyocha ya na-apụta ihe site na njem akụkọ ifo nke onwe ya,ihe ekere eke ihe gbagwojuru anya na mgbagwoju anya pụrụ iche, na ntinye ichu nke ngosipụta nke ihe osise pụtara ihe
Dị ka onye nduzi nka,ọ rụọla ọrụ na ihe nkiri na vidiyo egwu, nakwa maka Kapringen (A Hijacking), ihe nkiri Danish site na 2003
Na Kenya, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ọkachamara na-ese foto ejiji a na-akwanyere ùgwù
E gosipụtala usoro foto Minishi n'akwụkwọ akpọrọ book 9 Photographers from Kenya nke e bipụtara na njikọ National Museums of Kenya
Barbara Minishi, si Nairobi, Kenya, gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 2003 na nzere BA na nkwukọrịta
Ọrụ ya dị ka ọkachamara na-ese foto malitere mgbe ọ chọpụtara ihe oyiyi njikọ obi na-akpali ọ hutara n'ime ya
Minishi kwuru 'Foto bụ otú m si malite nyocha okike m ma n'ụzọ ụfọdụ mmadụ nwere ike ịsị na igwefoto ghọrọ ngwá ọrụ m iji kpughee, rubigharịa, ma jiri ihe odide ndị dị otú ahụ nke njirimara gwu egwu
Ọ bụ 'olu' m na ụzọ nke ịbụ nke mepụtara 'ihe omume' nke m nwere ike itinye aka na isiokwu ndị dị ka echiche na agbụrụ, ala na nke m, ngosipụta mmetụta, mmetụta obodo na ịma mma

N'agbanyeghi 'ihe ịga nke ọma' nke azụmahịa,amaliterem ịjụ ajụjụ gbasara ọrụ m dị ka nwanyị Afrịka na-ahụ maka nkwukọrịta,Mpụta ihe, ntụziaka na nchịkọta ọrụ m nwere ike isi gbanwee site n'ime omume nyocha na itinye aka nke metụtara ndị na-ege ntị dị ka ịnwe ọnọdụ na ntinye aka na uche ndị na-ege ntị
Omume m anọgidewo na-agbanwe ma jiri ya na-ejikwa ngwá ọrụ m na-emepụta, nke gụnyere ugbu a ihe nkiri, egwu,ihe osise,ọrụ to na ntinye ụda na mmeghari
Ugbu a, ana m ahụ onwe m n'ime ọnọdụ, na-ntinye aka na mgbanwe na-aga n'ihu nke mkparịta ụka ihe pụtara ihe, akụkọ nyocha nke ihe ọmụma gụnyere, ajụjụ ntụgharị uche na na mpụtara nwanyị
Enwere mmekọrịta n'ime ebumnuche zoro ezo na mmekorita ya na nkwupụta mgbanwe na-apụta tinyere nlekọta nke ala ọhụrụ, ọdịbendị na echiche
Ọrụ ya na-aga n'ihu ma ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a karicha n' ide ma na-eduzi ihe nkiri ya na ọrụ ndị ọzọ dị ka obere ihe nkiri, vidiyo ejiji, ihe nkiri, eserese, na edemede
Minishi meritere ihe nrite Best Art Director maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Nairobi Half Life n'afọ 2014 African Magic Viewer's Choice Awards na Machị 2014
Barbara Oteng Gyasi (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 5 n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1964) bụ onye ndọrọ juu ndọrọ ọchịchị Ghana na onye bụbu onye omeiwu nke Prestea Huni-Valley nke Western Region nke Ghana
Ọ bụ onye otu New Patriotic Party (NPP), ọ bụkwa osote onye minista na-ahụ maka ala na akụrụngwa na Ghana nakwa onye bụbu minista na njem nleta, ọdịbendị na nka
A mụrụ Gyasi na 5 Ọktoba na afọ 1964
O nwere akara ugo mmụta na Mahadum nke Ghana O nwere nzere bachelọ nke iwu site na Ghana School of Law
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi ngalaba iwu na Vivo Energy Ghana Limited site na afo 2012 ruo afọ 2016

Dị ka onye NPP, a họpụtara Barbara ka ọ nọchite anya Prestea Huni-Valley Constituency na afọ 2016, mana o nweghị oche na ntuli aka Ghana nke afọ 2020, ebe Wisdom Cudjoe nke National Democratic Congress (NDC) meriri ya
Oteng Gyasi bụ Onye Kraịst
Rosalie Barbara Pike amụrụ n'ubochí irí abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1933 na Johannesburg bụ ónyé na-ese ihe ọkụkụ nà South Africa
Barbara Pike bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị abụọ nke Barend Elzas, ónyé na-emepụta kemịkal, na nwunye ya Klara 'Claire' Kindinger mụrụ
Ọ gàrà ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Parktown màkà ụmụ nwanyị na Johannesburg wee banye n'akwụkwọ na 1949
Ọ nwetara BSc
na botany na zoology na Mahadum Witwatersrand na 1952 wee gaa na Diploma agụmakwụkwọ dị elu na Johannesburg College of Education
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka biochemist na onye na-ese ihe na ngalaba nke ịwa ahụ na ọgwụ, Mahadum Witwatersrand site na 1953 na 1955
N'afọ 1956, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye biochemist màkà Ngalaba Nnyocha Mmiri na CSIR na Johannesburg
Mgbe nke a gasịrị, ọ laghachiri na Mahadum Witwatersrand ọzọ iji wéré ọkwa onye na-ese ihe osise botanical màkà Ngalaba Botany n'etiti afọ 1957 ruo 1985
The Geological Survey Museum na Pretoria were ya n'ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na 1985
Barbara lụrụ Merrill Andrew Pike ma nwee ụmụ nwoke abụọ, Andrew John Pike 1958 na Richard Linden Pike 1961
Ọ bi nà Parkwood, Johannesburg ugbu a
Ihe nrite izizi ya bụ n'afọ 1945 na National Eisteddfod mgbe ọ meriri n'ọnọdụ mbụ na ngalaba 'ihe osise n'okpuru afọ iri na abuo'
Kirstenbosch nyere ya ihe nrite ọlaọcha na 2000 na 2004, ihe nrite ego edo na 2002 na 2006
Ihe osise ya apụtala na
Dorothy Barbara Saben CBE (1912 na 16 Septemba 2014) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda
A họpụtara ya na Alice Boase na Kansụl Iwu na 1954, na-aghọ ụmụ nwanyị mbụ so na ya
Saben mechara bụrụ nwanyị mbụ bụ onyeisi obodo Kampala
A mụrụ Saben na India na 1912
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ onwe onye, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na St James College na London site na 1931 ruo 1932
Ya na di ya bụ onye ọchụnta ego kwagara Uganda n'afọ 1940
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Kansụl Ụmụ nwanyị nke Uganda na 1946
Na 1951 New Year Honours e nyere ya MBE maka ọrụ ọha na eze ya na Uganda
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere National Council of Social Service, na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche ya
N'afọ 1954, a họpụtara Saben na Alice Boase ka ha bụrụ ndị omeiwu, na-aghọ ụmụ nwanyị mbụ so na ya
Mgbe ntuli aka nke afọ 1958 gasịrị, ọ ghọrọ osote onyeisi oche nke ndị nnọchiteanya nke ndị otu, otu ndị a họpụtara
Ọ nọgidere na Council ruo 1961
Saben ghọkwara onye otu Kampala City Council mgbe e guzobere ya
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi obodo site na 1959 ruo na afọr otu puku narị itoolu na iri isii , ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ bụ onye isi obodo ahụ na 1961, na-eje ozi ruo 1962
E nyere ya CBE na 1963 New Year Honours; ka e mesịrị n'otu afọ ahụ ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na City Council
Barbara Soky (amụrụ Bara Sokoroma ) bụ onye Naijiria na- eme ihe nkiri na onye bụbu onye na-agụ egwú bụ onye bilitere na- ewu ewu na usoro TV Mirror in the Sun
N'ịgbaso nkwụsịtụ ka arụchara ọrụ dị iche iche na 80s na 90s, Soky maliteghachiri ọrụ ime ihe nkiri, na-apụta na ihe nkiri Nollywood na mgbakwunye na ncha ndị ọzọ
Ọrụ izizi Soky mere bụ onye na-anabata ọfịs Rosemary Hart na usoro NTA Inside Out
Na mbụ mmepụta NTA Port Harcourt, sitcom nwetara ewu ewu n'ofe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Nigeria site na ntinye aka na ọdụ NTA ndị ọzọ site na mgbanwe
Soky nwekwara akụkụ ya na Adiela Onyedibia na ị nweghị ike ịkpọrọ nwunye gị gaa New York, usoro gbasara onye nnọchiteanya Naijiria na nwunye na-agụghị akwụkwọ
Mgbe Inside Out kwụsịrị, Rivers- native Soky kwagara Lagos ebe ọ gbara egwu na Lola Fani-Kayode 's serial Mirror in the Sun

Mgbe afọ 13 kwụsịtụrụ bụ nke hụrụ obere oge ọ na-etinye aka na ihe ngosi telivishọn, Soky laghachiri n'ime ihe nkiri nke Amaka Igwe emeputa Solitaire dị ka Nkoyo Broderick, nwanyị kpebisiri ike ichekwa akụ na ụba ezinụlọ
Na 1986, Soky wepụtara album Going Places n'okpuru Mercury Records
Tupu ọ nweta nkwekọrịta ndekọ, agwa ya Rosemary na Inside Out abụwo abụ na ihe nkiri ahụ
Na 2013 Soky ka a na-akpọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na ọrụ nkwado na 2013 Nollywood Movies Awards maka arụmọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Bridge of Hope
N'afọ 2014 ọ nwetara otu nhọpụta maka ọrụ ya na fim Brothers Keeper na Africa Movie Academy Awards
Soky nwere nwa nwanyị Maxine
Barbara Steele (amụrụ na 29 Disemba 1937) bụ onye England na-eme ihe nkiri nke a maara maka ime ihe nkiri egwu Gothic nke Itali nke afọ 1960
A na-akpọ ya 'Queen of All Scream Queens' na 'nwanyi mbụ nke egwu Britain'
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ abụọ nke Asa na Katia Vajda na ihe nkiri Mario Bava Black Sunday (1960), ma mee ihe nkiri na The Pit and the Pendulum (1961), The Horrible Dr
Hichcock (1962), The Long Hair of Death (1964), na Castle of Blood (1964)

Tụkwasị na nke a, Steele nwere ọrụ nkwado na Federico Fellini's 81⁄2 (1963), David Cronenberg's Shivers (1975), na Louis Malle's Pretty Baby (1978), wee pụta na telivishọn na usoro TV nke 1991 Dark Shadows
O ritere ihe nrite Primetime Emmy maka imepụta ihe nkiri telivishọn America bụ War and Remembrance (1988-1989)
Steele pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na afọ 2010, gụnyere ọrụ ndu na The Butterfly Room (2012) na ọrụ nkwado na Ryan Gosling's Lost River (2014)
A mụrụ Steele na Birkenhead, Cheshire
Ọ gụrụ nka na Chelsea Art School na Paris na Sorbonne
N'ime afọ ndị 1960, Steele pụtara na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri egwu ndị Ịtali, gụnyere Black Sunday (1960), The Horrible Dr
Hichcock (1962), The Ghost (1963), The Long Hair of Death (1964), Castle of Blood (1964), Terror-Creatures from the Grave na Nightmare Castle (ha abụọ 1965)
O mekwara ihe nkiri na Roger Corman nke The Pit and the Pendulum (1961), nke dabeere na obere akụkọ Edgar Allan Poe nke otu aha ahụ, na ihe nkiri Britain bụ Curse of the Crimson Altar (1968)
Onye ọbịa Steele gosipụtara na ihe ngosi telivishọn Britain gụnyere ihe nkiri ndị nledo, Danger Man (aka Secret Agent) nke Patrick McGoohan gosipụtara na 1965
O mere ihe nkiri telivishọn America nke mbụ ya na 1960 dị ka Dolores na 'Daughter of Illusion' nke usoro ABC, Adventures in Paradise, nke Gardner McKay gosipụtara
N'otu afọ ahụ, Barbara Eden nọchiri ya na ihe nkiri Elvis Presley Flaming Star mgbe ya na onye nduzi Don Siegel nwesịrị nghọtahie
N'afọ 1961, ọ pụtara dị ka Phyllis na 'Beta Delta Gamma' nke CBS's Alfred Hitchcock Presents
O nwekwara ọrụ nkwado na Federico Fellini's 81⁄2 (1963), na 1966 pụtara na oge nke abụọ nke NBC's I Spy, 'Bridge of Spies'
Steele laghachiri n'ụdị egwu na ngwụcha afọ 1970, na-apụta na ihe nkiri egwu atọ David Cronenberg's Shivers (aka
Ha Si n'Ime) (1975), Piranha (1978), na The Silent Scream (1979)

Steele jere ozi dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri TV, The Winds of War (1983), ma bụrụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri maka ihe na-eso ya, War and Remembrance (1988), nke o kesara 1989 Emmy Award for Outstanding Drama / Comedy Special na onye na-arụ ọrụ Dan Curtis
A họpụtara Steele dị ka Julia Hoffman na 1991 remake nke 1960s ABC telivishọn usoro Dark Shadows
N'afọ 2010, ọ bụ onye ọbịa na ihe nkiri Dark Shadows, The Night Whispers
N'afọ 2014, ọ pụtara na Ryan Gosling's directory debut, ihe nkiri na-akpali akpali Lost River, nke ọ gosipụtara Belladonna na ọrụ nkwado
Steele lụrụ onye edemede America bụ James Poe
Ha lụrụ na 1969 ma gbaa alụkwaghịm na 1978
Barbara Thomson (Nke a na-akpọkwa Barbara Thompson) bụ osote minista na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na South Africa
Barbara (Louise) Trapido, amụrụ ya na 1941 dị ka Barbara Schuddeboom, bụ onye edemede Britain amụrụ na South Africa nke sitere na German, Danish na Dutch
Amụrụ na Cape Town wee tolite na Durban ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Natal wee nweta BA N'afọ 1963 tupu ọ kwaga London
Mgbe ọtụtụ afọ kụzichara ihe, ọ ghọrọ onye ode akwụkwọ oge niile n'afọ 1970
Trapido ebipụtala akwụkwọ akụkọ asaa, atọ n'ime ha ahọpụtara maka ihe nrite Whitbread

Ya ọkara autobiographical Frankie & Stankie, otu n'ime ndị a depụtara aha, nke na-emekọ ihe na-eto eto na-acha ọcha n'okpuru ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, nwetara nnukwu nlebara anya dị oke egwu, ọtụtụ n'ime ya dị mma
Edekwara ya ogologo oge maka ihe nrite Booker
Barbara Trapido na ezinụlọ ya bi na Oxford na ụfọdụ akwụkwọ ya nwere njikọ Oxford
Barbara Tyson Mosley (amụrụ n'afọ 1950) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, nke a maara màkà ihe osise ala ya, ihe osise mgbasa ozi, na ihe osise fiber
Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Louisville, Kentucky na n'ime obodo Black
A mụrụ Barbara Tyson Mosley na 1950 na Harrisburg, Pennsylvania
Ọ gàrà Mahadum nke District of Columbia ma nwee nzèrè Bachelor of Arts na Studio Arts na Mahadum Georgetown ma nwee nzere Master of Arts na Liberal Studies

Ọrụ ya dị na nchịkọta ọha na eze dị íchè íchè gụnyere San Bernardino County Museum, National Gallery of Art, Corcoran Gallery of Art (n'ime Evans-Tibbs Collection of African-American Artists), Mahadum Virginia Medical Center, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Barbra Banda (amụrụ na 20 Machị, na afọ 2000) bụ onye Zambia na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-agbachitere klọb China Shanghai Shengli na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị Zambia
Mgbe ọ nọrọ oge abụọ mbụ ya na klọb nke mbụ nke Spain EDF Logroño, na Jenụwarị, na afọ 2020, a kpọfere Banda na klọbu Chinese Super League Shanghai Shengli
N'oge izizi ya, ọ gbara goolu iri na asatọ n'egwuregwu league iri na atọ iji pụta dị ka onye kacha gbaa goolu na afọ 2020 Chinese Women's Super League
Banda nọchitere anya Zambia na afọ 2014 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup
N'egwuregwu mbụ nke Zambia na 2020 Olympics, Banda gbara hat trick megide Netherlands
N'egwuregwu nke abụọ ha, Banda gbara hat trick ọzọ megide China na egwuregwu ahụ kwụsịrị na 4o4 draw
Ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ na-agba bọọlụ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Olimpik iji nweta akara okpu azụ azụ na nke mbụ iji nweta akara abụọ okpu n'otu asọmpi
Onye ọ bụla
Barbro Cecilia Johansson (September 25, 1912 na December 7, 1999) bụ onye ozi ala ọzọ Swedish-Tanzanian
A mụrụ Barbro na St
John's Parish Malmö, obodo nke atọ kachasị ukwuu na Sweden na ọnwa Septemba 12, nke afọ 1912
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke Anders Johansson na onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ Betzy Persson Hussénius
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ịghọ onye nkuzi na Sweden, ọ gara Tanzania (nke a maara dị ka Tanganyika) na afọ 1946 iji jee ozi na Chọọchị Sweden (Chọọchị Evangelical Lutheran Swedish state)

Mgbe ọ nọ n'ọkwa ya na Tanzania, ọ kwadoro iwu ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị na Kashasha, Bukoba na afọ 1949, a họpụtakwara ya ka ọ sonye na ndị omeiwu mba ahụ na afọ 1959 dị ka onye nnọchi anya mpaghara Mwanza na onye otu Tanganyika African National Union (TANU), nke mechara jikọta ya na Chama Cha Mapinduzi
O mechara bụrụ onye minista dị mkpa na Gọọmentị Tanzania
Ọ bụkwa onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị, onye ndụmọdụ onye nnọchi anya Tanzania na Sweden, onye otu Mahadum Dar es-Salaam ma na-arụsi ọrụ ike mgbe niile n'imeziwanye agụmakwụkwọ ndị okenye
Ka oge na-aga, ọ ghọrọ ezigbo enyi nke Onye isi ala Julius Nyerere
Ọ pụtakwara maka nnwere onwe na mpaghara ndị ọzọ nke ndịda Afrịka, dị ka African National Congress
Ọ natara nzere doctorate na Mahadum Gothenburg n'afọ 1968 ma nye ya (Illis quorum) n'afọ 1990
Barein (nke a na-akpọkwa Baraïn, Barayin, Guilia, Jalkia ma ọ bu Jalkiya) bụ asụsụ Chadic a na-asụ na ndịda etiti Chad
Baraïn bụ nke mmadụ 6,000 bi n'obodo nta 30 ruo 40 gbara Melfi gburugburu na mpaghara Guéra nke ndịda Chad
Asụsụ ya ndị bụ isi anaghị aghọta ibe ha, ebe ndị na-asụ ya ga-agbaso asụsụ Chadian Arabic iji kwurịta okwu
Àtụ East Chadic languages
Barhoumi bụ aha nna a na-ahụkarị n'ebe ugwu (north) Afrịka
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere
Àtụ Infobox settlement
Bariga bụ ebe pụtara aputa na mpaghara dị na Lagos State, Nigeria
Ọ dịbu n'okpuru mpaghara gọọmentị ime obodo Somolu nke Lagos Steeti mana n'afọ 2013 gọmentị steeti mere ka ọ dị elu dị ka mpaghara mmepe nke kansụl mpaghara
Odeakwụkwọ gọmentị ime obodo dị na 19, Bawala Striti, Bariga
A na-akọwa ya site n'ụdị okike ya dị ka ngwa ngwa
Ọ nwere ugbu a dị ka Onye isi oche ya Alabi Kolade David
Ọ bụ ebe ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị kachasị ochie na Naịjirịa dị
Bariis Iskukaris, nke a na-akpọkwazi Isku-dheh karis (Somali البيلاف الصومالي), maọbụ nke a na'akpọzines Bariis bụ nri osikapa ọdịnaala sitere na nri Somalia
Aha Isku-dheh karis pụtara n'ụzọ nkịtị 'esi nri agwakọta ọnụ', ya mere a na-eji ya eme ihe mgbe ụfọdụ iji zoo aka n'ụzọ sara mbara na ihe ọkụkụ ndị ọzọ sitere na ọka chọrọ nri yiri nke ahụ
N'ihi ya, okwu a kapịrị ọnụ maka nri a bụ bariis isku-dheh karis nke pụtara 'osikapa (bariis) siri na-ngwakọta ọnụ'
A na-ejikari osikapa basmati eme Bariis iskukaris, a na-ejikarị mkpụrụ vaịn, peas, ya na poteto, yabasị na ose, ma jiri nwa atụrụ, anụ ehi, ewu, kamel, maọbụ ọkụkọ were sie ya
Ọ bụ nri mba Somalia ma bụrụkwa nke a ma ama karịsịa na agbamakwụkwọ ma bụrụkwa nri a na-eri n'ebe niile dịka akụkụ nke nri Somalia kwa ụbọchị
Ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ mgbe niile ka a na-ejikọta ya na nri anụ e siri esi, nke a na-ahụkarị bụ anụ atụrụ maọbụ anụ ewu, ma jiri unere ọhụrụ
Barikisu Tettey-Quao (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1980) bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ nke gbara dịka onye na-agbachitere otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Ghana
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu na afọ 1999 FIFA Women's World Cup
Na klọb ọ na-egwuri egwu bụ La Ladies na Ghana
Sidney Kofi Ofori bụ onye Ghana na-edekọ egwu na onye ọchụnta ego nke a na-akpọ Barima Sidney
A mụrụ ya na Accra, Ghana, ma nọrọ afọ ntolite ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ n'ebe ahụ
Ọ gara Harvard College na West African Secondary School ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1996
Ọ gakwara Institute of Professional Studies (IPS), ebe ọ nwetara diplọma na Business Studies, ahịa (nhọrọ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya)
Kemgbe afọ 2001, Sidney enyewo aka na ụlọ ọrụ egwu Ghana na egwu ya gbasara mmekọrịta ọha na eze na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma rụọ ọrụ na Ghana na mba ofesi
Sidney nwetara aha mbụ ya na 2001 mgbe ọ wepụtara abọm izizi ya, Tinana
Abọm ahụ mere nke ọma, abọm nke abụọ ya, Akofna (2003) sochiri ya
O gosipụtara abụ esemokwu 'Abuskeleke'
Abụ ahụ ghọrọ ukwe, ma jiri ya kọwaa uwe mkpirikpi, nke na-adịghị mma ma ọ bụ nke na-akpali akpali
Sidney kọwara ihe ọ pụtara dị ka 'ezi itinye ego', nke a na-eche na ọ pụtara itinye ego na ịgba akwụna
A tọhapụrụ 'Y No Saa' n'afọ 2012 na egwu abụọ 'Enkɔ yie' na 'Awuchie cruise'
Egwú ya dị ka onye na-ese egwu malitere na 'Ebobɔba (Gadindim Gadem) ' na 2012, na 'E bobɔba Reloaded' na 2013
Na Febụwarị 27, 2016, Sidney guzobere otu na-abụghị nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị a na-akpọ 'Mutashi Movement' nke nwere ụkpụrụ 'Rise for the Future'
Ebumnuche nke otu ahụ bụ ịkụziri ndị ntorobịa banyere ikike ha, nnwere onwe, na ọrụ ha na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya
Ndị otu ahụ haziri usoro ihe omume gụnyere 'Nkwado zuru oke maka Black Stars' na mkpọsa It's your Right to Vote, yana ikere òkè na Chalewote Festival 2016
Sidney na-abụkarị rap n'asụsụ obodo ya Twi, a na-ewerekwa ya dị ka onye na-ese okwu na onye na-eti egwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'ihi abụ ya na-akatọ ndị otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ndị isi
Ọ ghọrọ onye Ghana mbụ na-eme nkiri hiplife na-eme na otu egwu na Ghana na arụmọrụ ya akpọrọ 'HIP LIVE'
'Abuskeleke' bụ abụ hiplife mbụ ya a ga-abụ abụ na ndụ, n'ihi ya kwa, a kpọrọ ya aha egwu nke 2003 album ya
'S lakti Noo,' ma ọ bụ 'Scent Noo,' bụ abụ na-ese okwu nke na-ekwu maka ọrụ rụrụ arụ
Sidney anọwo na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na-akpọ onwe ya onye na-akwado otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ụfọdụ

N'afọ 2003, New Patriotic Party jiri 'S__ilo____ilo____ilo__ Noo' mee ihe dị ka abụ mkpọsa n'oge ha na National Democratic Congress, otu ndị mmegide nke nọ n'ọchịchị n'oge ahụ, maka ikike ya na ntuli aka Ghana nke afọ 2004
Ọ bụ ezie na a tọhapụrụ abụ ahụ n'afọ 2003, ọ nwetara ewu ewu n'afọ 2004; 'S__ilo____ilo____ilo__ No' bụ okwu mmeri nke onye New Patriotic Party bụ John Kuffour nke ọ gbara ọsọ mmeri
Arụmụka ya na egwu Sidney toro na album ya nke afọ 2004 Obiaa Nye Obiaa, nke kwuru maka arụmụka gbasara ịha nhata na ọha mmadụ
E nwere ezumike mgbe abọm a gasịrị ebe ọ nyochara otu afọ maka otu esi agafe na mba ndị na-asụ French na egwu ya
O weputara abọm Africa Monie na ngwụcha afọ 2007
Ọganihu a mere ka ọ gaa njem ma rụọ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ mba Afrịka dị ka Benin, Cameroon, na Chad

Òtù ndị na-achị Afrịka ndị jiri 'Africa Monie' mee ihe dị ka abụ mkpọsa gụnyere Congress for Democracy and Progress nke Burkina Faso; Democratic Party nke Equatorial Guinea; Rally of the Republicans nke Côte d'Ivoire; na nso nso a, All Progressives Congress nke Nigeria

Òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ndị a niile gbasoro nduzi nke Ghana's National Democratic Congress, nke jiri abụ ahụ mee ihe n'ụzọ na-abụghị nke gọọmentị na mkpọsa megide ọchịchị onye isi ala Kuffuor iji merie ntuli aka onye isi ala nke afọ 2008
Onye isi ala Liberia George Weah nyere Sidney ọrụ iduzi nnukwu mkpọsa maka ntiwapụ nke ọrịa Ebola
Egwú isiokwu mkpọsa a kpọrọ 'Ebola; Africa ga-eguzo ma lụọ ọgụ ọnụ' ka edere n'okpuru mkpuchi egwu 'Udo' nke Lionel Peterson
Sidney sokwa na Child Soldier Campaign, nke a malitere na Liberia na 2003
'Nye ha mkpịsị akwụkwọ, ọ bụghị egbe' bụ abụ ọ raara nye ụmụaka ndị agha niile nọ n'ụwa, ọkachasị n'Africa
Ọ na-egosi Dr
Kaunda, onye ya na ya na-ede egwu, na Eze Ayisoba, onye na-eti egwu ọdịnala
N'afọ 2004, Sidney malitere njem ya n'Africa
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ mba na obodo dị iche iche n'Africa, gụnyere Liberia, Togo, Equatorial Guinea, Nigeria, Chad, Mali, Ivorian Coast, Burkina Faso, na Benin
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Afro-pop Festival na Amsterdam na 2004 wee gaa njem n'obodo na steeti ụfọdụ dị na Ịtali gụnyere Modena, Napoli, na Brescia
Na United Kingdom, Sidney emeela na London, Milton Keynes, Luton, Leeds, na Germany ọ gara Cologne, Hamburg, na Stuttgart
Barima Sidney agagharịla n'ọtụtụ mba Europe, gụnyere Switzerland
Barkley L
Hendricks (Amụrụ n'ọnwa Eprel 16, afọ1945 - rụọ ọnwa Eprel 18, afọ 3017) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ihe n'oge a, onye nyere aka na Black portraiture na conceptualism
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi na ụdị dịgasị iche iche n'oge ọrụ ya (site na foto ruo na eserese ala), ọrụ Hendricks a kacha mara amara weere ụdị ihe osise mmanụ nke ndị Ojiị Amerịka
A mụrụ ya n'ọnwa Eprel 16, nke afọ 1945 na mpaghara Tioga nke North Philadelphia, Barkley Leonnard Hendricks bụ nwa mbụ dị ndụ nke Ruby Powell Hendricks na Barkley Herbert Hendricks
Nne na nna ya si Halifax County, Virginia kwaga Philadelphia n'oge Nnukwu Migration mgbe ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke ndị Afrịka-Amerịka si n'ime ime obodo Southern United States pụọ
Hendricks gara Simon Gratz High School ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1963
Ọ gara Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts (PAFA)
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na PAFA n'afọ 1967, Hendricks kpebiri ịbanye na New Jersey National Guard ma chọta ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi nka na ọrụ aka na Ngalaba Ntụrụndụ Philadelphia
N'afọ 1970, ọ malitere ịga Mahadum Yale ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1972 na nzere bachelọ na masta
Na Yale, ọ mụụrụ Bernard Chaet, Lester Johnson, Gabor Peterdi, Robert Reed, na onye na-ese foto Walker Evans

Hendricks bụ Prọfesọ nke Studio Art na Connecticut College, ebe ọ kụziri ihe osise, ihe osise mmanụ na ihe osise mmiri, na foto, site n'afọ 1972 ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká n'afọ 2010, mgbe ọ ghọrọ Prọfesụ Emeritus
N'etiti afọ 1960 mgbe ọ na-eme njem na Europe, ọ hụrụ ụdị ihe osise nke ndị na-ese ihe dị ka van Dyck na Velázquez n'anya
N'oge ọ gara ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie na ụka nke Britain, Italy, Spain na Netherlands, ọ chọpụtara na agbụrụ nke ya anọghị na nka ọdịda anyanwụ, na-ahapụ oghere nke na-enye ya nsogbu

Ka òtù Black Power na-enweta ume, Hendricks malitere ịgbanwe ihe ọ hụrụ na Europe site n'ịgbanwe nguzozi, na foto ndị enyi, ndị ikwu na ndị ọ na-amaghị, zutere n'okporo ámá, nke gosipụtara nkwenye na mpako ọhụrụ n'etiti ndị Ojiị Amerịka
N'ihe osise ndị a, ọ gbalịrị itinye mpako, ọnụnọ dị ùgwù n'elu ndị ọ na-ese
Ọ na-ese ndị Ojiị Amerịka ugboro ugboro megide nkọwa monochrome nke obodo ukwu ndị dị n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Amerịka
A na-ewere ọrụ Hendricks dị ka ihe pụrụ iche na alụmdi na nwunye ya nke American realism na post-modernism

Ọ bụ ezie na Hendricks emeghị ka ndị ọ na-achị dị ka ndị ama ama, ndị a na-emegbu, ma ọ bụ ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe, ndị e gosipụtara n'ọrụ ya na-abụkarị olu ndị isi ojii na-anọchite anya nke ndị afọ 1960s na 1970s
Hendricks guzoro n'akụkụ ndị ọ na-achị ma gosipụta onwe ya n'ọrụ

N'afọ 1969, o sere otu n'ime ihe osise mbụ ya, Lawdy Mama, nke na-egosi nwa agbọghọ (nwa nwanne ya nke abụọ) n'ụdị ihe oyiyi Byzantine nwere akwụkwọ ọla edo gbara ya gburugburu ejiji ọgbara ọhụrụ na Angela Davis style afro na ákwà nwere oghere
Hendricks kwuru na foto ndị ahụ bụ maka ndị ọ maara, ọ bụkwa naanị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'ihi ọdịbendị nke oge ahụ
Baruti Kandolo Lilela, nke a maara nke ọma site na aha edemede ya bụ Barly Baruti (amụrụ na Disemba 9, 1959, na Kisangani, n'ihe bụ Congo-Léopoldville n'oge ahụ), bụ onye Congo (DRC) na-ese ihe osise
Ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Britain kọwara ya dị ka 'onye edemede Congo a maara nke ọma na mpụga mba ya'
Ọ gụrụ nkuzi, wee rụọ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ eserese nke French Cultural Centre na Kisangani
N'ebe ahụ, n'afọ 1982, o dere ma depụta ihe ọchị mbụ ya, Le Temps d'agir (Oge ime ihe), na nsogbu gburugburu ebe obibi
N'afọ 1984, ebe o meriri n'asọmpi ihe nkiri, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ mụọ edemede ihe nkiri na Angoulême (France), mgbe ahụ n'afọ 1987 ọ rụrụ ọrụ ọnwa ole na ole na Studios Hergé na Brussels
Ọ laghachiri Congo, ebe o bipụtara ọtụtụ abọm, wee kwaga Belgium na 1992
N'afọ 1994, Cultural Centre dị na Kisangani bipụtara abọm ya Objectif Terre! (Objective Earth!), ihe ngosi gburugburu ebe obibi
N'ọgwụgwụ afọ ndị 1990, ya na Frank Giroud mepụtara Eva K, trilogy nke albums comics, nke Mandrill sochiri, usoro nke albums asaa
Maka ọrụ ndị a, Baruti 'dochie ụdị akara ya doro anya na-atọ ọchị na nke ezi uche dị na ya'
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2010, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ sonye na ihe ngosi mba ụwa mbụ nke ihe nkiri Africa, na Paris
Baruti bụ onye guzobere Atelier de Création et de l'Initiation à l'Art (Creative Workshop for an Initiation to Art) iji gbaa ndị ntorobịa nwere nkà ume na Kinshasa
Baron Tornado Index (BTI), nkè a na-akpọkwa Vipir Tornado Index, bụ ụdị kọmputa na-ahụ màkà ihu igwe
Isi ihe eji ya eme bụ iji chọpụta ohere nke ajọ ifufe n'ime ákàrà Tornadic Vortex n'azụ azụ nke oké ifufe, iji mee ka ébé ndị nwéré ike ịdị oke egwu màkà ajọ ifufe na iji soro ha n'ụzọ dị mfe
Site n'enyemaka nke data radar ihu igwe NEXRAD, ụdị mesoscale na algọridim, a na-atụle ndepụta ahụ na ọkwa nke efu rụọ irí
Ka ọnụ ọgụgụ BTI dị elu, o yikarịrị ka ajọ ifufe dị n'ala
A na-eji akara shear sitere na agba dị iche iche dabere na ọ̀tụ̀tụ̀ dị n'elu abụọ
A na-eji akara odo eme ihe màkà uru dị n'etiti abụọ na 39, a na-eji ihe akara oroma eme ihe màkà ụkpụrụ dị n'agbata 4 na 69 ma na-eji mkpado uhie eme ihe màkà ọnụọgụ karịrị 7
Ọ bụ Baron Services nke Huntsville, Alabama mepụtara ngwaahịa ahụ ma na-ere ya, ọ bụkwa akụkụ nke ngwaahịa nyocha radar VIPIR nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Usoro a na-ejikarị ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn eme ihe
BTI hụrụ ojiji ọha na eze na mbido afọ 2008

WMC-TV, ónyé mmekọ NBC na Memphis, Tennessee bụ ụlọ ọrụ mbụ iji mejuputa BTI n'oge 2008 Super Tuesday tornado outbreak n'ubochi ise n'onwa Febrụwarị afọ 2008 mgbè ọ na-agbaso tornadoes n'elu Memphis na Jackson
Nnyocha ziri ezi nke oké ifufe méré ka WMC-TV nwee ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke ndị na-ekiri ya
Barringtonia racemosa (osisi ntụ ntụ, Afrikaans pooeierkwasboom, Zulu Iboqo, Malay Putat) bụ osisi dị n'ezinụlọ Lecythidaceae

A na-ahụ ya n'ọhịa mmiri dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri na n'akụkụ ọnụ mmiri dị n'Oké Osimiri India, malite n'ụsoro oké osimiri ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Mozambique na KwaZulu-Natal (South Africa) ruo Madagascar, India, Sri Lanka, Malaysia, Maldives, Thailand, Laos, ndịda China, ugwu Australia, ụsọ mmiri Taiwan, Ryukyu Islands na ọtụtụ agwaetiti Polynesia

Akwụkwọ 1889 'The Useful Native Plants of Australia na-edekọ na ndị obodo nke Mitchell River District kpọrọ osisi a 'Yakooro' nakwa na 'Mgbọrọgwụ nke osisi a nwere ụtọ dị ilu, ndị ọrụ Hindu [sic] na-eji ya eme ihe n'ihi àgwà ya dị mma na nke na-eme ka ọ dị jụụ
A na-ejikwa mkpụrụ na ụgbụgbọ osisi mee ihe na ọgwụ ala; nke ikpeazụ na-acha uhie uhie, a na-ekwukwa na ọ nwere ihe ndị jikọtara ya na Cinchonas
A na-eji mkpụrụ osisi ahụ a na-egweri egweri eme ihe dị ka anwụrụ, ma, jikọta ya na ọgwụ ndị ọzọ, a na-etinye ya n'èzí na ọrịa akpụkpọ ahụ
(Akụ̀ nke ọkụkụ)'
Osisi nke ana akpo Powder-puff bụ osisi a na-echebe na South Africa

Mgbasa ozi metụtara Barringtonia racemosa na Wikimedia Commons
Barron Claiborne bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto na onye na-ese ihe nkiri nke toro na Boston, Massachusetts
Ọ malitere ise foto mgbe ọ dị afọ iri
Mgbe ọ kwagara New York n'afọ 1989 ọ malitere inyere ndị na-ese foto aka dịka; Richard Avedon, Irving Penn, Saint Claire Born, na Richard Numeroff
Onye nkuzi foto ya, bụ Gordon Parks
E bipụtara foto Claiborne nke ndị egwu na ọtụtụ narị akwụkwọ, dị ka onyinyo ya nke DJ Khaled nke pụtara na mkpuchi ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2016 nke magazin Paper
Ọrụ ya apụtawokwa n'ọtụtụ mkpuchi ndekọ gụnyere; Tricky's Angels With Dirty Faces na N'Dea Davenport's album Bring It On
Ihe osise ya dị mma dị na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide gburugburu ụwa gụnyere Polaroid Museum na Cambridge, Brooklyn Museum, Museum of Fine Arts, Houston, na MoCADA
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Paris, Martha's Vineyard, na Art Basel
N'afọ 2012, Claiborne natara onyinye site na The National Endowment for the Arts na afọ sochirinụ natara onyinye sitere na Creative Time
Otu n'ime ihe kachasị mkpa Claiborne rụzuru n'obodo egwu bụ usoro foto nke The Notorious BIG na-eyi okpueze ọla edo plastik n'ihu ihe na-acha ọbara ọbara
E mere foto ndị ahụ na ụlọ ọrụ Claiborne na New York n'ọnwa Maachị afọ 1997, naanị ụbọchị atọ tupu ọnwụ mberede nke onye na-eti egwu na Los Angeles, nke sitere na ịgba égbè
Ihe oyiyi a ma ama site na usoro akpọrọ 'The King of New York,' bụ otu foto sitere na foto iri na abụọ nke onye na-eti egwu site na oge foto
Ọtụtụ n'ime foto ndị ọzọ a sitere na nnọkọ ahụ ahụtụbeghị ọha na eze tupu etinye ya n'akwụkwọ afọ 2018 Contact High A Visual History of Hip-Hop
N'ihe ngosi 2019 dabere na akwụkwọ ahụ, (nke The Annenberg Space for Photography kwadoro na Los Angeles), e wuru ntinye dum nke oge foto a a na-agaghị echefu echefu

Na mgbakwunye na mbipụta 100 cm x 150 cm nke onyinyo ahụ bụ isi, ihe ngosi nka nke 'The King Of New York' gosipụtara otu n'ime vidiyo egwu The Notorious BIG na-akpọ na obere ihuenyo n'akụkụ mbipụta kọntaktị abụọ buru ibu yana okpueze plastik mbụ nke Claiborne zụrụ kpọmkwem maka ịgbapụ, gosipụtara na igbe ọla dị ka a ga-asị na e ji ezigbo ọla mee ya
Barry Hankerson (amụrụ n'August 3, 1947) bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, ónyé nwe ụlọ ọrụ egwu na onye njikwa
Hankerson bụ ónyé guzobere Blackground Records
Ọ bụ nwanne nna nke ónyé na-agụ egwu na ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri Aaliyah
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Harlem, New York City, Hankerson gàrà Mahadum Central State na Ohio, ébé ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya ma gbaa bọọlụ
Mgbè ọ nwetasịrị nnwale na-enweghị isi maka New York Jets, ọ kwagara Detroit, Michigan, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nhazi ọbọdọ n'ọfịs onye isi ọbọdọ Coleman Young na mbido afọ 1970
Ka e mesịrị n'ime afọ iri ahụ, ọ banyere n'ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ, nyere aka mepụta ihe nkírí 1976 Pipe Dreams, nke ya na nwunye ya n'oge ahụ Gladys Knight
O mepụtara egwuregwu Ron Milner Don't Get God Started na 1988
Hankerson formed Blackground in 1993, as a result of unsuccessful efforts to sign his niece, Aaliyah, to big record labels
Using his connection with singer R
Kelly, who he managed at the time, Hankerson obtained a contract with Jive to distribute the release of Aaliyah's debut album Age Ain't Nothing but a Number
Initially named Blackground Enterprises, the label switched its name to Blackground Entertainment and later Blackground Records in 2000
It co-operated with a publishing company founded by Hankerson, named Black Fountain Music
Hankerson served as Aaliyah's manager until 1995 when her father, Michael Haughton, took over as manager
Aaliyah remained on his label until her death on August 25, 2001
He managed and produced The Winans, and was a percussionist on their albums Let My People Go and Decisions
Hankerson also managed Toni Braxton
Hankerson lụrụ Gladys Knight n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1974; mgbè afọ anọ gachara, di na nwunye ahụ gbara alụkwaghịm
O nwèrè otu nwa nwanyị na ụmụ nwoke abụọ; otu ya na Knight, Shanga-Ali Hankerson na Jomo Hankerson, nwa ya nwoke nke okenye, site na alụmdi na nwunye gara aga
Hankerson bụ nwanne Diane Haughton na nwanne nna ya na ụmụ abụọ nke Michael Haughton, ónyé na-agụ egwu R&B nke America Aaliyah na Rashad Haughton
Na Julaị 30, 2013, a kọrọ na JoJo gbara akwụkwọ megide Blackground Records màkà 'mmebi a na-apụghị idozi edozi na ọrụ ọkachamara ya'

Ụmụaka enweghị ike ịbịanye aka na nkwekọrịta nke ga-adịru ihe karịrị afọ asaá n'okpuru iwu steeti New York ma si otú a na-ekwu na dịka a bịanyere aka na nkwenye ya na 2004, nkwekọrịta ya kwesịrị ịkwụsị na 2011
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2013, ndị ọka iwu JoJo na Blackground kwetara ịhapụ ikpe ahụ ka ndị otu abụọ ahụ bịarutere nkwekọrịta n'èzí ụlọ ikpe
JoJo kwuru na ónyé njikwa ya na akara ya agaghị ahapụ ya na nkwekọrịta, mana ha na-ajụkwa ikwe ka ọ wepụta egwu ọ bụla
A mụrụ Roberts, onye nku, na Sydney ma kwuo otu okpu rugby mba ụwa maka Australia
Ọ gbara bọọlụ maka St Joseph's College, Hunters Hill
Roberts gbara bọọlụ maka Manly Club Club ebe ọ gbara egwuregwu otu narị na iri atọ (135) nke mbụ ma nweta akara narị isii na iri asaa na asatọ (678)
Ọ gbara egwuregwu itoolu maka New South Wales n'etiti afọ 1953 na 1960
Roberts mere nnwale mbụ ya na 1956 na egwuregwu nke abụọ Wallabies na South Africa na Ala ngosi Brisbane Ọ gbakwara bọọlụ asaa na-abụghị nke ule maka Australia
Roberts gbakwara bọọlụ megide British & Irish Lions maka New South Wales n'afọ 1959
Roberts bụ onye nwere nkà n'ihe mgbochi n'oge ntorobịa ya
Bartho Smit (onye biri ndụ site na 15 Julaị 1924 ruo 31 Disemba 1986) bụ onye edemede si obodo South Africa, onye na-ede uri, onye na'eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi
Ọ bụ onye otu Sestigers, otu ndị edemede Afrikaans nwere mmetụta nke afọ 1960
O dere Moeder Hanna ('Nne Hanna') n'afọ 1959, nke bụ ihe nkiri a ma ama banyere Agha nke Abụọ nke Boer
N'afọ 1962, o dere egwuregwu Putsonderwater ('Ọ dị mma na-enweghị mmiri'), mana enweghị ike ịme ya na South Africa n'ihi ozi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya
A mụrụ Bartholomeus Jacobus Smit na (1924-07-15) na Klerkskraal, nso Ventersdorp, South Africa
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Standerton n'afọ 1949 na nzere bachelọ, n'afọ 1951 O nwetara nzere Master of Arts na Mahadum Pretoria
N'afọ 1949, ọ zutere onye na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Kita Redelinghuys ha wee lụọ
Site n'afọ 1952 ruo afọ 1957 ha gara Paris, Munich na London dị ka ụmụ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri n'okpuru Jan Rabie
O tinyekwara onwe ya na nkà ihe ọmụma mgbe ọ nọ na Europe
Akwụkwọ mbụ o bipụtara bụ akụkọ Outa Lukas, die строkind, nke e bipụtara na ụbọchị 27 n'ọnwa Machị nke afọ 1941
N'afọ ndị iri anọ, o bipụtara akụkọ na uri na magazin ndị dị ka The Sentinel na Huisgenoot
N'afọ 1949, onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ bụ Unie-Boekhandel wepụtara akwụkwọ uri mbụ ya, Mure amaokwu
O mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na 1955 na Moeder Hanna, mana ọ bịara n'ihu ọha na 1962 na egwuregwu ya Putsonderwater N'afọ 1978, ọ natara onyinye Hertzog maka ihe nkiri maka ọrụ ya
N'afọ 1979 ọ meriri Perskor Prize for Literature maka Die Keiser
Ọzọkwa, na 1960, ọ natara onyinye Encyclopædia Britannica maka nsụgharị Bekee nke Die verminktes (The Maimed)
Ọ nwụrụ na (1986-12-31) site na ọrịa kansa

Nnaji sonyeere ngalaba injinia na Mahadum Massachusetts, Amherst n’afọ 1983
Mgbe afọ ole na ole gasịrị, ọ ghọrọ Onye guzobere na onye nchịkwa nke Laboratory akpaaka na Robotics na Mahadum
Ọ ghọrọ Ọkammụta zuru oke nke Mechanical and Industrial injinia n'afọ 1992 Dị ka onye na-eme nchọpụta, ọ lekwasịrị anya na isi okwu atọ Kọmputa Enyemaka Onwe, Robotics na Injinịa Kọmputa
N'iji ihe ọmumu o nwetara site na nchọpụta nke nyocha ya, o kere okwu nke echiche geometric, echiche nke ọtụtụ ihe anyị na-arụ ọrụ nwere nhazi geometric

A na-enye ya otuto dịka otu n'ime ndị ọhụụ nke atụmatụ E-design, ebe ndị na-ahụ maka imepụta ngwaahịa nwere ike ịrụ ọrụ site na mpaghara dịpụrụ adịpụ iji mepụta, gbakọta ma nwalee otu ngwaahịa ahụ, na-eji kọmputa na ịntanetị / World Wide Web
Nnaji kwagara Mahadum Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania n’afọ 1996 dị ka ALCOA Foundation dị iche na Ọkammụta Injinia

E mechara họpụta ya ka ọbụrụ William Kepler Whiteford Ọkammụta Injinia na Mahadum Pittsburgh, USA, ebe ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka Onye Ntọala Onyeisi nke US National Science Foundation (NSF) Ebe ngbakọ maka e-Design - ụlọ akwụkwọ mahadum-NSF ise-campus-NSF Ebe ngbakọ nke kacha mma na e-imewe
Ọ hapụrụ Mahadum wee laghachi na Naịjirịa n'afọ 2007
N’afọ 1993, Nnaji lara ezumike nwepu onwe na Mahadum wee laghachi Naịjirịa ije ozi dị ka Mịnịsta sayensị na nka na ụzụ nke etiti
Ọ tọrọ ntọala Geometric Power, ụlọ ọrụ mmepe ọkụ nke ụmụ amaala Naịjirịa n’afọ 2000
N’afọ 2010 o jere ozi dịka Onye Ndụmọdụ Pụrụ Iche nke Onye isi ala na ikikere ọkụ, yana Onye isi oche nke Onye isi ala Task Force na ikikere ọkụ
Ọ ghọrọ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ikikere oku na 2011, ma gbaa arụkwaghịm nke onwe na onwa asato nke afọ 2012

Agbanyeghị, maka ebumnuche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, gọọmentị gbanwere usoro nke nkwekọrịta site na ịghara inye ndị mmepe mmepe mgbanaka mgbanaka ahụ na ngalaba ikike nke ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị na-achịkwa iji kwụsị ụkọ ike ọkụ na-adịghị ala ala nke Naịjirịa

Basaa (A na-akpọkwa Bassa, Basa, Bissa), ma ọ bụ Mbene, bụ asụsụ Bantu nke ndị Basaa nọ na obodo Cameroon na asụ
Ihe dị ka mmadụ puku narị atọ na-asụ ya na mpaghara etiti na mpaghara Littoral
Maho (2009) depụtara n'ebe ugwu na ndịda Kogo dị ka olumba
Mmadụ narị puku abuo na iri atọ na-asụ asụsụ Basaa
Ha bi na Nyong-et-Kelle (Mpaghara Etiti) na Sanaga Maritime (ma e wezụga obodo Edéa, nke nwere ọtụtụ ndị Bakoko) na ọtụtụ n'ime obodo Nkam (Mpaghara Littoral)
N'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ na n'ebe ugwu nke ngalaba a, a na-asụ asụsụ Basaa Yabasi na obodo Yabassi, Diɓuum na obodo Nkondjok (Diboum Canton), n'ebe ndịda Ndemli na Dimbamban
N'otu aka ahụ, a na-asụ Basaa Baduala na Ngalaba Wouri ( Mpaghara Littoral), Douala na agbanwe mpaghara ọdịnala Basaa A na-ahụkwa Basaa na Ngalaba Oké Osimiri (obodo Bipindi, Mpaghara Ndịda)
A na-asụ Hijuk naanị na nkeji iri na ise nke Niki na obodo Batanga, na Yangben Canton (Ch
Paulian (1980)) site na mmadụ 400
Hijuk bụ olumba Basaa, n'agbanyeghị ọnọdụ ala ya na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Bokito arrondissement (Mbam-et-Inoubou department, Central Region)
Basaa na-eji ụda onu anọ eme ihe elu, ala, elu na ala (na-ada) na ala na elu (na-ebili)
Asụsụ ahụ na-eji mkpụrụ edemede nke Latin, na mgbakwunye nke mkpụrụ edemede Ɓɓ, Ɛɛ, Ŋŋ, Ɔɔ, iri multigraphs, yana ụda olu siri ike, nke dị nro, na nke gbara gburugburu
Enwere ike iji akara Macron na caron diacritics were gosi ihe maka akara ụda na ọrụ ntụaka, dịka ọmụmaatụ akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu nke Pierre Emmanuel Njock

A mụrụ Bashir Dalhatu na Dutse n'abalị iri na abụọ nke ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1949
Ọ gara Rumfa College, Kano site na 1963 ruo 1967
N'afọ 1972, o nwetara nzere bachelọ na iwu na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello na Zaria, wee kpọbata ya na ụlọ ọrụ iwu N'afọ 1973 tupu ọ mechaa gụọ akwụkwọ iwu na London

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Gọọmentị nke Kano Steeti na n'ụlọ ọrụ ọzi dị iche iche ụlọ ọrụ ozi nke ndị ọrụ nke Kano Steeti na nyocha na ụlọ ọrụ ozi nke ndị ọrụ ugbo, tupu ọ mechaa bụrụ onye ndụmọdụ steeti na ụlọ ọrụ oziikpe ziri ezi
O mechara tọọ ntọala ụlọ ọrụ nke onwe bụ BM Dalhatu & Co
na Kano
N'afọ 1993, Dalhatu rụrụ ọrụ na Gọọmentị Etiti dị ka odeakwụkwọ nke njem na njem ụgbọelu
Ọ jekwara ozi n'ọchịchị Sani Abacha dị ka Onye ozi nke ike na igwe site n'afọ 1993 ruo 1997; na Onye ozi na-ahụ maka ihe na-eme n’ime obodo n’afọ 1997 ruo 1998, ma mecha lụọ ada Abacha
N'afọ 2018, a kwalitere ya na Walin Dutse, ka ọ nọchie nwanne ya nwoke bụ Muktar Muhammed dị ka Waziri (onye isi ndụmọdụ Emir) nke Dutse Emirate)
Dalhatu bụkwa onye nnọchi anya nsọpụrụ na Tunisia
A hoputara ya n’ime ndi otu mmebe 1978 nke weputara Iwu nke 1979

Na ngwụcha ọgbakọ a, ọ mechara bụrụ otu n'ime ndị otu tọrọ ntọala otu National Party nke Naijiria ebe, n'agbata afọ 1979 na 1983, ọ bụ onye enyemaka onye ndụmọdụ gbasara iwu obodo, onye osote odeakwụkwọ steeti Kano na odeakwụkwọ steeti
O mechara bụrụ otu onye n'ime ndị isi na National Republican Convention na onye isi oche nke Think Tank nke Mgbasa Ozi Onye isi ala
O mechara bụrụ onye otu ntọala nke Peoples Democratic Party, tupu ọ pụọ ịzọ ọkwa Gọvanọ nke Jigawa Steeti n'okpuru All Nigeria Peoples Party

N'afọ 2006, na-imegide Olusegun Obasanjo, Dalhatu guzobere Advanced Congress of Democrats, tupu emesịa jikọta pati ahụ na Action Congress of Nigeria, ebe ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ mba ruo mgbe ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'afọ 2007, mgbe otu ahụ jụrụ isonyere Ọchịchị Umaru Yar'Adua
Ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke Freedom Radio Naijiria, otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ndị ama ama na mgbago ugwu Naijiria
Ọ mechara bụrụ onye isi oche nke Ụlọ ọrụ mmepe Naijiria ọhụrụ na 2015
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Highland Waters na Marketing Limited
Ọ bụ onye otu, ndị isi oche na ikike ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Naijiria yana onye otu ndị ọka iwu Naijiria na otu ndị ọka iwu mba nile Bar
Bashiri Johnson (amụrụ na Mee 12, 1955) bụ ónyé na-akụ ọkpọ na New York City, ónyé ọrụ ya pụtara n'ọtụtụ ndekọ, yana na mgbasa ozi, ihe nkírí, telivishọn, egwuregwu vidio, na ihe ngosi egwu
A maara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-akụ ọkpọ kachasị edekọ na azụmaahịa egwu, yana otu n'etiti ndị a na-ahụkarị

Ọ bụ ezie na ya na ndị omenkà dị ka Luther Vandross, Miles Davis, na Patti LaBelle dekọrọ, ọ sokwa n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi n'elu ikpo okwu; ya na ndị na-ese ihe dị ka Sting, Michael Jackson, Whitney Houston, Lionel Richie, Aretha Franklin, na Steve Winwood emeela ihe nkiri
Mmasị ya na egwu na ịkụ ọkpọ malitere mgbè ọ dị obere, mgbè ọ na-etolite na Bedford Stuyvesant, Brooklyn, n'ime afọ 1960
Dị ka nne ya si kwuo, nkà ya na ịkụ ọkpọ malitere n'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ site na ịkụ ọkụkụ na tebụl na oche, mgbè ụfọdụ ruo n'ókè nke ịkpaghasị klas

Bashiru Ademola Raji, FAAS bụ prọfesọ Naijiria nke sayensị ala, Pedologist, geologist, ọkachamara na-enyocha mmetụta gburugburu ebe obibi na onye bụbu osote onyeisi isi uloakwukwo nke Mahadum Fountain, Osogbo
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke abụọ nke Mahadum ahụ
Mmasị nyocha ya dị na mpaghara nyocha ala, atụmatụ ojiji ala, nyocha mmetụta gburugburu ebe obibi nke ojiji nke akụ na ụba na Pedology, ọmụmụ nke ala na gburugburu ebe obibi ha
Ọ na-ekwu maka Pedogenesis, sayensị na ọmụmụ nke usoro ndị na-eduga n'ịmepụta ala na nke mbụ onye Russia na-amụ banyere ala Vasily Dokuchaev nyochara
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Soil Science Society of Nigeria
O nwetara nzere Bachelor of Science na Master of Science na Geology tupu ya enweta nzere Doctorate na sayensị ala na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria
O mechara nweta diplọma postgraduate na nyocha ala site na International Institute for Aerospace Survey and Earth Science (ITC) na Enschede, Netherlands
A mụrụ Bashiru Ademola Raji' na Offa, obodo na mpaghara gọọmentị dị na Kwara State, North-Central Nigeria
O nwetara nzere Bachelor of Science na Master of Science na Geology tupu ya enweta nzere Doctorate na sayensị ala na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria
O mechara nweta diplọma postgraduate na nyocha ala site na International Institute for Aerospace Survey and Earth Science (ITC) na Enschede, Netherlands
Ọ malitere ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ya na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello ebe ọ ghọrọ prọfesọ nke sayensị ala ma jee ozi dị ka Dean nke ihe omume ụmụakwụkwọ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Assistant Dean nke Postgraduate School, Faculty of Agriculture site n'afọ 2003 - 2005 tupu a họpụta ya dị ka Dean nke ihe omume ụmụakwụkwọ
Tupu nke a, ọ bụ Onye isi nke ngalaba sayensị ala, ngalaba nke ọrụ ugbo, na onye nduzi nke atụmatụ agụmakwụkwọ na ngalaba nlekota nke mahadum site n'afọ 2006 ruo 2008
N'afọ 2003, ọ ghọrọ onye otu Ahmadu Bello University Senate onye nnọchi anya Board of National Agricultural Extension Research Liaison Services ma jee ozi na ikike ahụ afọ abụọ
Ọ bụbu prọfesọ nleta na Mahadum nke Ilorin ebe ọ haziri ngalaba nke njikwa ihe onwunwe ọhịa ruo afọ abụọ (2013 - 2013)
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2012, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi oche nke abụọ nke Mahadum Fountain
Ọ nọchiri Prọfesọ Bukoye Oloyede, onye ọsụ ụzọ Vice chancellor nke Mahadum ahụ
Raji bụ onye otu African Scientific Institute na onye otu Soil Science Society of Nigeria
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Soil Science Society of Nigeria

Bright Okpocha (a mụrụ ya n'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Septemba nke afọ 1978 na Lagos State ), nke e jikarịrị aha okwago ya bu Basketmouth wee mara, bu onye ọkpa ọchị na onye omee ejije nke Naijiria

Basketmouth kwadoro ihe ịma aka egwuregwu na Instagram, nke ọ kpọrọ #TwoThingsChallenge nke kpalitere ọgba aghara site n'aka ndị nkiri ya, mgbe ahụ ka otu onye ntorobịa bụ kwa onye nkiri ya wepụtara ihe onyonyo ya na-ekwu okwu rụrụ arụ metụtara mmekọ edina, na nwatakịrị na-ele anya n'ihe onyonyo ahụ
Ọ bụ ya mepụtara ' Ghana Jollof '
A mụrụ Bright Okpocha na steeti Lagos mana ọ bụ onye steeti Abia, nke Naijiria
Ọ gụchara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke sekọndrị ya na Apapa, Lagos tupu ọ gaa na mahadum Benin, steeti Edo wee nweta nzere digirii mụọ na Sociology na Anthropology
Ọ chọpụtara nka ya n'ịkụ ịgba n'afọ 1991 ma malite rapịnụ n'afọ 1994
O wee hiwe otu a na-akpọ ' Da Psychophats' nke nwere mmadụ asaa wee malite ịga maka ihe nkiri na rapịnụ n'afọ 1995, mana ha kpasara tupu ha ewepụta ihe ọ bụla

Bright gụchara akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị na Apapa (Lagos, Nigeria) wee gakwaa n'ihu ịnweta nzere digirii na mahadum Benin ebe ya na nwanne ya nwoke Godwin gụrụ sociology na anthropology

Asụsụ Basketo (nke a na-akpọ Basketto, Baskatta, Mesketo, Misketto, na Basketo-Dokka) bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic a na-asụ na Basketto pụrụ iche woreda nke Southern Nations, Nationalities, and Peoples Region, nke bụ akụkụ nke Ethiopia
Ndị na-asụ ya na-akpọ asụsụ ahụ 'Masketo', ebe ndị agbata obi ha na-akpọ ya 'Basketo'
O kwuru na o nwere asụsụ abụọ, 'Doko' (Dokko) na 'Dollo' (Dollo)
E wezụga asụsụ nne ha, ụfọdụ na-asụkwa Melo, Oyda, Galila, ma ọ bụ Gofa
Baskin-Robbins bụ ihe American ice ude oruru tọrọ ntọala na 1945 na Glendale, California
Ọ purports onwe ya dị ka 'ndị kasị ibu n'ụwa ice ude franchise', na ihe karịrị 4,500 ọnọdụ, 2,300 nke na-emi odude ke Njikọ̀taọ̀hà
Baskin-Robbins zụrụ na 1973 site British ụlọ ọrụ J
Lyons na Co, nke e mechara ghọrọ akụkụ nke alụso Domecq Plc
Baskin-Robbins, Togo's, na Dunkin donuts nkejikotara alụso Domecq Ndenye Service ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, akụkụ nke Jikọrọ Aka Domecq Plc
Baskin-Robbins-mara dị ka 'Iri Atọ na-Otu flavors'
Ọ bụ ezie na ya flavor n'ọbá akwụkwọ mejupụtara 1000 flavors, nanị 31 flavors dị na a ahịa na a nyere oge, otu onye maka otu ụbọchị nke ọnwa
Na omume, ọtụtụ Baskin-Robbins 'franchises ebu 32 flavors bụla e nyere n'oge, n'ihi na akụkụ anọ udi nke na friji nkeji na primality nke ọnụ ọgụgụ 31

Ha na-ebi ndụ site n'ọrụ ugbo na ịkụ azụ
Duala na ndị ahịa Europe mbụ chụpụrụ ndị Bassa, na-ata ahụhụ na nchụpụ n'oge German Kamerun
Mgbalị ha na-egbu azụ na ọrụ ugbo belatara
N'oge ndị German a, ọtụtụ ndị Bassa bụ ndị na-emegide ọchịchị, na-alụ ọgụ megide mgbasawanye Germany gafere ụsọ oké osimiri
Otú ọ dị, ha meriri nnukwu mmeri ma bụrụ ndị a manyere ịrụ ọrụ n'ike n'iwu ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè Douala-Yaoundé 'Mittel Kamerun'

N'oge niile nke ndị Europe na-achị, ndị Bassa nwere ike iji ndị ozi ala ọzọ nke Ndị Kraịst mee ihe iji nweta agụmakwụkwọ ọdịda anyanwụ, kachasị site n'aka ndị Protestant Germany na ndị Presbyterian America
Bassa rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa n'oge decolonization, na mpaghara Bassa-Bakongo bụ ebe a na-ahụ mba n'anya, ọkachasị Union des Populations du Cameroun (UPC)
Otú ọ dị, ụdị Bassa nke na-emegide ọchịchị ndị eze na-achị ala ọzọ mechara tụfuo n'oge e mepụtara mba Cameroon
N'agbanyeghị na a na-achụpụ ha na steeti postcolonial, a ka nwere nkwenye na 'Nka indo' ma ọ bụ nnwere onwe mba nke na-emebeghị
Hyman, Larry M
'Basaá (A43)', in Nurse, Derek The Bantu Languages
Routledge, 257–282
Ndị Bassa bụ agbụrụ ọdịda anyanwụ Afrịka bụ ndị obodo Liberia
Ndị Bassa bụ obere ìgwè nke ndị Kru buru ibu nke Liberia na Ivory Coast
Ha mejupụtara ọnụ ọgụgụ ka ukwuu ma ọ bụ ọnụ ọgụgụ ka nta na mpaghara Grand Bassa, Rivercess, Margibi na Montserrado nke Liberia
N'isi obodo Liberia nke Monrovia, ha bụ agbụrụ kachasị ukwu
N'inwe ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ niile nke ihe dị ka nde 105 , ha bụ agbụrụ nke abụọ kachasị ukwu na mba Liberia (18%), mgbe ndị Kpelle (26%)
A na-ahụkwa obere obodo Bassa na Sierra Leone na mba Ivory Coast
Ndị Bassa na-asụ asụsụ Bassa, asụsụ Kru nke sitere na ezinụlọ asụsụ Niger-Congo

Ha nwere usoro ederede nke ha mana ọ kwụsịrị iji ya mee ihe na narị afọ nke 19, a chọtara ya n'etiti ndị ohu nke Brazil na West Indies na afo 1890 ha, Thomas Flo Darvin Lewis wughachiri ya na mmalite na afo 1900
A na-akpọ ihe odide dabeere na ihe ịrịba ama ahụ e mere ka ọ dịghachi ndụ Ehni Ka Se Fa
N'asụsụ obodo, a makwaara ndị Bassa dị ka Gboboh, Adbassa ma ọ bụ Bambog-Mbog

Ndị Bassa si Western Sudan ma mesịa kwaga ma biri na West Africa na mpaghara ndị ọzọ gụnyere Liberia, Sierra Leone, Togo na Nigeria, Senegal ebe ndị ọzọ biri na mpaghara etiti Africa nke Cameroon na Congo
Ìgwè ndị kewara ekewa n'ebe dị iche iche mepụtara ọdịbendị, asụsụ na ọha mmadụ dị iche iche
Ndị Bassa nwere njikọ na ndị Basari nke Togo na Senegal, ndị Bassa-Mpoku na mpaghara Congo, ndị Bass nke Cameroon
Ihe akaebe asụsụ na ọdịnala ọnụ nke ndị a dịgasị iche iche, obere ma dị mkpa na-egosi na aha ha Bassa nwere ike ịbụ ihe jikọrọ ya na Bassa Sooh Nyombe nke pụtara 'ndị Nna Nkume'
Ndị ahịa Europe mbụ nwere nsogbu ịkpọpụta ahịrịokwu ahụ dum, a na-ejikwa ụdị Bassa dị mkpirikpi mee ihe na akwụkwọ ọdịda anyanwụ kemgbe ahụ
Okpukpe ọdịnala nke ndị Bassa nwere ntọala omume na omume, nke na-asọpụrụ ndị nna nna na mmụọ karịrị nke mmadụ
Iso Ụzọ Kraịst rutere n'etiti ndị Bassa n'oge ọchịchị ndị ọchịchị, a sụgharịrị Bible mbụ n'asụsụ Bassa na afo 1922
Usoro nkuchi ahụ jikọtara echiche nke Chineke Ndị Kraịst na echiche ọdịnala ha nke Onye Kasị Elu na nna nna mbụ dị ike nke nwere ebere na ịbọ ọbọ, na-akwụghachi ndị ọma ụgwọ ma na-ata ndị ọjọọ ahụhụ
Okpukpe ọdịnala gụnyere emume nzuzo nke ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị, dị ka ndị Sande
Ọtụtụ ndị ozi ala ọzọ sitere na okpukpe dị iche iche nke Iso Ụzọ Kraịst anọwo na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'etiti ndị Bassa na narị afọ nke 20
Ihe ndị a emeela ka ọtụtụ ụka Bassa nwere onwe ha si Europe, North America, Africa na òtù Evangelical
N'oge a, ndị Bassa na-emekarị Iso Ụzọ Kraịst, mana ha ejigidewo akụkụ nke okpukpe ọdịnala ha
Ndị Bassa bụ ndị ọrụ ugbo bi na omenala na-akụ yam, cassava, eddoes na plantain
Ha bụ agbụrụ ndị nweere onwe ha na-ebi n'ime obodo, nke ọ bụla nwere onye isi
Àtụ Ethnic groups in Liberia
Bassey Ikpi bụ onye Naijiria amụrụ na America na-ese okwu, onye ode akwụkwọ, na onye na-akwado ahụike uche
Ọ pụtago na HBO 's Russell Simmons Presents Def Poetry ugboro ise abụ uri ya emepeela ihe ngosi maka ndị nka na-emeri Grammy Award
Ọ bụkwa onye akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke M na-ekwu Eziokwu Mana m na-asị Asị ụgha
kacha ere na New York Times N'afọ puku abụọ na ịrị abụọ, o kpere Indiana Review Creative Nonfiction Prize
O gosikwara na mkpọsa nkwanye ugwu ụmụ nwanyị Otu narị nke OkayAfrica puku abụọ na ịrị abụọ, nke mere mmemme ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ akụrụngwa maka ọgbọ ndị Africa n'ọdịnihu
A mụrụ Ikpi n'Ikom, Cross River State, Nigeria, n'abalị atọ, n'ọnwa Ọgọst na puku otu afọ narị iteghete na iri asaa na isii, n'ime n'ezinaụlọ Naijiria bụ ndị sibu na Ugep
Mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ, ya na ndị mụrụ ya kwagara Stillwater, Oklahoma, United States ebe o biri ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ
Mgbe ahụ ọ kwagara Greenbelt, Maryland, nke dị na Washington DC
Ọ gara mahadum nke Maryland, Baltimore County ka ọ mụọ asụsụ bekee
Mgbe ọ nọ na kọleji, ọ malitere ịme abụ uri ya na sekut igwe mepere emepe na Baltimore na Washington DC
Ọ hapụrụ ihe ọ na-agụ n'afọ ikpeazụ ya ịkwaga New York City
Ọrụ Ikpi malitere na ihe ngosi ihe nkiri America Teen Summit, nke e gosịrị na igwe onyonyo Black Entertainment
Ọ kwagara, mgbe ọ gbara ihe dị ka afọ iri abụọ na otu, gaa New York City maka ohere ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụ n'ebe ahụ ka ọ chọpụtara 'The Louder Arts Movement', Nuyorican Poets Café, na mgbe e mesịrị Def Poetry Jam
Ọ bụkwa n'ebe ahụ ka ọ mụtara ka e si eji ihe odide ya kpọrọ ihe

Ọ ghọrọ onye na-ese okwu ọnụ na-aga nke ọma n'obodo ahụ ma gosipụta onwe ya na ngosi Def Poetry Jam TV ruo oge 5, soro ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-eme njem otu afọ malite na Edinburgh Fringe Festival, nakwa otu afọ ọzọ, na-eme njem nleta mba na ndị njem nleta
Ihe nkedo Broadway izizi
Ya na ndi Def Poetry Jam na-eme njem bido n'afọ puku abụọ na otu ruo n'afọ puku abụọ na anọ

Na ọnwa mbụ n'afọ puku abụọ na anọ, na Chicago, n'otu n'ime njem nlegharị anya ya na mba ahụ maka Def Poetry Jam, o nwere nkoropụ site na ịda mbà n'obi, nchekasị na nchekasị na-akpata ehighị ụra nke ọma
Ụbọchị ole na ole ka e mesịrị, na New York City, a chọpụtara na ọ nwere Bipolar II Disorder, o dere banyere ya n'ihu ọha na otu echiche na Huffington Post na ọnwa mbụ n'afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na otu
ihe ọ kwuru na ọ dị ebe ahụ kemgbe ọ bụ nwata
O kwugokwa banyere ya n'ihu ọha n'ọtụtụ ebe ọha na eze, dịka ụzọ isi nyere ndị ọzọ aka imeri ihere na ịghọta mgba
Odegokwa ọtụtụ mpempe ndị nweere onwe ha 'maka ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi gbasara isiokwu ahụike uche na nkọwa omenala pop ndi gụnyere Ebony, Huffington Post, Essence, xoJane na The Root'
Ọ laghachiri Nigeria na mbụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, ma mesịa lọta mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ
N'afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na abụọ, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri atọ na isii, ọ laghachiri Lagos, Nigeria ịrụ ọrụ n'okwu ọnụ, ide ihe, na mgbasa ozi nke Televishọn
Mgbe ọ nọ na Lagos, ọ haziri ihe ọ kpọrọ 'Basseyworld Presents Naija Poetry Slam', asọmpi National Poetry Slam, nke mbụ na obodo ahụ, na ọwa iteghete, na afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na abụọ
A kọwara ihe ngosi a dịka 'ụzọ iji nye ụtọ ụzọ ọhụrụ Bassey si weta nkà nke okwu ọnụ na mgbede nke abụ uri na mkparịta ụka na-akpali akpali'

N'afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na anọ, ọnwa ole a tọọrọchara ọtụtụ narị ụmụakwụkwọ na Chibok dị na Naịjirịa, Ikpị haziri 'Do The Write Thing' bụ mmemme iji gosi nkwado site n'okwu ọnụ maka mgbasa Bring Back Our Girls
O sokwara onye ọ gụ egwu Naijiria ama ama 2Face Idibia dekọkwaa egwu na-akwado otu a kpọrọ 'Break The Silence'

Ikpi tọrọ ntọala The Siwe Project, e nyere aha Siwe Monsanto, nwa nwanyị enyi ya nwanyi dị afọ iri na ise, onye gburu onwe ya na afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na otu, mgbe oke ịda mbà n'obi gasịrị dị ka ụzọ isi gbaa ndị nwere ọrịa uche ume ka ha bụrụ nwee mmụọ ịchọ enyemaka na ịchịkwa ọrịa ha na ka ha ghara ịtụ egwu ma ọ bụ ihere ikwu banyere ya' E debanyere aha Siwe Project dị ka 'ọrụ zuru ụwa ọnụ anaghị akwụ ụgwọ maka ịkwalite mmata ahụike uche n'ogbe mba ụwa niile'
E mere oru a na ọwa ịrị abụọ na afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na na abụọ

Na abalị abụọ nke ọnwa Julaị, na afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na atọ, e mere “Ụbọchị Ihere Ọ dịghị” nke mbụ na mgbasa ozi ọha, ebe a na-agba ndị mmadụ na-alụ ọgụ na ịda mbà n'obi ma ọ bụ ọrịa uche ka ha bipụta akụkọ ha n'emeghị ihere nye ụwa
'Ohere maka ndị mmadụ gbara gburugburu n'ụwa iji gbakọta na nlekọta ahụike uche
[na] mkparịta ụka n'ezoghị ọnụ banyere mkparị ọrịa uche, nyocha, na nhọrọ ọgwụgwọ
Ebumnuche nke ụbọchị enweghị ihere bụ ịgba ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ ume ka ha chọọ ọgwụgwọ n'enweghị ihere
Na abalị anọ nke ọnwa Mee, afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na asaa, a mara ọkwa na akwụkwọ mbụ ya, ihe ncheta aha ya bụ Making Friends With Giants nke Harper Perennial ga-ebipụta na puku abụọ na ịrị na asatọ
Akwụkwọ a e mesịrị bagharia A na m ekwu Eziokwu ma a na m atụ Asị, e bipụtara ya na ọnwa Ọgọst afọ puku abụọ na iri na itenani, mesịrị ọsọsọ bụrụ New York Times bestseller
Essence kọwara ya dịka njịkọta ederede di egwu
Kola Tubosun kpọrọ ya 'ọ dịka ihe nduzi ụzọ maka ndi nwéré mmasị ị mụta maka etu ọrịa ụbụrụ si emetụta ndị mmadụ
Akwụkwọ ahụ, e mechara degharịa aha ya ka Ana m ekwu Eziokwu, mana m na-asi asi, ebipụtara n'onwa asatọ na afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na iteghete, wee bụrụ onye kacha ere ngwa ngwa
Essence kọwara ya dị ka 'nchịkọta edemede mara mma'
Kola Tubosun na-akpọ ya 'ụdị ihe izi ụzọ maka ndị nwere mmasị ịmụta otú ọrịa uche si emetụta ndị mmadụ'

A kọwara akwụkwọ a dị ka 'ọrụ dị omimi nke onwe nke na-akọ akụkọ ndụ onye Naijiria-American na-ebi ndụ na ọrịa bipolar II na nchekasị, na nwanyị nwere agba na ịlụso ọgụ nyere ihere gbara ya gburugburu' Edemede ndị a na-ekpuchi ihe isi ike ya dị ka nwatakịrị na-esi na Nigeria na-aga America, na-alụ ọgụ na esemokwu ezinụlọ, ịda mbà n'obi na ụlọ ọgwụ, na-eduga na nyocha ya na ọgwụgwọ maka ọrịa bipolar II
