Bata (Gbwata) bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic a na-asụ na Naijiria na Adamawa Steeti na Numan, Song, Fufore na ọchịchị ime obodo Mubi, Cameroon na mpaghara ugwu n'akụkụ ókèala ya na Naijiria
Asụsụ ndị a bụ Demsa, Garoua, Jirai, Kobotachi, Malabu, Ndeewe, Ribaw, Wadi, na Zumu (Jimo)
A na-elekarị ya anya dị ka otu asụsụ dị ka Bacama
Blench (2019) depụtara Bwatye (endonym Ɓwaare; exonym Bachama) dị ka asụsụ dịgasị iche iche
Asụsụ ndi a dị na Adamawa Steeti (Numan na ọchịchị ime obodo Guyuk) na Kaduna Steeti (n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke obodo Kaduna)
A na-akpọkwa ya Kwā ɓwàryē
ALCAM (2012) depụtara Gbwata (Bwaara na Naịjirịa) dị ka otu ụdị nke Bata
Ndị na-asụ asụsụ a na-ezo aka na ọ dị ka 'asụsụ nke Gbwata', nke a na-akpọ Magbwatá, Magbwati nke anakpọ kwa
Magbwatiye na Cameroon
Na Cameroon, e nwere ụdị Gbwata atọ
Ndeewe bụ olumba nke ndị Gbwata bi dị anya site n'ikpere osimiri Faro na Benue, ebe 'Bata ọrụ ugbo' bi
Ọ bụ naanị mmadụ iri na abụọ na-asụ asụsụ a n'ogea a
Bacama bụ agbụrụ Gbwata nke bi na Naịjirịa
E nwere mmadụ puku abụọ na narị ise na asụ asụsụ a na Cameroon
Àtụ Languages of Cameroon
Fugu bu nke Africa (Smock) nke a na-akpọkwa Batakari n'asụsụ Ghana bụ otu n'ime uwe ọdịnala ụmụ nwoke si West Africa na Northern Ghana
A nabatara ya na Ghana dum ọ bụ ezie na ọ sitere na Northern Ghana
Aha Fugu bụ nsụgharị sitere na okwu Moshie maka akwa
Ndị Dagomba na-akpọ uwe ahụ Bingba
Cosse Group bụ ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta ahịa na Lagos, Naijiria
Onye guzobere Cosse bụ Funmi Onabolu, onye bụ onye isi nchịkwa mbụ na Chief Operating Officer na ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta ahịa Biodun Shobanjo's Insight-Grey (nke jikọtara ya na Grey Global Group)
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ malitere ọrụ na afọ 1995

Ndị ahịa ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gụnyere United Bank for Africa (UBA), Virgin Nigeria Airways, Wema Bank, Nigerian Breweries Plc, ARM, Interswitch, UAC Dairies, Nando's, Unilever, Nordica Fertility Centre, Lumos, na CFAO Motors
Cosse merikwara azụmahịa okike maka Promasidor na Naịjirịa, na-esote asọmpi asọmpi siri ike nke gụnyere ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Naịjirị na Disemba na afọ 2010
Cosse na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe dị ka London Advertising na mba London & Joe Public na South Afrika na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a

Cosse mepụtara ihe ngwọta pụrụ iche dị ka 'Sunny Golden World of B&H' Radio music hit show maka British American Tobacco (BAT) na mgbakwunye na 'Star Wheel of Fortune' na 'Looking Good with Amstel Malta' ma maka Nigerian Breweries Plc (ụlọ ọrụ Heineken mba ụwa) Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nyekwara aka n'ime ka Star Lager na Benson & Hedges bụrụ akara mbụ na ahịa ha, site na atụmatụ ahịa pụrụ iche
Cosse malitere nkwurịta okwu Through-the-line (TTL) na akaụntụ Benson & Hedges na afọ 2000 wee sonye na netwọk Bates Worldwide na afọ 2001
Ọ ghọọ kwara ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara mbụ na-abụghị ebe ahụ nyere ohere ịmepụta echiche okike maka ma B & H na akaụntụ ụlọ ọrụ BAT

N'afọ 2003, mgbe a na-agbaso mkpọsa mgbasa ozi squib, Cosse meriri Globacom Advertising pitch, akaụntụ nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mechara gbaa arụkwaghịm mgbe afọ ole na ole gachara mgbe nkwekọrịta dị n'etiti òtù abụọ ahụ

Cosse TTL bụ onye otu ụlọ ọrụ nke Cosse Group, n'akụkụ ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọkachamara ndị ọzọ gụnyere TownCriers (Experiential Marketing and Brand Activation) MediaIntegra (Strategic Media Planning and Buying) ProChannel (Trade/Channel marketing) Media Junction (Audio-visual production and content development)
N'afọ 2009, onye isi oche Cosse, Funmi Onabolu ghọrọ onye isi oche nke Association of Advertising Agencies na Naijiria (AAAN)
Bathabile Olive Dlamini (Amụrụ na 10 Septemba 1962, Nquthu, KwaZulu-Natal), onye ndú nke African National Congress Women's League (ANCWL) na onye otu ANC National Executive Committee
Ọ bụbu Minista nke Ụmụ nwanyị na Presidency, na Minista nke Mmepe Ọha
A mụrụ Dlamini na Nquthu n'ụbọchị 10 Septemba 1962 ma too na Nkandla, Matshensikazi na Imbali, Pietermaritzburg
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Arts Degree na Social Studies na Mahadum nke Zululand
Dlamini na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị site na nwata
N'afọ 1983 ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị guzobere Imbali Youth Organisation, onye mmekọ nke United Democratic Front, nke ya na South African Students Congress na Imbali Civic Organisation rụkọtara ọrụ
N'afọ 1985, ọ sonyeere South African National Students Congress dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ole na ole sonyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya
N'afọ 1989, Dlamini gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Zululand na Bachelor of Arts na Social Work nke ọ gafere n'ụzọ dị iche
Batilda Salha Burian (amụrụ n' ọnwa October 19, 1965) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye nnọchi anya na mba Tanzania
Ugbu a, ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya Tanzania na mba Japan
Burian nwetara PhD ya na Mahadum College nke London na afọ 1992
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ugboro abụọ na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu, site na afọ 2000 ruo afọ 2005 na 2006 ruo na afọ 2010
N'etiti oge ọ nọ na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu, ọ bụ osote Minista nke Mmepe Obodo, Mmekọahụ na Ụmụaka
Mgbe Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu gasịrị, ọ ghọrọ Kọmishọna Ukwu (ma ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya) nke Tanzania na Kenya
N'oge ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya na Kenya, ọ gara n'ihu na-eme ka mmekọrịta dị n'etiti mba abụọ ahụ sikwuo ike, na-ekwu na mba abụọ ahụ nwere ọtụtụ ihe jikọrọ ha ma na ọdịbendị ma na gburugburu ebe obibi
N'afọ 2015, ọ ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya Tanzania na Japan
Burian bụ onye isi oche nke World Climate Change Forum III na afọ 2009 na Geneva ma bụrụkwa onye nnọchi anya Tanzania na mba United Nations Environment Program (UNEP)
Batoul Arafa (amụrụ na Nọvemba 16, 1981) bụ onye Egypt na-eduzi ihe nkiri
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mir de Dieu School na Alexandria, wee sonye na Higher Institute of Dramatic Arts wee gụsịa akwụkwọ site na Ngalaba Drama na 2005
Batoul duziri ọtụtụ ihe nkiri telivishọn na ihe nkiri nke nwere nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma
O duziri ọtụtụ ememme ma n'ime ma n'èzí Ijipt
Batu bụ asụsụ Tivoid nke Naijiria
Olumba asụsụ a bụ Amanda-Afi, Kamino
A na-eche na Angwe, mana ọ na-aghọ otu olumba nke asụsụ Buru dị iche iche
Àtụ Languages of Nigeria

Yobnesh Yussuf Hassan bụ onye Tanzania na-eme ihe nkiri (a mụrụ na 1 Febụwarị ) nke a maara nke ọma dịka Batuli E gosipụtara ya na ihe karịrị iri nke gụnyere nnukwu ndị na-eme ihe nkiri dịka Steven Kanumba na Vincent Kigosi
A mụrụ Batuli na Mwanza
O nwere ụmụ nwoke abụọ
Ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya n'afọ 2000

Ludwig Bauer (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1876, Vienna) bụ onye nta akụkọ Austro-Swiss, onye na-ahụ maka udo na onye edemede
Bauer ghọrọ onye nta akụkọ na Vienna, na-ede nkatọ ihe nkiri, ederede njem na akwụkwọ akụkọ dị iche iche
N'afọ 1915, n'ịkpọ Agha Ụwa Mbụ asị, ọ kwagara Switzerland

Site na Wiener Cafe dị na Bern, 'onye dike nwere omume enyi nke na-eri nri n'ebe a na-anọdụ ala maka ndị ikom anọ nkịtị ma jiri biya dị egwu saa ya', o dere ndị isi maka Basle National Zeitung, nweta aha - na nkatọ sitere n'aka ndị na-akwado ya n'akụkụ nke ọ bụla - dị ka 'naanị onye na-anọpụ iche na Switzerland'
Morgen Wieder Krieg (1931), nke a sụgharịrị n'asụsụ Bekee dị ka War Again Tomorrow, dọrọ aka ná ntị banyere ihe ize ndụ nke agha ụwa ọzọ

Akwụkwọ ahụ, nke otu onye nyochara dị ka 'echiche na-adịghị mma nke onye na-eme udo banyere Njikọ, ebe obibi Versailles, Sovietism, Fascism, Americanism na ihe ndị ọzọ', bụ nke Albert Einstein tụrụ aro na The World As I See It
Baugrygr ma ọ bụ Ringkvinna bụ okwu banyere nwanyị na-alụghị di nke ketara ọkwa nke onye isi ezinụlọ, na-esikarị n'aka nna ya ma ọ bụ nwanne ya nwoke, na ọrụ na ikike niile metụtara ọkwa ahụ
Ọnọdụ ahụ dị na Scandinavia n'oge Viking na n'ime Middle Ages
A kpọrọ Ringkvinna aha na Icelandic Grágás na iwu Norwegian Frostating na iwu Gulating, nke a na-ekwu ya n'otu ụzọ ahụ

Ụmụ nwanyị na-alụbeghị di n'ozuzu ha, nke a na-akpọ maer na mey, nwere nchebe na ikike nnwere onwe ha mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ, nwanyị ruru ikike nke ọtụtụ iwu ma nwee ikike ikpebi maka ebe obibi ya ma guzoro n'onwe ya n'echiche niile nke ikpe n'ihu iwu
Otu ikike ndị a metụtara ụmụ nwanyị di ha nwụrụ
Otu ihe dị iche na nnwere onwe ya bụ ikike ịhọrọ onye ọlụlụ, nke bụ okwu maka ezinụlọ dum
Na enweghị ndị ikwu nwoke obula, nwanyị na-alụghị di na-enweghị nwa nwoke nwere ike iketa ọkwa dị ka onye isi ezinụlọ site n'aka nna ma ọ bụ nwanne nwoke nwụrụ anwụ
A na-akpọ ụmụ nwanyị nwere ọnọdụ dị otú ahụ ringkvinna
O jiri ikike niile e nyere onye isi ezinụlọ ruo mgbe ọ lụrụ di n'oge e nyefere ikike ya n'aka di ya

Ikike iketa n'onwe ya metụtara ma nwanne nne nna, nwa nwanne nna na nwa nwa nna nke onye nwụrụ anwụ, bụ ndị a kpọrọ aha ha niile dị ka odalkvinna, mana ikike iketa ọkwa nke onye isi ezinụlọ bụ ikike nke naanị nwa nwanyị ma ọ bụ nwanne nwanyị nke nwoke nwụrụ anwụ nwekwara ike iketa
Ringkvinna nwere nkwado kpọmkwem nke iwu iji rụọ ọrụ niile onye isi ezinụlọ na-arụkarị, dị ka, ikike ịchọ ma nata ụgwọ banyere igbu onye òtù ezinụlọ
N'agbanyeghị, ọ bụrụ na ọ lụọ di, ikike ndị a na-enyefe di ya
Ikike ndị a ji nwayọọ nwayọọ na-apụ n'anya mgbe Iso Ụzọ Kraịst gasịrị, a naghịzi akpọ ha aha na ederede iwu ọ bụla mgbe ngwụcha narị afọ nke iri na atọ gasịrị
Bauhinia divaricata, bull hoof ma ọ bụ osisi orchid nke Mexico, bụ ụdị osisi na-agbasa okooko n'ezinụlọ Fabaceae
A mụrụ ya na Mexico, Amerika nke etiti (ma e wezụga Panama), na Caribbean
Bavelile Gloria Hlongwa (14 Eprel 1981 na 13 Septemba, na afọ 2019) bụ onye injinia kemịkal na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị si KwaZulu-Natal na onye otu African National Congress (ANC)
Ọ bụ osote minista na-ahụ maka ihe onwunwe na ike na onye otu National Assembly of South Africa site na Mee, na afọ 2019 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na Septemba na afọ 2019
A mụrụ Bavelile Gloria Hlongwa n'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1981 n'obodo Umzinto dị na mpaghara Natal gara aga
Ọ malitere ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ya na Ncazuka Primary School na afọ 1989 wee banye na Sihle High School na 2000
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke KwaZulu-Natal Howard College campus wee nweta nzere Bachelor of Science na injinia kemịkal
Mgbe ọ nọ na mahadum, Hlongwa malitere ịrụsi ọrụ ike na ANC Youth League na òtù ụmụ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ
Ọ na-agbaso nzere masta na nchịkwa ọha na eze n'oge ọnwụ ya
Hlongwa anọwo n'ọkwá ndị isi dị iche iche
A họpụtara ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na Kọmitii Mmepe Obodo na afọ 1999
A họpụtara Hlongwa na South African Institute of Chemical Engineers na afọ 2011, na, na afọ 2013, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye na-ahụ maka akụ maka usoro ahụ
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ National Youth Development Agency na afọ 2017
Hlongwa malitere ọrụ ya dị ka injinia kemịkal na Shell Downstream SA
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka injinia site na afọ 2011 ruo na afọ 2013, na n'oge na-adịghị anya dị ka injiniya mmepụta site na afọ 2013 ruo na afọ 2015 na Sapref
Ọ bụkwa onye na-eme atụmatụ gas na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ site na afo 2016 ruo na afọ 2017
A họpụtara Hlongwa dị ka osote onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ National Youth Development Agency na afọ 2017, mgbe ọ bụ osote onye nduzi nke Kọmitii Nchịkwa na Mahadum KwaZulu-Natal
Site na afo 2017 ruo na afọ 2019, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-abụghị onye isi oche nke Dube Trade Port Corporation
Hlongwa bụ onye na-abụghị onye isi oche nke National Metrology Institute of South Africa site na afo 2018 ruo afọ 2019
A họpụtara Hlongwa ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke SRC na Mahadum KwaZulu-Natal n'afọ 2009
Ọ bụ onye otu ANC Youth League ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye otu ọrụ nke ngalaba ngalaba KwaZulu-Natal nke ANCYL ma bụrụ onye otu kọmitii dị iche iche site na afo 2013 ruo afọ 2015
Ọ bụ onye nkatọ nke ANC Women's League
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2019, a họpụtara Hlongwa ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu mba South Africa
Ọ malitere ọrụ dị ka onye otu na 22 Mee, na afọ 2019
Onye isi ala Cyril Ramaphosa n'oge na-adịghị anya na 29 Mee na afọ 2019 họpụtara ya dị ka osote Mineral Resources and Energy, na-eje ozi n'akụkụ Minista Gwede Mantashe
A ṅụrụ ya iyi na 30 Mee, na afọ 2019 ma si otú a ghọọ otu n'ime ndị kachasị nta n'ime kansụl
Hlongwa nwụrụ na 13 Septemba na afọ 2019, mgbe otu gwongworo na-egwu n'ebe ihe mberede ụgbọ ala gara aga ọ na-enyere aka
Ihe mberede ahụ gburu Hlongwa na mmadụ atọ ndị ọzọ
Ihe mberede ahụ mere na nso Maubane Bridge na N1 na Carousel Plaza, Hammanskraal
Onye isi ala Cyril Ramaphosa kwupụtara mwute ya maka ọnwụ mberede ya ma kwuo na a ga-eme emume olili ozu maka ya
E mere emume ncheta maka Hlongwa na 19 Septemba na afọ 2019
Mahadum nke KwaZulu-Natal kagburu ozi ncheta ya nke a haziri ka ọ bụrụ ya
E mere emume olili ozu Hlongwa na 21 Septemba na afọ 2019
Bayajidda (Hausa Bàyā̀jiddà) bụ, dịka akụkọ mgbe ochie gbasara ọtụtụ steeti West Africa tupu narị afọ nke 19, onye guzobere igidimba ndị Hausa

Dịka akụkọ mgbe ochie si kọọ, Bayajidda bụ nwa eze si Baghdad (isi obodo nke Iraq nke oge a) na nwa Eze Abdullahi, mana a chụpụrụ ya n'obodo ya mgbe Eze Nwanyị Zidam, nke a makwaara dịka Zigawa, meriri obodo ahụ
Ozugbo ọ hapụrụ Baghdad, ya na ọtụtụ ndị agha ya gara Afrịka wee rute Borno
Ozugbo ha rutere Borno, akụkọ a dị iche iche gbasara ihe kpatara esemokwu na eze obodo ahụ
Dịka otu akụkọ si kọwaa, Bayajidda ghọtara na ndị agha ya siri ike karịa ndị nke eze; n'ihi nke a, o mere atụmatụ iwepu ya
Otú ọ dị, eze nụrụ banyere atụmatụ ahụ ma, mgbe ya na ndị ndụmọdụ ya kwurịtara okwu, nyere Bayajidda nwa ya nwanyị, Magaram (nke a makwaara dịka Magira), ka ọ lụọ

Ka e mesịrị, mgbe eze ahụ wakporo ma weghara ọtụtụ obodo, ọ ghọgburu ọgọ ya nwoke ọhụrụ ka ọ hapụ ndị ikom nke ya ka ha chebe obodo ndị ahụ, si otú a belata ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị umuokorobia Bayajidda nwere n'aka ya
Bayajidda ghọtara na a na-aghọgbu ya mgbe ọ hapụrụ naanị nwunye ya na otu ohu; n'abalị, ha gbagara Garun Gabas, nke dị ugbu a n'ógbè Hadeja
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ebe ahụ, Magaram mụrụ nwa mbụ Bayajidda, nke a kpọrọ Biram, nna nna nke obere alaeze nke Gabas-ta-Biram ('ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Birami')
Otú ọ dị, dịka akụkọ ọzọ si kwuo, a nabatara Bayajidda na Borno, ọ lụọ Magaram ma bụrụ onye a ma ama n'etiti ndị mmadụ
N'ihi nke a, eze ahụ kpụpụrụ ya anyaụfụ ma kpata nkata megide ya; mgbe nwunye ya gwara ya nke ahụ, ya na ya gbagara Borno
Bayamo bụ oké ifufe na-esi n'ala dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri ndịda Cuba, karịsịa na nso Bight of Bayamo

Bayo Omoboriowo (amụrụ na Mee 13, 1987) bụ onye nta akụkọ foto Naijiria na onye na-ese foto akwụkwọ
Ọ bụ onye na-ese foto nke onye isi ala Muhammad Buhari
A mụrụ Omoboriowo ma zụlite ya na Mushin, Lagos
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere BSc na pure and applied chemistry na Mahadum nke Lagos
Eberechukwu Nwizu a maara nke ọma dị ka Bhaira Mcwizu ma ọ bụ Bayray McNwizu bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Naijiria
Ọ bịara bụrụ onye a ma ama mgbe o meriri ihe ngosi nke atọ nke Amstel Malta Box Office (AMBO)
N'afọ 2009, ọ nwetara nhọpụta nke Africa Movie Academy Awards

Bayume Mohamed Husen (onye a mụrụ Mahjub bin Adam Mohamed; a mụrụ n'abalị 22 ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 1904 ọ nwụọ na'abalị 24 ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1944) bụ onye agha Afro-German, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye mmegide ndị Nazi
Husen, nwa nwoke nke onye bụbu onye ọrụ askari, so nna ya rụọ ọrụ na Agha Ụwa Mbụ na ndị agha Germany na-achị n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Afrịka
O mechara rụọ ọrụ dịka onye na-ere nri n'ụgbọ mmiri na Germany ma nwee ike ịkwaga Germany na 1929
Ọ lụrụ di ma malite ezinụlọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 1933
Husen kwadoro ndị Germany na-achị ala ọhụrụ ma nye aka na Deutsche Afrika-Schau, ebe a na-edebe anụmanụ nke ndị Nazi na-agbasa ozi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Husen rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-ere nri na obere ọrụ dị iche iche na nkuzi asụsụ na obere ọrụ na ihe nkiri German dị iche iche metụtara Africa
N'afọ 1941, a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ na KZ Sachsenhausen, ebe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1944
Ndụ ya bụ isiokwu nke akụkọ ndụ afọ 2007 na ihe nkiri ihe nkiri afọ 2014
A mụrụ Husen na Dar es Salaam, nke bụ akụkụ nke German East Africa n'oge ahụ, dịka nwa nke onye askari nke nwere ọkwa Effendi
Tupu Agha Ụwa Mbụ, ọ mụtalarị German ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ na ụlọ ọrụ akwa na Lindi
Mgbe agha tiwapụrụ n'afọ 1914, ya na nna ya sonyeere Schutztruppe ma sonye na mkpọsa East Africa megide ndị agha Allied
Husen merụrụ ahụ n'Agha nke Mahiwa n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1917 ma jide ya dịka onye agha Britain
bazaar -e-Husn (Urdu) ma ọ bụ seva sadan (Hindi Ụlọ ọrụ) bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ Hindustani nke munshi Premchand dere
Edere ya na mbụ n'asụsụ Urdu n'okpuru aha bazaar -e- Husn ('ahịa nke ịma mma' ma ọ bụ mpaghara na-acha uhie uhie) mana e bipụtara ya na hindin sitere na Calcutta dị ka seva sadan (ụlọ ọrụ ') na 1919
E bipụtara ya na Urdu, na 1924, si Lahore
Bazaar-e-Husn bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ dị mkpa nke Premchand; tupu ya, o bipụtara ihe odide anọ n'asụsụ Urdu nke nwere ihe dịka peeji 100 ọ bụla
Oxford University Press, India wepụtara nsụgharị Bekee nke akwụkwọ a na New Delhi n'afọ 2005
A na-ekwu na afọ ahụ dị ịrịba ama, ebe ọ bụ ncheta ọmụmụ Munshi Premchand nke 125th
Bazaar-e-Husn bụ akụkọ banyere nwanyị na-enweghị obi ụtọ nke a ghọgburu site n'ụzọ omume ọma ụlọ ka ọ bụrụ onye akwụna
Mgbe ahụ, ọ na-agbanwe onwe ya ma kwụọ ụgwọ site n'ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa nke ogige ụmụ mgbei maka ụmụaka nwanyị ndị isi obodo, seva-sadan of the Hindi title
Ọnọdụ ahụ dị n'obodo okpukpe Hindu nke Varanasi, na mmalite narị afọ nke 20
British Raj ewebatala ọchịchị onwe onye na India n'obodo nta, n'ime obodo ụfọdụ
Onye isi na-eme ihe nkiri bụ nwanyị Brahmin aha ya bụ Suman onye lụrụ di n'otu, nke a kpọrọ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ọ hapụrụ alụmdi na nwunye a ka ọ bụrụ onye isi, n'ime 'kothas' nke obodo ahụ
N'ịgbanwe akụkọ ahụ, ụlọ ọrụ obodo dị n'ógbè ahụ, akụkụ nke India na-emepe emebi mgbe ahụ, nyere iwu ka a kpọga ha pụọ n'obodo ahụ maka omume ọma
Suman chọpụtara na ọnọdụ ya n'etiti ọha mmadụ bụ ihe kpatara nsogbu alụmdi na nwunye nwanne nwanyị
Mgbe ahụ, ọ na-esonyere ndị inyom di ha nwụrụ ozi n'ụlọ ma kụziie ha okpukpe
Mgbe nke a na-aghọ ihe siri ike, ya na nwanne nwanyị bụ onye lụrụ Suman n'oge gara aga sonyeere dị ka nkụzi
A na-akpọ ụlọ ahụ Seva Sadan (ụlọ ọrụ), nke aha akwụkwọ akụkọ a yiri ka ọ sitere
Bazin o nwere ike izo aka na
Bazin (Arabic البازين, nke a na-akpọ , bụ achịcha na-enweghị ihe na-eko achịcha na nri Libya nke e ji ọka bali, mmiri na nnu mee
A na nakwado bazin site n'isi ụtụ ọka bali n'ime mmiri wee tie ya iji mepụta ntụ ọka site na iji magraf, nke bụ osisi pụrụ iche e mere maka nzube a
Enwere ike itinye ntụ ọka ahụ n'ime efere ma nye ohere ka ọ sie ike, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, a na-eme ya ma ọ bụ na-esi ya ọkụ
[lower-alpha 1] Nnu na-enye aka na ike nke bazin
Bazin nwere ike ịnwe ihe yiri ihe siri ike na ihe siri ike
A pụrụ ịkwado ya site na iji ntụ ọka wit dum, mmanụ oliv na ose dị ka ihe ndị mejupụtara ya
A na-ejikarị tomato sauce, àkwá, poteto na atụrụ enye bazin

Usoro nkwado isi ya na-agụnye ịkpụzi ntụ ọka ahụ ka ọ bụrụ pyramid ma ọ bụ dome, e mesịa, a pụrụ iji ofe tomato ma ọ bụ stew anụ na poteto wụsara n'elu ma ọ bụ gburugburu ma jiri àkwá sie ike chọọ ya mma
Enwere ike itinye akwa raw n'ime ofe ọkụ
Aseeda bụ efere eji bazin, mmanụ aṅụ, sirop dat na bọta ma ọ bụ mmanụ a kwadebere
Bazin nwekwara ike isonyere ugu esiri esi na ngwakọta tomato ihendori
Mgbe a na-eri ya, a pụrụ 'ịkụkọta ya ma jiri mkpịsị aka rie ya'
A na-eri ya site na iji aka nri, a pụkwara iri ya n'otu
A kọwawo Bazin dị ka nri ọdịnala na dị ka nri mba Libya
Enwere irụwadebe ofe Bazin site n'iji ya esi nri (ma ọ bụ ubu ma ọ bụ ụkwụ) na yabasị a pịrị apị, turmeric, nnu, chilli powder, helba (fek), paprika na-atọ ụtọ, ose ojii na tomato paste
A pụkwara itinye agwa buru ibu, lentil na poteto
A na-ahazi ofe, àkwá, poteto na anụ gburugburu ebe a na-eme ntụ ọka
A na-ejikarị lemon na chillies ọhụrụ ma ọ bụ pickled (imsaiyar) eri nri ahụ
Ụzọ ochie e si eme bazin bụ iji mepụta ntụ ọka ahụ n'ime achịcha nkwụ ma sie ya na mmiri n'ime ite ọla kọpa pụrụ iche a na-akpọ__hau____hau____hau__
A na-eji nnukwu, dị larịị, osisi na-agwakọta achịcha ọka bali, ebe ọ bụ na ha siri ike, n'ime ite ahụ ma gwakọta ha iji mepụta otu nnukwu iberibe
N'oge ndị a, a na-ejikarị blender eme ihe, ma ọ bụ a na-esi ntụ ọka ahụ ozugbo na mmiri dị ka pudding

Beatrice 'Bea' Angela Duran bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị America na ọkachamara n'ihe gbasara mkpesa nke ndị otu si Las Vegas, Nevada, na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye otu Nevada Assembly
A mụrụ Duran na 1963 na Cheyenne, Wyoming

N N'afọ 1986, Duran, onye na-ere nri na Four Queens Hotel na Casino, malitere ịrụsi ọrụ ike na Culinary Workers Union, Las Vegas-based Local 226 nke UNITE HERE, ma nọrọ na ndị ọrụ ka otu ahụ nwetara nkwado n'ebe ahụ
Kemgbe afọ 1999 ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ maka Culinary Union, ebe ọ bụ ọkachamara na mkpesa na Ngalaba mkpesa ha

N'ọnwa Disemba 2018, Clark County Commission họpụtara Duran dị ka onye otu Democratic iji nọchite anya mpaghara nke iri na otu (akụkụ Las Vegas na North Las Vegas) nke Nzukọ Nevada, iji dochie Olivia Diaz (onye gbara arụkwaghịm n'oche Nzukọ ya n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ nwetasịrị nhọpụta ọzọ, iji gbaa ọsọ maka Kansụl Obodo Las Vegas)
Àtụ Nevada State Assembly
A bean bụ mkpụrụ nke otu na ime ọtụtụ ụdị nke ezinụlọ osisi na-agbasa okooko Fabaceae, nke a na-eji dị ka akwụkwọ nri maka nri mmadụ ma ọ bụ anụmanụ
Enwere ike isi ha na otụtụ ụzọ dị iche iche, gụnyere isi nri, isi nri, na isi nri, ma jiri ha mee ihe na ọtụtụ nri ọdịnala na uwa niile
Okwu ahụ bụ 'bean' na okwu German ya (dịka
German Bohne) adịgo na-ejikarị eme ihe n'asụsụ West German kemgbe tupu narị afọ nke iri na abụọ, na-ezo aka na agwa sara mbara, chickpeas, na mkpụrụ osisi ndị ọzọ
Nke a bụ ogologo oge tupu a mara ụdị New World Phaseolus na Europe
Mgbe mmekọrịta nke oge Columbian na etiti Europe na Amerịka, a gbatịkwuru okwu ahụ na mkpụrụ nke Phaseolus, dị ka ọka na ọka na-agba ọsọ, na ụdị Vigna

Ọ dịla anya a na-eji okwu ahụ eme ihe na ozuzu ya na ọtụtụ mkpụrụ ndị ọzọ yiri ya, dị ka Old World soybeans, peas, vetches ndị ọzọ, na lupins, na ọbụna ndị yiri obere, dị ka kọfị, vanilla beans, castor beans, na cocoa beans
Na ihi ya, okwu ahụ bụ 'bean' na ozuzu ya nwere ike izo aka n'ọtụtụ ụdị dị iche iche

A na-etinye kari wa mkpụrụ a na-akpọ 'beans' na etiti ihe ọkụkụ a na-ahụkarị 'pulses' (legumes), ọ bụ ezie na okwu ndị ahụ anaghị agbanwe mgbe niile (iji ya eme ihe dịgasị iche site na ụdị osisi na mpaghara)

Okwu abụọ ahụ, agwa na pulses, na-echekwa maka ihe ọkụkụ ma si otú a wepụ akwụkwọ nri ndị nwere obere mkpụrụ ma jiri ya mee ihe maka ebumnuche na-abụghị ọka (forage, hay, na silage), dị ka clover na alfalfa
Òtù Nri na Ọrụ Ugbo nke Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu na-akọwa 'BEANS, DRY' (koodu isiokwu 176) dị ka nke metụtara naanị ụdị Phaseolus

Nke a bụ otu n'ime ihe atụ dị iche iche nke otu okwu dị warara nke a na-eme ka ọ dị na iwu azụmahịa ma ọ bụ botany na-adịkarị n'asụsụ okike na ihe omimi sara mbara na ojiji nri na ojiji n'ozuzu; ihe atụ ndị ọzọ a na-ahụkarị bụ ihe omimi nke okwu nut na ihe omuma sara mbara nke okwu , na eziokwu ahụ bụ na tomato bụ mkpụrụ osisi, n'ikwu okwu botanical, mana a na-emekarị ha dị ka akwụkwọ nri na ozu n'ojii

N'ụzọ yiri nke ahụ, nkọwa ọzọ nke ojiji bụ na ọtụtụ ụdị osisi ndị a na-akpọ agwa mgbe ụfọdụ, gụnyere Vigna angularis (azuki bean), mungo (black gram), radiata (green gram), na aconitifolia (moth bean), bụ ndị e kewara dị ka Phaseolus ma e mesịrị gbanwee ya ma nyocha taxonomic anaghị akwụsị kpamkpam iji mmetụta ndị guzosiri ike n'ozuzu
N'adịghị ka pea ndị yiri ya, agwa bụ ihe ọkụkụ na oge ọkọchị nke chọrọ okpomọkụ iji too
Legumes nwere ike ijikọta nitrogen ma ya mere ọ chọrọ obere fatịlaịza karịa ọtụtụ osisi
Uto na-abụkarị ụbọchị 55 na 60 site na ịkụ ruo owuwe ihe ubi
Ka mkpụrụ osisi bean na-etolite, ha na-acha odo odo ma kpọọ nkụ, na agwa dị n'ime na-agbanwe site na akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ gaa na agba ha tozuru etozu
[nkọwa dị mkpa] Dị ka osisi vaịn, osisi bean chọrọ nkwado mpụga, nke nwere ike iwere ụdị 'ụlọ ọka' pụrụ iche ma ọ bụ osisi
Ụmụ amaala America na-akụkarị ha na ọka na squash (nke a na-akpọ Three Sisters), na nnukwu ọka na-arụ ọrụ dị ka nkwado maka agwa

Beata Nandjala Naigambo (amụrụ na 11 Machị, na afọ 1980 na Oilagati, Ohangwena Region) bụ onye Namibia na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge nke bụ ọkachamara na marathon
Oge kachasị mma ya bụ 2 27 28, nke e debere na Hamburg Marathon n'ọnwa Eprel na afọ 2015
O sonyere na afọ 2008 Summer Olympics, ebe ọ mechara nke iri abụọ na asatọ n'ime mmadụ iri asatọ na otu sonyere na Women's marathon
Na afọ 2012 Summer Olympics ọ mechara nke 38 n'ime 107 ndị na-agwụcha na oge nke 2 31 16
Beatrice nwere ike iza kwa
Beatrice Aboyade (amụrụ ya na onwa Ọgọst 24 1935), bụ onye ọdee akwụkwọ Naịjirịa na onye prọfesọ lara ezumike nka na ọmụmụ ọba akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ibadan
World Encyclopedia of Library and Information Services kọwara dị ka onye ọsụ ụzọ na Ọbá akwụkwọ na Nigeria
Aboyade rụrụ ọrụ na mahadum nke Ibadan na mahadum nke Ile-Ife Library
Aboyade gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Christ's Church Primary School, Porogun, Ijebu Ode
Ọ gara Queen's College, Lagos, maka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndiri n'etiti 1948 na 1951
N'agbata 1952 na 1953, ọ gụchara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndirị na Queen's College, Ede
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta mbụ ya na bekee na mahadum nke Ibadan na 1960, wee nweta ogo ọzọ na Mahadum Michigan na 1964
N'afọ 1970, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na doctorate na mahadum nke Ibadan
Ọ lụrụ Prof
Ojetunji Aboyade, prọfesọ nke akụnụba, site na 1961 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 1994
Aboyade aghọghị onye na- agụ akwụkwọ ozugbo, kama ọ nọrọ obere oge na Nigerian Broadcasting Corporation tupu ọ banye n'ọbá akwụkwọ mahadum nke Ibadan dị ka onye enyemaka onye na-agụ akwụkwọ na 1962
N'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ malitere ọkwa ọhụrụ dị ka onye isi katalọgụ na Mahadum Ife na 1965
Afọ atọ ka e mesịrị, ọ laghachiri na mahadum nke Ibadan ka ọ duru ọrụ Reader ha
Na 1972 ọ malitere ịkụzi ebe ahụ mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye nkuzi mahadum na ngalaba sayensị ọbá akwụkwọ
N'afọ 1978, e buliri ya site na onye nkuzi ukwu mgbe e mere ya onye prọfesọ nke ọmụmụ ọba akwụkwọ na Uni Ibadan, ma bụrụ onye isi ngalaba nke Ọbá akwụkwọ, nweta na Ọmụmụ Ozi na mahadum
Ọ na-elekọtakwa Rural Development Information System (RUDIS), bụ nke mere ka ndị obodo Afrịka nweta ozi
Ọrụ ya na RUDIS kpughere na ọba akwụkwọ ime obodo Naijiria na-arụ ọrụ chọrọ
E jiri akwụkwọ ọbá akwụkwọ ahụ gosi ka esi emeziwanye ihe ndị dị ka okporo ụzọ, ọkụ eletrik, ego na mmiri pọpụpụ
Ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ ga-achọpụta maka ohere ọrụ na-abụghị mpaghara yana ozi gbasara fatịlaịza na ohere ịzụ ahịa

Beatrice Agyeman Abbey bụ onye isi ndị isi Ghana na onye isi njikwa nke Media General bụ ndị nwe TV3, Onua FM, 3FM, Connect FM, Akoma FM na MG Digital si mba Ghana N'afọ 2021, e nyere ya onyinye dị ka onye isi mgbasa ozi nke afọ na Ghana Entrepreneur and Corporate Executive Awards
Beatrice nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na nzere masta ya na GIMPA
Beatrice malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ 2000 dị ka onye nta akụkọ, mgbe ahụ ọ bụ onye nta akụkọ mgbasa ozi na onye na-ahụ maka akụkọ
N'afọ 2017, ọ ghọrọ onye isi nchikota maka Media General
Ọ bụ onye isi nke Media General Digital ruo ihe karịrị otu afọ na onye isi nchikota nke Media General Radio maka oge ụfọdụ
Ọ gbara ndị ama ama ajụjụ ọnụ dịka John Agyekum Kufuor, John Mahama, na Ellen Johnson Sirleaf
Na Septemba 2020, e nyere ya onyinye maka Ọkachasị na Mgbasa Ozi na Ghana Women of the Year
Ọ bụ Glitz Africa haziri ya
N'ọnwa ise afọ 2021, e nyere ya onyinye dị ka onye isi mgbasa ozi nke afọ na Ghana Entrepreneur and Corporate Executive Awards
Ọ bụ ndị Entrepreneurs Foundation of Ghana (EFG) haziri ya
Beatrice Akello Akori bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda
Ọ bụ nwanyị so na ndị omeiwu nke iri na otu nke Uganda (na afo 2021), na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu National Resistance Movement na-achị
Beatrice Akello Akori bụ onye isi obodo nke Apac District
N'afọ 2020 ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Apac District taskforce maka COVID-19
Na ntuli aka nke afọ 2021, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị na nzuko omeiwu maka mpaghara Agago
O nwetara vootu 31,450 iji merie nwanyị MP nke Agago, Judith Franca Akello (FDC), onye nwetara vootu 26,564

Beatrice Atim Anywar (née Beatrice Atime), nke a na-akpọkwa Betty Anywar, (amụrụ na 9 Jenụwarị, na afọ 1964), bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda nke na-eje ozi dị ka onye omeiwu na-anọchite anya Kitgum Municipality Constituency na 10th Ugandan Parliament (2016 ruo 2021)
Site na 14 Disemba, na afọ 2019, ọ na-eje ozi n'otu oge ahụ dị ka Minista Steeti maka Gburugburu Ebe Obibi, na Kọmitii Ugandan
Ọ nọchiri Dr
Mary Goretti Kitutu, onye a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka ike na mineral, n'otu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
A mụrụ ya na Kitgum District, na mpaghara Acholi, na mpaghara Northern nke Uganda, na Jenụwarị 9, na afọ 1964
N'afọ 1991, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Advanced Diploma in Marketing, na Makerere University Business School
N'afọ 2004, ọ nwetara nzere Bachelor of Public Administration na Mahadum Islam dị na Uganda
Mahadum Makerere, mahadum ọha na eze kachasị ochie na nke kachasị ukwuu na Uganda nyere ya nzere Master of Public Administration and Management
O nwekwara asambodo na Democracy na Good Governance, nke o nwetara na Mahadum Marquette, na United States
Ruo ihe karịrị afọ abụọ, site na afọ 1991 ruo na afọ 1993, Beatrice Anywar rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Depot Manager na ụlọ ọrụ a na-akpọ UFEL Uganda
Mgbe ahụ maka afọ abụọ sochirinụ, na afọ 1994 rụọ na afọ 1995, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Senior Marketing Officer na Vitafoam Uganda Limited, ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta matarasị
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọfịs nlekọta ndị ahịa nke National Water and Sewerage Corporation, na-eje ozi n'ebe ahụ afọ asatọ, site na afọ 1996 ruo na afọ 2004
Ọ banyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ntuli aka nke Uganda site na ịsọ mpi maka oche ndị omeiwu nke Kitgum Municipality Constituency na afọ 2006
A họpụtara ya, na-emeri onye na-azọ ọkwa onye National Resistance Movement bụ Santa Okot
A họpụtara ya dị ka minista onyinyo maka gburugburu ebe obibi, n'oge mbụ ya na ndị omeiwu, n'ihi ọrụ ya na gburugburu ebe obibi
A mara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya iji chekwaa Ọhịa Mabira na Uganda

Onye isi ala Yoweri Museveni, na gọọmentị, tupu ọrụ ya kpebiri ire ọhịa ahụ na ụlọ ọrụ shuga Sugar Corporation of Uganda Limited (SCOUL) iji belata ya ma gbanwee ya ka ọ bụrụ ubi okpete maka mmepụta ethanol
Atim lụrụ ọgụ na ihe atụ National Association of Professional Environmentalists iji kwụsị ịkpụ osisi, ma hazie boycott nke shuga SCOUL
N'afọ 2007, ihe dị ka 100,000 ndị Uganda mere ngagharị iwe na ngagharị iwe a na-akpọ 'Save Mabira Crusade' megide onye isi ala na ndị agha iji chekwaa ọhịa ahụ
Mmadụ atọ nwụrụ ma merụọ ọtụtụ ndị ahụ
Ndị agha na ndị uwe ojii nọchibidoro ụlọ Atim Anywar, a tụkwara ya mkpọrọ maka iyi ọha egwu
N'oge ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke afọ 2016, Betty Anywar meriri na ntuli aka Forum for Democratic Change
Ọ gbara ọsọ dị ka onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nwere onwe ya
Ọ meriri n'oche ndị omeiwu, na ohere dị mma, na-eti ọtụtụ ndị mmegide dị elu
N'ọnwa Disemba, na afọ 2017, n'oge ntuli aka ndị omeiwu iji wepụ afọ ole onye isi ala, Beatrice Atim Anywar vootu 'Ee', nke na-ewute ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-emegide ya
N'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2019, a kpọrọ aha ya na kọmitii nke Uganda dị ka minista nke steeti maka gburugburu ebe obibi; ọkwá onye isi ala nke Uganda Yoweri Kaguta Museveni họpụtara ya
Beatrice Balana Bofia (amuru na November 9, 1984) bu onye egwuregwu basketball nke America America, na-egwu ugbu a maka Mahadum Arizona The Arizona Wildcats
A mụrụ ya na Bafia, Cameroon, ma bụrụ nwanne ejima tọrọ Suzy Bofia
N'ịdị elu 6 ụkwụ na 7½ inch, Bofia na-edobekarị dị ka etiti n'ihi nnukwu ịdị elu ya
Bofia malitere ịgba bọọlụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ
Nwanne ya nwanyị nke nta, Suzy, malitere obere oge ka nke ahụ gasịrị
Ọrụ ya mere ka ọ kpọọ na Technical High School afọ abụọ na Cameroon
O mechara gaa Illinois Central College na America
Onye na-agafe na kọleji site na Illinois Central, onye bụbu onye nkuzi Arizona bụ Joan Bonvicini tinyere nwanne ya nwanyị Suzy kpọrọ Bofia
Ọ pụtara na egwuregwu Iri abụọ na itoolu maka Wildcats n'oge oge mbụ ya
n'okpuru onye isi nchịkwa Steve Garber, ọ nwetara akara 44 na 35 rebounds maka Cougars
Na mbido Nọvemba 2006, Beatrice nwere obere mmerụ ahụ n'ikpere nke mere ka ọ ghara ịga ebe ọ na gba bọọlụ ruo ọtụtụ izu
A na-eyi ya redshirt ma nọrọ n'èzí n'oge niile nke 2006-07
Ọ laghachiri n'oge gara aga iji mee nkezi atọ na atọ rebounds kwa egwuregwu
Ọ pụtara na egwuregwu iri abụọ na itoolu maka Wildcats n'oge oge mbụ ya na otu ahụ
A na-ewere Beatrice na Suzy dị ka ụmụ ejima kachasị ogologo n'ụwa
Otú ọ dị, Guinness World Records depụtara ndị egwuregwu volleyball Ann Recht na Claire Recht dị ka ndị kachasị elu
A naghịzi arụrịta ụka na ndekọ a ebe ọ bụ na a tụrụ ụmụnne nwanyị Recht ọzọ mgbe ha dị afọ 18 na 2006 ma ha abụọ dịkarịa ala 6'7'
Ụmụnne nwanyị Bofia agbaghabeghị ndekọ a kemgbe afọ 2006
Byenkya previously served as the Woman Representative for Hoima District in the 7th Parliament (2001–2006) and the 8th Parliament (2006–2011)
She lost her seat during the National Resistance Movement political party, primary elections of the 2016 election cycle, losing to the former Woman MP for Hoima District, Tophace Byagira Kaahwa
During the 7th parliament, she was one of the few members of parliament, who refused to accept the USh5 million (approx
US$2,000 at that time) given to each MP, as inducement to change the Constitution and remove the presidential term-limits

Nhọpụta ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Uganda Land Commission (ULC), na-abịa n'oge ULC na-etinye aka na esemokwu, gụnyere ikpe ụlọ ikpe nke (a) nchụpụ iwu na-akwadoghị nke ndị mmadụ n'ala ha (b) ịgha ụgha nke utu aha ala (c) iwu na-adịghị mma nke ndị ọchụnta ego bara ọgaranya na (d) nrụrụ aka
N'afọ 2018, Justice Catherine Bamugemereire nke Land Inquiry Commission, nyere iwu ka ejide ụfọdụ ndị ọrụ ULC maka ebubo nke iji ọrụ eme ihe n'ụzọ na-ezighị ezi, ileghara ọrụ na nrụrụ aka anya
Na ULC, Byenkya nọchiri Baguma Isoke, onye bụbu Minista nke Ala na kansụl Ugandan, onye jere ozi dị ka onyeisi oche, site na afo 2013 ruo na afo 2019
N'afọ 2012, onye isi ala Yoweri Museveni họpụtara Beatrice Byenkya na Immigration and Citizen Control Board
Beatrice Funke Ogunmola (amuru Febụwarị 15, 1980) bụ onye nọọsụ, onye na-emeputa ihe nkiri, onye na-ede ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke a na-akpọ kwa BFO
Ogunmola bụ onye Naijiria si Itaogbolu, Ondo State, Nigeria bi na US
Ogunmola tolitere n'ụlọ a na-alụ karịa otu nwanyị
Ọ bụ nwa nke abụọ n’ime ụmụ isii nne ya mụrụ na ụmụ iri na abụọ nna ya
Ogunmola lụrụ Victor Ogunmola ma nwee ụmụ atọ
Ogo mmụta mbụ Ogunmola na Naijiria bụ na teknụzụ nri
Ọ lụọ di wee soro ezinụlọ ya kwaga United States
Ọ gara n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya wee mụọ na kọleji obodo, ọ ghọrọ Registered Nurse (RN) na-aru na US
Ọrụ ime ihe nkiri, ide na mmepụta Ogunmola malitere n'ime ihe nkiri nwere ogologo ihe n'afọ 2010 o dere, ihe nkiri otu ndi na-eme ihe nkiri nke ụka ya mepụtara, wee sonye na onye ndu
N'ikpeazụ, ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke 'ndi na-eme ihe nkiri bu naanị ụmụaka'
Ogunmola emeputala ọtụtụ ihe nkiri wee bụrụ onye ama ama ka o mepụtachara Love Castle na 2021
Ogunmola bụ onye isi oche nke Hope Studio na BFO Media
Ọ bụkwa nọọsụ edebanyere aha n'ụlọ ọgwụ dị na Houston, Texas, US
Jide Kosoko Rachel Oniga Zack Orji
Na 2021, Ogunmola nwetara ọtụtụ ihe nrite n'ihi ọrụ ya n'imepụta ihe nkiri Love Castle
Béatrice Kamboulé (amụrụ na 25 Febụwarị 1980) bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu na Burkinabé nke na-asọ mpi na 100 mita ihe mgbochi, ogologo ima elu, mwụli elu okpukpu atọ yana heptathlon
O sonyere na 100 mita hurdles na 2011 Asọmpi mba ụwa na-enweghị iru eru maka ọkara ikpeazụ
Beatrice Lungu (amụrụ na 23 Nọvemba na afọ 1956) bụ onye na-agba ọsọ na Zambia
O sonyere na 100 mita ụmụ nwanyị na afo 1972 Summer Olympics
Frances Beatrice Marshoff (Amụrụ na 17 Septemba 1957) bụ onye isi ala nke Free State site n'afọ 2004 ruo afọ 2009
Ọ nọchiri Winkie Direko n'ọkwa ahụ n'ụbọchị 22 Eprel 2004, Ace Magashule nọchiri ya n'ụbọchị 6 Mee 2009
Marshoff bụkwa onye nọọsụ edebanyere aha ma bụrụbu onye otu Executive Council (MEC) maka Social Development na Free State (June 2001 ruo 21 Eprel 2004)
Tupu nke ahụ, ọ bụ onye otu ndị omeiwu maka African National Congress (1994 ruo afọ 1999)
Beatrice Mukansinga bụ onye na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru ụmụnwanyị na Rwanda nke na-elekwasị anya na ụmụnwanyị ndị mgbukpọ agbụrụ nke Rwanda metụtara nke ukwuu
Ọ hapụrụ Rwanda n'oge mgbukpọ agbụrụ wee kwaga Kenya
Mgbe o si Kenya laghachi Rwanda n'afọ 1995, ihe na-erughị otu afọ mgbe mgbukpọ ahụ gasịrị, e gbukwara ndị ezinụlọ ya gụnyere ndị mụrụ ya na ụmụnne isii n'oge mgbukpọ agbụrụ ahụ n'afọ 1994
Ọ sonyeere òtù ọrụ ebere nke ọha na eze bụ Barakabaho Foundation na -afo 1995, mgbe ọ laghachiri Rwanda
Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na nzukọ ahụ na-enye enyemaka maka ụmụ nwanyị ndị lanarịrị mgbukpọ agbụrụ
O mechara guzobe otu MBWIRA NDUMVA (Kwuo, Ana m ege ntị) n'afọ 1996 dị ka otu nzukọ jikọtara ya na Barakabaho Foundation
Ọ malitere nzukọ ahụ iji kwado ma nye nduzi maka ụmụnwanyị na-enweghị nne na nna na ndị e dinara n'ike bụ ndị a chụpụrụ n'ihi mgbukpọ agbụrụ nke Rwanda n'afọ 1994
A kpaliri ya ka o guzobe otu Mb disput Dumva mgbe ọ nwetasịrị ahụmịhe na echiche site n'aka onye gburu agbụrụ na onye e dinara n'ike
Beatrice bukwa Nwanyi amaama nkeoma n'aka ịgba ume na ime ka ụmụnwanyị e dinara n'ike n'oge mgbukpọ agbụrụ ahụ kwenye ịzụlite ụmụ ha kama ịhapụ ụmụaka ahụ
Amnesty International nyere ya Ginetta Sagan Fund Award na 1998 iji kwado enyemaka ya nye ndị lanarịrị mgbukpọ agbụrụ nke Rwanda
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2021, edepụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ụmụnwanyị asaa na-eme ngagharị iwe n'Afrịka nke kwesịrị isiokwu Wikipedia site na Global Citizen, otu mba ụwa na òtù nkwado
Beatrice Rwakimari (amụrụ na 21 Mee 1961) bụ onye isi ahụike ọha na eze nke Uganda, onye nchịkwa ọha na eze, onye nkuzi na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụ onye a họpụtara dị ka nwanyị omeiwu nke Ntungamo District na omeiwu nke iri nke Uganda ma nwee njikọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na NRM, otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị na Uganda
Ọ jere ozi na mpaghara ahụ ugboro abụọ n'usoro na nke asaa na nke asatọ site na puku abụọ na otu ruo pụkụ abụọ na iri na otu
Na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke iri, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu Kọmitii Ntinye aha, Kọmitii Ahụike na NRM Parliamentary Caucus

Beatrice Utondu (amuru na ọnwa 23 Novemba nke afọ 1969) bu onye oso oso si Nigeria bu onye meriri ihe nrite ọla nchara Olympic na 4 x 100 meters relay na Barcelona 1992
Ọ bụ ọkachamara n'egwuregwu mita 100, na-esetịpụ ihe kacha mma nke ya na nkeji 1140 n'oge asọmpi ụwa nke 1991 wee bụrụ onye mmeri Africa na mmemme na 1993
Ọ merikwara n'ọwụ elu ogologo na 1987 All-Africa Games
Beatrice Mukaye Wabudeya bụ dọkịta anụmanụ na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Uganda
Ọ bụ onye bụbu Minista nke Kampala Capital City Authority (KCCA), na Cabinet Ugandan, site na 17 Machị 2011 ruo 27 Mee 2011
Tupu nke ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista maka Onye isi ala, site na 2006 ruo Mee 2011
Na ntuli aka nke 27 Mee 2011, Kabakumba Masiko nọchiri ya na Ministry for the Presidency
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye omeiwu (MP), na-anọchite anya Sironko District Women's Constituency site na afọ pụkụ abụọ na otụ ruo pụkụ abụọ na iri na otu
A mụrụ ya na Sironko District na 12 Disemba 1956
Beatrice Wabudeya gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere dọkịta anụmanụ nke Bachelor of Veterinary Medicine (BVM) na Mahadum Makerere na 1979
Ọ gara n'ihu nweta nzere Master of Science (MSc), ọkachamara na Agricultural Extension, kwa site na Mahadum Makerere na 1996
Site na 1979 ruo 1988, Beatrice Wabudeya rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ Veterinary na Mbale District
Site na 1988 ruo 1993, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Chief District Veterinary Officer maka Mbale District
Site na 1993 ruo 1996, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Chief Production Officer maka Mbale District
N'afọ 1996, ọ banyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị wee sọọ mpi maka oche ụmụ nwanyị nke Mbale District na tiketi National Resistance Movement
Ọ meriri n'oche ahụ ma jee ozi ruo n'afọ 2001
Site na 1998 ruo 1999, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista nke Steeti maka Mmekọrịta Mmekọrịta nwoke na nwanyị na ọdịbendị
N'afọ 1999, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista nke Steeti maka Ahụike (Primary Health Care), ọfịs ọ nọgidere na ya ruo n'afọ 2001
N'afọ 2001, ọ gbara ọsọ maka oche onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị maka Sironko District
Ọ meriri n'oche ahụ, a họpụtakwara ya ọzọ n'afọ 2006
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta maka Onye isi ala n'afọ 2006 na-eje ozi n'ọkwa ahụ ruo mgbe a chụpụrụ ya na May 2011
Ruo ọnwa abụọ, site na 17 Machị 2011 ruo 28 Mee 2011, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista maka Kampala Capital City Authority
N'oge gara aga, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye omeiwu a họpụtara ahọpụta na-anọchite anya Sironko District Women's Constituency
N'ọnwa Machị afọ pụkụ abụọ na iri na otu , ọ gbara ọsọ megide Nandala Mafabi nke otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Forum for Democratic Change (FDC) na 'Budadiri County West' na Sironko District
Mafabi meriri n'ụzọ dị mfe
N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Onyinye Onye isi ala nke mmadụ asatọ maka afọ ise sochirinụ
Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ya akọwapụtara na mbụ, ọ na-ejekwa ozi dị ka onyeisi oche nke ndị nduzi nke National Enterprise Corporation, malite na 20 Machị 2014
Beatrice Khamisa Wani-Noah (amụrụ na 28 Julaị 1959) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Sudan nke jere ozi dị ka minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ofesi na imekọ ihe ọnụ mba ụwa site na 2020 ruo 2021
A mụrụ Wani-Noah na 28 nke July 1959 na Morobo County, Central Equatoria steeti

O nwere Masters of Arts na mmekọrịta mba ụwa site na Mahadum Mba Nile nke United States na Nairobi na diplọma postgraduate na Land and Water Management site na Cranfield Institute of Technology na United Kingdom
Wani-Noah rụrụ ọrụ na United Nations Economic Commission for Africa site na 1994 ruo 2003

Ọ nọ na nhọpụta na Gọọmentị nke South Sudan kemgbe afọ 2006, dị ka onye isi nchịkwa maka mmekọrịta dị iche iche na Ministry of Regional Cooperation (2006-2010), osote odeakwụkwọ na Ministry of Peace and CPA Implementation (2010-2011) na osote minista nke Telecommunications and Postal Services (2011-2013)
A họpụtara Wani-Noah ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya South Sudan na Democratic Republic of the Congo n'afọ 2014, wee jee ozi dị ka onye nnọchianya South Sudan na Germany site na Machị 2018
Onye isi ala họpụtara Wani-Noah ka ọ bụrụ Minista Na-ahụ Maka Mba Ọzọ] Salva Kiir Mayardit na ọchịchị ọhụrụ ya na 12 Machị 2020, na-anọchi Awut Deng Acuil
O nweghị ike ịga emume iyi gọọmentị n'ụbọchị iri na isii n'ọnwa Machị ka ọ nọ na-anọpụ iche mgbe o si mba nwere COVID-19 laghachi Juba
E wepụrụ ya n'ọkwa ya na 9 Septemba 2021
Wani-Noah lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
Beautiful Nubia and the Roots Renaissance Band bụ otu egwu ndị na-eme ihe n'oge a na Naịjirịa

Onye na-ede egwu na onye na-agụ uri bụ Segun Akinlolu (aka Beautiful Nubia) guzobere ma na-eduzi, abụ na abọm nke otu ahụ enwetawo ọnọdụ ofufe n'etiti ndị na-eguzosi ike n'ihe na ndị na-eto eto na-agbasa n'ụwa niile
Segun Akinlolu bụ onye nkwuputa mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na-eme nke a site na egwu ọdịnala ya
Na mgbe nduya nyefere o nkwenyere na-atachi obi na-adịgide adịgide na ike nke mgbanwe; na ọha mmadụ anyị abụghị nke a na-apụghị ịgbapụta agbapụta; na nsogbu ya dị n'ime ya nwere ike idozi
Abụ Nubia guzoro na uba ọdịnala na amamihe obodo mana ozi ya zuru ụwa ọnụ na mkpali na isiokwu iji ndụ kpọrọ ihe, kwanyere okike ùgwù ma mụta ibi n'udo na ndị ọzọ
Egwú ahụ na-ekwu chitere ndị na-enweghị olu ma na-akwado nrọ nke mmadụ dị mma ebe ndị mmadụ nwere onwe ha n'ezie ma ha nhata
Ọ na-ekwusa ịhụnanya na nnagide ma na-agbakwa ndị mmadụ ume iguzo ma gbachitere ikike ha mgbe a zọpịrị ha n'ebe ọ bụla n'ụwa
'Abụ ya karịrị parochialism
Ka ha na-arịọ maka mmetụta ndị Afrịka, ha nwekwara eziokwu zuru ụwa ọnụ
A mụrụ Segun na Ibadan na 1968, ọ malitere ide egwu mgbe ọ dị obere
O nwetara mmetụta mbụ ya site na ọdịbendị ọdịnala nke jupụtara n'ụdị uri, ihe nkiri, egwu na akụkọ ọdịnala
N'afọ 1997, o guzobere EniObanke, ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta egwu na ahịa, nke a tọhapụrụ abọm mbụ ya n'afọ 1997
A tọhapụrụ ihe ndekọ niile sochirinụ na akara a, na 2010, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ malitere mmemme egwu egwu mbụ na Naịjirịa, mmemme egwu EniObanke (EMUfest) kwa afọ
N'afọ 1998, onye na-ese ihe kpọrọ ọtụtụ ndị na-eto eto na-eti egwu na Lagos ka ha guzobe otu egwu nkwado nke o nyere aha The Roots Renaissance Band
Kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, Beautiful Nubia anọgidewo na-ede egwu, onye na-ede egwú, onye nhazi na onye ndú - na-enye aka na guitar / rhythm, na-eduzi ma na-akwado olu na ụda
Ụgwọ ọrụ bịara na 2002 site na nweputa abọm nke atọ Jangbalajugbu
Ndị nta akụkọ redio na eme atụmatụ na ihe karịrị nde ndị Naijiria 50 na-eteta kwa ụbọchị na 'Owuro L'Ojo (How D'You Do?)', otu n'ime egwu ndị a na-ewu ewu na abọm ahụ
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, Jangbalajugbu ereela ihe karịrị otu nde (na-agụnyeghị ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke ndị ohi na-ere n'ahịa mepere emepe)
Kemgbe 2002 ndị otu beautiful Nnubia ewepụta la abọm studio iri na anọ ọzọ, nke niile na-akwado ihe a pụrụ ịkọwa dị ka ụdị Nubia mara mma na isi ike ya ịjụ ịbụ onye oghere nduru

Ihe karịrị abụ 200 mbụ - nke na-akụzi ihe, nke nkà ihe ọmụma na nke na-emetụ n'ahụ - emeela ka aha ya sie ike na Naịjirịa na karịa dị ka onye na-akwado iji amamihe ọdịnala mee ihe iji nweta mmepe onwe onye na nke obodo na ikpe ziri ezi
Beautiful Nubia gwakoro ntụrụndụ na-atọ ụtọ na echiche na-akpali akpali nke bịara kọwaa ụdị Nubia mara mma
Egwú a enwetala nyocha magburu onwe ya na akwụkwọ egwu Afrịka / ụwa
A họpụtara ya maka onyinye egwu ma bulie ya n'elu chaatị mba ụwa / ụwa na obodo, obodo na ụlọ ọrụ redio ụlọ akwụkwọ
Segun Akinlolu gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Mahadum Ibadan na nzere Doctor of Veterinary Medicine (DVM) na arọ 1992 ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka dọkịta anụmanụ ruo ihe dị ka afọ 8
O nwekwara asambodo diplọma post-graduate site na Nigeria Institute of Journalism
Na Ọktoba n'afọ 2016, ESEP Le Berger University, Republic of Benin nye kwara Beautiful Nubia onyinye nke Doctorate in Science (Honoris Causa) na Artiz maka ọrụ ya
AlBUMS ACOUSTIC
A na-akọwakarị ịma mma dị ka akụkụ nke ihe ndị na-eme ka ihe ndị a dị ụtọ ịhụ
Ihe ndị dị otú ahụ gụnyere ọdịdị ala, ọdịda anyanwụ, ụmụ mmadụ na ọrụ nka
Ịma mma, tinyere nka na uto, bụ isi isiokwu nke ịma mma, otu n'ime isi alaka nke nkà ihe ọmụma
Dị ka uru mara mma dị mma, a na-eji ya tụnyere ihe ọjọọ dị ka ihe na-adịghị mma
Tinyere eziokwu na ịdị mma ọ bụ otu n'ime transcendentals, nke a na-ewere dịka echiche atọ bụ isi nke nghọta mmadụ
Otu ihe isi ike n'ịghọta ịma mma bụ n'ihi na ọ nwere akụkụ ebumnobi na nke uche a na-ahụ ya dị ka ihe onwunwe nke ihe kamakwa dị ka dabere na mmeghachi omume mmetụta uche nke ndị na-ekiri
Na ihi akụkụ ya, a na-ekwu na ịma mma dị 'na anya onye na-ekiri'

A na-ekwu na ikike dị na akụkụ nke isiokwu ahụ dị mkpa iji ghọta ma kpee ikpe mara mma, mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ ya 'echiche nke ụtọ', nwere ike ịzụ ya nakwa na mkpebi ikpe nke ndị ọkachamara kwekọrọ na ikpeazụ
Nke a ga-atụ aro na ụkpụrụ nke ikpe ziri ezi nke ikpe mara mma bụ intersubjective, ya bụ, dabere na otu ndị ọkàikpe, kama ịbụ kpamkpam ma ọ bụ kpamkpam
Echiche nke ịma mma na-achọ ijide ihe dị mkpa maka ihe niile mara mma
Echiche oge ochie na-akọwa ịma mma n'ihe gbasara mmekọrịta dị na etiti ihe mara mma na ozuzu ya na akụkụ ya akụkụ ndị ahụ kwesịrị iguzo na uzọ ziri ezi na ibe ha ma si otú a mepụta ihe jikọtara ọnụ
Echiche Hedonist na-ahụ njikọ dị mkpa na etiti obi ụtọ na ịma mma, dịka na maka ihe mara mma bụ maka ya ịkpata obi ụtọ na-enweghị mmasị
Echiche ndị ọzọ gụnyere ịkọwa ihe mara mma n'ihe gbasara uru ha, àgwà ịhụnanya n'ebe ha nọ ma ọ bụ ọrụ ha nọ
Beauty Nomvuzo Dlulane bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ndị South Africa bụ onye bụ onye omeiwu (MP) maka African National Congress kemgbe afọ 2003
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Portfolio na Sport & Recreation ugbu a
Beauty Batimbele Ngxongo (amụrụ n'afọ 1953) bụ ónyé South Africa na-akpa nkata Zulu
Igbe nkàtà ya abụrụla ónyé ama ama n'ụwa niile
Ọ bi na Hlabisa, na mpaghara KwaZulu-Natal nkè South Africa
Ngxongo na-akpa akwa ọnụ ụzọ na akwa tebụl n'oge ọ bụ nwata
N'afọ ndị 1990, ónyé agbata obi kụziiri Ngxongo otu esi emepụta ihe dị mgbagwoju ányà site na iji ngwaahịa okike (dị ka ahịhịa na akwụkwọ nkwụ Ilala)
Otu nkata Zulu nke na-ejide mmiri na-ewe ọtụtụ ọnwa iji mezue
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2012, o wèrè ụmụ nwanyị iri na atọ n'ọrụ iji nyéré ákà n'ọmụmụ ihe ya
Ịchọta ndị na-azụ ahịa nwere ike isi ike dịka akpa plastik dị mfe
Otú ọ dị, ya na ndị na-emepụta ihe abụọ n'oge a rụkọtara ọrụ iji mepụta ihe ha na-akpọ Hlabisa Bench
Ọdịdị oche ahụ na-eduzi profaịlụ nke ugwu Hlabisa, ọbọdọ ebe Ngxongo na ndị ọrụ ibe ya bi
Enwere ike ịchọta ọrụ ya na nchịkọta ihe ngosi nka gụnyere na Metropolitan Museum of Art, Smithsonian Institution, Samuel P
Harn Museum of Art
na Fowler Museum na Mahadum California, Los Angeles (UCLA)
Tụkwasị na nkè a, ọrụ ya bụ akụkụ nkè MTN Art Collection, nchịkọta nka nke onwé, nkè ụlọ ọrụ na Johannesburg
Mma Lily Zhuwao (/ zuːˈwaɪoʊ/; amuru 10 Jenụwarị 1965) bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Zimbabwe, na nwunye onye bụbu minista gọọmentị Patrick Zhuwao
Ọ bụkwa nwunye nwa Sabina Mugabe, nwanne onye bụbu onye isi ala Zimbabwe Robert Mugabe
Beauty Lily Zhuwao (/zuːˈwaɪoʊ/; amụrụ na 10 Jenụwarị 1965) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Zimbabwe, na nwunye onye bụbu minista gọọmentị Patrick Zhuwao
Ọ bụkwa nwunye nwa Sabina Mugabe, nwanne nwanyị onye bụbu onye isi ala Zimbabwe Robert Mugabe
Tupu afọ 2015, Zhuwao na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ZANUīPF, na-eje ozi ọtụtụ afọ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba nke mpaghara Mashonaland West Province
N'oge mkparịta ụka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Zimbabwe n'afọ 2008, a họpụtara Zhuwao ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Kọmitii Nhọrọ Iwu (COPAC), nke rụrụ ọrụ idepụta iwu ọhụrụ nke Zimbabwe
E kenyere ya ọrụ dị ka onye na-ekwu okwu, na-atụle echiche ọha na eze n'oge usoro ide iwu
N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2010, Zhuwao wakporo onye otu kọmitii ibe ya bụ Bednock Nyaude, onye otu ụlọ omebe iwu nke Bindura South
Zhuwao wakporo Nyaude n'èzí ọfịs onye nchịkwa distrikti maka Kadoma na Mashonaland West Province
Ọ kụrụ ya ihe n'obi mgbe ọ boro ya ebubo na ọ na-ekwu na ya nwere nsogbu onwe ya, ebubo Nyaude gọnahụrụ
Mgbe ihe ahụ mere, Nyaude kọrọ banyere mwakpo ahụ na Kadoma Central Police Station na 7 Septemba 2010, ma gwa ndị otu COPAC Editor Matamisa na Walter Chidakwa, ndị otu House of Assembly
Matamisa, n'aka nke ya, kọọrọ ndị isi oche COPAC Paul Mangwana na Douglas Mwonzora ihe merenụ
Monzwora kwuru na ọ bụrụ na a mara ya ikpe, a ga-akwụsị Zhuwao na COPAC
Na 6 Febụwarị 2011, Tsitsi Mugabe meriri Zhuwao na ntuli aka maka onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Nhazi Mpaghara ZANUPF Zvimba
Mugabe nwetara vootu iri abụọ na isii na vootu iri na anọ nke Zhuwao
N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2014, Zhuwao sonyere n'ọgụ dị ọkụ nke ZANUPF n'etiti osote onye isi ala Joice Mujuru na Minista Ikpe Zụziri Emmerson Mnangagwa
N'oge ihe di ya kọwara dị ka 'mgbalị ọchịchị', Zhuwao kụrụ onye isi oche mpaghara ZANUPF Mashonaland West Temba Mliswa aka mgbe ha nwesịrị nkwurịta okwu
A kọrọ na ọ kụrụ Mliswa aka, onye na-emegwara ya, otu ugboro, tupu ndị ọzọ nọ ebe ahụ etinye aka

N'ime nzukọ ya na ndị isi gọọmentị ụbọchị ole na ole ka e mesịrị, a kọrọ na Onye isi ala Robert Mugabe gọnahụrụ na a nwara iwe ọchịchị, kwupụtara enweghị nkwenye maka ihe merenụ, ma rịọ Mliswa mgbaghara n'aha Zhuwao
A kọkwara na Mugabe jụrụ Minista mgbasa ozi Jonathan Moyo ihe mere e ji gosipụta Mliswa na mgbasa ozi gọọmentị dị ka onye mwakpo mgbe n'eziokwu, ọ bụ onye mwakpo ahụ metụtara
Zhuwao kwupụtara ihe ahụ merenụ mana ọ jụrụ ikwu okwu, na-ekwu na ọ ga-emecha wepụta nkwupụta

N'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2015, Zhuwao si n'ọkwa ya dị ka onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba nke ZANUPF Mashonaland West Provincial Women's League n'ihi nrụgide sitere n'aka ndị otu pati ibe ya, bụ ndị boro ya ebubo na ọ jụrụ ịbịanye aka n'akwụkwọ mkpesa nke dugara n'ịchụpụ onye isi oche mpaghara Ziyambi Ziyambi
A kọrọ na a na-ahụ Zhuwao dị ka onye na-akwado Ziyambi ma si otú a bụrụ onye ndị mmegide Ziyambi lekwasịrị anya
Zhuwao kwupụtara na ọ gbara arụkwaghịm, mana o kwuru na ọpụpụ ahụ enweghị ihe jikọrọ ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, kama, ọ kwụsịrị ịga gụọ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Zimbabwe
Ọ lụrụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ZANU PF a chụgara mba ọzọ bụ Patrick Zhuwao na nwa ha nwoke bụ Jason Zhuwao bụkwa onye ndọrọ ndọrọ nke ZANU PF
E debere ya na ndepụta mmachibido iwu nke United States n'afọ 2005
Beauty Thulani Zibula bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na onye otu National Assembly of South Africa
Zibula bụ onye otu African National Congress
Zibula bụ onye omeiwu na-azọ ọkwa onye omeiwu maka African National Congress na ntuli aka 2019
Ọ bụ onye nke iri na isii na ndepụta ANC na KwaZulu-Natal
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu mba dịka ANC meriri oche iri abụọ na anọ na mpaghara ahụ
Dị ka onye otu National Assembly, ọ bụ onye otu Standing Committee on Public Accounts
Na 2019 Register of Members' Interest, Zibula kpughere na dị ka onyeisi oche nke Clothing Manufactory Chamber nke National Bargaining Council, ọ natara R13 93548

N'ebe Moore Campbell (February 18, 1950 na November 27, 2006) bụ onye edemede America, onye nta akụkọ na onye nkuzi
Campbell bụ onye dere akwụkwọ atọ kachasị ere na New York Times Brothers and Sisters, Singing in the Comeback Choir, na What You Owe Me, nke bụkwa Los Angeles Times 'Best Book of 2001'

Ọrụ ya ndị ọzọ gụnyere akwụkwọ akụkọ Your Blues Ain't Like Mine, nke bụ New York Times Notable Book of the Year na onye mmeri nke NAACP Image Award for Literature; akwụkwọ ncheta ya, Sweet Summer Growing Up With and Without My Dad; na akwụkwọ mbụ ya na-abụghị akụkọ ifo, Successful Women, Angry Men Backlash in the Two-Career Marriage
Edemede ya, isiokwu ya, na ihe ndị e wepụrụ na-apụta n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ

A mụrụ Elizabeth Bebe Moore, naanị nwa, ma zụlite ya na Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Philadelphia High School for Girls wee nweta nzere Bachelor of Science na agụmakwụkwọ elementrị na Mahadum Pittsburgh
Ọ bụ onye otu nsọpụrụ nke Alpha Kappa Alpha sorority
Ọrụ akụkọ ifo nke Campbell ga-egosipụtakarị mmetụta na-emerụ ahụ nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ga-emetụta ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu na mmekọrịta ha
N'afọ 1992, Campbell ga-ewepụta akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, nke a na-akatọkarị, Your Blues Ain't Like Mine, nke The New York Times Magazine kọwara dị ka otu n'ime akwụkwọ kachasị emetụta na 1992
Akwụkwọ a, nke sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke ogbugbu Emmett Till na 1955, na-akọwa mmetụta nke mpụ a na-enweghị isi nke ezinụlọ onye ahụ
Campbell, nke Rodney King na ọgba aghara ndị sochirinụ na Los Angeles kpaliri, dere akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke abụọ akpọrọ, Brothers and Sisters
A ga-akpọ akwụkwọ akụkọ a akwụkwọ akụkọ The New York Times Magazine kacha ere naanị izu abụọ mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya na 1994
Mmasị Campbell nwere na ahụike uche bụ ihe kpaliri akwụkwọ ụmụaka mbụ ya, Sometimes My Mommy Gets Angry, nke e bipụtara na Septemba 2003
Akwụkwọ a meriri National Alliance on Mental Illness (NAMI) Outstanding Literature Award maka afọ 2003
Akwụkwọ ahụ na-akọ akụkọ banyere otu obere nwa agbọghọ si anagide nne ya na-arịa ọrịa uche zụlite ya
Campbell bụ onye otu National Alliance for the Mentally Ill na onye guzobere NAMI-Inglewood
Akwụkwọ ya bụ 72 Hour Hold na-ekwu maka ọrịa uche
Ọrụ a laghachiri n'isiokwu nke ọrịa uche na ezinụlọ
Dị ka onye nta akụkọ, Campbell dere edemede maka The New York Times Magazine, The Washington Post, Los Angeles Times, Essence, Ebony, Black Enterprise, yana akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụ onye na-akọwa ihe mgbe niile maka Morning Edition mmemme na National Public Radio

Campbell biri na Los Angeles, California, ya na di ya, Ellis Gordon Jr; ha zụlitere ụmụ abụọ, nwa nwoke, Ellis Gordon III, na nwa nwanyị, onye na-eme ihe nkiri Maia Campbell, site na alụmdi na nwunye Campbell na Tiko Campbell
A maara Maia Campbell nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dị ka 'Tiffany' na In the House
Bebe Moore Campbell nwụrụ site na ọrịa kansa ụbụrụ, dị afọ 56, na Nọvemba 27, 2006, ma lie ya na Inglewood Park Cemetery, Inglewood, California
Okwu kachasị amasị ya n'ịbụ onye edemede bụ 'Ịdọ aka ná ntị bụ onye na-enye ihe mkpali'
A na-edebe ihe ndekọ nke Campbell na nchịkọta Bebe Moore Campbell na Mahadum nke Pittsburgh Archives Service Center

Bebe, ma ọ bụ Naami, bụ asụsụ nke ọwụwa anyanwu Beboid dịna Cameroon
Dị ka Ethnologue si kwuo, ọ bụ pasenti iri asatọ na ise yiri Kemezung
Bebele (Bamvele, Bëbëlë) bụ asụsụ Bantu dịna Cameroon
Nghọta dịna ya na olumba ndị ọzọ dị ka Ewondo na Fang
Otu Bémbélé gụnyere asụsụ ndị agbata obi niile na-ekwu na ha bụkwa ndị otu Eki
Ndị a bụ Bebele (Bembélé), Yasám, Yekaba, Yesamba, Bajia, Bafék, na Yanavok
Bémbélé gụnwere Bébélé (Bamvele), Yébaka, Yesamba, na Bajia, akụkụ dum nke ngalaba Haute Sanaga, nke dị n'ebe ndịda Osimiri Sanaga (n'ime obodo Minta, Nanga-Ebogo, Bibé, na Nsem)
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, 'Feuk', Yangavék (Yangafeuk), na Bafék (Bafeuk) dị n'ebe ugwu nke Osimiri Sanaga (na obodo Ntui), na Yasém (Asem) dị na Yassem na njedebe ugwu nke obodo Ngoro (nke Mbam-et-Kim)
Bémbélé tokwara banye mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ na ngalaba Lom-et-Djerem (Diang communi) na Haut-Nyong (Nguélémendouka communi)
Atụmatụ na ekwu na madụ puku iri ise na isii, narị abụọ na asụ asụsụ a (Djomeni 2004)
Àtụ Infobox airportỌdụ ụgbọ elu Bebi (bụ ọdụ ụgbọ elu na-ejere Bebi ozi na Cross River Steeti nke Naịjirịa
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi dị ka ọdụ ụgbọ elu maka Ugwu Ntụrụndụ Obudu
Ụzọ ụgbọ elu ahụ dị kilomita iri na asatọ (mi iri na otu) ọwụwa anyanwụ nke obodo Obudu
Bebi VOR-DME (Ident BEB ) bụ 072 nautical miles (133 km) site n'ọnụ ụzọ ụzọ ụgbọ elu nke iri
Bebil (Gbïgbïl) bụ asụsụ ndị Bantu dịna Cameroon
Nghọta dịna na olumba ya na nke ndị Beti ọzọ
E nwere ndị na asụ asụsụ puku isii (dị ka Nguetse Mezatio Tsague si kwuo na 2003) na mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ, na obodo Diang na Belabo na ngalaba Lom-et-Djerem
Asụsụ Beboid bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ asụsụ a na-asụ na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Cameroon, ọ bụ ezie na a na- asụ asụsụ abụọ (Bukwen na Mashi) n'ókèala Naịjirịa
Enwere ike ọbụrụ na enweghị ihe njikọ ha ọnụ
Asụsụ Beboid nke Ọwụwa Anyanwụ nwere ike ịbụ ndị nwere njikọ chiri anya na Tivoid na Momo, ọ bụ ezie na ụfọdụ n'ime ndị otu Beboid dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ pụrụ ịdị nso na Ekoid na Bantu

Nchọpụta gara aga gụnyere ọmụmụ nke klas aha na asụsụ Beboid dịka Jean-Marie Hombert (1980), Larry Hyman (1980, 1981), edemede nke Richards (1991) gbasara phonology nke asụsụ Beboide atọ dị n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ (Noni, Ncane na Nsari), Lux (2003) na Noni lexicon na Cox (2005) ngalaba phonology nke Kemezung
2002) na Hamm (2002) bụ nchịkọta dị mkpirikpi nke otu ahụ n'ozuzu ya

Owụwa anyanwụ Beboid bụ ihe gụzoro ana ahụ anya; ndị na-ekwu okwu na-amata mmekọrịta dị n'etiti asụsụ ha, nkesa ha bụ nsonaazụ nke mmegharị ndị mmadụ na-adịbeghị anya na asụsụ ha yiri, ha dịkwa nso na asụsụ Bantu
Okwu 'Beboid' na-ezo aka mgbe ụfọdụ na otu a

Odịda anyanwụ Beboid, n'aka nke ọzọ, bụ mpaghara mpaghara kama ịbụ otu mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa ụfọdụ yiri ka ha dị nso na asụsụ Grassfields, ọ dịghịkwa ihe dị ukwuu iji jikọta ha ọnụ, ọ bụ ezie na nke a nwere ike ịbụ n'ihi enweghị data (Good 2009, Di Carlo & Good 2012)
A na-akpọkwa ha 'Yemne-Kimbi' mgbe a na-akpọ otu ọwụwa anyanwụ 'Beboid' (Di Carlo & Good 2012)
A na-asụkwa ya n'ógbè Bikya (Furu), otu n'ime asụsụ Furu, na Kung, otu n'etiti asụsụ Ring
N'okpuru ebe a ka edepụtara aha asụsụ, ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ, na ebe (na Naịjirịa naanị) site na Blench (2019)
Arthello Beck Jr
(Ubochí irí na asaá n'ọnwa Julaị, 1941 rụo ụbọchị ịse n'ọnwa Novemba, 2004) bụ onye America na-ese ihe
Ọ na-ese ihe nkírí nke ebe ọ gara, na-eji ihe dịgasị iche iche, gụnyere mmanụ, mmiri, na icheku ọkụ
A mụrụ Beck na Dallas, Texas, ma gaa Lincoln High School, ebe ọ natara naanị ọzụzụ nka ya
Mgbè nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka United States Postal Service, yana ọrụ ndị ọzọ dị iche iche tupu ọ ghọọ ónyé na-ese ihe

O nwèrè ike ịbụ na a maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya site na 1960s na-emetụta Civil Rights Movement, ọ bụ ezie na Beck na-egosipụtakarị isiokwu ndị ọzọ, gụnyere ụmụaka, okpukpe, na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ọkachasị na ndị Afrịka-Amerịka na mpaghara ndịda United States

Ónyé bi ogologo ógè na Oak Cliff, Beck bụ onye kwenyesiri ike na mmegharị ndị isi, ma guzobe Arthello Beck Gallery, nke ghọrọ ihe dị n'etiti ebe nka nke mpaghara Dallas na 1970s na 80s, ma bụrụkwa ihe enyemaka màkà ọrụ nke ọtụtụ ndị omenkà ojii
Beck bụ ónyé otu National Conference of Artists na Southwest Alliance of African American Artists, ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị guzobere Southwest Black Artists Guild
Ihe osise ya na ihe osise ya so n'ime ndị a họọrọ màkà itinye ya na ihe ngosi njem nke ónyé na-eme egwuregwu Grant Hill nke ndị na-ese ihe Africa-America

Hill, onye malitere ịnakọta ihe osise na-eṅomi nna ya, Calvin Hill, kpọtụrụ ihe osise Beck bụ Confrontation (1969) aha dị ka mmetụta, na-ekwu, 'M tolitere na ihe osise a, dịka nna m na-ejikọta ya n'ihi na ọ na-egosipụta ọgụ akụkọ ihe méré eme nke nwoke ojii, ya mere m'
N'afọ 2007, a haziri mkpọsa mpaghara iji gbanwee aha South Dallas Cultural Center iji sọpụrụ Beck
Ọ bụ ezie na ihe karịrị mmadụ narị asatọ na iri ise bi na ya bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ mkpesa, Kansụl Ọbọdọ ahụ ji otu olu jụ aro ahụ, na-ahọrọ inye aha ya na gallery dị n'etiti

Mkpebi ahụ zutere esemokwu n'akụkụ abụọ ahụ, ebe ndị na-akwado ya chere na gallery dị n'ime ụlọ ahụ abụghị nsọpụrụ zuru oke, ebe ndị ọzọ kwuru na aha etiti ahụ ugbu a na-eweta nsọpụrụ na mpaghara ọbọdọ nke a na-akatọkarị nakwa na ọtụtụ n'ime ndị bịanyere aka na mkpesa ahụ bi na mpụga mpaghara South Dallas
Becky Ngozi Okorie bụ onye Naijirịa na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya nke ọma dị ka onye isi maka ihe nkiri egwu nke 1996 Karishika
Becky UzoAmaka Umeh nwaafọ Naịjirịa bụ onye ntuziaka nka, onye nhazi egwu, ọgụ egwú, ome ejiji, mana agbakwa egwu
Á mụrụ Umeh na Anambra State, Naijiria
Mana o toro na Lagos site mgbe ọ gbara afọ ise
Na 1992, onwetara nchawapụta nke mba ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Nigerian Television Authority children's drama Tales nke Moonlight
O sonyekwara na ihe nkiri Jezebel, Twist of Fate, Living Ghost, Amazon na ndị ọzọ

Site na 1994 rue 1998, Umeh gụrụ maka egwu ọdịnala na nke oge a nke gbasatara Afrika, na agụmakwụkwọ nturu ugo ọzụzụ efu, na Ivory Dance Academy, nke onye otu National Troupe nke Naịjirịa bụ Steve James hiwere
Mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ, ya na ndị otu ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ a na-akpọ Ivory Ambassador mere njehari ma mee nyocha n'ọhịa banyere egwu ọdịnala dị n'ime obodo Naịjirịa
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Umeh jere ozi dị ka Onye isi egwu nke Ivory Dance Troupe ruo afọ ise, na-atuzi ma na -emepụta ihe ngosi maka Guinness, Mobile, Chevron, seven-up bottling company, wdg
Kà ọ lotachara obere njem ọ mere gaa Ghana, ọ gara Paris n'oge 1998 FIFA World Cup ya na ndị otu bọọlụ nke Naịjirịa
Becky Umeh kwalitere ọrụ ịbụ abụ ya wee hiwe otu egwu ya, nke ha jikọrọ aka mepụta afere egwu ọkpọrọ'Aiye'
Site na 1998 rue 2001, Umeh kwadoro ndị ngosi ihe nkiri onyonyo a na-akpọ Dance Jam Competition

Na 2002, na nsote mmepụta fiesta Afrifest, ebe o jikọtara ndị otu egwu nke Africa ọnụ, Umeh jere ozi dị ka osote onye na-ahazi egwu maka asọmpi ịma mma Miss Nigeria nke onye mmeri ghọrọ Miss World 2002
Ebe Becky Umeh rụrụ gụnyere French Cultural Center, Goethe-Institut, Nigeria Music Awards, na isi obodo etiti Abuja
Ọ nọ n'ọrụ na-agba mbọ̀ ka Gọọmentị Naịjirịa nye ndị omenkà ezi nkwado nke na-esoghi ebumnuche mgbasa ozi nke Gọọmentị

Kemgbe ọ kwagara Washington, DC na 2002, Umeh esonyela ndị na-emepụta ihe dịka Hugh Medrano, Nancy Havlik (onye nhazi nkwago) na George Faison (choreographer New York) rụkọọ ọrụ O gosipụtala ụfọdụ ndị òtù akwụ ụgwọ ihe nkiri dịka Red Cross, ndị nnọchi anya ndị Naijiria, na ọtụtụ ebe ọdịbendị, mahadum, na ụka Na 2005, Umeh so Toby Foyeh na Orchestra Africa kpaharia North na South Carolina, Massachusetts, na Ememme Syracuse nke New York

Site na 2004 rue ugbu a, Umeh gara n'ihu igosipụ̀ta egwu na ịrụ ọrụ na Malcolm X Drum Ensemble nke Doc Powel duziri, wee wepụta onwe ya dịka Onye Nlekọta Ọha na UAA Foundation,otu n'abụghị maka ichụ ego nke ebumnuche banyere ya bụ agha imegide ihe ike megide ụmụ nwanyị www
UAAfoundationorg
N’afọ 2006, Umeh dekọtara ihe nkiri The Lion king
nke Metropolitan Fine Arts na Virginia kwadoro
Na 2009 Umeh guzobere ọgbakọ egwu Zomema, nke na-arụ ọrụ egwu ọdịnala na nke oge a n’Afrika na ntuziaka ya
N'afọ 2011, o dere ma bipụta usoro egwuregwu izizi ya 'Legend of Abiku Zombeh'

Umeh ka etinyere aka dị ka onye nhazi asụsụ na onye na-ahụ maka nhazi emume na Mahadum Richmond na mmemme ha nke seasonal Stage Production Things Fall Apart nke onye ode akwụkwọ ma bụrụ ode abụ Naịjirịa bụ Chinua Achebe dere
Beddit Oy (nke bụbu Finsor Oy) bụ ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ Finland nke na-ere ngwaọrụ na-agbaso ụra akpa dị ka ndị na ụdị nke ụwa na ngwa na-agwọ ụra iji nyere aka nyochaa ụra
E hiwere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2006 wee wepụta ihe nchọgharị ụra mbụ ha n'ọnwarị ndị mere n'oge ndị gara afọ 2013
Na Mee 2017, Apple Inc nwetara Beddit
Ka ọ bụla nke na ímé ihe na-erule n'afọ 2016, Beddit anakọtara dị ihe karịrị nde abalị atọ nke data ụra site n'aka ndị ọrụ ya
Lasse Leppäkorpi guzobere Beddit na 12 Ọktoba 2006

Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na mbụ rụrụ nlekota ụra n'ụlọ ọgwụ site n'ịgbaso obi na iku ume ọkụ ndị odeakwụkwọ hụrụ ihe nọr na mkpóró Malcolm dị ka ndị na ụdị nke ụwa họrọ nke ndị ọrịa n'emetụghị ndị na eme ìhè ahụ n'ebe nile site n'aka Onye Okike nke eluigwe ha aka
Otú ọ dị, ọ dị oke ọnụ iji wepụta ya dị ka ngwaahịa ndị ahịa n'oge ahụ
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2013, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ wepụtara ihe nchọgharị ụra mbụ ha maka ndị na-akwado ya n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe mkpọsa mgbasa ozi na Indiegogo gasịrị, ebe ọ nwetara $ 500,000

N'ọnwa nke iri na Julaị afọ 2014, onye na-ahụ maka ahụike nke Misfit kwupụtara ndị mmadụ n'ihe ndị na eme ka onye isi dị ndụ na ụra akpa dị ka nkwado maka ndị na-ahụ ụzọ ụra nke Beddit ndị mmadụ dị ndụ ebighị ebi n'ụwa olileanya nke dị ka ndị ọzọ ndị nwere mmasị dị ka akụkụ nke mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ụlọ ọrụ abụọ ahụ
N'abalị isii n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2015, Beddit wepụtara ngwa na-eso ụra maka Apple Watch
N'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2016, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ wepụtara ihe na-eso ụra Beddit 3 na Apple Stores, na Amazon, na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ Beddit

N'abalị ndị mmadụ n'ihe banyere ọrụ nkụzi afọ ojuju nke ijere ndị ọzọ iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2017, Beddit kwupụtara na ha ga-ewepụ ngwaọrụ ndị na-esochi ụra ha, na-emetụ n'ahụ a na-emepụta na ka ha ghara ikwekọ na ngwa Beddit, ka ha na-enye ndị ọrụ nhọrọ ịkwalite na Beddit 3 n'efu
N'oge ọkwa a, 80% nke ndị ọrụ Beddit bụ ndị ọrụ Bedin 3
Ná mmalite 8 Mee 2017 Apple Inc
nwetara Beddit maka ego a na-akọwaghị

Na Septemba 2018, Beddit kwupụtara na mmelite Ụlọ Ahịa App na ọrụ nkụzi afọ ndị gara aga akụkọ ụra akpa ndị mmadụ igwe ojii ha ga-emechi na 15 Nọvemba 2018 maka ndị ọrụ dị ugbu a nakwa na ndị ọrụ ọhụrụ agaghị enwe ike ịnweta ndị mmadụ n'ihe ndị na eme ìhè ọrụ igwe ojii ya site na 21 Septemba 2018
Ọrụ igwe ojii nke Beddit mechiri dị ka atụmatụ ya na Nọvemba 15 na mmelite na ngwa Beddit
Ná 7 Disemba 2018 Beddit wepụtara ihe nchọgharị ịntanetị nke dị ka ndị ọzọ ụra mbụ ya kemgbe Apple nwetara ya, Beddit 35, na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ Apple na ụlọ ahịa
Ọ nwere ike ijikọ ndị na ụdị àlà úkwú nke ụwa họrọ site na HealthKit ma rụọ ọrụ na otu onye ma ọ bụ abụọ n'àkwà, Otú ọ dị, enweghị ike ịchọpụta onye nke abụọ ọ gwụla ma ha nwere ngwaọrụ nke ha
Na June 2019, Beddit kwupụtara mmemme beta maka ngwa ha na-agbaso ụra iji nweta nzaghachi site n'aka ndị Kraịst nọ n'ọrụ njegharị n'afọ ndị ọrụ banyere otu esi emeziwanye ngwa ha

N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2020, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na Mahadum California, Los Angeles (UCLA) kwupụtara na ha ga-enwe ndị mmadụ n'ihe ndị a na-emepụta ndị mmadụ n'ihe ndị na nnyocha afọ atọ banyere otu ụra, mmega ahụ, obi si agba, na omume kwa ụbọchị nwere ike isi rụọ ọrụ na ịda mbà n'ime ụmụ ndị n'obi na nchegbu n'etiti ndị mmadụ
