Bediako Asare (amụrụ n'afọ 1930) bụ onye nta akụkọ na onye edemede Ghana, nke sitere na Ghana
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na-arụ ọrụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ obodo, wee kwaga Dar es Salaam, Tanzania na 1963, iji nyere aka malite akwụkwọ akụkọ The Nationalist
Na 1969 o bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ya Rebel, gbasara esemokwu dị n'etiti ụzọ ọdịnala na ọgbara ọhụrụ na Sub-Saharan Africa
Stephen H
Arnold, na-enyocha ya na African Book Publishing Record, kwuru na ndị o bu n'obi na-ege ntị bụ 'ndị dị afọ 15-18 nke klaasị ọchịchị nke East Africa' na 'Isi isiokwu
bụ sayensị megide nkwenkwe ụgha na uru ndụmọdụ sitere n'aka ndị okenye'
Beeke bụ asụsụ Bantu nkè á na-ejighị n'aka
E kenyere Guthrie ná ụyọkọ Nyali
Agbanyeghị, Ethnologue na-atụ arọ ná ọ nwèrè ike ịbụ ụdị dị iche iche nkè Bali
Ọ bụ 65% cognate na Bali, mana 38% na asụsụ Nyali Ndaka
Beer (nke a maara dị ka bia na Swahili) na mmanya na-aba n'anya bụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke ndị obodo Tanzania na ụdị mpaghara nwere mmetụta siri ike nke mpako mba n'etiti ndị Tanzania
E nwere ọtụtụ ịṅụ mmanya na ịṅụ mmanya a na-eme na mba ahụ
Tanzania nọ n'ọnọdụ nke isii n'Africa maka ịṅụ biya ma na-enye aka n'ihe karịrị pecenti mmadu atọ nke oriri Afrịka
Otú ọ dị, ihe karịrị pecenti iri iteolu nke ihe mba na-eri bụ ma ọ bụ nke e mere n'ụlọ ma ọ bụ site na ngalaba na-abụghị nke gọọmentị
Mmanya beer agbara na okporo dị oke ọnụ maka ọtụtụ ndị mmadu, otutu na ime ha jiri okpukpo isii di onu Maria biya ọka
Ka o sina dị, ahịa biya na ụtụ isi bụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke akụ na ụba Tanzania

Biya bụ akụkụ dị ukwuu nke akụ na ụba mba ndi na emeputa Mmanya Na mba Tanzania Breweries Limited make Di na owuwa anyanwu mba Afrika Breweries limited na-achịkwa n'okpuru ụlọ ọrụ Serengeti Breweries Ltd
Ụlọ ọrụ abụọ ahụ nwere ụfọdụ n'ime ego kachasị ukwuu na mba ahụ ma depụta ha na mgbanwe ngwaahịa
Tanzania Breweries Limited bụ onye na-atụ ụtụ isi kachasị ukwuu na mba ahụ ma ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ na ọ nwetara ihe karịrị otu nderi Tanzanian shillings na ego na 2014
Tanzania Breweries LimitedTBL) malitere na afor 1932 dị ka Tanganyika Breweries limited ma mesịa ndi Kenya Breweries Ltd(KBL) azụo ya na afor 1935
E jikọtara ụlọ ọrụ abụọ ahụ na 1936 iji guzobe ụlọ ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a nke East African Breweries Limited(BLEA)
Gọọmentị mere Tanzania Breweries mba na 1976 dị ka akụkụ nke Arusha kwuwaputara wee ree SABMiller na afo 1993 mgbe afọ 25 nke ọrụ dara
Ihe onwunwe ụlọ ọrụ ahụ agbanweela oge dị iche iche, Otú ọ dị, SABMiller ka nwere ọtụtụ òkè na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ma depụta ya ugbu a dị ka TBL na Dar es Salaam Stock Exchange
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ onye na-akwụ ụtụ isi kachasị na mba ahụ na ngwaahịa kachasị ere na Dar Brouse
TBL ugbu a nwere òkè ahịa 80% na ahịa biya Tanzania
Serengeti Breweries Limited bụ nke abụọ kachasị ukwuu na mba ahụ ma nwee ihe dịka 15% nke ahịa biya a na-etinye na karama
E hiwere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 1988 dị ka Associated Breweries Limited na akara ụgbọ mmiri ha Serengeti Lager
N'afọ 2002, a gbanwere aha ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ka ọ bụrụ Serengeti Breweries Limited ma nwee isi ụlọ ọrụ na Dar es Salaam
N'afọ 2010, ndị East African Breweries nwetara pasentị iri ise na otu nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-egosi na ha batara n'ahịa biya nke Tanzania kemgbe a manyere ha ịpụ n'afọ 1976
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-arụ ọrụ mmepụta 3 na Dar es Salaam (300,000 HL), Mwanza (600,000 H L) na Moshi (500,000 HL)
A naghị azụ ahịa ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na mgbanwe ngwaahịa mana ụlọ ọrụ nne na nna ha EABL edepụtara na Nairobi Securities Exchange

E debanyere aha na 2005, ụlọ ọrụ biya Qingdao-Sino Tanzanian bụ ụlọ ọrụ China ma bụrụ obere onye ọkpụkpọ n'ahịa ma bụrụ nke a maara nke ọma site na ụdị abụọ ya bụ King Orxy Lager na King Orxy Dark Lager
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ọtụtụ n'ime biya aka na-eme site na obere ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta mmanya

A naghị emepụta ahịa mmanya na-emepụta ihe ma ugbu a ọ bụ naanị ụlọ ọrụ abụọ na-emepụta mmanya, ya bụ Twiga Brewery nke dị na Arusha na Crafty Dee's Brewing Company Ltd nke dị na Dar es Salaam, na-arụ ọrụ na Tanzania
TwigaBrew, ụlọ ọrụ mbụ na-emepụta mmanya na Tanzania (nke a na-akpọ 2015), nwere ụdị abụọ, Twiga Ale na Twiga Stout, ebe flagship Crafty Dee bụ Dee's Gold, hoppy pilsner
E nwere ọtụtụ ụdị dị iche iche nke ndị Brewers mepụtara na Tanzania ma ọtụtụ bụkwa ụdị mba ụwa dị ka Caster Lager na Pilsner mana n'okpuru ebe a bụ ndepụta nke ụdị 12 dị n'ụlọ
A na asụ asụsụ Beezen n'obodo Plateau nke Cameroon
Asụsụ Baazem dị iche iche

Beezy Bailey (amụrụ na 21 Julaị 1962 na Johannesburg, South Africa) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nke na-arụ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi dị iche iche, nke gụnyere eserese, ihe ọkpụkpụ, eserese, obibi akwụkwọ na ceramics
Ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe oge niile ruo afọ iri atọ, na ihe karịrị ngosi otu onye iri abụọ na London, Johannesburg na Cape Town yana ọtụtụ ihe ngosi otu gburugburu ụwa
Ọ natara akara ugo mmụta nka dị mma site na Byam Shaw School of Art na London na 1986, mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ afọ abụọ nke ise ihe na nke atọ na obibi akwụkwọ, eserese na ihe ọkpụkpụ
Bailey nwere akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mmekọrịta chiri anya na ndị na-ese ihe ndị ọzọ - ndị egwu a ma ama
Ya na David Bowie, Brian Eno, Dave Matthews na Arno Carstens arụwo ọrụ
Na mgbakwunye, ya na ndị na-ese foto Adam Letch na Zwelethu Mthethwa na onye na-ese ihe Koos Malgas arụkọwo ọrụ
N'afọ 1985 tupu ọ nweta akara ugo mmụta ya, Bailey na Young British Artist, Lennie Lee rụkọtara ọrụ wee mepụta ihe ọkpụkpụ n'ụlọ nkwakọba ihe efu n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ London, UK
A na-anọchite anya ọrụ Bailey n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta nka, nke gụnyere David Bowie Art Collection
Beezy Bailey lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ abụọ ma na-ebi na Cape Town na London
N'ịbụ onye a mụrụ site na nkụda mmụọ nke 'omume nkwenye na-arịwanye elu', Bailey nyere ọrụ nka abụọ maka ihe ngosi afọ atọ
Otu bụ nke nwere akara ọdịnala Beezy Bailey (ajụrụ ajụ) nke ọzọ bịanyere aka na Joyce Ntobe
Nke ikpeazụ bi ugbu a na South African National Gallery dị ka akụkụ nke nchịkọta ya na-adịgide adịgide
Mgbe onye nlekọta nke Gallery chọrọ ịrụ ọrụ na akwụkwọ banyere ụmụ nwanyị ojii atọ na-ese ihe, Joyce Ntobe bụ otu, Bailey kpughere eziokwu, na-akpata ihe ihere nke mgbasa ozi
Begonia glabra, sorrel na-arịgo arịgo, bụ ụdị osisi na-agbasa okooko n'ezinụlọ Begoniaceae, nke na eto na Okpomọkụ nke ụwa ọfu Ọ bụ ihe a na-adịghị ahụkebe, ọ na-ewu ewu na vivariums
Ojiji ya na okpukpe ọdịnala Winti Afro-Surinamese emeela ka a chịkọta ya n'ógbè
Ememme Ibu Nwoke (BAM) bụ ememme dị na UK nke na-edozi ihe ịma aka na nrụgide nke njirimara nwoke na narị afọ nke iri abụọ na otu
Jude Kelly hiwere emume a n'ime afọ 2014

Ndị na-ekwu okwu na mmemme mmeghe ahụ gụnyere Grayson Perry (onye na-ese ihe), Ziauddin Yousafzai (nna nke onye nrite Nobel Malala Yousafzai), Michael Kaufman (onye guzobere White Ribbon Campaign) Jon Snow (onye nta akụkọ), Billy Bragg (onye na-abụ abụ), Nick Hornby (onye edemede na onye na-ede abụ), Charlie Condou (onye na-eme ihe nkiri) na Hardeep Singh Kohli (onye mgbasa ozi na onye edemede)
Ndị na-ekwu okwu na ememme 2016 gụnyere Prọfesọ Green (rapper) na Roger Moore

Ndị na-ekwu okwu gụnyere Simon Amstell (onye na-eme ihe nkiri), Robert Webb (onye na-eme ihe nkiri), Kevin Powell (onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị America), Alan Hollinghurst (onye edemede na onye mmeri nke 2004 Booker Prize) na Antonythasan Jesuthasan (onye edemede na onye na-eme ihe nkiri)
Àtụ Hiero
Bek ma ọ bụ Bak (asụsụ Egyptmaka 'Ohu') bụ onye isi mbụ na-ese ihe n'oge ọchịchị Fero Akhenaten
Nna ya Men nwere otu ọkwá ahụ n'okpuru nna Akhenaten Amenhotep III; nne ya Roi bụ nwanyị si Heliopolis
Bek tolitere na Heliopolis, ebe ofufe dị mkpa nke chi anyanwụ Ra
Nwa eze Amenhotep (onye ghọrọ Fero Akhenaten) nwere obí eze n'ebe a, o yikarịrị ka echiche okpukpe ya esitere na nkuzi Heliopolitan
Bek sooro nna ya ukwu gaa Akhet-Aten, obodo nke Akhenaten tọrọ ntọala ya
O lekọtara iwu nnukwu ihe oyiyi ụlọ nsọ nke eze na mmeghe nke Aswan na Gebel es-Silsila nkume quarries, ebe a na-ebute nkume ahụ
Otu stela a chọtara na Aswan, nke e mere n'ihe dị ka afọ nke itoolu nke Akhenaten na-egosi Men na nwa ya nwoke Bek na ndị Fero ha na-ejere ozi
N'akụkụ aka nri, ndị ikom na-eguzo n'ihu ihe oyiyi nke Amenhotep nke Atọ
O yikarịrị ka ihe oyiyi ahụ ọ bụ otu n'ime colossi nke Fero nke ụmụ mmadụ mere

Akụkụ a nke stela na-egosipụta ụdị nka ọdịnala nke 18th Dynasty, naanị ihe na-egosi oge Amarna bụ na aha 'Amenhotep' ka a hapụrụ, kama ọ bụ aha ocheeze Fero 'Nebmaatre' ka a na-ekwughachi, iji zere ịkpọ aha chi Amun nke a machibidoro ofufe ya
N'akụkụ aka ekpe nke stela Bek na-egosi n'ihu Akhenaten, onye na-enye chi ya Aten onyinye; dị ka ihe odide ahụ si kwuo, a na-egosi ihe ahụ na nnukwu ụlọ nsọ nke Aten
Ihe a na-ahụkarị na foto oge Amarna, ụzarị nke Aten na-ejedebe n'aka
E mechara wepụta aha Aten na Akhenaten
Na stela, Bek na-ekwu na ọ bụ 'onye mmụta nke Eze Ukwu kụziiri'
O yikarịrị ka ọ na-ahụ maka ime ihe oyiyi nke na-egosi Akhenaten na ezinụlọ ya n'ụdị okike, na-agbagha ihe ngosi nke ọdịnala chọrọ
Otu stela (nke dị na Berlin ugbu a) na-egosi Bek na nwunye ya Taheret
Nke a nwere ike ịbụ foto onwe onye mbụ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme
Ihe odide nke stela a kwukwara na Akhenaten kụziiri ya
Ihe osise nke Akhenaten, nke na-egosi Fero na Aten ma eleghị anya e mere ya n'afọ ndị mbụ nke ọchịchị ya, nwere ike ịbụ ọrụ Bek
Ihe osise a na-egosi Aten na nwoke nwere isi falcon, nke bụ àgwà nke Ra
A makwaara ụfọdụ ndị na-ese ihe ndị ọzọ n'oge Amarna site na aha, nke gụnyere Thutmose (onye mepụtara bust Nefertiti a ma ama) na Yuti, onye na-ese Queen Tiye
Békè bu mkpurokwu ana-kpo ndi ocha
Obu kwa he ana-kpo asüsü wo
Mgbe onye Scotland nwoke ana-kpo William Baike biara n'Igboland, ogwara ndi madu n'aha ya bula Baike
Maka otu ndị Inglish di su asusu ha, mgbe ndị Igbo suoro ya, o dila ike
Ha kpowa 'Baike' 'bekee', kpowazie ndi ocha enyiya, ndi bekee
Bekele (Amharic) o bụ aha nna nke Etiopia nke nwere ike izo aka na
Bekhta Rabah-Mazari (amụrụ 5 1998) bụ nwa agbọghọ Algeria na egwu volleyball
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu volleyball ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Algeria
O sonyere na 2015 FIVB Volleyball Ukwu ụwa Prix
N'ọkwa klọb ọ gbara bọọlụ maka NR Chlef n'afọ 2015
Bekolari Ransome-Kuti (2 Ọgọst 1940 – 10 Febrụwarị 2006) bụ dọkịta Naijiria mara maka ọrụ ya dịka onye na-akwado ikike mmadụ
A mụrụ Ransome-Kuti na Abeokuta, Nigeria
Nne ya Funmilayo Ransome-Kuti megidere ụtụ na-enweghị isi nke ndị ọchịchị Briten na-ana ụmụ nwanyị
O nyere aka kparịta ụka maka nnwere onwe nke Naijiria na Briten na-ekwu na ọ bụ nwanyị Naijria mbụ na-anya ụgbọ ala
Nna ya Oludotun Ransome-Kuti bụ onye ụkọchukwu Anglịkan na onye nchoputa nke Nigeria Union of Teachers
Otu n'ime ụmụnne ya, Fela Kuti, bụ onye na-egwu egwu na onye na -eme ihe ike nke tọrọ ntọala Afrobeat ; onye ozo, Olikoye Ransome-Kuti, bu kwa onye dibia bekee na onye na- akwalite AIDS
Nwa Beko, Enitan, bụ onye isi ndị agha Naijiria na-eje ozi bụbu onye ọchịagha nke Multinational Joint Task Force
Ransome-Kuti gara Abeokuta Grammar School, Coventry Technical College, na Mahadum Manchester, ebe ọ ghọrọ dọkịta ahụike
Ransome-Kuti lọghachiri na Naijiria n'afọ 1963 ka o nwetara akara ugo mmụta ya
Ihe mere n'afọ 1977 metụrụ ya n'ahụ́ mgbe ndị agha nọ n'okpuru ọchịchị ndị agha TY Danjuma wakporo ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ nwanne ya nwoke bụ Fela Kuti , mebisie ụlọ ọgwụ ya ma gbuo nne ya
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche nke ngalaba na-ahụ maka ahụike Nigeria na Lagos na onye osote ya nke mba, na-akwado maka enweghị ọgwụ n' ụlọ ọgwụ
N'afọ 1984, gọọmentị General Muhammadu Buhari nwụchiri Fela ma tụọ ya mkpọrọ afọ iri
A tụrụ Ransome-Kuti mkpọrọ, machigidekwa òtù ahụike ya iwu
A tọhapụrụ ya n'afọ 1985 mgbe Ọchịagha Ibrahim Babangida chụpụrụ Buhari; Babangida kpọziri ya ka o sonye na ọchịchị
Ransome-Kuti nyere aka guzobe otu mbụ na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ na Naijiria, Mgbasa Ozi Maka Ọchịchị Democracy, nke na 1993 megidere ọchịchị aka ike nke General Sani Abacha
N’afọ 1995, otu ụlọ ikpe ndị agha mara ya ikpe n’ụlọ mkpọrọ maka iweta ikpe njakịrị nke Olusegun Obasanjo na ntị ụwa
Amnesty International nabatara ya dị ka onye mkpọrọ nke akọ na uche wee tọhapụ ya na 1998 ka Sani Abacha nwụsịrị

Ransome-Kuti bụ onye otu kọleji West African College of Physicians and Surgeons, onye isi na kọmitii na akwado ikike mmadụ na British Commonwealth, onye isi oche kọmitii maka Defence of Human Rights na onye isi oche nke Center maka Constitutional Governance
Ransome-Kuti nwụrụ site na nsogbu nke ọrịa kansa akpa ume na 10 February 2006, ọ dị afọ 65, na ihe dịka 11 20 nke abali na Lagos University Teaching Hospital, Idi-Araba, Lagos, Nigeria
Gọọmenti steeti ji ihe oyiyi kwanyere ya ugwu n'afọ 2010 na ogige ntụrụndụ, ogige Beko Ransome-Kuti, bụ nke a kpọrọ aha ya na nsọpụrụ ya
Bela Duarte bụ onye na-ese ihe si Cape Verde, A mụrụ ya n'àgwàetiti São Vicente o wee mụọ maka nka ịchọ mma na Lisbon, Portugal
N'oge Portuguese Carnation Revolution na 1974, ọ laghachiri Cape Verde na Mindelo, ya na Manuel Figueira na Luísa Queirós, o mere Cooperativa da Resistência (The Resistance Cooperative)
Ọ hụrụ nyocha n'elu nka na ọrụ aka na ọrụ sitere na Cape Verde Islands, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ taa onye kachasị ukwuu na agwaetiti ahụ
Bela Duarte mere ọrụ ya ma see ya na mmanụ na acrylic, onye na-eme batik, webbing na otu ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 1992, ya na Luisa Queiros mepụtara na gallery dị na Mindelo 'azul + azul = verde' maka batik, nka na onye na-ese ihe
N'afọ ndị 1970, Bela Duarte nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi nka na Cape Verde, Brussels, Portugal, Paris na USA
Maka ọrụ batik ya na 1995, ụlọ ọrụ ọdịnala mba ahụ natara ya Fonte Lima Prize

Belinda Bozzoli (17 Disemba na afọ 1945 na 5 Disemba na afọ 2020) bụ onye edemede mba South Africa, ọkà mmụta, ọkà mmụta mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụ osote osote onye isi nke Mahadum nke Witwatersrand maka oge site na afo 2002, ebe ọ bụ onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ sayensị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara Bozzoli ka ọ bụrụ onye otu ndị omeiwu South Africa maka Democratic Alliance
Site na afọ 2019 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista Nlekọta nke Mmụta Kasị Elu, Sayensị na Teknụzụ
A mụrụ Bozzoli na 17 Disemba, na afọ 1945 na Johannesburg na Guerino Renzo na Cora Bertha Bozzoli, ndị Itali South Africa
O nwetara nzere Bachelor of Arts na Honours na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand wee nweta Master of Arts na Doctor of Philosophy na Mahadụ Sussex
Bozzoli bụ Associate Fellow na Mahadum Yale n'etiti afọ 1978 na afọ 1979
Bozzoli dere akwụkwọ atọ e dere n'otu, nke e bipụtara na mba ụwa ma bụrụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ ma ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke anọ ọzọ
O bipụtara, n'ozuzu ya, isiokwu iri abụọ na isii
Bozzoli ghọrọ onye isi nke sociology na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand na ngwụcha afọ 1990 ma bụrụ onye isi nke School of Social Sciences site na afọ 2001 ruo na afọ 2003
Ọ ghọrọ osote osote onye isi oche n'afọ 2002 ma bụrụ onye isi oche nke Board nke National Research Foundation ruo oge ụfọdụ
E nyere ya akara A-rating site na National Research Foundation na afọ 2006
Bozzoli bụ onye ọkà mmụta mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya mbụ a na-asọpụrụ n'ụzọ a
Bozzoli rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi na-anọchite anya Wits Institute for Social and Economic Research
N'afọ 2014, Bozzoli guzoro maka ntuli aka na South African National Assembly dị ka onye nke 77 na ndepụta mba Democratic Alliance (DA)
Na ntuli aka ahụ, Bozzoli meriri oche na National Assembly
Mgbe a họpụtara ya, ọ ghọrọ Minista Na-ahụ Maka Mmụta na Ọzụzụ dị elu

Ọ bụ onye otu Kọmitii Portfolio na agụmakwụkwọ dị elu na ọzụzụ na kọntaktị DA maka mpaghara Boksburg West n'oge ndị omeiwu nke afọ 2014 N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2016, ọ katọrọ iwu mahadum nke African National Congress Party nke o kwuru na ego gọọmentị si na 50% ruo 40% nke ego mahadum na-enweta kemgbe afọ 1994 wee mee ka mmefu ego daa, nnukwu klas na ụgwọ dị elu
A họpụtara Bozzoli ọzọ ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu n'afọ 2019
E mechara mee Bozzoli Minista Nchịkọta maka agụmakwụkwọ dị elu, sayensị na teknụzụ ọhụrụ
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2020, o welitere nchegbu banyere mbọ gọọmentị South Africa na-eme iji wepụ ụgwọ ijeri rand 196 nke ụgwọ ụmụ akwụkwọ
Bozzoli kwuru na DA enweghị mgbagha maka ụgwọ ụmụ akwụkwọ na-enweta ego dị ala, mana ọ jụrụ ma ọ ga-abara ụmụ akwụkwọ na'enweta ego dị elu uru bụ ndị na-achọghị ịkwụ ụgwọ
Ọ na-echegbu onwe ya banyere mmetụta na ego maka mahadum
Bozzoli nwụrụ n'ọrịa kansa na 5 Disemba na afọ 2020, ụbọchị iri na abụọ tupu afọ iri asaa na ise ya
Di ya, Charles van Onselen, na ụmụ ha atọ hapụrụ ya
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'oge ọrịa ikpeazụ ya
Grace-Charis Bassey Effah (amụrụ na Disemba 14, 1989) bụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi na mgbasa ozi na Naịjirịa
Ọ meriri ihe nrite kachasị mma nke onyinye afọ na 9th Africa Movie Academy Awards
A mụrụ Grace-Charis Bassey dịka Belinda Uyu Effah na Disemba 14, 1989, na Cross River State, steeti dị n'ụsọ osimiri na ndịda Naịjirịa
Ọ nwere agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị na nke sekọndrị na Hillside International Nursery & Primary School na ụlọ akwụkwọ nke ndi Nigerian Navy , Port Harcourt n'otu n'otu
Ọ gara n'ihu n'ọmụmụ ihe ya na Mahadum Calabar, nke ọ gbasiri ukwu na mmụta jenetiks na mmụta bayo-teknoloji
Sire N'ajụjụ ọnụ a gbara ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ The Punch, o kwuru na ụdị mkpachapụ anya nke nna ya tinyere n'ebe ụmụ iri na anọ ya nọ nyere aka n'ịkpụzi ọrụ ya
O mere mpụta izizi telivishọn ya na usoro ihe nkiri 2005 bụ́ Shallow Waters
Mgbe nke a gasịrị, o were ezumike n'usoro ihe nkiri ahụ iji gosipụta na ihe ihe omume ngosi bụ Next Movie Star
Ọ bụ onyenke ise, a chụpụghịkw a ya n'ụlọ
Ọ bụbu onye mgbasa ozi telivishọn nke Sound City, ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ na Naijiria
Agbanyeghị, ọ hapụrụ ọdụ ahụ wee malite ihe ngosi TV nke ya akpọrọ Lunch Break with Belinda
The Tales of Eve
Belinda Kanda (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 3 n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1982) bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-agba ọsọ n'etiti
Ọ bụ onye otu ụmụ nwanyị mba Ghana
A zụlitere Kanda na Accra
Kanda gara Mahadum Alabama A&M na United States
Kanda so n'òtù egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Ghana na afọ 2003 FIFA Women's World Cup na afọ 2007 FIFA Women'n World Cup

Gloria Jean Watkins (Septemba 25, 1952 Disemba 15, 2021), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha edemede ya bụ bell hooks, bụ onye edemede America na onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya bụ Prọfesọ a ma ama na Berea College
A maara ya nke ọma maka edemede ya banyere agbụrụ, feminism, na klas
Ebumnuche nke edemede hooks bụ ịchọpụta njikọ nke agbụrụ, capitalism, nwoke na nwanyị, na ihe ọ kọwara dị ka ikike ha ịmepụta ma mee ka usoro mmegbu na ịchịisi klas dịgide
O bipụtara ihe dị ka akwụkwọ iri anọ, gụnyere ọrụ ndị sitere na edemede na uri na akwụkwọ ụmụaka
O bipụtara ọtụtụ isiokwu ndị ọkà mmụta, pụtara na ihe nkiri, ma sonye na nkuzi ihu ọha
Ọrụ ya metụtara ịhụnanya, agbụrụ, klas, okike, nka, akụkọ ihe mere eme, mmekọahụ, mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi, na feminism
Ọ bụ onye agụmakwụkwọ a ma ama, Hooks malitere ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ya n'afọ 1976 na-akụzi Bekee na ọmụmụ agbụrụ na Mahadum nke Southern California

O mechara kụzie na ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere Mahadum Stanford, Mahadum Yale, na The City College of New York, tupu ọ banye na Berea College na Berea, Kentucky, n'afọ 2004, ebe ọ tọrọ ntọala bell hooks Institute n'afọ 2014
Aha edemede ya sitere n'aka nne nne nne ya, Bell Blair Hooks
A mụrụ Gloria Jean Watkins na Septemba 25, 1952, na Hopkinsville, obere obodo a na-ekewapụ iche na Kentucky, n'ezinụlọ ndị Africa na-American na-arụ ọrụ
Watkins bụ otu n'ime ụmụ isii Rosa Bell Watkins (née Oldham) na Veodis Watkins mụrụ
Nna ya na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-elekọta ụlọ na nne ya na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eje ozi n'ụlọ ezinụlọ ndị ọcha

N'akwụkwọ ncheta ya Bone Black Memories of Girlhood (1996), Watkins ga-ede banyere 'ọgụ ya iji mepụta onwe ya na njirimara' mgbe ọ na-etolite na 'ụwa anwansi bara ụba nke ọdịbendị ndịda ojii nke na-abụ mgbe ụfọdụ paradaịs na n'oge ndị ọzọ na-emenye ụjọ

Onye na-agụ akwụkwọ nke ọma (ya na ndị na-ede abụ William Wordsworth, Langston Hughes, Elizabeth Barrett Browning na Gwendolyn Brooks n'etiti ndị ọkacha mmasị ya), Watkins gụrụ akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze na-ekewa agbụrụ, mechara kwaga ụlọ akwụkwọ jikọtara ọnụ na ngwụsị afọ 1960
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Hopkinsville High School tupu ọ nweta BA na Bekee na Mahadum Stanford n'afọ 1973, na MA ya na Bekee na Mahadum Wisconsin-Madison n'afọ 1976
N'oge a, Watkins na-ede akwụkwọ ya Ain't I a Woman Black Women and Feminism, nke ọ malitere mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu (ca
1971) wee bipụta ya n'afọ 1981

N'afọ 1983, mgbe ọtụtụ afọ nke izi ihe na edemede gasịrị, ọ gụsịrị doctorate ya na Bekee na Mahadum California, Santa Cruz, na edemede banyere onye edemede Toni Morrison nke isiokwu ya bụ 'Keeping a Hold on Life Reading Toni Morrison's Fiction'

Ọ malitere ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ya n'afọ 1976 dị ka prọfesọ Bekee na nnukwu onye nkuzi na ọmụmụ agbụrụ na Mahadum nke Southern California N'ime afọ atọ ya n'ebe ahụ, Golemics, onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ na Los Angeles, wepụtara ọrụ mbụ ya bipụtara, akwụkwọ uri akpọrọ And There We Wept (1978), nke e dere n'okpuru aha 'bell hooks'
Ọ nakweere aha nne nne nne ya dị ka aha edemede ya n'ihi na, dị ka o mechara kwuo ya, a maara nne nne ya 'maka ire ya dị nro na obi ike, nke m nwere mmasị dị ukwuu,' [nkọwa dị mkpa]
O kwukwara na o tinyere aha ahụ na mkpụrụedemede dị ala iji sọpụrụ nne nne ya ma gosipụta na ihe kachasị mkpa ilekwasị anya bụ ọrụ ya, ọ bụghị àgwà ya 'ihe nke akwụkwọ, ọ bụghị onye m bụ'
Banyere mbelata aha edemede ya na-enweghị atụ, hooks gbakwụnyere na, 'Mgbe òtù ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'ogo ya na ngwụsị oge afọ '60s na mmalite oge afọ '70s, enwere ọtụtụ ihe na-apụ n'echiche nke onye ahụ
Ọ bụ Ka anyị kwuo banyere echiche ndị dị n'azụ ọrụ ahụ, ndị mmadụ adịchaghị mkpa
Ọ bụ ụdị ihe aghụghọ, mana ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị na-eme ya

Ná mmalite afọ 1980 n'afọ 1990, hooks kụziri na ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, gụnyere Mahadum California, Santa Cruz, Mahadum San Francisco State, Yale (1985 ruo afọ 1988, dị ka osote prọfesọ nke ọmụmụ Africa na Afro-American na Bekee), Oberlin College (1988 ruo afọ 1994, dị ka prọfesọ na-esote nke akwụkwọ America na ọmụmụ ụmụ nwanyị), na, malite n'afọ 1994, dị ka prọfesọ a ma ama nke Bekee na City College of New York
South End Press bipụtara nnukwu ọrụ mbụ ya, Ain't I a Woman? Ụmụ nwanyị ojii na Feminism, n'afọ 1981, ọ bụ ezie na o dere ya ọtụtụ afọ tupu mgbe ọ ka na-agụ akwụkwọ

N'ime ọtụtụ iri afọ kemgbe e bipụtara ya, Ain't I a Woman? ka a ghọtara maka onyinye ya na echiche ụmụ nwanyị, na Publishers Weekly n'afọ 1992 kpọrọ ya 'Otu n'ime akwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị iri abụọ kachasị emetụta n'ime afọ iri abụọ gara aga
' Mgbe ọ na-ede na The New York Times n'afọ 2019, Min Jin Lee kwuru na Ain't I a Woman 'na-anọgide na-abụ ọrụ dị oke mkpa nke dị mkpa nke echiche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
nko na-etinye ntọala nke echiche nwanyị ya site n'inye ihe akaebe akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mmekọahụ kpọmkwem nke ụmụ nwanyị ojii na-agba ohu diri na otú ihe nketa ahụ si emetụta nwanyị ojii taa

' Ain't I a Woman? na-enyocha isiokwu gụnyere mmetụta akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mmekọahụ na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na ụmụ nwanyị ojii, mbelata nke nwanyị ojii, ọrụ mgbasa ozi na ihe ngosi, usoro agụmakwụkwọ, echiche nke ndị ọcha-supremacist-capitalist-patriarchy na mmachi nke ụmụ nwanyị ojii
N'otu oge ahụ, hooks ghọrọ ihe dị ịrịba ama dị ka onye aka ekpe na onye na-eche echiche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke oge a na onye nkatọ omenala

O bipụtara ihe karịrị akwụkwọ iri atọ, nke sitere na isiokwu sitere na ụmụ nwoke ojii, patriarchy, na nwoke na enyemaka onwe onye; nkuzi na-etinye aka na ncheta onwe onye; na mmekọahụ (n'ihe gbasara feminism na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke aesthetics na omenala ọhụụ)
Reel to Real agbụrụ, mmekọahụ, na klas na ihe nkiri ọnyọyọ (1996) na-anakọta edemede ihe nkiri, nyocha, na ajụjụ ọnụ na ndị nduzi ihe nkiri
Na The New Yorker, Hua Hsu kwuru na ajụjụ ọnụ ndị a gosipụtara akụkụ nke ọrụ hooks nke 'na-achọ ịmata ihe, na-enwe ọmịiko, na-achọ ndị enyi'
Na Feminist Theory From si n'ókè rụọ etiti(1984), hooks na-emepe nkatọ nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ nke ụmụ nwanyị ọcha na nke abụọ, nke ọ rụrụ ụka na ọ na-emebi ohere nke ịdị n'otu ụmụ nwanyị n'ofe agbụrụ

Dị ka hooks na-arụ ụka, nkwurịta okwu na ịgụ akwụkwọ (ikike ịgụ, ide, na iche echiche nke ọma) dị mkpa maka mmegharị ụmụ nwanyị n'ihi na n'enweghị ha, ndị mmadụ nwere ike ọ gaghị etolite iji mata enweghị nhata nwoke na nwanyị na ọha mmadụ
N'afọ 2002, hooks kwuru okwu mmalite na Mahadum Southwestern
N'izere ụdị ekele nke okwu mmalite ọdịnala, o kwuru okwu megide ihe ọ hụrụ dị ka ime ihe ike na mmegbu nke gọọmentị kwadoro, ma dụọ ụmụ akwụkwọ ọdụ ndị o kwenyere na ha na-agbaso omume ndị dị otú ahụ
The Austin Chronicle kọrọ na ọtụtụ ndị na-ege ntị na-ekwu okwu ahụ, ọ bụ ezie na 'ọtụtụ ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ gafere provost iji maa ya aka ma ọ bụ makụọ ya aka
N'afọ 2004, ọ sonyeere Berea College dị ka Prọfesọ a ma ama na ebe obibi
Akwụkwọ ya nke afọ 2008, nke ọdịbendị nke ebe, gụnyere ajụjụ ọnụ ya na onye edemede Wendell Berry yana mkparịta ụka banyere ịlaghachi Kentucky
Ọ bụ onye ọkà mmụta bi na Ụlọ akwụkwọ Ọhụrụ ugboro atọ, nke ikpeazụ ya bụ n'afọ 2014
Nakwa n'afọ 2014, e hiwere ụlọ ọrụ bell hooks Institute na kọleji Berea, ebe o nyere akwụkwọ ya n'afọ 2017
Banyere njirimara mmekọahụ ya, hooks kọwara onwe ya dị ka 'queer-pas-gay'
Ọ na-eji okwu ahụ bụ 'pas' site n'asụsụ French, na-asụgharị 'ọ bụghị' n'asụsụ Bekee
hooks na-akọwa ịbụ onye na-abụghị nwoke ma ọ bụ nwanyị n'okwu nke ya dị ka 'ọ bụghị onye gị na ya na-enwe mmekọahụ, kama ọ bụ banyere inwe esemokwu na ihe niile gbara ya gburugburu'

Ọ na-ekwu, 'Dị ka isi nke queer, echere m ọrụ Tim Dean na ịbụ queer na queer ọ bụghị dị ka ịbụ banyere onye gị na-enwe mmekọahụ - nke ahụ nwere ike ịbụ akụkụ nke ya - mana queer dị ka ịbụ banyere onwe onye na-emegiderịta onwe ya na ihe niile gbara ya gburugburu ma ọ ghaghị ịmepụta ma mepụta ma chọta ebe ikwu okwu na inwe ọganihu na ibi ndụ
N'oge ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Abigail Bereola n'afọ 2017, hooks kpughere Bereola na ọ lụbeghị di mgbe ha na-atụle ndụ ịhụnanya ya
N'oge ajụjụ ọnụ ahụ, hooks gwara Bereola, 'Enweghị m onye mmekọ
Anọ m na-alụbeghị di kemgbe afọ iri na asaa
Ọ ga-amasị m inwe onye ọlụlụ, mana echeghị m na ndụ m abaghị uru
Na Disemba 15, 2021, Hooks nwụrụ site na akụrụ n'ụlọ ya na Berea, Kentucky, dị afọ iri isii na itoolu
BellaNaija bụ ụdị ndụ, ihe ntụrụndụ na webụsaịtị ejiji na Africa
isi ụlọ ọrụ dị na Lagos, Nigeria

BellaNaija bụ Uche Eze tọrọ ntọala na 2006 dị ka mgbasa ozi mmalite nke mechara bụrụ BellaNaijacom ka ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ maka akara ugo mmụta mahadum na Ivey School of Business, University of Western Ontario, Canada
BellaNaija n'ụdị mbụ ya gosipụtara akụkọ, foto na ajụjụ ọnụ nke ndị ejiji Naijiria
Uche nọgidere na-adị ala, na-ezochikwa njirimara ya ruo mgbe BellaNaija malitere inwe ihe karịrị ofu nde kwa ọnwa
N'afọ 2013, BellaNaija họọrọ nke anọ na 'Webụsaịtị Ntụrụndụ 10 nke Afrịka kacha elu'
Mmezu ndị ọzọ gụnyere
Bella Agossou (Arabic; بيلا أجوسو;) amụrụ n'afọ 1981) bụ onye Benin na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri Spanish
Agossou malitere ọrụ ya na Benin dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ụlọ ọrụ 'Sonangnon' nke ọ mepụtara ma mepụta
Otú ọ dị, mgbe afọ anọ nke ịmepụta ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gasịrị, ọ kwagara Spain na 2002
Mgbe ahụ ọ mụtara asụsụ Catalan na Spanish iji chụsoo ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri Un cuento de Navidad (Christmas Tale) na ọrụ ndu nke nwanyị ndị uwe ojii na-achọ maka enweghị akwụkwọ dị ka onye mbịarambịa iwu na-akwadoghị
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ a ma ama n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Afrịka na nke mba ụwa gụnyere Los Nuestros, Moranetta, A cuento of Nadal na Palmeras en la Nieve
Na 13 Julaị 2017, Agossou nyere ndị nta akụkọ ụlọ ahịa a na-akpọ 'NOK'
Bella Bell-Gam (amụrụ n'August 24, 1956, na Rivers State) bụ onye Naijirịa na-eme egwuregwu pentathlete lara ezumike nká
A mụrụ Bell-Gam na Opobo Town, Rivers State, o ṅwere ejima, Judy onye bụkwa onye na-eme egwuregwu
Ụmụnne ṅwanyị abụọ ahụ gara Government Primary School, Afikpo, Methodist School, Uwani, Enugu na Union Secondary School, Ikot Ekpene
Ụmụ agbọghọ nọ na Enugu mgbe Agha Obodo malitere wee kwaga n'ebe ndịda Nnewi
Na ngwụcha agha ahụ, Bell-Gam laghachiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na Ikot Ekpene
N'afọ 1973, ọ nọchitere anya ụlọ akwụkwọ ya na ịwụli elu na asọmpi Hussey Shield na Lady Manuwa
Na 2nd National Sports Festival na 1975, ọ gbanwere na ihe mgbochi wee merie ọla edo na ihe omume ya
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ gara Calabar College of Technology ma nọchite anya kọleji ahụ na egwuregwu NIPOGA na-ekere òkè na ihe mgbochi, elu elu na ogologo elu
Na 3rd National Sports Festival, ọ họọrọ ilekwasị anya na ịwụli elu na ịwụsi elu
Site n'ebe ahụ, a họpụtara ya ka ọ nọchite anya mba ahụ na egwuregwu Ecowas ma mesịa na All Africa Games
O meriri nrite ọla edo na 1978 All Africa Games nke emere na Algiers, Algeria na akara 3709
O nwetakwara ọla nchara na 100m hurdles na long jump n'otu asọmpi ahụ na-enweta oge na anya nke 1399s na 612m n'otu n'otu
Àtụ Footer All-Africa Champions Heptathlon WomenÀtụ Footer African Champions women's long jumpÀtụ Footer African Champions women's heptathlon
Bella Moretti (a mụrụ Önwa abụa 12, 1989) bụ Amerikạ akpali agụụ mmekọahụ omee
Enye ama odụk okenye ịse ụlọ ọrụ na 2008 na afọ na 19
Akinbiyi Abiola Ahmed nke a maara dịka Bella Shmurda bụ onye Naịjirịa na-agụ egwu
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama site na ntọhapụ nke egwu 'Vision 2020', na remix na-esote nke gosipụtara onye egwu Naịjirịa bụ Olamide
Shmurda ghọrọ onye a ma ama mgbe egwu izizi ya bụ 'Vision 2020', na ihe na-esote (remix) na egwu nke o gosipụtara Olamide
O wepụtara ọtụtụ egwu egwu na afọ 2020, ụfọdụ n'ime ha gosipụtara ndị egwu kachasị elu, otu n'ime ha bụ 'Cash App' nke gosipụtara Zlatan
A họpụtara ya maka Headies Award maka nke ọzọ e gosiri na 2020
N'afọ 2020, Bella Shmurda ritere ihe nrite 'Next Rated Male' na 'Street Music of the Year' na City People Entertainment Awards, a họpụtakwara ya maka 'Revelation of the Year' award' n'otu afọ ahụ
N'afọ 2021, a họpụtara Bella Shmurda maka onyinye 'Next Rated' na Headies Awards
Na ọnwa June afọ 2021, a họpụtara egwu ya, 'Cash App' nke gosipụtara Zlatan na Lincoln maka 'Most Played Song - Street Pop' na NET Honours
A kpọbatara Bella Shmurda na afo 2021 YouTube Foundry Programme
Ọ bụ naanị ya bụ onye na-ese ihe n'Afrịka ka e tinyere na klas a
Na 10 June afọ 2021, Shmurda kpughere na ibe Instagram ya na ọ na-ezube iwepụta mpịakọta nke abụọ nke EP mbụ ya nke akpọrọ “High Tension Vol
2', nke a na-eme atụmatụ ịhapụ na ọnwa July afọ 2021 ma kesaa ihe osise album ahụ na peeji nke ya
O wepụtara EP na 7 Julaị afọ 2021
Shmurda mere nke mbụ ya na 02 Arena na United Kingdom, dị ka onye ọbịa na-eju anya, na egwu Wizkid's Made in Lagos concert na ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2021
O nwetakwara onyinye Youtube Foundry nke 2021 iji tinye ego na ọdịnaya ya na mmepe ọwa ya

N'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2021, vidiyo nke nwa akwụkwọ na-agụghị akwụkwọ na-eme egwu egwu Olamide 'Triumphant' site na abọm ya 'Carpe Diem' nke gosipụtara Shmurda, dọtara uche onye na-agụ egwú ahụ, ka ọ na-agbasa na ịntanetị
Na nzaghachi, Shmurda kwere nkwa itinye nwatakịrị ahụ na agụmakwụkwọ n'oge agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya
Mmụta ahụ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2021
N'ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya na ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2022, Shmurda kwupụtara na ọ ga-enye otu puku ndị ogbenye nri kwa afọ n'ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya

Bellamy Young (amụrụ Amy Maria Young ; n'abali iri na itoolu nke ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 1970) bụ onye ome ihe nkiri na onye ọbụ abụ America, nke ama ama maka ọrụ ya dị ka Melody “Mellie” Grant na usoro ihe nkiri ABC Scandal (2012 ruo 2018)
Na 2014, maka ihe ngosi ya nke Mellie, Young meriri ihe nrite Television Choice Television Award dị ka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma na usoro ihe nkiri
Young gosiputara na usoro ihe nkiri Fox Prodigal Son (2019–2021)
A mụrụ Young dị ka Amy Maria Young na Asheville, North Carolina, ma akpọtara ya akpọrọ nakweere ya

Ọ gbanwere aha ya ịbanye na Screen Actors Guild ebe ọ bụ na e nwere onye ọzọ n'aza Amy Young edebanyere aha, o wee họrọ aha akpọrọ Bellamy ka ọ bụrụ nkwanye ùgwù nye ezigbo enyi nna ya nwụrụ anwụ, Bill, onye nyere aka ịzụlite ya mgbe nna ya nwụsịrị
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Asheville School n'afo 1987
Ọ gara Mahadum Yale, na mbụ na Fiziks mana mechaa mụọ Bekee na amumamu gbasara ọgbọ, wee gụchaa n'afọ 1991
Young nọrọ oge okpomọkụ n'oge kọleji na British American Drama Academy na England
Young malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri na ọgbọ ihe nkiri
N'afọ 1997, o mere Broadway mpụta mbụ dị ka Mary na nkedo mbụ nke The Life
Young pụtakwara Off-Broadway na egwu Stephen Sondheim Merrily We Roll Along (1994), na Randy Newman 's Faust (1995–1996)
N'afọ 1995, Young mere mpụta mbụ ya na telivishọn n'ọrụ ugboro ugboro na NBC soap opera nke ọsịsa chi Another world dị ka Dr
Courtney Evans
Ọ gosiputara dị ka ọbịa na Law & Order n'afọ 1997 na afo 1998, n'ọrụ abụọ dị iche iche
Na 1999 o mere ihe nkiri mpụta mbụ ya na obere ọrụ na mpụ ihe nkiri Black and White wee mechaa rụkọọ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri nọọrọ onwe ya

Na mmalite 2000 ọ malitere ịpụta na ọrụ ndị ọbịa na-arụ ọrụ na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri telivishọn na ihe nkiri, gụnyere The Drew Carey Show, The X Files, ER, Frasier, The West Wing, NCIS, Ọkara, Grey's Anatomy, Private Practice, Abụọ na ọkara ndị nwoke, ike karịrị ike mmadụ, Dobe Dead Diva, na Castle
Site na 2000 ruo 2011, Young mere ihe ngosi ndị ọbịa iri atọ na ihe nkiri telivishọn
Young bụ onye otu ngosipụta oge niile na USA Network series Peacemakers na 2003
A kagburu ihe ngosi a ka otu oge nke nkeji itoolu gachara
O nwere ọrụ ugboro ugboro na usoro ihe nkiri iwu Oge ndu bu For the people dị ka nsote Dist
Atty
Agnes Hunt n'afọ 2002, na NBC oge ejije American Dreams ka Diane Shaw n'afọ 2003, na NBC's Scrubs ka Dr
Grace Miller n'afọ 2004, dị ka Assistant State Attorney Monica West na CBS's CSI Miami (2005 ruo 06), na ABC primetime soap
opera Dirty Sexy Money (2008-2009) dị ka Ellen Darling, ọgọ nwanyị nke okenye nke ezinụlọ Darling
O nwekwara ọrụ ugboro ugboro na Minds Criminal dị ka Beth Clemmons site n'afọ 2011 ruo afọ 2013

Young apụtala n'ọrụ nkwado n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, gụnyere We were Soldiers (2002) and Mission Impossible III (2006), yana ihe nkiri onwe ha dị ka Larceny (2004), Eve of Understanding (2006), Trust Me (2007), This is not a Test (2008), In My Sleep (2010), The Freebie (2010), and Joint Body (2014)

Na 2011 Shonda Rhimes gosiputara ndétu Young na ọrụ ugboro ugboro nke First Lady, Republican afọ 2016 onye nhọpụta onye isi ala, Melody 'Mellie' Grant na usoro telivishọn ABC ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị thriller Scandal megide Kerry Washington na Tony Goldwyn
Tupu Scandal, Young pụtara na Shonda Rhimes ' Grey's Anatomy and Private Practice
Ọ pụtara na ihe omume ọ bụla nke oge mbụ nke Scandal ma kwalite ya ka ọ bụrụ usoro oge niile dịka oge nke abụọ
Young mechara kwuo na e bu ụzọ chepụta akụkụ ya dị ka arc ihe omume atọ
Young enwetala otuto dị egwu maka ịrụ ọrụ ya dị ka Melody Grant n'oge ya niile na ihe nkiri ahụ
Daily Beast kpọrọ ya aha 'Breakout Star' nke ihe nkiri ahụ na 2014
Ọtụtụ ndị nkatọ toro ọrụ Young n'ime ihe omume gbadoro ụkwụ na agwa ya na nkeji ' I Everything's Coming Up Mellie ' nke oge nke atọ
Ntụleghachi nke Cicely K

Dyson maka akwụkwọ akụkọ The Wall Street Journal na-ekwu, sị 'Bellamy Young abụwo onye n'enye mmụọ ikiri ihe nkiri dị ịtụnanya nke oge abụọ na ọkara, ma oge a ọ mechara nweta ohere ịchawaya na ihe ịga nke ọma' Robert Rorke, na-ede akwụkwọ maka New York Post, na-ekwu na, 'Na Mellie, ihe ngosi ahụ nwere àgwà kachasị na ngosipụta, ma Young bụ onye na-eme ihe na-adọrọ mmụọ nkiri mmadụ' Ọ meriri ihe nrite Television Choice Television Award maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma na usoro ihe nkiri maka arụmọrụ ya na oge atọ
N'ọnwa Mee abalị iri ise nke afọ 2015, Young wepụtara albom mbụ ya, Far Away So Close, na iTunes
N'afọ 2016, o gosiputara n'ihe nkiri mpụ bụ The Night Stalker nke Megan Griffiths duziri banyere onye na-egbu mmadụ bụ Richard Ramirez
N'afọ sochirinụ, o nwere ọrụ nkwado na ihe nkiri ntọchị bụ Bernard na Huey nchịkwa aka Jim Rash na David Koechner
Na 2018, o gosiputara na Disney 's live action adaptation nke A wrinkle in Time, tinyere Oprah Winfrey, Reese Witherspoon na Mindy Kaling
Na Machị 2019, Young kwupụtara na ya ga-esonye na ngosipụta nke fox drama Prodigal Son megidere Michael Sheen, Lou Diamond Phillips na Tom Payne
N'ọnwa Mee, ihe nkiri ahụ nwere Mbelata nke nhọrọ dị ka usoro na ka ọ na-erule Ọktoba, eburula ya maka usoro nkeji oge iri abụọ na abụọ zuru ezu
Prodigal Son bụ usoro oge mbụ zuru oke nke ọdịda 2019 ma bụrụ ihe ngosi ọhụụ kachasị elu na netwọkụ ọ bụla
Young bụ onye anaghị eri anụ kemgbe afọ 1988 na n'afo 2016 sonye na mgbasa ozi Ngahari maka PETA akpọrọ, 'Ịbụ onye anaghị eri anụ na-eme ka m diwanye ka onye N'eto eto'
Onye nkwado ogologo oge nke ndochi ụlọ, Young sonyere na mgbasa ozi telivishọn abụọ maka The Humane Society of the United States 'The Shelter Pet Project' n'afọ 2015 na 'Honestly' n'afọ 2016
Young bụ onye Democrat edebanyere aha
Tinyere ọtụtụ n'ime ndị ọlụlụ Scandal ya, Young gbara na isiokwu na mmemme inye ego maka Hillary Clinton n'onwa Eprel 2016
Site N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ ga na Nọvemba afọ 2016, Young kụrụ nzọ mgbasa ozi maka Clinton wee gaa Virginia, North Carolina, Colorado, Iowa, Michigan, Ohio, Pennsylvania, na New Hampshire

Dị ka akụkụ nke ihe nketa ọchịchị Obama, n'afọ 2016, Young pụtara na 'Women Film' nke United States of Women tinyere ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ ọha na eze dị ka Michelle Obama, Meryl Streep na Oprah Winfrey Mgbe emechara n'afọ 2015 nke mmnnye ukwu osisi ọkụ nke ekeresimesi nke mba ahu bụ National Christmas Tree Lighting, a mara ọkwa na n'afọ 2016 Young ga-abụ onye nnọchianya, yana Chelsea Clinton, nke Trust for the National Mall
Young bụ onye ana enye nkwanye ugwu maka ọgbakọ domestic violence nonprofit organizationaghị 'Helpmate' ma nyere aka n'ịkwalite ego maka ndị ihe ike mere
Na 2015, Young meritere Celebrity Jeopardy! na n'ihi ya nwetara $50,000 maka Operation Blankets of Love - ọrụ ebere nke na-enye anụmanụ ndị nọ n'ụlọ mkpuchi blanket
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, Young malitere ịta ahụhụ site na oké isi ọwụwa bụ migraines ma ka na-ata ahụhụ site na ha ruo taa
Ọ ghọrọ onye mmekọ na GlaxoSmithKline maka Treximet, n'afo 2015, iji gbasaa mmata gbasara ike isi ọwụwa bụ migraine
Young nwere nkwekọrịta ntinyeaka nke Merck & Co, n'ọnwa Novemba afọ 2016, iji nyere aka kụziere ndị mmadụ mkpa nyocha nke biomarker na ọrịa cancer akpa ume na-abụghị obere cell, ọrịa gburu nna ya
Nwa akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'onwe ya, Young ugbu a na-enye nwa akwụkwọ nọ na kọleji ebe ọ gụsịrị bụ Mahadum Yale ohere agụmakwụkwọ nchefu kwa afọ
N'afọ 2019, Young ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya nzukọ CARE wee gaa njem na Rwanda ịhụ ọrụ ha na-arụ ebe ahụ
Maka ụbọchị ụmụ nwanyị mba ụwa 2020, Young duziri PSA, maka CARE, na-egosipụta onwe ya, Kerry Washington, Shonda Rhimes na Katie Lowes
Kemgbe Septemba 2017, Young na-enwe mmekọrịta ya na onye na-akụ egwu bụ Portuguese Pedro Segundo
Bellview Airlines bụ ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu nwere isi ụlọọrụ na Bellview Plaza na Ikeja, Lagos State, Nigeria
A tọrọ ntọala ya na 1992
O nwere ndị ọrụ narị atọ na asatọ, ọ na-arụ ọrụ ụgbọ elu ndị njem n'ime Africa yana London site na Murtala Mohammed International Airport, Lagos
E mechiri ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọelu ahụ n'afọ 2009
N'afọ 1992, Bellview Airlines pụtara site na Bellview Travels Limited, ụlọ ọrụ njem dị na Lagos, na-elekwasị anya na inye ọrụ ndị isi na-eji otu ụgbọ elu Yakovlev Yak-40
N'afọ 1993, a malitere ọrụ ndị njem n'ime ụlọ site na Douglas DC-9-30 a gbazitere
Iji gbasaawanye, e guzobere ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka na Sierra Leone na 1995, nke mechara sonyeghachi na ụlọ ọrụ nne ya
Gọọmentị Naịjirịa setịpụrụ oge a kara aka n'April 30, 2007, maka ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu niile na-arụ ọrụ na mba ahụ iji zere ịbụ ndị a kwụsịrị, na mgbalị iji hụ na ọrụ na nchekwa ka mma
Bellview Airlines mezuru ụkpụrụ nke Nigerian Civil Aviation Authority (NCAA) ma mesịa debanye aha ya maka ọrụ
[citation needed]
N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2009, Bellview Airlines kwụsịrị ọrụ niile mgbe a kwụsịrị ọrụ ya na London Heathrow
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2009, ụgbọelu Bellview nyere ụgbọ elu ndị a haziri ahazi na ebe ndị a
Kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, Bellview Airlines na-eji ụdị ụgbọ elu ndị a arụ ọrụ
Belowars bụ ihe nkiri animated nke Brazil nke afọ 2009, nke Paulo Munhoz duziri ,dabere na akwụkwọ Guerra Dentro da Gente, nke Paulo Leminski
N'ịbụ onye echiche ahụ dọtara, Baita malitere njem na mgbanwe dị n'ime

Asụsụ Bemba, ChiBemba (nke á na-akpọkwa Cibemba, Ichibemba, Icibemba na Chiwemba), bụ asụsụ Bantu nkè ndị Bemba na-asụkarị n'ebe ùgwù ọwụwa anyanwụ Zambia yá ná dị ka asụsụ na-asọpụta site n'ihe dị ka agbụrụ 18 metụtara ya
Bemba bụ otu n'ime asụsụ ndị a na-asụ na Zambia, nkè ọtụtụ ndị bi n'obodo ụkwụ na-asụrụ, ọ bụkwa otú n'etiti asụsụ mpaghara asaá á mà ámá na Zambia
Ónyé ịsị àlà mbụ nkè Zambia, Kenneth Kaunda, ọ bụ ezie ná ọ bụ onye Malawi, a zụlitere yá n'obodo na-asụ Bemba, abụọ n'ime ndị isi ala anọ nke Zambia kemgbe bụ ndị na-asụrụ Bemba
Ónyé ịsị àlà nkè atọ, Levy Mwanawasa, bụ onye Lenje, sitere ná Copperbelt Province nkè sitere ná agbụrụ Bantu Botatwe nkè mejupụtara ndị Tonga-Lenje-Ila
Ónyé ịsị àlà nke ànọ́, Rupiah Bwezani Banda bụ onye Chewa sị n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ
N'ime afọ ndị MMD weghaara ọchịchị na 1991, a na-ebo ya ebubo ọtụtụ ugboro na ọ na-akwalite Bemba karịa asụsụ mpaghara ndị ọzọ na mba ahụ
Ọ bụ ezie na asụsụ nke isi obodo Zambia bụ Lusaka bụ olumba nke Bantu Botatwe
Bemba nwere ọtụtụ olumba, ọtụtụ n'ime há bụ ụdị Bemba nke agbụrụ ndị ọzọ na-asụ nkè dàràa n'okpuru mmetụta Bemba
Há gụnyere Chishinga, Lomotwa, Ngoma, Nwesi, Lala, Kabende, Luunda, Mukulu, Ngiao, na Unga, nke ndị Twa pygmies na-asụ ma na-ewere ya mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka asụsụ dị iche (Nurse 2003)
Ndị Twa nke Bangweulu na-asụ asụsụ ọzọ nke Bemba
Usoro orthographical a na-ejikarị eme ìhè, nkè Edward Steere webatara ná mbụ, bụ ụdaume
Á na-enye mkpụrụedemede yá, ná ọnụọgụ ụdaume há, n'okpuru ébé á
Ọ ghọwo ìhè á na-ahụkarị iji 'c' mee ihe n'ọnọdụ 'ch'
Dị ka asụsụ ndị ọzọ nkè Bantu, kà á na-agbakwunye affixes, njikọta nkè ụda ume nwere ike ịbịakọta ná ụdaume nwere ikike ịgbanwe
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, 'aa' na-agbanwe kà ọ bụrụ ogologo 'a', 'ae' ná 'ai' na-aga 'e', ná 'ao' na 'au' na-aghọ 'o' (n'ọnọdụ ndị ọzọ, a na-ejikarị 'y' kewaa ngwakọta ụdaume ndị ọzọ)
'n' imi na-agbanwe ka ọ bụrụ 'm' tupu 'b' ma ọ bụ 'p', a na-akpọkwa yá ŋ tupu 'k' mà ọ dị 'g'; mgbè 'n', 'l' gbanwere ka ọ bụrụ' 'd'
Iwu ndị a niile ga-apụta ìhè na tebụl ndị e nyèrè n'okpuru ébé á
Dị ka ọtụtụ asụsụ Bantu, Bemba bụ ụda, nwèrè ụda abụọ; Otú ọ dị, ụda nwèrè mmetụta dị ntà ná ihe ọ pụtara dịka ọnụ ọgụgụ ókwú ndị á ga-agbagwoju anya dị obere
Nkwekasị na-adaba ná prefix, mgbè ọ dị, mà nwee ike iduga ná ọdịiche dị nro nke ìhè ọ pụtara (lee ụdị ngwaa dị n'okpuru)

Ọtụtụ n'ime isi ihe ndị dị ná ụtọ asụsụ Bemba bụ ihe atụ nke asụsụ Bantu ọ bụ aglutinative, dabere na prefixes, nwere usoro nke ọtụtụ áhà, nnukwu akụkụ ókwú ná oge, adjectives olé ná olé, na, dị ka Bekee, nwèrè usoro okwu nkè bụ isiokwu-okwu-ihe
A na-ewere ọtụtụ n'ime nhazi ébé á site ná nke Schoeffer, Sheane ná Cornwallis nyere
A na-ekewa áhàa Bemba n'ime ọtụtụ klas na-enweghị isi
A na-egosi há site ná prefixes há mà na-adịkarị kà prefixes nkwekọrịta mà ọ bụghị mgbè niile kà há na-agbakọta ná ngwaa há na-achị, adjectives na-eme kà há rụọ eru, ná nnọchiaha na-anọchite anya há
Site n'otu mgbakọ, dabere ná ọtụtụu, á na-ahazi ha dị ka ndị a (ọtụtụ ụdị ndị ọzọ na-esite na echiche phonetic)
Prefixes na klas 9 na-egosi ikpe 'ku-' kwekọrọ na 'to' ma ọ bụ 'from', 'mu-' na 'in', 'into', ma ọ bụ'out of', na 'pa-' na 'at'
Dị ka ọ na-adịkarị n'asụsụ Bantu, adjectives na-agbaso okwu há rụrụu eru, mà wéré adjectival concord prefixes, mànà ọ bụghị ọtụtụ n'ime háa n'echiche siri ike
Adverbs, ikwu ókwú, mà ọ bụ 'ndị na-akọwa', na-arụkarị ọrụ há kama
Á na-etinye ndị na-akọwa ìhè n'azụ áhà ahụ, ná mkpụrụedemede '-a', na nnọchiaha dị mkpa n'etiti ha chintu cha nomba, 'ihe ọhụrụ'
Nọmba site na 1 ruo 10 bụ
Nọmba 1-5 na-ewere adjectival concord prefixes (mà e wezụga màkà klas 1 otu muntu umo, 'otu onye')
A hapụrụ nọmba 6-10 n'agbanweghị
'Ikumi' nwéré ọnụọgụ 'makumi', nkè enwere ike iji dị kà áhà ná 'na' (na, na) iji mepụta ọnụọgụ niile ruo 99 dịka ọmụmaatụ, makumi yatatu ná pabula, 'iri atọ ná itoolu'
100 bụ 'mwanda', ná ọnụọgụ' 'myanda'

Ndị nnọchiaha onwé ónyé na-anọghị nà klas bụ 'ine' (1st person sg), 'iwe' (2nd person sg), 'ifwe' (1st persona pl), 'imwe' (2nd persona plỌ dị ichèe ichè Ndị a bụ ìhè zụrụu oké, n'echiche ná há na-eguzo naanị há, há enweghịkwa ike ịpụta dị ka isiokwu mà ọ bụ ihe dịka ha dị
E nwere nnọchiaha dị iche iche, ná nnọchiaha ónyé nkè atọ dabere ná klas
Enwekwara nnọchiaha na-egosi, nkè e kewara site ná klas ná ụdị atọ site ná ala deixis ('nke a, nke ahụ, ná nkè ahụ n'ebe ahụ'), á na-ejikwa ndị a mepụta nnọchiaha

Ngwaa nwere ụdị dị mfe, na-ejikarị '-a' (ihe niile tụpụ 'a' ịbụ 'ogwe', 'mgbọrọgwụ' ma ọ bụ 'radical'), mà na-agbakọta yá dabere ná ónyé, ọnụ ọgụgụ ná klassi nkè isiokwu ná ìhè, oge, ọnọdụ, olu, akụkụ ná mà há bụ nkwenye mà ọ bụ ihe na-adịghị mma
Ọzọkwa, ogwe ha na-agbanwe iji gosipụta ihe ndị ọzọ dị iche iche
Enwere ike ijikọta iwu ndị na-esonụ n'ụzọ dọrọ ányá, Bemba bụ aglutinative na ọ bụghị inflective, mana á kà nwere ụfọdụ ndị ọzọ
Á na-ebu ụzọ tinye prefix isiokwu, mgbè ahụ ihe ahụ na-etinye
Mgbe isiokwu ma ọ bụ ihe bụ áhà á kapịrị ọnụ ná klas á nyere, á ná-eji ókwú nkwekọrịta nkè klas á, ná ụdị na-adịghị mmá na-agbakwunye prefix 'ta-' tupu nke a
Nchịkọta e nyèrèe ebe á bụ nke Schoeffer gosipụtara

Ụfọdụ n'ime ndị á chọrọ ogwe áká gbanwere agbanwe, na-agbanwe 'a' ikpeazụ ka ọ bụrụ 'ile' ma ọ bụrụ na ụdaume bu ya ụzọ bụ 'a', 'i' ma ọ bụ 'u', na 'ya' ma ọ dị ka 'e' ma ọbụ 'o', ma ọ bụ, ma ọ bụrụ bụrụ na ụdaolu ikpeazụ bụ imi, na-gbanwe 'a' ka ọ bụrụ na 'ine' ma ọ bụghị 'ene' dịka o si dị
E nwere ihe na-adịghị mma n'ọtụtụ ngwaa
A na-enye infixes dị n'okpuru ebe a
Ha na-abịa n'azụ isiokwu na ihe, na n'ihu ngwaa, ma e wezụga maka oge na-adịbeghị anya, nke a rụzuru ma ọ bụ akụkọ ihe mere eme na 'na-', nke na-apụta na mbido
A na-eji ụda olu ( ́) mara nrụgide
Mmetụta ahụ kwekọrọ nke ọma na ụkpụrụ ndị Bantu
Otu ihe dị mfe bụ otu ụdị 'dictionary' nke ngwaa nkè nwèrè ogwe ná nsonaazụ '-a', na-agbanwe ka '-e' ma ọ bụrụ ná ejiri prefix ihe - enweghị prefix isiokwu
Ọdịdị dị mfe nkè dị mkpa na-agbanwe '-a' ka ọ bụrụ '-eni'
Ntinye 'aku-' ma ọ bụ 'uka-', na-agbakwunye echiche nke ntụziaka iji maliteghachi mà ọ bụ gaa n'ihu n'omume
Enwere ike inye ụdị nkwenye site ná iji prefix nke ónyé nnọchiaha (n'ozuzu nke klas 1) ma soro nke a site na infix '-inda-'
Á na-eji subjunctive eme ìhè n'ụzọ na-enweghị isi, dị kà ìhè na-apụtaghị ìhè, nà agbamume, ná ná ná ahịrịokwu ndị dị n'okpuru, n'otu ụzọ ahụ ma ọ bụghị otú ná subjunctive nkè ọtụtụ asụsụ Europe
Ìhè á na-ahụkarị bụ mgbanwe nke '-a' ikpeazụ nkè ngwaa gaa na '-e'
Á na-enye ụdị ya n'okpuru ebe a
N'ebe a, V na-anọchite ányá ngwaa, ná P maka nnọchiaha ọ bụla (infixes)
Iwu phonological a na-ahụkarị na-emetụta
Infinitive, nke bụ áhà ókwú, nwèrè ụdị abụọ
Ụdị dị mfe nwèrè prefix 'ku-' gbakwunyere na ụdị dị mfe, dị ka e kwụrụ n'elu, ná infinitive nwèrè prefix'kula-'
A na-emepụta passive site na itinye '-w-' n'ihu ụdaume ikpeazụ nkè ngwaa, mànà anaghị eji yá eme ìhè ugboro ugboro
Enwere ike ịmepụta ólú 'na-anọpụ iche' site ná iji '-ik-' kama mà ọ bụrụ ná ụdaume bú ụzọ bụ á, m mà ọ bụ u, na '-ek-' ma ọ bụrụ ma ọ bụrụ dalelị bu ụzọ bụ e ma ọ bụ o
Ụdị a dị iche n'ihe ọ pụtara site na nke na-agaghị agafe agafe n'ihi na ọ na-emesi ọnọdụ sitere n'omume ike karịa omume ahụ n'onwe ya (cf
Bekee 'arịa ahụ agbajiela', n'adịghị ka 'a na-agba bọọlụ')
N'ozuzu, prefixes 'ta-' na prefix isiokwu ma e wezụga maka ónyé mbụ nkè na-agbanwe kà 'nshi' ma ọ bụ 'shi'
N'ozuzu, subjunctive na-agbakwunye 'i' mgbe prefixes nke nnọchiaha gasịrị ma n'ọtụtụ ọnọdụ na-agbanwe 'e' ikpeazụ ka ọ bụrụ 'a'
Infinitive na-eji oge ụfọdụ 'te' na-adịghị mmá
Otú ọ dị, iwu ndị a kapịrị ọnụ dị mgbagwoju anya karị, ụdị ndị ahụ na-adabere nke ọma na oge, akụkụ na ọnọdụ
Mgbè a na-eji ihe na-adịghị mma na 'le' ezughi oke, ọ na-abụkarị n'echiche nke omume a na-emebeghị, Schoeffer na-ezo aka na ya dị ka 'oge a na-egbu oge' dị iche
E nwere ọtụtụ ụdị ngwaa ndị ọzọ nke na-agbanwe ogwe site na ịgbakwunye mkpụrụedemede ọzọ tupu 'a' ikpeazụ
Á na-enye ndị a n'okpuru ébé á
E nwekwara ọtụtụ oge ngwakọta, ọtụtụ na-eji copula 'kuli' ná 'kuba'
Á na-eji ndị á eme ìhè iji webata nhazi ma ọ bụ nkè dị n'okpuru, dịka ojiji há na Bekee
Abantu bonse bafyalwa abalubuka nokulingana mu mucinshi nensambu
Balikwata amano nokutontonkanya, eico bafwile ukulacita ifintu ku banabo mu mutima wa bwananyina
Á na-amụ ụmụ mmadụ niile n'efu mà há nata ha ùgwù na ikike
A na-enye ha ezi uche ná akọ ná uche mà kwesịkwa imegide ibe ha n'ime mmụọ nkè ọbụbụenyi
(Akụkụ nke mbụ nke Universal Declaration of Human Rights)
E nwere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ná Bemba
E nwèrè akụkọ, uri ná egwuregwu
Ụfọdụ n'ime ndị edemede ámá ámá ná Bemba gụnyere Stephen Mpashi, Chongo Kasonkomona, Chishimba, Paul Mushindo, Bwalya Chilangwa, Mwila Launshi na Kambole
E dere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ná akụkọ ná Bemba n'etiti oge 1950 na 1980

N'oge na-adịbeghị ányá, á na-ebipụta ọrụ okike olé ná olé ná Zambia karịsịa n'ihi ihe abụọ ndị na-agụ yá na-abụkarị ndị ogbenye ná nkè abụọ, n'ihi nkè mbụ, ndị na-ebi akwụkwọ na-ala azụ ibipụta ọrụ okorobịa na Bemba, ọkachasị akwụkwọ akụkọ dị ogologo, maka ihe ego n'ihi ohere dị ala nke ndị na-ede akwụkwọ na ya wee si otú a nweta uru
Kama nkè ahụ, e nwèrè ọtụtụ akụkọ mkpirikpi na akwụkwọ akụkọ ná akwụkwọ akụkọ Bemba
N'agbanyeghị nsogbu ndị á, dị ka ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ na enweghị mbipụta, ogo nkè ọrụ ndị á na-ebipụta ná Bemba na-adịkarị elu
Ọzọkwa, ọ yiri kà e nwèrè ọtụtụ ndị édémédé nwéré nkà ga-achọ ide n'asụsụ á mànà há enweghị ike ide ihe n'ihi ìhè ndị e nyèrè n'elu ná ndị ọzọ [nkọwa dị mkpa] ndị metụtara
N'ihe gbasara nkatọ akwụkwọ, á tụlebeghị ma katọọ ọtụtụ ọrụ na Bemba
Nkè á bụ n'ihi ná e nwèrè ndị nkatọ akwụkwọ olé na olé ná Bemba, ọ bụ ezie ná mmasị na-eji nwayọọ nwayọọ na-eto
Ụfọdụ n'ime ndị a gụnyere Lutato na Shadreck Kondala, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Akwụkwọ Bemba oge ochie gụnyere Uwauma Nafyala, Pano Calo ná Imilimo ya bena Kale
Ben Agbee bụ onye na-ese ihe na Ghana
A mụrụ ya na Ghana n'afọ 1966
Ọ gụrụ nka na kọleji
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1989
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Agbee gara n'ihu na-ese ihe mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ihe gbasara mgbasa ozi na imewe
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na acrylic na akwa, Agbee na-elekwasị anya naanị n'ihe gbasara ụmụ nwanyị Africa, na-abụkarị na profaịlụ, na-esekarị ihe abụọ dị iche iche maka ngosipụta ha
Ụfọdụ ọrụ, dị ka Wait A Minute, na-egosi ha ebe ha na-ekwu okwu n'ìgwè, ma nwee nkọwa dị mgbagwoju anya nke akara ndị etinyere na uwe ha ma ọ bụ akwa
Ndị ọzọ, dị ka Migration, na-egosipụta profaịlụ gbara ọchịchịrị, dị ọcha nke ụmụ nwanyị ndị a na nzụlite nke ọdịdị mara mma, ọdịdị geometric, nke na-akpali akpali nke ájá ájá
Agbee sonyere n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi nchịkọta na nke onye ọ bụla na Accra, ebe ndị ọzọ na Ghana, Netherlands, United States, New Zealand na ebe ndị ọzọ na mba ụwa

Tinyere onye Ethiopia na-ese ihe n'oge a bụ Wosene Worke Kosrof, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe ole na ole ndị ọrụ ha pụtara kwa afọ na kalenda Contemporary African Art nke Avalanche Publishing bipụtara
Odinigwe Benedict Chukwukadibia Enwonwu MBE (14 Jụlai 1917 - 5 Febrụwarị 1994), onye eji Ben Enwonwu mara,bụ onye Naịjirịa na- ese/ete ihe na akpụkwa ihe
Ọ bụ omenka nke Afrịka kachasị pụta ìhè na senturi irí abụọ,ọrụ mmeghe ụzọ ya meghere ụzọ maka mmụba/nwulite nke postukolonịa na mmepe anya nyere nka Afrịka nke oge a
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị omenkà Afrika mbụ natara mkpu ekele,na ihe ngosi ogosipụtara na ohere ihe ngosi pụtara ihe na Europe ya na United States ma detuo ya n'akwụkwọ ndekọ mba Ụwa nke ǹkà ógè a
Kemgbe afọ 1950, ndị mgbasa ozi mba ụwa n'eto Enwonwu dịka'Oménka úkwú nke Afrịka' ma mpụta ìhè ya wetere otu mba ndị isi ojii nkwado n'ụwa niile
Mkpopu Enwonwu nọ na mbara alaMercury bụ nke mere ikwanyere ya ùgwù
Ben Enwonwu bụ ejima amụrụ na n'ime abalị iri na anọ n'ime ọnwa Julaị 1917 n'a ezinụlọ a ma ama nke Umueze-Aroli na Onitsha, Nigeria
Nna-ya, Omenka Odigwe Emeka Enwonwu, bụ onye Tekịnịshịanna-ọrụ na Royal Niger Company
O bubu onye òtù kansụlụ ndị Chiffu na Onitsha ma buru omenkà ọdịnala ana eweliri aka, onye kpụrụ mkpara ikikere,oche,ibo achọrọ mma na ihe oyiyi okpukpe
Nne ya, Chinyelugo Iyom Nweze bụ onye ahịa ahịa na-aga nke ọma
Mgbe nna ya nwụrụ na 1921, Enwonwu ketara ngwaọrụ ya,ga n'ihu iwepụta mma nka site n'ịpịapụta ihe n'ụdị ihe osise ndị Igbo, malitere na nna ya n'oge mbụ, bụ onye zụlitere ikike mbụ ya

N’agbata afọ 1921 na 1931, Enwonwu gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ise; Ụlọ Akwụkwọ elementrị nke St Joseph, Onitsha (1926–1928); ụlọ Akwụkwọ elementrị nke St, Theresa, Umuahia (1928–1929); ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị nke St
Mary,Port Harcourt (1929–1930); ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị nke Holy Trinity na praịmarị nke St
Mary,buchaa na Onitsha (1930–1931)
Na 1933, Enwonwu gara ụlọ akwụkwọ St
Patrick,Ibusa ma emesịrị ọ deba aha na Government College nke Ịbadan, ma gụchaa mmụta sekọndịrị naGovernment College Ụmụahịa na 1937
Na kọleji abụọ a, ọ mụrụ gbasara nka n'aka Kenneth C
Murray
Murray bụ onye ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ na-ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ nka na ọrụ gọọmentị kolonịal na onye mechara bụrụ onye isi ihe mgbe ochie
Mgbe ha na nọkọrọ, Enwonwu ghọrọ onye enyemaka Murray ma bụrụ onye ama ama dị ka otu n’ime ụmụ akwụkwọ nwere ọgụgụ isi na nka na uzu nke “Murray Group” (Ben C
Enwonwu, CC Ibeto, DL Nnachy, na AP Umana)

Oge ọmụmụ ihe n'aka Murray kara akara mbido agụmakwụkwọ nka Enwonwu Na 1944, n’okpuru ụlọ ọrụ Shell Petrolum na njikọ aka agụmakwụkwọ n'efu British kansụl, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Slade nke Fine Art ama ama ,kọleji Mahadum, London ma na 1945, ọ ga ụlọ Akwụkwọ Ruskin, Ashmolean, Mahadum Oxford ebe Slade kwagara n’oge Agha ụwa nke Abụọ

N'afọ 1947, ọ nwetara diplọma nke klas mbụ na agụmakwụkwọ nka site na Slade wee debanye aha ya maka ọrụ postgrajuete na ngalaba agụmakwụkanọ (na nlekwasị anya na ọdịda agbụrụ West Afrika) na Mahadum London
N’afọ 1948,Enwonwu gụcharaakwụkwọ

Nkiru Nzegwu na- ekwu na ọnọdụ ịkpa oke agbụrụ ọ hụrụ oge ọ nọ na England kpalitere mmasị ya ịbanye na mmemme aAntropọlọji nyere ohere maka ọmụmụ sayensị nke agbụrụ, njirimara uche na nke pụtara ìhè ,omenala, yana mmekọrịta mmadụ na,ibe yaN'áfo 1937, Murray gosipụtara ọrụ Enwonwu na galarịị Zwemmer dị na London Na 1969, ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta dị elu na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria
Mgbe ya na Murray rụkọchara ọrụ ọtụtụ afọ, e goro ya ka onye nkuzi n’ụlọ akwụkwọ gọọmentị dị n’Umuahia
Dabere na Sylvester Ogbechie, Odee nke Ben Enwonwu The Making of an African Modernist, Murray enweghị obi ụtọ na nhọrọ mahadum ahụ inye Enwonwu otu ụgwọ dị ka ndị nkuzi ndị ọzọ bụ aka ochie
Nke a mere ka esemokwu dị n'etiti mmadụ abụọ ahụ
Murray hapụrụ koleji Gọọmentị ma Enwonwu nọchiri ya dị ka onye nkuzi nka
Ọ gara n'ihu n'ọrụ ya dị ka onye nkuzi nka na ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ dị iche iche, gụnyere ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị ozi dị na prọvinsị ￼￼Calabar￼￼ (1940-41), ya na Edo College, Benin City (1941 43)
Ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ gọọmentị Naịjirịa na-ahụ maka nka site na 1948
N’afọ ndị na_eso 1950, ọ jegharịrị ma kuzie na United States, ma ọ malitere ọtụtụ ọrụ dị ka onye omenka na ọrụ ntabi anya

Site na 1949 rue 1954, Na 1951, ọ zutere ndị otu hiwere ọzịlarịị Lagos nye Anti Slavery and Aborigines Right Society nke Candido Da Rocha nọ n'isi ya n'oge ahụ, ma nwee James Johnson, Samuel Pearse, na Sapara Williams dịka ndị otu
ma bụrụ onye na-ese ihe osise ha
Enwonwu hiwere ọtụtụ ihe ngosi nka n'ime London, Lagos, Milan, New York City, Washington DC, na Boston
N'oge ọbịbịa ya na Nigeria na 1956, Queen Elizabeth II nyere ya ọrụ ma nọdụ ala maka ihe osise nke onye na-ese ihe
N'oge ngosi ndị omenka nke Royal Society nke British na London nke 1957, o gosipụtara ihe ọkpụkpụ ọla nchara
N’afọ 1959, a họpụtara Enwonwu dịka onye nlekọta n’ọfịs Ngalaba mgbasa Ozi na Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ onye òtù ibe nke Mahadum Lagos, Lagos (1966-68), onye ndụmọdụ ọdịnala nye gọọmentị Naịjirịa(1968-71), na onye nleta na Institute African Studies na Mahadum Howard, Washington, DC, na 1971
A họpụtara ya prọfesọ mbụ nke Fine Arts na Mahadum Ife, Ile-Ife, site na 1971 ruo 1975
Ọ bụkwa onye ndụmọdụ nka na seketeriete mbà ụwa , Second World Black and Afrịcan Festival of Arts and Culture (FESTAC) na Lagos nke 1977
O sere ihe osise nke ndị Naijiria dị ka ọrụ dịrị ya onwe ya, ma gosipụta Amos Tutuola'The Brave African huntress
Ọ hiwekwara ụlọ ihe nkiri na London ma bụrụ onye otu Royal Anthropological Institute, London, bụrụkwa onye otu Royal Academy of Arts, London
N’oge ya, a na-ahụ Enwonwu dịka onye omenkà; a kọwara nka ya dị ka ' immepe ọhụụ nke Afrịka n'ụdị pụrụ iche'
Ogbechie kọwara nka ya dịka'[mmepe ohere nke ato nke akụkọ ihe mere gbasara nka nke ọdịdị ya na njirimara ya nwere ndịịche na nwezụga nkọwa akụkọ omenka nke oge a na odide
Isiokwu gbasara nwoke isi ocha si western Europe

g onyinye ọla nchara gbasara òsìsè queen,gosipụtara na ya, dị ka onye omenkà Afrika nke oge a, jiri omume ya wee mepụta ụdị nka ọgbara ọhụụ nke echiche nke nnọchi anya na echiche nke njirimara nka dị iche na akụkọ nka na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke usoro ọgbara ọhụrụ nke Europe
Achọpụtara ihe osise nke ada eze Ife bụ Adetutu Ademiluyi (Tutu), nke Enwonwu tere n’afọ 1973 achọwara kemgbe 1975, ka achọpụtakwara na 2017 n’ụlọ elu dị na London

E rere ya ọnụ ala £ 1,205,000 nke Bonhams chikọbara Eserese nke Tutu, otu n’ime ihe atọ ahụ onye na-ese ihe mere, bụ akara ngosi nke mba Naịjirịa ma nlere anya dị ka ihe ga-eme ka udo dị n’etiti gọọmentị na ndị na-ekewa ugwu Biafran mgbe agha obodo bisịrị
Onye nwe ihe osise a mara Enwonwu, ma kọwaa ya dịka nwoke mara mma nke nwere ifuru n'olu ya
1951 – Portrait of Chief Candido Joao Da Rocha which was exhibited during FESTAC LAGOS 1977
1956 – Bronze sculpture of Queen Elizabeth II
1964 – Sango the Yoruba god of lightning and thunder
1967 - Ogbanje which is currently exhibited at Yemisi Shyllon Museum of Art
You can find more of Ben Enwonwu's works displayed there
1971 – Christine Sold in 2019 for $14 million
1973 – Tutu
1986 – Risen Christ was displayed University of Ibadan but was torched as a result of a political-religious tensions
Enwonwu's work is displayed in the National Gallery of Modern Art, Lagos
His works can also be viewed at the Virtual Museum of Modern Nigerian Art
1944 - Shell Petroleum Scholarship to study in the United Kingdom
1954- National Merit Award for academic and intellectual attainment in Nigeria
1958 - Commonwealth Certificate in London for contributions to art by the Royal Institute of Art
1958 - Member of the Order of the British Empire
1971 - Officer of the National Order of the Republic in Senegal
1980 - National Order of Merit in Nigeria for contributions to art in Nigeria
Benjamin Charles Harper (amụrụ n'October 28, 1969) bụ ónyé America na-agụ egwu na ónyé na-ede egwu na onye nwèrè ọtụtụ ngwá egwu
Harper na-akpọ ngwakọta nke blues, folk, mkpụrụ obi, reggae, na egwu rock ma mara ya maka nkà egwu egwu ya, olu, arụmọrụ dị ndụ, na ime ihe
O weputara abọm iri na abụọ, nke ka ukwuu site na Virgin Records, ma gaa mba ụwa

Harper bụ ónyé mmeri Grammy Award ugboro atọ na onye a họpụtara ugboro asaa, yana onyinye màkà Best Pop Instrumental Performance na Best Traditional Soul Gospel Album na 2004 na Best Blues Album na 2013
Na mmemme nké iri anọ nke Blues Music Awards, a kpọrọ egwu Harper na Charlie Musselwhite, 'No Mercy in This Land', bụ Song of the Year
A mụrụ Harper na Pomona, California
Nna ya nwụrụ anwụ, Leonard Harper, bụ ónyé Africa-America na Cherokee, nne ya, Ellen Harper Verdries (née Chase), bụ onye Juu
Nne nne ya bụ onye Juu Russia-Lithuania
Nne na nna ya gbara alụkwaghịm mgbè ọ dị afọ ise, ya na ezinụlọ nne ya tolitere
Harper nwere ụmụnne abụọ, Joel na Peter Harper
Harper malitere ịkpọ ụbọ akwara mgbe ọ bụ nwatakịrị

Ụlọ ahịa egwu nne ya, Folk Music Center and Museum, tọrọ ntọala nke ọdịnala na blues màkà ónyé na-ese ihe, nke ndị na-akwado ya Leonard Cohen, Taj Mahal, John Darnielle, na David Lindley na ihe William Shakespeare na Robert Frost kwuru mgbe mgbe site n'aka nna nna ya 5
Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, Harper gbara egwu mbụ ya
N'ime afọ 1980, n'oge ọ nọ n'afọ iri na ụma, Harper malitere ịkpọ slide guitar, na-eṅomi ụdị Robert Johnson
Harper nụchara ụdị ya, na-ewere Weissenborn slide guitar 11 Harper gbapụrụ n'Alaeze Ukwu Inland mgbè Taj Mahal kpọrọ ya ka ya na onye na-ese ihe na-eme njem
Ha dekọrọ abọm Taj Mahal bụ Follow the Drinking Gourd, nke e wepụtara na Nọvemba 1990, wee gaa Hawaii

Ben Jay Crossman bụ onye a mụrụ na Britain na South Africa nke a zụlitere n'ụdị ihe osise n'okporo ámá, onye na-ese ihe, onye na-ese ihe osise, onye na na-ese foto, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na onye nduzi, nke a maara maka mmekọrịta ya na Roger Ballen na Die Antwoord
N'agbata afọ 2010 na afọ 2015, Crossman sere ihe osise ya n'okporo ámá n'okpuru aha nwa okorobịa aha ya bụ Veronika
N'agbata afọ 2010 na afọ 2012, Crossman mere ihe nkiri ma wepụta 'The Streets of Fietas'

Usoro mkpirikpi nke akụkụ atọ ahụ na-agbaso ndụ nke ndị na-enye aka ma na-emetụta usoro ọjọọ nke ịda ogbenye, mpụ na iji ọgwụ ọjọọ eme ihe na Fiestaas, otu n'ime mpaghara ndị kasị daa ogbenye na Johannesburg
N'afọ 2013, Crossman mere ihe nkiri ma duzie vidiyo egwu maka Van Coke Kartel, na-egosi Jack Parow

Na-arụkọ ọrụ na Roger Ballen na ọrụ nka ya ọtụtụ afọ na ogige ndị ogbenye nke South Africa, Crossman duziri, mee ihe nkiri ma dezie Roger Ballen's Asylum of the Birds (2014) na Roger Ballens's Outland (2015)
N'agbata afọ 2009 na 2016, Crossman so Die Antwoord rụọ ọrụ ma soro ya mee njem dị ka onye na-ahụ maka nka, onye na-ese foto na onye na-eme vidio
Ben Passmore (amụrụ n'afọ 1983) bụ onye America na-ese ihe nkiri na onye na-ese ihe osise ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Great Barrington, Massachusetts, Passmore gara ụlọ akwụkwọ nka na Savannah College of Art and Design ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ gbasara ihe nkiri na obere ihe atụ
Ọrụ Passmore, site na fantastical na autobiographical, nwere nkọwa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ikike ndị ọcha, mba United States, egwuregwu, na ahụmịhe nke ndị isi ojii America
Ọ bụ onye na-enyekarị aka na mbipụta ihe nkiri The Nib Akwụkwọ ya, Your Black Friend, bụ nke e bipụtara n'onwe ya na 2016 wee bụrụ nke Silver Sprocket bipụtara na 2018
Akwụkwọ a bụ nchịkọta nke obere vignettes na-enye ahụmịhe nke nwoke ojii n'ụwa nke ndị ọcha
Enyi ojii gị sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ Black Skin, White Masks, akwụkwọ Frantz Fanon nke 1952 banyere mmetụta nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
E jiriwo akwụkwọ a tụnyere Jimbo comic strip nke Gary Panter dere

Akwụkwọ Passmore meriri ihe nrite 2017 Ignatz Award for Outstanding Comic, natara nhọpụta Eisner Award n'afọ ahụ maka Best Single-Issue, ma gosipụta ya na ndepụta NPR nke 100 ọkacha mmasị comics na akwụkwọ akụkọ
E meela ọrụ ahụ ka ọ bụrụ obere ihe nkiri
Benjamin Chukwukelo Uzoh (amụrụ ya na Machị 18, 1988) bụ onye Naijiria-Amerịka ọkachamara na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba maka Marinos nke Venezuelan SuperLiga
Ọ na-egwuri egwu na mba ụwa maka Naịjirịa
Na-eguzo na 6 ft 3 (191 ), Uzoh agbaala bọọlụ NBA na New Jersey Nets na Toronto Raptors
Uzoh gbara bọọlụ na Tulsa Golden Hurricane n'ime afọ anọ ọ rụrụ ọrụ basketball na kọleji
Uzoh bụ naanị onye egwuregwu n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ka etinyere n'isi 10 n'etiti isi, nkwụghachi, enyemaka, izu ohi na ngọngọ
Ọ bụ onye nnata oge niile-Conference USA gụnyere nhọrọ ya na ndị otu mbụ ya n'afọ agadi ya
Ọ malitere na egwuregwu nke otu narị na iri anọ n'ime egwuregwu nke otu narị na iri anọ na otu na ọrụ kọleji ya
N'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 2010, Uzoh nwetara Asọmpi ọkpụkpọ òkù na otu egwuregwu nke atọ nke Portsmouth
Mgbe ọ na-agaghị na NBA Draft nke afọ 2010, Uzoh bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkwekọrịta na New Jersey Nets nke National Basketball Association
Na Jenụwarị 5, 2011, e nyere Uzoh nkwekọrịta iji kpọọ afọ fọdụrụ na New Jersey
E kenyere ya ọrụ na Springfield Armor nke NBA D-League, n'oge ọnwa Machị 2011
N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2011, ọ bịnyere aka na nkwekọrịta otu afọ na Lokomotiv Kuban nke Russian League, mana a tọhapụrụ ya mgbe ọ gbasịrị naanị egwuregwu abụọ
Na Machị 27, 2012, ọ bịnyere aka na nkwekọrịta ụbọchị nke iri na Toronto Raptors na National Basketball Association
N'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2012, ndị Raptors kwupụtara na ha zụrụ Ben Uzoh maka oge fọdụrụ na 2011-2012
O dekọrọ okpukpu atọ na Eprel 26, megide Nets, nke mbụ site na Raptor n'ime afọ iri na otu
Uzoh sonyeere Denver Nuggets maka ogige ọzụzụ ha n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2012, mana o tinyeghị na ndepụta ikpeazụ nke otu ahụ
Ndị otu D-League bụ Rio Grande Valley Vipers nwetara ya
Agbanyeghị, na Nọvemba 5, 2012, e rere Uzoh na Armor maka Tim Ohlbrecht
N'October 31, 2013, ndị Tulsa 66ers nwetara Uzoh na azụmaahịa metụtara Iowa Energy na Springfield Armor
Na Jenụwarị 22, 2014, a zụrụ ya na Canton Charge
Na Machị 21, 2014, Charge hapụrụ ya n'ihi mmerụ ahụ na-akwụsị oge
Ben Uzoh gara Naijiria n'afọ 2015 ebe ọ bịanyere aka na ya ka ọ gbaa ndị Lagos Islanders egwu
Na Machị 12, 2017, Uzoh bịnyere aka na klọb Belgian Okapi Aalstar maka oge fọdụrụ n'afọ 2016 na 1917
Na Febụwarị 10, 2018, ọ bịnyere aka na Caballeros de Culiacan nke CIBACOPA league na obodo Mexico
Na Nọvemba 24, 2019, Uzoh bịnyere aka na otu egwuregwu Paris Basketball nke LNB Pro B
Na Jenụwarị 20, 2020, Paris Basketball na Uzoh jikọrọ aka kpebie ịghara ịga n'ihu maka mmekorita ha
N'ọnwa Eprel 2021, Uzoh bịanyere aka na ndị otu Naijiria Rivers Hoopers ka ha gbaa bọọlụ n'oge izizi nke Basketball Africa League (BAL)
Ọ ghọkwara onye mbụ bụbu onye egwuregwu NBA na-egwu na asọmpi ọhụrụ ahụ
A kpochapụrụ ndị Hoopers na oge oge mgbe ha nwụsịrị abụọ na otu mmeri, na Uzoh na-ebute isi otu 147 n'otu egwuregwu
Na Septemba 2021, Uzoh nọ na aha ndị otu South Africa Cape Town Tigers wee nyere ndị otu ahụ aka imeri asọmpi mba mbụ ha
O dekọrọ akara 22, 5 rebounds na 5 assists na egwuregwu mmeri megide Jozi Nuggets
Na Julaị 4, 2022, ọ bịnyere aka na Marinos nke Venezuelan SuperLiga
Uzoh agbaala bọọlụ maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Naịjirịa n'afọ 2013, 2015, na 2017 FIBA Men's African Championships
Ọ bụkwa onye otu egwuregwu Naijiria nke sonyere na Rio 2016 Olympic Games

Benard Nkanjo (amụrụ na Septemba 28, 1970) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
A mụrụ ya na mpaghara Highfield nke Harare, Nkanjo ga-eleta onye ikwu ya Garrison Machinjili mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
Machinjili bụ onye na-akpụ ihe, Nkanjo mụụrụ ihe na nke ya ruo afọ atọ tupu ọ gawa ịrụ ọrụ n'onwe ya
Ugbu a, ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Chitungwiza
Nkume Nkanjo họọrọ maka ịkpụ ihe bụ serpentinite
Benard Ifeanyi Odoh (amụrụ 5 Ọgọst 1975) bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị obodo Naijirịa na prọfesọ gbasara mmụta ala na Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe, Awka
O si na Ezza North Local Government Area na Ebonyi State (Nigeria)
Odoh bu onye nkuzi na Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe tinyere ulo akwukwo ndi ozo
Ọ bụkwa onye isi ndị otu pati APC n’Ebonyi Steeti
Ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ nke State na Ebonyi State wee hapụ ọrụ site na arụkwaghịm

Asụsụ Bench bụkwa asụsụ Northern Omotic nke 'Gimojan' subgroup, nke ihe dị ka mmadụ 174,000 na-asụ (na 1998) na mpaghara Bench Maji nke Southern Nations, Nationalities, na Peoples Region, na ndịda Etiopia, gburugburu obodo Mizan Teferi na Shewa Gimira
N'akwụkwọ edemede nke afọ 2006, Christian Rapold kọwara ụdị Bench atọ (Benchnon, Shenon, na Mernon) dị ka 'mutually comprensiblevarieties of one and the same language'
Bench bụ asụsụ nna nna nke ndị Bench
Mana n'ụzọ dị iche na ọtụtụ asụsụ ndị ọzọ dị n'Africa, Bench nwere ụdaume retroflex
Asụsụ ahụ dịkwa ịrịba ama n'ihi na o nwere ụda ụda ụda isii, otu n'ime asụsụ ole na ole n'ụwa nwere ọtụtụ
Bench nwere ụdị a na-afụ ụfụ nke ndị ọkà okwu nwoke na-eji, nke na-enye ohere nkwurịta okwu n'ebe dị anya karịa Bench a na-ekwu
Enwere ike ịmepụta ụda ahụ site na iji egbugbere ọnụ ma ọ bụ mee ya site na oghere e ji aka abụọ mepụta
Tụkwasị na nke a, enwere ike ịkọwa ụdị asụsụ a site na krar nwere eriri ise
Mkpụrụ ụdaume nke Bench bụ //i e a o u/ e a o u/
E nwere ụda ụda isii ụda ọkwa ise (nke nọmba 1 ruo 5 n'akwụkwọ, ebe 1 bụ nke kachasị ala) na otu ụda na-arị elu 23 /ń/
A na-ahụ ụda kachasị elu mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka ụda dị elu nke 45 [[[]
Na ụdaume o, ha bụ /ő ó ó ó ǒ/
Ihe ndị a niile nwekwara ike ịpụt/a/ palatalized, mana naanị tupu /a/, na-atụ aro nyocha ọzọ nke ụdaume nke isii //ja//
A na-akọ na ụdaume lab/i/alized maka [p, b, s, ɡ,] na [ʔ], mana ọnọdụ ụdaume ha edoghị anya; ha na-apụta naanị mgbe /i/ gasịrị
Maka /p/honeme /p/ mmezu nke [pʰ] na [f] dị n'efu; //j// nwere allophone [w] n'ihu ụdaume azụ
Ọdịdị mkpụrụedemede bụ (C)V(C)(C) + ụda ma ọ bụ (C' N (C), ebe C na-anọchite anya ụdaume ọ bụla, V ụdaume ọ bụ, N ọ bụla imi, na brackets ihe nhọrọ

CC clus/t/ers /n/were ihe na-aga n'ihu na-esote plosive, fricative, ma ọ bụ affricate; na CCC clusters, ụdaume mbụ ga-abụ otu n/k/e /r/ /j/ /m/ /p/ ma ọ bụ //pʼ//, nke abụọ ma ọ bụ/ ma ọ bụrụ /n/ ma ọ bụghị fricative na-enweghị olu, na nke atọ /t/ ma ọ dị ka /k/
Bende bụ ama ukwu no na Afrịka ala ana-kpo Naigeria
Bende nwekarike na-ezo aka

Benedict Okey Oramah (amụrụ 24 Julaị 1961) bụ onye akụ na ụba Naijiria na onye ọchụnta ego, bụrụkwa onye isi oche na onye isi oche nke Otu ndị isi oche African Export – Import Bank (Afreximbank), kemgbe 2015
O bipụtala akwụkwọ,Foundations of Structured Trade Finance, ma dee ihe karịrị akụkọ iri atọ na ise gbasara ọtụtụ okwu gbasara akụ na ụba Africa, azụmahịa na azụmahịa
A mụrụ Oramah n'ezinaụlọ ndị okenye si Nnokwa, na obodo Igbo, ndịda-ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria
Nna ya ‘Chief’ Lazarọs A
Oramah bụ onye otu eze ọdịnala obodo
Oramah jide MSc
na PhD
ogo na agricultural Economics, nwetara na 1987 na 1991 n'otu n'otu, na Mahadum nke Obafemi Awolowo, Ile-Ife, Naijiria
Ọ nwetara nzere BSc
ogo, nakwa na akụnụba ọrụ ugbo, site na Mahadum Ibadan, Naijiria, na 1983
O nwere asambodo nchịkwa dị elu na Mahadum Columbia
Na 22 Julaị 2018, Mahadum Adeleke, Naijiria nyere ya Prọfesọ nke Azụmahịa na ego mba ụwa mma
Oramah sonyeere Afreximbank dị ka Chief Analyst na 1994 wee kwalite ya n'ọkwa nke Onye isi nchịkwa, Atụmatụ na mmepe azụmahịa na 2007
Tupu ịbanye na Afreximbank, ọ bụ onye enyemaka nyocha na Nigerian Export-Import Bank site na 1992
Ọ bụbu onye isi oche onye isi oche na-ahụ maka mmepe azụmahịa na ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ site na (October 2008 - Septemba 2015)
Ọ lụrụ di ma mụta ụmụ atọ
Benedict Peters bụ onye Naijiria nwere ọtụtụ ijeri ego nke guzobere Aiteo Group, ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta mmanụ kacha ukwuu na Naijiria
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2014, o nwere atụmatụ ego ruru ijeri US $ 27 ijeri
Ventures Africa họpụtara ya dị ka onye nke iri na asaa kacha baa ọgaranya n'Africa na onye nke asaa kacha baa uru na Naịjirịa
Peters si Onicha Oloma na Delta steeti ma amụọ ya na Abakaliki, Ebonyi Steeti n'aka onye na-echekwa ego na onye na-elekọta ụlọ
Ọ gara Ekulu Primary School, Enugu na Federal Government College Enugu, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ gara Mahadum Benin, ebe ọ nwetara nzere Bachelor of Science (BSc) Hons na Geography na Town Planning

Peters malitere ọrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ na gas na mbido afọ 1990, na-arụkọ ọrụ na ndị guzobere Ocean and Oil, ụlọ ọrụ a maara ugbu a dị ka Oando Nigeria Plc, Adewale Tinubu, Mofe Boyo na Onajite Okoloko
Ọ kwagara na MRS Oil Nigeria PLC dị ka onye isi nchịkwa otu, na-agwụ dị ka onye nchịkwa ya, tupu ọ pụọ na 1999 iji guzobe Sigmund Communecci
Na Febụwarị 2008, Peters guzobere otu Aiteo (Aiteo Eastern Exploration and Production Company Limited), ụlọ ọrụ nọchiri Sigmund Communecci
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere otu n'ime nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ tankị mmanụ na Naịjirịa nwere ụlọ ọrụ karịrị nde lita 250 n'ihe karịrị 100,000 square mita nke ala
Ọ nwekwara ma na-arụ ọrụ Abonnema Storage Terminal
N'afọ 2014, Aiteo nwetara òkè na-achịkwa Oil Mining Lease (OML) 29 na Nembe Creek Trunk Line (NCTL) na Eastern Niger Delta site na Royal Dutch Shell Plc
Dị ka Wood Mackenzie si kwuo, 'OML 29 bụ nnukwu blọk dị na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Niger Delta
O nwere oghere mmanụ na gas iri na otu
' 'OML 29 nke dị square kilomita 983 n'ụsọ osimiri na mpaghara Niger Delta, bụ ebe nchọpụta azụmahịa mbụ nke Naịjirịa', na 1956 na Oloibiri Oilfield
Peters na-agbanwekwa ngwa ngwa site na ntọala ya nke Aiteo Power, nke ọ bụ onyeisi oche ya

Ọ na-eduga Aiteo Consortium na EMA Consortium nke meriri n'ọkwa dị iche iche iji nweta ụlọ ọrụ atọ na-emepụta ike ma na-akwadebe iwu ụlọ nrụpụta 100,000 barrel na Warri jupụtara na mmanụ na Delta State
N'ọnwa Eprel 2017, Aiteo Group kwupụtara ịbịanye aka na nkwekọrịta mmekọrịta afọ ise na Nigeria Football Federation nke ruru N29b
N'ikike nke onye mmekọ kachasị mma nke NFF, nkwado Aiteo kwadoro ụgwọ ọrụ nke onye isi Super Eagles Gernot Rohr na ndị nkuzi nke ndị otu mba NFF niile

Peters gwara ndị mgbasa ozi na 'Aiteo Group nwere mmasị n'ịchịkwa dịka ndị Naijiria nwere mmasị n'ịgba bọọlụ, yabụ anyị nwere obi ụtọ na anyị na NFF na ndị nkuzi ya na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ iji nweta ihe mgbaru ọsọ nke Naijiria bara ọgaranya karị'

N'August 5, 2014 na Washington DC, Peters bụ otu n'ime mmadụ anọ natara Marquee Award for Global Business Excellence na nri abalị Africa-US Leadership Awards, nke African Energy Association kwadoro, 'otu nzukọ na-enweghị uru nke ndị na-ekwu okwu nwere ahụmahụ, ndị ndụmọdụ na ndị na-akwado ike dị elu'

Leadership, akwụkwọ akụkọ mba Abuja, nke dị na Nigeria, kpọrọ ya 'Leadership CEO of the Year 2014' maka ịkwado nkwekọrịta ọdịnaya mpaghara na-eme ka ikike ka ukwuu iji jikwaa akụ mmanụ na mba ya, Nigeria
Na 18 Jenụwarị 2015, e nyere Peters Dr
Martin Luther King Jr
Legacy Awards na 'Economic Empowerment' category na ihe omume emere na Washington, DC's Willard Hotel
E depụtara Benedict Peters n'etiti ndị Naijiria 50 kachasị emetụta na 2017 site na BusinessDay Newspaper na Naijiria
Na June 2018, The Guardian (Nigeria) kpọkwara ya aha dị ka onye isi mmanụ na gas nke afọ
Nwoke nke Business Day nke afọ 2019
Peters lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ anọ
N'afọ 2017, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Naịjirịa dị na Abuja nyere iwu ka e bulie iwu mkpochapụ ngwa ngwa na ihe onwunwe Peters na UK
Ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ Economic and Financial Crimes Commission EFCC nwetara Iwu Nnapụta Nkwụsị
Ụlọ ikpe ahụ boro EFCC ebubo 'nnukwu nkwupụta na-ezighị ezi, izochi na nkwupụta na nke eziokwu'

E boro Benedict Peters ebubo na Pandora Papers na-agbapụta na ọ na-enye onye ọrụ mmanụ Naijiria (Diezani Alison-Madueke) aka azụ na ụlọ ndị dị oké ọnụ ahịa na mba ofesi iji nweta ihu ọma na Ministri Naijiria nke Petroleum Resources
Benedict agọnahụla ebubo ahụ
Benedict Wallet Vilakazi (ụbọchị 16 ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 1906 - ụbọchị 26 ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1947) bụ onye edemede South Africa, onye sitere n'ezinụlọ eze Zulu, na onye dere uri Romantic n'asụsụ Zulu
Vilakazi bụkwa prọfesọ na Mahadum Witwatersrand, ebe ọ ghọrọ onye isi ojii South Africa mbụ kụziiri ndị ọcha South Africa klas Mahadum
N'afọ 1946, Vilakazi ghọkwara onye isi ojii South Africa mbụ natara PhD
Okporo ámá Vilakazi dị na Soweto, nke abara aha ya bu onye na-ede uri, bu ebe a ma ama dika okporo ebe Nelson Mandela na Archbishop Desmond Tutu biri otu mgbe

A mụrụ Benedict Vilakazi Bambatha kaMshini n'afọ 1906 na obodo Groutville Mission Station dị nso na KwaDukuza, Natal (nke bụ South Afrịka ugbu a), nwa nke ise nke ndị Roman Katọlik Mshini ka Makhwatha na Leah Hlongwane

Nne ya, Oriakụ Leah Hlongwane Vilakazi, bụ nwa nwanyị Bangile, onye bụ nwanne nwanyị nke Queen Ngqambuza, nwunye Eze Cetshwayo, yana nwanne nwanyị nke Right Reverend J Mdelwa Hlongwane ka Mnyaziwezulu, nwa nwoke Chief Matiwane
Vilakazi kewara ntolite ya n'etiti ịzụ ehi ezinụlọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ ozi ala ọzọ ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ 10, mgbe ọ gafere na St
Francis College na Mariannhill, ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Roman Katọlik nke Mariannhillers guzobere
N'ebe a ka e mere ya baptizim na aha 'Benedict Wallet,' ọ bụ ezie na nne ya siri ọnwụ na ọ nọgidere na-akpọ aha nna Vilakazi
Ọ nwetara asambodo nkuzi n'afọ 1923 wee kụzie na Mariannhill ma mesịa na seminarị dị na
Ixopo
N'afọ 1933, Vilakazi wepụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya Nje nempela ('N'ezie na Ezi'), otu n'ime ọrụ mbụ nke akụkọ ifo Zulu iji dozie isiokwu nke oge a
Ọ sochiri ya n'afọ 1935 na akwụkwọ akụkọ Noma nini yana nchịkọta uri Inkondlo kaZulu, mbipụta mbụ nke uri Zulu nke Europe

Uri ya, nke amaokwu nke European Romantics nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu, webatara isiokwu edemede yana ma rhyme na mita uri nke a na-amaghị na akwụkwọ Zulu, ka ọ na-ejikọta ha na ihe ndị sitere na ọdịnala Izibongo nke abụ otuto
N'inweta BA
na Mahadum nke South Africa n'afọ 1934, Vilakazi malitere ịrụ ọrụ na ngalaba ọmụmụ Bantu na Mahadụ nke Witwatersrand n'afọ 1936 n'okpuru onye ọkà mmụta asụsụ C
Doke, onye ya na ya mepụtara akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu Zulu-English
Ọnọdụ nkuzi Vilakazi mere ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ojii South Africa mbụ kụziiri ndị ọcha South Africa na mahadum
Akwụkwọ akụkọ Vilakazi mechara gaa n'ihu na-enyocha ndụ kwa ụbọchị na omenala ọdịnala Zulu, dị ka UDingiswayo kaJob (1939) na Nje nempela (1944), nke bụ akụkọ nke ezinụlọ Zulu nwere ọtụtụ nwanyị
Uri ya ghọrọwanye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'oge ndụ ya, na-eme ihe nkiri banyere mmegbu na ịkpa ókè ọ bụghị naanị megide ndị Zulu, kamakwa megide ndị isi ojii ndị ọzọ nke South Africa
A makwaara Vilakazi maka ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ya gbasara ọdịnala ọnụ na asụsụ Zulu na Xhosa, nke mere ka o nweta PhD mbụ a ga-enye onye isi ojii South Africa na ụbọchị16 ọnwa Maachị nke afọ 1946
Otu afọ mgbe ọ natasịrị nzere doctorate ya, Benedict Wallet Vilakazi nwụrụ na Johannesburg site na meningitis
A nabatara ma akwụkwọ akụkọ ya na uri ya nke ọma n'oge ndụ ya ma ka dị otú ahụ taa

N'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2016, e nyere Dr Benedict Wallet Vilakazi Order of Ikhamanga - Gold (OIG) maka 'onyinye pụrụ iche o nyere n'ọhịa akwụkwọ n'asụsụ ụmụ amaala na nchekwa nke ọdịbendị isiZulu'
Vilakazi Street dị na Soweto bụ naanị okporo ámá dị n'ụwa ebe ndị Nobel Laureate abụọ biri
Ọ bụ ebe Nelson Mandela na Desmond Tutu biri ma gụọ ya aha iji sọpụrụ Vilakazi
Dr BW
Vilakazi Secondary School na Zola 3, a gụrụ Soweto aha Dr Vilakazi nwụrụ anwụ iji cheta ihe nketa ya
E bipụtara nsụgharị edemede nke RM
Mfeka na Peggy Rutherfoord nke uri Benedict Vilakazi Umamina na anthology African Voices An Anthology of Native African Writing
Benedicta nwere ike izo aka ṅa
Benedicta Ajudua (bu onye a mụrụ n'ụbọchị 10 n'ọnwa Julaị 1975) bụ onye oso ọsọ Naijiria nke mara nma na otu narị mita
Ọ gbachara nke asaa na mita anọ x 400 n'egwuregwu Olimpik Summer 2000 ya na ndị otu egwuregwu Glory Alozie, Mercy Nku na Mary Onyali
Benedicta Gafah (amụrụ na 1 Septemba 1992) bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
E gosipụtara ya na ihe nkiri Ghallywood na Kumawood nke gụnyere 'Mirror Girl', 'Azonto Ghost' na 'April Fool'
Ọ bụ onye bịanyere aka na Zylofon Media
Benedicta malitere inye ndị nọ ná mkpa na ndị inyom di ha nwụrụ nke King Jesus Orphanage Home onyinye n'afọ 2014
Ọ na-eburu ya gaa n'okporo ámá iji kesaa nri, uwe na ihe ndị ọzọ kwa ọnwa Disemba ọ bụla nye ụmụaka nọ n'okporo ámá
Ọ na-elekọta Gafah Foundation ugbu a iji nyere ndị nọ ná mkpa aka
Benedicta Maria van Minnen (amụrụ na 10 Disemba 1970) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na onye otu Democratic Alliance
Ọ bụ onye otu National Assembly kemgbe 22 Mee 2019
N'oge gara aga, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye kansụl na Cape Town
Van Minnen gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Cape Town
N'afọ 1991, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya ụmụ akwụkwọ mahadum (SRC)
Onye otu Democratic Alliance, a họpụtara ya na mbụ dị ka onye kansụl mpaghara maka ngalaba 15 na Cape Town na ntuli aka ime obodo nke afọ 2011
A họpụtara onye otu Kọmitii Mayoral maka ahụike, Lungiswa James, ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu nke mba na ntuli aka nke afọ 2014, nke mere ka ọnọdụ ahụ bụrụ ihe efu
N'ihi ya, onye isi obodo Patricia de Lille họpụtara Van Minnen n'ọkwa ahụ
De Lille kpọgara ya na ụlọ ọrụ na Jenụwarị 2015
A họpụtara Van Minnen dị ka onye kansụl PR na ntuli aka ime obodo nke Ọgọst 2016
De Lille debere ya na kọmitii onye isi obodo ruo Jenụwarị 2017
Tupu ntuli aka nke 8 Mee 2019, Van Minnen nọ n'ọnọdụ nke abụọ na ndepụta nke DA nke Western Cape nke ndị na-azọ ọkwa maka National Assembly
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu mgbe ntuli aka ahụ gasịrị, a ṅụrụ ya iyi na 22 Mee 2019
Ọ ghọrọ onye otu kọmitii na 27 June 2019
Van Minnen ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya Kọmitii maka Nnyocha nke ngalaba 194 na 21 June 2021
