Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere
Beni Lar a mụrụ na (August 12, 1967) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke People's Democratic Party si Plateau State, Nigeria
Ọ bụ onye otu ụlọ omebe iwu etiti Naijiria sitere na Langtang North, Langtang South Federal Constituency nke Plateau State
Ebu ụzọ họpụta ya n'ụlọ n'afọ 2007 ma n'afọ 2019 a họpụtara ya ọzọ n'ụlọomeiwu nke o anọ
Ọ bụ ada Solomon Lar, onye bụbu Gọvanọ Plateau steeti na Prof
Mary Lar
Ọ sịrị,
“Nna m kụziiri m na ọ dịghị ihe dị iche n'etiti nwoke na nwanyị (nwa)
Ọ kụziiri m ka m na-arụsi ọrụ ike; ya mere, a zụrụ m ọzụzụ dị ka onye ọka iwu dị ka ya'
Ọ gwala ndị Naijiria ka ha ghara ichefu ihe nketa nna ya nke ịdị n'otu, udo na ịhụnanya, na-agbakwụnye, 'Nke a bụ ihe anyị kwesịrị iji kwalite mba a'
Na 2007, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Ụlọ Ndị Nnọchiteanya
N'afọ 2008, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke Ụlọ Nnọchiteanya na ihe gbasara ụmụ nwanyị
dị ka mge July 2014, ọ na-anọchite anya mpaghara Langtang North na South
Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke kọmitii nke Ụlọ Nnọchiteanya Maka Ihe Ndị Ruuru Mmadụ
Ọ kwadoro ego mberede maka National Agency for the Prohibition of Trafficking in Persons (NAPTIP), mụbara ntaramahụhụ maka mmetọ ụmụaka na ịmepụta Ụlọ Ọrụ Nchebe na Nchekwa Ụmụaka nke Mba anyi
Na 2010, o sonyere na GlobalPOWER® Women Network in Africa Ndị Omeiwu Umụ Nwanyị na ndị Minista jikọrọ ọnụ Megidere ọrịa HIV/AIDS
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụnwaanyị iri na otu a họpụtara n'afọ 2007 bụ ndị a họpụtara ọzọ n'afọ 2011 mgbe ụlọomeiwu nta fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ 95% nwoke

Ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ a họpụtara gụnyere Mulikat Adeola-Akande, Abike Dabiri, Nkiru Onyeagocha, Uche Ekwunife, Nnena Elendu-Ukeje, Olajumoke Okoya-Thomas, Juliet Akano, Khadija Bukar Abba-Ibrahim, Elizabeth Ogbaga na Peace Uzoamaka Nnaji
Ka afọ 2013 mbuso agha ndị na-achị ehi na Langtang South gburu mmadụ iri asaa, ọ gwara gọọmentị etiti Naijiria ka ha kwalite ọnọdụ okporo ụzọ obodo, ka o wee mee ka ndị ọrụ nchekwa bịarute n'oge
Ọ kpọkukwara ka e kee ebe ndị Fulani na-achị ehi na-ata nri, sị
“Ndị niile na-eri anụ kwesịrị inwe nchebara echiche maka gba-ahapụ ala ha maka isi iyi anụ ahụ
Naijirịa bu ala a gọziri gọziri ma nwere ala ga-ezuru onye ọ bụla, ndị Naijiria kwesịrị ime amara nke ọma ịmata na anụ ahụ onye na-achị ehi na-enye bụ maka obodo'

Na May 2014, o duuru otu ndị ngagharị iwe sitere na Nigerians United Against Terrorism, yi uwe T-shirt 'nke e dere '#ReleaseOurGirls,' na-egosi nkwado ya na ndị agha Naijiria na mbọ ha na-agbapụta ndị ụmụ agbọghọ Chibok a tọọrọ Otu akwụkwọ akụkọ kwuru na ụfọdụ ndị bịara mgbakọ ahụ nwetara ego gọọmenti
E jirila Lar mee ihe atụ nye ụmụnwaanyị siri ike nọ n’ọchịchị, n’agbanyeghị na ụfọdụ na-arụ ụka na ọ bụ n’ihi ihe ùgwù o nwere dị ka onye nketa nna ya mere o ji nye ya ikike a
Ọ kwadoro ka ụmụ nwanyị na-ekere òkè n'ọchịchị ma bụrụ akụkụ nke usoro ọhụrụ nke ụmụ nwanyị ọtụtụ na-achị n'ọchịchị karịa mgbe tupu na-eso Nigeria nwesịrị nnwere onwe na 1914

Ọ kwadowo maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị dịka afọ nke ụmụ nwanyị ịlụ di na nwunye, ikike ime ime, ma nwee aka na akwụkwọ iwu Mwepụ ụdị ịkpa ókè megide ụmụ nwanyị na Naijiria na iwu okwu ndị ọzọ, na Iwu Gender and Equal Opportunities Bill
N'afọ 2017 Hon
Beni Lar kwuru okwu dị ka onye isi oche maka Kọmitii Sayensị na Nkà na ụzụ ma gbaa ume maka ọganihu nke ike na-adịgide adịgide, nke a pụrụ ịdabere na ya maka Nigeria
Ọ kwadokwara maka nhọrọ maka ụmụ akwụkwọ ịhọrọ ụdị okpukpe ha ga-achọ ịmụta banyere ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, kama inwe ihe akara aka chọrọ
O wetara nke a n'ihu ụlọ ahụ ma nyefee ya n'akụkụ ụfọdụ n'ihi na ọ bụ n'ihi na Naijiria bụ mba ụwa, okpukperechi na ụkpụrụ obodo kwesịrị ikewapụ
N'afọ 2019, Lar gbara ọsọ maka ntuli aka ụlọ ma merie
'Anyị aghaghị ikwu ihe ga-eme ka obodo anyi too'

Benin City bụ ama ukwu no na Afrịka ala ana-kpo Naigeria
Benin City bụ ịsị óche Ȯra Edo (Edo State), nwéré madu ha sị rùrù, 1,450,000 (2015; e mere atụmatụ ịbụ)
Benin City National Museum bụ ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie nke mba dị na Benin City, Nigeria, nke dị n'etiti obodo na King's Square
Ihe ngosi nka ahụ nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke ihe ndị metụtara Alaeze Ukwu Benin dị ka terracotta, ihe oyiyi ọla nchara na iberibe ígwè
O nwekwara nka oge ochie metụtara oge mbụ
Beningbrough (1791-1815) bụ ịnyịnya na-agba ọsọ nke Britain na nna a maara nke ọma maka mmeri St Leger Stakes na 1794
N'ọrụ ịgba ọsọ nke were site na Mee 1794 ruo Ọgọst 1797 ọ meriri agbụrụ iri na asatọ ya
Mgbe e meriri ya na mbụ ya, ọ meriri agbụrụ anọ fọdụrụnụ dị ka onye dị afọ atọ, gụnyere St Leger na Gold Cup na Doncaster Racecourse na Septemba
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara obere mkpọsa ma ọ bụ ugboro atọ na 1795 na otu ugboro na 1796
Mgbe ahụ, ọ lara ezumike nká na stud ebe ọ ghọrọ onye na-azụlite ịnyịnya na-aga nke ọma n'ịbụ nna na nwa nke ọtụtụ ndị mmeri dị mkpa
Beningbrough bụ ịnyịnya 'nke buru ibu' nke John Hutchinson nke Shipton, North Yorkshire zụlitere, nwe ya ma zụọ ya, ma gụọ ya aha obodo dị nso
Ọ bụ Eze Fergus mụrụ ya, ịnyịnya na-agba ọsọ nke na-aga nke ọma nke nọ na Hutchinson's stud maka ọtụtụ ọrụ ịzụlite ya

Ewezuga Beningbrough, a maara ya nke ọma dị ka nna nke Hambletonian, onye meriri St Leger wee ghọọ onye na-azụ anụmanụ nwere mmetụta nke ụmụ ya gụnyere Voltigeur, St Simon, Count Fleet na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ na-emeri
Beningbrough bụ nke asaa n'ime ụmụ ehi iri na abụọ nke Herọd mepụtara
Na 29 Mee 1794 Benningbrough, nwanne Sandhopper pụtara nke mbụ ya na asọmpi ihe karịrị otu na ọkara kilomita na York Racecourse
Ọ malitere 6/4 ọkacha mmasị mana Prior, nwa ehi na-acha ntụ ntụ nke Gilbert Crompton, kụrụ ya n'ọnọdụ nke abụọ
Beningbrough laghachiri York maka agbụrụ abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, nke ọ meriri
O dekọrọ mmeri mbụ ya mgbe ọ na-eti ndị iro abụọ na asọmpi kilomita abụọ wee merie Eliza nke Maazị Wilson na ndị ọzọ anọ na ọkara kilomita abụọ ka e mesịrị
N'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Septemba, Beningbrough bụ otu n'ime ụmụ ehi asatọ na ụmụ nwanyị iji sọọ mpi nke iri na itoolu nke St Leger Stakes karịa kilomita abụọ na Doncaster Racecourse
N'ịbụ onye John Jackson na-agba, ọ bụ onye nke abụọ kachasị amasị na 2/1 ma merie nke Prior na Maazị Garforth's grey colt (nke e mechara kpọwa Brilliant)
N'ehihie na-esote, Beningbrough zutere ịnyịnya ndị okenye, gụnyere onye mmeri St Leger nke afọ gara aga Ninety-three na iko ọla edo anọ
Ọ malitere 1/2 ọkacha mmasị wee merie site na Maazị Webb's mare Constant
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 1795, e rere Beningbrough, ya na enyi ya Hambletonian, maka guineas 3,000 nye Sir Charles Turner nke Kirkleatham

Beningbrough apụtaghị dị ka onye dị afọ anọ ruo n'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ mgbe ọ malitere ọkacha mmasị maka nkewa nke nnukwu akpa ndebanye aha, mana ọ gwụchara nke ikpeazụ n'ime ndị ọsọ atọ n'azụ Brilliant na Bennington
Dị ka akụkọ dị na Sportsman's Pilot Beningbrough na Bennington 'meriri onwe ha' site n'ịlụ ọgụ maka ibute ụzọ n'ọsọ ahụ niile na-enyere Brilliant aka imeri ha abụọ na njedebe ikpeazụ
N'ọnwa sochirinụ, Beningbrough laghachiri n'ebe mmeri ya maka agbụrụ atọ na nzukọ Doncaster St Leger
N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Septemba, o meriri Bennington na asọmpi egwuregwu 500 guinea karịa kilomita anọ ma n'ehihie na-esote, ọ meriri Doncaster Stakes, na-eti Brilliant na Eliza
Otu ụbọchị mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gbara ọsọ ọsọ £ 100 n'usoro nke okpomọkụ kilomita abụọ, ihe nrite ahụ na-aga ịnyịnya mbụ iji merie ugboro abụọ
Beningbrough doziri asọmpi ahụ na okpomọkụ abụọ, na-emeri Brilliant n'ọnọdụ nke abụọ n'oge ọ bụla
Oge afọ ise nke Beningbrough nwere agbụrụ abụọ na York n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ
Na Satọdee 20 Ọgọstụ, ọ meriri asọmpi egwuregwu megide Maazị Wentworth's Ormond karịa kilomita anọ iji merie ihe nrite nke 500 guineas
Ụbọchị anọ ka e mesịrị, e mere ya onye kachasị amasị ya megide ndị iro abụọ maka nkewa nke nnukwu akpa ndebanye aha, mana Eliza meriri ya
Na mbido 1797, John Hutchinson zụrụ Beningbrough n'aka Sir Charles Turner
Oge ikpeazụ nke ịnyịnya ahụ bụ nke nzukọ Ọgọstụ na York
Hutchinson nwetara guinea iri ise mgbe ịnyịnya Maazị Tatton bụ Yorkshire Bite apụtaghị maka egwuregwu megide Beningbrough na 19 Ọgọst
Ụbọchị ise ka e mesịrị, Beningbrough kwụsịrị ọrụ ya na ngalaba nke Great Subscription Purse nke ọ mechara nke abụọ na Hambletonian
Beningbrough lara ezumike nká n'ọsọ iji ghọọ ịnyịnya na-azụlite na Shipton, na-eguzo na ụgwọ guineas isii na okpueze
Ka ọ na-erule 1803, mgbe ihe ịga nke ọma nke ụmụ mbụ ya n'ebe a na-agba ọsọ, ụgwọ ya arịgoola guineas iri na ọkara
N'afọ 1808 ọ kwagara na ụlọ ọrụ Maazị Dimsdale na Middleham, ebe ọ guzo na ụgwọ nke guineas iri abụọ na ise na ndị nwe ndị ga-abụ ndị enyi ya ka a chọrọ ka ha nyefee akwụkwọ edere ede
Beningbrough nọgidere na Middleham ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 7 Febụwarị 1815
E liri ya n'okpuru osisi mulberry n'ihu ụlọ Dimsdale
Ndị mmeri kachasị mma nke Beningbrough gụnyere ndị mmeri Oriana, Ashton, Briseis na Orville (nke bụkwa onye mmeri)
Otu n'ime ụmụ ya nwoke bụ Scud onye meriri Doncaster Cup ma mụọ ndị mmeri Derby Sam na Sailor
Beningbrough bụkwa onye na-eme nke ọma n'ịmụ nwa bụ nne nne nke Doctor Syntax, Variation, Reveller na The Duchess

Benita Sena Okity-Duah (amụrụ na 19 Juun, na afọ 1976) bụ onye Ghana na-emepụta ejiji, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye bụbu onye omeiwu maka mpaghara Ledzokuku na mpaghara Greater Accra
A mụrụ ya na 19 Juun, na afọ 1976 na Anloga na mpaghara Volta nke Ghana O meriri asọmpi Miss Ghana na afọ 1997 mgbe ọ dị afọ 20 dị ka nwa akwụkwọ
Ọ gara Achimota School na Accra maka agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Ọ gara n'ihu na-amụ ejiji na London School of Fashion ruo afọ anọ
Ọ laghachiri Ghana n'afọ 2003 ma kemgbe ahụ, ọ kpụrụ onwe ya niche na ụlọ ọrụ ejiji Ghana
Benita gbara arụkwaghịm dị ka onye nhazi ụmụ nwanyị nke National Democratic Congress nke mpaghara Ledzokuku na mpaghara Greater Accra
O sonyere na ntuli aka nke pati ma merie onye omeiwu nke oge ahụ bụ Nii Nortey Dua iji nọchiteanya National Democratic Congress na mpaghara ahụ
O meriri ntuli aka na 2012 iji nọchiteanya ndị Ledzokuku na ndị omeiwu nke Ghana
Ọ ghọrọ onye mbụ Miss Ghana beauty queen ka a họpụtara dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu na Ghana
Tụkwasị na nke a, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote minista na-ahụ maka mmekọahụ, ụmụaka na nchekwa ọha na eze nke Ghana site n'Epriel, na afọ 2013 ruo June 2014
Ọ bụkwa osote minista na-ahụ maka ịkụ azụ na aquaculture nke Republic of Ghana
Benita tụfuru oche ya n'aka Dr
Benard Okoe-Boye onye guzo na tiketi nke New Patriotic Party na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke afọ 2016
Benita lụrụ Steve Okity-Duah
A mụrụ ya Benita Golomeke, e chiri ya okpueze Embassy pleasure Ms Ghana na afọ 1997
Ọ bụ Onye Kraịst na onye otu The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
Benjamin Adesanya Maja Adekunle (26 Juun, na afọ 1936 na 13 Septemba, na afọ 2014) bụ onye Brigadier nke ndị agha Naijiria na onye isi agha obodo
A mụrụ Adekunle na Kaduna
Nna ya bụ nwa afọ Ogbomosho, ebe nne ya bụ onye agbụrụ Bachama
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na kọleji gọọmentị, Okene (nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Abdul Aziz Atta Memorial College, Okene, na Kogi Steeti nke oge a)
Ọ debara aha na ndị agha Naịjirịa n'afọ 1958 n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ gụsịrị ule asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ ya
Ọ gafere ule nhọpụta ndị agha ma mesịa ziga ya na Royal Military Academy Sandhurst na UK, ụlọ akwụkwọ mbido ndị agha Britain
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke abụọ na Disemba 15, na afọ 1960
Dị ka onye isi ndị agha, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Kasai Province of Congo na 1st Battalion, Queen's Own Nigeria Regiment n'oge njem udo mbụ ya na ONUC UN
N'afọ 1962, Lt
Adekunle ghọrọ Aide-de-Camp nye gọvanọ nke mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ, Sir Akanu Ibiam
N'afọ sochirinụ, dị ka Captain, e zigara ya na Congo dị ka Staff Captain (A) na Nigerian Brigade HQ na Luluabourg - n'okpuru Brigadier B
Babafemi Ogundipe
N'afọ 1964, Major Adekunle gara kọleji ndị ọrụ nchekwa na Wellington, na India
Mgbe ọ laghachiri, a họpụtara ya Adjutant General na isi ụlọ ọrụ ndị agha na Mee, na afọ 1965 iji dochie Lt
Col
Yakubu Gowon, onye na-aga n'ihu na-aga akwụkwọ na mpụga mba ahụ
Otú ọ dị, o mechara nyefee ọkwa ahụ na Lt
Col
James Pam ma zigara ya na Battalion ochie ya (1st Bn) na Enugu dị ka onye isi ụlọ ọrụ
Adekunle mechara bụrụ onye isi nke Lagos Garrison dị ka Lt
Col

Mgbe Agha Obodo Naijiria malitere na Julaị, na afọ 1967, e nyere Adekunle ọrụ iduzi ihe ndị gụnyere ndị agha ọhụrụ abụọ (7th na 8th) - iji mee mwakpo akụkọ ihe mere eme na Bonny na Bight of Benin na 26 Julaị 1968 (nke Major Isaac Adaka Boro mere)
Nke a mere mgbe gọọmentị etiti nwetara ntụkwasị obi n'ọtụtụ agbụrụ ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ dịka nsonaazụ Biafran na-aga n'etiti ọdịda anyanwụ ma nyochaa mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ
A kwalitere Adekunle ka ọ bụrụ Colonel mgbe Bonny rutere
Ndị agha nke isii (n'okpuru Major Jalo) na nke asatọ (n'ihi Major Ochefu) nke Lagos Garrison sonyere n'ọrụ iji tọhapụ Midwest mgbe mwakpo Biafran nke Ọgostu, na afọ 1967
Nke asaa (n'okpuru Major Abubakar) nọrọ n'azụ iji jide Bonny
N'ihi na Major Jalo's Unit bụ onye Lt
Col
Ngalaba nke abụọ nke Murtala Mohammed, Adekunle hapụrụ naanị 8th Battalion na Escravos
Ya mere, o mere mkpesa na HQ nke ndị agha wee mee ka ndị agha Lagos dị elu ka Brigade site na ịmepụta 31 na 32 Battalions (n'okpuru Majors Aliyu na Hamman, n'otu n'otu)
Ọdịdị a, jikọtara ya na ndị agha Lagos n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke oké osimiri, a kpọrọ ya 3 Infantry Division
Otú ọ dị, Colonel Adekunle echeghị na aha '3 Infantry Division' bụ ihe na-akpali akpali ma ọ bụ gosipụta ọdịdị nke ala pụrụ iche nke ndị ikom ya ga-alụ ọgụ
Ya mere, na-enweghị nkwado iwu site na HQ nke ndị agha, ọ gbanwere aha ya ' 3 Marine Commando (3MCDO)

' 'Black Scorpion' dị ka a bịara mara ya, bụ onye kachasị arụmụka, onye a ma ama na onye a na-akọ akụkọ ifo [aha a chọrọ] n'agha nke ịla n'iyi nke tọrọ ntọala maka nsogbu nke oge a nke Naịjirịa; ma tụba n'ime akwa mba
Benjamin 'Ụmụ nwoke Adekunle na Midwest weghara Escravos, Burutu, Urhonigbe, Owa na Aladima
Ha weghara Bomadi na Patani, Youngtown, Koko, Sapele, Ajagbodudu, Warri, Ughelli, Orerokpe, Umutu na Itagba
A kwalitere Benjamin Adekunle ka ọ bụrụ Brigadier n'afọ 1972
Mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, e nyere Adekunle ọrụ iwepụ ụgbọ mmiri Lagos nke nwere nsogbu na-adịghị ala ala nke iwepụ ngwongwo si mba ọzọ
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa a ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na 20 Ọgọst, na afọ 1974
O kwuru na nsogbu ya n'oge agha na mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị bụ ndị iro ya na ndị agha
N'ajụjụ ọnụ dị iche iche, o kwuru na a na-ekwu mgbe niile na ọ bụ ya ka a na-akọ na ọ bụ ọchịchị aka ike ruo mgbe ndị agha nwere nchegbu ime ihe banyere ya
O nwere ọtụtụ ndị na-eso ya ma ndị agha ma ọha na eze n'ozuzu ya ma bụrụ onye isi ndị agha kachasị ewu ewu n'oge agha ahụ, ma e wezụga Obasanjo, onye nọchiri ya ma jiri otu 3MC kwụsị agha ahụ
Adekunle duziri Third Marine Commando Division na nnukwu ọganihu na mkpebi siri ike nke na ndị mgbasa ozi mba ọzọ, na-achọ akụkụ mmadụ na agha Biafran, hụrụ ya dị njikere isi iyi akụkọ
Ọ nwụrụ na 13 Septemba, na afọ 2014 ma lie ya na Vaults and Gardens, Ikoyi, Lagos
Agha nke Port Harcourt Col
Adekunle's 3 Marine Commando Div
Igbochi Biafra Ịga Oké Osimiri, May 1968
Ndị agha gọọmentị etiti wakporo Arochukwu, Col
Adekunle's 3 Marine Commando, Nigerian Civil War, July 1968
Benjamin Franklin (Ben) Britt (1923-1996) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe, na-eme ihe n'ụzọ na-enweghị isi na ónyé na-adịghị ahụ anya, na ónyé nkuzi nka
Ndị ọ na-achị bụ omenala ndị Africa America, okpukpe na ụmụaka, nke o jidere na mmanụ na icheku ọkụ
Britt bịanyere aka n'ọrụ ya
A mụrụ Benjamin Franklin Roundtree n'ubochí anọ n'ọnwa Mee, 1923 na Winfall, North Carolina
Nné na nnà ya gbanwere aha nnà ha ka ọ bụrụ Britt mgbè a manyere ha ịgbapụ na steeti ha gaa Philadelphia
Dị ka nwa Brittī Stanford si kwuo, mgbanwe aha ahụ mèrè n'ụzọ ndị a Nna Brittī na ónyé were ya n'ọrụ na-acha ọcha lụrụ ọgụ, jiri shọvel kụọ ya ma gbuo ya
Nna ahụ zoro
Nne ya na-acha ọcha na-ewe ya n'ọrụ gwara ya ka o jiri aha nna ya pụọ n'obodo ahụ, na-atụ egwu na Ku Klux Klan ga-abịa n'azụ ezinụlọ ahụ
Mgbe ezinụlọ ya kwagara Philadelphia, Britt dị ihe dị ka afọ isii ma ọ bụ asaa
Na North Carolina, ọ nọ nso na nna ya, ónyé ụkọchukwu Baptist, onye gụrụ ya amaokwu Bible
Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise ndị Brittịn mbụ nwere utu aha okpukpe

Britt tolitere na North Philadelphia ma gaa Dobbins Technical High School ébé ọ zutere nwunye ya n'ọdịnihu Marjorie onye na-amụ ka ọ bụrụ onye na-achọ mma (afọ ole na ole ka e mesịrị, ya na nwanne ya nwoke ga-ewu ụlọ ahịa ịchọ mma màkà ya n'okpuru ala nke ụlọ ha)
Britt na-agụ akwụkwọ na nka azụmahịa
Otu n'ime ndị nkụzi ya na Dobbins bụ onye na-ese ihe Samuel Joseph Brown Jr
Britt gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1943
Ruo afọ abụọ, Britt jere ozi na Coast Guard, na-aga France na England
Mgbè ọ laghachiri n'ụlọ, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Hussian School of Art (1947ī 1950), Philadelphia College of Art (1951) na Art Students League na New York (1952ī 1953)
Britt bụ ónyé surrealist na mbido ọrụ ya
A kọwara ya dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe n'afọ 1951 n'otu akụkọ akụkọ banyéré ihe ngosi nke Guild of Allied Arts na Richard Allen Auditorium
Ọ bụ ónyé otu ndị na-ese ihe na-egosi ọrụ ha ma na-ajụ ajụjụ site n'aka ndị na-ege ntị
Ọ na-ese echiche na ọnọdụ uche nke dị ma enweghị ike ijikwa ya, dịka ọ na-akpọ ha, otu ónyé édémédé kwuru
Ojiji a na-eji agba eme ihe na-adabere n'echiche ma ọ bụ mmetụta ọ na-akọwa ma na-agbasa site na monochromatic ruo multicolored

N'akwụkwọ ya nke 1960 bụ American Negro Art, ónyé édémédé Cedric Dover buru amụma na Britt ga-anọ n'etiti ndị na-eto eto na-ese ihe, ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-efu n'akwụkwọ ya, ga-enwe ọnọdụ dị ịrịba ama n'akụkọ ihe méré eme nke Black art
Malite na 1950s, Britt malitere ma nọgide na-enwe mmekọrịta ogologo ógè na Wharton Centre, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ màkà mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na North Philadelphia nke kwadoro mmemme nka ndị ntorobịa
Ọ bụ ónyé otu ndị nduzi, onye nduzi nka na ónyé nkụzi nka
N'afọ 1952, ihe osise ya bụ Red Moon zụtara n'ọkwa nke abụọ n'ihe ngosi Wharton, nke gosipụtara ndị omenkà ise jikọtara ya na etiti ahụ
Otu n'ime ndị ọkàikpe bụ onye na-ese ihe n'Afrịka bụ Paul Keene
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ zụrụ ihe osise ahụ
N'afọ 1965, o ritere ihe nrite mbụ a ma ama kwa afọ maka ihe osise ya na ihe ngosi na Wharton Rosenbaum Art Center
N'afọ 2015, e gosipụtara ihe omimi na-enweghị aha nke Britt rụchara na 1950s na ngosi nke ndị Black na-ese ihe na Woodmere Art Museum
A kpọrọ ihe ngosi ahụ 'Anyị Na-ekwu Ndị Black Artists na Philadelphia, 1920s-1970s'
Ihe osise Britt dị na nchịkọta ihe ngosi nka
N'afọ 2021, a gụnyere Britt n'ihe ngosi nke ónyé na-ese ihe Percy Ricks nke akpọrọ 'Afro-American Images 1971' na National Guard Armory na Wilmington, DE
O tinyere akwụkwọ na ihe ngosi Ricks
Ọ bụ Delaware Art Museum haziri ihe ngosi nke afọ 2021, nke jụrụ Ricks na nzukọ ya Aesthetic Dynamics Inc
mgbè ọ bịakwutere nkwado na 1971
Britt, onye gbara alụkwaghịm, nwụrụ n'ụlọ ya n'ubochí irí abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Juun, 1996, n'ihi nkụchi obi
Benjamin Franklin Trueblood (1847 ruo afọ 1916) bụ onye America na-eme udo nke jere ozi na American Peace Society ruo afọ 23
N'ọrụ a, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ọnụ na-ekwuchitere ọha na eze na onye nnọchi anya Society
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Society, The Advocate of Peace nke nwere ọtụtụ isiokwu Trueblood
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke American Society of International Law n'afọ 1905
Trueblood bụ prọfesọ na kọleji atọ na onye isi oche nke Wilmington na Penn Colleges
Ọ sụgharịrị Immanuel Kant's Perpetual Peace A Philosophical Sketch ma dee ọtụtụ akwụkwọ mpịakọta na akwụkwọ, gụnyere Federation of the World
Klas Pontus Arnoldson họpụtara ya maka Nobel Peace Prize n'afọ 1913Àtụ Notelist
Benjamin Ladraa bụ onye Sweden na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ

A maara ya nke ọma maka ịkwalite mmata banyere mmebi ikike mmadụ na West Bank site na ịmalite njem 4,800-kilota (3,000 mi) site na Gothenburg, Sweden gaa Jerusalem, site na mba iri na atọ Germany, Czech Republic, Slovakia, Austria, Slovenia, Croatia, Serbia, Bulgaria, Greece, Turkey, Lebanon, na Jordan
A mụrụ Ladraa na Umeå
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Ladraa malitere afọ anọ nke ọmụmụ ihe na egwu tupu ọ gbanwee gaa na Global Studies
Ọ nọrọ otu afọ na Japan na-amụta Japanese
Mmasị ya na nsogbu nke ndị Palestine sitere na ọbụbụenyi ya na ezinụlọ ndị Palestine kwagara
Ọ dara akara ugo mmụta mahadum ya mgbe ọmụmụ ikpeazụ ya na Human Rights dakọtara na ọgba ọsọ agụụ ọ sonyere na ya
N'afọ 2016, mgbe ọ gụsịrị egwu na Paris, ọ gara Nablus izu atọ, na-egwuri egwu dị ka onye na-akụ ọkpọ na ọrụ egwu akpọrọ 'Ethno'
N'oge ọ nọrọ, ọ gakwara Hebron, nke ya na ndị otu Issa Amro's Youth Against Settlements na-agagharị ma bụrụ onye nkewa nke ndị Israel bi n'ebe ahụ na-emetụta karịsịa
Ladraa bụ onye ọrụ Red Cross, tupu ọ gaa ije
Ọnọdụ ndụ ọ hụrụ n'oge njem izu atọ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2017 gaa West Bank, ọ haziri ọgba ọsọ agụụ iji kwado otu ndị mkpọrọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Palestine 1,600 nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ndị Israel
Ọ chetara, sị 'Ihe m hụrụ n'ebe ahụ wụrụ m akpata oyi n'ahụ, na-ahụ mgbidi niile, ndị agha na-agagharị n'okporo ámá na-ebu égbè M-60
Anụrụ m akụkọ banyere ụmụaka 300 nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ, ndina n'ike n'ụlọ

' N'afọ 2017, Ladraa malitere imepụta njem ya site na Gothenburg gaa Jerusalem iji mee ka a mara banyere mmebi ikike mmadụ na West Bank; ọ rere ihe niile ya iji kwado njem ahụ, nke a kwalitere na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta n'okpuru hashtag #WalkToPalestine

Ladraa malitere ije ije ahụ, na-etinye onwe ya ka ọ gaa njem na nkezi kilomita 8-10 n'ụbọchị, site na ịpụ na Gothenburg, na ụbọchị ise n'ọnwa Ọgọst the n'afọ 2017 iji kwekọọ na otu narị afọ nke nkwupụta Balfour
Na-eme njem dị mfe, ọ tụrụ anya iru ebe ọ na-aga site na Junu ma ọ bụ Julia 2018
N'oge njem ahụ, nke kpọgara ya na mba iri na atọ , o jisiri ike nweta ihe karịrị ndị na-eso ụzọ 18,000 na Instagram na ihe karịrị 20,000 na Facebook

Njem ya, nke ọtụtụ n'ime ha gụnyere ime njem n'ụzọ ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ na-eji n'oge nsogbu ndị Europe na-eme n'oge na-adịbeghị anya, zutere ezi uche na ọchịchọ ịmata ihe site n'aka ndị Europe, naanị ihe abụọ na-emebi njem ahụ a kụrụ ya aka mgbe ọ na-agwakọta na ngagharị iwe na Germany na mberede, ma jide ya na Czech Republic ma bụrụ onye ndị nche nche Israel na-achọgharị onwe ha n'akụkụ ụlọ ọrụ nnọchi anya ha na Prague maka iburu ọkọlọtọ Palestine
Ndị mmadụ na-ahụ ya na-akpọkarị ndị uwe ojii ha
Otu nwanyị nọ na Austria, na-ahụ ọkọlọtọ Palestine ọ na-ebu, kpọrọ ndị uwe ojii bụ ndị, na-atụ aka n'ọtụtụ égbè, zutere ya n'ụzọ obi ọjọọ

Na ngwụcha njem ahụ, Ladraa kwuru na ọ zutere 'ihe niile site na ndị uwe ojii na ọrụ nzuzo ruo ndị uwe ojii nkịtị, ndị uwe ojii obodo, ndị uweojii na-emegide ndị na-eyi ọha egwu, (na) ndị otu Swat' n'ihi ya

Ndị nnọchi anya Palestine na Europe nyere nkwado site n'ịgwa Ladraa na ụzọ ya nke ga-enwe ọmịiko na ọrụ ya ka ọ ga-enwe obi ụtọ na West Bank, ọ na-enwe ọ na-eme ka ọ na-akwalite nkwurịta okwu, na West Bank
Ọ banyere Lebanọn site na ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri El Mina ebe ndị uwe ojii nzuzo gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ ruo awa isii
Mgbe ahụ, ọ gara mba ahụ ma chịkọta akaebe sitere n'aka ndị Palestine banyere nsogbu ha mgbe ọ na-eleta ogige ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ Beddawi, Nahr al-Bared, na Mar Elias
N'enweghị ike ịbanye Israel site na Lebanọn, ọ gara n'ebe ugwu Beirut wee gbaa ụgbọelu gaa Amman, ebe o si gaa n'ókè Jọdan

N'abalị isii n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2018, mgbe ọ rutere n'ebe a na-agafe Allenby, na-ejikọ Jọdan na West Bank, na naanị narị mita ole na ole site n'ebe ọ na-aga, e jidere Ladraa ma gbaa ya ajụjụ ọnụ ruo awa isii ma gbochie ndị ọrụ Israel ịbanye
Ihe kpatara na a jụrụ arịrịọ ya ịbanye Palestine bụ na a na-ewere ya dị ka onye ụgha, nakwa na ebumnuche ya bụ 'ịhazi ngagharị iwe na Nabi Saleh,' ebubo ọ gọnahụrụ n'ụzọ siri ike
N'ihi mbọ ya, Onye isi ala Palestine Mahmoud Abbas nyere Ladraa nwa amaala ma nye ya Medal of Merit
Benjamin Alfred Onyango Ochieng, bụ onye Kenya-American na-eme ihe nkiri, karịsịa na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Hollywood
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ na ihe nkiri Tears of the Sun, God's Not Dead na Beautifully Broken
A mụrụ ya na Ofafa Jericho Estate na Eastlands, Nairobi, Kenya, dịka nwa nke abụọ na ezinụlọ nke ụmụnne asaa
Nna ya bụ Christopher Ochieng na nne ya bụ Eudiah Achieng Ochieng
Benjamin malitere agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Ofafa Jericho Primary School mgbe ahụ Ofafa Jericho Secondary School
Mgbe Benjamin mere afọ iri na asatọ, nna ya goro ya ọrụ na British American Tobacco Kenya Ltd (BAT) ma mesịa kwaga ya n'ọkwa odeakwụkwọ na Ngalaba Ụgwọ Ọrụ ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ afọ anọ
Mgbe ahụ, e bufere ya na ngalaba kọmputa ma rụọ ọrụ afọ abụọ
O mechara sonye na United States International University (USIU) iji mụọ Management Information Systems (MIT)
Maka ọmụmụ ihe ọzọ, Benjamin kwagara USIU, San Diego na USA
Site n'ebe ahụ, e bufere ya na Mahadum California State, Stanislaus na Turlock, California
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 1992, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Science Degree na Computer Science
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ kwagara Hollywood, California ebe ọ gara n'ihu mụọ egwu na ime ihe nkiri
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Funk Rock band 'PFO' ruo afọ ole na ole ka e mesịrị kpebiri ịbụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Site n'echiche a, ọ malitere ịpụta n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri telivishọn ndị America a ma ama dịka General Hospital, The Shield na The X-files n'afọ 1999

Ka ọ dịgodị, ọ pụtara na The God's Not Dead Trilogy franchise yana Tears of the Sun, Heavenly Deposit, Beautifully Broken, Father Africa, The Boy, Road to Redemption, Default, Kwame, Chains, Thunder Chance, The Disciple, American Crude na The Terminal

Ọ ghọkwara onye na-eme ihe nkiri olu ma nye olu ya na ihe nkiri na usoro telivishọn gụnyere; Last Face, Furious 7, Constantine, Night At the Museum I & III, Machine Gun Preacher, Inception, The Day the Earth Stood Still, Primeval, League of Extraordinary Gentlemen, The Path to 911, Mighty Joe Young na E-ring

E wezụga ime ihe nkiri, ọ bụkwa onye edemede nwere ihe odide ndị a ma ama gụnyere The Wives (TV Series); Dysfunctionally Organized (Web Series); Mind Tricks and Curse of Devil's Mountain (Shorts), Cheza na Original Man (Films)
Benjamin Sokomba Dazhi (nke a maara dị ka Benny Dee; amụrụ na Febụwarị 15, 1988) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi vidio, onye nchịkọta akụkọ na onye na-ese ihe nkiri na Naijiria
A mụrụ Dazhi na Minna, isi obodo Niger State, North-central Nigeria

Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na National Open University of Nigeria na Federal University of Technology, Minna, ebe ọ malitere azụmahịa n'ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ dị ka onye na-eti egwu tupu ọ gbanwee wee bụrụzie onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Dazhi bu ụzọ nweta nkwanye ùgwù ya site n'iso onye nduzi vidio ama ama nke Naijiria bụ Akin Alabi rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri, The Legend of Oronpoto

Na Septemba 2021, ya na Cartoon Network jikọrọ aka dị ka onye okike na onye nduzi nke usoro ịgba egwu ọhụrụ Cartoon Network Africa, CN Dance Challenge Ihe ngosi a bụ maka ịkụziri ụmụaka usoro ịgba egwu dị iche iche sitere n'ala Afrịka site n'aka ndị nkuzi ịgba egwu abụọ nwere nkà, Anwuli na Kingsley
Benna Namugwanya Bugembe (née Benna Namigwanya) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda
Ọ bụ Minista Steeti maka Kampala Capital City Authority na Cabinet Ugandan
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ na 6 June 2016
Ọ na-eje ozi n'otu oge ahụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị nke Mubende District na 10th Parliament (2016[[2021)
A mụrụ ya na 21 Septemba 1967, na mpaghara Mubende nke oge a
Ọ gara Saint Edwards College, na Bukuumi, na mpaghara Kakumiro nke oge a, maka ọmụmụ O-Level ya
Ọ gara Saint Kizito High School Bethany, na Ngugulo, na Mityana District nke oge a, maka agụmakwụkwọ A-Level ya
N'afọ 1989, a nabatara ya na Mahadum Makerere, na Kampala, obodo kachasị ukwuu na isi obodo Uganda
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1992 na Bachelor of Education
Ka e mesịrị na afo puku abụọ na isii , otu Mahadum ahụ nyere ya Master of Education
Benna Namugwaya nwekwara diplọma na Human Resource Management, nke ọ nwetara na Uganda Management Institute na 2007 na asambodo na Iwu nchịkwa, nke Law Development Centre nyere na 2009
Ọrụ mbụ ya bụ dị ka onye nkuzi na Alliance High School, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ ruo 1995
Shen gara Saint Augustine College, na Wakiso, na-akụzi ebe ahụ site na 1996 ruo 1998
N'afọ 1998, gọọmentị ime obodo Mubende were Benna Namugwanya n'ọrụ, dị ka onye nyocha ụlọ akwụkwọ, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ ruo afọ isii
N'afọ 2004, e buliri ya n'ọkwa onye enyemaka onye isi agụmakwụkwọ distrikti, na Mubende District, na-eje ozi n'ọkwá ahụ otu afọ
N'afọ 2005, e buliri ya n'ọkwa ọzọ ka ọ bụrụ onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ distrikti, na-eje ozi afọ abụọ n'ọkwá ahụ
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi agụmakwụkwọ distrikti n'afọ 2007, na-eje ozi n'ọkwa ahụ ruo n'afọ 2010
N'afọ 2011, ọ banyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Uganda, site na ịsọ mpi na Mubende District Women's Constituency, n'okpuru tiketi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement
Ọ meriri ma họpụta ya ọzọ na 2016

Na ndepụta ndị kansụl, nke e wepụtara na 6 June 2016, a kpọrọ Namugwanya Minista nke Steeti maka Kampala Capital City authority Affairs, na-anọchite anya Beti Olive Namisango Kamya-Turomwe, minista zuru ezu
Benneth Nwankwo (amuru Febụwarị 22, 1995) bụ onye Naịjirịa na -ese foto na onye isi ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onye okpuru ọchịchị Orumba North, Anambra steeti, Naịjirịa
Nwankwo eduzila ọtụtụ ihe nkiri nke oge a, gụnyere Like Filtered Water (2021), Abuse Of Rights (2021), This Is My Story (2020) na Dreams and Survival (2020)
N'April 2021, a gwara ya na ọ ga -eduzi ihe nkiri a bụ A Place Between Colours
Dị ka onye na -ese foto na onye na -eme ihe ngosi, na Jenụwarị 31, 2020, o mere ihe e weere dị ka ihe ngosi foto ụmụ amaala nke mbụ na Anambra Steeti
Ihe mmemme a kpọrọ 'Akaraka Anambra through A Lens', nke dọtara ndị hụrụ nka na ihe nkiri si na Ndida Naịjirịa na ndị ọzọ
Ihe omume a, nke gosipụtara ihe ngosi a na ekiri mgbe omere, bụ nke a méré n'ihi ka ike mmepụta Steeti dị ka akụ njem nleta, na -enwe olileanya ịmepụta ohere akụnaụba na ibelata mpụ
Ewezuga Nwankwo, ndị ọzọ sere foto bụ Uju Egwin, Obiora Okoye, na Michael Ike
Onye bụbu kọmishọna ndị okorobịa na akụnụba okike na steeti Anambra, Afam Mbanefo, nwere mmasị na Benneth Nwankwo ji foto akwụkwọ akụakọkọọ steeti Anambra
Ọ kpọrọ ndị okorobịa ka ha tinye aka na nka
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2017, Benneth Nwankwo bipụtara foto ya nke nwata nwoke dị afọ itoolu na-eree ukpa na Anambra Steeti
Foto ndị ahu kesara ngwa ngwa na ịntanetị niile, akwụkwọ akụkọ dị iche iche bipụtara ya na Naịjirịa
Ọtụtụ ndị Naịjirịa, gụnyere 2017 onye na -azọ ọkwa Govano 2017 na Anambra Steeti, Okeke Chika Jerry, kwupụtara mmasị inyere Nwatakịrị nwoke , Sunday Nweke, aka n'ịga n'ihu na agụmagu kwụkwọ ya
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2020, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ụlọ na Naịjirịa, De-GraceLand Home Consults, binyere Benneth Nwankwo na Chioma Okonkwo (Onye bụbu Miss Impact Anambra) ka ha bụrụ ndị nnọchiri anya há
Nkwekọrịta ahụ were otu afọ
Benny Andrews (ubochí irí na atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba, 1930 rụo ụbọchị irí n'ọnwa Nọvemba, 2006) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, ónyé na-eme ihe ike na ónyé nkuzi
A mụrụ ya na Plainview, GA, Andrews nwetara BFA na eserese site na School of the Art Institute of Chicago na 1958, ma n'oge na-adịghị anya ọ kwagara New York
A maara ya maka ihe osise ya na-egosipụta ihe, nke na-ejikarị akwa collaged na ihe ndị ọzọ

Andrews nyere aka chọta Black Emergency Cultural Coalition, nke na-eme mkpọtụ maka nnọchiteanya ka ukwuu nke ndị na-ese ihe na ndị nlekọta Africa America na nnukwu ebe ngosi nka na New York na ngwụcha afọ 1960 na 70
Ọ duziri otu ahụ n'ịtọ ntọala mmemme agụmakwụkwọ nka n'ụlọ mkpọrọ na ebe ndị a na-edebe ndị mkpọrọ
Andrews kụziri nka na Queens College ruo afọ iri atọ, site na 1982 ruo 1984, jere ozi dị ka ónyé nduzi nke Visual Arts Program maka National Endowment for the Arts
Ọ natara ọtụtụ onyinye, gụnyere John Hay Whitney Fellowship (1965), New York Council on the Arts fellowships (1971), na National Endowment for the Arts Fellowsship (19748)
A mụrụ Benny Andrews n'ezinụlọ mmadụ iri n'ubochí irí na atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba, 1930, na obéré ọbọdọ Plainview, Georgia
Nné na nnà ya, George na Viola (née Perryman), bụ ndị na-ekere òkè
Nné ya na nnà ya mesiri ike mkpa agụmakwụkwọ, okpukpe, na nnwere onwe ikwu okwu
Nnà Andrews bụ ónyé na-ese ihe n'onwe ya nke ihe osise ya na ihe osise mere ka ọ bụrụ ónyé a ma ama dị ka 'Dot Man' na ihe ngosi na Morris Museum of Art
N'agbanyeghị nrụgide nne na nna ya na agụmakwụkwọ, ha enweghị ike ịhapụ Andrews ka ọ gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbe ha chọrọ enyemaka ya iji kụọ ma ọ bụ kụọ ogho
Ọ gara Plainview Elementary School, ụlọ osisi nwere otu ọnụ ụlọ na ọkara
A kwụsịrị agụmakwụkwọ gafere klas nke asaa n'ime ọbọdọ na-ekere òkè, mana ndị nne na nna Andrews kwere ka ya na ụmụnne ya gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị n'oge ọnwa oyi
Andrews jisiri ike gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Burney Street High School na Madison, Georgia na 1948, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ónyé gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị mbụ n'ezinụlọ ya
N'afọ 1976, Andrews ghọrọ ónyé nduzi mmemme nka màkà Inner City Roundtable of Youths
Ndị otu a bụ ndị òtù ndị na-achọ ịlụso ime ihe ike ndị ntorobịa ọgụ ma mee ka ọbọdọ ndị dị na New York City sie ike
Malite na 1970s, Andrews na-anọkarị na MacDowell
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ ónyé nduzi nke mpaghara ahụ n'afọ 1987
Benny Andrews bụ onye na-ese ihe osise n'ụdị ngosipụta nke sere ọtụtụ isiokwu nke nhụjuanya na ikpe na-ezighị ezi, gụnyere Holocaust, Native American forced migrations, na Hurricane Katrina
N'afọ ndị 1960 ọ malitere ịchọta ụdị ihe osise nke ya, nke mepụtara n'otu ógè na-aga n'ihu
Mmetụta ndị ọzọ na ọrụ ya gụnyere surrealism na Southern folk art

Ọrụ ya dị na Metropolitan Museum of Art na New York City; Art Institute of Chicago; Studio Museum na Harlem (New York City); High Museum of Art dị na Atlanta, Georgia; Hirshhorn Museum dị na Washington, DC; na Ogden Museum of Southern Art dị na New Orleans, Louisiana
Benny Andrews lụrụ Mary Ellen Jones Smith, ónyé na-ese foto, na 1957
Di na nwunye ahụ mụrụ ụmụ atọ, Christopher, Thomas, na Julia, tupu ha kewaa na 1976
Di na nwunye ahụ gbara alụkwaghịm n'ụzọ iwu kwadoro na 1986
Andrews lụrụ ónyé na-ese ihe Nene Humphrey na 1986
Di na nwunye ahụ zutere na MacDowell
Andrews nwụrụ n'ọrịa kansa na n'ubochí irí n'ọnwa Nọvemba, 2006 mgbè ọ dị afọ irí asaá na isé
Benny Sophie Caroline Andrea Cederfeld de Simonsen née Treschow (1865-1952) bụ onye Danish na-eme udo

A na-echeta ya dị ka onye otu Danske Kvinders Fredskæde, alaka Danish nke Women's International League for Peace and Freedom (WILPF), nke e mechara mara dị ka Kvindernes Internationale Liga for Fred og Frihed (KILFF)
Site n'afọ 1931 ruo n'afọ 1939, ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke nzukọ ahụ
Ọ bụ onye na-ekere òkè na nzukọ mba ụwa WILPF site n'afọ 1926 ruo n'afọ 1937 yana onye otu kọmitii mba ụwa ha ebe ọ na-ekwu maka ikike nke ndị ka nta

A mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị 2 n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1865 na Brahesborg, ụlọ dị nso na Assens n'àgwàetiti Funen, Benny Sophie Caroline Andrea Treschow bụ nwa nwanyị nke onye nwe ala Carl Adolph Rothe Treschow (1839 Xi1924) na Sophie Margrethe Elisabeth Rantzau (1844 Xi1911)
A zụlitere ya n'ezinụlọ a ma ama, na-enweta agụmakwụkwọ ya n'ụlọ site n'aka ndị nkuzi onwe onye si mba ọzọ
N'ihi ya, o nwere ike ikwurịta okwu nke ọma na French, Bekee na German
N'afọ 1892, ọ lụrụ Hans Christian Frederik Wilhelm Cederfeld de Simonsen (1866-1938), onye bụkwa onye nwe ala bara ọgaranya na Funen
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ kwagara n'ụlọ ya dị na Erholm
N'ịbụ onye agha nke Agha Ụwa Mbụ kpaliri, n'afọ 1916 Cederfeld de Simonsen sonyeere nzukọ udo Danskevind Kers Fredskæde, na-aghọ onye isi nke isi Funen ya n'afọ 1919
N'afọ 1925, na-ekere òkè na nzukọ kwa afọ nke Dansk Fredsforening (DF) ma ọ bụ Danish Peace Society, o guzoro megide nkatọ nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ banyere KILFF
DF, nke Fredrik Bajer guzobere n'afọ 1882, weere KILFF dị ka onye mmegide, na-ekwere na òtù udo niile nke Denmark kwesịrị ịnọ n'okpuru nchịkwa ya

Ya na Clara Tybjerg na Henriette Beenfeldt, Cederfeld de Simonsen kwusiri ike na ọ nwere ike inye aka naanị ma ọ bụrụ na e nwere òtù abụọ na Denmark na-agba mbọ maka udo ka ha nwere ike ịgbasawanye mmasị n'ebe ahụ n'ọtụtụ ebe
Cederfeld de Simonsen dị irè karịsịa n'ịbawanye ndị otu nke Funen nke KILFF, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nnukwu nzukọ mpaghara nwere ndị otu 4,000
Tupu ndị Germany eburu Denmark, na Machị 1940 ọ dị irè karịsịa na mmekọrịta dị n'etiti Danske Kvinders Nationalråd (Women's Council of Denmark) na òtù ụmụ nwanyị ndị Juu Danish Jødisk Kvindeforening
Mgbalị ya mere ka a kpọbata ụmụaka ndị Juu 320 si n'etiti Europe na Denmark ka ha lekọta ha n'ụlọ ndị Denmark
N'ịnọgide na-enwe mmasị n'ihe omume udo n'oge ndụ ya niile, Benny Cederfeld de Simonsen nwụrụ na Copenhagen n'ụbọchị 16 Jenụwarị 1952
Benso Oil Palm Plantation bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-akụ nkwụ mmanụ na Ghana, nke dị na Adum Banso Estate na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke Ghana

E hiwere ya na 1978 wee depụta ya na Ghana Stock Exchange GSE na 2004 ma na-etinye aka na mmepụta na nhazi nke nkwụ mmanụ CPO maka nchacha na ọtụtụ ojiji nke ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe↵Benso Oil Palm Plantation Limited bụ ụlọ ọrụ Ghana
na-etinye aka na azụmahịa nke nkwụ mmanụ
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere ihe karịrị hectare 5,000 nke nkwụ mmanụ na Ghana
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ enyemaka nke Wilmar International Limited
Àtụ Economy of Ghana
Me mmadụ
Ọ nwere ihe na-eme ka nchegbu kwụsị, ihe na-egbochi nkụchi, ihe na'ime ka ọ dị jụụ na ekpere chi oboro ndị na eme ka ndị mmadụ ihe na-ehi ụra
A na-enweta ọnụ ọgụgụ kachasị elu nke plasma n'ihe dị ka awa 25 mgbe a nwesịrị ọgwụgwọ ọnụ
Ọkara ndụ mwepụ ahụ dị n'etiti ihe dịka awa 2-4
Bentazepam dị irè dị ka ihe na-egbochi nchegbu
Nnukwu benzodiazepine na bentazepam nwere ike ịkpata coma na nsogbu iku ume
Mmetụta ọjọọ gụnyere ọnụ kpọrọ nkụ, ụra, asthenia, dyspepsia, afọ mgbu, agbọ onunu na ọgwụ na-akpata lymphocytic colitis ejikọtara ya na bentazepam
A na-ejikọkwa mmerụ ahụ imeju siri ike na ịba ọcha n'anya na bentazepam
Ọ bụ ezie na a na-ewere ọdịda imeju site na bentazepam dị ka ihe a na-adịghị ahụkebe, a tụwo aro nlekota ọrụ imeju maka ndị ọrịa niile na-aṅụ bentazepam

Nri Amazigh (Berber) bụ nri ọdịnala nwere akụkọ ihe mere eme dịgasị iche iche na mmetụta nke ọtụtụ ụtọ sitere na mpaghara dị iche iche gafee na nde ugwu nke Afrịka
Nri ọdịnala na-enweta mmetụta site na ugwu Atlas nke Morocco na obodo na mpaghara ndị Berber bi na ya, yana obodo na mpaghara Berber nke Algeria
Nri Berber dị iche site n'otu mpaghara gaa na nke ọzọ n'ime mpaghara ndị ugwu nke Afrịka
N'ihi nke a, nri ọ bụla nwere njirimara pụrụ iche na nke pụrụ iche dabere na mpaghara ọ sitere na mba ndị ugwu, na ụfọdụ efere ndị e mere atụmatụ na ha karịrị otu puku afọ
Zayanes nke mpaghara Khénifra gburugburu Middle Atlas nwere nri dị mfe
Ọ dabeere na ọka, ọka bali, mmiri ara ehi, cheese ewu, bọta, mmanụ aṅụ, anụ, na egwuregwu
Ezigbo nri Berber a ma ama nke Tunisian, Moroccan, Algeria, na Libya gụnyere tajine, couscous, shakshouka, pastilla, msemen, merguez, asida, lablabi, harissa, makroudh, harira, sfenj, na ahriche
Nri na nri ndị Berber gụnyere

Ọ bụ ezie na ha bụ ndị mbụ bi na mpaghara ugwu nke Africa, ndị Berber biri n'obodo ndị dị n'ime onwe ha, n'agbanyeghị mwakpo dị iche iche nke ndị Finishia, ndị Rom, ndị Byzantium, ndị Arab, ndị Ottoman na ndị French
Ebe ọ bụ na ha nwere mmetụta dị nta n'èzí, ndị a na-ebi ndụ n'enweghị ihe ndị na-eme ka ọdịbendị

asụsụ, nke a makwaara dị ka asụsụ Amazigh (/ˌæməˈziːk/ AM-ə-ZEEK; Berber aha Tamaziɣt, Tamazight, Thamazight; Neo-Tifinagh ⵜⴰⵎⴰⵣⵉⵖⵜ, TuaregˈætɸθΣ, ⵜⴰⵎⴰⵣⵉⵖⵜ, TuaregˈætɸθΣ, ⵜounces Tifinagh ezinụlọ Afroasiatic
Ha nwere otu asụsụ nwere njikọ chiri anya nke ndị Berber na-asụ, bụ́ ndị si n'Ebe Ugwu Africa
E ji script Libyco-Berber oge ochie dee asụsụ ndị a, nke dị ugbu a n'ụdị Tifinagh

Roger Blench atụwo aro na ndị na-asụ Proto-Berber gbasara site na ndagwurugwu Osimiri Naịl gaa North Africa 4,00055,000 afọ gara aga n'ihi mgbasa nke ọzụzụ atụrụ, ma nwee ike ịtọ asụsụ siri ike ihe dị ka afọ 2,000 gara aga
Ya mere, ọ bụ ezie na Berber kewapụrụ na Afroasiatic ọtụtụ puku afọ gara aga, Proto-Berber n'onwe ya nwere ike iwughachi n'oge dị ka 200 AD
Blench kwuru na Berber dị nnọọ iche na alaka ndị ọzọ nke Afroasiatics, mana asụsụ Berber nke oge a na-egosipụta obere ọdịiche dị n'ime
Ọnụnọ nke mgbazinye Punic na Proto-Berber na-egosi ụdị dị iche iche nke asụsụ Berber nke oge a na-esote ọdịda Carthage na 146 BC; naanị Zenaga enweghị okwu mgbazinye Punik
Tụkwasị na nke a, okwu ndị a gbazitere Latin na Proto-Berber na-ezo aka na nkewa nke Proto-Berbar n'etiti 1 na 200 AD

N'oge a, ndị obodo Berber nabatara ihe ọhụrụ ndị Rom gụnyere ahịhịa ehi, kamel, na njikwa ubi mkpụrụ osisi n'akụkụ limes, ma ọ bụ ókèala nke Alaeze Ukwu Rom, dị ka ihe akaebe nke ugboro nke okwu ndị a na-agbazite Latin site n'oge a na ngalaba ndị a
Nke a dugara na omenala azụmaahịa ọhụrụ nke gụnyere iji asụsụ nke ghọrọ Proto-Berber
Berenice Sinexve bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na onye otu African National Congress (ANC)
Beresford Egan (1905-1984) bụ onye na-ese ihe, onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ, onye na'eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ejiji na onye na-eme egwuregwu
A mụrụ ya na London mana o tolitere na South Africa mgbe ezinụlọ ya kwagara mgbe ọ dị afọ ise
Ọ laghachiri London na Julaị 1926 mgbe ọ nọsịrị afọ abụọ dị ka onye na-ese katụụn gwuregwu na Rand Daily Mail na Johannesburg
O guzobere onwe ya ngwa ngwa n'ime ọnọdụ nka na akwụkwọ nke London
Ọ bụghị naanị na o gosipụtara ọrụ nke ndi odee ndị ọzọ, kamakwa akwụkwọ akụkọ nke ya
O dere egwuregwu atọ, dee egwu ma mee nkatọ ihe nkiri na caricatures
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri Britain nke gụnyere 'Latin Quarter' ma pụta n'ụbọchị ọnwụ nke ụlọ egwu Britain dị ka The Great Daleno
Aubrey Beardsley nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu n'ihe osise ya na ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise ya dị n'ụdị agụụ mmekọahụ
A na-echeta Egan dị ka otu n'ime ndị Britain ole na ole na-egosipụta Art Deco
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị a ma ama na London's bohemian scene ruo ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ iri afọ ise
Ọ bụ odeee na onye na-ese ihe osise n'akwụkwọ, malite na The Sink of Solitude, satire banyere mmachibido iwu nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Radclyffe Hall na-ese okwu The Well Of Loneliness (1928)
Akwụkwọ ahụ gosipụtara mmalite nke oge na-emepụta ihe dị ka afọ isii nke Egan mepụtara ọtụtụ ihe osise na mkpuchi akwụkwọ maka ọrụ Aleister Crowley, Pierre Louÿs na Charles Baudelaire
Egan dekwara akwụkwọ akụkọ ole na ole, nke o ji ihe osise ya dị egwu chọọ mma
O mekwara ihe osise maka akwụkwọ edemede nke nwunye ya Catherine Bower Alcock mepụtara
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ agha n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ mgbe ụfọdụ na fim, nke gụnyere anọ maka onye nduzi Vernon Sewell
Ọ nwụrụ na London n'afọ 1984
Beresford Egan na IMDb
Berhane Adere Debala (Ge'ez ብርሀኔ Winston a mụrụ na 21 Julaị, na afọ 1973 na Shewa) bụ onye Etiopia na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge nke na-ahụ maka 10,000 mita na ọkara marathon
Ọ bụ onye mmeri ụwa n'elu 10,000 m na afọ 2003 na onye mmeri Ụwa na ọkara marathon na afo 2002
Berhane na-arụ ọrụ maka UNICEF dị ka onye nnọchi anya obiọma maka agụmakwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị
Berhane nwere ihe ndekọ Afrịka maka mita 10,000 n'ime oge nke 30 0418, setịpụrụ na afọ 2003 World Championships, ebe ọ meriri ọla edo
Tirunesh Dibaba, onye ghọrọ onye Afrịka mbụ gbara ọsọ n'okpuru nkeji iri atọ, mebiri ihe ndekọ Afrịka na afọ 2008 Olympics
Berhane meriri IAAF World Half Marathon Championships na afọ 2002, na ọla nchara na 2001 World Half Maraton Championships
Ọ bụ onye nwetara ihe nrite ọla edo karịa mita 3000 na 2003 IAAF World Indoor Championships
O meriri na 2006 Chicago Marathon na oge kachasị mma nke 2 20 42
O meriri Chicago Marathon ọzọ na 2007 na Dubai Marathon na 18 Jenụwarị, na afọ 2008
Berhane merikwara na afọ 2007 Ras Al Khaimah Half Marathon
Ọ bụ nwanyị kachasị elu na 2010 Rock 印度 Roll Mardi Gras Marathon, ebe o dekọrọ ọkara marathon kachasị ọsọ n'ala America na oge 1 07 52, na-emebi ihe kachasị mma ya n'oge gara aga karịa 25 sekọnd
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri atọ na isii, nke ahụ kwesịkwara ịbụ ihe ndekọ ụwa nke Masters
Ọ hụrụ ihe ịma aka site n'aka Ana Dulce Félix iji merie na Great North Run na Septemba, mezue ọkara marathon na 1 08 49
N'afọ 2012, o nwere agbụrụ abụọ, ma n'ọnwa Ọktoba na Britain, ebe ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na Great Birmingham Run na nke atọ na Great South Run
Berhanu ma ọ bụ Birhanu bụ aha nwoke zitere na Etiopia nke nwere ike izo aka na
Berhe bụ aha nna sitere na Eritrea na Tigray
Ọ pụkwara izo aka na

Gugulethu Khumalo (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụo na asaa nke ọnwa Juunu n'afọ 1991), onye amara nke ọma site n' aha a na- akpọ ya n' ọgbọ bụ Berita, bụ onye na-agụ abụ, onye na-agụ abụ na onye na-emepụta egwu
Egwu ya bụ ngwakọta nke egwu mkpụrụ obi nwere ihe sitere na Afro Jazz, mmetụta pop nke oge a ya na egwu ogbụgba mba South Afrịka
Ọ bụ onye nwe akara ndekọ nke nọọrọ onwe ya Assali Music
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere otu ụmụ nwaghị ahịa mgbere egwu of Music Business (WOMB), otu Pan nzukọ nkwado ụmụ nwaghị mba South Afrịka nakwa ụlọ ọrụ egwu
A mụrụ Berita n'abalị iri abụo na asaa nke ọnwa June n'afọ 1991 na Bulawayo
Ọ bụ onye mbụ a mụrụ n’ezinụlọ mmadụ ise
Ọ nọrọ otu akụkụ nke nwata ya na Bulawayo na Zhombe ebe nne na nna ya bụ ndị nkuzi na Rio Tinto
Ọ gara St Martin de Porres na Zhombe, Nketa Primary school na Greenfield Primary school na Bulawayo

N'afọ 2007, ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara New Zealand na-achọ ala ịta ahịhịa ndụ n'ihi ọnọdụ akụ na ụba na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị siri ike na Zimbabwe wee kwaga South Afrịka iji nweta agụmakwụkwọ ya na Mahadum Walter Sisulu na Eastern Cape

N'afọ 2012, o wepụtara mpụta mbụ nke abọ egwu ya akpọrọ Conquering Spirit, nke peaked na #1 na iTunes wee nwetara ya ihe okpụkpụ ọla edo na RISA ma wetakwa ihe nweta ọkaibe n'abó egwu nzere ugo Afrịka Pop ṅ'afọ 2013 Metro FM Awards
N'afọ 2014, ya na ndị na-agụ egwú a ma ama bụ Hugh Masekela na Oliver Mtukudzi rụkọtara ọrụ na egwu, 'Mwana Wa Mai'
N'afọ n' esote ya, ya na Black Motion rụkọtara ọrụ na remix 'Mwana Wa Mai'
N'afọ 2016, o sonyere na Coke Studio nke rụpụtara ma tụgharịa ụra mwepụta nke otu, 'Vusu Yeke' nke ya na onye rapper, Yanga Chief jikọrọ aka

Otu ya 'Ezizweni' ruru ya #1 na eserese iri anọ kacha elu nke Metro FM na Ukhozi FM 's eserese kacha elu irí abụọ Na mpụta mbụ ya akpọrọ 'Ndicel'ikiss' gbagoro #iri abụọ ná otu na eserese redio nke RAMS, dekọrọ n'okpuru ya
labelụ onwe ASSALI Music
Ya na Mobi Dixon jikọrọ aka na egwu ya 'Ezizweni' na Da Capo na 'Achọtara Gị'
N'onwa Febụwarị nke afọ 2020, o wepụtara abọ egwu studio nke anọ ya, Abụ na igodo nke ịhụnanya
N'abalị iri abụo na asaa kwa afọ nzere Ugo egwu mba South Afrịka , abọ egwu ahụ nwetara ihe nrite maka ihe nrite ndị ọzọ nke Afrịka
Otu onye na-enyocha abọ egwu ahụ bụ 'Jikizinto' ruru #1 na eserese nnyocha redio, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị mbụ nwere onwe ya na-ese ihe ruru ọnụ ọgụgụ #1 n'ime afọ iri ọhụrụ

Ntọhapụ egwu ya gara aga 'Ungandibulali' ruru #1 na-emefu izu atọ n'elu n' eserese nnghocha redioCharts Redio , otu a egosipụtara Ndlovu Youth Choir ma bụrụ isiokwu isiokwu abụ n'oge afọ 2020 ịrụ ọrụ mkpụrụ Ụbọchị iri na isii dị ka akụkụ nke SABC 's 'Adịla Tụgharịa mkpọsa anya kpuru ìsì megide GBV
Ya na Amanda Black rụkọrọ ọrụ na otu, 'Siyathandana'
Na ejiji, ya na ndị na-emepụta akwa na mpaghara mba South Afirika arukọla ọrụ ọnụ dị ka Athenkosi Mgundlwa, KISUA na ụlọ ọrụ dị ọtụtụ

O ruola ọrụ n'emumme egwu dị ka Bayimba International Festival na Uganda, Ọdọ Mmiri Stars, Jakaranda Music Festival na Zimbabwe na Cape Town Jazz Festival dị ka akụkụ nke Oliver Mtukudzi 's tribute concert
N'abalị iri abụo na isii nke ọnwa Mee n afọ 2021, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị otu ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ ndekọ nke South Afríka (RISA)

Berlinda Addardey, onye a maara nke oma dị ka Berla Mundi, (amụrụ na abali mbu nke onwa Eprel 1988) bụ onye mgbasa ozi si mba Ghana, onye na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị na onye na-eji olu ya aguputa ihe n' uzo puru iche Ya na Kwami Sefa Kayi kwadoro VGMA nke iri abụọ
Berla bụ onye guchara akwukwo nke St
Theresa's School, Achimota School na Mahadum nke Ghana ebe ọ gụrụ asụsụ na akparamaagwa maka akara ugo mmụta nke mbụ ya

Bernadette Essossimna Legzim-Balouki (amụrụ na ọnwa Jenụwarị 20, na afọ 1959 na Lomé) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mba Togolese

Ọ bụ National General Secretary nke YWCA, Onye isi oche nke Tanganyika Council of Women, na onye omeiwu

Ọ lụrụ Patrick Kunambi (1916 ruo afọ 2011), onye isi na onye guzobere TANU bụ ezigbo enyi Julius Nyerere
Onye Roman Katọlik, Kunambi sonyere na Nzukọ Ndịozi nke East Frican Lay Apostolate nke afọ 1961 nke Bishọp Blomjous kwadoro na Social Training Centre ya na Nyegezi
N'afọ 1969, o sonyere na Seminar Study Year, mmemme iji tụlee Chọọchị Katọlik na Tanzania n'ìhè nke Vatican II
N'afọ 1969, Julius Nyerere họpụtara Kunambi, onye na-arụbu ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi, dị ka Kọmishọna mpaghara maka Kilosa District

N'afọ 1998, ọ gara South Korea wee nọrọ ebe ahụ afọ atọ iji na-eme taekwondo na Mahadum Yonsei
O mere ya ọkachamara mbuaha mara nka mpụta mbụ na March 2007 na a mbụ-gburugburu knockout mmeri Hyun Pyo Shin na K-1 Hero si 8

Ọ gara n'ihu merie ọgụ atọ ya na-esote, Otú ọ dị, gụnyere otu onye Dutch kickboxer Melvin Manhoef

Ọ meriri ọgụ abụọ, ma na nkwalite miri emi

O meriri n'ọgụ ahụ site na knockout na agba nke atọ

Ihe ndekọ kickboxing ya na-eguzo na mmeri abụọ na ọdịda atọ

A maara ya n'etiti ndị na-akwado anime dị ka olu nke Master of Ceremonies na nsụgharị Japanese mbụ nke Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D

Bernard Akoi-Jackson (amụrụ n'afọ 1979) bụ onye agụmakwụkwọ Ghana, onye na-ese ihe na onye edemede
A maara ya maka ọrụ ndị na-aga n'ihu na nnwoghari
Ọrụ nka ya na-abụkarị ihe ngosi ma ọ bụ ememe pseudo
Ihe odide ya na-elekwasị anya na mmepe nke oge a nke Africa, nka na ọdịbendị Ghana n'ụzọ abụ na nke obi ụtọ
A maara ya dị ka onye na-eme ilu ma ọ bụ Esu na-eji ihe nzuzu dị oke egwu na-agagharị n'etiti nrụnye, ịgba egwu na uri, vidiyo, na foto
Ọ na-agwakọta njirimara ndị Afrịka na-achị site na ihe ncheta na-agafe agafe na nke na-enweghị isi
Akoi-Jackson gara Presbyterian Boys' Secondary School, maka agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
O nwere Bachelor of Fine Arts, Master of Fine Arts na PhD na Painting and Sculpture site na College of Art and Built Environment, Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2006, o nwere ebe obibi mbụ ya na Kofi Setordj's ArtHAUS ebe ọ mepụtara ọrụ ya REDTAPEONBOTTLENECK dị ka ọrụ ntinye aka
O nwere ebe obibi na Stedelijk Museum dị ka 'Global-Artist -in-Residency n'etiti afọ 2013 na 2014 na Thiami Mnyele Artists' Residency na Amsterdam
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi na College of Art and Built Environment, Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology
Bernard Manyandure (1929–1999) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
A mụrụ Manyandure na Nyanga, ma nweta ọtụtụ n'ime isiokwu ya site na akụkọ ọdịnala obodo
O so na ndị mbụ na-akpụ ihe na Frank McEwen's Workshop School, na-anọnyere ya site na ntọala ya na 1957 ruo 1973
Na mbụ ọ bụ onye ọrụ ugbo na-azụ ahịa, o mechara ghọọ onye na-akpụ ihe ọkpụkpụ oge niile
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na nnukwu ihe ngosi mbụ nke ihe ọkpụkpụ Zimbabwe na Paris na London, ma gosipụtakwa ya na Museum of Modern Art na New York City
Bernard Nyarko (nwụrụ 2 Mee 2020), nke a na-akpọkarị na azụmahịa ngosi dị ka Bishọp Bernard Nyarko, bụ onye omere na onye na- nto ọchị Ghana onye ghọrọ onye nkwusa oge niile n'oge na-adịbeghị anya
A maara ya maka ihe nkiri Hero Service to Humanity (2017) na Sidechic Gang (2018)
Bernard Nyarko bụ nwa nke asaa nne na nna ya mụrụ ya n'etiti ụmụnne 14 ndị ọzọ
Ọ lụrụ nwanyi ma muo ụmụ atọ
Ọ batara n'ọkwa na gburugburu 2012 ma gosipụta ya na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri obodo Ghana, gụnyere Wanted, Aban Bo sia, Boyz Abre, Sunsum Police, John na John na ndị ọzọ
Nyarko malitere agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ ọta akara na Swedru Salvation Army na Central Region nke Ghana, ebe nne na nna ya nọ n'oge ahụ n'ihi nkwa ọrụ
Ọ kwagara na Primary one na Nsawam, ebe nne ya, onye na-arụ ọrụ na Public Works Department, nọrọ
Ebe nna ya, onye jere ozi dị ka onye uwe ojii, ebugharị na mpaghara Kumawu, Nyarko kwagara Kumawu Presby Primary School maka Primary abụọ (2)
Ọ gakwara n'ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Asem Boys M/A na Kumasi mgbe e bufere nna ya n'ọdụ ndị uwe ojii Zongo dị na Kumasi
Ọ dechara akwụkwọ ise na Tweneboah Koduah Senior High School, Kumawu
O mechara gụchaa akwụkwọ ọmụmụ ya nke isii na Osei Kyretwie Senior High
A kwanyere Bernard Nyarko ugwu na 2017 site na Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology (KNUST) maka ntinye aka ya na National Union of Ghana Students (NUGS)

Bernard Ifeanyi Odoh (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke ise n'ọnwa Asatọ n'afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri asaa nise (5 Ọgọstụ 1975) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria na Prọfesọ nke Applied Geophysics Ọ bụ onye a họpụtara ugbu a dịka gọvanọ nke All Progressives Grand Alliance na Ebonyi Steetị

Odoh malitere ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Ezza Road Primary School ma mesịa nweta SSCE ya site na Special Science School, Igbeagu Abakaliki, Ebonyi Steetị, na afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri iteolu na anọ (1994)
Ọ gara n'ihu ịnweta nzere BSc

na Geological Sciences n'afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri iteolu na iteolu (1999), MSc na Applied Geophysics, n'afọ puku abụọ na isii(2006), na PhD n'afọ puku abụọ na asatọ (2008) naApplied geophytics (Geoelectrical Ge Physics) niile site na Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe, Awka
Odoh sonyeere agụmakwụkwọ na afọ puku abụọ na abụọ (2002) ma họpụta ya dịka prọfesọ nke Applied Geophysics n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na anọ (2014)na Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe, Awka
Ọ kụzikwaara na Mahadum Ebonyi Steetị, Abakaliki site na ọnwa atọ n'afọ puku abụọ na abụọ ruo na onwa iteolu afọ puku abụọ na iteoulu (March 2002 ruo September 2009)

nakwa Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe, Awka n'etiti ọnwa iteolu afọ puku abụọ na iteolu ruo n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na anọ (Septemba 2009 ruo August 2014), ọ bụkwa onye nchọpụta na Society of Exploration Geophysics (SEG) na Oklahoma USA, n'afo puku abụọ na isii, puku abụọ na asaa nakwa puku abụọ na iri na otu (2006, 2007, 2008 na 2011)

Nnyocha ya n'ógbè a nyere ngwá ọrụ mkpebi akụ na ụba iji belata ọdịda na mmepụta mmiri dị n'okpuru ala; mmebi nke mineral siri ike; njirimara ọdọ mmiri na atụmanya maka World Bank Community Water Projects, Anambra Imo River Basin

Ọ bụ onye otu Society of Exploration Geophysics, Oklahoma, USA, American Association of Petroleum Geologists, US, European Association for Geoscientists & Engineers, London, na Nigeria Association nke Petroleo Explorations, Lagos
Ọ bụkwa onye otu Nigerian Mining and Geosciences Society, Abuja

Odoh malitere ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya mgbe ọ na-azọ ọkwa onye omeiwu Ebonyi Central na ikpo okwu nke All Progressives Grand Alliance (APGA) na ntuli aka nke Naijiria n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na ise (2015) mana Senator Obinna Ogba nke People's Democratic Party meriri ya
Gọvanọ nke Ebonyi Steeti, Dave Umahi họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ nke Gọọmentị Steetị nke Steetị Ebonayi na ọnwa ise n'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'ise (Mee 2015)
Ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na Executive Council n'ọnwa anọ n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na asatọ (Eprel 2018) n'ihi ihe ndị Gọvanọ Dave Umahi mere
O mechara sonye na ntuli aka Gọvanọ Ebonyi nke afọ puku abụọ na iri iteolu (2019) n'okpuru All Progressives Congress mana Sonni Ogbuoji meriri ya na primaries

N'afọ puku abụọ na iri abụọ na abụọ (2022), Odoh hapụrụ All Progressives Congress (APC) laghachi na All progressives Grand Alliance ma mesịa merie tiketi gọvanọ iji bụrụ onye a họpụtara maka All progresssive Grand alliance na ntuli aka gọvarọ nke Ebonyi State na afọ puku abụọ na iri abụọ na atọ (2023)

E nyere Odoh onyinye Tertiary Educational Trust Fund afọ puku abụọ na iri na abụọ (2012) maka nyocha maka ịchọpụta mmalite nke Okposi-Uburu Salt Lakes; [citation needed] nyocha geotechnical maka ịkọwa ọdịdị ala, Ebonyi Steetị, Nigeria

E nyekwara ya onyinye Society of Exploration Geophysics (SEG) Oklahoma USA, afọ puku abụọ na iri na otu (2011) maka nyocha nke geoelectrical na ọmụmụ hydrogeochemical maka ịkọwa mmetọ mmiri dị n'okpuru ala nke acid mine drainage na Okpara Mine site, Enugu, Southeastern Nigeria, na Society nke Exploración Geofsics / TGS Field Camp Project Grant iji kwado ọrụ 'Nnyocha nke Toxic Waste Sites na Buried Fuel Tanks na-eji Spontaneous Potential Method' n'afọ puku abụọ na iteolu (2009)

Ọrụ ndị ọzọ nke Odoh duziri gụnyere Society of Exploration Geophysics Projectin nkwado nke Pb-Zn Exploración na Abakaliki site na iji Spontaneous Potential, afọ puku abụọ na asatọ (2008) na Society nke Exploring Gehysics Projection onHydrogeophysical mapping of the Abakliki shale aquifers,afọ puku abụọ na asaa (2007)
Sir Bernard Oppenheimer, 1st Baronet (13 February 1866 – 13 June 1921) bụ onye ahịa diamond nke South Africa na Britain na onye na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka
Oppenheimer bụ onye isi oche nke Pniel's Ltd, New Vaal River Diamond & Exploration Company, na Blaauwbosch Diamonds Ltd, na onye isi nchịkwa nke Lewis & Marks Ltd nke Holborn
Nwanne ya nwoke, Sir Ernest Oppenheimer, tinyekwara aka na ụlọ ọrụ diamond
Na Julaị 1917, Oppenheimer guzobere atụmatụ maka ịzụ ndị agha nwere nkwarụ na ịkpụ diamond na Brighton, England
Bernard Oppenheimer Diamond Works (National Diamond Factories Ltd) mepere na Lewes Road / Coombe Road (n'akụkụ ugwu) na 17 Mee 1918
Ọ bụ Oppenheimer n'onwe ya na Lewis & Marks kwụrụ ya
N'afọ 1920, o mepere alaka na Cambridge, Wrexham na Fort William
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1921, ọrụ ndị ahụ, gụnyere ụlọ nke abụọ n'akụkụ nke ọzọ nke Coombe Road, were ihe dị ka ndị ikom 2,000 n'ọrụ bụ ndị Mịnịstrị nke Ọrụ zoro aka na ya
Ndị ikom ọhụrụ natara ọzụzụ ọnwa isii, n'oge nke gọọmentị kwụrụ ha ụgwọ mmezi, ma bụrụ na-ekwe nkwa ọrụ na ezigbo ụgwọ ọrụ
Ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe ahụ nwere ụlọ ọgwụ a kwadebere nke ọma iji nye ndị ọrụ nlekọta na-aga n'ihu, ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ ndị e gbupụrụ ụkwụ ma ọ bụ ndị nwere nkwarụ dị ukwuu
Azụmahịa ahụ emeghị nke ọma ma mechie na 1923, mana emeghachiri mgbe e mesịrị n'otu afọ ahụ
O mechara banye na nnata na 1924
N'afọ 1917, ọ zụtara ala Sefton Park, Stoke Poges, Buckinghamshire, ebe ọ biri ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
N'oge ahụ, ya na onye agbata obi ya, Walter A
Judd zụtara ala nke gụnyere Gray's Monument na Stoke Poges, ihe ncheta maka onye Bekee na-ede uri, Thomas Gray, iji chekwaa ya maka ọha na eze
N'afọ 1925, e nyefere Gray's Monument na Gray's Field n'aka National Trust
Maka ọrụ ya na ndị nwere nkwarụ, e kere Oppenheimer baronet na 1921 New Year Honours
Ọ nwụrụ na mberede mgbe ọnwa isii gasịrị mgbe ọ dị afọ iri ise na ise
Ọ lụrụ Lena Straus, onye ya na ya mụrụ ụmụ isii

Bernard Takawira (1948–1997) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe, nwanne nwoke nke John Takawira na nwanne nwoke nke Lazarus Takawira
A mụrụ Takawira na mpaghara ugwu Nyanga, nwa nke atọ n'ime ụmụ isii
Nna ha anaghị anọkarị n'ọrụ, nne ha, Mai, na-arụkwa ọrụ dị mkpa
A maara ya nke ọma maka ihe ọmụma ya banyere akụkọ ifo na akụkọ Shona, ọ na-akọkwara ụmụ ya ndị nwoke akụkọ agbụrụ ha; akụkọ ndị a nwere mmetụta miri emi na ọrụ John na Bernard dị ka ndị na-akpụ ihe
Bernard nwetara ọzụzụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ ọrụ ugbo nye gọọmentị mgbe ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ, mana John gbara ya ume ka ọ gbalịa ịkpụ nkume
John mere ka ọ mata Frank McEwen, onye na-arụ ọrụ na Vukutu n'oge ahụ
N'oge na-adịghị anya, Takawira malitere itinye oge ezumike ya niile n'ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, ebe ọ mụtara ọtụtụ ihe; na 1977 ọ hapụrụ ọkwa ọchịchị ya iji malite ịkpụ ihe oge niile
N'ụzọ ejiji, ihe ọkpụkpụ Takawira na-egosi ihe akaebe nke nnukwu ọgụ ime ụlọ n'etiti Iso Ụzọ Kraịst na omenala Shona, agha nke metụtara onye na-ese ihe maka ọtụtụ ndụ ya
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya na-ewere dị ka isiokwu ha ihe dị ka ndidi, ịdị umeala n'obi, na iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe
Takawira nwụrụ n'afọ 1997

Berni Searle (amụrụ n'ubochí asaá n'ọnwa Julaị 1964 na Cape Town, South Africa) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na-arụ ọrụ na foto, vidiyo, na ihe nkiri iji mepụta ntinye anya nke na-eme akụkọ ndị metụtara akụkọ ihe méré eme, njirimara, ncheta, na ebe
Ọtụtụ mgbè na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ọrụ ya na-esikwa na mmetụta zụrụ ụwa ọnụ metụtara adịghị ike, mfu na ịma mmá
Searle bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Cape Town, South Africa ma bụrụ ugbu a Associate Professor na Michaelis School of Fine Art na Mahadum Cape Town
A mụrụ Searle n'ubochí asaá n'ọnwa Julaị, 1964 na Cape Town, South Africa na nne na nna ndị Afrịka na German-English
Dị ka ónyé agbụrụ dị íchè íchè na-etolite n'oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na South Africa, a na-ahazi Searle dị ka 'Coloured,' akara nke o mechara jụ ma maa aka site na nka ya mgbè ịkpa ókè
Searle nwetara BA ya na Fine Art na 1987 na diplọma postgraduate na Education na 1988 site na Michaelis School of Fine Art, Mahadum Cape Town
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Searle kụziri nka n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Cape Town ruo afọ abụọ wee banyeghachi Michaelis, na-edebanye aha màkà nzere masta na ihe ọkpụkpụ n'afọ 1992
Ọ bụ ezie na nke a bụ ógè bárá uru màkà ịnakọta nka teknụzụ na ijikọ mmekọrịta màkà ụdị atọ - ihe a ka na-ahụ anya na ọrụ foto ya taa -, ọchụchọ ya maka ụdị na ọdịnaya gara n'ihu

Ọrụ ya gosipụtara màkà nzere masta na nka dị mma na 1995 na-egosi ihe omimi, nnukwu ihe owuwu na simenti, simenti fondu, ígwè, waya, ọla nchara, na ugegbe nke yiri ka ọ na-ekwekọghị na ọrụ ndị dị nso na nke abụ nke Searle maara taa

N'ịbụ ndị e mepụtara otu afọ mgbè ntuli aka ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya mbụ gasịrị, ọrụ ndị a bụ iji jụọ echiche obi ụtọ nke mbà na mbà na-ewulite na akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu siri ike, ọbụna nke a na-achịkwa, site na ihe gbara ya gbụrụ-gbúrụ na ntụziaka
Berni Searle na-eji nnukwu foto dijitalụ, ihe ndị a chọtara, na mgbasa ozi oge dịka ihe nkiri iji jide ọrụ ya
Ọrụ Searle na-agụnye akụkọ na-eme ihe nkiri na onwé ya dị ka ónyé na-egosipụta akụkọ ihe méré eme, ala, ncheta na ebe
A maara Searle maka iji ahụ nke ya n'ime iberibe ya mee ka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nke ya pụta ìhè na iwulite ma mebie njirimara gbásárá agbụrụ na okikeIhe na-esi ísì ụtọ bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị n'ọrụ ya
Perryer (2004)
10 Years 100 Artists Art in a Democratic South Africa
