Bernice Dapaah bụ onye Ghana , bụrụ kwa onye ọchụnta ego, ọ bu ya tọrọ ntọala ma bụrụ kwa onye isi ọrụ nke Ghana Bamboo Bike Initiative na Kumasi
Atụmatụ a na-eleba anya na nbibi gburugburu ebe obibi site n'ịmepụta igwe igwe na-eji akụrụngwa na-emetụta gburugburu ebe obibi dịka achara
Ya na ụlọ ọrụ ya, Ghana Bamboo Bike Initiative eritela ọtụtụ ihe nrite
N'afọ 2016 na 2017, edepụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị inyom otu narị kacha pụta ìhè ndị ọchụnta ego na Ghana
Dapaah so n'otu onye bọọdụ ndụmọdụ nke World Intellectual Property Organisation Green (WIPO Green) na Switzerland ma bụrụ onye guzobere Kumasi Hub nke Global Shapers
Na mgbakwunye, ọ bụ onye so na World Economic Forum Global Agenda Council on Biodiversity and Natural Capital
Dapaah gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum Christian Service ma nweta nzere bachelọ na nchịkwa azụmahịa
O jikwa nzere diplọma na Human Resource Management and Marketing site na Institute of Commercial Management na UK
N'ịbụ onye ọnụ ọgụgụ dị elu nke ndị na-enweghị ọrụ na Ghana kpaliri, Dapaah kpebiri itinye aka n'ịzụ ahịa mgbe ọ na-achọ igucha ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ya na ndị enyi ya chọrọ ikeputa ọrụ kama ịbụ ndi na-achọ ọrụ
Ya mere ya na Winnifred Selby hiwere ụlọọrụ Ghana Bamboo Bike na 2009

N'agbanyeghị atụmatụ nke Ghana Bamboo Bike Initiative inye ndị ntorobịa ọrụ, ha na-enyere aka ibelata mmebi gburugburu ebe obibi site n'iji akụrụngwa mpaghara na gburugburu ebe obibi dị ka achara na-emepụta igwe

Atụmatụ a eritela ọtụtụ ihe nrite nke gụnyere 2014 UNEP/Dubai International Award, 2013 UNFCCC Momentum For Change Light House Award Award (Women For Results Category), World Business and Development Award 2012, UN Habitat/Dubai International Best Practice Award 2012, Samsung/ Generations For Peace Impact Award 2012, GIZ Impact Business Award 2011, na UNEP SEED Initiative Award 2010
Bernice Ofei bụ onye Ghana na-nwetara ihe nrite site n'ịkụ egwu ozioma
O ritere ihe nrite nwanyí kacha mma n'igụ egwu na ode abụ nke afọ 2019 bụ Best Female Vocal Performance na Songwriter of the Year na 2009 Vodafone Ghana Music Awards
Bernice Ofei nwere abọm isii maka nke biputere aha ya, nke isii nke o dekọrọ na 2007 nke akpọrọ 'ndụ'

Nke ritere ya ihe nrite abụọ ya n'oge mbipụta nke iri nke MTN Ghana Music Awards dị ka onye kacha mma nwanyí n'ihe gbasara Ihe omume na odide egwu nke afọ bụ Best Vocal Female Performer na Song Writer of the year
Bernice bụ onye ọrụ ọbá ego site na ọrụ ya ma na-arụ ọrụ na Standard Chartered Bank
Bernice gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Achimota School dị na Accra, Ghana
O nwere MPhil na sayensị ihe ọkụkụ na Mahadum nke Ghana na MSc na teknụzụ ozi site na United Kingdom
A maara ya nke ọma maka egwu ya 'Hold On' na 'Life is so short'
Ọ lụrụ Prof
Samuel Kwame Offei osote onyeisi mahadum nke Ghana (Pro-Vice Chancellor of University of Ghana) ma bụrụ nne ụmụ abụọ
Bernice Swarts (amụrụ na 19 Febụwarị 1972) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa bụ onye otu National Assembly of South Africa maka African National Congress, na-eje ozi kemgbe 2019
N'ọnwa Machị 2019, African National Congress (ANC) kwupụtara ndepụta ndị ha na-azọ ọkwa maka ntuli aka mba na nke mpaghara na 8 Mee 2019
E debere Swarts na nke iri na asaa na mpaghara Gauteng nke ANC na ndepụta mba
Na ntuli aka na Mee 8, ANC meriri 532% nke votu na ntuli aka mba na Gauteng, nke mere ka ha merie 26 n'ime oche 47 nke Gauteng na National Assembly
A họpụtara Swarts ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu nke mba ahụ ma ṅụọ iyi n'ọkwa na 22 Mee n'oge nnọkọ mbụ nke ndị omebe iwu na-esote ntuli aka ahụ
N'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2019, a họpụtara Swarts ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na Kọmitii Portfolio na International Relations and Cooperation na Standing Committee on Public Accounts (SCOPA)

N'ọnwa Nọvemba 2019, a kọrọ na a na-enyocha Swarts maka ebubo na ọ ghọgburu onye ọchụnta ego Tuwani Mulaudzi na 2013 nke R500,000 n'okpuru ebubo na a ga-enye ego ahụ na mkpọsa ntuli aka nke ANC na 2014
Mulaudzi gbalịrị ime ka Swarts kwụọghachi ego ahụ mgbe ọ matara na Swarts kpebiri idebe ego ahụ maka onwe ya, mana ọ jụrụ ịkwụghachi ya

Naanị mgbe a mara ọkwa na a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu, o kpebiri iweghachite ego ahụ ọzọ wee kọọrọ onye na-ekwuchitere National Assembly, Thandi Modise, onye zigara ya onye isi ANC na National Assembly, Pemmy Majodina
Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a na Kọmitii Portfolio na International Relations and Cooperation
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2021, Swarts jụrụ nkwupụta nke ndị otu mmegide na gọọmentị na-eleghara ndị ọrụ gọọmentị anya nke a chọpụtara na ikpe mara maka nrụrụ aka na ngalaba ọha na eze
O kwuru na gọọmentị na-ewere okwu ahụ n'ụzọ siri ike
Berom ma ọ bụ Birom nwere ike ịpụta ka
Berom (mgbe ụfọdụ a na-asụkwa ya dị ka Birom) bụ agbụrụ kachasị ukwuu na Steeti Plateau, etiti Naịjirịa
Na-ekpuchi ihe dị ka mpaghara gọọmentị ime obodo anọ, nke gụnyere Jos North, Jos South, Barkin Ladi (Gwol) na Riyom, a na-ahụkwa Berom na mpaghara gọọmentụ mpaghara ndịda Steeti Kaduna
Ndị Berom na-asụ asụsụ Berom, nke sitere na alaka Plateau nke Benuezongo, otu ezinụlọ nke nnukwu ezinụlọ asụsụ Nigerzongo
Ọ nweghị ihe jikọrọ ya na asụsụ Hausa (nke sitere n'ezinụlọ Afro-Asiatic) ma ọ bụ asụsụ Afro-Asia ndị ọzọ nke Plateau State, nke bụ asụsụ Chadic
Ndị Berom nwere ihe nketa ọdịbendị bara ọgaranya
Ha na-eme emume Nzem Berom kwa afọ na onwa Maachị ma ọ bụ Eprel
Ememme ndị ọzọ gụnyere Nzem Tou Chun (worongchun) na Wusal Berom
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị isi ndị Aborigine na Naijiria (Plateau State) nke kwenyere na chi ndị Juu na Ndị Kraịst (Dagwi)
Ụfọdụ ememme Berom gụnyere
Ememme na omenala Berom na-emetụta ọrụ ugbo na ịchụ nta, nke bụ ihe omume ndị bụ isi na-emetụ aka na ndụ Berom na cosmology
A na-emekarị emume metụtara ọrụ ugbo gburugburu obodo dị iche iche
Mmụba nke Iso Ụzọ Kraịst na agụmakwụkwọ ọdịda anyanwụ kwadebere ụzọ maka ọtụtụ mgbanwe mmekọrịta na ọdịbendị na omenala Berom
Mgbanwe ndị ahụ mere ka ọdịbendị bara ọgaranya nke ndị mmadụ ghara ịdị mma na-eweta nnukwu nsogbu nke nnukwu nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ọdịbendị
Iji zere ihe ize ndụ nke ịhapụ omume mmekọrịta na ọdịbendị nke nna nna, na ọrụ niile dị ka Mandyeng, Nshok, Worom Chun, Vwana, ememe e mere n'otu emume a na-akpọ Nzem Berom
A na-eme Nzem Berom n'ime izu mbụ nke Eprel, iji kwekọọ n'oge emere Mandyeng, Nshok na Badu Festival
Nzem bụ oge mgbe a na-egosipụta ihe ngosi ọdịbendị dị iche iche site n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke ala Berom, ọkachasị na egwu, ịgba egwu, nka na ọdịbendị
Mandyeng bụ nnukwu emume a na-eme n'ala Berom iji webata oge mmiri ozuzo
A na-emekarị ememme ndị a na Machị / Eprel
N'oge gara aga, ndị Berom na-ele Mandyeng / Nshok (ha yiri nnọọ) anya dị ka ememme kachasị mkpa nke mere ka oge ọrụ ugbo na ịchụ nta na owuwe ihe ubi dị mma
Ọ bụghị obodo Berom niile na-eme emume Mandyeng na Nshok
Ndị na-eme 'Mandyeng' na-ekwu na ha sitere na Riyom, ha gụnyere; Vwang, Kuru, Zawan, Gyel, Rim, Bachit, Bangai, Lwa, Sop, Jol, Wereng Kwi, Gwo, Kakuruk, Kuzeng, Kurak, Kuchin, Rahos na Tahoss
Nshok Nshok dịtụ iche na Mandiyeng n'ihi eziokwu ahụ bụ na ọ na-ejikọkwa ịchụ nta na ọrụ ugbo n'oge mmiri ozuzo
A na-emekwa ya otu ugboro n'afọ n'oge ọnwa Eprel na Mee, iji webata oge ọhụrụ dịka Mandyeng
N'oge tupu ọchịchị ndị Berom, ịchụ nta weere dị ka ọrụ na egwuregwu
Ọ bụ ezie na n'ụzọ akụ na ụba ọ bụghị ihe dị mkpa dị ka ọrụ ugbo, a na-ewere ịchụ nta dị ka ngosipụta nke nkà na obi ike
Nke ukwuu, nke na ọtụtụ aha Berom sitere na anụmanụ egwuregwu, nke kachasị mkpa duiker [citation needed], n'ihi ịma mma ha
Aha ndị dị ka Gyang, Pam, Dung, Davou, Chuwang, Badung wdg maka ụmụ nwoke bụ ndị a na-ahụkarị, ebe ụmụ agbọghọ na-aza Kaneng, Lyop, Chundung, Nvou, Kangyang
Ndị a bụ aha maka ụdị dị iche iche nke duiker
[citation needed] Ndị ọzọ, dị ka Bot (frog) Tok (fish), Tsok (toad) wdg
bụ aha maka anụmanụ ndị ọzọ na-abụghị ndị a zụlitere, mana ọ bụghị egwuregwu
Aha ndị a na-egosi n'ụzọ doro anya etu egwuregwu dị mkpa n'etiti ndị Berom tupu ọchịchị
Nshok abụghị naanị emume ịchụ nta n'ala Berom
Ememme ndị dị ka Mado na Behwol dị ma ha adịghị mkpa dị ka Nshok
Ụfọdụ n'ime ngwá egwú n'etiti Berom gụnyere
Ngwá egwu Berom edepụtara na Blench (2021)
Ngwá egwu berom edepụtara na Blench (2021)
Berom nwere onye ọchịchị kachasị elu a na-akpọ Gbong Gwom Jos
Ọ bụ ndị ọchịchị Britain na-achị Northern Nigeria mepụtara oche ọdịnala ahụ n'afọ 1935
Northern Nigeria nwere asụsụ na ọdịbendị dị iche iche n'etiti agbụrụ ndị dị na Plateau na ndị ọzọ

Enweghị ihe ọmụma a banyere ọdịiche agbụrụ na mbụ gbara ume ka e guzobe ndị isi ndị Hausa na-achị achị iji lekọta ikike Jos Native Authority, nke gosipụtara ọgba aghara na Berom n'ihi echiche na ọdịmma na-emegiderịta onwe ha
Site na okirikiri; No

24p/1916[JOS PROF NAK 473/1916], nke e dere n'abalị iri na ise n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1917, e nyere onye bi na mpaghara Bauchi Province ntụziaka ka o zipụ ndị nwere ike isi site n'aka ndị isi obodo dị iche iche gụnyere ndị isi distrikti na ndị isi obodo ka Gọvanọ General bulie ha dị ka ndị isi
N'ịzaghachi ozi ahụ, onye bi na ya degaara odeakwụkwọ Northern Province Kaduna akwụkwọ ozi site na akwụkwọ ozi No
24/1916 [JOSPROF NAK 473/1916] nke e dere na 27 Ọktoba 1917, tụrụ aro ka onye ọchịchị dị elu lekọta mpaghara ndị a mụrụ
[citation needed]

N'oge tupu ọchịchị ndị ọchịchị, e kewara ndị Berom n'ime òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-achị onwe ha dabere na mpaghara, mana ikike ọchịchị ndị ọchịchị jikọtara ha n'okpuru Gbong Gwom na afọ 1952 iji nyere aka ịhazi ọrụ nke ụmụ amaala
Onye isi mbụ Dachung Gyang ghọrọ onye ndu site na 1935 ruo 1941
N'okpuru Dachung Gyang, a họpụtara ụlọ ọrụ ọdịnala dị ka Kansụl Tribal Berom nke ndị isi obodo mejupụtara n'ime Jos Native Authority
Ikike ya mgbe ahụ gụnyere naanị ndị Berom ma wepụ ndị isi Buji, Naraguta, Jos na Bukuru
Otú ọ dị, gọọmentị, na Gazette nke 7 Febụwarị, na afọ 1918, gbanwere ndepụta ahụ iji tinye Buji, Naraguta, Jos na Bukuru
[citation needed]
Mpụta nke Da Rwang Pam (1947 ruo ọnwụ ya na 14 Julaị, na afọ 1969) hụrụ ebuli elu nke isi nke Kansụl Agbụrụ gaa n'oche nke Gbong Gwom Jos
Kemgbe afọ 1969, ndị na-esonụ na-ejide oche ahụ
Gọvanọ gara aga nke Plateau State (2007-2015), Jonah David Jang, sitere na Berom

Berrell Elizabeth Jensen (ụbọchị irí abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1933 rụọ úbọchị irí abụọ na isé n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2015) bụ onye South Africa mgbe agha gasịrị na onye na-akpụ ihe n'oge a, onye ọrụ ebere, na onye nkụzi
A maara ya nke ọma maka ihe banyere ọrụ ya na ọla kọpa na ọla ndị ọzọ, na-eme ihe ngosi mbụ ya n'afọ 1960
Ọ hapụrụ Saụt Afrịka gaa Yurop n'afọ 1968 ma mesịa rụọ ụlọ ọrụ aka na Ireland na agụmakwụkwọ ndị okenye na ụlọ ọrụ obodo na United Kingdom
A mụrụ Jensen n'afọ 1933 na Potchefstroom, South Africa nye Phyllis (née Horwood) na Harry Jay
O nwere ụmụnne nwoke atọ na ụmụnne nwoke abụọ site na alụmdi na nwunye nna ya gara aga
Jensen gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Natal dị na Durban ebe ọ gụsịrị nzere bachelọ ya na sayensị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
N'afọ 1958, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na metalwork na welding na Natal Technical College wee bido ime mobiles ịchọ mma, na-aga n'ihu ịmepụta ihe ọkpụkpụ site na iji ọla nchara, ọla kọpa, ọlaọcha, na enamel
Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ya a na-egosipụta, e nyere ya ọrụ ịmepụta nnukwu ọrụ n'ihe banyere ụlọ ọha na eze
N'afọ 1984 Jensen nwetara diplọma na atụmatụ site na Architectural Association School of Architecture na London
N'afọ 1957 Jensen lụrụ Anton Jensen, nwa akwụkwọ PhD, onye ya na ya nwere nwa nwoke na nwa nwanyị
N'ihi ọchịchị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, ya na di ya họọrọ ịkwaga Europe site na Johannesburg
Ha kwụsịrị na Crete, ezinụlọ ahụ wee nwee ihe mberede ụgbọ ala n'afọ 1969 nke di Jensen nwụrụ

Jensen na ụmụ ya nọrọ na Gris wee kwaga obere oge na United Kingdom wee, n'afọ 1977, gaa County Donegal, Ireland, ógè onye ụkọchukwu na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya bụ Nna James McDyer kpọrọ ya ka o guzobe ụlọ ọrụ aka na ụlọ ọrụ nka
Jensen mechara biri na Belfast wee biri na London ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ọrụ obodo, na-eguzobe ma na-arụ ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ndị okenye na ụlọ ọrụ obodo gụnyere na Archway, Highgate na Hampstead
Ọ lara ezumike nká na Ireland, mana ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akpụ ihe
Ihe ngosi izizi nke Jensen bụ na Durban n'afọ 1960
O gosipụtara ihe ngosi iri na itoolu ọzọ n'ime afọ asatọ sochirinụ
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ígwè, na-eji ọkụ oxy-acetylene, hacksaw, metal guillotine na usoro mmepụta ihe ndị ọzọ, na-ejikwa usoro metal-, resin- na concrete-casting
Jensen gosipụtara na ụlọ ngosi na South Africa na United Kingdom
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na nnukwu ọrụ ọha na eze n'ihe banyere ụlọ Netherlands Bank, ụlọ ọrụ redio Phillips, Jan Smuts Airport, na Windhoek Museum
N'afọ 1977, Jensen bịdọrọ ụlọ ọrụ aka na County Donegal, Ireland
N'ebe ahụ, o mepụtara ụlọ ọrụ nka iji zụọ ụmụ akwụkwọ na ọrụ ígwè na ihe ọkpụkpụ, yana ime ọla, ibipụta akwụkwọ, na ọrụ aka ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 1993, Jensen zụtara ụlọ ụka Protestant dị afọ narị atọ na Rochfortbridge, County Westmeath
Ọ rụzigharịrị ụlọ ahụ ma tinye ụlọ ọrụ metal
Ọ maliteghachiri ịcha ma rụchaa ọrụ n'ihi ndị isi obodo
A kpọrọ Jensen ka o guzobe ụlọ ọrụ aka na Glencolumbkille, Ireland n'afọ 1977 dịka akụkụ nke atụmatụ ịzụlite ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara ahụ
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ ndị okenye na Belfast
O guzobere Highgate Newtown Community Centre
O mechara bụrụ onye nduzi Hampstead Community Centre, ọkwa ọ nọrọ afọ itoolu
N'afọ 2001, Jensen haziri otu County Westmeath gburugburu ebe obibi nke kwadoro megide ebe a na-ekpofu ala na mpaghara Killucan
Jensen nwụrụ ógè ọ dị afọ Iri asatọ na abụọ na Cork, Ireland, n'ubochí irí abụọ na isé n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2015
Berry Bickle (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1959) bụ onye mba Zimbabwe na-ese ihe nke bi na Maputo
A mụrụ ya na Bulawayo, Bickle gụrụ akwụkwọ na Chisipite Senior School na Harare
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ gara Durban Institute of Technology, ebe ọ nwetara nzere diplọma mba na nka, na Mahadum Rhodes nke mba South Africa, ebe o nwetara nzere mastas na nka
Bickle bụ onye guzobere Bulawayo's Visual Artists' Association
Ọ na-ekewa oge ya n'etiti Zimbabwe na Mozambique, ọrụ ya na-enyocha akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mpaghara ahụ
N'afọ 1988, ya na Tapfuma Gutsa haziri nzukọ Pachipamwe, nzukọ Triangle Art Trust nke mbụ a haziri na Afrịka
N'afọ 2010, ọ ghọrọ Rockefeller Foundation Creative Arts Fellow ma na-arụ ọrụ na Rockefeller Foundation Bellagio Center na usoro Suite Europa
Berry Bickle bụ onye na-ese ihe na multimedia nke na-arụ ọrụ na ntinye, ihe onyonyo, foto, na ceramik
Ọrụ ya bụ n'ozuzu nrụnye, ọ bụkwa ọrụ mgbasa ozi agwakọta nke gụnyere edemede; ụfọdụ gụnyere ihe onyonyo na foto
Bickle na onye mba Zimbabwe na-ahụ maka ụrọ, Marjorie Wallace, na-arụkọ ọrụ nke ọma
Ya na onye na-ese ihe na mba Peru bụ Adrian Velasquez arụkọla ọrụ

Ihe ngosi ahụ na mbipụta Inscribing Meaning Writing and Graphic Systems in African Art na-egosipụta ọnụnọ nke ederede na ọrụ Bickle na mkpa ọ dị ime ihe na ịnakọta okwu; na usoro a, onye na-ese ihe na-edepụta ọrụ ya 'Re-Writes'
A na-egosipụta ọrụ Berry Bickle na mba ụwa
N'afọ 2011, Bickle nọchitere anya Zimbabwe na Venice Biennale, n'oge ahụ ọ bụ ihe na-adịghị ahụkebe maka mba Afrịka
Pavilion Zimbabwe, nke Raphael Chikukwa haziri, akpọrọ 'Ịhụ Onwe Anyị'

Berry Gordy III (amụrụ na Nọvemba 28, 1929), nke a maara dịka Berry Gorty Jr, bụ ónyé America bụbu ónyé isi ndekọ, onye na-emepụta ndekọ, onye édémédé egwu, onye na'emepụta ihe nkiri na ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri telivishọn
A maara ya nke ọma dị ka onye guzobere akara ndekọ Motown na ndị enyemaka ya, nke bụ azụmaahịa kachasị elu nke ndị Africa America ruo ọtụtụ iri afọ

Dị ka ónyé na-ede egwu, o dere ma ọ bụ soro dee ọtụtụ egwu gụnyere 'Lonely Teardrops' na 'That's Why' (Jackie Wilson), 'Shop Around' (The Miracles), na 'Do You Love Me' (the Contours), nke niile nọ n'elu chaatị R&B nkè US, yana egwu mba ụwa 'Reet Petite' (Jackye Wilson)
Dị ka akụkụ nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, o dere ọtụtụ egwu egwu màkà Jackson 5, gụnyere 'I Want You Back' na 'ABC'
Dị ka ónyé na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, ọ malitere Miracles ma bịanye aka na ọrụ dịka Supremes, Marvin Gaye, Temptations, Four Tops, Gladys Knight & the Pips, na Stevie Wonder
A maara ya màkà iji nlezianya na-eduzi onyinyo ọha, uwe, omume, na usoro ihe omume ya
A nabatara Gordy n'ime Rock and Roll Hall of Fame na 1988, onye isi ala Barack Obama nyèrè ya National Medal of Arts na 2016, na Kennedy Center Honors na 2021
N'afọ 2022, a nabatara ya na Black Music & Entertainment Walk of Fame

Berry Gordy III (nke a makwaara dị ka Berry Gorty Jr) bụ nwa nke asaá n'ime ụmụ asatọ (Fuller, Esther, Anna, Loucye, George, Gwen, Berry na Robert), amụrụ na Nọvemba 28, 1929, na Detroit, n'ezinụlọ Berry Gardy II (nke a maara dị ka Berries Gordy Sr), onye si Oconee na Washington County, Georgia kwaga Detroit na 1922
Nna nna ya, aha ya bụ Berry Gordy I, bụ nwa James Gordy, ónyé nwe ubi ọcha na Georgia, na nwanyị ọ zụrụ ohu
Nwanne ya nwoke, James (nwa nke okenye James na nwunye ya), bụ nna nna nke Ónyé isi ala Jimmy Carter

A kpọgara Berry Gordy II na Detroit ma site na ohere ọrụ nke azụmaahịa ụgbọ ala na-aga n'ihu na-enye, yana nchegbu banyéré ikuku dị na South America ebe ndị isi ojii na-egbu ndị mmadụ 'na-eme ka ndị Ku Klux Klan na-eme ihe mgbe niile'; n'ime afọ iri abụọ mbụ nke narị afọ nke iri abụọ, a kọrọ na 1,502 lynchings, ọtụtụ n'ime ha na steeti ndịda
Nna Gordy meghere ụlọ ahịa nri, nwere azụmahịa plastering na ọkwa nkà, na ụlọ obibi akwụkwọ
Ọ bụ ezie na ụmụnne ya Fuller na George nwere obi ụtọ ịrụ ọrụ n'ọrụ nna ha nyere ha n'iwu na obibi akwụkwọ, Berry na Robert, ụmụ nwoke ndị na-eto eto, enweghị mmasị ịgbaso ụzọ ahụ
Ma Robert na Berry nwèrè mmasị ịgba egwú na egwu, mana mmasị kachasị ukwuu Berry bụ ịkụ ọkpọ
A nabatara Gordy na Rock and Roll Hall of Fame n'afọ 1988
A nabatara ya na Junior Achievement US
Business Hall of Fame na 1998 na Michigan Rock and Roll Legends Hall of Fame n'afọ 2009
Mgbè Gordy natara Songwriters Hall of Fame's Pioneer Award na June 13, 2013, ọ bụ ónyé mbụ dị ndụ natara nsọpụrụ ahụ
N'afọ 2016, Gordy natara National Medal of Arts site n'aka Onye isi ala Obama màkà 'inyere aka mepụta ụda ọhụrụ na egwu America
Dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ na ónyé na-ede egwu, o nyere aka wuo Motown, na-amalite ọrụ egwu nke ọtụtụ ndị omenkà a ma ama
Ụda ya pụrụ iche nyèrè aka ịkpụzi akụkọ mba anyị
Bert Andrews (Maachị 21, 1929 na Jenụwarị 25, 1993) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto, onye na-ede akụkọ ihe nkiri ojii na New York City

N'ọrụ nke were ihe karịrị afọ iri atọ, o sere foto ọtụtụ n'ime ndị isi Afrịka-Amerịka na-eme ihe nkiri na ihuenyo gụnyere James Earl Jones, Cicely Tyson, Diana Sands, Louis Gossett, Jr, Billy Dee Williams, Morgan Freeman, Alfre Woodard, Denzel Washington na Samuel L
Jackson
A mụrụ Bert J
Andrews na Chicago n'ọnwa Maachị 21, afọ 1929, nwa John na Frieda Andrews
Mgbe ọ dị obere, ọ kwagara Harlem, ebe o tolitere
Ọrụ ya malitere na ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ dị ka onye na-ede egwu, onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-agba egwu
Na mbido afọ 1950, mgbe ọ na-eje ozi na ndị agha, Andrews malitere ịmụ foto
N'afọ 1953, n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya n'usuu ndị agha, Andrews malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye mmụta maka Chuck Stewart, onye a maara nke ọma maka foto ya nke ndị egwu jazz
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọkwa ahụ ruo n'afọ 1957, mgbe ọ gbasara n'onwe ya, na-ese foto n'etiti ihe ndị ọzọ, ihe nkiri maka ihe nkiri ndị isi ojii na New York City
Otu n'ime ọrụ mbụ ya dị ka onye na-ese foto n'onwe ya bụ mmepụta nke egwuregwu ahụ n'afọ 1957, Dark of the Moon, nke YMCA Drama Guild mepụtara na Little Theatre
Vinnette Carroll haziri mmepụta a ma gosipụta ya n'etiti ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Cicely Tyson, Roscoe Lee Browne na Clarence Williams III

N'ime ogologo ọrụ ya, Andrews ga-ese foto ọtụtụ mmepụta nke egwuregwu dị mkpa gụnyere The Blacks (1961), The Blood Knot (1964), To Be Young, Gifted and Black (1969), The River Niger (1972), Bubbling Brown Sugar (1976), A Soldier's Play (1982) na Ma Rainey's Black Bottom (1984)
Foto ya apụtawokwa n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ dị mkpa, dị ka Time, Life, Ebony, Newsweek na The New York Times
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị 29, nke afọ 1985, ọkụ gbara ụlọ ọrụ ya na 750 Eighth Avenue na nkuku nke 46th Street na New York City
N'ebe dị n'etiti 40,000 na 50,000 foto furu efu, na-agafe ihe dị ka afọ iri atọ nke ọrụ
Otú ọ dị, site n'enyemaka nke ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri dị iche iche, Andrews nwere ike inweta mbipụta nke ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke foto ya gụnyere ihe dịka 2,000 site na Negro Ensemble Company
N'afọ 1988, e guzobere Bert Andrews Photographic Collection of Blacks in the Theatre na Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture
N'afọ sochirinụ, e bipụtara nchịkọta foto ndị a n'akwụkwọ In the Shadow of the Great White Way Images from the Black Theatre (Thunder's Mouth Press, 1989)
Andrews nwụrụ n'ọrịa kansa na Lenox Hill Hospital dị na Manhattan n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 25, afọ 1993, mgbe ọ dị afọ 63
Bert Long, Jr
(1940-2013) bụ ónyé isi nri, ónyé na-ese ihe, onye na'ese foto, ónyé na ónyé guzobere Project Row Houses
A mụrụ Bert Long, Jr, na 1940 na Fifth Ward, Houston, Texas
Nné ya rụrụ ọrụ dị ka odibo, nna ya na-arụ ọrụ ígwè nwụrụ n'ihe mberede dị egwu n'ebe ọrụ mgbè Long dị naanị afọ atọ, na-ahapụ ya inyere nne ya aka dịka o nwèrè ike
Nna ya, onye na-arụ ọrụ na Sheffield Steel, nwụrụ mgbè ọ dabara n'ime ite ígwè a gbazere agbaze
Long nyere aka n'ilekọta ụmụnne ya atọ ndị ọ tọrọ ma dị ka nwatakịrị, ọ na-ewepụta ogho n'oge ọkọchị iji nyere aka kwado ezinụlọ ahụ
Long rụrụ ọrụ na Houston Club mgbe ọ dị naanị afọ iri na abụọ
Ọ gàrà klas nka mbụ ya na Wheatley High School (Houston) mana ọ na-akụzi onwe ya, na-etinye ọtụtụ awa na-amụ akwụkwọ nka n'ọbá akwụkwọ ọha na eze
IN'afọ 1959, mgbè ọ dị afọ 19, Long sonyeere ndị agha mmírí ma jee ozi ruo 1964
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ lụrụ ónyé agbata obi ya mgbe ọ bụ nwata Connie Kelly
Ha nwere ụmụ atọ
Tupu ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe, Long bụ onye isi nri a ma ama na mba ahụ
Ọ gàrà ụlọ akwụkwọ nri na Los Angeles ma buru ụzọ rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nri na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ dị mma tupu ọ mepee ụlọ oriri nke ya 'Big Bertž' na Oregon
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ laghachiri California ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi na MGM Grand Las Vegas
Longs kwagara Rome mgbe Long meriri Rome Prize ma mesịa kwaga Spain
A chọpụtara na Connie nwèrè ọrịa kansa akpa ume na 1997 ma nwụọ na 1998 obere oge ka di na nwunye ahụ laghachiri Texas
Long gara leta onye omenkà a mụrụ na Scotland bụ Joan Batson na 1998, na 1999, ha laghachiri Houston ebe ha bi n'ụlọ ruo mgbè Long nwụrụ
Long nwụrụ site na ọrịa kansa pancreatic na Febụwarị 1, 2013 mgbè ọ dị afọ 72
Obéré oge tupu ọnwụ ya, ọ lụrụ Batson, ónyé ya na ya biri n'ụlọ na ndụ ihe karịrị afọ iri na ise
Ihe ngosi mbụ Long bụ na gallery nka na MGM Grand ébé ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé isi nri, ahụmịhe ahụ kpaliri nnukwu mgbanwe ọrụ
Ọ bụ n'afọ 1975, Long nọkwa n'etiti afọ iri atọ, mgbe o kpebiri itinye onwé ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe
Ọ kpọkọtara ezinụlọ ya wee gaa n'ebe ngosi nka gafee ọdịda anyanwụ United States
N'afọ 1976, Long nwetara ọrụ na Ritz-Carlton na Chicago ma nwee ihe ịga nke ọma na Chicago, gụnyere ihe ngosi na DuSable Museum of African American History
Nwunye ya Connie Kelly Long nọrọ naanị otu ọnwa tupu ọ laghachi Houston na ihu igwe ya dị ọkụ
Long nọrọ ọnwa 10 ọzọ tupu ọ laghachi Houston
Asụsụ Berta n'onwe ya, nke a na-akpọ kwa Gebeto, bụ nke ndị Berta (nke a na-akpọkwa Bertha, Barta, Burta) na Sudan na Ethiopia na-asụ
Asụsụ Berta atọ, Gebeto, Fadashi na Undu, a na-ewerekarị ha dị ka olumba nke otu asụsụ
Berta n'onwe ya gụnyere olumba Bake, Dabuso, Gebeto, Mayu, na Shuru; aha olumba Gebeto nwere ike ịgbasa na Berta niile
Asụsụ Berta, ma ọ bụ Asụsụ Funj, nke ndi Igbo na-ewere dị ka olumba nke otu asụsụ, bụ Gebeto (Berta n'onwe ya), Fadashi, na Undu
Ha bụ ma ọ bụ obere ezinụlọ (ma ọ bụ asụsụ dị iche) nke ha, ma ọ bụ alaka bụ isi nke ezinụlọ asụsụ Nilo-Saharan
Berta nwere ụdị usoro usoro okwu isiokwu-ngwaa-ihe
Ọ bụ asụsụ tonal
O metụtala ụfọdụ asụsụ Jebel ọwụwa anyanwụ
Aha Arabic 'Beni-Shangul' (dị ka ọ dị na mpaghara Etiopia nke Benishangul-Gumuz) na-enweta site na okwu Berta (ya na bele 'nkume / nkume' na-ezighị ezi dị ka Arabic beni 'ụmụ')
Bremer (2016) nyochara ụdị Berta 6 ndị a, na-enye ha ndepụta okwu
Ozi gbasara ala sitere na Bremer (2016 2-3)
Ewezuga Metehara, a na-asụ ụdị Berta niile a nyochara na mpaghara Benishangul-Gumuz nke Etiopia
Enwere obere data maka ụdị Berta a na-asụ na Sudan
Ndigwako Bertha Akim Kingori (n'ụbọchị 19 Nọvemba 1930 ruo n'ụbọchị 4 Nọvember 2013) bụ onye nkuzi na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tanzania
A họpụtara ya na Kansụl Iwu n'afọ 1957
A mụrụ Kingori na Tukuyu n'ọnwa Nọvemba 1930 n'aka Subila Kabonga na Akim Mwakosya
Otu n'ime ụmụ agbọghọ ole na ole si n'obodo ya gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Tabora Girls School na Gayaza High School na King's College Budo boarding schools na Uganda
N'afọ 1954 ọ malitere ịmụ ihe na Makerere College n'okpuru agụmakwụkwọ gọọmentị, nweta diplọma na agụmakwụkwọ
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Tanganyika, Kingori rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na Loleza Girls' School na Mbeya
Ọ gara Makerere College na Uganda n'afọ ndị 1950 n'okpuru agụmakwụkwọ gọọmentị
N'oge ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ, o nyekwara aka na ụlọ ọgwụ ụmụaka na Kampala
N'afọ 1956, e nyere ya Van Leer na Atlanta Fellowship, nke mere ka ọ gụọ akwụkwọ na Mount Holyoke College na United States ruo otu afọ
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Tanganyika, ọ kụziri na kọleji ọzụzụ ndị nkuzi na Butimba na Mpwapwa wee bụrụ onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ Bwiru Girls' Secondary School na Mwanza
A họpụtara ya na Kansụl Iwu n'afọ 1957
N'afọ sochirinụ ọ lụrụ Peter Gathura Kingori, onye ya na ya mụrụ ụmụ ise
N'afọ 1965, a họpụtara ya na Kansụl Mahadum East Africa
N'afọ 1967, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ nke òtù ụmụ nwanyị nke Umoja Wa Wanawake Wa Tanzania
Onye otu National Christian Council nke Kenya, ọ bụ nwanyị Africa mbụ a họpụtara na Anglican Consultative Council n'afọ 1973
Ọ nwụrụ na Kenya n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2013 ma lie ya na Mwalimu Kingīori Farm na Nyeri

Saint Bertha maọbụ ị kpọọ ya Saint Aldeberge (a mụrụ n'ihe dịka 565 - nwụrụ na 601 maọbu mgbe ọ gafere) bụ eze nwanyị nke Kent nke mmetụta ya mere ka Okpụkperechi Chineke bátá na mpaghara England a na -akpọ Anglo-Saxon England
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye nsọ maka ọrụ ya na ntọala ọ tụrụ n'oge akụkọ ihe mere eme nke England
Bertha bụ ada eze ala Frankfurt, nna ya bụ eze Charibert I na nwunye ya Ingoberga, bụ nwa nwa nke Eze Chlothar 1 na-achị na nwa nwa nwa Clovis 1 na Saint Clotilde
Nna ya nwụrụ na 567, nne ya nwụọ na 589
A zụlitere Bertha na nso nsoTours
Alụmdi na nwunye ya na onye ọgọ mmụọ Æthelberht nke Kent, na 580 AD, bụ na ọnọdụ na a ga-ekwe ka ọ na-eme Okpụkperechi ya
Ọ kpọtara ụkọchukwu ya, Liudhard, gaa England
E weghachiri ụlọ ụka Rom mbụ maka Bertha na mpụga ama Canterbury, ma mepee ya n'aha Saint Martin nke Tours
Ọ bụ ụlọ ekpere nke Nwunye Eze Bertha naanị ya tupu Augustine esi na Rom lọta
Ụlọ ụka St Martin nke dị ugbu a bụ n'otu ebe ahụ ka ọ dị, na-etinye mgbidi Rom nke ụlọ ụka mbụ na chancel
UNESCO kwenyere na ọ bụ ya bụ ụlọ ụka kachasị ochie n'akụkụ n'ụwa ndị na-asụ Bekee ebe ofufe Ndị Kraịst na-aga n'ihu n'akwụsịghị akwụsị kemgbe 580 AD
St Martin's (ya na Canterbury Cathedral na St Augustine's Abbey) mejupụtara ebe nrite ụwa nke UNESCO dị na Canterbury
Popu Gregory Onye Ukwu zigara ndị ozi ala ọzọ nke Augustine nke Canterbury nọ n'isi ya iji weghachite Okpụkperechi Iso Ụzọ Kraịst na England na 596
Nnabata na nkwado dị mma nke ndị ozi a nwetara mgbe ha rutere na 597 AD sitere n'ike nke Bertha
Ewezuga nkwado ya na obi oma Æthelberht, ebe obibi ndị mọnk na ụlọ ofufe gaara abụ n'ebe ọzọ
N'afọ 601, Popu Gregory degaara Bertha akwụkwọ ozi, ebe ọ jara ya mma nke ukwuu maka okwukwe ya na ihe ọmụma ya nke akwụkwọ ozi
Ihe ndị edere maka Anglo-Saxon n'akọwa na Saint Bertha nweere ụmụ abụọ Eadbald of Kent, and Æthelburg of Kent
Edere aha ya N'Akwụkwọ ihe ndidi mere n'oge ọchịchị 'Kentish Royal Legend'
A na-arụ ụka màkà ụbọchị ọnwụ ya (ma eleghị anya 606)
Obodo Canterbury na-eme emume ncheta Queen Bertha n'ọtụtụ ụzọ
Bertha Sophie Felicitas Freifrau von Suttner (nke a na-akpọ ; nke a na-amụ und Tettau; 9 June 1843 n'ụbọchị 21 June 1914) bụ onye Austria-Bohemian na-eme udo na onye edemede
N'afọ 1905, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị nke abụọ nwetara ihe nrite Nobel (mgbe Marie Curie gasịrị n'afọ 1903), nwanyị mbụ e nyere ihe nrite udo Nobel, na onye Austria mbụ nwetara ihe nritu Nobel
A mụrụ Bertha Kinský n'ụbọchị 9 June 1843 na Kinský Palace na Obecní dvůr (cz) district nke Prague

Nne na nna ya bụ Austrian Lieutenant general (German Feldmarschall-Leutnant) Franz Michael de Paula Josef Graf Kinsky von Wchinitz und Tettau (1769 ruo afọ 1843), onye nwụrụ n'oge na-adịbeghị anya mgbe ọ dị afọ 75, na nwunye ya na-eto eto Sophie Wilhelmine von Körner (1815 ruo afọ 1884), fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri ise karịa ya

Ọ bụ ezie na mmekọrịta onwe onye ya na Alfred Nobel dị mkpirikpi, ya na ya na-ederịta akwụkwọ ozi ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 1896, a kwenyere na Von Suttner nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu na mkpebi ya itinye ihe nrite udo n'etiti ihe nrite ndị ahụ enyere na testament ya

E nyere Bertha von Suttner Nobel Peace Price na nke ise na 10 Disemba 1905, ya na onye ibe ya, onye ọkà mmụta iwu Tobias Asser (1838-1913) maka enyemaka ha n'ịmepụta usoro mba ụwa dabere na udo karịa agha
Ihe ngosi ahụ mere na 18 Eprel 1906 na Kristiania
Berthe Emillene Etane Ngolle (amụrụ na ụbọsị 19 May 1995) bụ onye Cameroon na-agba mgba
Ọ bụ onye nwetara ọlaọcha ugboro abụọ na African Games
O meriri ihe nrite ọla edo na ihe omume ya na 2022 African Wrestling Championships nke emere na El Jadida, Morocco
O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị nke 62 kilogram na 2018 Commonwealth Games na Gold Coast, Australia
N'afọ 2019, ọ nọchitere anya Cameroon na African Games ma merie ọlaọcha na freestyle 62 kg nke ụmụ nwanyị
N'afọ 2021, o sonyere na asọmpi African & Oceania Olympic Qualification Tournament na-atụ anya iru eru maka 2020 Summer Olympics na Tokyo, Japan
Ọ mechiri n'ọnọdụ nke atọ
Ọ nwetakwara ike iru eru maka Olimpik na World Olympic Qualification Tournament nke emere na Sofia, Bulgaria
A mụrụ Rakotosamimanana na Andasibe dị na Moramanga District na abalị iri na asatọ nke ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 1938
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Paris VII, ngalaba Sayensị, inweta nzere na Animal Biology and anthropology
Mgbe ọ laghachiri n'afọ 1967 ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Nkega Geology na Mahadum Madagascar
Ọ lụrụ onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ anụmanụ bụ Philibert Rakotosamimanana
Ọrụ Rakotosamimanana na Ngalaba Geology, site na nke mbụ gụnyere nlekọta na ịkụzi akụkụ ndị a na-eme n'aka nke isiokwu ahụ
Mgbe afọ asaa gasịrị, ya na onye ọrụ ibe ya Ọkàmmụta Henri Rakotoarivelo, guzobere ọrụ paleontology nke mbụ na mahadum ahụ n'afọ 1974
N'afọ 1977, e nyere ya nzere dọkịnta site na Mahadum Paris VII, nke akpọrọ 'La diversité anthropologique des isolats des hautes terres de l'Imerina (Madagascar)
Confrontation du biologique et du social'
Nnyocha a nyochara ụdị ndị mmadụ dị iche iche na agbụrụ ha dị iche iche na ụdị mmekọrịta ha na Imerina Highlands

N'afọ 1993, ọrụ paleontology ghọrọ Ngalaba zuru oke, karịsịa n'ihi atụmatụ ya, ọ bụkwa onye isi ya site n'afọ1995 ruo 1998 O mepụtara ngalaba atọ ọhụrụ ọzọ Physical Anthropology, Nutritional Anthropology, Primatology and Evolutionary Biology
Ọ rụsiri ọrụ ike na ngalaba ahụ ruo 2003 mgbe olekọtara ụmụ akwụkwọ ndị chọrọ ịbụ dọkịnta ruokwa mgbe ọ nwụrụ
N'oge niile ọ na-arụ ọrụ, Rakotosamimanana bụ onye otu ọtụtụ òtù ndị ọkachamara, gụnyere 'Groupe d'Etude et de Recherche sur les Primate de Madagascar' (GERP)

Òtù ndị ọzọ ọ sonyekwara gụnyere Malagasy Academy, ndị ọrụ 'Ranomafana National Park', IUCN / SSC Primate Survival Commission, ndị òtù nchịkọta akụkọ nke 'International Journal of Primatology' na 'Lemur News', Society of Human Biometrics, Society of Anthropology of Paris na International Association of Anthropologists

Mgbe nsogbu ego na Madagascar mere na àgbàtà 1980 na 1989 gasịrị, Rakotosamimanana bụ otu n'ime ndị na-esepụta ụlọ owuwu gara ije ka ụlọ ọrụ ehiwere inyere ndị mmadụ aka nke ndi mba ọzọ kwalite mmemme, nke ga-aba uru n'ezie maka mmepe nke mba ahụ

Dị ka odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke ọgbakọ nke iri na asaa nke International Primatological Society, Rakotosamimanana rụgidere gọọmentị ka ha kwenye inye mahadum mba ahụ nnukwu ego iji kwadebe maka nzukọ 1998, nke emere na Antananarivo
Site n'afọ 1977 ruo afọ 1983 ọ bụ onye isi na ngalaba nnyocha sayensị na Ministrị n'ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ and Nnyocha sayensị nke Madagascar
Site na 1986 ruo n'afọ 1992 ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ teknụzụ n'otu Ministri ahụ
Ọ bụ onye rụsiri ọrụ ike n'ịmepụta atụmatụ National Environmental Action Plan nke Madagascar
Nnyocha Rakotosamimanana lekwasịrị anya na fossil na subfossil ụmụ anụmanụ na-enye nwa ara na Madagascar
N'oge ndụ Rakotosamimanana, a gụrụ ụdị òké lemur a kọwara ọhụrụ aha ya Madame Berthe's mouse lemur
Ndị dere nkọwa mbụ ahụ kwanyere ùgwù otuto nye nhazi nnyocha ogologo oge nke ha na German Primate Centre mere na Kirindy-Mitea National Park, bụ ebe obibi nke lemur ọhụrụ
Microcebus berthae bụ anụ ya na mmadụ nọ n'ótù agbụrụ nke kacha nta n'ụwa, nke achọpụtara n'afọ 1992 n'oké ọhịa Menabe
N'afọ 1993, ndị na-eme nchọpụta kpọrọ ụdị anụmaanụ n'emepụta ihe eji eme akwa (silk) n'adịkwaghị n'ụwa ugbua, a na-akpọbu (Coua berthae maọbụ Madame Berthe's Coua), n'aha Rakotosamimanana
Rakotosamimanana so n'ime ndị otu mbụ ndị kọwara

Rakotosamimanana jikọrọ aka na mba ụwa ndị ọzọ n'ime ọrụ nyocha paleontology na primatology, ma bụrụkwa onye a na-akwanyere ùgwù na ihe gbasara anụmaanụ ndị há na mmadụ nọ n'ótù agbụrụ ndị si Madagascar, gụnyere òtù esi kesaa ha gafee agwaetiti ahụ
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu jiri usoro DNA gosipụta na lemur niile ndị si ná Madagascar sitere na ótù nna nna pụta

Ihe edeputara maka Ọnatarachi fossil nke Madagascar dịbu obere na mbụ, mana Rakotosamimanana so n'otu ndị chọpụtara ebe ọhụrụ ọnatarachi ndị a dị, sitekwa na nkea chọpụta ụfọdụ dinosaurs mbụ nke agwaetiti ahụ
Ndị a gụnyere ụdị abụọ ọhụrụ nke eucynodonts na-abụghị nke na-enye nwa ara
Rakotosamimanana nwere mmasị siri ike n'ebe nnyochapụtaSportive Lemur nke Miles Edwards ma mụọ ụzọ ha si eji ebe ihi ụra ha eme ihe, yana igbu ụmụaka n'etiti ha
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu sara mbara nke mere nchọpụta banyere njikọ dị n'etiti ịdị anya nke mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa na nkesa n'ala nke lemur ndị dị mkpụmkpụ
Ọrụ ya na ndị ọrụ ibe ya rụrụ na Pachylemur insignis gosipụtara na ọ nwee mmetụta n'ụdị Variecia karịa Lemur
Ọ mụkwara maka ụdi lemur dermatoglyphs
Bertina Lopes (July 11, 1924 - February 10, 2012) bụ onye Mozambique, onye na-ese ihe na onye na-akpụ ihe n'Itali
Ọrụ Lopes na-egosipụta mmetụta miri emi nke Africa na agba jupụtara na ihe ndị siri ike nke ihe oyiyi yiri ihe nkpuchi na ụdị geometric
E keleela ya maka ịkọwa 'nkatọ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ịnụ ọkụ n'obi nke mba nke metụtara ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe Mozambik n'oge ya'
A mụrụ Lopes na Maputo (nke a maara dị ka Lourenço Marques), Mozambique, na July 11, 1924 nye nne Africa, onye a maara ezinụlọ ya n'ógbè ahụ, na nna onye Portugal, onye bụ onye ọrụ ubi

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Maputo, mana mgbe afọ nke abụọ ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị gasịrị, ọ kwagara Lisbon iji mechaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndri, ebe ọ gụrụ ihe osise na eserese na Lino António na Celestino Alves wee nweta nzere na eserese
N'oge ahụ, ọ zutere ndị na-ese ihe dịka Marcelino Vespeira, Carlos Botelho, Albertina Mantua, Costa Pinheiro, Júlio Pomar na Nuno Sampayo
N'afọ 1953, Lopes laghachiri Mozambique, ebe ọ lụrụ onye na-ede uri Virgilio de Lemos, onye ya na ya mụtara ụmụ ejima
Lopes kụziri nka ihe osise na General Machado Girlsī Technical School ruo afọ itoolu
Ọ bụ ezie na a na-enwe ekele maka nkà nkuzi ọhụrụ ya, ndị a ga-abanye mgbe ụfọdụ na esemokwu na usoro nchịkwa ụlọ akwụkwọ
N'afọ 1955, de Lemos bipụtara uri na-emegide ọchịchị nke dugara n'ikpe maka imerụ ọkọlọtọ Portugal
O mechara sonye na Mozambican Resistance (1954 - 61) e wee jide ya maka nnupụisi
Ihe omume ndị ahụ mere ka ọmịiko Lopes maka ndị na-adịghị ike na ndị a na-emegbu emegbu nke ndị bi na ya, isiokwu nke a na-ahụkarị na nka ya
N'oge a nke ndụ ya, ịhụ mba n'anya ghọrọ mmetụta dị ukwuu maka ọrụ nka ya na echiche onwe onye
N'afọ 1956, Lopes sere ihe osise a na-akpọ 'Pavilhão da Evocação Històrica' nke emere emume ya n'oge António de Oliveira Salazar gara njem nleta na Maputo
Afọ atọ ka e mesịrị, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke obodo Maputo na osote onye isi oche
N'ihi mmekọrịta ya na de Lemos, yana mmalite nke Agha Nnwere Onwe Mozambik, a manyere Lopes ịhapụ Mozambique na 1961
Mgbe obere oge gachara na Lisbon, ọ kwagara Rom
N'afọ 1964 ọ lụrụ Francesco Confaloni, onye injinia kọmputa na onye hụrụ nka n'anya
N'oge ahụ, ọ ghọrọ enyi ụfọdụ n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nka Itali, gụnyere Marino Marini, Renato Guttuso, Carlo Levi na Antonio Scordia
N'afọ 1965, Lopes nwetara akwụkwọ ikike ịbụ nwa amaala Ịtali
N'afọ 1979, Lopes gara Mozambique na nke mbụ ya kemgbe ọ hapụrụ, na 1982 ọrụ ya bụ isiokwu nke nnukwu ihe ngosi na Museu Nacional de Arte Moderna na Maputo
N'afọ 1986, e meghere ihe ngosi mbụ ya na Palazzo Venezia na Rom
N'afọ 1993, onye isi ala nke Republic of Portugal Mario Soares sọpụrụ ya dị ka Commander for Merits na Lisbon
N'afọ 1995, Lopes bụ onye mmeri nke Gabriele D'Annunzio Prize na Rom
N'afọ 2002, onye isi ala Ịtali bụ Carlo Azeglio Ciampi kwanyeere ya ugwu maka onyinye ya na nka
Oge ikpeazụ Lopes pụtara n'ihu ọha bụ na Venice Biennale na 2011
Ọ nwụrụ na Rom n'afọ 2012 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na isii

Onye isi ala Mozambik Armando Guebuza kọwara Lopes dị ka 'nwanyi dị umeala n'obi, nke na-echepụta ihe, nke nwere ike ịlụ ọgụ ma na-emesapụ aka, onye na-achọ mgbe niile n'onwe ya ka ọ gafee ihe ndị ọ rụzuru n'oge gara aga'
Ọrụ Lopes nwere mmetụta dị iche iche, nke gụnyere nka Mozambican na modernism Portuguese
N'agbata afọ 1946 na 1956, ọ nabatara nka nke ndị na-ese ihe n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ na ndị na-ede ihe na South America
Mgbe Picasso nwụsịrị n'afọ 1973, Lopes ji ihe osise siri ike nke na-anọchi anya mmegide ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Spain sọpụrụ ya

Ozugbo Lopes bịarutere nso na ndị na-emegide Fascist, ọ malitere imegide echiche nke 'arte negra (ihe osise ojii) ma nweta mkpali na uri nke José Craveirinha na Noémia de Sousa, na-etinye isiokwu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya n'ime ọrụ ya
Ihe omume ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị metụtara obodo ya nwekwara mmetụta miri emi n'ọrụ Lopesão, ọkachasị n'oge nnwere onwe na agha obodo n'etiti FRELIMO na RENAMO
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ Lopes gosipụtara akụkọ ifo na akụkọ ndị Afrịka metụtara ihe omume ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-eme n'oge mmepụta
1950 Ihe nrite ihe osise, Lourenço Marques (Mozambique)
1953 Ihe nrite nke Prata, Lourenço Marques (Mozambique)
1953 Ihe nrite ụlọ ọrụ ọgbara ọhụrụ, Lda, Lourenço Marques (Mozambique)
1958 A họpụtara ya nke mbụ (Mohere Mérito Artistico), Beira (Mozambique)
1974 Ọlaedo, Fasano di Puglia, Brindisi
1975 Ihe nrite International Painting, International Center of Mediterranean Art and Culture, Corfu (Greece)
1978 Ịbụ onye ndú
Campidoglio, Rom
1988 Nnukwu ihe nrite, European Union of Art Critics, Rome
1991 Ihe nrite ụwa nke Rachel Carson Memorial Foundation, Rome
1992 La Plejade per l'Art, Rome
1993 Commander for Merits, nke Mario Soares, Onye isi ala nke Republic of Portugal họpụtara, Lisbon
1994 Centro Francescano Internazionale di Studi per il dialogo fra i popoli (Franciscan International Study Center iji kwalite mkparịta ụka n'etiti ndị mmadụ), Assisi
1995 Ihe nrite Gabriele Annonzio, Pescara
1996 Messaggero della Pace UNIPAX Prize, Rome
1998 Ihe nrite mba ụwa Arte e Solidarietà nellArca, Florence
1998 Ihe nrite mba ụwa nke Angelico, Rome
2002 Ihe ncheta ọlaọcha nke Onye isi ala nke Republic of Italy, Rome

Àtụ Adamawa languages
Besnat Hellen Mayase Jere (4 Mee 1952 - 7 June 2020) bụby onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Obodo Zambia
O jere ozi dịka onye otu National Assembly maka Luangeni site n’afo 2002 ruo 2006
Ọ bụ adaeze ya na onye otu Ngoni Royal Establishment ebe ọ bụ nwa nwa nwaanyi nke HRH Nkosi (King) Nzamane II
Nkosi Nzamane nke Abụọ bụ nwanne nwoke nke HRH Paramount Eze ndi Eze Mpezeni nke Abụọ nke ndị Ngoni nke mpaghara odida anyanwu
Tupu ọ banye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Jere bụ onye ọrụ ugbo
Ọ bụbu Onye isi mgbasa ozi nke Posts and Telecommunications Corporation (PTC) na Chipata
Ọ bụ onye United National Independence Party (UNIP) na Luangeni na ntuli aka nke afọ 2001 ma a họpụta ya na National Assembly site na vootu 2,027
N'oge mbụ ọ nọ na nzuko omeiwu, ọ bụ onye otu nzuko omebe iwu Pan-Afrikan
Na ntuli aka nke afọ 2006, UNIP sonyeere United Democratic Alliance, ebe a họpụtara Jere dịka onye nnọchiteanya nke njikọ ahụ na Luangeni
Otú ọ dị, ọ mechara nke atọ n'azụ Angela Cifire nke Movement for Multi-Party Democracy na Charles Zulu nke Patriotic Front
Baaitse Elizabeth 'Bess' Nkabinde (amụrụ n'afọ 1959 na Silwerkrans) bụ onye bụbu onye ọka ikpe n'ụlọ ikpe iwu nke South Africa
A mụrụ Nkabinde (née Motsatsi) na afọ 1959 na Silwerkrans, n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ Transvaal n'oge ahụ (ma ugbu a bụ akụkụ nke mpaghara North West)
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mariasdal High School na Tweespruit na afọ 1979
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta BProc na Mahadum Zululand na afọ 1983, LLB na Mahadụ North-West na afọ 1986, na Diploma na Industrial Relations na Damelin College na afọ 1988
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ iwu na gọọmentị Bophutatswana ruo afọ anọ, tupu ọ ghọọ onye ọka iwu na afọ 1988
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na North West Bar ruo afọ iri tupu nhọpụta mbụ ya dị ka onye ọka ikpe na afọ 1999
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1999, a họpụtara Nkabinde na ngalaba Bophuthatswana nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke mba South Africa
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Labour Court, Labour Appeal Court, na, na afọ 2005, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Mkpegharị
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Rules Board
N'afọ 2006, Onye isi ala Thabo Mbeki họpụtara Nkabinde ka ọ nọchie Arthur Chaskalson n'ụlọ ikpe iwu nke South Africa

Nhọpụta ya gosipụtara esemokwu, ebe ọ bụ na, n'agbanyeghị na ọ bụ 'ihe na-amaghị ama' na enweghị ahụmịhe na iwu iwu, a họọrọ ya karịa onye ọkachamara iwu Wits Cora Hoexter, onye yiri ka ọ bụ onye siri ike
A mara Nkabinde maka ikpe ya na-ese okwu na S Masiya v, Lee v Minister of Correctional Services, na Botha v Rich, nke ọ bụla dọtara nkatọ siri ike
N'afọ 2008, onye ọka ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu bụ John Hlophe kwuru na ọ gakwuuru Nkabinde na Chris Jafta iji mee ka ha chọọ Onye isi ala Jacob Zuma na ikpe na-echere ikpe
Ụlọikpe Iwu ahụ tinyere mkpesa ọha na eze megide Hlophe nke Jafta na Nkabinde kwadoro
Otú ọ dị, afọ isii ka e mesịrị, mgbe nyocha omume ọjọọ megide Hlophe na-echere, Jafta na Nkabinde wetara ihe ịma aka ụlọ ikpe na ikike ụlọ ikpe, na-ekwu na mkpesa nke ha abụghị nke iwu kwadoro
Ndị na-akọwa ihe katọrọ 'egwu' Jafta na Nkabinde, nke mere ka ụlọ ikpe iwu ahụ bụrụ ihe ihere
Ndị ọka ikpe kwuru, na nzaghachi, na ha na-akwado iwu ahụ
Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu jụrụ arịrịọ ndị ọkàikpe na 26 Septemba, na afọ 2014, mana ha rịọrọ arịrịọ

Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Mkpegharị Ikpe jụrụ mkpesa ahụ na Machị na afọ 2016, na-akatọ akwụkwọ ikpe na-emebi ihe nke Jafta na Nkabinde ma na-egosi na ikpe ahụ welitere ajụjụ banyere 'iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe' ha
N'abalị isii n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2016, Jafta na Nkabinde tinyere akwụkwọ mkpegharị ikpe n'ụlọ ikpe iwu nke ha na-arịọ ka ọ gbanwee mkpebi ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu
Ha mere nke a n'ụzọ ụfọdụ n'ihi na SCA mere 'ihe mgbu' banyere ha
Ihe a niile bụ n'agbanyeghị eziokwu ahụ, dịka otu onye na-akọwa ihe kwuru, na Ụlọikpe Iwu ahụ ekwuola na afọ 2012 na ọ pụghị ịnụ mkpesa na okwu Hlophe nakwa na ikpe SCA ọ bụla bụ nke ikpeazụ
Nkabinde lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ anọ
Bessie Virginia Blount, nke a makwaara dị ka Bessie Blount Griffin, (24 Nọvemba, 1914 - 30 Disemba, 2009) bụ onye edemede, nọọsụ, onye na-agwọ ọrịa, onye na-emepụta ihe na ọkà mmụta sayensị
A mụrụ Bessie Blount Griffin na Nọvemba 24, 1914
Ọ bu onye ọbọdọ Virginia, A mụrụ Blount na Hickory, Virginia, na Princess Anne County (nke a maara ugbu a dị ka obodo Chesapeake)
Blount gara ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị Diggs Chapel na Hickory, Virginia, ụlọ akwụkwọ e wuru mgbe agha obodo gasịrị maka agụmakwụkwọ nke ụmụaka ndị Africa America
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Virginian, Griffin chetara na ụlọ akwụkwọ ya enweghị akwụkwọ ọgụgụ
[Ha] mechara nweta ha n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị ọcha

Mgbe ọ na-aga Diggs Chapel, onye nkụzi Blount baara ya mba maka iji aka ekpe ya dee ihe site n'ịkụ aka ya, ụdị ịdọ aka ná ntị eji eme ihe n'oge ahụ iji kụziere ụmụ akwụkwọ ụkpụrụ edemede kwesịrị ekwesị
Blount weere nke a dị ka ihe ịma aka iji bụrụ onye na-enweghị atụ
Ọ bụ ezie na aka nri ya ghọrọ aka edemede ya bụ isi, ọ nọgidere na-enwe ike iji aka ekpe ya dee
Ọ kụzikwaara onwe ya ide ihe n'ejighị aka ya site n'iji ezé ya na ụkwụ ya jide pensụl
Nkà a bara uru na ọrụ ya mgbe e mesịrị, na-enyere ya aka ịkụziri ndị ọzọ ịwa ahụ n'enweghị otu ma ọ bụ karịa ụkwụ
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ nke isii, enweghi ihe mmụta ọzọ maka ụmụaka ndị Africa America n'obodo ya, na-amanye Blount ịkwụsị agụmakwụkwọ ya
Ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara n'ebe ugwu na New Jersey, ebe Blount nọgidere na-akụzi onwe ya ma nweta GED ya
Ọ gara mmemme nọọsụ nke Community Kennedy Memorial Hospital, na Newark, New Jersey
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị akara ugo mmụta nọọsụ, ọ gara n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na Panzer College of Physical Education and Hygiene na East Orange, New Jersey wee bụrụ onye na-agwọ ọrịa
N'afọ 2008, Bessie Griffin laghachiri n'ụlọ Hickory iji cheta mkpa ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya, nke a gbara ọkụ n'ala n'afọ 1932
Achọpụtaghị ihe ndekọ nke usoro ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ tupu 1913
O bu n'obi iwu ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie na ọbá akwụkwọ n'ala ahụ iji cheta ndị gụrụ akwụkwọ n'ebe ahụ n'ime iri afọ gara aga
N'ụzọ dị mwute, arụchabeghị ọrụ ya ka Griffin nwụrụ n'afọ sochirinụ
N'oge ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-agwọ ọrịa, mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ gasịrị, ọtụtụ ndị agha laghachiri dị ka ndị e gbupụrụ ụkwụ mgbe ha merụrụ ahụ n'agha
Dị ka akụkụ nke mmega ahụ nke Blount, ọ kụziiri ndị ochie na-enweghị ike iji aka ha, ụzọ ọhụrụ iji rụọ ọrụ kwa ụbọchị site n'iji ezé na ụkwụ ha dochie anya
Amamihe ya na ikike iji ọnụ ya na ụkwụ ya rụọ ọrụ nyeere ya aka ijikọ ndị ọrịa ya site na ịwa ahụ
Ka ọ na-arụ ọrụ kwa ụbọchị, Blount chọpụtara na otu n'ime ihe ịma aka kasịnụ maka ndị e gbupụrụ ụkwụ bụ iri nri n'enweghị enyemaka site n'aka ndị ọzọ
Ọrụ dị oke mkpa nye ọtụtụ ndị bụ ịmaliteghachi ikike inye onwe ha nri
Inwetaghachi nkà a ga-eweghachi ogo nnwere onwe ma mee ka ha nwekwuo ùgwù onye
Dị ka onye nọọsụ na onye na-agwọ ọrịa, ọ lekọtakwara ma soro Theodore Edison, nwa onye ama ama na-emepụta ihe bụ Thomas Edison rụọ ọrụ nke ọma
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Bronx Hospital na New York, Blount mepụtara ngwá ọrụ eletriki na-enye onwe ya nri maka ndị e gbupụrụ ụkwụ
Ngwá ọrụ ahụ nwere tube iji bubata nri n'otu n'otu n'ọnụ onye ọrịa
Ndị ọrịa ahụ ga-ata tube ahụ ma mgbe ahụ, akụkụ nri na-esote ga-ekesa n'ọnụ site na igwe ahụ
E nyere otu akụkụ nke ngwaọrụ ahụ ikike na 1948
Ndị American Veterans Administration (VA) jụrụ mmepụta Blount, ya mere na 1952 o nyere ya ikikere n'efu nye gọọmentị France

O kwuru n'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Afro-American na ihe ọ rụzuru gosiri na 'nwanyị nwere agba nwere ike ịmepụta ihe maka abamuru nke ihe a kpọrọ mmadụ' O chekwara olu maka onye ọrịa merụrụ ahụ ma ọ bụ onye ọrịa, nke na-ejide efere ma ọ bụ iko n'akụkụ ihu ha dị ka 'nkwado nnabata' na Eprel 1951, e nyere Blount US Patent 2,550,554
N'oge ọrụ ya, Blount bụ onye na-agwọ nwa Thomas Edison, Theodore Miller Edison
Blount na Edison ghọrọ ezigbo enyi
N'oge ahụ, ọ mepụtara efere emesis
efere ahụ bụ efere katọn a na-eji ntụ ọka, mmiri, na akwụkwọ akụkọ mee nke a na-eme achịcha ruo mgbe ihe ahụ siri ike
Ọzọ, United States egosighi mmasị na ihe Blount mepụtara
O rere ikike nke ihe o mepụtara nye otu ụlọ ọrụ dị na Belgium
A ka na-eji atụmatụ ya eme ihe n'ụlọ ọgwụ ndị Belgium
E mepụtara ngwaọrụ ọgbara ọhụrụ, nke dị nro kemgbe 1948, mana a na-echeta Blount maka ịsụ ụzọ ngwaọrụ eletriki mbụ maka inye ndị e gbupụrụ ụkwụ nri
N'afọ 1969, Blount malitere ọrụ nke abụọ, na ndị mmanye iwu, na-achụso nyocha sayensị maka ngalaba ndị uwe ojii na New Jersey na Virginia
N'oge ọgwụgwọ onye ọrịa ya gara aga, mgbe ọ na-egosipụta ọrụ ambidextrous, ma ọ bụ iji ezé ma ọ bụ ụkwụ dee, ọ malitere ịhụ njikọ dị n'etiti ahụike anụ ahụ na njirimara edemede
Site na nyocha ya, ọ hụrụ otú aka mmadụ si gosipụta ọnọdụ ahụike ha
Nchọpụta a kpaliri ya ibipụta akwụkwọ nkà na ụzụ na 'graphology ahụike'
Mgbe e bipụtachara akwụkwọ ahụ, ọrụ Blount na forensics toro ngwa ngwa
Ka ọ na-erule ngwụsị afọ 1960, ọ na-enyere ngalaba ndị uwe ojii aka na Norfolk, VA na Vineland, New Jersey, ma mesịa sonye na ngalaba ndị uwe ojii Portsmouth, Virginia dị ka onye isi nyocha
N'afọ 1977, ndị uwe ojii Metropolitan (Scotland Yard) Forensic Science Laboratory kpọrọ Blount ka ọ sonyere ha na London maka ọmụmụ ihe dị elu na graphology
Ọ bụ nwanyị ojii mbụ zụrụ na Scotland Yard
Mgbe ọ lọtara, Blount malitere azụmahịa ndụmọdụ, na-eji ahụmịhe nyocha ya nyochaa akwụkwọ na akwụkwọ ndị ohu site na agha obodo
Blount rụrụ ọrụ ahụ ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ 83
E jikwa nkwenye ya nke eziokwu mee ihe na nkwekọrịta ndị Amerịka na United States
Blount mere ọtụtụ mgbalị iji mee ka VA nwee mmasị na ihe ndị o mepụtara mana ha jụrụ, n'agbanyeghị mmetụta bara uru nke ngwaọrụ ndị ahụ
Iji kwalite ihe ndị ahụ, ọ pụtara na ihe ngosi telivishọn WCAU Philadelphia The Big Idea na 1953
Blount bụ nwanyị Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ nọ na ihe ngosi ahụ
Enweghị ederede ọ bụla, mana a kọrọ na ọ kwughachiri na ọ gosipụtara 'Nwanyị ojii nwere ike ịmepụta ihe maka abamuru nke ihe a kpọrọ mmadụ'
Blount dere kọlụm egosipụtara maka akwụkwọ akụkọ Africa-American, NJ Herald News na Philadelphia Independent
N'afọ 2008, ọ malitere ọrụ mana ọ nweghị ike ịrụzu otu ọrụ ọzọ ịmepụta ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie na ogige ụlọ akwụkwọ Virginia ochie ya nke gbara ọkụ, iji cheta onyinye nke ndị gụrụ akwụkwọ n'ebe ahụ
Blount nwetara ugwu na 1992 site na American Academy of Physical Therapy, otu African American lekwasịrị anya ọgwụgwọ anụ ahụ
Ụmụ nwanyị Virginia na akụkọ ihe mere eme na 2005
Na 1951, Blount lụrụ Thomas Griffin
Ha nwere otu nwa nwoke, Filip
Blount nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ 95 na Disemba 30, 2009, n'ụlọ ya na Newfield, New Jersey
Bessie Coleman (Januarị 26, afo 1892 – Eprel 30, afo 1926) bụ onye ọkwọ ụgbọ elu mbụ nke America
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ onye Afrịka America na onye America mbụ nwere ikike ịnya ụgbọ elu
O nwetara ikikere ya n'aka Fédération Aéronautique Internationale na June 15, afo 1921, ma bụrụ onye isi ojii mbụ nwetara akwụkwọ ikike ụgbọ elu mba ụwa
A mụrụ na ezinụlọ nke sharecroppers na Texas, Coleman rụrụ ọrụ n'ubi owu na nwata mgbe ọ na-agụkwa akwụkwọ na obere ụlọ akwụkwọ dịpụrụ adịpụ
Ọ gara otu akwụkwọ kọleji na Mahadum Langston

Coleman zụlitere mmasị mbụ n'ịfe ụgbọ elu, mana ndị Africa America, ụmụ amaala America, na ụmụ nwanyị enweghị ohere ọzụzụ ụgbọ elu na United States, ya mere ọ zọpụtara ma nweta nkwado iji gaa France maka ụlọ akwụkwọ ụgbọ elu
Ọ ghọrọ onye ọkwọ ụgbọ elu dị elu na ihe ngosi ikuku dị egwu na United States
A maara ya nke ọma dị ka Queen Bess na Brave Bessie, ma nwee olile anya ịmalite ụlọ akwụkwọ maka ndị na-efe efe ndị America na ndị America
Coleman nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ụgbọelu na afo 1926
Ọrụ ọsụ ụzọ ya bụ ihe mkpali nye ndị na-anya ụgbọ elu oge ochie na ndị obodo Africa-American na ụmụ amaala America

Elizabeth Coleman (mgbe ụfọdụ, Bessie) mụrụ na Jenụwarị 26, afo 1892, na Atlanta, Texas, nke iri n'ime ụmụ iri na atọ nke George Coleman, onye America agwakọtara agwakọta nke nwere nne na nna Cherokee, na Susan Coleman, onye bụ African American
Itoolu n'ime ụmụaka ahụ lanarịrị nwata, nke a na-ahụkarị maka oge ahụ
Mgbe Coleman dị afọ abụọ, ezinụlọ ya kwagara Waxahachie, Texas, ebe ha bi dị ka ndị na -eketa ihe
Coleman malitere ịga akwụkwọ na Waxahachie mgbe ọ dị afọ isii
Ọ na-eji ụkwụ na-aga kilomita anọ kwa ụbọchị gaa n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dịpụrụ adịpụ, nke nwere otu ọnụ ụlọ, ebe ọ na-amasị ịgụ akwụkwọ ma guzobe onwe ya dị ka nwa akwụkwọ mgbakọ na mwepụ pụtara ìhè
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ elementrị n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Kwa afọ, owuwe ihe ubi na-akwụsị ọrụ Coleman na-aga n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, ọrụ, na chọọchị
Na afo 1901, George Coleman hapụrụ ezinụlọ ya
Ọ laghachiri Oklahoma, ma ọ bụ Indian Territory, dị ka a na-akpọ mgbe ahụ, ịchọta ohere ka mma, ma nwunye ya na ụmụ ya esoghị
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 12, a nabatara Bessie n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Chọọchị Baptist nke ozi ala ọzọ na agụmakwụkwọ
Mgbe ọ gbara afọ iri na asatọ, o weere ego ya wee debanye aha na Oklahoma Colored Agricultural and Normal University na Langston, Oklahoma (nke a na-akpọ Mahadum Langston ugbu a)
O mechachara otu okwu tupu ego ya agwụ, ọ lọghachikwa n'ụlọ
Na afo 1915, mgbe ọ dị afọ 23, Coleman kwagara Chicago, Illinois, bụ́ ebe ya na ụmụnne ya bi
Na Chicago, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye manicurist na White Sox Barber Shop
N’ebe ahụ, ọ nụrụ akụkọ banyere ụgbọ elu n’oge agha site n’aka ndị ọkwọ ụgbọ mmiri si Agha Ụwa Mbụ lọta
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ nke abụọ dị ka onye njikwa ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ nke ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ chili iji chekwaa ego n'olileanya nke ịghọ onye ọkwọ ụgbọ elu
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ụgbọ elu America nke oge ahụ ekwenyeghị na ụmụ nwanyị ma ọ bụ ndị ojii, ya mere Robert S
Abbott, onye nchoputa na onye bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ Chicago Defender, gbara ya ume ka ọ mụọ akwụkwọ ná mba ọzọ
Abbot kwusara ọchịchọ Coleman n'akwụkwọ akụkọ ya wee nweta nkwado ego site n'aka onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ akụ Jesse Binga na onye na- agbachitere
Bessie Coleman gara klas nke asụsụ French n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Asụsụ Berlitz dị na Chicago wee gaa Paris na Nọvemba 20, afo 1920, ka o wee nweta ikike ịnya ụgbọ elu ya
Ọ mụtara ife efe na Nieuport 564 biplane nwere 'usoro nhazi nke nwere mkpisi kwụ ọtọ n'ịdị arọ nke bat baseball dị n'ihu onye na-anya ụgbọ mmiri na ogwe ntụ n'okpuru ụkwụ onye na-anya ụgbọelu'
Na June 15, afo 1921, Coleman ghọrọ nwanyị ojii mbụ na onye America mbụ iji nweta akwụkwọ ikike ịnya ụgbọ elu yana onye ojii mbụ na onye mbụ nwa amaala America iji nweta ikike ụgbọ elu mba ofesi
Ụlọ ọrụ Fédération Aéronautique Internationale
N'ịbụ onye kpebisiri ike ime ka nkà ya dị mma, Coleman ji ọnwa abụọ na-esote na-amụ ihe site n'aka onye na-anya ụgbọelu French nke dị nso na Paris na, na September na afo 1921, ọ gara America
Ọ ghọrọ ihe mmetụta mgbasa ozi mgbe ọ laghachiri na US

Na afọ nke ụgbọ elu azụmahịa ka dị afọ iri ma ọ bụ karịa n'ọdịnihu, Coleman ghọtara ngwa ngwa na iji nwee ike ibi ndụ dị ka onye ọkwọ ụgbọ elu nkịtị na ọ ga-aghọ onye na-agba ọsọ ' barnstorming ' stunt flier, na-eme aghụghọ dị ize ndụ na ikuku na mgbe ahụ
ka na-eji teknụzụ mbụ nke ụgbọ elu maka ịkwụ ndị na-ege ntị ụgwọ
Mana, iji nwee ihe ịga nke ọma n'ọgbọ egwuregwu a nke ukwuu, ọ ga-achọ nkuzi dị elu na akwụkwọ akụkọ sara mbara karị
N'ịlaghachi na Chicago, Coleman enweghị ike ịhụ onye ọ bụla dị njikere ịkụziri ya ihe, ya mere na February na afo 1922, ọ gaghachiri ụgbọ mmiri na Europe
Ọ nọrọ ọnwa abụọ na-esote na France na-agụcha ihe mmụta dị elu na ụgbọ elu
Ọ gawara Netherlands ka ya na Anthony Fokker zute, otu n'ime ndị na-emepụta ụgbọ elu kachasị ama n'ụwa
Ọ gakwara Jamanị, bụ́ ebe ọ gara na Fokker Corporation wee nweta ọzụzụ ọzọ n’aka otu n’ime ndị isi ụgbọ elu nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Ọ laghachiri na United States ịmalite ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi ofufe
'Ezenwanyi Bess,' dị ka a maara ya, bụ ihe osise na-ewu ewu nke ukwuu maka afọ ise na-esote
N'ịbụ onye a kpọrọ òkù ka ọ bụrụ ihe omume ndị dị mkpa ma na-agbakarị akwụkwọ akụkọ ajụjụ ọnụ, ma ndị ojii na ndị ọcha masịrị ya
Ọ na-efekarị Curtiss JN-4 Jenny biplanes na ụgbọ elu ndị ọzọ bụbu ụgbọ elu ndị agha fọdụrụ n'agha hapụrụ
O mere ka ọ pụta ìhè nke mbụ na ihe ngosi ikuku America na Septemba 3, afo 1922, na mmemme na-asọpụrụ ndị agha agha nke 369th Infantry Regiment nke Agha Ụwa Mbụ

Emere na Curtiss Field na Long Island dị nso na New York City, ma kwado ya site na enyi ya Abbott na akwụkwọ akụkọ Chicago Defender, ihe nkiri ahụ kpọrọ Coleman dị ka 'nwanyị kachasị ukwuu n'ụwa' ma gosipụta ikuku ikuku site na ndị ọkwọ ụgbọ elu asatọ ndị ọzọ America
na wụliri elu nke onye na-ahụ maka parachuti ojii Hubert Julian
Izu isii ka e mesịrị, ọ laghachiri na Chicago, na-eme ihe ngosi ikuku, oge a iji sọpụrụ Agha Ụwa Mbụ nke 370th Infantry Regiment

Coleman weputara ihe ngosi dị egwu nke ụzọ egwu egwu-gụnyere ọnụọgụ asatọ, loops, na ntinye dị nso n'ala na nnukwu ìgwè mmadụ na-anụ ọkụ n'obi na Checkerboard Airdrome - ugbu a mgbada nke Hines Veterans Administration Medical Center, Hines, Illinois, Loyola Hospital, Maywood, yana nchekwa oke ọhịa Cook County dị nso
Obi ụtọ nke ịkwọ ụgbọ elu na mmasi nke igwe mmadụ na-akwa emo bụ naanị akụkụ nke nrọ Coleman

Coleman echefughị nkwa ọ kwere n'oge ọ bụ nwata na otu ụbọchị 'ego maka ihe' Dị ka onye ọrụ ụgbọ elu ọkachamara, Coleman na-akatọkarị ndị nta akụkọ maka ọdịdị ohere ya na ụdị ọmarịcha ọ wetara na ngosi ya na-efe efe
Ọ nwetakwara aha ngwa ngwa dị ka onye ọkwọ ụgbọ elu nwere nkà na onye na-atụghị egwu nke na-akwụsị n'enweghị ihe ọ bụla iji mezuo ihe siri ike
Na Los Angeles, ọ gbajiri ụkwụ na ọgịrịga atọ mgbe ụgbọ elu ya kwụsịrị wee daa na February 22, afo 1923
N'ịbụ onye kwadoro ịkwalite ụgbọ elu na ịlụso ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ọgụ, Coleman gwara ndị na-ege ntị n'ofe mba ahụ banyere ịchụso ụgbọ elu na ebumnuche maka ndị America America
Ọ jụrụ kpam kpam isonye na mmemme ụgbọ elu machibidoro ịga ndị Africa America
N'afọ 1920, ọ zutere Rev
Hezakiah Hill na nwunye ya Viola na njem nlegharị anya okwu na Orlando, Florida
Ndị ọrụ obodo kpọrọ ya ka ya na ha nọrọ na parsonage nke Mount Zion Missionary Baptist Church dị na Washington Street na agbata obi Parramore
Otu okporo ụzọ obodo ka ahagharịrị aha 'Bessie Coleman' Street maka nsọpụrụ ya na afo 2013
Di na nwunye ahụ, ndị mesoro ya dị ka nwa nwanyị, kwenye ya ka ọ nọrọ, Coleman meghere ụlọ ahịa ịma mma na Orlando iji nweta ego ọzọ iji zụta ụgbọ elu nke ya
Site na kọntaktị mgbasa ozi ya, e nyere ya ọrụ na ihe nkiri ogologo ogologo nke aha ya bụ Shadow and Sunshine, nke African American Seminole Film Producing Company ga-enweta ego
O ji obi ụtọ nakwere, na-atụ anya na mgbasa ozi ga-enyere aka ịkwalite ọrụ ya ma nye ya ụfọdụ ego ọ chọrọ iji guzobe ụlọ akwụkwọ nke ya
Ma mgbe ọ matara na ihe nkiri mbụ e mere na fim ahụ chọrọ ka o yi uwe dọwara adọwa pụta, jikwa osisi na-aga ije na ngwugwu dị n’azụ, ọ jụrụ ịga n’ihu
'O doro anya
[Bessie's] ịpụ na ihe nkiri nkiri bụ nkwupụta ụkpụrụ
Opportunist n'agbanyeghị na ọ bụ banyere ọrụ ya, ọ dịghị mgbe ọ na-enwe ohere banyere agbụrụ
O nweghị ihe o bu n'obi ime ka onyinyo mkparị nke ọtụtụ ndị ọcha nwere nke ọtụtụ ndị ojii,' ka Doris Rich dere
Coleman agaghị adị ogologo oge iji guzobe ụlọ akwụkwọ maka ndị na-eto eto ndị isi ojii, ma ihe ndị ọ rụzuru n'ọrụ ọsụ ụzọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ihe mkpali maka ọgbọ nke ndị ikom na ndị inyom America-America
'N'ihi Bessie Coleman,' ka Lieutenant William J
Powell na Black Wings (1934), raara nye Coleman dere, 'anyị emeriwo ihe ahụ nke dị njọ karịa ihe mgbochi agbụrụ

Anyị emeriwo ihe mgbochi dị n'ime onwe anyị ma nwee ike ịrọ nrọ' Powell jere ozi na ngalaba kewapụrụ n'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ, ma na-agwụ ike na-akwalite ihe kpatara ụgbọ elu ojii site n'akwụkwọ ya, akwụkwọ akụkọ ya, na Bessie Coleman Aero Club, nke o hiwere na afo 1929
Na Eprel 30, afo 1926, Coleman nọ na Jacksonville, Florida
Ọ zụtala Curtiss JN-4 (Jenny) na Dallas n'oge na-adịbeghị anya
Onye na-ahụ maka ọrụ ya na mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi, William D
Wills dị afọ iri abuo na ano, si Dallas fepụ ụgbọ elu ahụ maka nkwadebe maka ihe ngosi ikuku wee mee ka ọ gbatuo mmanye atọ n'ụzọ n'ihi na ụgbọ elu ahụ adịchaghị mma
Mgbe ha matara nke a, ndị enyi na ezinụlọ Coleman echeghị na ụgbọ elu ahụ adịghị mma ma rịọ ya ka ọ ghara ịfe ya, mana ọ jụrụ
Mgbe ọ na-apụ, Wills na Coleman na-efe ụgbọ elu n'oche ọzọ
Ọ nọ na-eme atụmatụ ịwụ elu parachute maka ụbọchị na-esote, ma chọọ inyocha ebe ahụ dị ka a hụrụ site n'ọgbọ mmiri
Ihe dị ka nkeji iri n'ime ụgbọ elu ahụ, ụgbọ elu ahụ na-atụghị anya ya banye n'ime mmiri wee gbagharịa na 3,000 ụkwụ n'elu ala
A tụpụrụ Coleman n'ụgbọelu na 2,000 ft (610 m), e wee gbuo ya ozugbo mgbe ọ kụrụ ala
Wills enwekwaghị ike ịchịkwa ụgbọ elu ahụ, ma ọ daturu n'ala
Ọ nwụrụ n'elu mmetụta
Ụgbọ elu ahụ gbawara, na-agbakwa ọkụ
Ọ bụ ezie na mkpọmkpọ ebe nke ụgbọ elu ahụ gbara ọkụ nke ukwuu, e mesịrị chọpụta na mgbanaka e ji akwọ ụgbọ epeepe ahụ kụchiela ihe ndị a na-achịkwa n'ụgbọelu ahụ
Coleman dị afọ iri ato na ano
Emere emume olili ozu na Florida tupu ezighachi ozu ya na Chicago
Ọ bụ ezie na a kpọtụrụ aha obere okwu n'ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi, akụkọ banyere ọnwụ ya na-agbasa n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ African-American
Ndị na-eru uju puku iri gara emume ya na Chicago, nke onye ndọrọndọrọ Ida B
Wells duziri
Bessie Harvey (ónyé amụrụ Bessie Ruth White, Ọktoba 11, 1929 Ọgọst 12, 1994) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nke a maara nke ọma màkà ihe ọkpụkpụ ya nke e ji ihe ndị a chọtara rụọ, ọkachasị iberibe osisi
Ónyé ji okpukpe kpọrọ ihe, okwukwe Harvey na mmasị ya n'ihe okike bụ isi ihe kpatara ọrụ ya
A mụrụ ya na Dallas, Georgia, Harvey bụ nwa nke asaá n'ime ụmụ iri na atọ Homer na Rosie Mae White mụrụ
Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na anọ, ọ lụrụ Charles Harvey ma bírí na Buena Vista, Georgia
Ọ gbara Harvey alụkwaghịm na 1968 wee kwaga Alcoa, Tennessee, ébé ọ na-azụlite ụmụ iri na otu mgbè ọ dị afọ 35
Dị ka nwatakịrị, ọ na-echeta ime 'ihe na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla,' na-emepụta ihe egwuregwu na ụmụ bebi nke ya
Na mgbakwunye na inwe ụmụ iri na otu, Harvey nwèrè ụmụ ụmụ irí abụọ na asatọ na ụmụ ụmụ atọ
N'afọ 1977, Harvey malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Blount Memorial Hospital dị ka ónyé na-elekọta ụlọ
Màkà ego ọzọ, n'abalị mgbè ónyé ọ bụla na-ehi ụra Harvey ga-eme ụmụ bebi
Mgbè o gosipụtara ọrụ nka ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ, ọrụ ya dọtara uche na nnọchite anya gallery
Otu n'ime ndị dọkịta na-arụ ọrụ mere ka ọ mata ndị nduzi nke Cavin-Morris Gallery na New York City, nke gárá n'ihu na-ere ọrụ ya naanị ruo ọtụtụ afọ
Ihe osise Harvey na-abụkarị osisi e ji ágbá, beads, shells, ákwà, na ihe ndị ọzọ a chọtara chọọ mma, na-ejikọta 'ọrụ (n'usoro nke ihe ngosi nwa bebi) ihe osise, eserese, na nchịkọta'
Mgbè ógè ahụ gasịrị, ọ lekwasịrị anya na ọrụ nka ya ruo Mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 1994
A gụnyere ọrụ Harvey n'ihe karịrị ihe ngosi 50, gụnyere itinye ya na 1995 Whitney Biennial
Whitney Museum mechara zụta ọrụ ya Cross Bearers màkà nchịkọta ya na-adịgide adịgide
Ọ bụkwa isiokwu nke nnukwu ihe ngosi na 1997 na Tennessee Museum of Art Ọrụ ya dị na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke Knoxville Museum of Art na American Folk Art Museum, New York

A zụkwara ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ Harvey site na Souls Grown Deep Foundation site na Fine Arts Museums nke San Francisco dị ka akụkụ nke nnweta nke ọrụ nke ndị na-ese ihe Africa America si Southern United States
E gosipụtara ọrụ a n'ihe ngosi a na-akpọ Revelations Art from the African American South site na June 3, 2017 ruo April 1, 2018

A na-aga n'ihu na-egosi ọrụ Harvey na ihe ngosi na ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie dị ka Philadelphia Museum of Art na Turner Contemporary na England dị ka akụkụ nke ihe ngosi na ọrụ nka ndị Africa America sitere na South America
Alison Saar kwuru na Harvey nwèrè mmetụta, a gụrụkwa okporo ámá dị na Alcoa aha ya
Best of Nollywood Awards (nke a na-akpọ BON Awards ) bụ mmemme ihe nkiri kwa afọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ kacha mma nke Nollywood gosipụtara na- asọpụrụ mmezu pụtara ìhè na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naijiria
E mere mbipụta nke mbụ na Disemba 6, 2009, na Ikeja, Lagos State
Ememe 2013 nkwanye ugwu ihe nkiri nke 2013, emere na Dome di na Asaba, Delta State na Disemba 5, 2013
Gọvanọ Emmanuel Uduaghan dị ka onyeisi ndị ọbịa, na nhọpụta a mere n'ụlọ steeti dị na Lagos
Ezubere kapeeti uhie e ji mee ihe omume ahụ ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ihe kachasị ogologo na akụkọ ntolite
Site na 2013, BON Awards nwere ihe dị ka ụdị 35
Beth Diane Armstrong (amụrụ n'afọ 1985) bụ onye South Africa na-akpụ ihe
Nkà ya, oke ọchịchọ ya na nnukwu ọrụ ya enyewo ya ohere ịrụ ọrụ na ọkwa ya na ụfọdụ ụmụ nwoke ibe ya na mbà South Africa

N'ime afọ ole na ole gara aga, ọ na-arụkarị ọrụ na nnukwu ihe osise ndị e ji ígwè dị nro na nke na-enweghị ntụpọ mee mana enwere ihe dị iche iche dị iche na ihe ndekọ ya mgbasa ozi ndị ọzọ na-akpụ akpụ yana mbipụta, vidiyo, foto, eserese na ntinye
A mụrụ ya na South Africa n'afọ 1985, Armstrong bi ma rụọ ọrụ na Johannesburg
N'afọ 2010, ọ gụsịrị Masters of Fine Art na Mahadum Rhodes
N'afọ 2007, Rhodes zụtara ihe ngosi BFA ya, Hibernation, n'ihe banyere nchịkọta ha na-adịgide adịgide
Kemgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, e nweela ihe ngosi naanị ya, ụfọdụ ihe ngosi na ọrụ ndị otu na mpaghara na mba ụwa, yana ọrụ onwe na nke ọha
Ihe ndị pụtara ìhè na nso nso a gụnyere ihe ọkpụkpụ na Design Miami / Basel design fair na Basel, Switzerland, na Design Miami, Florida - ha abụọ n'afọ 2014
Afọ 2014 hụkwara mmezu nke nnukwu ihe osise ọha na eze na-adịgide adịgide na Oostvoorne, na Netherlands, nke Kern Kunst Westvoorne Foundation nyere ọrụ
Standard Bank zụtara nnukwu ihe ọkpụkpụ izizi ya na 2013 ma tinye ya n'ụlọ ọhụrụ ha na Rosebank, Johannesburg
Armstrong bi ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na Johannesburg
A họpụtara Armstrong ka ọ mepụta ihe ọkpụkpụ n'ihe banyere mkpọsa 2011 site n'aka ụlọ ọrụ njikwa ego Prescient
Armstrong bụ otu n'ime ndị omenkà iri atọ na atọ ahọpụtara n'ihi Worldforall's Not All is Black and White Wisdom from the African Zebra campaign, nke gbara ọsọ n'otu oge na 2010 FIFA World Cup
Armstrong sonyere na Design Miami / Basel, ya na Southern Guild, Miami, Florida, USA n'afọ 2014
Ọ gụsịrị Flagpole Sculpture Commission n'ihe banyere Kern Kunst Westvoorne Foundation, Netherlands
Armstrong nyere aka na A Place in Time na njikọ ya na Yorkshire Sculpture Park UK, nke Helen Pheby haziri, NIROX Sculpture Park, Johannesburg, South Africa n'afọ 2016
Peeji - E kpughere ihe ọkpụkpụ ọha na eze na Grahamstown wuru ọhụrụ NELM (National English Literary Museum) na ngwụsị afọ 2016

E nyere Armstrong onyinye 2017 Standard Bank Young Artist for Visual Art, nke nyere ya ihe ngosi naanị ya na Grahams town Festival n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 2017, sochiri njem nke otu ọrụ ahụ na ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie dị iche iche gburugburu mba ahụ n'ime afọ 2018
Grace O'Malley kwuru na nyocha maka Artthrob, na ọrụ Armstrong 'nyere nyocha ọgụgụ isi dị iche iche nke akparamaagwa mmadụ site na akara na ohere'

Ashraf Jamal, n'otu ihe banyere Armstrong maka Art South Africa's 'Bright Young Things', na-ekwu na 'Armstrong's warping of the sculpture paradigm makes way for new applications and new figurations in a genre caught in the tedious warp of thingness'; ógè e mesịrị na-ekwu na Armstrong na-ewebata ọ bụghị naanị nkà ihe ọmụma ọhụrụ nke ịme na ihe ọ pụtara, kama ngwọta ya
Beth Koigi bụ onye ọchụnta ego Kenya na-arụ ọrụ iji kwalite ịnweta mmiri maka obodo ndị na-adịghị grid
Koigi bụ onye guzobere Majik Water, ụlọ ọrụ nke na-achọ iweta mmiri ọñụñụ site na ikuku iji jeere obodo dị iche iche ozi n'ụwa niile na-enweghị ike ịnweta mmiri ọñụñụ dị ọcha
A mụrụ Koigi na Kimende na mpaghara Kiambu

Koigi nwetara nzere bachelọ sayensị na mmepe obodo, atụmatụ na njikwa sitere na Mahadum Chuka, Kenya (Klas nke 2013), yana Nzere nke Maastas atụmatụ na njikwa sitere na Mahadum Nairobi (Klas nke 2017)
N'ịgbaso nzere bachelọ ya, ọ bụ onye guzobere Aqua Clean Initiative, hiwere na 2013
Enyere Koigi onyinye mmekọ mmiri na-eto eto na Septemba, 2018, ma bụrụkwa onye otu ugbu a na Royal Commonwealth Society, Nordic Baltic Hub kemgbe Eprel 2015
Na mgbakwunye, Koigi bụ onye na-enye ndụmọdụ maka Pollination Project kemgbe Disemba 2015
Koigi bụ onye guzobere Majik Water ugbu a, nke hiwere na Julaị 2017
Majik Water meriri EDF Pulse Award Africa na 2017, na Koigi bụ onye ahọpụtara ahọpụtara maka ihe nrite Royal Academy of Engineering Africa 2019
Ọ pụtara na TEDxFasoKanu n'afọ 2019
Bethlehem Tilahun Alemu (amụrụ n'afọ 1980) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Etiopia, onye guzobere bụrụkwa onye isi nchịkwa nke ụlọ ọrụ SoleRebels, 'ụlọ ọrụ akpụkpọ ụkwụ na-eto ngwa ngwa n'Africa'

Betlehem enwetala nsọpụrụ na otuto maka amamihe azụmahịa o nwere, yana mbọ ọ na-agba iji gbanwee okwu gbasara Afrịka site na ịda ogbenye gaa na mmụọ ọchụnta ego nke kọntinent ahụ, isi obodo, na ikike akụ na ụba
Bethlehem malitere 'The Republic of Leather', na-emepụta ihe ndị dị oké ọnụ ahịa na-adịgide adịgide eji akpụkpọ anụ mee, ya na ụlọ ahịa 'Garden of Coffee' iji kwalite kọfị ndị Etiopia
A mụrụ Betlehem na mpaghara Zenebework nke Addis Ababa
Nne na nna ya rụrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ dị n'ógbè ahụ
Alemu gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ọtaakara na sekọndrị nke gọọmenti nwoe, wee gaa n'ihu gụọ mgbakọ na mwepụ ego na Mahadum Unity, gụsịa akwụkwọ n'afọ 2004
Bethlehem bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego Afrịka mbụ kwuru okwu na Clinton Global Initiative nke African Business Awards nyekwara nturu ugo, kpọọ ya Outstanding African Business Woman n'afọ 2011
Na mbido afọ 2005, Bethlehem guzobere soleRebels iji nye ndị obodo ya ọrụ na-adịgide adịgide
Ebe Ọ hụrụ na ọtụtụ ndị omenkà nwere nkà na obere obodo ya bụ Zenebework enweghị ọrụ, ọ chọzie ka O gosipụta nkà ha ma sikwa òtù a nye ha ọrụ
ya ọrụ
A na-eji ụ́kwụ́ ụgbọ ala a rụgharịrị arụgharị eme okpuru akpụkpọ ụkwụ ndị ha na-arụ
Taa, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere ọtụtụ ụlọ ahịa n'ụwa gbaa gburugburu nke gụnyere na Ethiopia, Singapore, Switzerland na Taiwan
Afọ juru Betlehem ikwu na O mechara hiwe ụlọ azụmahịa gazuru ụwa ọnụ dịka soleRebels na Garden of Coffee
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ malitere site na ụlọ ọrụ dị na ótù nkewapúta ala nke nne nne Betlehem nwere na Zenebework

SoleRebels enweela ọganihu, ma tolite nke inwe ndị ọrụ dị narị atọ n'ọnụ ọgụ na Ethiopia, na arụpụta ngwa ahịa a na-ekesa na mba iri atọ n'ụwa niile, na-eresi ndị na-eme ngwá nri Whole Foods, Urban Outfitters na Amazon
Ha nwekwara atụmatụ imeghe ụlọ ahịa ndị ụlọ ọrụ ya nwe na mba ndị dika Austria, Switzerland, Taiwan, na UK
Betlehem chọrọ ịmepụta ọrụ a na-akwụ ụgwọ nke ọma nke nwere ike ịmepụta ọganihu site na iji nkà ndị ọrụ aka na ihe ndị sitere n'ọnatarachi nke Etiopia
Echiche ịhọrọ akpụkpọ ụkwụ dị ka ngwaahịa mmalite nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bịara mgbe e mesịrị

Ihe cheere Bethlehem aka mgba mgbamume bụ seleate maọbụ ị kpọọ ya barabasso, nke bụ akpụkpọ ụkwụ e si na taya emegharịrị emegharị wee mepụta, nke a na-ejighi ngwá ọrụ ọgbaraọhụrụ mepụta na Etiopia, nke gụziri ya agụụ ime ka ihe ọ ga-arụpụta bụrụ nke ga-esi na akpụkpọ anụ
N'afọ 2016, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ rere akpụkpọ ụkwụ dị puku otu narị na iri abụo na ise n'ọnụ ọgụ ma kepụta ọrụ dị ótù puku na narị abụọ
N'afọ 2014, Bethlehem kwupụtara aha ọhụrụ ọ ga-akpọ ụlọ azụmahịa ya nke bụ The Republic of Leather, site na ihe O deputara na websaịt ụlọ ọrụ ya bụ Rebels

Bethlehem kọwapụtara ngalaba nke iji akpụkpọ anụ mepụta ngwá ahịa dị oké ọnụ ahịa dịka 'ndị tozuru etozu maọbu nke oge ya rurula maka imezigharị n'ozuzu oke,' sikwa n'otu aka ahụ kwupụta ihe ndị dị iche iche O jirila soleRebels mepụta n'ịrụ akpụkpọ ụkwụ

E wezụga ịgbaso ụkpụrụ nke emeputaghị ihe ndị ga-emebi gburugburu ebe obibi ma a na-arụ ọrụ dịka soleRebels, The Republic of Leather weere ọchịchọ maọbu nhọrọ ndị ahịa bute ụzọ - nhọrọ ndị ahịa gbasara ọdị̀dị́, na iwepụ pasentị ise n'ego ọbụla ndị ahịa ya kwụrụ dosa n'akụkụ iji nyere ndị mmadụ aka
, onye na-emepụta na ịnata ọrụ ebere nke 5% nke ọnụahịa ha na-akwụ
N'afọ 2017, agbakwunyere 'Garden of Coffee' na ụlọ ọrụ ndị O nwere
sre te na ụlọ ahịa dị na Addis Ab maliteaba
Betlehem na-achọ ịma nkwenye ọjọọ onye ọbụla bụrụla n'obi banyere ndị Africa, ọkachasị, Etiopia, nke bụ na ndị Afrịka amaghị otu esi ekepụta ụzọ ha ga-esi nwee ọganihu aka mgba'

Betlehem kwenyere na ndị Etiopia ga-agbarịrị mbọ 'ikepụta akụkọ na ọdịdị nke ha pụọ na ndị chọrọ enyemaka' bátá na ndi nwe enyemaka ndị ọzọ na-achọ', dịka Betlehem si kọwaa n'ajụjụ ọnụ 'The Next Woman' gbara ya
Ọganihu zuru ụwa ọnụ nke ụlọ ọrụ ndị dịka soleRebels na-enye aka iwepụ nkwenye ochie ndị a ma na-enye ndị Etiopia ohere ịkpụzi ọdịdị mba ụwa nke ha
Beti Olive Namisango Kamya-Turomwe, nke a makwaara dị ka Betty Kamya na Beti Kamya, bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Uganda, nke atọ kachasị akụ na ụba na East African Community
Ọ bụ Inspector General nke Gọọmentị na Uganda, kemgbe 16 Julaị 2021
Tupu nke ahụ, site na 6 June 2016 ruo 14 December 2019, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista maka Kampala Capital City Authority na kansụl Uganda
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke Uganda Federal Alliance (UFA), otu n'ime òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị edebanyere aha na mba ahụ
Ọ bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala na ntuli aka onye isi ala nke Uganda n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na otu , na-abịa na nke ise na vootu 52,782
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye omeiwu na-anọchite anya Lubaga North Constituency na tiketi Forum for Democratic Change (FDC) site na 2006 ruo 2010
Kamya sonyeere otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement ma n'afọ 2020 ọ sonyere na ntuli aka ndị na-ebu ọkọlọtọ maka mpaghara Lubaga North dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa
Ọ meriri Brian Tindyebwa na Dr
Isaac Lwanga ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ebu ọkọlọtọ NRM na ntuli aka onye isi ala na nke ndị omeiwu nke 2021

Na ntuli aka nke afọ pụkụ abụọ na iri abụọ na abụọ Kamya meriri ntuli aka ndị omeiwu Lubaga North na Ababaker Kawalya nke National Unity Platform (NUP) otu pati n'okpuru onyeisi oche nke Robert Kyagulanyi Sentamu
A mụrụ ya na Nakuru, Kenya na 30 Nọvemba 1955 na George Wilson Kamya, onye Uganda, na Margaret Wairimu Kamya, nke Kenya
Beti bụ nwa nke anọ n'ime ụmụ itoolu
N'afọ 1961, mgbe Beti dị afọ isii, ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara Uganda
Ọ gara McKay Memorial School na Kampala na Saint Hellen's Primary School na Western Uganda maka agụmakwụkwọ elementrị ya
Ọ gara Wanyange Girls' School maka agụmakwụkwọ O-Level ya na Kings College Budo maka agụmakịa A-Level
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Makerere, mahadum ọha na eze kachasị ochie na nke kachasị ukwuu na mba ahụ, na-agụsị akwụkwọ na nzere Bachelor of Commerce na ahịa
N'etiti afọ 1980, ọ sonyeere Uganda Leather and Tanning Industries Limited na Jinja na ngalaba ahịa, na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ ruo 1988
Ọ sonyeere Nyanza Textiles Industries Limited, na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ dị ka onye na-ere ahịa ruo n'afọ 1992
Mgbe ahụ, ya na di ya kwagara Kampala, isi obodo Uganda na obodo kachasị ukwuu
Site na 1996 ruo 1999, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa ahịa na Uganda Breweries Limited na Port Bell, mpaghara Kampala

Site na 1999 ruo 2004, ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Uganda Wildlife Education Centre (UWEC) na Entebbe, ihe dị ka kilota 36 (22 mi), site n'okporo ụzọ, n'ebe ndịda Kampala n'akụkụ ugwu nke Ọdọ Mmiri Victoria
N'agbata afọ 2001 na afọ 2004, mgbe ọ ka nọ na UWEC, ọ ghọrọ onye ọrụ na otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Reform, Agenda, onye bu ụzọ na otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị FDC
Site na 2005 ruo 2010, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya pụrụ iche nke onye isi oche FDC Kizza Besigye
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye omeiwu a họpụtara maka Lubaga North Constituency na tiketi FDC
Na Jenụwarị 2010, ọ hapụrụ FDC wee guzobe UFA, bụrụ onye isi oche mbụ ya
Na 6 June 2016, a kpọrọ ya aha dị ka Minista ọhụrụ maka Kampala Capital City Authority na Cabinet ọhụrụ mara ọkwa n'ụbọchị ahụ
N'ime mgbanwe nke kansụl na 14 Disemba 2019, a kpọrọ ya Minista nke Ala, Ụlọ na Mmepe Obodo, na-agbanwe dockets na Betty Amongi, onye weghaara na Kampala Capital City Authority
Kamya lụrụ Spencer Turwomwe, onye agha na ndị agha Uganda
Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2003
Ha nwere ụmụ isii
Seneanye Betta Lehihi bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa nke na-anọchite anya North West na National Council of Provinces kemgbe Mee, na afo 2019
Lehihi bụ onye otu Economic Freedom Fighters
Lehihi gụsịrị klas nke 11 na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Tiragalo na Leeudoringstad, North West
Lehihi bụ onye otu Economic Freedom Fighters
Mgbe ntuli aka n'ozuzu na 8 Mee na afọ 2019, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya na-adịgide adịgide na National Council of Provinces
A ṅụrụ ya iyi dị ka onye omeiwu na 23 Mee, na afọ 2019
Lehihi bụ naanị onye nnọchianya EFF na ndị nnọchianya North West
Ọ natara ọrụ kọmitii ya na 24 Juun

Bettie Cilliers-Barnard (n'ubochí irí na asatọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba 1914 rụọ úbọchị irí nà isé n'ọnwa Septemba 2010) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na South Africa, nke a maara n'ozuzu ya màkà nnukwu ihe osise nke nnụnụ na-efe efe
Ọ bụkwa nne nke ónyé àmà ámá na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, Jana Cilliers
A mụrụ Cilliers-Barnard na Rustenburg, Transvaal n'ubochí irí na asatọ Nọvemba 1914
Ọ malitere ise ihe na ngwụcha afọ 1930 ma n'ime afọ ndị gárá aga na-anwale agba, ahịrị, abstraction na abstractions figurative
N'afọ ndị 1970, nnụnụ malitere ịpụta na mberede n'ọrụ ya nke a pụrụ ịkọwa dị ka akụkụ nke ihe nnọchianya ala ya
O zoro aka n'ọrụ a dị ka 'ụgbọ elu nke mmụọ' ya

Kemgbe 1946, egosila ọrụ Cilliers-Barnard na ihe ngosi iri asaá na South Africa nakwa na Paris (ihe osise 1956), London (ihe osisa 1971), na Prestiges Invitation Exhibition na Taipei Fine Arts museum na Taiwan (ihe osiso na ihe osise 1987)
Ihe ngosi nka South Africa ya na mbà ofesi gụnyere Austria, Germany, Spain, Greece na Israel, ịkpọ aha ole na ole
E nyela tapestries ya, ihe osise, na murals na mmanụ màkà nchịkọta ọha na eze na màkà ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie na nchịkọta onwé na South Africa na mba ofesi

N'oge na-adịbeghị anya na 1992, o sere 'Vision' màkà Pretoria Eye Institute na ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya ndị ọzọ gụnyere ihe osise 'Flight' màkà South African Airways 1983, tapestry 'Guardian Angel of the Arts' màkà State Theatre nke Pretoria 1981, na mural ya na mmanụ 'Mens sana corpore sano' maka Ngalaba Ahụike na Pretoria 1980
Cilliers-Barnard rụrụ ọrụ karịsịa n'abalị 'n'ihi na abalị enweghị onyinyo', ka o kwuru
Ihe ngosi abụọ nke ọrụ ya sochiri Pretoria Art Museum 1995 na SASOL Art Museum 1996
E wepụtara akwụkwọ banyéré ndụ na ọrụ Bettie Cilliers-Barnard, site n'aka ónyé na-akọ akụkọ ihe méré eme bụ Prọfesọ Muller Ballot, na 1996
N'afọ 2004, o gosipụtara ọrụ ọhụrụ n'oge ikpeazụ na Colour as Language, ihe ngosi nke gụnyere ọrụ ochie (1937 rụọ 1961) site na nchịkọta nke ezinụlọ ya
Vollot na-ekwu ihe ndị a banyéré ọrụ ya 'Oge ónyé na-ese ihe ugbu a nke isiokwu ndị a na-ejikọta sitere na ụkpụrụ nke ijikọ na ijikọ ụdị ihe niile dị ugbu a na nke ọhụrụ
N'ụzọ dị otú a, a na-emepụta ọnọdụ ọhụrụ na ọdịnaya ọhụrụ
Enwere ma ọ dịkarịa ala otu ozi dị mkpà nke na-apụta na ọrụ nke oge a
Nke a nwéré njikọ n'ezie na ọchụchọ siri ike nke ónyé na-ese ihe màkà ime ka echiche ụwa na nke karịrị nke mmadụ dị n'otu
Ịgafe ya na horizons esoteric, na ókè nke ógè na oghere, nke masịrị ya site na mbido, ka na-achọ mmezu na ụkpụrụ ihe atụ nke mmadụ
Mgbe ụfọdụ, ihe ndị a na-eme, dịka ọmụmaatụ, ihe ndị ọzọ dị iche iche, ụdị anụmanụ mbụ, akụ na ọdịdị triangular dị nkọ

Stephan Welz, ọkachamara nka na onye isi nchịkwa nke Strauss & Co, kwenyere na ọrụ Cilliers-Barnard anaghị enweta ọnụahịa dị elu ugbu a 'n'ihi na ọ bụ akụkụ nke ọgbọ echefuru echefu nke nwéré ihe kachasị njọ nke ọdịbendị nkewapụ onwé ya n'oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Cilliers-Barnard debara aha ya na Hoërskool Rustenburg
Cilliers-Barnard gụrụ nka na Mahadum Pretoria
