'Bold textBettina Judd bụ onye African-American interdisciplinary writer, scholar, artist, and performer
A mụrụ Judd na Baltimore ma zụlite ya na Southern California

O nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na Comparative Women's Studies na asụsụ bekee na Spelman College n'afọ 2005, nzere masta ya na Women's Studies na Mahadum nke Maryland n'afọ 2007, na PhD ya na Women's Studies n'afọ 2014, na Mahadum nke Maryland

Nkọwa ya, Feelin Feminism Black Women's Art as Feminist Thought , bụ nyocha nke otú mmegbu dị iche iche na-emetụta ụmụ nwanyị ojii si enwe mmetụta, ma na-ekwusi ike na usoro okike na mmepụta nke ụmụ nwanyị ojii bụ ebe echiche nwanyị na nwanyị
Ọ kpọrọ aha mmetụta uri mbụ ya dị ka nne nne ya (onye na-ede uri na onye mgbakọ na mwepụ maka Ngalaba Nchebe), nne ya, na Maya Angelou
Dị ka onye na-ede uri, Judd abụrụla onye otu Cave Canem n'afọ 2007, 2008, na 2011

E bipụtala uri ya na ihe odide ya ndị ọzọ na magazin edemede, akwụkwọ akụkọ na anthologies gụnyere ma ọ bụghị naanị dị ka Torch, Meridians, na Mythium, nke ikpeazụ nke họpụtara onyinye ya maka Pushcart Prize
Judd enwetala nkwado site na kọleji ise, Vermont Studio Center, na Mahadum nke Maryland
Dị ka onye na-agụ egwu, ọ rụrụ maka ndị na-ege ntị gburugburu United States na World
Ugbu a, ọ bụ osote Prọfesọ nke okike, ụmụ nwanyị, na ọmụmụ gbasara mmekọahụ na Mahadum Washington, Seattle
N'afọ 2013, ihe odide Judd nke Patient, akwụkwọ mbụ ya nke uri, meriri n'afọ 2013 Black Lawrence Press Hudson Prize
Black Lawrence Press bipụtara Patient
n'afọ 2014
N'ụzọ sara mbara, nchịkọta ahụ bụ nyocha uri nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ sayensị na ihe akaebe nke nnwale ahụike nke narị afọ nke iri na itoolu na ụmụ nwanyị ojii nke wuru omume ọgbara ọhụrụ nke gynecology
N'ime ederede Judd na-esite na ahụmịhe nke ya na ụlọ ọrụ ahụike, na ụzọ ndị o si nweta mmegbu nke ọ na-ekwu maka ya n'oge niile o dere
Ọzọkwa, ọ na-ejikwa edemede ya adọta uche na akụkọ nke ụmụ nwanyị ojii ndị e zuru ndụ ha site na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ sayensị a, dị ka Henrietta Lacks

Nchịkọta ahụ na-agbanwe n'etiti echiche na olu nke onye na-ekwu okwu n'oge a, nwanyị ojii na-eme nchọpụta nke na-ahụ onwe ya ka ọ na-eche ihu na-akpa ókè agbụrụ na mmekọahụ microaggressions n'ihu ọnọdụ mberede gynecological, na olu 'ghost' nke Anarcha Wescott, Joice Heth, Lucy Zimmerman, na Betsey Harris, ezigbo ndụ ụmụ nwanyị ojii nke nnwale nke J
Marion Sims, nke a na-ewerekarị dị ka nna nke gynecology nke oge a

Nchịkọta ahụ na-ebikwa n'olu ụmụ nwanyị ojii ndị ọzọ akụkọ ihe mere eme bụ ndị a nwalere ma na-emegbu dị ka Saartjie Baartman na Henrietta Lacks Nchịkọta ahụ sitere na ahụmịhe nke Judd n'ụlọ ọgwụ nkuzi
Judd ekwuola banyere isiokwu na ndị na-ekwu okwu nke Patient 'Achọrọ m ime ka ụmụ nwanyị ndị a bụrụ mmadụ

Achọrọ m ịkọ akụkọ ha, ma ọ bụ ma ọ dịghị ihe ọzọ, nye ndị na-ege ntị ohere ịnụ na ha dị adị ka ajụjụ ọzọ wee bụrụ 'Ọ dị mma, gịnị bụ akụkọ ha?'Ònye ga-adị ndụ ma kọọ akụkọ ụmụ nwanyị ojii?Ụmụ nwanyị ole na ole m na-ede banyere ha bụ ndị ohu
E bu n'uche ka ha laa n'iyi n'azụ ihe nketa nke ndị ọcha nwere ha
Eziokwu ahụ, eziokwu nke ikpochapụ bụ ihe a ga-enyocha
Ya mere, ana m ede n'olu ha, mana ha na-ada ụda dị nnọọ ka nwanyị ojii na-eme nchọpụta nke na-eme nnyocha na ha
Onye nchọpụta a nwere ọmịiko na-aghọta akụkọ ya site na akụkọ ha
Nke ahụ bụ ọdachi, mana ọ bụ ụzọ ha, ọ bụkwa ụzọ isi gwọọ ya

Na Febụwarị 16, 2016, Judd, ya na ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme Vanessa Gamble, bụ ndị ọbịa na mbipụta nke NPR's Hidden Brain Podcast nke akpọrọ 'Remembering Anarcha, Lucy, and Betsey Ndị nne nke gainakologị ugbu a' ebe ọ gụrụ uri site na Patient
ma kwurịta isiokwu ya
Bettinah Tianah (amụrụ Betty Nassali, 10 Nọvemba 1993) bụ onye Uganda na-ahụ maka telivishọn, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nlereanya, na onye ejiji
A maara ya dika onye na akwado ihe omume television dị ka Youth Voice, Be My Date, na The Style Project Ọ rụkwara ọrụ ndu (Rhona) na usoro telivishọn The Hostel
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, Tianah malitere ịrụ ọrụ na NBS Television dị ka onye na-elekọta Youth Voice

O mechara kwado ihe ngosi telivishọn a na-akpọ Be My Date na 2015 na NTV Uganda, onochiri Anita Fabiola, ma kwado ihe ngosi ejiji a na-akpọ The Style Project site na 2017 ruo Machị 2022 mgbe ọ gbara arụkwaghịm iji lekwasị anya na azụmahịa ya BT Beauty Uganda Tianah nwetara ọrụ mbụ ya dị ka Rhona, 'nwa agbọghọ ọjọọ' na usoro telivishọn Uganda The Hostel na oge nke anọ nakwa nke ikpeazụ
Tianah kwadoro ihe omume red carpet na UNAA Convention na Washington DC, na-aghọ onye Uganda mbụ kwadoro ihe omume ahụ
Ọ bụkwa onye nlereanya, ebe ọ bịanyere aka na Creative Industries Group na 2017
O mere foto mbụ ya na Paris
Tianah nwere nzere mmuta na akwụkwọ akụkọ na Mahadum Cavendish
Na mbu odebanyere aha maka nzere na Human Resources Management na Makerere University Business School (MUBS), mana ọ kwụsịrịiji wee chuso ọrụ nta akuko
'Betty Abah' amụrụ n' 6 ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1974 bụ onye ọchụ ntà akụkọ nakwa ode akwụkwọ na Nijirịa
Ọ bụkwa ọnụ na-ekwuchitere maọbụ a gbaara ụmụ nwaanyị na ụmụaka ọgụ
O guzobere, ma bụrụkwa onye nchịkwata otu CEE HOPE
Otu a bụ otu na-agbachitere ụmụaka ụmụ nwanyị hụ na ha nwetere oke ruru ha
E guzobere otu a na Lagos Steeti
A mụrụ Betty n' Otukpo,|Benue Steti, nke di na Middle Belt mpaghara nke Nigeria
O nwetara digiri nke mbụ ka ọ gụchara maka asụsụ bekee na ihe gbasara ebe ọba akwụkwọ na University of Calabar ma nwetakwa nzere Mastas n'agụmagụ ederede nke bekee na University of Lagos

Betty rụrụ ọrụ mbụ n'ụlọ ọrụ akwụkwọ akụkụ a kpọrọ The Voice Newspaper di na Makurdi, Benue Steeti, ọ rụkwara n'ụlọ akwụkwọ akụkọ ọzọ a kpọrọ Newswatch na Tell Magazine, tupu ọ ga rụọ na Rocky Mountain News dịka onye otu Alfred Friendly Press Fellowships
Dịka onye ọchụ nta akụkọ, ọ mụrụ ọrụ ịchụ nta akụkọ n'ụlọ ọrụ ndia The Voice Newspaper, Newswatch, Tell Magazine nakwa Rocky Mountain News na Denver, Colorado, USA
Ọ dere akwụkwọ a kpọrọ Sound of Broken Chains, Go Tell our King Mother of Multitutes
Betty na ndị otu akpọrọ 'Environmental Rights Action; Friends of the Earth Nigeria' tupu o bido ụlọ ọrụ nke ya bụ CEE-HOPE n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2013
Abah etinyela aka n'ọtụtụ ikpe gbasara ndị a na-akpagbu maọbụ emegide iji napụta ha n'ọnọdụ a

ụfọdụ ikpe ndị a gụnyere ịnapụta ndị Chibok girls abducted ndị ọtu ọmekome akpọrọ Boko Haram,mgbago ugwu nke Nigeria, nkwado ụmụnwaanyị Niger Delta maka ichedo gburugburu ha,ịzọpụta ụmụ nwaanyi atọ ndi otu nje nke Ejigbo di na Lagos mekpara ahụ, ikpe gbasara kidnapping of Ese Oruru na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Betty Amongi Akena, (née Betty Amongi Ongom), mana a maara ya dị ka Betty Amongi, bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda
Ọ bụ Minista nke Mmekọahụ, Ọrụ na Mmepe Ọha na Cabinet nke Uganda, ka ọ na-erule 9 June 2021
N'oge gara aga, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista nke Kampala Capital City ma tupu nke ahụ, site na 6 June 2016 ruo 14 December 2019, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka Minista nke Ala, Ụlọ na Mmepe Obodo na kansụl Uganda
Ọ bụkwa onye omeiwu na-anọchite anya Oyam South Constituency na 11th Parliament (2021 ruo 2026)
A mụrụ Betty Amongi na Oyam District, Lango sub-region, na Northern Region nke Uganda, na 15 Nọvemba 1975
N'afọ 1996, ọ banyere Mahadum Makerere, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Arts na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nchịkwa ọha
Ka e mesịrị na 2009, e nyere ya Master of Arts na mmekọrịta mba ụwa na ọmụmụ Diplomatic
A họpụtara Betty Amongi ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu na 2001
A họpụtara ya ọzọ na 2006, 2011 na 2016

N'ime ihe ijuanya na-esote ntuli aka onye isi ala na ndị omeiwu nke 20 Febụwarị 2016, Onye isi ala Yoweri Museveni nke otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement na-achị, kpọrọ ya Minista nke Ala, Ụlọ na Mmepe Obodo, n'agbanyeghị njikọ ya na ndị mmegide Uganda People's Congress
N'ime mgbanwe nke kansụl na 14 Disemba 2019, a kpọrọ ya minista nke Kampala Capital City, na-agbanwe dockets na Beti Kamya-Turwomwe, onye weghaara na Lands, Housing and Urban Development
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2021, a họpụtara Amongi ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka Mmekọahụ, Ọrụ na Mmepe Ọha na Kọmitii ọhụrụ
N'abalị isii n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2013, Betty Amongi lụrụ Jimmy Akena, onye otu ndị omeiwu maka obodo Lira na onye isi oche nke ndị mmegide Uganda People's Congress
Jimmy Akena bụ nwa Milton Obote, onye bụbu praịm minista na onye isi ala nke Uganda ugboro abụọ
Alụmdi na nwunye ọdịnala ahụ mere na mpaghara Minakulu, Oyam District ma ndị omeiwu 32 bịara ya
Onye isi ala Yoweri Museveni, enyi di na nwunye ahụ, gakwara agbamakwụkwọ ahụ
Betty Anyanwu-Akeredolu (a mụrụ n'afọ 1953) bu akwakọlchọristị, onye na-enyere ndi mmadu aka, ma burukwa nwunye onye isi ala nke Ondo Steeti na Naijiria
Ọ lụrụ gọvanọ bụ Oluwarotimi Odunayo Akeredolu
O bu onye hiwere Breast Cancer Association nke Naijiria
A mụrụ Betty Anyanwu- Akeredolu n'ụbọchị nke 20 n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1953, na ezi na ulo nke onye isi BUB na Nneoma Dora Anyanwu, na Emeabiam, nke Owerri-West, na Imo Steeti
Anyanwu-Akeredolu gara Mahadum nke Naijiria,dị na Nsukka ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na zuuọlọji n'afọ 1977
O nwere akara nzere masta na sayensị nke azụ, nke isi agụmagụ ya bụ akwakọlchọristị, na Mahadum nke Philippines dị na Visayas n'obodo Iloilo
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka ọkachamara n'ịkụ azụ mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Azụ n'ogo gọọmentị etiti
Ọ lara ezumike nká n'afọ 2005
Ọ bu onye na-azu ahia azụ ma na enyekwa ndumodu site na ulo oru ya, Aquatek Farms Ventures
Na mgbakwunye, ọ banyela na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị kemgbe afọ 2007 ma na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'oge a (2017)
N’afọ 1997, a chọpụtara na ọ na-arịa kansa ara
Ọ gara nlekọta ma gbakee
Ọ malitere otu ụlọ ọrụ bụ ndị ọrụ ebere, Breast Cancer Association of Nigeria (BRECAN) iji mee ka a mata banyere ọrịa a
O ritela ugo na ntunye ọrụ ya na mbọ ọ na-agba i buso ọrịa kansa aha na Naịjirịa
Ọ bụkwa onye nkwado nke otu ‘Bring Back Our Girls’
Ọ lụrụ Oluwarotimi Odunayo Akeredolu, SAN
Ha nwere ụmụ anọ na ụmụ ụmụ anọ

Betty Jocelyne Okagua - Apiafi (onye a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 19 n'ọnwa Febrụwarị n'afọ 1962) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naịjirịa, onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba, onye rụburu ọrụ n'ụlọ akụ na ezumike nka, na onye mmụta
A họpụtara Apiafi na Sineti Naịjirịa maka Rivers West Senatorial District n'afọ 2019
O jekwara ozi dịka onye otu ụlọ ndị nnọchi anya maka Abua / Odual- Ahoada East Federal Constituency nke Rivers Steeti kemgbe afọ 2007
Ọ bu onye People's Democratic Party (PDP)
A mụrụ Betty Jocelyne Okagua - Apiafi n'ụbọchị nke 19 n'ọnwa Febrụwarị n'afọ 1962
O nwetara nzere bachelọ na Ekọnọmics na Mahadum nke Port Harcourt, yana nzere masta na Rivers State University of Science and Technology
N'oge ọrụ ya n'ụlọ nnọchị anya (2007-2019), Apiafi bụ onye nkwado siri ike n'ihe gbasara ụmụ nwanyị, agụmakwụkwọ na mgbanwe ngalaba ụlọ akụ

Ụmụ nwaanyị ndị ọzọ a hoputara gụnyere Folake Olunloyo, Maimunat Adaji, Martha Bodunrin, Suleiman Oba Nimota, Mulikat Adeola Akande, Uche Lilian Ekunife, Beni Lar, Linda Chuba-Ikpeazu, Mercy Almona-Isei, Doris Uboh, Olubimi Etteh
Ọ kwadoro ọtụtụ atụmatụ iwu ma rụọ ọtụtụ ọrụ a kpọrọ ụfọdụ n'ime ha n'okpuru;
Apiafi chịkọtara ọtụtụ kọmitii n'oge ọrụ ya na ụlọ nnọchi anya site n'afọ 2007 ruo afọ 2019

Betty Awori Engola (amụrụ na 24 Disemba na afo 1960) nke a na-akpọkwa Betty Engola bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ugandan
Ọ bụ nwanyị nnọchi anya distrikti nke distrikti Apac n'okpuru pati National Resistance Movement na-achị na 10th Parliament (na afo 2016 ruo na afo 2021)
N'afọ 1974, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ Primary Leaving Examination na Shimon Demonstration School
N'afọ 1978, ọ nwetara asambodo agụmakwụkwọ nke Uganda na St Josephs Girls School, Nsambya
Awori gụsịrị akwụkwọ Uganda Advanced Certificate na Tororo Girls School n'afọ 1981
N'afọ 1984, ọ sonyeere Mahadum Makerere, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Arts na Social Science
Site na afo 2009 ruo na afo 2010, Betty Awori Engola jere ozi dị ka onye otu kansụl na-achịkwa na Uganda Technical College, Lira
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye otu Board n'etiti na afọ 2005 na afo 2008 na National Agricultural Advisory Services
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Uganda Advisory Board of Trade dị ka onye ọrụ azụmahịa site na afo 1986 ruo na afo 1987
Site na afo 1988 ruo na afo 2001, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ azụmahịa mba ọzọ na Ministry of Tourism, Trade and Industry
Site na afo 2016 ruo taa, ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye omeiwu na ụlọ omeiwu nke Uganda
Betty Awori Engola na-eje ozi na ọrụ ọzọ na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda dị ka Kọmitii na Sayensị na Teknụzụ site na ndị otu
O sonyere na nnọkọ nke iri na anọ nke United Nations Conference on Trade and Development na Nairobi, Kenya nke mere site na 17-22 Julaị na afo 2016
Awori sonyekwara na mmepe nhazi nke Local Government Budget Framework Paper maka Apac District
Betty Blayton (July 10, 1937 October 2, 2016) bụ ónyé America na-eme ihe, ónyé nkwado, ónyé na-ese ihe, onye nchịkwa nka na ónyé nkụzi, na onye nkuchi
Dị ka onye na-ese ihe, Blayton bụ onye na-eme ihe osise, onye na-ede ihe, na onye na-akpụ ihe
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya a na-akọwakarị dị ka 'ihe omimi'
Blayton bụ onye guzobere Studio Museum na Harlem na odeakwụkwọ ụlọ ọrụ, onye guzobere na onye isi nchịkwa nke Harlem Children's Art Carnival (CAC), na onye guzobere Harlem Textile Works
Ọ bụkwa onye ndụmọdụ, onye ndụmọdụ na onye otu ụlọ ọrụ na ọtụtụ nka ndị ọzọ na ụlọ ọrụ na mmemme ndị ọrụ obodo
Ụzọ ya na-enweghị atụ mepụtara ohere maka ónyé na-ekiri ya itinye onwé ya n'ime mpempe akwụkwọ ahụ, na-enye ohere maka echiche onwe ónyé, akụkụ dị mkpa nke ọrụ Blayton
A mụrụ Betty Jean Blayton na Newport News, Virginia na 1937
Nne na nna ya bụ Alleyne Houser Blayton na Dr
James Blaine, ọ bụkwa nwa nke abụọ n'ime ụmụ anọ ha
Nne na nna ya na-arụkwa ọrụ na ọbọdọ ndị Africa America
Nna ya meghere ụlọ ọgwụ mbụ maka ndị isi ojii na mpaghara ya na nne ya na-alụ ọgụ mgbè niile màkà agụmakwụkwọ maka mmadụ niile
Blayton gụrụ akwụkwọ na Bruton Heights ruo na klas nke 8 wee gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na Palmer Memorial Institute na North Carolina ruo 1955
Blayton nwèrè mmetụta dị ukwuu na ebe ngosi nka na ntọala ụwa nke New York City, na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi nka nka na-arụkọ ọrụ na ọtụtụ òtù
Site na 1968 ruo 1994, ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ na City of New York Board of Education ébé o nyèrè aka zụlite agụmakwụkwọ nka na ụlọ akwụkwọ na mmemme ọha na eze
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé nlekọta màkà mmemme mgbasa ozi nke Museum of Modern Art maka ndị ntorobịa nọ n'ime Obodo
Dị ka onye guzobere, ya na Victor D'Amico, ma mesịa bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa, ọ mepụtara ma duzie Children's Art Carnival na Harlem School of Arts

Otu n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ ya kachasị nwee ihe ịga nke ọma bụ Jean-Michel Basquiat, onye a na-eche na ọ mụtara ekele ya maka ihe okike ndị na-eto eto site na nkà ihe ọmụma Blaytonz na mmụọ dị mkpa karịa usoro mgbe ọ na-abịa na ọrụ nka gị
Ihe omume ahụ, nke MoMA mepụtara n'afọ ndị 1960 maka ụmụaka obodo, lụrụ ọgụ mgbe ego gọọmentị tụfuru na afọ ndị 1980, mana Blayton rụrụ ọrụ ịchọta ego azụmahịa iji mee ka ọ dị ndụ
Mgbè ọ kwagara New York, ọ ghọrọ akụkụ nke Association Community Team of Harlem Youth Opportunities Unlimited ebe ọ kụziiri ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma banyéré nka ma gbaa ha ume ileta MoMA
Mgbè ọ chọpụtara na a machibidoro ụmụ akwụkwọ ya ịbanye n'ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie ahụ, o jiri kọntaktị ya n'ebe ahụ iji jide n'aka na ọ gaghị eme ọzọ

Nke a jikọtara ya na echiche Blaytoná nke ịmepụta ebe ngosi nka n'ime obodo ụmụ akwụkwọ ya bụ ihe dugara n'ịmepụta ebe ngosi nka Studio ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ na onye isi oche site na 1965-1977

Betty Elaine Collette (December 5, afo 1930 - Febụwarị 5, afo 2017) bụ ọkachamara n'ọrịa anụmanụ si Asheville, North Carolina
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Stephens-Lee, nweta akara ugo mmụta bachelor ya na bayoloji site na Mahadum Morgan State, yana PhD
na bacteriology si Catholic University of America
Colllette bụ naanị onye nyocha ihe gbasara ọrịa akparamaagwa nke America na Georgetown University School of Medicine na afo 1950s
Nnyocha ya lekwasịrị anya na ọbara mgbali elu na ụmụ anụmanụ
Mgbe e mesịrị na ọrụ ya, ọ bụ prọfesọ na Howard University
Betty Esther Naluyima bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na onye otu ndị omeiwu
A họpụtara ya n'ọchịchị dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu maka mpaghara Wakiso n'oge ntuli aka nke 2021 Uganda
Ọ bụ onye otu National Unity Platform
Betty Irabor bụ onye Naijiria na-ede akụkọ,onyena-enyere mmadụ aka, onye nhiwe na mbiputa nke Genevieve magazine
O nweburu otu kọlụm na akwụkwọ akụkọ Black & Beauty UK
O nwekwara ntọala na-akwalite ị mata maka ọrịa ara ure, ịchọpụta ya n'oge na ọgwụgwọ
A mụrụ Irabor n'ụbọchị nke 25 n'ọnwa Maachị, n'afọ 1957
Betty Irabor bụ otu n’ime ndị ode akwụkwọ bụ ọkaibe na ndị na-ebipụta akụkọ na Naijiria
Irabor mụrụ asụsụ Bekee na mahadum were tinyezie isi n'ibipụta akwụkwọ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye nta akụkọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ Concord, ọrụ ndị nwe onwe ha na Vanguard, The Guardian,Thisday na Black & Beauty magazine na UK na ndị ọzọ na mba ofesi
N'afọ 2005, onye ọchụnta akụkọ mgbasa ozi na onye edemede a malitere Genevieve Foundation nke na-eme Pink Ball kwa afọ dị ka ụzọ e ji enweta ego e ji enyere ndị na-arịa ọrịa kansa aka

O mechara banye na azụmaahịa nke ihe nkwukọrịta ma gbahapụ ihe niile iji bido Genevieve Magazine n'afọ 2003 nke enwere ike ị kọwa dị ka ihe gaziri nke ọma, ma bụrụkwa otu n'ime akwụkwọ akụkọ maka ndụ, ejiji na ịma mma a kachasị agụ na Naijiria
Irabor bụ onye isi nchịkọta na onye isi nchịkwa nke Genevieve magazine
Ọ bụkwa onye na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka, okwu okwu n'ihu ọha na onye ndu mmeri maka ị mata maka ọrịa ure ara ya na ndị ọrụ ebere ya a ma dịka Genevieve PinkBall Foundation

Tupu ị malite Genevieve Magazine n'afọ 2003, ọ rụburu ọrụ dịka onye ode akwụkwọ nwe onwe ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ ThisDay na Vanguard ma nyekwa akụkọ ole na ole maka akwụkwọ akụkọ Black & Beauty magazine UK A makwaara ya dịka onye ngosi nke Life's Lessons with Betty Irabor
Ọ bụ ọkà okwu na onye nnọchi anya nke na-ekesa foto ị kwalite ma ị kwado ngosipụta uwe site na Instagram maka ndị na-eso ụzọ ya ruru 80,000 [bettyirabo] Onye guzobere @mybeautifulmindnetwork
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1957 ma zụlite ya na Naijiria
Ọ lụrụ Soni Irabor' Ha nwe ụmụaka abụọ
O nwere nwa nwoke nke ndi Zanzibar International Film Festival hoputara obere ihe nkiri ya
Ọ i ge egwu Tina Tuner na Westlife
N’afọ 2018
Irabor na di ya mere emume ncheta agbamakwụkwọ ha nke iri atọ na ise
A kwanyeere ya ùgwù nke ndị Association of Professional Women Bankers dịka The Most Accomplished Female Publisher in Nigeria 2011
Betty Louke Chelain bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ugandan na nwanyị so na ndị omeiwu
N'afọ 2021, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị na nzuko omeiwu maka mpaghara Amudat
Ọ bụ onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement na-achị
Estelle Betty Manyolo (amụrụ n'afọ 1938) bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye na-ebi akwụkwọ na Uganda
Betty Manyolo bụ onye Muganda, na otu n'ime ụmụ iri
Ọ gụrụ nka na School of Fine Art na Makerere College
Ka oge na-aga n'ọrụ ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe maka Ngalaba Ahụike nke Uganda
Ndị na-akpa ehi
Ọnwụ n'Ọhịa
Betty Manyolo sere ihe n'akwụkwọ ahụ bụ Awo olwatuuka

E gosipụtara ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise linocut ya, tinyere ihe osise mmanụ, site na Harmon Foundation malite na 1961; a gụnyekwara ọrụ ya na Smithsonian Institution Traveling Exhibit of Contemporary African Printmakers site na 1966 ruo 1968
Betty Nambooze Bakireke, nke a maara dị ka Betty Namboozi, bụ onye nta akụkọ na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda
Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye omeiwu, na-anọchite anya Obodo Ukwu Mukono, na Mukono District
A mụrụ ya na Mukono District, na 13 Julaị 1969
Ọ gara Bishop's Senior Secondary School Mukono, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1986
O mechara gaa Law Development Centre, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Diploma na Law, na 1998
N'afọ 2010, e nyere ya diplọma na Development Studies site na Mahadum Uganda Martyrs

A họpụtara Nambooze na mbụ ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu na Mee 2010, mgbe na ntuli aka, na-agba ọsọ na tiketi Democratic Party, ọ meriri onye omeiwu nọ n'ọkwa ahụ, Peter Bakaluba Mukasa nke National Resistance Movement na-achị
Dị ka profaịlụ omeiwu ya si kwuo, Nambooze rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ akụkọ (stringer), n'etiti afọ 1993 na 2000
Site na 2000 ruo 2004, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ mmanye iwu
Site na 2004 ruo 2005, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-egosi redio n'etiti afọ 2000 na 2009 na CBS FM
Site na 2005 ruo 2010, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ọnụ na-ekwuchitere Democratic Party na Uganda

N'abalị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2016, e jidere ya na Moses Kasibante onye omeiwu a họpụtara maka ikpughe akwụkwọ na-akọwa aghụghọ ntuli aka na-ewere ọnọdụ n'oge ntuli aka mba ahụ na nso nso a
E jidere Nambooze n'ọtụtụ oge n'ebubo dị iche iche na-akpali ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, nke a na-edekarị ụgha, mana a ka na-ama ya ikpe n'ụlọ ikpe ọ bụla
A na-eyi ndụ ya egwu ma ọbụna tinye ya nsí n'ihi ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya
N'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2020, a mara Nambooze dị ka onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị 'National Unity Platform' na onye otu ya 'Kyagulanyi Sentamu Robert' aka
'Bobi Wine' onye isi oche nke pati
Ya na ndị otu ya ndị ọzọ, Nambooze setịpụrụ na 'Mission 2021' ọrụ otu iji wepụ ndị otu na-achị achị na ntuli aka 2021 na-abịanụ

Na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke afọ 2021, Namboze meriri oge ọzọ (2021-2026) iji nọchite anya obodo mukono na tiketi NUP mgbe o meriri ndị asọmpi ya kacha nso Maazị George Fred Kagimu nke Democratic Party (DP) na Abbas Ssozi nke National resistance Movement (NRM)
N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọktoba, ndị uwe ojii nyochara mwakpo a wakporo ụlọ Betty Nambooze ebe ha nwetara pangas ọhụrụ abụọ n'ime akpa n'ime obere ogige tomato
Nambooze na-anọdụ na (a) Kọmitii na-ahụ maka ọrụ ọha na eze na Gọọmentị Obodo na (b) Kọmiti na-ahụkarị maka ego gọọmentị Ob Obodo
Na Nọvemba 2002, Betty Nambooze lụrụ Henry Bakireke, onye ọ zutere na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na 1980s
Ha niile bụ nne na nna nke ihe karịrị ụmụ iri abụọ na isii, ma ndị e kere eke ma ndị e kuchiri
Betty Achan Ogwaro (Hon
Dr Betty Achan Ogwaro) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Sudan na gọọmentị South Sudan
Betty Achan Ogwaro bụ onye bụbu minista mbụ nke Ọrụ Ugbo na Ọhịa na Republic of South Sudan
Ogwaro nwere nzere bachelọ na sayensị anụmanụ na nsọpụrụ site na Mahadum Juba
O nwetakwara nzere masta na sayensị anụmanụ na Mahadum Edinburgh
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ maka nzere na microbiology na Mahadum Wolverhampton, na United Kingdom
Betty Ogwaro jere ozi dị ka onye nduzi nke mmepụta anụmanụ maka Gọọmentị nke Southern Sudan ruo 1995 mgbe ọ gara mba ọzọ na United Kingdom

Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ Sudanese People Liberation Movement (SPLM) na Midlands site na 1999 ruo 2005, ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị isi nwanyị bụ ndị nwere ihe ịga nke ọma na-ekwurịta maka itinye 25% kacha nta ndị nnọchiteanya ụmụ nwanyị na ọkwa ọchịchị niile dị ka akụkụ nke nkwekọrịta udo zuru oke
Ogwaro bụ onye guzobere 'Windows for Sudan', otu NGO nke na-achọ ịkwalite ụmụ nwanyị Sudan na-ekere òkè na mmepe ma bulie ọnọdụ ha na ọha mmadụ
Ọ gakwara UNIFEM maka nsogbu ụmụ nwanyị

bụ onye otu ndị ogbugbo na-ekwu maka udo n'etiti Lord's Resistance Army (LRA) na gọọmentị Uganda, na nwanyị Sudan mbụ ịma Joseph Kony aka, onye isi LRA, ihu na ihu maka arụrụala nke otu ahụ na Sudan na enweghị nkwenye ha na usoro udo
N'afọ 2007, Ogwaro jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Southern Sudanese Women's Parliamentarian League, nke na-akwalite ntinye aka nke ndị isi ụmụ nwanyị Sudanese na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mkpebi
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Southern Sudanese Women Caucus, ebe òtù ụmụ nwanyị nwere mmetụta na-arụ ọrụ iji meghachi omume na mkpa nke obodo Sudan
Ọ bụ onye otu ọtụtụ kọmitii, gụnyere kọmitii pụrụ iche maka Gender, Social Welfare, Youth and Sports
Ọ na-ejikọta ọrụ omeiwu ya na ịkwalite ụmụ nwanyị n'ọrụ ugbo
N'afọ 2007, Salva Kiir Mayardit họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka ọrụ ugbo, ihe onwunwe anụmanụ, ọhịa, imekọ ihe ọnụ na mmepe ime obodo na Eastern Equatoria State
na-aga n'ihu ịghọ Gọọmentị nke Republic of South Sudan National Minister for Agriculture and Forestry n'afọ 2011

Betty Oyella Bigombe, nke a makwaara dị ka Betty Atuku Bigombe (amụrụ n'Oktoba 21, na afọ 1952), jere ozi dị ka Onye isi nchịkwa maka Fragility, Conflict, na Violence na World Bank site na 2014 ruo 2017
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ na June 2014
Site na Mee, na afọ 2011 ruo June 2014, ọ bụ Minista Steeti maka Ihe Ndị Dị n'Oké Mmiri na Kọmitii Uganda
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ na 27 Mee, na afọ 2011
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'otu oge dị ka onye omeiwu a họpụtara ahọpụta (MP), na-anọchite anya Amuru District Women's Constituency
Ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọkwa abụọ ahụ na 1 Junn, na afọ 2014
A mụrụ Betty Bigombe na Amuru District na Ọktoba 21, na afọ 1952, mgbe ọ bụ akụkụ nke Acholi District
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ iri na otu nke nna ya, onye bụ nọọsụ
Ọ bụ onye agbụrụ Acholi
Bigombe gara Gayaza High School maka ọmụmụ O-Level ya, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afọ 1968 na Trinity College Nabbingo maka agụmakwụkwọ A-Level, gụsịrị aha na afọ 1970
Ọ banyere Mahadum Makerere, mahadum ọha na eze kachasị ochie na Uganda, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere Bachelor of Arts na Social Science, na afọ 1974
O mechara gaa Harvard Kennedy School na Mahadum Harvard, na Cambridge, Massachusetts na United States
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere Master of Public Administration
Ọmụmụ ihe ya na Harvard nwetara nkwado site na Fellowship sitere na Harvard Institute for International Development
Site na afọ 1981 ruo na afọ 1984, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ ụlọ ọrụ nke Uganda Mining Corporation, ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị
Site na afọ 1986 ruo na afọ 1996, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda dị ka onye omeiwu
N'afọ 1988, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista Steeti maka Northern Uganda, nke chọrọ ka ọ biri na Gulu, obodo kachasị ukwuu na mpaghara Northern nke Uganda
E nyere ya ọrụ ime ka ndị nnupụisi Lord's Resistance Army (LRA) kweta ịtọgbọ ngwá agha ha, na-esote ọdịda nke mbọ ndị agha iji merie ndị nnupụrụ ọchịchị
Bigombe malitere ịkpọtụrụ onye isi LRA Joseph Kony na Junn, na afọ 1993
N'afọ 1993, a kpọrọ ya nwanyị nke afọ nke Uganda maka mbọ ọ na-agba ịkwụsị ime ihe ike ahụ
N'agbanyeghị nzukọ ya na Kony, mkparịta ụka ahụ dara na Febrụwarị, na afọ 1994
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, nnupụisi ahụ siri ike ma ọ nweghị mgbalị dị ịrịba ama a ga-eme maka udo maka afọ iri sochirinụ
Mgbe ọ nọrọ afọ iri na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda site na afọ 1986 ruo na afọ 1996, ọ meriri oche ndị omeiwu maka Obodo Gulu na afọ 1996 wee hapụ ọrụ gọọmentị
N'afọ 2011, afọ iri na ise ka e mesịrị, ọ laghachiri site n'inweta oche ndị omeiwu nke Amuru District Women's Constituency, na tiketi National Resistance Movement
N'afọ 1997, mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Harvard, ọ malitere ọrụ na World Bank na Washington, DC, dị ka Senior Social Scientist na Post-Conflict Unit
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na Ngalaba Nchebe Ọha na Mmepe Mmadụ nke Bank
N'afọ 1999 na 2000, Bigombe nyere nkwado teknụzụ na Carter Center na mgbalị dị mma n'etiti gọọmentị Uganda na Sudan
Mgbe ogbugbu nke Febụwari, na afọ 2004 na Barlonyo gasịrị, Bigombe hapụrụ World Bank wee gbaa ụgbọ elu gaa Uganda iji gbalịa ịmaliteghachi usoro udo

Site na Machị, na afọ 2004 ruo na afọ 2005, Bigombe bụ onye isi ogbugbo na atụmatụ udo ọhụrụ ya na Lord's Resistance Army, n'onwe ya na-akwado ọtụtụ n'ime usoro iji kpọkọta ndị minista gọọmentị Uganda na ndị isi nnupụisi
Nzukọ ikpeazụ e nwere na 20 Eprel, na afọ 2005, dara
Otú ọ dị, a na-ahụ ọdịda nke ogbugbo Bigombe dị ka ntọala maka mkparịta ụka Juba nke afọ 2006-2007, nke gọọmentị South Sudan kwadoro
Mkparịta ụka ndị ahụ dara na nkeji ikpeazụ mgbe Joseph Kony jụrụ ịbịanye aka na nkwekọrịta udo
N'afọ 2006, ọ laghachiri na United States wee rụọ ọrụ dị ka Senior Fellow na US Institute of Peace na Washington DC
Mgbe e mesịrị, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye ọkà mmụta Afrịka pụrụ iche na Woodrow Wilson International Center for Scholars, kwa na Washington, DC
N'afọ 2007, ọ natara onyinye Peacemakers in Action Award site na Tanenbaum Center for Interreligious Understanding
A họpụtara ya dịka onyeisi oche nke National Information and Technology Authority na Uganda (NITAU) n'afọ 2009

N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2011, Onye isi ala Yoweri Museveni họpụtara ya dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka ihe onwunwe mmiri, ọkwá ọ nọ na ya ruo n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2014, mgbe ọ gbara arụkwaghịm iji were ọrụ ya na World Bank
Betty Bigombe lụrụ onye nnọchi anya Uganda na Japan n'otu oge
Ọ bụ nne ụmụ abụọ; Pauline na Emmanuel
Na mgbakwunye na Acholi na Bekee, ọ na-asụ Swahili na Japanese
Elizabeth Williams (née Smyth; 22 Mee 1943 - 17 Machị 2020) bụ onye na-ahụ maka udo si Northern Ireland
Ya na Mairead Corrigan nwetara ihe nrite Nobel Peace Prize n'afọ 1976 maka ọrụ ya dị ka onye guzobere Community of Peace People, otu a raara nye ịkwalite ngwọta udo maka nsogbu na Northern Ireland
Williams bụ onye isi nke Global Children's Foundation ma bụrụ onye isi oche nke World Centre of Compassion for Children International
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Institute for Asian Democracy na Washington DC
Ọ kụziri ihe n'ọtụtụ isiokwu banyere udo, agụmakwụkwọ, nghọta ọdịbendị na okpukpe, mgbochi oke, na ikike ụmụaka
Williams bụ onye guzobere Nobel Laureate Summit, nke a na-eme kwa afọ kemgbe afọ 2000
N'afọ 2006, Williams ghọrọ onye guzobere Nobel Women's Initiative ya na ndị Nobel Peace Laureates Mairead Corrigan Maguire, Shirin Ebadi, Wangari Maathai, Jody Williams na Rigoberta Menchú Tum
Ụmụ nwanyị isii a, na-anọchite anya North na South America, Middle East, Europe na Africa, jikọtara ahụmịhe ha na mgbalị ha maka udo na ikpe ziri ezi na nha nhata
Ọ bụ ebumnuche nke Nobel Women's Initiative iji nyere aka mee ka ọrụ a na-arụ iji kwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị gburugburu ụwa sikwuo ike
Williams bụkwa onye otu PeaceJam
A mụrụ Williams na ụbọchị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1943 na Belfast, Northern Ireland
Nna ya na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-egbu anụ na nne ya bụ onye na-elekọta ụlọ
Betty nwetara agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya na St
Teresa Primary School na Belfast wee gaa St Dominic's Grammar School for Girls maka ọmụmụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ malitere ọrụ dị ka onye na-anabata ndị ọbịa n'ọfịs

Ọ bụ ihe a na-adịghị ahụkebe n'oge ahụ na Northern Ireland, nna ya bụ onye Protestant na nne ya bụ onye Katọlik; ezinụlọ nke Williams mechara kwuo na ọ nwetara nnwere onwe okpukpe na ọhụụ sara mbara nke kpaliri ya ịrụ ọrụ maka udo
Na mbido afọ ndị 1970 ọ sonyeere mkpọsa mgbochi ime ihe ike nke onye ụkọchukwu Protestant duziri

Williams kwuru na ahụmịhe a kwadebere ya ka o mechaa chọta òtù udo nke ya, nke lekwasịrị anya n'ịmepụta òtù udo nke ndị bụbu ndị iro mejupụtara, na-eme usoro iwulite ntụkwasị obi, na mmepe nke usoro udo

A dọtara Williams n'ọgbọ egwuregwu ọha na eze mgbe ọ hụchara ọnwụ ụmụaka atọ na 10 Ọgọstụ 1976, mgbe ụgbọ ala nke onye ọkwọ ụgbọala ya, onye Irish Republican Army (IRA) paramilitary aha ya bụ Danny Lennon, gbara egbe na nzaghachi site n'aka onye agha nke Kings Own Royal Border regiment
Ka ọ na-atụgharị n'ụlọ ya, ọ hụrụ ụmụaka Maguire atọ ụgbọ ala ahụ na-agbagharị wee gbaa ọsọ inyere aka
Nne ha, Anne Maguire, onye ya na ụmụ ahụ nọ, gburu onwe ya na Jenụwarị 1980
Ihe merenụ metụrụ Williams n'ahụ nke ukwuu nke na n'ime ụbọchị abụọ nke ọdachi ahụ, ọ nwetara mbinye aka 6,000 na mkpesa maka udo ma nweta nlebara anya mgbasa ozi zuru oke
Ya na Corrigan, ya na ya guzobere Women for Peace; nke, ya na Ciaran McKeown, mechara ghọọ Community of Peace People
N'oge na-adịghị anya, Williams haziri njem udo gaa n'ili nke ụmụaka ndị e gburu egbu, nke ụmụ nwanyị Protestant na Katọlik 10,000 bịara
Otú ọ dị, ndị otu IRA ji ike mebie njem udo ahụ, bụ ndị boro ha ebubo na ha bụ 'ndị na-akwado ndị Britain'
N'izu na-esote, Williams duziri njem ọzọ na Ormeau Park nke mechiri n'ụzọ gara nke ọma n'enweghị ihe ọghọm n'oge a na ndị sonyere 20,000
N'oge ahụ, Williams kwupụtara ihe ndị a
N'ịghọta mbọ ọ na-agba maka udo, Williams, ya na enyi ya Mairead Corrigan, jikọrọ aka nweta Nobel Peace Prize na 1977 (ihe nrite maka 1976)
N'okwu nnabata ya, Williams kwuru,
A ga-echeta izu mbụ ahụ mgbe niile maka ihe ọzọ ma e wezụga ọmụmụ nke ndị Peace People
Maka ndị na-etinye aka nke ukwuu, ihe ncheta kachasị ike n'izu ahụ bụ ọnwụ nke nwa okorobịa Republican na ọnwụ nke ụmụaka atọ nke ụgbọala nwoke ahụ nwụrụ anwụ kụrụ
Mmetụta miri emi nke nkụda mmụọ na nzuzu na-enweghị uche nke ime ihe ike na-aga n'ihu apụtaworị ìhè tupu ọdachi ndị mere n'ehihie ahụ nke 10 Ọgọst 1976

Mana ọnwụ nke ndị ntorobịa anọ ahụ n'otu oge dị egwu nke ime ihe ike mere ka nkụda mmụọ ahụ gbawaa, ma mepụta ohere nke ezigbo udoN'ihe banyere anyị, ọnwụ ọ bụla n'ime afọ asatọ gara aga, na ọnwụ ọ bụla na agha ọ bụla a lụrụ na-anọchite anya ndụ furu efu n'enweghị isi, ọrụ nne jụrụ
E kewara ego Peace Prize n'etiti Williams na Corrigan
Williams jidere òkè ya n'ego ahụ, na-ekwu na ebumnuche ya bụ iji ya kwalite udo karịa Ireland, mana ọ na-eche nkatọ maka mkpebi ya ihu
Ya na Corrigan enweghị njikọ ọ bụla mgbe afọ 1976 gasịrị
N'afọ 1978, Williams kwụsịrị njikọ ya na Peace People movement, wee bụrụ onye na-agba mbọ maka udo n'ebe ndị ọzọ gburugburu ụwa
Williams natara People's Peace Prize nke Norway na 1976, Golden Plate Award nke American Academy of Achievement na 1977, Schweitzer Medallion for Courage, Martin Luther King, Jr
Award, Eleanor Roosevelt Award na 1984, na Frank Foundation Child Care International Oliver Award
N'afọ 1995, e nyere ya Rotary Club International 'Paul Harris Fellowship' na Together for Peace Building Award
Na 2006 Earth Dialogues forum na Brisbane, Williams gwara ndị na-ege ntị nke ụmụ akwụkwọ n'oge okwu banyere ndị agha Iraq nwụrụ na 'Ugbu a, ọ ga-amasị m igbu George W
Bush'

Site na 17 ruo 20 Septemba 2007, Williams nyere usoro nkuzi na Southern California na 18 Septemba, o nyere nkuzi na ndị agụmakwụkwọ nke Orange County nke akpọrọ 'Udo na Ụwa bụ Azụmaahịa Onye Ọ bụla'; na 20 Septemba, o nyechara nkuzi na mmadụ 2,232 n'ozuzu, gụnyere 1,100 ụmụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, na Mahadum Soka nke America
N'afọ 2010, o kwuru okwu na WE Day Toronto, ihe omume WE Charity nke na-enye ụmụ akwụkwọ ike ịrụsi ọrụ ike n'ime obodo ha, na n'ụwa niile

N'ikwu okwu na Mahadum Bradford n'ihu ndị na-ege ntị 200 na Machị 2011, Williams dọrọ aka ná ntị na ụmụ agbọghọ Alakụba nọ na kọleji nwere ike ịnata mwakpo site n'aka ndị ezinụlọ iwe, ebe mahadum ahụ na-eme obere ihe iji nyere aka chebe ha

'Ọ bụrụ na ị nwere onye nọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ a, ụmụ agbọghọ ndị a nwere ike ịga kwuo, 'A na-atụ m egwu' ma ọ bụrụ na ị naghị eme nke ahụ ebe a, ị na-eme ka ha ghara ịbụ mmadụ site n'inyere ụmụ agbọghọ ndị ahụ aka, echeghị m?'
N'oge ọ natara Nobel Prize, Williams rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-anabata ndị ọbịa ma na-azụlite ụmụ ya abụọ na di mbụ ya Ralph Williams
Alụmdi na nwunye a gbasara n'afọ 1981
Ọ lụrụ onye ọchụnta ego James Perkins na Disemba 1982; ha biri na Florida na United States
N'afọ 2004, ọ laghachiri ibi na Northern Ireland
Williams nwụrụ na 17 Machị 2020, mgbe ọ dị afọ 76 na Belfast

Bettye Washington Greene (March 20, 1935 - June 16, 1995) bụ onye Amerika na-eme nnyocha na ụlọ ọrụ
Ọ bụ nwaanyị Afrịka-Amerika mbụ PhD
chemist na-arụ ọrụ n'ọkwa ọkachamara na Dow Chemical Company
Na Dow, ọ nyochara latex na polymers
A na-ewere Dr
Greene dị ka onye ọsụ ụzọ mbụ nke Afrika-Amerika na sayensị
A mụrụ Bettye Washington na Fort Worth, Texas
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na IM
Terrell High School n'ihe dị ka afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri ise na abụọ
Ọ banyere Tuskegee Institute na Alabama, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na BS
na kemịkal nafo otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri ise na ise
Mgbe ọ lụrụ Veteran Air force Captain William Miller Greene n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri ise na ise, ọ gara Mahadum Wayne State na Detroit, ebe ọ nwetara PhD
ya na kemịkal anụ ahụ na-arụ ọrụ na Wilfred Heller(1962)
Ọ kụzikwaara ụmụ akwụkwọ kemịkal n'oge a
E bipụtara akwụkwọ doctoral ya, 'Determination of particle size distributions in emulsions by light scattering' n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri isii na ise
A hoputara ya na Sigma Xi, Scientific Research Society
N'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri isii na ise, Greene sonyeere Dow Chemical Company's E
Britton Research Laboratory na Midland, Michigan
Ọ bụ nwaanyị Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ sonyere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'ọkwa ọkachamara
Greene jere ozi dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na nsogbu Polymers na Saran Research Laboratory na otu Styrene Butadiene (SB) Latex na-ejikarị nkà ya na ihe ọmụma ya
Na Dow, ọ nyochara colloid na latex chemistry, gụnyere mmekọrịta dị n'etiti latex na akwụkwọ
N'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri asaa, a kwalitere Dr
Greene ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nyocha kemist na Dow Chemical
N'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri asaa na atọ, ọ sonyeere Dow Chemical's Designed Polymers Research Division, na-arụ ọrụ ọzọ na latex, iji chọta polymers nwere ike imezi latex
E mechara bulie ya n'ọkwa nke ọkachamara nyocha n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri asaa na ise
Ọ nọgidere na-arụ ọrụ na Dow Chemical ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri iteghete
O bipụtara ọtụtụ akwụkwọ na-amụ banyere ihe dị iche iche nke na-eme ka latex dịghachi
O bipụtakwara ọrụ na-amụ usoro iji chọpụta nrụgide elu nke mmiri ma ọ bụ ngwọta
Ọ hapụrụ Dow Chemical n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri iteghete
Greene gbara akwụkwọ maka ọtụtụ ikike n'oge ọrụ ya na Dow Chemical

N'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri asatọ na ise e nyere ya akwụkwọ ikike nke isiokwu ya bụ 'Stable latexes containing phosphorus surface groups' na-akọwa usoro nke ịkwadebe mpempe akwụkwọ mkpuchi nke gụnyere mgbakwunye site na ihe dị ka pasent abụọ ruo ihe dị ka pasent iri atọ nke latex gbanwere nke nwere phosphorus surface groups

N'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri asatọ na isii e nyere ya akwụkwọ ikike na-esote nke isiokwu ya bụ 'Composite sheet prepared with stable latexes containing phosphorus surface groups' na-ejikwa usoro emulsion polymerization maka ịkwadebe latex gbanwere
N'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri iteghete e nyere Dr

Greene ikike nke isiokwu ya bụ 'Latex based adhesive prepared by emulsion polymerization' maka imepụta latex based pressure sensitive adhesive for coating conventional substrates to form an adhesive tape
Mgbe ọtụtụ iri afọ nke onyinye na sayensị nke polymers, ọ nwụrụ na Midland n'onwa June 16, otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri iteghete na ise
Greene bụ onye so n'akwụkwọ iwu nke Midland, Michigan Alumni Chapter nke Delta Sigma Theta sorority, otu ọrụ ọha na eze na-ekwusi ike na ọrụ ya na ụmụ nwaanyị Afrika-America
A kwadoro isi Midland n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri asatọ na anọ
Greene nwere ọtụtụ ikike gụnyere ihe nkedo dabeere na latex site na iji carboxylic acid copolymerizing agent, na latex polymers na phosphates eji dị ka mkpuchi
Beulah Ecton Woodard (November 11, 1895 na July 13, 1955) bụ ónyé Africa-America na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ese onyinyo nke bi na California
Woodard bụ ónyé Africa America mbụ na-ese ihe na-eme ihe ngosi n'onwe ya na Los Angeles Museum of History, Science and Art
A mụrụ Beulah Ecton na nso Frankfort, Ohio, na Nọvemba 11, 1895
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke Maazị na Oriakụ
William P
Ecton Nna ya bụ ónyé agha ọbọdọ
Ọ zụlitere mmasị ndụ ya niile na ọdịbendị Afrịka mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ mgbè onye Afrịka letara ezinụlọ ya
Ezinụlọ ya kwagara California, ébé ọ bírí nso Los Angeles na ihe ga-aghọ Vernon
Ọ gara Los Angeles Polytechnic High School, ebe ọ gụrụ ihe osise ụlọ
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Woodard ga-arụ ọrụ dị ka odibo maka afọ ole na ole mgbe ọ gụsịrịchara akwụkwọ ruo mgbe ọ gbara afọ iri atọ
Woodard malitere iji ụrọ rụọ ọrụ na mbido afọ 30, mana ezinụlọ ya mèrè ka ọ ghara ịchụ ya na 1926
N'afọ 1928, ọ lụrụ Brady Woodard ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Otis Art Institute, Los Angeles Art School, na Mahadum nke Southern California
Ọ gụrụ Glen Lukens n'etiti ndị nkụzi ya, yana Peter David Edstrom, otu n'ime ndị guzobere Los Angeles County Museum of Art
Prince Russia Paul Troubetzkoy bụkwa otu n'ime ndị nkụzi Woodard
Woodard nwèrè ihe ngosi mbụ ya na Febụwarị 1935 na windo ụlọ ahịa màkà California News kwa izu
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Vernon Branch Library na Los Angeles Central Library
Ọ bụ onye Africa-America mbụ na-ese ihe na-egosi ihe ngosi otu ónyé na Los Angeles County Museum na ihe ngosi nke onwé ya na 1937
Ihe ngosi ahụ were izu asatọ ma nwee 'usoro ihe nkpuchi ụrọ na papier-mâché, nke e ji beading na ábụ́bà mara mma chọọ mma ma dabere na nyocha anthropological nke ónyé na-ese ihe
' Ọ bụ ónyé na-ahụ màkà nka na Los Angeles na onye isi ọbá akwụkwọ Los Angeles Miriam Matthews chịkọtara ya na Golden State Mutual Life Insurance Company zụrụ ọtụtụ ihe màkà nchịkọta nka ụlọ ọrụ ha
Matthews haziri ihe ngosi nke ọrụ Woodard na Vernon Branch nke Los Angeles Public Library
Woodard bịara n'uche Matthew mgbè onye na-ebipụta California News bụ James R
Smith gosipụtara ihe ọkpụkpụ ya na windo nke akwụkwọ akụkọ kwa izu
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa nke atọ na All-City Art Festival na 1953
Woodard nwụrụ na July 13, 1955, mgbè ọ dị afọ 59, tupu egosiputa ọrụ ya na Germany n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi
Beverley Felicity Badenhorst bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu Gauteng Provincial kemgbe Mee, na afọ 2019
Badenhorst bụ onye otu Economic Freedom Fighters
Badenhorst bụ onye otu Economic Freedom Fighters
Mgbe ntuli aka mpaghara nke afọ 2019 gasịrị, a họpụtara ya maka ndị omeiwu Gauteng Provincial
Ọ malitere ọrụ na 22 Mee 2019
E nyere Badenhorst ọrụ kọmitii ya na 13 Juun, na afọ 2019
Beverley Naidoo bụ onye South Afrika odee akwụkwọ ụmụaka bi na UK Akwụkwọ akụkọ atọ mbụ ya gosipụtara ndụ na South Africa ebe o biri ruo afọ iri abụọ ya
Odewokwa akụkọ ndụ onye ọrụ otu ndị ahịa Neil Aggett
Akụkụ nke ọzọ nke Eziokwu, nke Puffin bipụtara na afo 2000, bụ akụkọ banyere ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria na England
Maka ọrụ ahụ ọ meriri Medal Carnegie kwa afọ site na Association Library, na-amata akwụkwọ ụmụaka kacha mma nke afọ site na isiokwu Britain
Naidoo meriri Josette Frank Award ugboro abụọ - na 1986 maka njem na Jo'burg na 1997 maka Ọ dịghị Ntugharị azụ Akwụkwọ akụkọ South Afrika
A mụrụ Beverley Naidoo na 21st May afo 1943 na Johannesburg, South Afrika
O tolitere n'okpuru iwu ịkpa ókè agbụrụ nke nyere ụmụaka ndị ọcha ihe ùgwù
E zigara ụmụaka ndị ojii ka ha kewapụ, a gwara ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị dị ala na ezinụlọ ha ebe ha nwere ike ibi, ọrụ na njem
Apartheid gbochiri ụmụaka niile ikike itolite ọnụ na nha anya, ikpe ziri ezi na nkwanye ùgwù
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Wiwaterrand na afo 1963
Dị ka nwa akwụkwọ, Beverley malitere ịjụ ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na echiche bụ na ndị ọcha ka ndị ọzọ
Ntinye aka ya na òtù mgbochi ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na South Afrika mere ka a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ naanị izu asatọ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na otu
Ọ hapụrụ England na afo 1965 wee mụọ akwụkwọ na Mahadum York site n'enyemaka nke United Nations Bursary, ọzụzụ ka ọ bụrụ onye nkuzi
Ọ kụziiri ma ụmụaka praịmarị na nke sekọndrị na London afọ iri na asatọ
O nwetara PhD
sitere na Mahadum Southampton na afo 1991 wee rụọ ọrụ dị ka Onye Ndụmọdụ maka Omenala Diversity na Bekee na Dorset
Ọ kuziri Creative Writing na Goldsmiths College, University of London, ma na-agba ọsọ nkuzi maka ndị ntorobịa na ndị okenye na Britain na ná mba ọzọ, gụnyere maka British Council
Ọ lụrụ onye Saụt Afrịka ọzọ
Iwu ịkpa ókè agbụrụ machiri alụmdi na nwunye n'etiti ndị ọcha na ndị isi ojii ma gbochie ha na ụmụ ha ibikọ ọnụ na South Afrika
Dị ka nwata Beverley hụrụ akụkọ n'anya mgbe niile mana ọ malitere ide mgbe ụmụ nke ya na-etolite
Akwụkwọ mbụ ya, Journey to Jo'burg, meriri ihe nrite ọzọ na Britain
O meghere windo n'ọgụ ụmụaka na-alụ n'okpuru ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Na South Afrika amachibidoro ya ruo na afo 1991, afọ ka a tọhapụrụ Nelson Mandela n'ụlọ mkpọrọ
Afọ ole na ole ka e mesịrị, mgbe nne na nna nke ụmụaka South Afrika nile nwere ikike ịme ntuli aka maka oge mbụ, a họpụtara Nelson Mandela ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi oche

Njem na-aga Jo'burg, Chain of Fire and Out of Bonds ka edobere na South Africa n'okpuru ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, mgbe enweghị Ntugharị azụ na-eche banyere ahụmahụ nke otu nwa nwoke na-agbalị ịlanarị n'okporo ámá nke Johannesburg n'ime afọ ndị agha ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ozugbo
Akụkụ nke ọzọ nke Eziokwu na usoro ya, Web of Lies, na-ahụ maka ahụmahụ nke ụmụaka nke onye edemede Naijiria na-ekwu okwu ka ha na-achọ mgbaba ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na England
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke afo 2007 Burn My Heart nwere echiche echepụtara n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Kenya nke nwa nwanne nne nke abụọ, Neil Aggett, nke edobere na afo 1950s n'oge ọgba aghara Mau Mau
Beverley Naidoo edewokwa ọtụtụ akwụkwọ foto, na-egosi ụmụaka si Botswana na England
N'afọ 2004, o dere akwụkwọ foto Baba's Gift, nke edobere na South Africa nke oge a, ya na nwa ya nwanyị, Maya Naidoo
N'ime The Great Tug of War na akụkọ ndị ọzọ ọ na-akọ akụkọ ifo ndị Africa, ihe mmalite akụkọ akụkọ Brer Rabbit
Beverley Ann Schäfer bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na-eje ozi dị ka osote onye isi oche nke Western Cape Provincial Parliament kemgbe Mee 2019
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka ohere akụ na ụba nke Western Cape Provincial site na Nọvemba 2018 ruo Mee 2019
N'etiti June 2014 na October 2018, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Portfolio na Ohere akụ na ụba, Njem na Ọrụ Ugbo na ndị omeiwu mpaghara
Ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ obodo Cape Town maka Ward 54 site na 2011 ruo 2014
Ọ bụ onye otu Democratic Alliance (DA)
Schäfer jere ozi dị ka Onye isi nke Ngalaba Ahịa na Mgbasa Ozi n'ịntanetị nke Democratic Alliance site na 2009 ruo 2011
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2011, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye ndụmọdụ obodo Cape Town maka Ward 54
Ngalaba ahụ gụnyere mpaghara ndị dị ka Green Point, Mouille Point, Robben Island, Sea Point, Fresnaye, Bantry Bay, Clifton na akụkụ ugwu nke Camps Bay
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye kansụl ruo mgbe a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu nke Western Cape Provincial na Mee 2014
Ọ malitere ọrụ dị ka onye otu na 21 Mee 2014
A họpụtara Schäfer ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Portfolio na Ohere akụ na ụba na ụtarị maka Democratic Alliance na ndị omeiwu
N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2018, onye isi ala Helen Zille kwupụtara na Schäfer ga-anọchi Alan Winde dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka ohere akụ na ụba
Onye isi oche Western Cape Judge President John Hlophe ṅụrụ iyi na 1 Nọvemba 2018
A họpụtara Schäfer ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi oche nke Western Cape Provincial Parliament na 22 Mee 2019, na-anọchi Piet Pretorius
Àtụ Zille provincial cabinetÀtụ Members of the Western Cape Provincial Parliament
Beverly Afaglo Baah (amụrụ Ya na 28 Mee 1983) o bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eweputa ihe ngosi na onyonyo
Beverly si na mpaghara Volta na Ghana
Ọ lụrụ Eugene Kwadwo Boadu Baah na obere nsogbu ma ha nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
Beverly nwetara ọzụzụ dị ka Beauty Therapist na FC Institute of Beauty Therapy, Ghana ma o bubu nwa akwụkwọ nke Ghana Institute of Journalism ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ na mmekọrịta ọha na eze
E wezụga ime ihe nkiri, ọ na-arụ ọrụ Glamour Beauty Salon na Tema
Beverly Barkat (amụrụ n'afọ 1966) bụ onye Israel na-ese íhé nkiri
A mụrụ Beverly Sakalovsky (mgbè e mesịrị Barkat) n'afọ 1966 na Johannesburg, South Africa na Louis na Lorna Sakalovski, ha abụọ bụ ndị na-ese ihe n'onwe ha
N'afọ 1976, ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara Israel
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ya na Bezalel Academy of Arts and Design na 1990, na-enweta BFA site na Ngalaba Metalsmithing na Jewellery Design
Barkat lụrụ ónyé bụbu ónyé isi ọbọdọ Jerusalem bụ Nir Barkat, ónyé ya na ya nwèrè ụmụ nwanyị atọ
N'afọ 1995, Barkat rụrụ ọrụ na nka iko na Czech Republic ma kpọọ ya ka ọ sonye na nnọkọ mbà ụwa na-eme ka iko na ihe ọkpụkpụ
Site n'afọ 2006 rụọ afọ 2009, Barkat gụrụ ihe osise na Israel Hershberg's Master Class na Jerusalem Studio School
O sonyere na JSS Summer Program na Ịtali ugboro abụọ, na-amụ ma na-ekere òkè na ọmụmụ ihe n'akụkụ ndị na-ese ihe Lennart Anderson, Stuart Shils, na Raoul Middleman
Barkat nwalere ihe ọhụrụ na oghere ụlọ
O raara onwé ya nye ọrụ owuwu dịka iwu na imezigharị ụlọ ndị mmadụ, yana oghere ọha na eze na ọbá akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị iji melite ọnọdụ agụmakwụkwọ
N'afọ 2009, Barkat meghere ụlọ ọrụ nke ya na Jerusalem
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na mbà ụwa, na ngosipụta otu na nke onwé
Ihe osise ndị izizi nke Barkatz bụ ihe atụ na-agbaso ọdịnala ọdịda anyanwụ
N'afọ 2018, Barkat mèrè íhé ngosi nké abụọ ya na Ịtali, na Museo Boncompagni Ludovisi na Rom
Ihe ngosi ahụ, nke akpọrọ After the Tribes, bụ nke Dr
Giorgia Calo haziri, ónyé kọwara na katalọgụ ihe ngosi ahụ
N'afọ 2022, ọ rụchara Earth Poetica, okirikiri nke dị mita irí nà àtó n'obosara, nke e ji akụkụ ígwè jupụtara na ihe mkpofu plastik mee
A na-etinye ọrụ ahụ ugbu a na Gottesman Family Aquarium na Jerusalem, a ga-egosikwa ya n'ọnụ ụlọ dị na World Trade Center ọhụrụ na-eleghara Ground Zero na ala Manhattan
Model Series, Evocative Surfaces ngosi, Museo di Palazzo Grimani, Venice 2017
Beverly Barkat na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ya, na Jerusalem
Mgbe ngosi The Tribes gasịrị, Museo Boncompagni Ludovisi, Rome 2018
Mgbe ngosi The Tribes gasịrị, Museo Boncompagni Ludovisi, Rome 2018
Beverly Buchanan (Ọktoba 8, 1940 na Julaị 4, 2015) bụ onye Africa-America na-ese ihe nke ọrụ ya gụnyere eserese, ihe ọkpụkpụ, vidiyo, na nka ala
A maara Buchanan màkà nchọpụta ya banyéré ụlọ ndịda site na nka ya

A mụrụ Buchanan na Fuquay, North Carolina, ọ bụkwa nwanne nné ya na nwanne nnà ya zụlitere ya na Orangeburg, South Carolina, ébé nna nkuchi ya bụ dean nke School of Agriculture na South Carolina State College bụ naanị ụlọ akwụkwọ steeti màkà ndị Africa America na South Carolina
Buchanan na nna ya nọrọ ógè dị ukwuu na njem ya ebe ọ ga-eso ndị ọrụ ugbo nọ n'ime ime Obodo rụọ ọrụ, na-adụ ha ọdụ na usoro ọrụ ugbo ha
N'afọ 1971, Buchanan debara aha ya na klas Norman Lewis kụziiri na Art Students League na New York City
Lewis, tinyere ónyé na-ese ihe Romare Bearden, ghọrọ ndị enyi na ndị nduzi Buchanan
Mmekọrịta a na Bearden mere mgbè ihe mberede mere na kọntaktị ebe Bearden mepụtara ihe ngosi màkà ihe omume ahụ
Buchanan zutere Norman Lewis n'azụ ikpo okwu mgbè ọ na-anwa ịbịanye aka na poster Bearden, Lewis wee were Buchanan n'azụ azụ iji zute Bearden
Buchanan mechara degara Bearden akwụkwọ ozi na-echetara ya ihe omume ahụ na Bearden ghọrọ ónyé nduzi ya ma mee ka ọ gosipụta nka ya na Cinque Gallery
Buchanan kpebiri ịghọ onye na-ese ihe oge niile na 1977 mgbè ọ gosipụtara ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi nka ọhụrụ na Betty Parsons Gallery
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ kwagara Macon, Georgia
E gosipụtara ọrụ Buchanan na Independent Art Fair 2017 na ụlọ Andrew Edlin Gallery
Buchanan kwuru, sị, 'Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe m nwèrè okwu ahụ n'aha ha n'ihi na echere m na nke ahụ na-agwa gị na ihe a agafeela ọtụtụ ihe ma lanarị echiche ahụ dị n'azụ ihe ndị a tụrụ atụ
ọ dị ka, ebe a ka m nọ; I ka nọ ebe a!
Ọrụ Buchanan dị na nchịkọta nke Addison Art Gallery of American Art na Phillips Academy na Andover, Massachusetts, Georgia Museum of Art, Metropolitan Museum of Art
Beverly Hannah-Jones (amụrụ n'afọ 1960) bụ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ, onye ọchụnta ego, na onye isi obodo na steeti Michigan dị na United States
A kọwapụtara ya dị ka 'onye na-ewu ụlọ pụrụ iche' na mbido Mee afọ 1995, yana ọkara nke 'ndị abụọ dị ike nke ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ Detroit'
Mgbe ọ nọ na mmemme tupu ọgwụ na MSU, ọ gara ọmụmụ edemede ole na ole, wee gbanwee isi ya na ihe owuwu wee malite ịchụso ebumnuche nke inwe ụlọ ọrụ nke ya
Ọ gara Mahadum Nkà na Ụzụ Lawrence iji mepụta nkà na ụzụ n'otu oge ma mụta ịrụ ọrụ
O nwetara nzere bachelọ n'afọ 1985 wee nweta ọrụ na Albert Kahn Associates, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ afọ asatọ wee nweta ikikere iwu ụlọ
Ọ gara n'ihu na obere ụlọ ọrụ dị na Pontiac iji nweta ahụmịhe na idu ndú azụmaahịa, n'afọ sochirinụ, ọ malitere ụlọ ọrụ nke ya, Hannah & Associates, Inc
O guzobere atụmatụ siri ike na ntọala teknụzụ mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ A / E nke akụkọ ihe mere eme, Albert Kahn Associates (AKA), ma nọgide na-aga n'ihu na teknụzụ na ihe owuwu
Ọ bụkwa onye na-anabata ihe nrite Lawrence Technological University 2009 Distinguished Alumni Achievement Award, dị ka onye Afrịka Amerịka mbụ natara onyinye a n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke LTU
N'afọ 1993, o guzobere Hannah & Associates, Inc
(HAI) iji nye ndị ọkachamara na-ahụ maka ihe owuwu na ime ụlọ ọrụ
Ọ bụ otu n'ime naanị ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ iri nke onye nwanyi Afrịka Amerịka na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ nwere ikike ma na-arụ ọrụ na United States
Hannah Jones nwere afọ iri atọ nke ahụmịhe na atụmatụ ụlọ, imewe na ụlọ ọrụ iwu ihe
Ahụmahụ ọkachamara ya sitere na onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ, onye na-emepụta ọrụ, onye njikwa ọrụ site na onye isi ọrụ na onye nwe ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
O wuru ọrụ na-aga nke ọma dabere na nhazi dị mma na omume azụmaahịa dị mma
Nkà ya pụrụ iche bụ nsonaazụ kpọmkwem nke ahụmahụ dị iche iche n'oge ọrụ ya niile
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1996, ụlọ ọrụ ya, Hannah & Associates Inc, bụ otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ iri na United States nke ụmụ nwanyị ojii nwere
Ọrụ ndị mbụ gụnyere ebe nsọ nke ụka na nkwekọrịta ụgbọ ala, gụnyere mmekorita ya na Albert Kahn
N'afọ 2005, Hannah & Associates bụ otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ise ndị inyom ojii guzobere ma na-achịkwa
Hannah & Associates guzobere mmekọrịta ya na Niagara Murano LLC, ụlọ ọrụ nke onye ọrụ ibe ya si Albert Kahn, n'afọ 2004
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mepụtara ọtụtụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ maka Southern Hospitality Restaurant Group nke Detroit
N'afọ 2005, a họpụtara Hannah Jones na Michigan Fire Safety Board
N'afọ 2013 Hannah & Associates guzobere mmekọrịta mmekọrịta na Newman-Smith Architecture
Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ya na HAI, Beverly bụ onye isi nke Hannah-Neumann / Smith
Dị ka onye isi mmekọ, ọ nwere ọrụ maka ihe niile gbasara nkwekọrịta ma na-ahụ maka ogo na ọganihu nke ọrụ ahụ site na mmalite ruo na njedebe
Ọrụ ya na-adịbeghị anya na ụlọ ọrụ na-ewu ụlọ bụ ịmalite ụgbọ ala na ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ ya, Arawana Construction Trucking, Inc
Beverly Lorraine Greene (Ọktoba 4, 1915 na Ọgọọst 22, 1957) bụ onye America na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ
Dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ ihe owuwu Dreck Spurlock Wilson si kwuo, 'kwere na ọ bụ nwanyị Afrịka Amerịka mbụ nwere ikikere dị ka onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na United States'
E debara aha ya dị ka onye ọrụ na-ese ihe na Illinois na 1942
A mụrụ Beverly Lorraine Greene na Ọktoba 4, 1915, nwa ọkàiwu James A
Greene na nwunye ya Vera nke Chicago, Illinois
Ezinụlọ ahụ bụ ndị Afrịka-Amerịka
O nweghị ụmụnne nwoke ma ọ bụ ụmụnne nwanyị
Ọ gara Mahadum Illinois nke agbụrụ dị na Urbanazhampaign (UIUC), gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere bachelọ na injinia ụlọ na 1936, nwanyị Afrịka Amerịka mbụ nwetara nzere a na mahadum ahụ
Otu afọ mgbe e mesịrị, ọ nwetara nzere masta na atụmatụ obodo na ụlọ
Ọ sokwa na klọb ihe nkiri Cenacle ma bụrụ onye otu American Society of Civil Engineers N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ nwetara nzere masta ya na UIUC na atụmatụ obodo na ụlọ
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ laghachiri Chicago ma were ya n'ọrụ site na Housing Authority na 1938
Ọ ghọrọ nwanyị Africa-America mbụ nwere ikikere na United States mgbe ọ debanyere aha na steeti Illinois na Disemba 28, 1942
Greene rụkwara ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ mbụ nke onye Afrịka Amerịka duziri na etiti Chicago
N'agbanyeghị asambodo ya, ọ na-esiri ya ike imeri ihe mgbochi agbụrụ iji chọta ọrụ n'obodo ahụ
Ndị nta akụkọ Chicago na-eleghara ya na ndị ọzọ na-ewu ụlọ ojii anya
O tinyere akwụkwọ ya iji nyere aka mepụta ya, n'agbanyeghị atụmatụ ụlọ agbụrụ nke onye mmepe ahụ; na ihe ijuanya ya, e were ya n'ọrụ
Mgbe naanị ụbọchị ole na ole gasịrị, ọ hapụrụ ọrụ ahụ iji nabata agụmakwụkwọ maka mmemme nzere masta na Mahadum Columbia
Ọ nwetara nzere na ihe owuwu na 1945 wee nweta ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ Isadore Rosefield
Ụlọ ọrụ Rosefield bụ isi mepụtara ụlọ ọrụ ahụike
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ nọgidere na ọrụ Rosefield ruo 1955, Greene so Edward Durell Stone rụọ ọrụ na ọ dịkarịa ala ọrụ abụọ na mbido afọ 1950
N'afọ 1951, o sonyere na ọrụ iwu ụlọ ihe nkiri na Mahadum Arkansas na 1952, o nyere aka ịhazi Arts Complex na Sarah Lawrence College

Mgbe 1955, ya na Marcel Breuer rụkọtara ọrụ, na-enyere aka na atụmatụ maka isi ụlọ ọrụ UNESCO United Nations na Paris na ụfọdụ n'ime ụlọ maka University Heights Campus nke Mahadum New York, ọ bụ ezie na a rụchara ọrụ abụọ ahụ mgbe ọnwụ Greene gasịrị
Ọ nwụrụ na Ọgọọst 22, 1957, na New York City
Emere ememe ncheta ya na Unity Funeral Home na Manhattan, otu n'ime ụlọ ndị o chepụtara
Beverly McIver (amụrụ c
1962) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe n'oge a, nkè a maara nkè ọma màkà foto onwé ya, ónyé amụrụ ma zụlite na Greensboro, NC
Ọ bụ ugbu a Prọfesọ Esbenshade nké Practice of Art, Art History and Visual Studies na Mahadum Duke
McIver bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ nwanyị atọ ma bụrụ ónyé nné naanị ya zụlitere nke na-arụ ọrụ dị ka odibo iji kwado ezinụlọ ha
Nlebara anya na ihe onwunwe nke nné ya lekwasịrị anya na nwanne nwanyị McIverá, Renee, ónyé nwere nkwarụ
Ihe osise akụkọ ndụ ya jupụtara na ya ma na-akọ akụkọ ndụ ya na njirimara ya nkè ndị Africa America
Mgbè ọ na-aga ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ndị ọcha, nké bárá ọgaranya, McIver bụ onye otu klọb clowning nke ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ime ihe eji eme ihe na-eme ka mmadụ na-eme ihe na-eyi uwe na-emepe emepe nyere McIver ike A gbanwere m, ma n'ọtụtụ ụzọ ọ dị mma karịa ọha mmadụ
Ọ dịghị onye na-eche na m bụ onye isi ojii ma ọ bụ ogbenye
A makụrụ m
N'ịtụle ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ clown màkà ógè dị mkpirikpi, McIver kpebiri ịchụso ọrụ nka, nweta Master of Fine Art na Mahadum Penn State na nzere doctorate nsọpụrụ na Mahadim North Carolina Central
Ọ nwetara nzere Bachelor of Arts na Painting na Drawing na North Carolina Central University
Ọrụ McIver na-enyocha njirimara onwé ónyé ma e wezụga onyinyo onwé ónyé, a maara ya màkà ise ndị gbara ya gburugburu na ndụ kwa ụbọchị
Ọ natara ọtụtụ nsọpụrụ màkà ihe ọrụ ya gụnyere Guggenheim Fellowship na Louis Comfort Tiffany Award
E gosipụtara ihe ngosi banyéré ndụ McIver nke akpọrọ Raising Renee na HBO ma họpụta ya màkà onyinye Emmy
N'afọ 2011, a kpọrọ McIver 'onye kachasị iri na eserese' maka magazin Art In America
McIver nwekwara ọrụ ndị gosipụtara na Mint Museum of Art & North Carolina Museum of Art
Ọ bụ ugbu a Prọfesọ Esbenshade nke Practice of Visual Arts na Mahadum Duke
Ọrụ ya dịkwa na Weatherspoon Art Museum na Greensboro, NC, Baltimore Museum of Art, Minneapolis Institute of Art, NCCU Museum of Art
Asheville Museum of Art, The Crocker Art Museum, The Cameron Art Museum, Nasher Museum na Nelson Fine Arts Museum na campus nke Mahadum Arizona State
O meriri Rome Prize na Visual Arts site na American Academy na Rome na 2017 rụo 2018
McIver bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na 2014 na McColl Center for Art + Innovation na Charlotte, NC
A tụlere ọrụ ya na Art News, Art in America The New York Times na ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ mpaghara

Ọ natala ọtụtụ onyinye na onyinye gụnyere onyinye Anonymous Was A Woman Foundation, onyinye John Simon Guggenheim Fellowship, Radcliffe Fellowsship site na Mahadum Harvard, onyinye Marie Walsh Sharpe Foundation, onyinye Alumni pụrụ iche site na Maọndị Steeti Pennsylvania, onyinye Louis Comfort Tiffany Foundation na onyinye Creative Capital
Beverly Naya ( onye amụrụ Beverly Ifunaya Bassey ka ọnwa Eprel dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchi iri na asaa n'afọ 1989) bụ onye Naịjirịa na-emepụta ihe egwuregwu di iche iche a mụrụ na mba ana akpo Britain
O nwetara ihe nrite di iche dika onye nka ya nwere olile anya ịmụba nke 2010 Best of Nollywood Awards
Ọ nwetakwara nturu ugo ọzọ dika onye otu Nollywood kacha eto ọsisọ n'afọ 2011 akpọrọ City People Entertainment Awards
A mụrụ Beverly Ifunaya Bassey na London dịka otu nwa naanị nne na nna ya bụ ndị Nigeria mụrụ
O bidoro mepụtawa ihe egwuregwu ka ọdị afọ iri na asaa mgbe ọ ka na-agụ maka filọsọfi,saikọlọji na soshịọlọji na Brunel University

Ọ gụrụ ka esi ede na eme fim na Roehampton University N'ajụjụ ọnụ BellaNaija gbara ya ọ kọwara na ya lọchitere na Naịjirịa n'ihi uto nke otu Nollywood nakwa uru na ụzọ ọmepere ndi na-eto eto n'ihe gbasara ime fim
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ọzọ, o kwuru na ọ bụ Ramsey Nouah na Genevieve Nnaji bụ ndi ọ na-eṅomi ma na-egere ha ndụmọdụ
Dika e kwuru na mbụ na ọ malitere ime ihe egwuregwu mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Brunel dị na Uxbridge, England
N’afọ 2011, Mgbe ndi Encomium Magazine gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ, ọ sịrị
' Mgbe m gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, amaara m na m chọrọ ịme ihe egwuregwu,na London, enwere m ike ịme fim ma eleghị anya otu ugboro n'afọ
Mana ebe a enwere oghere iguzobe ihe eji maram site na ime ọtụtụ ihie ónyonyò aga-asị mee
Ya mere m ji kpebiri m Naijiria '

Beverly Ada Mary Osu (a muru ya na ubochi nke iri abuo na asaa onwa Septemba, na afo otu puku na nari itenani na iri itenani na abuo) bu onye na-eme ihe nkiri vixen nke Naijiria, ihe nlere na onye na -eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri yana maka isonye na oge 8 nke
Osu meriri na Model nke afọ na puku abuo na iri na otu na Dynamix All Youth Awards
A muru Osu, onye sitere na Delta Steeti na Lagos Steeti, na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naịjirịa
Osu nwetara agụmakwụkwọ mbụ ya site na Daughters of Divine Love Convent nke bu ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na steeti Enugu
N'ịchọ inweta akara nzere BSc, o tinyere akwụkwọ na mahadum Babcock, ebe enyere ya ohere ka ọ mụọ ihe gbasara Nkwukọrịta Uka
N'gbanyeghị nke a, ọ gafere na National Open University nke di na Naịjirịa wee nweta nzere nkwukọrịta uka ebe ahụ
N'afọ 2013, Osu nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na oge 8 nke Big Brother Africa, wee bụrụ naanị onye asọmpi a na -ahọpụtabeghị maka ịchụpụ

Ọrụ Osu n'ozuzu ya nwetara nkwanye ugwu n'ihi isonye na nnukwu ihe nkiri TV n'ezie mana agbanyeghị Osu rụrụ arụ ọrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ Naịjirịa dị ka ihe nlereanya na 2011 meriri nturu ugo maka ụdị nke afọ na nturu ugo Dynamix

Osu dị ka vidiyo vixen anọwo na vidiyo egwu nke ndị egwu Naịjirịa ama ama na -apụtakarị na vidiyo egwu nke Ice Prince na egwu akpọrọ Oleku, Terry da rapman na egwu akpọrọ Boys anaghị amụmụ ọnụ ọchị, Djinee na abụ akpọrọ Over na Kizz Daniel n'egwu akpọrọ Madu
Osu kwusiri ọrụ ịgba egwu ya otu afọ ka emechara Big Brother Africa nke asato
Osu na 2014 nwetara ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya ma gosipụta ya na fim akpọrọ Curse Of The Seven ebe ọ pụtara n'akụkụ onye na -eme ihe nkiri Nollywood Ken Erics
Osu meriri nturu ugo kacha elu nke Vidyo Vixen nke Nigeria meriri nturu ugo n'afo 2011 na Dynamix Awards ma n'otu afọ ahụ nweta nturu ugo maka Ngosiownwe nke Afọ na Award Dynamix
Mgbe ọ dị obere, Osu chọrọ ịghọ Ukochukwu Sista wee debanye aha ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị sista no na steeti Enugu
Osu mechara hapụ ọchịchọ a
Beverly Ranger bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ n'oge gara aga na Jamaica nke gbara bọọlụ na Germany n'afọ ndị 1970
O nọrọ obere oge na Serie A na Lazio na 1977, mana obi adịghị ya ụtọ na Ịtali o wee laghachi Germany
A kọrọ na Ranger bụ nwanyị mbụ na-agba bọọlụ iji nweta ego site na egwuregwu na Germany
O nwetara ọkwa a ma ama site n'inweta ihe nrite 'goolu nke ọnwa' site na telivishọn German na June 1975 wee nweta nkwekọrịta nkwado na Puma
Ọ tolitere na London mgbe ọ hapụsịrị Jamaica mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ
Mgbe ọrụ bọọlụ ya gasịrị, ọ kwagara United States, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Charlotte, North Carolina dị ka onye na-akuzi nkuzi
Ọ bụbu onye na-agba bọọlụ na Jamaica
Na Germany, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị egwuregwu a ma ama na 1970s
O meriri German Championship na 1975 na SSG Bergisch Gladbach, na June 1975, a họọrọ otu n'ime goolu ya dị ka goolu nke ọnwa ahụ
A na-ewere ya dị ka onye ọkpụkpọ ọkachamara mbụ na Germany ọ natara nkwekọrịta ngwá ọrụ maka ihe karịrị DM pụkụ atọ kwa ọnwa
A mụrụ ya na mbido afọ 1950 na isi obodo Jamaica bụ Kingston, Beverly Ranger na nne na nna ya bịara London mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ
N'ebe ahụ, ọ gbara bọọlụ n'ogige ntụrụndụ na-adịghị anya site na Wembley Stadium ya na ụmụ nwoke ha na ha bụ otu afọ
Otu onye nta akụkọ chọpụtara nkà ya na mberede nke tụrụ aro na ọ ga-esonye na klọb bọọlụ
Ranger bu ụzọ kpọọ maka Watford FC, mgbe e mesịrị na mpaghara London nke Amersham Town FC
N'afọ ndị 1970 ọ gbara egwu na Germany
N'ebe ahụ, bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị ka dị na akpụkpọ ụkwụ ụmụaka n'oge ahụ
Ọ bụ naanị n'afọ 1970 ka otu bọọlụ Germany nwere ike ịtinye ụmụ nwanyị na klọb ya
N'oge ahụ, ọ bụ naanị otu egwuregwu league mba ka e mere na ọkwa mba
N'afọ 1974, e mere asọmpi Germany nke mbụ ya na bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị

Beverly Ranger, otu n'ime ndị egwuregwu mba ọzọ mbụ na bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị dị elu na Germany, na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Saarland SV Bubach / Calmesweiler ma si n'oge 1974-75 gaa n'ihu maka onye na-agba ọsọ Germany na-achị Bonner SC, onye gbara na Middle Rhine league
Otu onye egwuregwu ibe a ma ama ebe a bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ Anne Trabant-Haarbach, onye gbanwere site na onye mmeri nke afọ gara aga TuS Wörrstadt gaa Bonn

Ndị otu ahụ nwere ike ịgbachitere aha ya na Middle Rhine league, nke nwere Beverly Ranger òkè dị ukwuu na 26 Eprel 1975, ọ gbara onye na-ekpebi na Middle Rhino championship megide SV Bergisch Gladbach 09 obere oge tupu nkwụsị 1 1 nkwụghachi ụgwọ, Bonn meriri ọgụ ahụ na ngwusi na 2-1 wee banye na agba ikpeazụ nke German championships 1975, ebe ha gara ọzọ na ngwụcha

N'ebe a, etiti nke Bonn nwere ike inwe 4 chekwaa aha na ọbụna n'egwuregwu a, nke mere tupu oge ahụ nnukwu ìgwè mmadụ dị ihe dị ka pụkụ abụọ na ịrị ise na-ekiri mmeri e meriri Bayern Munich, na Beverly Ranger jiri isi nye goolu nke mere ka goolu ha gara nha anya
Goolu ha n'egwuregwu megide Bergisch Gladbach, ebe ha na otu ise gbara bọọlụ yana onye na-edebe goolu, bụ nke ndị na-ekiri ARD Sportschau họpụtara na June 1975 maka ihe mgbaru ọsọ nke ọnwa ahụ
Beverly Ranger bụ nwanyị nke abụọ mgbe Bärbel Wohlleben gasịrị otu afọ tupu, nke e nyere onyinye a
Site na 'Gate of the Month', a maara Beverly Ranger na mberede n'ihu ọha

Ịbụ onye a ma ama nyeere ya aka n'etiti ihe ndị ọzọ na nkwekọrịta nkwado ya na onye na-emepụta ihe egwuregwu Puma, ya mere ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị mbụ na-agba bọọlụ, ndị nwere ike ịme egwuregwu ahụ na Germany ma ọ dịkarịa ala ọkara ọkachamara
N'afọ 1976, ya na Anne Trabant-Haarbach hapụrụ Bonner SC wee kpọọ SSG Bergisch Gladbach, ebe ọ bịakwara na ngwụcha n'afọ 1977 wee nweta mmeri nke abụọ ya n'egwuregwu ọzọ na NSG Oberst Schiel
Klọb ndị ọzọ gụnyere Palatinate club 1
FFC 08 Niederkirchen, nke meriri Südwestdeutsche Verbandspokal na 1978, yana Kickers Offenbach
Mgbe ọ ruchara ọrụ bọọlụ ya, ọ kwagara USA na 1989 ma biri na Charlotte, North Carolina
Bevis Kristofer Kizito Mugabi (amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1995) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agbachitere otu egwuregwu Scottish Premiership Motherwell
Ọ gbara bọọlụ n'oge gara aga na English Football League maka ndị Yeovil Town
A mụrụ ya n'England, ọ na-anọchite anya Uganda na mba ụwa
A mụrụ Mugabi na Harrow, London, nne na nna si Kampala, Uganda
Mugabi malitere ọrụ ya na Fulham tupu ọ banye n'òtù ndị ntorobịa Southampton na July 2011, wee bịanye aka na nkwekọrịta ọhụrụ afọ abụọ na ọkara na klọb ahụ na February n'afo 2015
Ọ bịanyere aka na klọb League Two Yeovil Town na 5 Ọgọstụ n'afo 2016 na nkwekọrịta otu afọ
O mere egwuregwu mbụ ya na 9 Ọgọstụ 2016, dị ka onye na-anọchi anya nkeji nke 54 na egwuregwu EFL Cup megide Walsall
Mugabi gbara goolu mbụ ya maka Yeovil na EFL Trophy tie megide Portsmouth na 30 August 2016
Ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ ọhụrụ na klọb ahụ na Mee 2017
Na ngwụcha oge 2018 na afo 2019, Yeovil tọhapụrụ Mugabi mgbe klọb ahụ si na League Two
Na 12 Septemba 2019, Mugabi bịanyere aka na Motherwell na nkwekọrịta ruo Jenụwarị 2020
Mgbe onye otu Motherwell bụ Charles Dunne merụrụ ahụ, Mugabi setịpụrụ ime nke mbụ ya n'oge a tụrụ anya ya
N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba 2019, Motherwell kwupụtara na ha agbatịla nkwekọrịta ha na Mugabi ruo n'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 2021
Na 18 Febụwarị n'afo 2022, Mugabi bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọhụrụ na Motherwell, ruo n'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 2024
Mugabi ruru eru ịnọchite anya England ma ọ bụ Uganda na ọkwa mba ụwa

N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2016, Mugabi natara oku mbụ ya na ndị otu mba Uganda maka egwuregwu enyi na enyi ha megide Kenya na asọmupi iru eru nke iko mba Afrịka nke afọ 2017 megide Comoros, mana Yeovil Town wepụrụ Mugabi na ndị otu ahụ na klọb ahụ na-ekwu maka ọkwa dị mkpirikpi nke oku ahụ dị ka ihe kpatara ọpụpụ ya
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2018, Mugabi natara oku nke abụọ na ndị otu mba Uganda maka egwuregwu enyi na enyi abụọ nke mba ụwa
Mugabi mere nke mbụ ya na mba ụwa maka Uganda na 24 Machị 2018 na mmeri enyi na enyi ha meriri São Tomé na Príncipe
Mugabi laghachiri n'òtù egwuregwu mba ahụ mgbe otu afọ gachara mgbe a gụnyere ya na ndị otu Uganda maka 2019 Africa Cup of Nations
Beyoncé Knowles bu onye Amerikạ nwayị na bụ abụ
Ha muru ya na ogẹ 4 Septemba 1981 na Houston, nor na Texas ime ọbọdọ Amerikạ
Ngbe o dị ntakiri o nọr na ébé há na kuzi i gbá nkwạ na i gwu nkwạ
O bụ onye di mkpạ maka o nọrọ na ọtú ndi umụ nwanyị nägwü nkwa há na kpo Destiny's child
Na uwa nilé, hë rẹrẹ nkwa rúrú ndẹ 50
Na Houston, Texas ébé há mụrụ Knowles, o bụ ádá Matthew Knowles, onye ahia égwú, na Tina Beyincé, onye na dọr ákwạ ná onye na edozi isi
Nna Knowles bu onye African American na mma ya bu onye ndi Louisiana Creole (African American, Diạlạ Amerika, na French) ébé ndi Creole shi nọr na obodo Louisiana, ime Amerika
Ha goziri ya na ụlọ ụka, Aha ya shi aha mma ya ukwu maka ndi Beyincé nwere nwoko ntakiri i gi were aha nké
