Bezabeh o bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere
Bezunesh Bekele Sertsu (amụrụ na 29 Jenụwarị, na afọ 1983) bụ onye Etiopia na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge bụ onye ọkachamara na ịgba ọsọ na marathons
A mụrụ ya na isi obodo Etiopia nke Addis Ababa
O nwetara ọtụtụ mmeri n'okporo ụzọ n'ime afọ ole na ole mbụ nke asọmpi, na-enwe mmeri azụ na azụ na Montferland Run na 2004 na 2005, yana mmeri na Rotterdam Half Marathon
O meriri Cross Internacional de Itálica na 2006 wee mechie n'ọnọdụ nke isii na ọsọ dị mkpirikpi na 2006 IAAF World Cross Country Championships mgbe oge ahụ gasịrị
N'afọ sochirinụ, o nwetara mmeri ndị a ma ama na Zevenheuvelenloop na Portugal Half Marathon
Na 2007 IAAF World Road Running Championships ọ mechara nke anọ ma setịpụ ihe ndekọ ọhụrụ nke 1 08 07
Dire Tune meriri ihe ndekọ ahụ, onye meriri na 2009 Ras Al Khaimah Half Marathon setịpụrụ ihe ndekọ ọkara marathon nke Ethiopia nke 1 07 18
Bizunesh fọrọ nke nta ka a họpụta ya maka ndị otu egwuregwu Olympic nke Ethiopia na afọ 2008
Ọ bụ ezie na Bizunesh nwere oge ngwa ngwa, a họọrọ Dire Tune maka otu ahụ kama, na-eduga na mmekọrịta dị nro n'etiti ndị na-agba ọsọ abụọ ahụ
Bezunesh bụ onye nke atọ na Great Manchester Run na afọ 2008, na-agwụcha n'azụ Jo Pavey na Rose Cheruiyot
O mere marathon mbụ ya na ọsọ nke 2 23 09 na afọ 2008 Dubai Marathon, na-ewere ọnọdụ nke abụọ n'azụ Birhane Adere ma na-agba ọsọ otu n'ime oge kachasị ọsọ maka onye mbido
Ọ laghachiri n'ọsọ ahụ n'afọ sochirinụ wee merie, na-eti Atsede Habtamu ihe karịrị otu nkeji
Na 2009 World Championships in Athletics a họpụtara ya ka ọ sọọ mpi na marathon maka Ethiopia ma ọ gwụchara na 16th ebe
Ọ gbara ọsọ na London Marathon n'ọnwa Eprel, afọ 2010 ma bụrụ onye nke anọ n'ime oge nke 2 23 17
Na mmiri ozuzo Berlin Marathon na Septemba n'afọ ahụ, ọ gwụchara ọsọ ahụ na 2 24 58, nke zuru iji nweta ọnọdụ nke abụọ n'azụ Aberu Kebede
Nlaghachi na London na 2011 hụrụ ka onye Etiopia mere nke kachasị mma, na-abịa nke anọ na 2 23 42 awa
Na 2011 World Championships in Athletics ọ mechara nke anọ ọzọ, ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ ghara ịdị na podium
Bezunesh meziwanyere oge kachasị mma ya dị afọ anọ site na ịgba ọsọ na afọ 2012 Dubai Marathon
Oge ya nke 2 20 30 awa maka ọnọdụ nke anọ mere ka ọ banye n'ime ụmụ nwanyị iri abụọ kachasị ọsọ maka ihe omume ahụ ma mee ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị Etiopia nke atọ kachasị ọsọ

Ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke anọ na Yangzhou Half Marathon n'ọnwa Eprel, mana ọ rụpụtara ihe ka mma na ọkara nke abụọ nke afọ ahụ ọ meriri Great Scottish Run, setịpụ 10 mile kacha mma nke 51 45 nkeji dị ka onye nke abụọ na Dam tot Damloop, wee bịa nke anọ na Frankfurt Marathon
Di Bezunesh, Tessema Abshiro, bụkwa onye na-agba ọsọ marathon na ndị otu mba Etiopia
Bhadreshwar bụ ebe obodo oge ochie nke Bhadravati dịA kpọtụrụ Bhadravati aha na Mahabharata
A kpọtụrụ ya aha n'ọrụ nke Kantavijay, onye mọnk Jain
Ebe izizi gbasara ebe a bụ ihe e dere n’elu ihe oyiyi Ajitnath dị na ụlọ nsọ Vasai Jain nke dekọtara Samvat 622 (555 AD) nke nwere ike na-akara Samvat 1622 (1565 AD)
Ụlọ nsọ Vasai Jain ka ekwuru na tọrọ ntọala n'afọ nke iri abụọ na otu nke oge Vairat, ma raara ya nye Vasai site n'aka Siddhasen nke agbụrụ Hari
Ndị nọchiri ya bụ Mahasen, Narsen, Bhojraj, Vanraj, Sarangdev, Virasen, na Harisen, ndị biri ndụ n'oge Vikram (57 BC)
Harisen hapụrụ ala-eze ya nye nwanyị di ya nwụrụ Lilavati
Nwa nwanne ya bụ Kirtidhara nọchiri Lilavati
Mgbe ahụ Dharnipal, Devdatt na Danjiraj bịara
N'oge Dhaniraj, ọtụtụ ndị isi na-akwakọrọ obodo ahụ
Na 156, (Samvat 213), Vanraj Vaghela nke Munjpur, onye bụ Jain, weghaara obodo ahụ
Yograj, Ratnadatta ma ọ bụ Shivaditya na Vijayarao ma ọ bụ Vaisiddha nọchiri ya
Na-esote, mgbe oge ọchịchị gachara, ndị Kathis nke Pavargadh weghaara Bhadravati ma debe ya ruo afọ 147

Mgbe ha gasịrị, 651 (Samvat 618), Kanak Chavda nke Patan weghaara obodo ahụ, wuo ụlọ nsọ ahụ, na 555 (Samvat 622) guzobe ihe oyiyi nke Ajitnath nke nwere ike iweta ka ọ dabara na ụbọchị dị na ihe oyiyi ahụ
Onye nọchiri anya Kanak bụ Akad Chavda, onye Shaiva
N'oge ya, Sayyid Lal Shah na Mughuls wakporo obodo ahụ
Bhuvad nwa ya sochiri ya onye ndị Solanki Rajputs nke Bhangadh tụfuru alaeze ya
Ndị ọchịchị ọhụrụ ahụ gbanwere aha ebe ahụ ka ọ bụrụ Bhadreshwar na 741 (Samvat 798), ma nọgide na-ejide ya ruo 1132 (Samvat 1189)
Navghan, nwa nwoke nke Bhimrao, bụ onye ikpeazụ n'ime ha
Bịafra bụla obodo ndï Ìgbo, nke pụtara ìhìe n'afọ 1967
Ndï bekee hapụrụ Naigeria na 1960, wéé nyehachi ndï ala Naigeria obodo ha
Ndï Ìgbo na ndï Hausa, bụ ndi n'achi Naigeria n'oge ahù luru ògù na 1967
Íhe butere ọgụ ahu Ufọdụ ndi ụmụ okọrọbia agha nke Naigeria (ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ ndi Ìgbo) gbara mgba okpụrụ n'ebe isi ọchichi ndi isi ala anyi Naigeria nọ
Ha sitéré na mgba okpụrụ ahu wéré gbụo ụfọdụ ndi isi ala anyi (ụfọdụ n'ime ha bụ ndi Haụsa) nke ndi bekee nyefere ọchichi n'aka tụpụ ha hapụ obodo anyi
Ha wéé gbanwe ọchichi obodo anyi ma wéré onye isi agha ha méé ye onye isi ala Naigeria
Aha ya bụ Major Aguiyi Ironsi (Ìgbo)
Ọtụtụ ndi agha Naigeria bụ ndi Hausa, wéré iwe mmegwata ogbụo Major General Aguiyi Ironsi, ma wéré GenYakubu Gowon (Hausa-Benue) dochie anya ya
N'iwe na ọnuma ha wéré gbuo ọtụtụ ndi Ìgbo bụ ndi isi agha nke Naigeria, ya na ndi Ìgbo aka ha di ọcha nọ n'ala ndi Hausa nke bụ isiala Naigeria
Lt Col
Chukwuemeka Odumegwu Ojukwu bụ onye na achi ndi ọwụwa anyawu Naigeria n'oge ahu, wéré juọ enyem-aka maka igbochi ogbugbu nke ndi Ígbo nọ na ala ndi Hausa, kama ndi n'achi ala anyi egeghi ya ntị
Íhe a méré ndï Igbo, ndi ikwere na ndï Ijaw jiri wéré kewapụ onwe ha na Naigeria
Ha wéré malite kpọwa onwe ha obodo 'Bịafra'
Ndi nachi ala Naigeria anabataghi ya
Ya mere n'afọ (otu pụkụ,narri ịtolụ,iri isii na asaa) ma ò bụ 1967 obodo Naigeria na ala Bịafra wéé malite ọgụ
Nke gbaruru afọ atọ, ma kwụsin'afọ 1970

Bianca Amato bụ ome ihe nkiri South African amaara maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Amerika , nakwa ome ihe omume audiobook nakwa na ngosi nke na akọwa ya ka Philippa De Villiers na ngosipụta nke South African soap opera Isidingo
Amato bụ onye so na ndetu mbụ nke soap opera South Africa nke n'eme ogologo oge akpọrọ Isidingo, na-egosi dị ka Philippa De Villiers site na 1998 ruo 2001

N'Ọrụ ahụ, 'nwa agbọghọ Bekee mara mma nke ya na onye njikwa ebe mmịpụta ojii nwere mmekọrịta ịhụnanya', akpọwo ya 'akụkọ nọ n'ikuku ma bụrụ nnukwu akụkọ na televishọn South Africa nke ọchịchị nchigbu bụ apartheid usoro akụkọ kọwara nke a dị ka 'ọnọdụ mmekọrịta nwoke na nwanyị mbụ nke egosiri na Televishion South Africa ' N'ime ahụmahụ Amato kwuru, 'Ọ bụ ihe magburu onwe ya isonye n'usoro a n'agaghi ngwa ma bụrụ nke nwere isi nke gbanwere àgwà ndị mmadụ' Ọrụ ya na Isidingo nwetara Amato ihe Avante maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na usoro ihe onyonyo
N'afọ 2002, e nyere Amato akwụkwọ ikike obibi bụ United States Permanent Resident Card dị ka onye kachasị dị ike pụrụ iche bụ'Alien of Extraordinary Ability' nke nka o wee kwaga United States
Mgbe ọ pụtachara na ihe omume 2002 nke usoro HBO Sex and the City, ọ rụrụ ọtụtụ ọrụ ndu na Guthrie Theatre na Minneapolis, Minnesota n'etiti afọ 2003 na afọ 2005
Malite afọ 2009 Amato egosịpụtala na ọtụtụ ihe omume onyonyo nke US
Amato gosipụtara dị ka Delia Alexander n'afọ 2015 na PlayStation Network series powers
Amato pụtara na mmepụta Broadway nke Tom Stoppard nke Tony Award - mmeri atọ nke ihe omume The Coast of Utopia (2006 ruo 07), yana 2013 ruo 2014 rivaival nke Broadway nke Shakespeare Macbeth
o lebekwara ọrụ nke Hannah Jarvis na Lady Croom n'afọ 2011 na rivaival Broadway nke Arcadia Stoppard
mpụga-Broadway, Amato apụtala na ngosipụta Bill Irwin bụ Mr
Fox akpọrọ A Rumination na(2004), ma gosiputa dị ka Emma na Trumpery (2007)
O mechara gosipụta dị ka Calantha na The Broken Heart na 2012, wee rụọ ọrụ isi nke Olga Knipper na Neva na 2013

Amato gosipụtakwa dị ka Amanda na mmepụta nke Noël Coward 's Private Lives nke Maria Aitken duziri, nke ngosipụta mbụ ya bụ na 2012 na Huntington Theater Company na Boston, ma omume ọzọ ya bụ na 2014 na Shakespeare Theater nke Company Lansburgh
Ụlọ ihe nkiri dị na Washington, DC Na 2014 ọ gosikwara dị ka Regan na Ụlọ ihe nkiri maka New Audience nke King Lear na New York

Amato akọpụtala ihe karịrị akwụkwọ ọdịyo iri anọ, tinyere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ihe mere eme na nhazi Cousins' War nke Philippa Gregory , na Charles Stross '2008 akwụkwọ akụkọ sayensị Saturn's Children dere
Ọ kwupụtakwara akwụkwọ akụkọ gothic 2006 The Thirteenth Tale nke Diane Setterfield, nke n'eruola ogo nke mbụ na ndepụta Best Seller na izu nke abụọ nke mbipụta ya

Charles Isherwood nke New York Times dere na nyocha ya nke afọ 2012 The Broken Heart na 'Amato na-egosipụta ịdị ebube nke agbara nwanyị dị ka Calantha', na Andy Propst nke Ụlọ ihe nkiriMania kwuru na 'ndị na-ege ntị ga-enwekwa mmasị na Amato n'akpali mmụọ kwa mgbe kwa mgbe dị ka ndị Adaeze Spartan' Na 2013 Isherwood kpọrọ ihe ndetu nke Neva dị ka ihe dị egwu ma'dịkwa mma nke ukwuu', wee detuo na Amato ka 'na eji mmasị ndị mmadụ site na mmalite oge' n'ide nke, ọ 'na-ejikwa mee ka onwe Olga na-eme ihe nkiri akụkọ ihe mere eme na-atọ ọchị, ma na-enwekwa ezigbo batiri uru' Na 2012 The Boston Globe kpọrọ Amato na yana costar James Waterston 'dịka vndi zuru oke na ọrụ ha dị ka Amanda na Elyot na Private Lives, MA na-eto ụzọ ha 'style, d, na sizzling kemist ha' Nyocha ahụ gara n'ihu na-ekwu na 'Amato na-egosipụta onye ọchịchị, onye nwe obodo - ọ nwere ike ịkpa ọchị n'otu mkpụrụ okwu , dị ka 'inveterate' - mana ọ nwekwara nkà na ihe nkiri' BroadwayWorldcom kpọrọ Amato na Waterston gosipụtara'otu ụzọ na-enweghị atụ' na 2014, na-agbakwụnye na 'Amato bụ ihe onye na- agbogwoju anya,na ngosipụ̀ta àgwà nke na-adịghị mma maka oge ya, ma ọ bụ ihe na-atọ ụtọ ikiri' Ben Brantley nke New York Times akpọrọ Ihe omume Amato nke afo 2014 arụmọrụ na King Lear 'dị oke mma', na Brooklyn Daily Eagle akpọrọ ya Regan 'nke ndọbata dị ñarī

Joe Dziemianowicz nke New York Daily News dere maka ihe omume ahụ na 'dị ka Regan amụrụ nke ugboro abụọ, okwu Bianca Amato na okwu ahụ ya iwe na okwu ahụ na-atụ aro ka nwanyị na-erubere anya ya na nleghara anya n'etiti ụmụaka
Ọ bụ Jan Brady na uwe oge'

Amato ritere ihe nrite awọd nke Vita nke onye ọhụụ kacha mma bụ Award for Best Newcomer maka Under Milk Wood and the Fleur du Cap Theater Award maka omee kacha mma na nkwado Greek, ha abụọ ka egosipụtara na Baxter Theater nke Cape Town, South Africa

Ngosipụta ya dị ka Philippa De Villiers na Isidingo nwetara ya Avante maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na nhazi telivishọn yana ihe nrite Duku Duku maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri South Africa kacha ewu ewu
O mechara nweta ihe nrite Star Tribune maka ngosipụta kacha mma nke 2004 maka igosipụta dị ka Eliza Doolittle na Pygmalion na Guthrie Theatre na Minneapolis, Minnesota
Ọrụ ngosipụta ya na in Private lives nwetara ya ihe nrite awọd ụ Elliot Norton maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri pụtara ìhè na 2013, na onyinye awọd Emery Battis nke Shakespeare Theater Company n'afọ 2014
A họpụtara Amato maka onyinye Ome ihe nkiri kacha mma na 2013 nke IRNE Award maka ihe ngosi Private Lives
Amato enwetala ihe nrite AudioFile Earphones iteghete na Audie Awards abụọ maka omume akwụkwọ ọdịyo ya
A mụrụ Amato na Cape Town, South Africa

Ada nke 'nne na nna na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị', ọ 'tolitere nke ọma ma mara maka'mkpagbu miri emi' nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ', na mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma ọ bụ onye otu òtù nke a na-akpọ Pupils Awareness and Action Group
Amato gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Cape Town
Bianca Buitendag bụ onye na-agba ọsọ na South Africa
Ọ nọchitere anya South Africa na 2020 Summer Olympics ebe ọ meriri ọlaọcha na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị
A mụrụ Buitendag na George, Western Cape, South Africa na 9 Nọvemba 1993
Ọ tolitere na nso osimiri nke False Bay na mpụga Cape Town
Site na agbamume nna ya, ya na ụmụnne ya abụọ mụtara ịnya ụgbọ mmiri mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, ezinụlọ ya kwagara mpaghara Southern Cape nke South Africa
Bianca na-asụ Afrikaans naanị mgbe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ, ya mere ndị mụrụ ya kpebiri itinye ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Bekee
N'afọ 2015, nna ya, Collin Buitendag, nwụrụ
Ọ ka nwere ike ịmecha ọrụ ya kachasị mma na World No
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke iri na abụọ n'ụwa
Bianca Jones Marlin, PhD
bụ onye ọkà mmụta nke America na Herbert and Florence Irving Assistant Prọfesọ nke nyocha mkpụrụ ndụ na Zuckerman Institute na Mahadum Columbia na New York City
Marlin na-amụ usoro epigenetic nke na-eme ka ọnyà ndị nne na nna nwee ike ibufe ụmụ n'ụdị òké
Ọrụ nke Marlin mgbe gụsịrị akwụkwọ kpugheere ọrụ bụ isi maka hormone oxytocin na omume nne, nke eji wee nye ya ihe nrite Donald B
Lindsley na Behavioral Neuroscience n'ihi ihe odide nke PhD ya nke puru iche na ihe nrite STAT Wunderkinds maka nchoputa ya gbara agba
Marlin tolitere na Central Islip, Long Island ebe e nwere usoro ezinụlọ pụrụ iche nke metụtara ọnọdụ ọrụ ya
Nne na nna mụrụ Marlin, bụ́ ndị ya na ha bi, bụkwa ndị kpọọrọ ụmụ ndị ọ na-abughi ha mụrụ
I Dika ya na ụmụnne ya na-tolite, nke a mere ka Marlin nwee mmasị na ihe nketa mkpụrụ ndụ mgbe ọ dị obere
Ige ntị akụkọ ndị siri ike sitere n'aka ụmụnne ya ndị ọ na-abụghị nne na nna ya mụrụ ha bụ ihe na-enye aka inye ya mmasị ka mmekọrịta nne na nna na ahụmahụ si emetụta ụmụaka
Ngosipụta nke Marlin n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị mere ka o nweta ohere ịgụ akwụkwọ n'efu na simesta nke mbụ ya na mahadum St
John's University
Mgbe ọ nọ na Mahadum St
John, ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta abụọ na bayoloji na mmụta ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma ma na-etinyesi aka ike na nduzi ụmụ akwụkwọ na nyocha
Dị ka nwa akwụkwọ na-agụ akwụkwọ, Marlin sonyere na nyocha n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na mmemme nyocha oge okpomọkụ abụọ otu na Mahadum Vanderbilt na nke ọzọ na Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT)
Na MIT, Marlin rụrụ ọrụ n'okpuru nduzi nke Dr
Martha Constantine Paton wee nweta ihe nrite maka akwụkwọ mmado nyocha ya na njedebe nke oge okpomọkụ
Na 2009, Marlin nwetara B
na Biology na B
na mmuta nke ndị dị afọ iri na uma site na Mahadum St
John
Na ngụsị akwụkwọ, e nyere ya onyinye nturu ugo onye ndu ụmụ akwụkwọ maka ọrụ ya dị ka Onye isi oche nke gọọmentị ụmụ akwụkwọ

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Marlin ghọrọ onye nkuzi nwetara ikike na steeti New York wee kuzie na NEST +m, ụlọ akwụkwọ ngalaba agụmakwụkwọ New York maka ụmụ akwụkwọ nwere nka na ndị nwere nka, ebe ọ kuziri mgbe ọ ka bu nwata akwụkwọ n'oge afọ agụmakwụkwọ mahadum ya
N'oge ya na Nest+m, ọ kuziri sayensị ọkwa asaa na nke iri na Advanced Placement (AP) Biology
Site na 2009-2015, Marlin gbasoro nzere nke ndi gụsịrị akwụkwọ na New York University School of Medicine Graduate Program na Biology na Physiology
Nyocha PhD nke Marlin nyochara ọrụ nke hormone oxytocin na omume nne na cortex plasticity n'oge dị egwu nke mmepụta ụbụrụ

N'afọ 2011, o bipụtara akụkọ nyocha nke ndị ọgbọ na-akọwa mkpa nke excitatory-inhibitory balance (EI) na-ekpebi oge nke oge dị oke egwu plasticity maka nhazigharị ugboro ugboro - ebe ọ bụ na mgbe amuchara, cortex na-ahụ anya erubeghị
Ọrụ a tọrọ ntọala Marlin ka ọ chọpụta ka oxytocin si akpụ akpụkọ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya ma gbanwee sekit ụbụrụ iji kpalite nlekọta nne n'ebe ụmụ nkịta nọ
Ndị nne rodent (nke a na-akpọ dams) ga-eweghachite ụmụ mgbe e kewapụrụ ya na ya na/ma ọ bụ ihe mkpofu mgbe ụda olu ultrasonic na-apụta site na ụmụ nkịta dịpụrụ adịpụ
Na-emekarị, dams na-anabata oku nwa agbọghọ, ebe ụmụ nwanyị na-amaghị nwoke adịghị - na-atụ aro na plasticity na cortex auditory na-eme mgbe a mụsịrị ahịhịa iji mee ka mmiri rụọ ọrụ iji zaghachi

Marlin chere na ọ bụ oxytocin na-ebugharị plasticity a na cortex auditory n'ihi na 1) dams na-ahapụ oxytocin mgbe a mụrụ ya iji kwalite njikọ, na 2) ụmụ agbọghọ na-amaghị nwoke na-anabata oku nwa agbọghọ mgbe a na-enye oxytocin n'ụzọ artificial
Marlin chọpụtara na oxytocin na-eme ka sekit akwara anụ ahụ dị na cortex nke anụ ahụ ma mee mgbanwe ogologo oge na nguzozi EI
Mgbanwe na nguzozi EI mere ka oge kwụ ọtọ kwụsiri ike nke a na-ahụ na dams (ma ọ bụ ụmụ agbọghọ na-amaghị nwoke oxytocin), mana ọ bụghị ụmụ agbọghọ na-amaghị nwoke, mgbe ị na-aza oku nwa
N'ịgbaso nchoputa nke Marlin gbasara ọrụ oxytocin na nweghachi nwa, ọ rụkwara ọrụ ọzọ ya na ndị ọrụ ibe ya na Robert Froemke Lab na-enyocha ọrụ oxytocin na-arụ na mgbasa ozi nke omume nne

N'ime ọmụmụ ha, nke e bipụtara na Nature, ha na-egosi na oxytocin neurons na mpaghara ụbụrụ na-ahụ maka ntọhapụ nke oxytocin, paraventricular nucleus (PVN), na-arụ ọrụ site na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nakwa na neurons a bu ọnụ ụzọ nzaghachi oku

Ha na-egosikwa na ụmụ agbọghọ ndị na-ebikọ ọnụ na ndị nne nwere ahụmahụ, na ndị na-ahụ anya na-ahụ maka nwa akwụkwọ nne na-amụ nwa, amụbawo ọrụ nke oxytocin neurons na PVN ma gosipụta àgwà alloparenting - na-atụ aro na omume nne nwere ike nweta site na mgbasa ozi ọha

Nchọpụta nke Marlin mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na-egosi ọ bụghị nanị na ọ na-arụ ọrụ lateralization nke ụbụrụ mammalian, kamakwa a raara onwe ya nye, oxytocin na-adabere na neural sekit maka omume nne na mmegharị mgbe amuchara nwa
E gosipụtara usoro nyocha a na mgbasa ozi a ma ama gụnyere National Geographic, na Los Angeles Times, Science Magazine, na Discover Magazine 's Top 100 Stories of 2015
Site na 2016-2020, Marlin bụ onye nyocha Postdoctoral na Mahadum Columbia n'okpuru ndụmọdụ nke onye nrite Nobel Laureate Richard Axel
N'ime ụlọ nyocha Axel, Marlin nyochara etu ọnyà ndị nne na nna si erute n'ọgbọ ndị na-esote (ya bụ, transgenerationally) site na usoro epigenetic
Marlin na ndị otu ya jikọtara ihe ndị na-esi ísì na akpata oyi n'ahụ ụmụ oke ndị toro eto, ma mesịa mụọ banyere mgbanwe akwara na akparamagwa nke ụmụ, ndị na-ahụtụbeghị ụdị nhụsianya-isi
Ọrụ Marlin na isiokwu a na mgbasa ozi a ma ama gụnyere Science Friday na Washington Post
Na 2020, Marlin sonyeere ngalaba na Mahadum Columbia na ngalaba nke Psychology na Neuroscience

Ụlọ nyocha Marlin dị na Zuckerman Institute na-aga n'ihu na-enyocha ka ihe ndị dị ndụ na-esi emeghe omume ebumpụta ụwa n'oge kwesịrị ekwesị, yana ka esi agafe ozi mmụta n'ọgbọ ndị na-esote site na ihe nketa nke transgenerational epigenetic site na iji nchikota nke onyonyo, omume, na mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa molecular

Oriakụ Bianca Odinakachukwu Olivia Odumegwu-Ojukwu (née , amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke ise n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ nari iri itoolu iri isii na asatọ) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria, onye nnọchi anya mba ọzọ, onye ọka iwu, na onye ọchụnta ego
Ọ bụ nwanyị di ya nwụrụ nke onye bụbu onye isi ala Biafra bụ Chukuemeka Odumegwu Ojukwu
Bianca Odumegwu-Ojukwu bụ onye nwere ọtụtụ asọmpi mba ụwa, ebe ọ meriri Most Beautiful Girl na Nigeria 1988 na Nwada Afrika, a makwaara ya nke ọma dị ka onye Afrịka mbụ meriri Miss Intercontinental
Ọ bụbu onye ndụmọdụ onye isi ala, ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya mba ahụ na Ghana wee bụrụ onye nnọchianya Naịjirịa na Spain na 2012

Nwa nke isii nke onye bụbu gọvanọ Anambra Christian Onoh na nwunye ya Carol, onye isi kọleji, Odumegwu-Ojukwu nọrọ ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ọ bụ nwata n'ime ime obodo Ngwo na ụmụnne ya Lilian, Josephine, Nuzo, Gabriel, Stella, Christian na Josef
Ọ gara Ackworth School, Pontefract, St Andrews College, Cambridge, na Cambridge Tutorial College ebe ọ nwetara ọkwa A

N'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ malitere nzere nsọpụrụ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, akụ na ụba na iwu na Mahadum Buckingham, mana ọ gafere na Mahadim Naịjirịa, Nsukka mgbe nna ya, onye ọka iwu site na ọrụ, siri ọnwụ na ọ lekwasịrị anya naanị na Iwu ma sonye na azụmahịa ezinụlọ
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Odumegwu-Ojukwu gara ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu Naịjirịa nke mechara mee ka ọ kpọọ ya n'ụlọ ikpe

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu, Oriakụ Bianca Odumegwu-Ojukwu rụrụ ọrụ ahụ n'oge dị mkpirikpi tupu ọ kwụsị ịkewa oge ya n'etiti ụlọ ya, azụmahịa ya na-emepụta ihe ntecha Bianca Blend na uwe ịchọ mma ya Mirabella
N'agbanyeghị nchegbu ya banyere ime ihe ngosi, Odumegwu-Ojukwu na-ebute ụzọ na mgbasa ozi maka akara ya
O guzobekwara otu na-abụghị nke gọọmentị Hope House Trust, nke lekwasịrị anya n'ịgbazigharị ndị omempụ na-eto eto na Enugu

N'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ nari iri itoolu iri asatọ na asatọ, Odumegwu-Ojukwu, onye bụbu onye mmeri na Miss Martini, bụ onye e chiri okpueze kacha mma na Naịjirịa, mana ọ chịrị ruo n'ihe ka ukwuu n'afọ nari iri itoolu iri asatọ na itoolu
O nwetakwara mmeri na asọmpi Miss Afrika na afọ narị iri itoolu iri asatọ na itoolu nke e mere na Gambia tupu ọ nọchite anya mba ya na Miss World na Hong Kong na Miss Universe na Mexico
O nwetara ihe ịga nke ọma ka ukwuu mgbe ọ meriri Miss Intercontinental n'otu afọ ahụ, a kpọkwara ya Miss Congeniality na Miss Charm International na Russia ebe ọ bụkwa onye na-emechi

N'afọ puku iri na otu, Onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan họpụtara Odumegwu-Ojukwu ka ọ bụrụ onye enyemaka pụrụ iche na Diaspora Affairs; n'afọ puku na iri na abụọ ọ ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya Naịjirịa na Ghana ma mesịa bụrụ onye nnọchianya na alaeze nke Spain
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri na isii, Odumegwu-Ojukwu nwetara nzere masta na International Relations and Diplomacy site na Mahadum Alfonso X el Sabio na Spain
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya Naịjirịa na-adịgide adịgide na United Nations World Tourism Organization
N'afọ nari iri asatọ iri asatọ na itoolu, a kpughere na Odumegwu-Ojukwu na onye bụbu onye isi Biafra Chukwuemeka Odumegwu Ojukwu, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke nna ya karịrị afọ iri atọ karịa ya
Ịhụnanya ha na-ese okwu bụ ihe na-ekwu okwu na mba na mbido afọ 1990

Nnukwu nrụgide nke ịnọ n'okpuru anya ọha na eze ghọrọ ihe a na-apụghị ịnagide, na-eme ka ọ gbaa arụkwaghịm dị ka Miss Intercontinental ebe ọ bụ na nchegbu ya bụ ịmecha agụmakwụkwọ ya dị ka nwa akwụkwọ iwu
N'afọ 1994, mgbe o mechara nweta akara ugo mmụta ya, ọ lụrụ onye bụbu onye isi ala Biafra n'ememe agbamakwụkwọ buru ibu e mere na Abuja
Bianca Xunise bụ onye America na-ese ihe osise, onye na-ese ihe osise, na onye na-akọwa onwe ya dịka 'goth of color'
A na-ejikọta ọrụ ya na mba site na Six Chix comic strip collaborative
A mụrụ Xunise na Chicago nye nne na nna bu ndi nka; nne ya bụ onye na-emepụta ejiji
Ezinụlọ ya nwere mgbọrọgwụ Creole

Ọ malitere dị ka onye na-ede blọgụ ejiji, mana ọ kwụsịrị 'n'ihi na ha achọghị ịgba George Zimmerman ebubo na ikpe Trayvon Martin ma mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, achọpụtara m na m enweghị m mmasị iche banyere ihe m na-eyi ọzọ
Mmetụta Xunise gụnyere onye na-ese ihe na Finland bụ Tove Jansson, onye na-ese akwụkwọ ụmụaka nke Austria bụ Ludwig Bemelmans, na onye na-ese manga na Japan bụ Naoko Takeuchi
O kwuru na mmalite ọkachamara ya na ihe nkiri na obodo ntanetị maka ụmụ nwanyị Hello Giggles, nke nyere ya kọlụm na 2015
E gosipụtara Xunise na Nib na Shondaland mgbe King Features Syndicate gwara ya ka o mepụta ihe ngosi ụtụ Popeye
N'afọ 2018, o ritere Ignatz Award maka 'Promising New Talent' maka 'Say Her Name' nke o bipụtara n'onwe ya, nke na-ekwu maka nchegbu nke ịbụ onye ojii na America
N'afọ 2020, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị ojii nke abụọ na-enye aka na ihe nkiri mba, mgbe ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime Six Chix
Barbara Brandon-Croft bu ya ụzọ n'ihe dị iche a, onye ihe nkiri ya kwa ụbọchị bụ Where I'm Coming From bụ nke a na-ejikọta na mba site na 1991 ruo 2005
Site na mbido Six Chix ya, Xunise ghọkwara onye mbụ Black nonbinary cartoonist nke a na-ejikọta na mba
Bibi Bakare-Yusuf (onye a mụrụ n'afọ 1970) bụ onye Nigerian na-ede ederede ma na-enyocha ma na ahazi ederede ndi ọzọ, ọ nọ na Lagos, Nigeria
Ya na onye otu ya bụ Jeremy Weate bidoro ụlọ ọrụ na-ebipụta akwụkwọ a kpọrọ Cassava Republic Press di n'Abuja n'afọ 2006

Uche ha bụ ime ka ọdịri onye ọbụla mfe ibipụta akwụkwọ tụmadị ndi Africa ka na ebido ebido,ọzọkwa ha chọrọ ka ọ bụrụ ebe a ga na-ebipụta akwụkwọ ndị Afrika dere bụ ndi nke a ga na-eto na mba Europe na America

A mụrụ Bibi Bakare-Yusuf na Lagos, Nigeria mana ọ kwagara England mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Goldsmith College, Mahadum nke London ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ Nkwukọrịta na Anthropology ma mee PhD na Gender Studies site na Mahadum Warwick

N'afọ 2006, Bibi Bakare-Yusuf - onye bụ onye gụrụ akwụkwọ na UK na Nigeria na onye otu ya Jeremy Weate, guzobere ụlọ ọrụ iji mepụta akwụkwọ ezigbo akwụkwọ ọgụgụ iduazi nke Africa nke ọnụ ego ya ga ekwe ndị mmadụ gote ma nye ha obi ụtọ

James Quentin 'Big Jim' Wright (March 19, 1966 na September 29, 2018) bụ ónyé America na-agụ egwú, onye na-ede egwu, onye na'ede egwu, ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ

Ónyé otu olu na ngwá ọrụ Sounds of Blackness, Wright ghọrọ onye na-arụkọ ọrụ ugboro ugboro nke ndị na-emepụta ihe Jimmy Jam na Terry Lewis na ónyé na-emepụta ụlọ maka ụlọ ọrụ ha, Flyte Tyme Productions, na 1990s
A mụrụ Wright na Rockford, Illinois
Nwa Jenniel Wright na Alan Jackson, ọ bìrì ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ndụ ya na Rockford, ọ bikwa na Roscoe yana Rancho Cucamonga, California, na Atlanta, Georgia
N'afọ 1984, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Rockford West High School tupu ọ kwaga Eden Prairie, Minnesota
Na Minnesota, Wright sonyeere ndị na-agụ egwú na ndị na-akpọ Sounds of Blackness, na-eje ozi dị ka ónyé na-emepụta, onye nhazi na ónyé na-ede egwu

Site n'aka ónyé otu Ann Nesby, ọ jikọtara ya na onye na-ede egwu na onye na'emepụta egwu Terry Lewis onye Lewis nyere Wright nkwekọrịta mbipụta pụrụ iche na ụlọ ọrụ ha, Flyte Tyme Production, Mgbè ọ ka na-enye ndị isi olu na mkpịsị aka maka Sounds of Blackness
N'afọ 1999, o dere ma mepụta egwu Yolanda Adams nke NAACP Image Award 'Open My Heart'
N'afọ 2004, Wright meriri Black Reel Award maka Best Original or Adapted Song màkà onyinye ya na 'He Still Loves Me' maka ụda nke ihe nkírí egwu egwu The Fighting Temptations (2003)
N'afọ 2006, o ritere ihe nrite Grammy màkà egwu Gospel kacha mma màkà ide egwu Adams 'Be Blessed' site na abọm ya Day by Day (2006)
Na Septemba 29, 2018, a hụrụ Wright nwụrụ anwụ n'ụlọ ya na Rockford
Biggie Kapeta (1956–1999) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
Ọ bụ nwa nwanne Sylvester Mubayi, onye ya na ya gụrụ akwụkwọ, ma mesịa nọrọ afọ abụọ dị ka onye na-ese ihe na Chapungu Sculpture Park, ebe a pụrụ ịhụ ụfọdụ ọrụ ya na ngosi
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi nke kụziri Sydney Majengwa
Bila, mà ọ bụ Forest Bira, bụ asụsụ Bantu á na-asụ na Mambasa Territory nkè Democratic Republic of Congo
Ndị Mbuti Pygmies bị n'ógbè ahụ na-asụkwa ya
Ìgwè ndị Pygmy dị n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ gụnyere Kango na Sua (Batchua)
Ndị Mbuti ndị ọzọ na-asụ asụsụ Central Sudan
Ndị Kango ná Sua na-asụ asụsụ dị iche iche (ndịda na ndị ugwu), mana ezughị iji mebie nghọta há ná ndị ọrụ ụgbọ há bụ Bila
Maho (2009) depụtara Ibutu (Mbuttu, D313) dị ka asụsụ dị iche
Bilikis Abiodun Otunla (amuru na ọnwa June 12, na afọ 1994) bu onye ebuli elu Naijiria

Ọ gbara asọmpi n'egwuregwu Afrịka nke afọ 2015 wee nweta ihe nrite ọla edo 69 nke ụmụnwaanyị Otu n'arọ - Ọ dị ọcha na jerk 1ST (Gold), Ụmụ nwanyị 69 – 75 Otu n'arọ - Trekken 1ST (Gold) na ụmụ nwanyị 69 - 75 kg - Total Gold O sonyekwara na 2016, 2018 na 2019 nke asọmpi egwuregwu Afrịka meriri ọla edo na ha niile ma e wezụga 2019 nke a kwụsịrị mgbe o meriri ya n'ihi ule mgbochi doping dara ada
ma e nyeghị ya ihe nrite ọla-edo ahụ
Na 2019 amachibidoro ya ruo 2027 site na International Weightlifting Federation mgbe ọ nwesịrị nnwale maka metenolone na metenolone metabolites
Biko mara na nnukwu nsonaazụ Bilikis Abiodun Otunla nwere ike ezughị oke, ị nwere ike inye aka mechaa ya
2019 - asọmpi Africa - Ụmụ nwanyị -81 n'arọ - ngụkọta 1st (Gold) 2019 - African Championship - Ụmụ nwanyị -81 n'arọ - Ịgbara 1st 2019 - African Championship - Ụmụ nwanyị -81 kg - Dị ọcha & Jerk 1st
Ụmụ nwanyị -76 kg - Dị ọcha & Jerk 12 Ụmụ nwanyị -76 n'arọ - Snatch 14 Ụmụ nwanyị -76 n'arọ - ngụkọta 14
2016 - asọmpi Africa - Ụmụ nwanyị 69 – 75 n'arọ ọla edo
Ụmụ nwanyị 69-75 n'arọ - Ọ dị ọcha ma na-ama jijiji 1ST Ụmụ nwanyị 69 - 75 kg – Trekken 1ST Ụmụ nwanyị 69 – 75 n'arọ - ngụkọta ọla edo
Bilikis Abiodun Otunla, onye nwetara ọla edo -81 Akwụsịla otu n'asọ n'asọmpị ịdị arọ nke Afrịka nke afọ 2019 n'ihi ule mgbochi doping ya dara ada, nsonaazụ mere ka ọ mebie iwu mgbochi ọgwụ ike

Otú ọ dị, International Weightlifting Federation (IWF) kpughere nkwupụta ọha na eze na akụkọ banyere ihe nlele nke ule ya, nke na-ekwu; 'Nchọpụta nyocha nke ọjọọ maka metenolone na metenolone metabolite -1-methylene-5α-androstane-3α-ol-17-one (S11 Anabolic agents)
N'ihi nke a, a kwụsịtụrụ onye na-eme egwuregwu nwa oge n'ihi mmebi iwu mgbochi ọgwụ ike
N'ọnọdụ ọ bụla, ebe ekpebisiri ike na onye na-eme egwuregwu emeghị mmebi iwu mgbochi doping, a ga-ebipụtakwa mkpebi ahụ bara ụru
IWF agaghị ekwu okwu ọzọ gbasara ikpe ahụ ruo mgbe emechiri ya
Bilikiss Adebiyi maọbụ Bilikiss Adebiyi Abiola bụ onye isi ala Naijiria nke ụlọ ọrụ na-emegharị ihe na Legọs, Wecyclers
Ọ ekwere na 'ihe efu otu nwoke bụ akụ nwoke ọzọ' Ya na ụlọ ọrụ ya achịkọtala ọtụtụ ihe nrite na ihe nrite gụnyere King Baudouin International Development Prize na 2018/19
A mụrụ Adebiyi na Lagos, ebe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Supreme Education Foundation
Ọ banyere na mahadum Lagos, mana ọ pụrụ otu afọ ka ọ ga gụchaa akwụkwọ ya na America
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Fisk wee gaa na Mahadum Vanderbilt, ebe ọ nwetara nzere masta
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na IBM afọ ise tupu o kpebie ịga n'ihu mụọ ihe
A nabatara ya ka ọ mụọ maka Master of Business Administration (MBA) na Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT)
O weputara echiche maka azụmaahịa imegharị ihe n'ime afọ nke abụọ ya na MIT, ebe ọ na-agụ ihe mkpofu dị ka isiokwu ọkachamara ya
Echiche mbụ ya bụ ịbawanye ụbara ihe mkpofu ọ nwere ike ịnakọta n'ezinaụlọ site n'inye ha tiketi ụgbọ oloko na mgbanwe
Mgbe ọ tụlere nke a na Naijiria na ezumike ọ tụrụ ya n'anya maka ịnụ ọkụ n'obi e nyere maka echiche ya
Ihe mkpofu bụ ihe jọgburu onwe ya na Legọs ebe ọ bụ na a na-anakọta naanị obere pasentị mgbe niile
Adebiyi weghachiri echiche ahụ na MIT ebe o nwere ike nweta nkwado site n'itinye echiche ya na asọmpi
Mgbe Adebiyi gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2012, ọ laghachiri azụ na Naijiria ka ya na di ya nọrọ
N'afọ 2012, o mebere Wecyclers, ụlọ ọrụ na-anakọta ahịhịa a na-emegharịgharị n'ụlọ dị na Legos
Mgbe azụmahịa ahụ malitere, Adebiyi na-ebupụta otu igwe kwụ otu ebe iji mee mkpokọta iji matakwuo ihe gbasara azụmahịa ọhụrụ ya
Ozugbo a haziri ihe mkpofu ahụ, ụlọ ọrụ ya na-ezigara ezinụlọ ya ozi SMS, na-agwa ha ego ole ha nwetara maka ịzụ ahịa ihe mkpofu
Enwere ike ịtụgharị ihe ndị a maka nri, ngwaahịa nhicha, ma ọ bụ nkeji ekwentị
Ụlọ ọrụ a na-arụkọ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ Lagos Waste Management Authority
Legọs na-emepụta ihe mkpofu dị puku tọn itoolu kwa ụbọchị ma ndị ọchịchị na-agbalị ime ka okpukpu abụọ nke e megharịrị site na ọnụ ọgụgụ 18% na 2011
Naijiria bụ nnukwu akụ na ụba Afrika mana enweghị nhazi na Legos pụtara na a pụghị ikpokọta ihe mkpofu mgbe niile
Ndị na-anya igwe na-eji igwe ọgbara ọhụrụ emezigharị nke na-enyere aka ịnakọta ihe mkpofu ebe ụgbọ ala nkịtị na-agaghị aga
Wecyclers na-anakọta site na puku kwuru puku ezinụlọ
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mere atụmatụ n'October 2015 na ọ chịkọtara ihe karịrị tọn 500 nke ihe mkpofu, ọ mepụtara uru site na mkpofu ahụ ma were mmadụ 80 n' ọrụ
Adebiyi onye aha ọlulu dị ya bụ Abiola ahazila ka ndị Coca-Cola na GlaxoSmithKline nye nkwado maka ọrụ ha
Wecyclers achọpụtala na akụkụ dị ukwuu nke ihe mkpofu sitere na ụlọ ọrụ ndị a ma ha dị njikere inye aka na mbọ a na-emegharịgharị ihe
Guinness na Naijiria kwetara imekọ ihe ọnụ na 2018
Na 2018 Abebiyi guzoro dị ka CEO nke Wecyclers ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Lagos State Parks and Gardens Agency (LASPARK)
N'ọrụ ọhụrụ ya ọ ga na-edobe oghere na Legọs steeti mara mma ma na-akụ osisi
A kọwo mbọ Adebiyi na Naịjirịa, UK, US na Germany n'afọ 2014 na 2016
Ihe mkpuchi gụnyere CNN, Huffington Post, 'Die Zeit', The Independent, Marie Claire Magazine, The Economist, NDAniTV na D + C
Enyere ya onyinye n'aka MIT ma merie ọtụtụ ihe nrite, gụnyere Cartier Initiative Award for Sub-Saharan Africa na 2013
Enyere ndị wecyclers ihe nrite mmepe mba ụwa nke King Baudouin na 2018/19
A na-ekwu na ndị mmekọ Wecycler gụnyere FCMB, DHL, Unilever, Oracle, Nigerian Bottling Company, MIT Sloan School of Management

O nwere nzere masta na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria, Naijiria na onye otu Institute of Information Management Africa ma bụrụ onye a họpụtara na 5 n'ime ụmụ nwanyị 25 kachasị ike na akwụkwọ akụkọ Naijiria n'afọ 2020, nke ụmụ nwanyị na akwụkwọ akụkọ Afrika chịkọtara
Hajiya Bilkisu Salisu Ahmed Funtuwa bụ onye ode akwụkwọ Naijiria
Ọ na-ede akwụkwọ ọgụgụ na Awụsa na-elekwasị anya n'ụmụ nwanyị Alakuba bụ ndị isi
Ọ bu otu n’ime ndi a mara akuko banyere akwukwo ha ama dika “Kano market literature” ma obu Littattafan Soyayya - “books of love”
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya jikọtara isiokwu nke ị kwalite ụmụ nwanyị na i nye nwanyị oke ha nke metụtara ndị Awụsa na Alakụba, nke sitere na ahụmịhe nke ya dịka onye otu ndị otu a
Bilkisu Funtuwa na-akwusi ike n'ọrụ a na-atụ anya n’aka ya na omume okpukpe nke ịlụ karịa otu nwanyị bụ nke bụ ndụ nke ụmụ nwanyị Awụsa, na-edekwazị banyere etu a ga-esi luso ọnọdụ ndị a agha
Ọrụ Funtuwa na-elekwasị anya na ndị isi nwanyị na-eji agụmakwụkwọ ha yana ofufe okpukpe ha bulie onwe ha elu nke ọma
Ndị a na-arụ ọrụ nke ndị ọka ikpe, ndị dọkịta, na ndị ọrụ gọọmentị ma na-ebikwazị ndụ dịka ndị ọchụnta ego bara ọgaranya
Otu n'ime isiokwu akọwapụtara nke ọma n'ọrụ ya bụ ịhụnanya miri emi
N'ime ọrụ ya, di na nwunye na-emekọrịta mmekọrịta juputara na nkwanye ugwu, mmekọrịta chiri anya, na ihe ụtọ oge ha abụọ
Na-ilekwasị anya na ụmụ nwanyị ị na-achịkwa ezinụlọ ha, akwụkwọ akụkọ ya na-agbakwa ụmụ nwanyị Alakuba ume ka ha lekwasị anya na agụmakwụkwọ ma na-ejigide okwukwe ha
Funtuwa na ezi na ụlọ ya bi na Funtua,na Katsina Steeti, na Naijiria

Bilkisu Yusuf, nke a makwaara dị ka Hajiya Bilkisu Yusuf, (Disemba 2, 1952 – Septemba 24, 2015), bụbu onye nta akụkọ Naịjirịa, onye ode akwụkwọ na onye ndezi akwụkwọ akụkọ ama ama n'Abuja, Kano na Kaduna,nke Naijiria
A maara ya na Naijiria maka ị bụ nwanyị mbụ na-edu ụlọ ọrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ, were jee ozi dịka onye nchịkọta akụkọ maka mmadụ nyee ụlọ akwụkwọ akụkọ abụọ ọzọ

Ọ bụ onye Awusa, Alakụba, onye nkwado ụmụ nwanyị, na onye na-akwado otu ngwakọta ofufe dị iche iche, onye a ma ama maka ị bụ onye ndụmọdụ nye onye isiala Naịjirịa n'ihe gbasara mba ofesi yana ịtọ ntọala ndị otu NGO, dịka Women In Nigeria (WIN) na Federation of Muslim Women Association
(FOMWAN)
A zọgburu Yusuf na ka ọ nọ na Haj na Mecca,na Saudi Arabia
A mụrụ Bilkisu Yusuf n'ụbọchị nke 2 n'ọnwa Disemba, n'afọ 1952
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Ansar Primary,nke Kano n'afọ 1964, were gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Government Girls College, nke Dala,dị na Kano
Akwụkwọ mahadum nke Yusuf gụrụ bụ na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nta akụkọ

Ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum nke Ahmadu Bello na Zaria, dị na Naijiria; ogo mmụta masta na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta mba ụwa na Mahadum nke Wisconsin – Madison na Madison, dị na Wisconsin, n'Amerịka; na ogo mmụta dị elu na nta akụkọ site na International Journalism School na Moscow State Institute of International Relations na Moscow, dị na Rọshịa, n'afọ 1986
Ọ lụrụ Alhaji Sanusi Ciroma Yusuf, onye mechara bụrụ onye isi ikpe obodo
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere ụmụ abụọ, nwa nwoke Moshood Sanusi Yusuf na nwa nwanyị Nana Fatima
Ha mechara gbaa alụkwaghịm
Di ya nke mbụ nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ 73
Ọ lụrụ di ya nke abụọ, bụ Mustapha Bintube
E nyere Hajiya Bilkisu Yusuf aha nsọpụrụ bụ Hajiya mgbe e mechara njem uka na Mecca (Haji bụ ụdị nwoke)
Ọ nwụrụ mgbe ọ na-eje ozi dịka onye ndu ụmụ nwanyị n'aha National Hajj Commission nke Naijiria
Bilkisu Yusuf bụ onye nta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Daily Trust na Leadership n'Abuja,nke Naijiria
Mgbe o si Mahadum nke Wisconsin-Madison lọghachi, ọ ghọrọ onye nwanyị mbụ ị bụ editọ na Sunday Triumph,na Kano, site n'afọ 1983 ruo n'afọ1987
O ji ọkwa onye nhazi na New Nigerian, na Kaduna, n'afọ 1987 na Citizen Magazine, na Kaduna, n'afọ 1990
A ma ya ama maka kọlụm ya bụ 'Civil Society Watch'
Ọ rụsiri ọrụ ike na The Nigeria Association of Women Journalists (NAWOJ), nke zụrụ ụmụ agbọghọ na-ede akwụkwọ nta akụkọ na Naijiria
Yusuf bụbu onye ndụmọdụ onye isi ala Naịjirịa n'ihe gbasara mba ofesi
Ọ bụbukwa onye a ma ama na-ịkwado ụmụ nwanyị

O guzobere ọtụtụ NGO, dị ka Women In Nigeria (WIN), nke bụ otu n'ime nzukọ izizi na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị na Naijiria, Federation of Muslim Women Associations in Nigeria (FOMWAN), the Nigerian Interfaith Action Association Against Malaria (NIFAAM), na Health Reform Foundation of Nigeria (HERFON), Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Advocacy Nigeria
O nọ na-arụ ọrụ na ' Bring Back Our Girls', nke e mere iji dulata ụmụ agbọghọ Chibok
Ihe ị zọgbu mmadụ mere n'ebe nkwụsị dị na Mina, Saudi Arabia n'ụbọchịnke 24 n'ọnwa Septemba, n'afọ 2015, n'ihe dị ka elekere 9 nke ụtụtụ
Ìgwè mmadụ ahụ si Muzdalifah na-aga Jaramat, ebe ndị njem uka na-atụ okwute na ogidi iji gosipụta ị tụ ekwensu okwute n'oge Hajj
Ha ga-esi ebe ahụ gawa nnukwu ụlọ alakụba dị na Mecca
A zọgburu ihe karịrị ndị njem ụka mmadụ 2,000 n’oge nzọgbụ ahụ, ọ fọrọ obere ka ọ bụrụ narị abụọ n’ime ha bụ ndị amaala Naijiria
Bilkisu Yusuf bụ onye a mara n’ime ndị ahụ nwụrụ
Ndị ọzọ a ma ama na Naịjirịa gụnyere Prọfesọ Tijjani El-Miskin
Saudi Arabia bụ mba Middle East nwere ọnụọgụgụ 27,752,316
Ọ bụ ụlọ nye ụlọ alakụba abụọ nke kachasị nsọ na okpukpe Alakụba
Otu n'ime ndị a bụ Masjid al-Haram na Mecca, nke bụ ebe njem a
Nke ozo bụ Masjid an-Nabawi nke Medina, ebe olili ozu nke onye amụma Muhammad
Njem a a na-aga Mecca bụ ogidi nke ise nke Alakụba ma dịka nkwenkwe ya si dị, e kwesịrị i me y opekata mpe otu ugboro na ndụ ndị Alakụba ọ bụla
Ọtụtụ puku mmadụ na-eme njem uka a kwa afọ site na gburugburu ụwa
Nigeria bụ obodo nọ na ọdịda anyanwụ nke Afrịka
Obodo a nwere njikọ chiri anya nke nna ochie, nke na-akpata ịkpa oke megide ụmụ nwanyị
Ha nwekwara nsogbu ị da ogbenye na ọgwụ ọjọọ
Ndị Boko Haram n’afọ 2014 tọọrọ ụmụakwụkwọ nke Chibok dị narị abụọ na iri na itoolu, nke mere ka mba ụwa nile gbaa mbọ ịzọpụta ụmụagbọghọ a
Kaosinadị, a chọtara ihe dịka 100 site n ’Eprel ruo na Mee nke afọ 2017

Ụlọ ọrụ nke onye isi ala Naịjirịa bụ Muhammadu Buhari wepụtara nkwupụta a na-eso nzọgbu ahụ 'Onye isi ala Buhari na-esoro Guild of Editors nke Naijiria na Nigerian Union of Journalists n'ọnwụ dị mwute nke Hajiya Bilkisu, onye kwesịrị nṅomi, onye raara onwe ya nye, onye maara ihe, e nweere ntụkwasị obi, onye a kwanyeere ugwu nke ukwuu, onye editọ na onye ode akwukwo puru iche, agbanyeghị onwu, bu onye ga-abu ihe nlere anya nke ndi oru nta akuko, n'ime na ezi na Naijiria

Jibrin Ibrahim, onye ntụzi aka na Centre for Democracy and Development kọwara Yusuf dị ka 'nnukwu mmadụ, onye nkwado, onye nta akụkọ, onye mgbasa ozi na ọkachasị nwee ntụkwasị n'Alakụba, onye nwụrụ mgbe ọ na-efe Chineke'

Dọkịnta Oby Ezekwesili, onye isi otu ‘ Bring Back Our Girls’ ma bụrụkwa onye minista na-ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ na Naịjirịa n’oge gara aga kwuru sị, “Bilkisu lụrụ ọgụ n’oge ndụ ya niile maka agụmakwụkwọ ụmụaka
Ọ naghị agbanwe agbanwe na nkwado ya
Ike agwụghị ya ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Anyi na-eto ihe ezigbo nwanne anyi nwanyi mere
Obi dị anyị ụtọ ị nabata ya dịka akụkụ nke ezinụlọ anyị
Aliyu Muktar, onye bụbu onye editọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Triumph onye ya na Yusuf rụkọtara ọrụ kwuru, 'Ọ bụụrụ m onye nlereanya, ezigbo nwanyị ji ọrụ aka, nke ọma na enweghị ntụpọ
Ị mara, ọ kara obi, na-ekwu eziokwu ma na-alụ ọgụ mgbe niile maka ndị e wedara n'ala
Ị makwazi ihe ndi ọ rụrụ n'oge gra aga; Hajiya bụ onye na-agaghị anabata ikpe na-ezighị ezi ebe ọbụla
Bilkisu Yusuf bụ otu n’ime ndị odeakụkọ iri abụọ na abụọ a gbara ajụjụ ọnụ maka akwụkwọ encyclopedic Nigerian Journalism nke Mike Awoyinfa na Dimgba Igwe dere
Bilkisu Yusuf (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 8 n'ọnwa Juun afọ 1977) bu onye judoka nke Naijiria
O soro na mee Women's half-middleweight event na2000 Summer Olympics
William 'Bill' Ainslie (1934 - 1989) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa, onye nkuzi, onye na-eme ihe, yana onye guzobere ọtụtụ ọrụ nka
A mụrụ Ainslie na 10 Eprel 1934 na Bedford, Eastern Cape, ebe ezinụlọ ya na-akọ ugbo a na-akpọ Spring Groveń
Ezinụlọ ya kwagara Karoo mgbe ọ bụ nwata nwoke, mana o mechara gaa Johannesburg n'ihi ụkọ mmiri ozuzo
Nna ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ
Ainslie bu n'obi ịghọ onye ụkọchukwu, mana nka weghaara echiche ya mgbe ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Natal, Pietermaritzburg site na 1952 na 1955
N'afọ 1958, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ wee nweta akara ugo mmụta ya na Fine Art
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ kụziri na ụlọ Michael, ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na KwaZulu Natal
Ọ kụzikwaara nka na Cyrene Mission na Zimbabwe na King Edward VII School na Johannesburg, alma mater ya
N'afọ 1960, Bill lụrụ Sophia Jansen-Schottell (nke a maara dị ka Fieka)
Ọ nwụrụ n'ihe mberede nke ụgbọ ala n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1989 mgbe ọ na-alọta site na ụlọ ọrụ mba ụwa na Cyrene Mission na Zimbabwe
Ihe osise Ainslie gbanwere site na ihe owuwu ndị Afrịka na-egosi ndị nne na ụmụaka, na ndị ọrụ ugbo gaa na ngosipụta na-enweghị atụ
A maara ya nke ọma maka ojiji ọ na-eji ụcha dị egwu na nke na-egbuke egbuke
Ihe osise ya nwere njikọ na American abstract expressionism ma n'ihi ya, Ainslie na-akụzi abstraction
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Goodman Gallery, Johannesburg Art Gallery na National Gallery of Zimbabwe
Bill Ainslie guzobere Johannesburg Art Foundation n'afọ 1982
Ọ zụrụ ndị na-ese ihe dịka Helen Sebidi, William Kentridge, Dumile Feni na David Koloane

Ụlọ ihe nkiri ahụ bụ òtù na-anaghi achọ uru nke malitere n'ụzọ na-enweghị isi, na-arụ ọrụ site n'ụlọ onye na-ese ihe Cecily Sash tupu Ainslie emechaa, na 1977, zụta ụlọ nke ghọrọ Johannesburg Art Foundation
Ntọala nka nke Ainslie nọgidere na-enwe nkà ihe ọmụma nkuzi nke na-emegide ụdị ịkpa ókè ọ bụla ma mesie ike na agụmakwụkwọ nka kwesịrị ịbụ ohere maka onye ọ bụla
Johannesburg Art Foundation nyere aka dị ukwuu na nka South Africa na ọkachasị mmepe na-aga n'ihu nke ndị na-ese ihe ojii South Africa
Ainslie nyere aka n'imalite FUBA (Federated Union of Black Artists), FUNDA (nke pụtara ịmụta na Xhosa) na Alexandra Arts Centre

N'afọ 1985, afọ nke South African State of Emergency, Ainslie guzobere ebe obibi onye na-ese ihe, Thupelo Workshops, na Cape Town na David Koloane na Kagiso Patrick Mautloa, nke Triangle Network, FUBA, FUNDA na Johannesburg Art Foundation kwadoro
N'etiti 1964 na 1988 o mere ọtụtụ ihe ngosi ma nata onyinye Art SA Today atọ
N'abalị iri abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1999, e meghere Ụlọ ngosi Bill Ainslie na Johannesburg Art Foundation iji kwekọọ na ncheta afọ iri nke ọnwụ ya
Ntọala ahụ mechiri na 2001 n'ihi enweghị nkwado
William Flynn (13 Disemba 1948 11 Julaị 2007) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ọchị, ma eleghị anya a maara nke ọma maka igwu egwu Tjokkie
A mụrụ Flynn William Frederick Flynn na Cape Town ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Plumstead High School
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri UCT ma bụrụ onye guzobere ụlọ ihe nkiri Space na Cape Town
Ọ bụ nwa William Frederick na Mary Elizabeth (Née Morley)
A maara Flynn nke ọma maka ngosipụta ya nke Tjokkie, onye ọ gosipụtara dịka onye maara ihe, onye na-aṅụ biya rugby union
Flynn enwetala ihe nrite 13 kachasị mma, gụnyere Dublin Critics na Golden Entertainer Awards
Otu n'ime ha bụ
Ọ bụ enyi ogologo oge na onye na-arụkọ ọrụ na onye na'eme ihe nkiri na onye na na-ede egwuregwu Paul Slabolepszy
Flynn tinyekwara aka n'ụwa egwu
Ọ bụ onye nchoputa na onye otu egwu nke The Rock Rebels (1998-2007) na onye na-abụ abụ maka Vinnie na Viscounts (1987-1997)
N'oge ọnwụ ya, Flynn lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Jana Cilliers, nwunye ya nke abụọ
Flynn nwụrụ na Johannesburg, South Africa n'abalị 11 ọnwa Julaị afọ 2007 site na nkụchi obi
Ọ dị afọ 58
Ọrụ ya na-aga nke ọma gụnyere ọrụ dị mkpa n'ihe karịrị 140 ihe nkiri, egwu, ihe nkiri 42, ọtụtụ ihe ngosi TV na ọtụtụ puku mgbasa ozi redio na TV
Bill Gaskins (amụrụ n'ọnwa Mee 25, afọ 1953) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto na agụmakwụkwọ
Ọrụ ya na-enyocha njikọ nke ntutu isi ojii na nyocha nyocha nke ihe osise na narị afọ nke 21

N'akwụkwọ ya Isi ọma na Isi Ọjọọ Foto, Gaskins na-ekwu maka ọrụ ntutu isi na nnọchiteanya na ọdịbendị ndị Afrịka Amerịka ma ọ na-enyocha ọrụ ntutu, ịchọ mma nke ihe ịchọ mma na njirimara onwe onye na ahụ
Gaskins nwetara nzere Bachelor of Fine Arts na Tyler School of Art, Master of Arts Degree na Mahadum Ohio State, na Master of Fine Arts Degree site na Maryland Institute College of Art
Ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe n'afọ 2008 na McColl Center for Art + Innovation
Bill Gaskins na-akụzi ugbu a na American Studies Program na Ngalaba nka na Mahadum Cornell
Ọ kụziri na Parsons the New School, na mmemme gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Media Studies na The New School for Public Engagement
Okwuchukwu ya na-elekwasị anya na nyocha nke agbụrụ na ihe ngosi nke foto ojii na ụmụ nwanyị ojii, ọ na-eduzi ọmụmụ ihe na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke foto

Gaskins egosila foto ya gụnyere ihe ngosi otu na Jersey City Museum nke gụnyere ọrụ Renée Green, Chitra Ganesh, Simone Leigh na Sharon Louden, na ngosipụta nke obere ihe nkiri ya, The Meaning of Hope na Detroit Institute of Arts
Usoro foto ya The Cadillac Chronicles na-egosi ndị isi ojii na Cadillacs ha
Ọ sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke ọdịnala Baltimore, Cadillac Parade, ma na-enyocha ihe nnọchianya nke Cadillac dị ka ihe nnọchi anya ike nwoke na ọnọdụ etiti
Akwụkwọ ya Isi ọma na Isi Ọjọọ (afọ 1997) gosipụtara ụdị ntutu isi ndị Afrịka Amerịka, ma dabere na ngosi afọ 1996 na Robert B
Menschel Photography Gallery
William Henry Gates nke III (amụrụ n'Oktoba 28, 1955) bụ onye ọchụnta ego America, onye na-etinye ego, na onye ọrụ obiọma
A maara ya nke ọma maka ịtọ ntọala nnukwu ngwanrọ Microsoft, ya na enyi ya ọmatara na nwata Paul Allen onye na-awuọla
N'oge ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Microsoft, Gates nwere ọkwa onye isi oche, onye isi nchịkọta (CEO), onye isi na onye isi na-ahụ maka ngwanrọ, mgbe ọ bụkwa onye nwere oké kachasị ruo na Mee 2014
Ọ bụ ọchụnta ego kaa, onye nke mgbanwe microcomputer nke 1970s na 1980s
A mụrụ ma zụlite Gate na Seattle

Bold textWilliam Keith (n'ubochí irí abụọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị, 1929 rụo ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Septemba, 2004) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nke malitere ndụ nka ya dị ka onye na-ese foto, mana ọ banyèrè na foto na uri anya
Abụ uri ya zuru oke site na calligrams sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ Apollinaire na ndị ọzọ na-ede uri French na mmalite narị afọ nke 20 rụo Lettrisme na Minimalism na Op Art nke afọ 1960
Ka ọrụ ya na-aga n'ihu, Keith lekwasịrị anya na isiokwu na isi mmalite ndị Afrịka na ndị Afrịka America
Ọganihu a na-aga na mgbọrọgwụ na alaka ndị Afrịka mèrè ka ọ pụọ na mkpụrụ akwụkwọ Rom ma na-aga n'ihu na ụlọ ahịa nke ihe oyiyi na ihe nnọchianya site na Ijipt ruo South Africa na ndị America
N'ihi ya, Keith mepụtara usoro eserese nke akwa, ihe a tụrụ atụ n'osisi, ọla nchara, ite, na nka ndị ọzọ

Ihe atụ nke ntụrụndụ Keith nkè ihe dị n'ụdị anya ya na ọdịdị nke ntinye aka nka ya ga-achọpụta ugbu a n'iji usoro egwu ya site na ikwughachi ihe osise sitere na isi mmalite dị iche iche dị ka akara okporo ụzọ na eriri zebra
Ọrụ Keith n'ozuzu ya ghọrọ emume nke njem nke isi mmalite Afrịka ka ha na-agagharị ma na-emekọrịta ihe na ụwa ndị ọzọ
Ọrụ ọ bụla nwere ike iyi ka ọ bụ naanị ihe ịchọ mma na mbụ, mana ịmara ihe na-ekpughe oku màkà kinetics na dynamics nke ememe
Mgbè ọ nwụrụ, ụmụ ya nwoke, Antar na Tarik, hapụrụ Keith, bụ ndị ọ raara akwụkwọ ya, 'Pictographs'

William Nicholaus Lyimo (a mụrụ n'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1993), onye a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Bill Nass, bụ onye na-eti egwu nke Tanzania nke Chagga, a mụrụ ya na Tanga, Tanga Region
MTV Base kpọrọ ya n'etiti '50 Artists To Watch For In 2017'
Ọ bi ugbu a na Dar es Salaam
Ọnwa ole na ole mgbe a tọhapụrụ egwu izizi ya 'Raha', a họpụtara Lyimo na 2015's Kilimanjaro Tanzania Music Awards (KTMA) dị ka 'New Best Artist'
A mụrụ William Nicholaus Lyimo n'abalị 11 ọnwa Eprel afọ 1993, na Bombo Hospital na Tanga Tanzania na nne na nna Chagga si Kilimanjaro Region
Bill Nass malitere agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Mbuyuni Primary School na Tanga 2000 2003 wee kwaga Mkunguni Primary school na Kinondoni Dar es Salaam
O mechara sonye na Oysterbay Secondary School n'afọ 2007 ruo 2010 ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Site n'afọ 2011 ruo 2013, ọ gụrụ maka diplọma na Nchịkwa na Nchịkọta na College Of Business Education Dar es Salaam Campus
N'afọ 2014 ọ laghachiri na kọleji ruo n'afọ 2017 ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere bachelọ na Procurement and supplies Management
MTV Base kpọrọ ya otu n'ime 'Ndị omenkà 50 kacha mma a ga-ele anya n'afọ 2017
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ 2017, Nass mere nke mbụ ya na Coke Studio Africa dịka Big Breakthrough Artist, rụrụ ya na Sheeba nke Uganda na Asgegenew nke Ethiopia
Lyimo emeela ọtụtụ ugboro na Fiesta, egwu nke Clouds Fm Radio na-achịkwa kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ
N'afọ 2019, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na mmemme Wasafi ya na onye Naijiria Wizkid, Tiwa Savage na onye Tanzania na-enweta ihe nrite Diamond Platnumz
Site na ibe Instagram ya, Bill Nass kesara ọbịbịa nke 'Love Tour' na onye ọlụlụ ya Nandy bụ ndị nwere abụ abụọ 'Bugana' na 'Do Me'
Ha abụọ mere njem nke malitere na Nọvemba 20 na Manyoni Singida wee mechie na Kahama Shinyanga na Nọfemba 22, 2020
N'afọ 2018, ndị ọchịchị Tanzania jidere Lyimo na onye ọ na-achọ ịlụ Nandy n'oge na-adịghị anya maka ịkekọrịta ihe ha weere dịka ọdịnaya na-adịghị mma n'ịntanetị
Bill Nass gwara Nandy na mbido afọ 2020 na ihe ngosi TV
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya n'afọ 2021 Nandy na Bill Nass kwụsịrị mmekọrịta ha na Bill Nuss dere abụ banyere ya nke a na-akpọ Tatizo

Billie Zangewa (amụrụ na afọ 1973 na Blantyre, Malawi) bụ ọkara Malawian ọkara onye na eme nkiri na obodo 'South Afrịka' nke na-eji aka na-akwa akwa silk iji mepụta tapestries collage, na onye bi na Johannesburg ugbu a
Kemgbe afọ 2004, nka ya egosila na ngosi mba ụwa gụnyere na Paris Art Fair na Grand Palais na Paris
Ọrụ Zangewa bụ akụkọ ndụ onwe onye ma na-ejikọta ụmụ nwanyị ojii na ụlọ kwa ụbọchị na ịbụ nne
Ụzọ nka ya na-egosi na onye na-ese ihe na-egosipụta nguzogide mmegbu ọ na-eche ihu site na ịhụnanya onwe onye

Billie Zangewa na-arụ ọrụ n'ụzọ bụ isi na silk offcuts na-enweghị isi na collages dị mgbagwoju anya nke aka, na-emepụta ihe oyiyi nke na-enyocha njirimara ya na-agbagha njirimara ya n'oge a ma na-agbawa akụkọ ihe mere eme, objectification na mmegbu nke ahụ nwanyị ojii
Na-arụ ọrụ n'ụdị dị larịị, nke mara mma, ọ na-egosi akụkọ ndị metụtara ahụmịhe ma nke onwe ma nke zuru ụwa ọnụ
Ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ mgbe niile onye na-eme ihe nkiri n'ọrụ ya, Zangewa na-aghọ dike nke a na-ekpughe ndụ ya kwa ụbọchị site na ihe nkiri ọ na-ese
Ọ bụ ezie na Zangewa tụgharịrị na mbụ na nka akwa n'ihi na ọ dị ọnụ ala, ákwà ọ na-eji n'oge na-adịghị anya ghọrọ ihe dị mkpa na nka ya
Zangewa na-achọpụta mkpa na omume kwa ụbọchị nke akwa nke na-eweta ihe ọ maara n'ime ọrụ ya ma na-elekwasị anya n'ịghọta ọrụ ụlọ
Usoro nke ị nụcha silk na-emetụta onye na-ese ihe maka njikọ ya na metamorphosis

Ihe osise Zangewa a rụchara arụcha na-eme emume ezughị oke site na ọnụ ha na-enweghị isi, nke na-adịghị mma na mgbe mgbe nnukwu iberibe yiri ka ọ na-apụ na tapestry nke yiri ka ọ ga-egbochi ihe nkiri ahụ
Usoro a na-arụkwa ọrụ iji mebie echiche efu ọ bụla nke ọrụ a na-ese na ákwà
A mụrụ ya na afọ 1973 na Blantyre, Malawi, ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Fine Arts na Mahadum Rhodes, South Africa mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ
Nne ya rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ akwa na ịkwa akwa na ịchọ mma
Dị ka nwatakịrị, ọ hụrụ njikọ dị n'etiti nne ya na ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ ka ha na-arụ ọrụ ụlọ ndị ọzọ ọnụ, nke ga-emetụta isiokwu nke ịbụ nne n'ọrụ ya
Na ọzụzụ nka ya, ọ nwalere ọtụtụ ụzọ ngosi, mana n'ikpeazụ ọ ghọrọ onye nwere mmasị na ọrụ silk, ma n'ihi mmasị ya na akwa, ìhè ya na àgwà na-egosipụta
O gosipụtara na 'Silk nwere àgwà dị egwu nke ntụgharị uche mana n'otu oge ahụ, echere m na ọ bụ nke oge a ma na-ebute ụzọ n'ụdị ejiji'
Na-arụ ọrụ na Gaborone, Botswana, mgbe ahụ Johannesburg kamakwa na London, ọ chọrọ ịsụgharị echiche nwanyị banyere obodo ukwu ya
Ọ kwuru banyere mmasị ya na foto ejiji na usoro ịkọ akụkọ, dịka ọmụmaatụ, nke Ellen von Unwerth na ọrụ ya
Ọrụ akwa mbụ nke Zangewa gụnyere mmepụta nke akpa aka patchwork, na-eji ihe nkiri ndị e si n'obodo Johannesburg nweta

Mgbe onye na-ese ihe malitere ịmepụta collages buru ibu nke a maara nke ọma ugbu a, ọ dabere na ojiji nke ederede, ihe oyiyi nwere mmetụta pop art, na, mgbe ụfọdụ, mmetụta gụnyere embroidery, beads, na mats n'elu ákwà ahụ
'The Rebirth of Black Venus,' nke onye na-ese ihe na-agwụ na 2010, gosipụtara mgbanwe na isiokwu Zangewa
Ihe osise ahụ na-egosi obodo Johannesburg, nke e belatara ka ọ dị obere ma e jiri ya tụnyere onye mara mma ma dị elu nke Zangewa, onye na-egosi ọtọ ma e wezụga ọkọlọtọ gbara ya gburugburu
Ọrụ ahụ bịara mgbe Zangewa kwụsịrị arịrịọ, ma gosipụta mkpebi o mere n'onwe ya, ịhụnanya onwe onye nke dị na ya ma na-apụta ugboro ugboro n'ọtụtụ ọrụ ya kemgbe ahụ
N'afọ 2020, Templon na obodo Paris gosipụtara ihe ngosi nke ọrụ onye na-ese ihe, nke akpọrọ Soldier of Love, nke nyochara isiokwu nke ụlọ, nwanyị, na ịhụnanya
N'ikwu okwu na akwụkwọ odide Jareh Das na Ocula, onye na-ese ihe kọwara, 'M na-eche na ugbu a, anyị na-ebi n'oge ọtụtụ ime ihe ike na mmebi iwu n'ụdị dị iche iche anyị na-eme ibe anyị dị ka ọha mmadụ
Anyị na-anụ banyere ya na akụkọ kwa ụbọchị
Ekwenyere m na ọ bụ n'ihi na anyị anaghị elekwasị ịhụnanya anya, nakwa na ọ bụrụ na anyị emee, ọtụtụ ahụhụ n'ụwa ga-abịa na njedebe ma anyị ga-ahụ ọgwụgwọ
Ọrụ Zangewa nke afọ 2014 bụ Constant Gardener bụ nke Smithsonian's National Museum of African Art na Washington, D
Akwụkwọ obibi akwụkwọ ahụ mere ka ọ nwee mmasị na ihe onwunwe, mgbe ọ kwara gaa obodo Johannesburg ọ chọtara ihie nkwali ya na obodo ahụ

Ọ na-eji self-referentiality dị ka usoro echiche nke iji gosipụta nwanyị Afrịka nke oge a ma nye aka na redefinition ya na ọha mmadụ ebe nna ochie na echiche mmeghachi omume na-aga n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ megide nnwere onwe ụmụ nwanyị

Ọ bụ ezie na tapestries ya bụ akụkọ ndụ onwe onye, ọ na-achọta ihe enyemaka n'ịkpụzi njirimara otu, dịka na Midnight Aura na Angelina Rising-titles nke na-ezo aka na aha ndị ụlọ ọrụ akwa Dutch Vlisco nyere na mbipụta wax

Nwanyị Afrịka ahụ e gosipụtara na tapestries nke Zangewa, onye 'enwetala ọgbara ọhụrụ' n'okwu Yinka Shonibare MBE, aghaghị iweghachite onwe ya onye na-adịghị arụ ọrụ na onye na-edo onwe ya n'okpuru ọchịchọ ụmụ nwoke, ọ ghọwo onye nnọchi anya ịrata ndị a na-eme dị ka omume maara ihe na nke afọ ofufo
N'afọ 2018 Zangewa bụ onye na-ese ihe maka FNB JoburgArtFair kwa afọ
N'afọ 2019, a gụnyere Zangewa na ihe ngosi I Am
Contemporary Women Artists of Africa na National Museum of African Art
A gụnyere Zangewa n'akwụkwọ Vitamin T Threads and Textiles in Contemporary Art ( Phaidon, 2019),
