biya South Africa enweela mmetụta abụọ dị mkpa na mmepe ya
Nke mbụ, ndị bi na Europe bụ ndị chịrị mba ahụ wetara nka na ihe ọmụma ka ndị bi na mba ahụ
Ndị Dutch si mba ọzọ site na 1650 gaa n'ihu, na ndị Britain, ndị si mba ọzọ kwabata na narị afọ nke 19 na nke 20 nyere aka n'ụzọ dị iche iche na ihe ọmụma nke mmepụta mmanya
Beer Ọdịda Anyanwụ South Africa
Beer rutere South Africa na ndị ọcha mbụ biri na ya ma a na-aṅụ ya ebe a ihe karịrị afọ 300
N'October 4, 1658, Jan van Riebeeck dere n'akwụkwọ akụkọ ya na n'ụbọchị a ka a na-aṅụ biya mbụ na Cape
E nyere mmepụta biya ihe dị elu n'ihi na ọ bụ ihe ọṅụṅụ dị mkpa maka ịlụso ọrịa scurvy a na-atụ egwu nke jupụtara na ụgbọ mmiri na-azụ ahịa n'etiti Netherlands na East Indies
A ka na-eji biya akpọrọ ihe dị elu taa dị ka ihe ọṅụṅụ dị mma

N'afọ 1960, ụlọ ọrụ Malan Liquor Commission mechara nyocha ya siri ike banyere nkesa mmanya na-egbu egbu na South Africa ma kọọ ya dị ka ndị a Echiche nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-akwado akụkọ a bụ na a ga-emepụta ọnọdụ nke ga-agba ume ịṅụ ihe ọṅụṅụ na-aba n'anya, ọkacha mma na nri, na-efu mmanya ma ọ bụ mmụọ siri ike
A na-atụ aro ọdịiche dị ukwuu na ọnụahịa dị n'etiti ihe ọṅụṅụ na mmụọ na nnweta dị mfe nke mbụ dị ka akụkụ nke atụmatụ a na-ezube iwepụ àgwà ịṅụ mmanya nke ndị mmadụ n'akụkụ a

Jellinck, onye a na-ewere dị ka onye na-eme nchọpụta sayensị n'ụwa niile n'ọhịa ọmụmụ ihe mmanya na-aba n'anya, bịara na nkwubi okwu na-esonụ Ụdị ihe ọṅụṅụ a na-eji eme ihe na-ekpughe mgbe niile omume ịṅụ mmanya
Beer bụ ihe ọṅụṅụ ahọpụtara, ọ bụghị site n'aka ndị aṅụrụma, kama ọ bụ ndị na-aṅụ mmanya na-aba n'anya
Mmetụta ọzọ dị mkpa ma a na-elegharakarị anya bụ ihe ọmụma ụmụ amaala
Ụlọ ọrụ na-aṅụ mmanya n'ógbè ahụ, nke ndị isi ojii na-arụ ọrụ, ọkachasị ndị dị ka ndị Sotho, Zulu na Xhosa, anọwo na-apụta ụdị biya sorghum ogologo oge tupu ndị Europe ọ bụla abịarute
Umqombothi, sitere n'asụsụ Nguni (Xhosa na Zulu), bụ biya ọdịnala e mere na Transkei, site na ọka (ọka), ọka malt, sorghum malt, yist, na mmiri
Mmanya Bantu
Ịṅụ na ịṅụ biya Bantu rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na ndụ agbụrụ Bantu na Southern Africa
A na-eme ya site n'ikwe ka ngwakọta mmiri na sorghum na-agbanye mmiri
A na-agbanye ihe na-agbari agbari naanị n'ụzọ dị nta ma si otú a na-ejigide pasent dị ukwuu nke ihe siri ike
A na-ele ya anya dị ka nri na ihe ọṅụṅụ
N'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, a na-emepụta ntụ biya Bantu na-anọchi anya malt sorghum n'ụlọ na obere ụlọ ọrụ
Ọtụtụ obodo nwere ikike maka mmepụta biya Bantu na mpaghara ha na ndị buru ibu na-arụ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nke oge a maka nzube a
Na mmepụta ụlọ ọrụ nke biya Bantu, ọka ọka ghọrọ isi ihe dị mkpa ma gwakọta ya na malt sorghum na oke nke akụkụ abụọ ma ọ bụ atọ nke ọka na otu akụkụ nke malt

Ọ bụ ezie na a ka na-ere ọtụtụ n'ime biya Bantu a na-emepụta n'ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe site n'ọtụtụ, a na-ewebata nkwakọ ngwaahịa nke oge a na plastik na ụdị akpa ndị ọzọ ngwa ngwa na ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ biya obodo
Ebe ọ bụ na e nyere ndị Bantu mmanya na-aba n'anya na 1962, ire biya Bantu site na obodo malitere ịbawanye ngwa ngwa karịa tupu
Mmanya Europe na Bantu nwere ọtụtụ ihe jikọrọ ha
Nke ikpeazụ bụ n'ezie ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ onye mbido mbụ nke mbụ
Na Leipzig, na Germany, a na-echekwa ụlọ ọrụ biya dị ọtụtụ narị afọ dị ka ihe na-adọrọ mmasị ndị njem nleta na ngwaahịa ya siri ike ịmata ọdịiche dị na biya Bantu
A maghị n'ozuzu na uru nri na-edozi ahụ nke biya Europe na-eru nso na nke biya Bantu

Ha abụọ nwere ihe dịka otu pasentị mmanya na-aba n'anya mana ebe a na-akwụsị ịgba ụka maka biya Europe site na pasteurisation mgbe etinyechara ya na karama, ọ na-aga n'ihu na biya Bantu ruo mgbe ọ gbanwere

N'ihi ya, mmanya na-aba n'anya nke biya Bantu na-abawanye mgbe ọ hapụrụ ụlọ ọrụ biya ma ọ bụghị ihe a na-ahụkarị ịchọta na o nwere mmanya na-egbu egbu karịa nke iwu kwadoro, ya bụ, 3% site na ịdị arọ ma ọ bụ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ 4% site na olu
Iwu South Africa nke 1964 nyere ikike n'oge ahụ

Ugbu a, laa azụ n'afọ ndị 1960, Gọọmentị South Africa kpebiri iji uru ndị na-enweta na obodo site na mmepụta na ire biya Bantu iji kọọghachi maka abamuru nke obodo Bantu na mpaghara ha, hends [sic?], ihe mere Gọọmentụ Akpa ókè agbụrụ ji wuo ụlọ akwụkwọ, ọbá akwụkwọ, ụlọ ọgwụ, ụlọ nwere ọnụ ụlọ anọ maka ụmụ amaala nke ala ahụ, ma nwee ihe ịga nke ọma n'iwepụ obodo Afrịka niile site na Townhomes ha dịka
Old Alberton North (Emagogogweni area) na obodo dị iche iche dịka Katlehong, Thokoza, na Vosloorus (Katorus), nke dị anya site na obodo ndị Europe
Ha wuru ihe ahụ niile site na iji uru nke Bantu Beer

E mepụtara biya Bantu na ọnụahịa nke ihe dị ka centi asatọ (8) ruo na iri (10) kwa galọn ma ree ya n'ụba na ihe dị ka centi iri abụọ (20) na-ahapụ obodo ndị nwere nnukwu uru dị nso na iri (10) ruo na iri na abụọ (12) cents kwa gallon, nke centi abụọ (2) na Gọọmentị etiti dị ka ụtụ isi
Mgbe a na-ere otu galọn biya Europe site na ụlọ ahịa obodo maka oriri na ụlọ ahụ, ego ndị a na-agbakwunye na (а) steeti (dị ka ụtụ isi) - cents 80; na (б) Obodo (dị ka nnukwu akara na-ere) - cants 83
A chọrọ ka obodo kwụọ 80% nke uru ha na-enweta na ire mmanya Europe na Ngalaba nke Bantu Administration maka iji ya mee ihe na mmepe nke ala nna Bantu
Site n'akụkụ ego, o yiri ka ọ ga-abụ ihe siri ike maka ịgba ndị Bantu ume ka ha ṅụọ biya ndị Europe n'ihi na ime nke a, ego buru ibu ga-adị maka uru nke ya na nke mba ahụ
South Africa na-akpata 34% nke ahịa biya nke Africa ma na-atụ anya na ọ ga-eto site na 8o10% kwa afọ n'ime afọ ise na-esote
A na-etinye biya na mba ahụ na lita 60 maka onye ọ bụla na 2012 nke karịrị nkezi 146 nke Africa yana nkezi ụwa nke lita 22

Taa, South African Breweries (SAB) na-achịkwa ọtụtụ n'ime ahịa biya South Africa, yana ma e wezụga ụdị ndị si mba ọzọ dị ka Heineken, Guinness na ndị ọzọ, SAB nwere ma na-emepụta ụdị niile dị na mba ahụ, yana inwe Miller's Genuine Draft (American) na ndepụta ogologo nke ndị ọzọ nke na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ụlọ ọrụ biya nke abụọ kachasị ukwuu n'ụwa
Akara ha kachasị ewu ewu na nke bara uru bụ Carling Black Label, nke bụ biya a na-enye onyinye na mba ahụ na onyinye biya 20 nke mba ụwa na aha ya
Ha na-emepụta mmiri ara ehi Castle, Hansa Pilsner, Castle Lager na Castle Lite
Mmanya biya ndị ọzọ a na-aṅụkarị na South Africa bụ Windhoek Lager, biya si Namibia nke e mere dịka Reinheitsgebot si kwuo, yana Tafel Lager, ihe ọzọ si Namibia
Jo'burg biya, azụmahịa kwụụrụ onwe ya na ihe ọṅụṅụ dị ọnụ ala, na-achịkwa n'etiti ndị na-enweta ego dị ala, ma na-etinye ụtọ nke ịṅụ mmanya ọdịnala
Ọganihu ndị na-adịbeghị anya ahụla mmụba na atụmatụ njem biya nke South Africa

N'ịbụ nke Beer Route malitere, njikọ aka nke ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta mmanya na South Africa, ndị egwuregwu ndị ọzọ abanyela n'ụgbọ iji nyere ndị njem nleta aka iduzi ndị njem nlegharị anya na taprooms na mba ahụ dum
N'otu oge ahụ Kwazulu-Natal nwekwara ngwaahịa a na-eduzi n'ógbè a na-akpọ KZN Craft Revolution
Njem biya bụ ngalaba njem nleta na-eto ngwa ngwa, nke nwere njikọ chiri anya na njem nleta nri ma yie echiche nke ụzọ mmanya
Ọtụtụ obere microbreweries apụtala n'ime iri afọ gara aga, ndị a na-asọ mpi na mpaghara
Ebe mbụ a na-emepụta obere mmanya na mba ahụ bụ Mitchell's Brewery na Knysna
A na-emepụta Mitchell ugbu a dị ka akara nkwekọrịta na Devil's Peak Brewing Company
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2019, e nwere ụlọ ọrụ 211 na-emepụta lita 34 nde biya kwa afọ
Obere mmanya ndị ọzọ dị na Saụt Afrika gụnyere
Mpaghara Western Cape na-akpata ọkara nke microbreweries biya na Saụt Afrika
E nwere nnukwu obodo na-eme mmanya n'obodo ukwu dị iche iche na mba ahụ dum
Ndị na-eme ihe n'ụlọ na-ezukọ kwa ọnwa n'obodo ukwu gụnyere Cape Town, Johannesburg, Port Elizabeth, Durban na Bloemfontein
Ndị isi klọb bụ Wort Hogs (Gauteng), Southyeasters (Cape Town), Durban Homebrewers (Durban), Free State Fermenters (Bloemfontein) na Helderberg Homebrew Club na Somerset West
E nwere ọtụtụ asọmpi mba a na-eme kwa afọ
Nke afọ puku abụọ na iri abụọ na abụọ (2022) hụrụ asọmpi bevPLUS Fools National Club Championship nke emere na Fools and Fans 5 na obere obodo Greyton na Western Cape
Klọb ndị si n'ofe mba ahụ na-asọ mpi megide ibe ha na asọmpi BJCP iji bụrụ klọb kachasị mma na mba ahụ
Helderberg Homebrew Club weghachiri ihe nrite ahụ n'ụlọ maka nkọwa magburu onwe ya nke ụdị ọdịnala; IPA Bekee

Àtụ Beers of the world
Amụrụ Biiyi Afonja bụ onye ọka mmụta ma bụrụ kwa onye Naijiria n'afọ 1935
Ọ lara ezumike ọrụ oyibo na ọkwa prọfesọ nke Statistics na Ngalaba n'akuzi Statistics na Mahadum Ibadan Ọ bụ onye Naijiria mbụ ịbụ Onye isi oche nke African Statistical Association
Ọ malitere njem agụmakwụkwọ ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ All Saints' School, nke dị na Araromi Orita tupu ogafee na Government College, Ibadan maka ịgụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Agụmakwụkwọ ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dị elu kpọgara ya na Mahadum College, Ibadan (nke a n'akpọzị ugbua Mahadum Ibadan dị na Naịjirịa) o nwetere nzere Bsc
na mgbakọ na mwepụ na Mahadum Aberdeen, Scotland nweta kwa Diploma na Statistics na Mahadum nke Wisconsin, USA nweta kwa nzere ukwuu PhD na ọnụ ọgụgụ
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na ọnọdụ ukwuu dị iche iche dị ka Onye isi, Ngalaba nke Statistics na Mahadum Ibadan, Kọmishọna n'ahụ maka Mmụta na oge gara aga na mpaghara odida anyanwu Western State of Nigeria

Omechara bụrụ kwa onye isi oche National Advisory Council on Statistics, bụrụ kwa onye isi oche Governing Council nke Ogun State College of Education na Pro-Chancellor nke Mahadum Ogun State nke ana akpọzi Olabisi Onabanjo University Ago Iwoye Ugbua
Biyi Bandele-Thomas (há mụ̀rụ̀ yá nà áfọ̀ 1967) bụ̀ òdé égwú òmẹ́kà nke ńdị́ mádụ̀ mà kà Biyi Bandele naanị
Há Makarị ya kà onye dị ḿkpà na ọ̀tụ́ ńdị́ Naijiriya nē dé ihnye
Ó kèrè ákwụ́kwọ́ ózí-ọ̀hụ́rụ̀, ózí ígwẹ̀, ònyònyo, na ékwé ńtị̀-ózí

Baya Bouzar (Arabic), nke a maara site na aha egwu Biyouna (بيونة) bụ onye Algeria na-agụ egwu, na-agba egwu, na onye na-eme ihe nkiri a mụrụ na Belcourt, nke a maara ugbu a dịka Belouizdad, Algiers, Algeria

N'inwe mmasị dị ukwuu n'ịbụ abụ, ọ bụ onye otu ọtụtụ ìgwè nke mbụ n'òtù Fadhéla Dziria ebe ọ na-akpọ ụbọ, nke ọzọ ya na onye mmekọ ya Flifla duziri, na n'ikpeazụ nke ya ebe ọ bụ onye isi na-agụ egwú ma bụrụ onye a na-achọ maka oriri agbamakwụkwọ
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri na ụfọdụ n'ime nnukwu cabarets n'obodo ahụ ma mgbe ọ dị afọ 19, ọ malitere ịgba egwú na Copacabana
N'otu afọ ahụ, onye nduzi Mustapha Badie nyere ya akụkụ ịbụ abụ na ihe nkiri ncha mbụ ya, La Grande Maison (afọ 1973), ebe ọ na-eme Fatma
E wepụtara ihe ngosi a site na akwụkwọ akụkọ nke Mohamed Dib
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama n'ihi ọrụ a
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Algeria abụọ Leila na ndị ọzọ, nke Sid Ali Mazif mere n'afọ 1978, na The Neighbor, nke Ghaouti Bendedouche mere n'afọ 2000
O mekwara ihe ngosi ụfọdụ nke otu nwanyị
N'afọ 1999, Nadir Moknèche nyere ya ọrụ Meriem na Madame Osmane's Harem nke o mepụtara na France
Viva Laldjéri sochiri ihe nkiri a n'afọ 2003
N'etiti afọ 2002 na afọ 2005, Biyouna nwere ihe ịga nke ọma na trilogy dabere na isiokwu nke Ramadan a na-akpọ 'Nass Mlah City
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri ikpeazụ nke Nadir Moknèche, Délice Paloma, ebe ọ na-eme ihe nkiri, onye mafia aha ya bụ Madame Aldjeria
N'afọ 2006, ọ rụrụ ọrụ Coryphée na Sophocles' Elektra n'akụkụ Jane Birkin na opera nke Philippe Calvaio duziri
N'afọ 2007, o nwere obere ọrụ na ihe nkiri Algeria Rendez-vous avec le destin
N'afọ 2009, ọ rụrụ La Celestina na Vingtième Théâtre na Paris
Maka Ramadan, afọ 2010, Biyouna bụ otu n'ime kpakpando na sitcom na-agbasa na Nessma TV, Nsibti Laaziza
Ka ọ dịgodị, ọ na-aga n'ihu n'ọrụ ịbụ abụ ya ma n'afọ 2001 wepụta ndekọ abọm Raid Zone, nke ya na onye na-ede egwu John Bagnolett mepụtara
Mgbe ihe ịga nke ọma nke ndekọ abọm a na ntinye aka ya na Jérome Savary's Opéra de Casbah, ọ wepụtara abọm ọzọ a na-akpọ Blonde dans la casbah
Ọ nọ na-eme atụmatụ abọm a ruo oge ụfọdụ
Biyouna were oge ya, jiri nlezianya họrọ ihe ndekọ Franco-Algeria nke nyochara ọdịbendị abụọ ahụ
Ya na di ya na ụmụ anọ bi na mpaghara Algiers
Bizunesh Mohammed Urgesa (amụrụ ya ka ọnwa junuu dị n' iri na asatọ n'afọ 1989 na Negele Arsi, Oromia Region) bụ onye Etiopia na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge nke na-asọ mpi na marathon
Ọ malitere dị ka onye na-agba ọsọ mita 800 na 1500
Ọ gbara ọsọ na ihe omume ikpeazụ na 2005 bụ ọsọ champịọnshipu ndị na-eto eto na ụwa, wee merie ọla nchara, na-etinye ihe kacha mma nke onwe ya nke 4 1934 nkeji
Na 2005 Afirika Junịọ Atịletiki Champịọnshipu, ọ gbara onye nke ise na 800 m ma bụrụ onye nwetara ọlaọcha na 1500 m

O mere ihe ngosi mba ụwa mbụ ya afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, na-agwụ na 14th n'ọsọ obere na 2007 IAAF World Cross Country Championships, na-enyere ndị otu ụmụ agbọghọ Etiopia aka inweta ọla nchara n'akụkụ Sule Utura, Genzebe Dibaba na Abebu Gelan

N'ịtụgharị n'okporo ụzọ ahụ, ọ kpara ike site na-isetịpụrụ ihe kacha mma maka ọnọdụ nke atọ na 1500mita na CAA Grand Prix na Brazzaville na Mee, mana ọ malitere ilekwasị anya n'ebe dị anya na Europe track and field circuit n'ọnwa ndị sochirinụ
N'ọnwa Julaị ahụ, o setịpụrụ mita 5000 kacha mma nke 15 1490 na Liège tupu ọ gbaa ọsọ mita 3000 kacha mma nke 9 0208 na Zaragoza n'ụbọchị abụọ n'ihu
Ihe mepụta na Memorial van Damme bu ụzọ pụta na 2007 IAAF World Athletics Final, ebe ọ gbara onye nke itoolu na 3000 m

N'afọ ikpeazụ ya nke na-elekwasị anya naanị na arụmọrụ egwu, ọ meziwanyere 3000 m kachasị mma ya ruo 8 5314 na Rabat Meeting wee gaa n'ihu merie ọlaọcha 3000 m na 2008 World Junior Championships in Athletics, na-agwụcha n'azụ Mercy Cherono
Ọ bịara nke atọ na mita 10,000 na asọmpi ndị Etiopia na 2009, mana ọ malitere ime mgbanwe na ịgba ọsọ n'okporo ụzọ mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị
O mere ihe n'okporo ụzọ nke mbụ ya na Dam tot Damloop na Zaandam na ọnwa Sepụtemba ahụ wee gbaa onye nke isii na ọsọ kilomita iri

Urgesa gbara ọsọ okporo ụzọ mbụ ya otu ọnwa ka gasịrị wee Mmeri Ashu Kasim iji nwee mmeri mbụ ya n'ọsọ okporo ụzọ na Istanbul Ọ meziwanyere ihe kachasị mma ya maka anya ruo 2 31 09 site na mmeri nke abụọ na Mumbai Marathon na Jenụwarị n'afọ 2010
Ọ mechara nke asaa n'ọsọ okporo ụzọ na Parisi wee bịa nke anọ mgbe ọ laghachiri na asọmpi Istanbul
Njem nke abụọ na Mumbai wetakwara mmechuihu, ebe ọ na-enweghị ike ịgbapụta aha ya ma mechie asọmpi ahụ n'ọnọdụ nke ise
Beirut Marathon na Nọvemba hụrụ ya na-agba ọsọ ọsọ karịa ihe ndekọ gara aga, ọ bụ ezie na ọ mechara bụrụ onye nke abụọ na Seada Kedir
Björk Guðmundsdóttir (21 Novemba 1965), márá kà Björk, bụ onye Aisland na kwu egwu ne de ábụ
Àgwà égwú ya di íchè na ó nwe máud mara ya na egwu rock, jazz, egwu nkwa elektriki, egwu ndi ichie, na egwu omenala
Ukwe àtọ́ Björk bàrà na Usoro Egwu 10 nke UK mgbe afọ-dum 90
Ọ̀jíkọ́ Egwu ọ́ nọ̀ sì nà mgbe ó rùtèrè áfọ̀ 2003 Björk rèrè ikpo-ukwe rúrú ńdè 15 nà ụ̀wà nile

Ó gbálìrì Ònyìnyé BRIT nke ànọ́, Ònyìnyé Ihunuche Ukwe MTV nke ànọ́ kwa, ótù Ònyìnyé MOJO, Ònyìnyé Ihunuche Ukwe UK nke àtọ́, na màkà 'ábụ̀ ukwe ya rúríté mkpụrụ óbì, ndọkwasi ihnye ukwe na ólú ya di íchè' ọ́ gbálìrì Ònyìnyé Ihnye Eze nke Nka ndi Suwidinu
Há kpàtụ̀kwàrà Björk màkà Ònyìnyé Grammy 13
Bjerknes Centre for Climate Research bụ ụlọ ọrụ nyocha ihu igwe na Bergen, Norway
Ebe ndị dị mkpa nke nyocha bụ mgbanwe okike na usoro ụwa na mgbanwe ihu igwe nke mmadụ mere
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-ejikọta ihe ndị a hụrụ na ihe ọmụmụ nke ógé gara-aga, ugbu a na ọdịnihu
A na-amụ ma mpaghara Global na Polar
A malitere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'afọ 2000 ma bụrụ mmekọrịta dị n'etiti Mahadum Bergen, Institute of Marine Research, Nansen Environmental and Remote Sensing Center na NORCE (nke bụbu Uni Research)
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ akụkụ nke Research Council of Norway's Centre of Excellence program site n'afo 2003 ruo 2013
Eystein Jansen duziri ụlọ ọrụ ahụ site n'afo 2000 ruo 2013, mgbè nke ahụ gasịrị Tore Furevik bụ ónyé nduzi
Ndị nchọpụta sitere na Bjerknes Centre esonyewo na Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change assessment reports; Eystein Jansen dị ka otu n'ime ndị édémédé na akụkọ nke anọ
A na-akpọ ya aha Vilhelm Bjerknes na nwa ya nwoke Jacob Bjerkne, bụ ndị méré ọtụtụ ihe iji chọta omume nke ógè a nke ịkọ ọdịnihu ihu igwe
Blọọgà ma obu Blooga, Blogger bu onye akuko edeme nke na eji entanet ede ihe n'ime na ala
Ma obu dee ihe basara ezi n'ulo ya
Nke a bu blọọgàs ma obu bloogas, bloogas nke si n'ala Igbo
Nkea bu Blọọgàs ma obu Bloogas, Bloggers nke Naigeria
Aha nna Blaauw (Dutch pronunciation ) sitere Dutch
Ọ bụ mkpụrụ okwu ochie nke Dutch blauw nke oge a, nke pụtara acha anụnụ anụnụ

Nke a nwere ike izo aka na akpụkpọ ahụ na-acha ntụ ntụ, anya, ma ọ bụ uwe nke onye mbụ bu aha ahụ ma ọ bụ aha nna nwere ike ịbụ metonymic, dịka ọmụmaatụ na-ezo aka na dyer ma ọ bụ onye na-emepụta bluing na igwe ihe
Ndị nwere aha a gụnyere
Angela Renée White (amuru na May 11, 1988), amara amara dika Blac Chyna, bu ihe nlere America na onye n'otu n'otu
Ọ malitere ịbụ onye a ma ama na 2010 dị ka stunt okpukpu abụọ maka Nicki Minaj na vidiyo egwu maka egwu ' Monster ' nke Kanye West dere

Ọ nwetara nlebara anya mgbasa ozi ka ukwuu mgbe aha-aha-dọrọ na song ' Miss Me ' site Drake n'otu afọ ahụ, na-eduga na ọnụ ọgụgụ nke magazin ngosi, gụnyere iberibe na Dimepiece, Straight Stuntin na Black Men's Magazine
N'afọ 2014, ọ malitere ika etemeete nke ya, 'Lashed by Blac Chyna', na ụlọ ịcha mma na Encino, Los Angeles
O meela ka ọ pụta ìhè ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi, gụnyere na ihe ngosi telivishọn nke ya n'ezie, Rob & Chyna na The Real Blac Chyna
A mụrụ Angela Renee White na May 11, 1988, nye Shalana Hunter na Eric Holland na Washington, DC Ọ malitere ịkwapụ na Maryland iji kwụọ ụgwọ akwụkwọ kọleji ya
Mgbe ọ na-aga Mahadum Johnson & Wales na Miami, Florida, ọ maliteghachiri ịkwapụ, mechaa kwụsị n'ike ọgwụgwụ, mgbe ọ dakwasịrị ụra ugboro ugboro na klaasị
Ọ malitere ilekwasị anya n'iwepụ ihe na ime ihe ngosi, na-ewere aha Blac Chyna na ntụnye onye ahịa dịka aha ọkwa

Mgbe a na-eyipụ ihe na Eze nke diamonds, ụlọ ọgbakọ Miami na-ewu ewu, ọdịdị Chyna na-adịghị ahụkebe na 'iche' mere ka ọ bụrụ ewu ewu; Onye na-elekọta redio Angela Yee kọwara ya dị ka 'onye ga-abụ onye a ma ama' N'afọ 2010, Drake tụbara ya na 'Miss Me'
Ọkwa ewu ewu ya na-arị elu dugara n'ịhazi ọrụ na mkpuchi nke Dimepiece, Straight Stuntin na akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị nwoke ojii
Mgbe afọ ahụ gasịrị, a tụbara ya dị ka Nicki Minaj si stunt okpukpu abụọ na egwu 'Monster' nke Kanye West
N'ime oge ọrụ ya niile, Chyna emeela ọtụtụ ọrụ ịwa ahụ maka ịgbatị buttock na nkwalite ara, mana a wakwara ya ahụ iji belata nha obi ya
Na February 2013, ọ debanyere aha na JLS Professional Make Up Artist School
Na Disemba 2013, ọ malitere ụlọ ahịa ịntanetị ya, '88fin', jupụtara na uwe ọhụrụ na ngwaahịa sitere na ahịrị uwe ya nke otu aha
N'ọnwa ahụ, ọ malitere ụdị nku anya nrapado nke ya, 'Lashed by Blac Chyna'
Na February 2014, ọ zụtara ụlọ mmanya mara mma na Encino, Los Angeles, nke na-enye nkuzi etemeete
Kemgbe 2016, ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi telivishọn n'ezie, gụnyere E! 's Keeping Up with the Kardashians, na ihe ngosi eziokwu nke ya na enyi nwoke Rob Kardashian, Rob & Chyna, nakwa na E! netwọk
N'afọ 2019, ọ gbara egwu na The Real Blac Chyna na Zeus Network
Ọ pụtakwara na Tokyo Toni's Finding Love ASAP!, na ịhụnanya VH1 & Hip Hop Hollywood
Na Disemba 2011, Chyna pụtara na vidiyo egwu maka egwu ' Rack City ' nke onye rapper Tyga ; O kwuwo na Tyga gwara ya ka o sonyere ya na njem nlegharị anya n'afọ ahụ, ma ọ jụrụ
Ha malitere ịlụ na Disemba 2011, wee mụọ nwa nwoke, King Cairo Stevenson, na October 2012

Ha kewara na 2014 mgbe Tyga malitere mmekọrịta na Kylie Jenner, na-eduga n'ọtụtụ esemokwu mgbasa ozi ọha na eze n'etiti Chyna na Jenner nke kwụsịrị mgbe Chyna malitere ịlụ nwanne Jenner, Rob Kardashian, na 2016
Na Nọvemba 2016 ọ mụrụ nwa ha nwanyị, Dream Renée Kardashian
Na Disemba 2016, Kardashian kwupụtara na post Instagram ya na ya na Chyna kewara
Ha mere ka ụbọchị ole na ole gachara, mana kewapụrụ ọzọ na February 2017
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2017, Kardashian biputere foto ndị na-akpali agụụ mmekọahụ nke Chyna na soshal midia, na-eduga na Chyna nwetara iwu mgbochi nwa oge megide ya
BlackByrd bụ onye so mmadụ atọ ndị pop nke obodo South Africa sitere na Cape Town
E guzobere na 2012, otu ahụ ugbu a nwere Tarryn Lamb, Axene Chaberski na Tamsyn Maker
Ụda BlackByrdī na-agbanye mgbọrọgwụ na pop-country na ballads banyere ịhụnanya na obi mgbawa
E guzobere òtù ahụ mgbe Tarryn Lamb biputara mgbasa ozi na Gumtree na 2012, na-achọ ndị egwu ndị ọzọ ịmalite otu ụmụ nwanyị niile
N'ime ọnwa ole na ole, EMI bịanyere aka na ha wee wepụta abọm mbụ ha, Strong
BlackByrd ewepụtala abọm studio abụọ ma rụọ ọrụ dịka ihe mmeghe maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri mba ụwa, dị ka Mike + The Mechanics, Patrizio Buanne na Jamiroquai
Ha enwetala ihe nrite egwu South African abụọ maka egwu ha, gụnyere Best Duo ma ọ bụ Group Award

Oké ifufe ojii, nkè a na-akpọ Kali Andhi, Kali Nheri na South Asia (Hindi, Punjabi, Urdu, nké pụtara n'ụzọ nkịtị Oké ifufe Ojii) bụ ajọ uzuzu na-eme na ngwụcha ógè opupu ihe ubi n'akụkụ ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ nkè mpaghara Indo-Gangetic Plain nkè mpaghara India
Ha na-adịkarị mkpụmkpụ, mana ha nwèrè ike igbochi anyanwụ, belata anya nke ukwuu ma kpatara mmebi na mmerụ ahụ
Ha bụ ihe na-ebute ụzọ na mbata nkè mmiri ozuzo na mbara ala ndị dị n'ebe ugwu
Ọ bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị na Punjab na ọzara Cholistan na Thar na Pakistan na Rajasthan na India
Blacka Di Danca bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, ónyé na-eme ihe nkírí na ónyé na-ede ihe nkírí
Blacka na-agagharị mgbè niile na United States, Europe, Canada, Asia, Russia, Central na South America
Nkà Blacka emeela ka ya na ụfọdụ n'ime aha ndị kachasị elu na ụlọ ọrụ egwu rụọ ọrụ
O meela ihe nkiri ma gosipụta na vidiyo egwu màkà Major Lazer, Rvssian, J Balvin, Farruko, Shenseea, Tyga, Janet Jackson, Nicky Jam, Anuel AA, Rihanna, Cardi B, El Alfa, Drake, A$AP Rocky, na Davido
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ màkà njem ụwa nke Farruko na Luis Fonsi

Dị ka ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri, ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ afọ na kọntaktị na ememme, na-apụta na kpakpando dịka Janet Jackson, Daddy Yankee, Farruko, Rihanna, Skrillex, Diplo, Kiesza, Nyla na Collie Buddz, ndị ya na ha gara ọtụtụ afọ
Blacka bụ ugbu a ónyé mbụ na naanị ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri dancehall na-arụkọ ọrụ na nnukwu ihe ọṅụṅụ Red Bull
E gosipụtara Blacka na The New York Times, The Jamaica Star, The Jamaica Gleaner, The Source magazine mà gosipụta na BET, MTV, Fuse TV na CBS TV
A mụrụ ya mà zụlite ya na Brooklyn, New York, Blacka tolitere n'ezinụlọ Caribbean na Crown Heights
Dancehall, reggae, soca na egwu calypso abụwo akụkụ nke ndụ ya
N'afọ 2003, ọ chọpụtara Passa Passa kwa izu na-eme emume dancehall nkè a na-eme na Kingston, Jamaica
Ụlọ ahịa dị na Brooklyn na mbido afọ 2000 na-ere ma gosipụta Passa Passa DVDS
Blacka mụtara banyéré omenala okporo ámá dancehall site n'anya ndị na-agba egwú na Deejays na-agakarị nnọkọ
Passa Passa DVD gosipụtara ijè egwu, ejiji, egwu na okwu ndị bịara na omenala okporo ámá dancehall
Site na 2003 na 2007, Blacka na-eme oriri kwa abalị na klọb na ihe omume okporo ámá site na Brooklyn, The Bronx, Queens, Manhattan na Staten Island n'ihi na ọ na-eme onwe ya aha
Na mbido afọ 2008, e debara aha ya na nké mbụ ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ ọkachamara na Virginia dị ka ónyé na-agba egwu màkà oriri abalị

Kemgbe afọ 2013, Blacka anọwo na ngụkọta nke njem ụwa irí na isii n'onwe ya n'ihe karịrị ọbọdọ irí asatọ na isé na mba irí anọ nà otu nke gụnyere United States, Poland, Russia, Siberia, Italy, France, Germany, Belgium, Sweden, Mexico, Spain, Finland, Norway, Lithuania, Romania, Czech Republic, Slovakia, Canada, Austria, Switzerland, Portugal, Argentina, Denmark, Colombia, United Kingdom, Brazil, Cyprus, Ecuador, Singapore, Romania, Puerto Rico, Netherlands, Norway, India, Trinidad, Bolivia, Bolivia, Costa Rica, Greece, Lebanon na Malaysia

Ahmedu Augustine Obiabo (amụrụ na Ogwule, Agatu, Benue Steeti, Naijiria), nke aha ya bụ Blackface Naija ma ọ bụ naanị Blackface, bụ onye na-agba egwu na Naijiria, ragga, onye na-agụ reggae, na onye na-ede egwu
A maara ya nke ọma dị ka onye so dee 'African Queen' na 2Baba, abụ nke onye nke ikpeazụ mere ka ọ bụrụ onye ama ama mgbe ọ pụtara na abọm izizi ya bụ Face 2 Face n'afọ 2004 iji bụrụ egwu mba ụwa
Blackface bụ onye guzobere otu egwu Naịjirịa Plantashun Boyz nke ya na 2Baba na onye egwu Chibuzor Oji (nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Faze) guzobere n'afọ 2000
Blackface na 2Baba zutere n'oge agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Benue
Faze sonyeere obere oge mgbe e mesịrị na Enugu
Ndị otu ahụ wepụtara abọm abụọ gara nke ọma Body and Soul na 2000 na Sold Out na 2003
Ndị otu ahụ gbawara n'afọ 2004, ka ha zukọta obere oge n'afọ 2007 maka naanị otu abọm ọzọ Plan B
Ọ bụ ezie na ya na Faze nwere mmekọrịta na-adịgide adịgide, esemokwu ya na 2Baba mụbara, ọkachasị maka ikike nke abụ 'African Queen'
Mgbe Plantashun Boiz kewara na 2004, Blackface duziri ọrụ egwu naanị ya
O wepụtara abọm hip hop Ghetto Child na Mee 2004 na-arụkọ ọrụ na ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe
Abọm ahụ nwere 'Hard Life' nke gosipụtara Alabai dị ka egwu mbụ
O dekwara abọm zuru ezu maka ndị ọrụ ya D Tribunal nke a kpọrọ What We Are
Mgbe Ghetto Child gasịrị, ọ wepụtara Evergreen, Jungle Fever, Me, Musiq and I, Dancehall Business, na onye na-atụ anya Defender
N'afọ 2013, ya na Maine Eazz mere abọm 200
Blackface lụrụ Dayo afọ asatọ ma nwee ụmụ abụọ, Caroline na Alex
Di na nwunye ahụ kwetara ikewa, na-echere usoro ịgba alụkwaghịm
Efemena Mukoro, onye a maara dịka Blackmagic, bụ onye Naijiria na-eti egwu, onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu
Blackmagic bụ onye Delta Steeti mana amụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Lagos
Ọ gara King's College, Lagos maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya ma gụọ Sayensị Kọmputa na Mahadum Benin
Blackmagic hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ iji gbasoo ọrụ egwu ya wee malite n'okpuru aha ogbo, Ejay
Ọ bịanyere aka na Lynxxx's Syndik8 ndekọ na 2010 dị ka onye egwu Soul na Afrobeat
Ọ gara n'ihu wepụta ọtụtụ egwu na abọm izizi ya akpọrọ Blackmagic 10 na 2011; ọ nwetara ewu ewu na egwu ya akpọrọ 'Confam' nke gosipụtara Sasha P
Otú ọ bịara bụrụ onye a ma ama mgbe a tọhapụrụ egwu ahụ, 'Repete' na 2013
A kọwara 'Repete' dị ka otu n'ime egwu ndị Naịjirịa nwere otuto kachasị mma
A na-ewere ya dị ka onye ọsụ ụzọ nke ihe nkiri ọzọ nke Naijiria
Ọ gbanwere aha ọgbọ ya ka oge na-aga na Ejay Blackmagic na naanị Blackmagic mgbe ọ na-apụ na ndekọ Syndik8
Ọ gara n'ihu ịmalite akara ndekọ nke ya, Dabere na Nkwenkwe na 2013
Blackwater bụ ụdị mmetọ a na-emepụta na nkwadebe coal
N'ime ime ka ọ dị ọcha, a na-egbutu coal n'ụlọ ọrụ na-akwadebe coal wee kewaa ya ma buru ya dị ka slurry coal, Site na slurry, a na'iwepụ ihe ndị na-adịghị agba ọkụ ma nwee ike ịhazi coal
MMgbe mgbake nke coal ahụ site na slurry a, mmiri fọdụrụnụ bụ oji, nwere ezigbo ahụ nke coal
Enweghị ike ịhazi mmiri ojii a n'ebe a na-edozi mmiri?]
Mgbochi maka nchekwa nke mmiri ojii na ihe mkpofu coal ndị ọzọ nwere akụkọ ihe mere eme na-enwe nsogbu na-enwekarị nnukwu nsonaazụ gburugburu ebe obibii

N'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1972, a tọhapụrụ ihe mgbochi mmiri atọ na-ejide ngwakọta nke coal slurry na Logan County, West Virginia n'usoro US gallons Otu narị nde na iri atọ (490,000 m3) nke mmiri na-egbu egbu na Buffalo Creek Flood
Dị ka a tụlere n'akwụkwọ The Buffalo Creek Flood An Act of Man, n'ime mmadụ 5,000, mmadụ 125 nwụrụ, 1,121 merụrụ ahụ, na ihe karịrị Puku anọ enweghị ebe obibi
Idei mmiri ahụ kpatara mmebi nde dollar iri ise
N'agbanyeghị ihe akaebe nke ileghara anya, ụlọ ọrụ Pittston Coal Company, nke nwere mmiri ahụ, kpọrọ ihe omume ahụ 'Omume Chineke'

N'afọ 2002, ndagwurugwu dị mita 900 (270 ) n'ịdị elu, mita puku abuo (610 m) n'ogologo jupụtara na Lyburn, West Virginia dara ma gbadaa n'ime ọdọ mmiri dị n'akụkụ mkpịsị ụkwụ nke jupụtara, na-emepụta nnukwu ebili mmiri na sediment nke bibiri ọtụtụ ụgbọala na ụlọ
Ihe ngwọta kachasị maka nsogbu mmiri ojii bụ ịhazi coal na-enweghị iji mmiri
Nkà na ụzụ nkewa mmiri dị otú ahụ na-emepe emepe
Blaha Ben Ziane (1953 -2 Mee 2021) bụ onye Algeria na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1953, Ziane malitere itinye aka na nka kemgbe ọ banyere na Institute of Acting na Oran na Kaddour Ben Khamsa n'afọ 1972 na 1973, wee sonye na Oran Festival
Ọrụ mbụ ya pụtara na telivishọn n'afọ 1974

Ọ rụrụ ọtụtụ ọrụ na ọchị, ọkachasị ọrụ ya na usoro 'Ashour El Acher', (Achour The Tenth), onye ọrụ ya bụ Saleh Oqrut, nke a maara dịka 'Al-Nouri', yana ọrụ ya na زنجیر 'Jami Family' dịka 'Ndị isi nke onye agbata obi Jami', nke yiri ọrụ ya na ndị Sultan Ashour nke Iri, onye maara ya nke ọma ma bụrụ ọrụ kachasị mma
Balaha na-arụkwa ọrụ n'elu ikpo okwu, otu n'ime ọrụ ihe nkiri ya a ma ama bụ 'The Apples' nke Abdelkader Alloula
Blaise Kilizou Abalo (1947 - 16 Ọktoba 2013), bụ onye nduzi, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri, na onye na-ede ihe nkiri na Togo
A maara ya nke ọma maka iduzi akụkọ ifo mbụ nke Togo na sinima Togo, Kawilasi
Ọ bụkwa ọkà n'akparamàgwà mmadụ, onye nkuzi na onye nduzi site na ọzụzụ
A mụrụ Abalo n'afọ 1947 na Kanianboua, Togo
Ọ lụrụ nwanyị Burkinabe ma bụrụ nna nke ụmụ ise
Ọ nwụrụ na 16 Ọktoba afọ 2013 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri isii na isii ka ọ rịachara ọrịa kansa ogologo oge
Mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu, Abalo chọpụtara nka nke asaa, ọkachasị site na ihe nkiri Hindi na ihe nkiri Kpèlèbé
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ gụrụ maka ịme ihe nkiri ma mesịa gụsịrị akwụkwọ na iwu na akparamaagwa
Mgbe ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi site na 1978 ruo 1981 na Mahadum Ouagadougou
Ka ọ dịgodị, ya na African Institute for Film Education na Burkina Faso jikọrọ aka
Na Jenụwarị 1977, ọ duziri ihe nkiri mbụ ya 10 ans de pouvoir du Président Éyadéma (na afọ iri nke Onye isi ala Eyadema)
A họpụtakwara ya dị ka onye enyemaka nke onye isi nke CINEATO, nke a maara ugbu a dị ka CNPA
Ka ọ dịgodị, ọ malitere izi ihe na National Pedagogical Institute IPN, ugbu a dị ka DIFOP
Site n'iji ihe ọmụma ya dị ka ọkà n'akparamàgwà mmadụ, ọ malitere iduzi ihe nkiri
Ọ malitere ọrụ sinima ya n'afọ 1976 site na imepụta ihe nkiri a na-akpọ 10 ans de pouvoir du Président Eyama, nke a chụrụ ya ruo n'afọ 2009
N'afọ 1992, ọ duziri ihe nkiri Kawilasi, nke mere akụkọ ihe mere eme dị ka akụkọ ifo mbụ nke Togo na sinima Togo
N'afọ 1995, ihe nkiri ahụ ritere ihe nrite pụrụ iche nke mmepe mmadụ na-adịgide adịgide na Panafrican Film and Television Festival nke Ouagadougou (FESPACO)
Mgbe ahụ, o mere ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri a ma ama dịka Coopération Franco-Togolaise, La révolte de l'ombre, Le cri du silence, Le mirage de l'espoir, na Le prix du vélo
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ duziri usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn iri na anọ, Dikanakou (Le sida) nke a ma ama na Togo
Blaise Musipère (a mụrụ na 15 Mee 1986 na Kinshasa) bụ onye Congolese na-eme ihe nkiri na onye bụbu onye na-egwu basketball
N'ịbụ onye a manyere ịhapụ mba ya n'ihi agha obodo, ọ bịarutere Brazil, ebe ọ lanarịrị na-arụ ọrụ dị iche iche ruo mgbe o mechara nwee ike ịmalite ọrụ ime ihe nkiri
'Bailly Larinette Tatah (amuru 8 Ọgọst 1995), onye amara aha ya dị ka Blanche Bailly bụ onye Cameroonian Afro na-abụ abụ na onye na-ede abụ

Mpụta mbụ official single 'Kam we stay ewepụtara na August 2016 hụrụ ka a nabata ya n'ime egwu na kemgbe ahụ, ọ na-abụ abụ mgbe hits maka onye na-agụ egwú taa na-eme ememe dị ka otu n'ime Africa kasị mma

Amụrụ na Kumba na South West Region nke Cameroon n'ime ezinụlọ okpukpe, Blanche gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Sacred Heart Kumba South-West mpaghara wee mechaa gụọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Baptist Secondary School-Kang Barombi na Diligent Bilingual College-Kumba tupu ya na Ezinụlọ ya kwaga France mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ ebe ọ gara n'ihu na-amụ ihe
Ọnụnọ ya na France baara onye na-agụ egwú uru n'ihi na o ji ya n'ụgwọ ahụ n'ihi na ọ na-asụ asụsụ abụọ
Mgbe ọ nọ na France, o kpebiri ịchụso ebum n'obi ya na ihe mgbaru ọsọ ya nke ịghọ onye na-eme egwuregwu na onye na-edekọ ihe
Ọ mèchàrà kwaga UK
N'October 2018, Blanche Bailly sonyeere onye ama ama dị ka; Mr
Leo, Daphné, Minks, Pit Barccardi, Magasco na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ na egwu udo; Anyị chọrọ udo nke Salatiel maka nsogbu na-aga n'ihu na mpaghara Anglophone nke Cameroon
Blanche Bilongo (amuru 26 Jenụwarị 1974) bụ onye omee ihe nkiri Cameroon, onye na-ede ihe nkiri, na onye nduzi ihe nkiri
Bilongo sitere na mpaghara etiti Cameroon
Ọ gara kọleji Johnson na Yaoundé wee mee ballet
N'afọ 1987, ọ malitere ịga mgbatị ahụ maka otu ihe nkiri André Bang's Les Pagayeurs na ahịrị n'isi maka ọrụ nwanyị bụ isi
Otu ụbọchị, mgbe onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-anọghị, Bilongo weere ọnọdụ ya na ọrụ ya mere ka onye ọ bụla kwenye
Bilongo sonyeere ndị otu ahụ
Akpọrọ Bilongo onye Knight of the Order of Valor na Mee 2015, na-agbaso atụmatụ nke Minista Arts na Culture Narcisse Mouelle Kombi
N'afọ 2019, Bilongo wepụtara otu mbụ ya, 'Le temps de Dieu'
A buru abụ a na asụsụ Beti ma raara abụ hụ nye nne ya nwụrụ anwụ
Na 2020, ọ gbara egwu dị ka Marie Young na ihe nkiri ịhụnanya Coup de Foudre à Yaoundé
Blanketị ịgbado ọkụ bụ ihe nchekwa e mere iji chebe ngwá ọrụ na onye na-agbanye ọkụ mgbe a na-agbakọta ya
Ihe mkpuchi na-agbanye ndị mmadụ n'ihe banyere ụkpụrụ ndị ziri ezi ntụziaka oriri ọkụ na-enwekarị ihe mkpuchi na'agbanwe agbanwe nke nwere vermiculite na-agbasaghị agbasa na ihe na-eguzogide okpomọkụ
Mgbe a na-emetụ ya aka site na ịpịpụta ígwè a gbazere agbaze n'oge usoro ịgbado ọkụ, ihe ahụ na-echebe mpaghara ndị gbara ya gburugburu site n'ịnọgide na-eguzosi ike n'ezi ihe nke blanket ahụ
A na-eji fiberglass na-egbochi ire ọkụ eme ọtụtụ blanket welding nke oge a ma nwee ike iguzo n'ọnọdụ okpomọkụ na-arụ ọrụ site na 300 ruo 2,500 degrees Fahrenheit
N'akụkọ ihe mere eme, a na-eji asbestos a kpara akpa eme blanket, agbanyeghị, a kwụsịrị ya n'ọtụtụ ebe n'ihi nchegbu nchekwa
blanketị ewu, ma ọ bụ uwe ewu, bụ blanketị ma ọ bụ mkpuchi uwe eji eme ka ewu dị ọkụ, ma ọ bụrụ na ọ bụghị ihe nchebe pụọ na ihu igwe

Ha nwere ike ịdịgasị iche site na mkpuchi nke ụwa họrọ site n'ime ụmụ ndị ákwà dị mfe, na uwe a na-etinye n'ụzọ pụrụ iche nke na-ekpuchi n'ụzọ dị nchebe gburugburu ahụ na olu, ebe ọ ka na-enye ohere ka anụmanụ ahụ na-agagharị n'enweghị nsogbu
Ọtụtụ ewu na-emepụta ajị anụ siri ike n'ọnwa ọdịda, mana ụdị ewu ụfọdụ anaghị eme, yabụ na ha chọrọ nchebe mpụga
Blaoui Houari (23 J
3Jenụwarị 1926 na 19 Julaị 2017) bụ onye Algeria na-agụ egwu, na-ede egwu na onye nduzi
N'oge ọrụ ya, o dekọrọ ihe karịrnarị itoolugwu 900 ma wepụta ihe otu narị rị 100 abọm
A mụrụ Blaoui Houari na 23 Jenụwarị 1926 na Oran, Western Algeria, mgbe ahụ French Algeria
Nna ya, onye nwere ụlọ mmanya na Oran, na-akpọ Kwitra
Houari hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ iji rụọ ọrụ maka nna ya
Houari malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-agụ egwú na onye na-ede egwú n'afọ 1940, mgbe mbụ ọ kụrụ egwu na agbamakwụkwọ na emume ibi úgwù
O dekwara egwu ma kpọọ piano, guitar, mandolin na accordion
O weputara abọm mbụ ya n'afọ 1955, nke gụnyere egwu Benyekhlef Boutaleb bụ Rani Mīhayer N'afọ 1986, o wepụtara Dikrayat Wahran, abọm banyere Oran
N'oge ọrụ ya, o dekọrọ ihe karịrị egwu narị itoolu ma wepụta ihe karịrị otu narị abọm
Ya na Ahmed Wahby, Houari guzobere El Asri, ụdị egwu nke jikọtara egwu ọdịnala Arab na rhythm Bedouin na asụsụ Oranian
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ọ gbanwere uri Abdelkader El-Khaldi ka ọ bụrụ abụ
N'oge Agha Algeria, ndị agha France jidere Houari ma jide ya na Sig maka abụ ya na-akwado Algeria
Mgbe Algeria ghọrọ mba nwere onwe ya na 1962, ọ ghọrọ onye isi nke ụlọ ọrụ redio na telivishọn ọha na eze nke Oran
N'afọ 1970, ọ duziri ndị Algeria National Orchestra na Expo '70 na Osaka, Japan
Houari nwụrụ na 19 Julaị 2017 na Oran, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri itoolu na otu
E liri ya na ili ozu Ain El Beida nke Oran
A na-ewere Houari dị ka 'onye bu ụzọ egwu raï'
N'ezie, egwu ya metụtara ọtụtụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri raï, gụnyere Khaled, onye kpuchiri ụfọdụ egwu ya, yana Houari Benchenet na Cheb Mami
Blaq Diamond (nke a na-akpọ BlaQ Diamond) bụ ndị South African Afro pop duo si Ladysmith KwaZulu-Natal
Ha zutere na afo 2010 na njem ụlọ akwụkwọ ebe ha abụọ sonyere na cypher egwu na bọs ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ha na arụ ọrụ na ndekọ labelụ Ambitiouz Entertainment, na-ewepụta abọm mbụ ha Inqola (2017), nke ghọrọ nọmba iTunes mbụ ha
Ndị otu a bu ụzọ bụrụ ndị a ma ama maka egwu ha 'Ibhanoyi' wepụtara n'afọ 2019, nke natara 'SAMA Record of the year'
Abọm studio nke abụọ ha bụ Umuthi (2020), mepụtara platinum abụọ na-ere egwu 'Ibhanoyi' na 'Love Letter'

N'afọ 2010, ha zutere mgbe ha nọ na njem ụlọ akwụkwọ ebe ha sonyere na rap cypher na bọs ụlọ akwụkwọ wee malite itinyekwu oge ọnụ, na-ekere òkè na ọrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ nke mere ka a mara ha na obodo na gburugburu obodo
Ha abụọ kpebiri ịkwaga Johannesburg maka atụmanya egwu ka mma nke siri ike na mbụ dịka, n'amaghị onye ọ bụla, manyere ha inweta ọrụ iji nweta ego nke eji kwado ọchịchọ egwu ha
Ná mmalite afọ 2017, ha abụọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ na Ambitiouz Entertainment wee malite ịrụ ọrụ na abọm mbụ
N'abalị iri na itoolu nke ọnwa Juun, ewepụtara egwu 'Sthandwa' nke abọm ha sochiri egwu nke abụọ 'Emzini kaBaba' nke ya na vidiyo egwu
N'oge oyi nke afọ 2017, ha wepụtara abọm mbụ ha bụ Inqola iji nweta otuto dị egwu
Abọm ahụ bụ ngwakọta nke Afro-soul na Maskandi na umBhaqanga fusion nke ha mere ka ụda nke oge a na nke ntorobịa
Na 24th South African Music Awards, ha nwetara nhọpụta SAMA Awards abụọ
N'afọ 2018, ha mere ihe nkiri nke mbụ na Piertermaritzburg nke otu ihe omume obodo kpọrọ ka ha mee ihe ngosi ejiji
Na Mee 2, afọ 2019, ewepụtara egwu ha 'Memeza' nke gosipụtara Sjava, dị ka egwu mbụ nke abọm
Egwu a ruru ọnụ ọgụgụ nke 9 na Radio Airplay Charts
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2, ewepụtara egwu ha nke abụọ 'Ibhanoyi'
Egwu ahụ ruru ọnụ ọgụgụ otu na chaatị iTunes
Na mmemme nke iri abụọ na isii nke South African Music Awards, 'Ibhanoyi' meriri Record of the Year
Na Jenụwarị 23, afọ 2020, ewepụtara egwu ha nke atọ 'Love Letter'
Egwu a ruru nọmba 3 na chaatị iTunes na nọmba 11 na Radio Airplay Charts
Na 31 Jenụwarị afọ 2020, ewepụtara abọm studio nke abụọ ha bụ Umuthi Abọm ahụ nwere Sjava, Ci Ci, Thee legacy na Igcokama Elisha
Abọm ahụ mepụtara egwu atọ 'Memeza', 'Love Letter' na 'Ibhanoyi'
Abọm ahụ malitere na nọmba 1 na iTunes Albums Charts
Na ọnwa June afọ 2020, ha guzobere Umuthi Records na Ambitiouz Entertainment
N'etiti afọ 2020, ha abụọ jikọrọ aka na 'Price to pay' na 'Uhulumeni' nke DJ Miss Pru
N'ọnwa Nọvemba 20, ewepụtara egwu ha bụ 'Summer YoMuthi' ma bido n'ọkwa nke mbụ na Channel 0 Top 30 music chart
Na June 4, ha wepụtara otu egwu 'Messiah' nke gosipụtara Dumi Mkokstad
Egwu a nwetara nde mmadụ atọ na YouTubeNkosikhona ngagane Khumalo onye dị na Ekuvukeni
Ọ bụ onye mbụ kachasị amasị Blaq Daimond na KwaZulu Natal

Na emume nke isii nke All Africa Music Awards egwu ha 'Summer YoMuthi' nwetara nhọpụta asatọ gụnyere; Onye omenkà kacha mma na South Africa, Onye nka nke afọ na Africa; Abụ nke Afọ na Africa; Onye mmepụta nke afọ na Africa; Onye omenkà kacha mma n'egwu egwu Afrịka; Breakout Artist nke Afọ; Onye nka kacha mma, Duo ma ọ bụ otu na Pop African; Duo nke Africa kacha mma, otu ma ọ bụ band
N'ọnwa Ọktọba 29, ewepụtara egwu ha bụ 'Italy'
Emeka Akumefule (a mụrụ na 29 Jenụwarị n'afọ 1996), nke a maara dịka Blaqbonez, bụ onye egwu Naịjirịa bịanyere aka na 100 Crowns, nke bụ akara nke Chocolate City
Blaqbonez bụ onye ama ama na Naijiria nke a maara maka ịgwakọta Yoruba na Bekee na rap ya
N'afọ 2019, The New York Times kọwara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị nche ọhụrụ nke egwu Naịjirịa

A maara ya nke ọma maka ọnọdụ ya na-akpọ onwe ya dị ka 'Best Rapper in Africa' (nke a na-akpọ 'BRIA'), nke ghọrọ isiokwu a na-ekwukarị banyere ya na mpaghara hip hop nke Naijiria n'etiti Julaị na Septemba n'afọ 2019
Mgbe ọ kpọpụtachara otu n'ime ndị na-akwado rap, Blaqbonez wepụtara abọm izizi ya 'Sex Over Love' nye ọha na eze nke dị njikere ịnata ya
Ụzọ ya na-adịghị mma na àgwà ya na-atọ ọchị, na-amasị ọgbọ na-eto eto, ma mee ka ọ nweta akara aka site n'aka ndị dị ka Wizkid na Burna Boy
A mụrụ Emeka na 29 Jenụwarị n'afọ 1996, n'ezinụlọ ndị Igbo, ma tolite na omenala Yoruba na Urhobo na NaịjirịaBlaqbonez si na steeti Imo, steeti dị na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjirịa nke ebo Igbo na-achị
Ya na nne ya, onye pastọ, tolitere na Yoruba na Urhobo
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo (OAU), ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ Injinia
Ọ dị afọ iri na atọ mgbe ọ chọpụtara na ọ nwere ike rap, njem ya n'ime egwu bụ n'ihi ihe mberede
Ọ chọpụtara onwe ya talent ya mgbe ya na nwa nwanne nna ya na-ege redio, mgbe a na-akpọ egwu nke onye na-eti egwu dị afọ iri na abụọ
Nwa nwanne nna ya nwere mmasị n'abụ ahụ ma maa Blaqbonez aka ka o wepụta okwu nke ya, ebe ọ bụ na ọ na-amasị ya ịkatọ ndị egwu
Mgbe nkeji ole na ole gasịrị, o nwere ihe mgbochi zuru ezu maka amaokwu, ọ bụkwa ebe ahụ ka ihe niile malitere
Nne na nna ya anaghị akwado ihe omume ntụrụndụ ọhụrụ ya, ọ na-achụso agụụ ya na nzuzo
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ mbụ ya, Hip-Hop na Blaq, ma sonye na asọmpi
Blaqbonez weghaara ihe ịma aka ahụ na nke ahụ bụ mgbe egwu ya niile malitere
N'afọ 2011, Blaqbonez malitere isonye na agha rap n'okpuru ala
O mechara merie Terry Tha Rapman's Zombie Competition n'afọ 2012, na-eti ndị egwu puku atọ na ihe ịma aka ahụ nke ahụ mere ka ọ bụrụ onye ama ama
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ pụtara na mixtape Terry nke afọ 2012 nke akpọrọ “World Domination” ya na ndị egwu Naịjirịa kachasị elu gụnyere Olamide, Vector, Mode 9, na Spellz
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ The Punch, o kwuru na nkwupụta ya 'Best Rapper in Africa' bụ nzaghachi nye egwu diss na mkpa ọ dị ịkpọte ndị egwu rap ndị ọzọ na Naijiria
The Guardian kọwara ya n'oge na-adịbeghị anya dị ka 'onye na-ebu ọkụ nke rap nke Naijiria' na 2 Jenụwarị 2019, otu akwụkwọ ahụ depụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime 'Top 10 Artists to watch in 2019'
A kpọrọ Blaqbonez West African Rapper Of The Year na mbido Creative-Africa Hip Hop Awards
Otu akwụkwọ ahụ mere ya onye nke abụọ na ndepụta Top 50 African Rappers Of 2021
Blaqbonez nwere nnukwu ndị na-akwado ya na onye kachasị amasị ya bụ Eseose Braimah
Blaqbonez wepụtara EP Bad Boy Blaq nke asatọ ya na 31 August n'afọ 2018
E wepụtara ya dị ka akụkụ nke ọrụ LAMB, usoro nke abọm hip hop atọ nke na-anwa ịkpọte hip hop Naijiria
MI Abaga mepụtara Bad Boy Blaq ma wepụta ya site na 100 Crowns, akara akara nke Chocolate City
EP ahụ bụ nke ikpeazụ n'ime ntọhapụ atọ ma MI Abaga's A Study on Self Worth Yxng Dxnzl (2018)
E wepụtara mbipụta nke EP, nke akpọrọ Bad Bloy Blaq Re-Up, na February n'afọ 2019
Blaqbonez wepụtara EP nke itoolu ya Mr
Boombastic na 25 October 2019
Otu ụbọchị tupu ntọhapụ nke EP, Blaqbonez wepụtara otu nkwado 'Jesus Is Black (Letter to Kanye West)'
N'ime ya, ọ gwara Kanye West ka ọ yigharịrị mwepụta nke album studio nke itoolu ya bụ Jesus Is King, nke nwere otu ụbọchị ewepụtara ya dị ka Mr
Boombastic
N'afọ 2020, Blaqbonez wepụtara egwu ọhụrụ 'Haba'
Na 30 Eprel n'afọ 2021 blaqbones kwụsịrị abọm ya Sex Over Love
Na Sep 17, 2021 Blaqbones dara 1000 Years

N'abụ a, '1000 Years' onye na-egwu diski DJ Yankee jiri egwu rap nke Chocolate City rapper na Bling crooner, Blaqbonez na Penthauze Music act, Cheque bụ onye jiri aka ya meziwanye egwu ahụ site na egwu rap ya dị egwu ya, okwu ndị na-adọrọ adọrọ, na egwu
Na afọ 2022, ọ mere egwu nke mbụ na London
SINGLES

Blatjang bụ chutney na obodo South Afrika nke e ji mkpụrụ osisi a mịrị amị (na-abụkarị apricots) na chillies esi na vinegar na ihe oriri dị mkpa n'ọtụtụ ezinụlọ South Africa, a na-eji ya eme ihe dị ka ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ na nri anụ Ndida Afrika dị ka bobotie na braai

Blatjang bụ chutney South Africa nke e ji mkpụrụ osisi a mịrị amị (na-abụkarị apricots) na chillies esi na vinegar na ihe oriri dị mkpa n'ọtụtụ ezinụlọ South Africa, a na-eji ya eme ihe dị ka ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ na nri anụ South Afrịka dị ka bobotie na braai
Blatjang nwere mmalite Cape Malay na mmetụta Indonesian, Malay, Indian na Dutch, na-egosipụta ọdịbendị dị iche iche nke South Africa
Blatjang bụ okwu Afrikaans nke enwere ike isite na Malay ma ọ bụ na Indonesian, nke bụ ihe na-enweghị njikọ na chutney

Nri nke blatjang, n'adịghị ka ọtụtụ chutneys, nwere ike ịbụ ihe na-atọ ụtọ, na-atọ ọchị ma na-amị mkpụrụ dị ka Mrs Balls Fruit Chutney site na Tiger Consumer Brands Limited, nwere ọdịdị dị nro ma na-eme ya na apricots (ma ọ bụ peaches ma ọ bụ mango), mkpụrụ vaịn ma ọ bụ ụbọchị, yabasị, galik, cayenne ose, shuga na-acha nchara, nnu, ginger, mustard ọhụrụ, vinegar na chili na-acha ọbara ọbara ọbara
Kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, a na-egbubi blatjang, dị ka ọtụtụ nri South Africa, gbanwee ma nwalee ya iji kwekọọ na mmasị onwe onye na ụdị ndụ
Nchịkọta na-esonụ bụ ụzọ ọdịnala nke ime blatjang
Nzọụkwụ 1 Mmiri apricots na mkpụrụ vaịn n'ime vinegar n'abalị ruo mgbe mkpụrụ osisi ahụ buru ibu
Nzọụkwụ nke abụọ belata ihe ndị mejupụtara ya n'ime obere iberibe
Nzọụkwụ 3 Tinye ihe niile na saucepan ma sie nri na-ekpuchi n'elu okpomọkụ dị n'etiti, na-agbanye mgbe ụfọdụ, ruo mgbe chutney belatara ruo ihe dị ka otu ụzọ n'ụzọ atọ, ma dị n'ụdị ziri ezi
Nzọụkwụ 3 Wụnye n'ime ite ọkụ, nke a na-eme ka ọ ghara ịdị ọcha, mechie ma chekwaa n'ime kọbọd dị jụụ, nke gbara ọchịchịrị

Ịbanye n'egwuregwu Olympic ọ gbara ọsọ ngwa ngwa na 100 m agbụrụ na e nwere nnukwu atụmanya na olile anya nke nrite
Agbanyeghị, asọmpi Olympic nke 2012 emeghị nke ọma maka Okagbare dịka ọpụpụ ya na 2008
O hibere onye kacha mma nke 1092 s na 100 m ọkara ikpeazụ mana etinyere nke asatọ na nke ikpeazụ yana agba nke 1101 s
2013 ga-abụ afọ na-emepe emepe maka Okagbare
N'April 2013, na Walnut, California, Blessing Okagbare debere ndekọ nke onwe ya na 200 m na oge nke 2231 s
Mgbe ahụ, na Julaị, ọ kwalitere ihe kacha mma nke onwe ya n'ịwụ elu ogologo site na mwụli elu nke 698 m na Athletissima zutere na Lausanne, na 700 m n'oge Monaco Herculis izute
Na 27 Julaị 2013, na London Anniversary Games, Okagbare debere ndekọ Africa ọhụrụ nke 1086 nọ na 100 ya m agbụrụ
O meriri agba ikpeazụ ihe dị ka otu awa ka e mesịrị, debere ndekọ ọhụrụ nke Africa nke 1079, n'ọsọ ebe ọ meriri 100 na-achị achị m Onye meriri ọla edo Olympic Shelly-Ann Fraser-Pryce
Ndekọ Okagbare kpuchiri ndekọ dị adị site n'aka onye ibe Glory Alozie nke 1090 s nke guzoro kemgbe 1998
Na 2013 World Championships na Moscow, Okagbare meriri nrite ọlaọcha na ogologo jump
Ọ wụliri elu 699 m tinyere ya n'ọnọdụ nke abụọ n'azụ Brittney Reese nke United States na nanị sentimita abụọ
N'afọ 100 m ikpeazụ, o tinyere nke isii na ọsọ nke 1104 s ma tinyekwa nke atọ na 200 m agbụrụ
Okagbare sonyere n'ọsọ 100m na 200m

O mere ya ruo na njedebe nke 100m wee merie oge nke 1085 sekọnd, na-emebi ndekọ egwuregwu nke 1091 sekọnd nke Debbie Ferguson-McKenzie setịpụrụ afọ 12 tupu mgbe ahụ na 2002 Commonwealth Games na Manchester
Okagbare nwetakwara ihe nrite ọla edo na 200m, jiri nkeji nkeji iri abụọ na abụọ na abụọ na ise
N'ime nke a, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị nke anọ meriri 100m na 200m ugboro abụọ na asọmpi Commonwealth
Ọ gbara ọsọ n'ụkwụ na 4 × 200 m na 2015 World Relays
Ndị otu nke gụnyere Okagbare, Regina George, Dominique Duncan na Christy Udoh, meriri n'ọsọ ahụ ma tinye akwụkwọ ndekọ Africa na usoro ahụ
Ọ pụtaghị na mita 200 na asọmpi mba ụwa IAAF ma ọ bụ asọmpi Africa niile n'ihi mmerụ ahụ ọ nwetara mgbe ọ gbasịrị ikpeazụ na ngwụcha nke otu narị mita na asọmpi mba ụwa
N'ọgwụgwụ oge ahụ, ọ sonye na asọmpi IAAF Diamond League, Weltklasse Zürich na Zurich, gụchara nke abụọ na 100 mita
Onye isi ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka egwuregwu mba Naịjirịa bụ Al Hassan Yakmu were iwe n'ihi ihe ahụ a na-eche na ọ na-agba ọsọ
Na mbụ a kọrọ na amachibidoro Okagbare ịnọchite anya Naijiria na asọmpi Olympic nke afọ 2016
Ndị otu egwuregwu Naịjirịa mechara gọnarị nkwupụta a

N'agbanyeghị na ọ kwụsịrị n'ihe omume onye ọ bụla n'egwuregwu All-Africa, ọ gbara ọsọ na 4 × 100 m relay wee nyere ndị otu Naijiria ( Cecilia Francis, Okagbare, Ngozi Onwumere na Lawretta Ozoh ) nweta ihe nrite ọla edo
Blessing nwere ihe ngosi na-akụda mmụọ na Rio Olympics 2016 ka ọ gụchara na-enweghị otu nrite
Ọ dịghị mgbe ọ mere ya na nke ikpeazụ mana ọ họọrọ 3rd na 100m semifinal agwụcha na 1109s wee họrọ 8th ya na ndị otu ya na njedebe nke 4 × 100 m relay
Okagbare meriri okpomoku nke mbu ya na 100 mita na oge 1105
Emechara kwụsịtụrụ ya na 31 Julaị 2021 ka ọ daa ule ọgwụ emere na 19 Julaị 2021, nke nwalere ihe dị mma maka homonụ uto mmadụ
Na Fraịde 18 February 2022, AIU kwupụtara na enyela Okagbare mmachibido iwu afọ iri maka 'ọtụtụ mmebi nke iwu mgbochi doping'
Otu egwuregwu ahụ kwuru na amachibidoro Okagbare afọ ise maka iji ọtụtụ ihe amachibidoro na-eme ihe na afọ ise ọzọ maka na ọ akwadoghị nyocha ahụ

N'abalị iri na itoolu nke ọnwa Febrụwarị, 2022, onye na-agba ọsọ Naịjirịa meghachiri omume n'amamikpe ndị otu Athletics Integrity Unit (AIU) dere site n'akwụkwọ ozi n'ibe Instagram ya enyochagoro na ndị ọkaiwu ya na-enyocha ebubo a ugbu a na ọ ga-agwa ndị mmadụ ka ọ ga-esi aga
Na Septemba 2014, ọ lụrụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naijiria Igho Otegheri

Blessing Okardi ( ka amuru n'ụbọchị ise n' ọnwa Novemba 1988) bu onye egwuregwu bọọlụ si Naijiria, onye na-agba Bayelsa United FC ugbua
Na 27 October 2006, KAA Gent na-ekpe ya ikpe
Ya na Ocean Boys ọ chịkọtara ndị otu mmeri FA Cup Nigeria 2008, meriri Gombe United na penariti na 5 Julaị 2008
Ọ kwagara Lobi Stars na ọnwa Ọktoba 2009
A machibidoro ya iwu otu afọ maka akụkụ ya na mwakpo ndị ọka ikpe na March 2010
Onye otu aka nri hapụrụ na 24 Nọvemba 2012 ka afọ atọ gachara ụlọ ọgbakọ Lobi Stars wee banye Bayelsa United FC
Abịa na ọkwá ya na mba ụwa, o mere ihe ngosi abụọ maka Nigeria na 2007 FIFA U-20 World Cup, megide Scotland na Costa Rica
Blessing Oladoye (amụrụ na 4 Septemba 2000) bụ onye Naijirịa na-eme egwuregwu
O sonyere na asọmpi 4 × 400 mita nke ụmụ nwanyị na 2019 World Athletics Championships
N'afọ 2019, o ritere ihe nrite ọla edo na 4 × 400 mita nke ụmụ nwanyị na 2019 African Games nke emere na Rabat, Morocco
Blessing Joy Onyebuchi bụ onye Naijirịa na-agba mgba
N’afọ 2014, o ritere ntụrụugo ọla nchara n’ihe omume n’egwuregwu mba Commonwealth nke afọ 2014 e mere na Glasgow, Skọtlandị
Afọ anọ ka nke ahụ gasịrị, na asọmpi Commonwealth nke afọ 2018 e mere na Gold Coast, dị na Ọstụreliya, ọ ritere ihe nrite ọla ọcha na ihe omume
N’ikpeazụ, o meriri Erica Wiebe nke Kanada
Na asọmpi egwuregwu Afrịka nke 2015 e mere na Brazzaville, dị na Rịpọbliiki nke Kongo, o ritere nrite ọla ọcha n'ihe omume
N'afọ sochirinu, ọ sọrọ mpi na 2016 African & Oceania Wrestling Olympic Qualification Tournament ebe o oritere otu n'ime ọla nchara na mmemme ya
Na asọmpi African Wrestling Championship nke afọ 2019 e mere na Hammamet, dị na Tunisia, o ritere nrita ọla edo na ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị nke kilogram 76
Ọ nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na asọmpi Afrịka nke afọ 2019 e mere na Rabat, dị na Moroko were rite nrite ọla edo n'ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị kilogram 76
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ sọkwara asọmpi na World Beach Games ebe o nwetara nrite ọla edo na ihe omume mgba osimiri nke ụmụ nwanyị kilogram +70
N'afọ 2020, o ritere ihe nrite ọla ọcha na mmemme nke ụmụ nwanyị kilogram 76 bụ nke 2020 Wrestling Championship nke e mere na Algiers, Algeria
N’ikpeazụ, o meriri Samar Amer nke Ijipt

Blossom Chukwujekwu bụ onye ome ihe nkiri nke Naịjirịa, onye mere ihe ngosi ọkachamara izizi ya n'afọ 2009
Na 2015, o meriri ihe nrite onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma na Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards

A mụrụ ma kpọọ ya Chukwudi Echezona Chukwujekwu n'abalị anọ nke ọnwa Novemba , 1983 na Benin City, Edo State, Nigeria nye Dr IE na Evangelist JC Chukwujekwu, Blossom Chukwujekwu bụ nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ nwoke abụọ
Ọ bụ onye Otolo, Nnewi North na Anambra State, Southeast Nigeria
Ọ gara Greater Tomorrow Primary School na Greater Tomorrow Comprehensive College bụcha na Benin City, Edo State
Maka agụmakwụkwọ mahadum ya, Blossom họọrọ ịgụ Mass Communications na Mahadum Sayensị na Nkà na ụzụ Anambra steeti
ebe ọ nọrọ otu afọ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Benson Idahosa University, Benin City, Edo State ka ọ gbachara obere oge na Mahadum Sayensị na Nkà na ụzụ Enugu State
Mgbe ọ nọ na BIU, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Association of Mass Communication Students (AMCOS) n'afọ agụmakwụkwọ nke 2007/2008
Ọ bụkwa onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Ụlọ ihe nkiri a ma ama (HOT) ebe ọ bụla onye ndu na ihe nkiri ọgbọ bụ Godless The path to dawn
Blossom na-ekwusi ike na ịgosiputa ka Ukemu na Godless bụ oge eureka ya
Na Julaị 2008 ọ gụchara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na Mass Communications na Mahadum Benson Idahosa, Benin City, Edo State
Ọ kwagara Legọs, Nigeria ọnwa ole na ole ka ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ iji rụọ ọrụ ọrụ ndị ntorobịa nke mba
Blossom nọrọ na Legọs ka ọ gbasoo ebumnobi ya ime ihe omume
N'afọ 2009, ka emechara ọtụtụ nyocha, Chukwujekwu wetara ọkwa isi n'ime ihe nkiri soap opera nke Naijiria aka ga ewepụta; bụ Portrait of Passion
N'otu afọ ahụ, e tinyere ya na ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Vivian Ejike's Private Storm nke gunyere Omotola Jalade Ekeinde na Ramsey Nouah
A kọwapụtara Blossom na ihe nkiri Nollywood nke Africa Magic, Jara, dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ise aga akacha lekwasị anya na 2013

Ọ bụ onye nke anọ na ndetu ọnụ ọgụgụ ace nke onye nduzie nke Nollywood bụ Charles Novia nke ndị kacha eme ihe nkiri nke 2013, Na 2012 Chukwujekwu nwetara ọrụ na Flower Girl nke bụ ya ihe nkiri bipụtara ya
Ewepụtara ya na 2013, ọ nwetara ihe ịga nke ọma dị egwu na azụmahịa na Nigeria, Ghana, United Kingdom na mmemme ihe nkiri na United States na Canada
Ọ bụ ihe nkiri mmechi na African International Film Festival (AFRIFF 2013)
Na 2014 Knocking na Heaven's Door pụtara na sinima na gburugburu mba na Eprel 18
Ihe omume ngosipụta agwa Chukwujekwu dị ka 'Moses' bụ onye mkparị na mmetụta mmuọ uche mere ka ọ nweta ihe nrite nke Africa Magic Viewers' Choice 2015, dị ka omee n'enye ezi nkwado n'ọrụ

Nweta Nchawapụ na ihe ịga nke ọma ihe nkiri a ma ama nke Blossom gụnyere Flower Girl (2013), (2013) nke ndi nsonye gụnyere Rita Dominic, Knocking on Heaven's Door (2014) gunyere Majid Michel, The Visit (2015) gunyere Nse Ikpe-Etim, A place Called Happy (2015) na Ghana Must Go (2016) nke Yvonne Okoro Sonyere
O gosila na ihe nkiri TV dị ole na ole na usoro ihe, dị ka Tinsel na MNET, ebe ọ n'egosiputa dị ka Mr
Akinlolu Hart, MTVBASE's HIV akpọrọ Shuga, CATWALQ nke Emem Isong na Monalisa Chinda, Greg Odutayo's My Mum and I, About to Wed and Married
Chukwujekwu na-arụ ọrụ ndu n'egosiputa dị ka Kelechi Pepple na telenovela mbụ nke Naijiria bụ Taste of love (2015)
Blossom Chukwujekwu lụrụ nwunye ya bụ Maureen n'ụzọ omenala, na 19 Disemba 2015 wee kewapụ na'alum di na nwunye na Septemba 2019

Hassan Secka onye a kacha mara amara na Blu Boy, bụ onye America na-ese ihe na-ahụ anya na onye ọchụnta ego
Ọ bụ onye nwe na onye guzobere ụdị ejiji na ahịrị uwe akpọrọ WNTD Apparel
A mụrụ Blu Boy na Atlanta, Georgia
Na 17, Secka chọpụtara na ya nwere mmasị maka ejiji, ebe ọ bụ na ọ nweghị ike ịkwụ ụgwọ otu ìgwè, ọ ghọrọ ndị agha otu nwoke
N'afọ 2014, ọ malitere WNTD Apparel ụdị ejiji na ahịrị uwe, Ịbụ onye na-ese ihe na-ahụ anya nyere ya aka karịa ndị na-emepụta ejiji na ụdị ndị ọzọ
Na-elekwasị anya na millennials, gen Z na obodo mepere emepe nke oge a na-eme ka WNTD dị iche na ndị asọmpi ndị ọzọ
Blu Boy bụ otu n'ime ndị mepụtara otu n'ime ihe ọṅụṅụ Coca-Cola nke a na-akpọ sprite
Ọ na-arụkọkwa ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ America ama ama nke a na-akwa akwa nke a na-akpọ Ezi Religion
Blu Boy bụkwa otu n'ime ndị okike na-arụkọ ọrụ na ụdị okomoko ejiji akpọrọ MCM n'ụwa niile
Blue Norther, nke a makwaara dị ka Texas Norther, bụ ihu oyi na-aga ngwa ngwa nke a na-ahụ site na ọdịda ngwa ngwa nke okpomọkụ, ifufe siri ike, na mbara igwe na-acha anụnụ anụnụ ma ọ bụ 'ọcha'
Ihu oyi na-esi n'ebe ugwu, ya mèrè 'n'ebe ugwu', ma nwee ike izipu okpomọkụ na-ada site na ogo irí abụọ ma ọ bụ irí atọ 30 na nkeji ole na ole
Midwestern United States enweghị ihe mgbochi ala iji chebe onwé ya pụọ na ikuku oyi oyi nké sitere na Canada na arctic
Ọtụtụ ugboro n'afọ ọnọdụ ga-adị mmá iji mee ka oke oyi rụọ n'ébé ndịda dị ka Texas, na-eweta snow na snow ma na-eme ka windchill banye n'ime ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma

Dabere n'oge nke afọ, okpomọkụ dị elu nké na-esote Texas Norther nwèrè ike iru 85 ° F (29 ° C) ma ọ bụ ọbụna 90 ° F (32 ° C) n'okpuru ìhè anyanwụ na-egbuke egbuke n'ọnọdụ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ dị jụụ tupu ihu oyi abịarute
Otú ọ dị, ọtụtụ ndị Blue Northers anaghị aga n'ihu rụọ n'ebe ndịda dị ka Mexico, ọbụnakwa ihe atụ kachasị njọ na-eru n'etiti etiti Texas
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ọbọdọ ndị dị na North Texas, dị ka Dallas, na-enwe ọtụtụ Blue Northers karịa ọbọdọ ndị dị n'akụkụ Gulf of Mexico, dị ka Houston
Ka Blue Norther na-awakpo ọbọdọ, okpomọkụ ya nwere ike ịbụ ogo iri atọ ruo iri ise oyi karịa ọbọdọ ndị gbara ya gbụrụ-gbúrụ nke dị naanị kilomita ole na ole ka na-awụbeghị
Blue Northers nwere ike ịbụ ihe dị ize ndụ n'ihi mgbanwe okpomọkụ ha na-agbanwe agbanwe nke na-ejide ụfọdụ ndị na-akwadoghị
Blue Northers na-apụta ọtụtụ ugboro kwa afọ
A na-edekarị ha n'etiti ọnwa Nọvemba na Machị, ọ bụ ezie na edere ha obere ógè n'ọnwa Ọktoba na Eprel
Ihe omume Blue Norther bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị na Nọvemba, mgbè ihe ncheta ikpeazụ nke ógè mgbụsị akwụkwọ ka na-arapara na ndụ

Otu n'ime ndị Blue Northers a ma ama bụ Great Blue Norther nke ụbọchị iri na otu n'ọnwa Nọvemba, 1911, nke kpatara ọtụtụ tornadoes ma mee ka okpomọkụ dị 40 degrees na naanị nkeji ogo iri na ise ruo iri isii na asaa na awa irí, ihe ndekọ ụwa
Blueprint bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ nke Naijiria a na-ebipụta kwa ụbọchị dabere na Abuja
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ malitere dị ka mbipụta kwa izu na Mee 2011, wee gbanwee gaa na akwụkwọ akụkọ a na-ebipụta kwa ụbọchị na Septemba 2011

Motolani Alake nke Pulse Nigeria kwuru na ọ 'na-egosi obi ike, mmeri na 'nkasi obi'
