Bonang Dorothy Matheba (a mụrụ na 25 June 1987), bụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi telivishọn na South Africa, onye redio, onye na-ese ihe nkiri na onye mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta
A mụrụ ya na Mahikeng, North West, a maara ya maka nkà ngosi ya na olu ya
Matheba gosipụtara ihe ngosi egwu SABC 1 LIVE (nke bụ Live Amp ugbu a) nke wuru ihe ngosi ya na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
A makwaara ya maka ịbụ onye isi ojii South Africa mbụ a ga-egosi na ọtụtụ magazin
N'afọ 2011, ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama na South Africa mbụ malitere ihe ngosi n'ịntanetị a na-akpọ B*Dazzled N'afọ 2013, ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya mba ụwa mbụ maka akara ihe ntecha Revlon, na mpụga US
N'afọ 2014, ọ kwadoro 2014 MTV Europe Music Awards pre-show, nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye South Africa mbụ kwadoro emume ahụ
N'afọ 2015, ọ ghọrọ onye Afrịka mbụ e nyere E! News Special Africa na E!
N'afọ 2016, ọ pụtara n'ihu Forbes Woman Africa, ya na ụmụ nwanyị atọ ndị ọzọ e nyere isi okwu maka ịbụ ihu nke ọchụnta ego
O weputara akwukwo ya From A to B ma gosipụta ihe ngosi nke ya Being Bonang, ha abụọ n'afọ 2017
N'afọ 2018, e gosipụtara ya na mbipụta ike nke GQ SA, maka mbipụta Septemba

A mụrụ Bonang n'abalị 25 ọnwa June 1987 na Mahikeng borough nke North West, nye Charlotte Mokoena, onye isi oche maka Human Resource and Corporate Affairs nke Sasol, na Gampi Matheba, onye nkuzi dị elu na Mahadum North-West
Ọ bụ onye agbụrụ na-asụ asụsụ Bantu bụ Tswana
Ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara Leondale, n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Johannesburg, ebe Bonang gara Fourways High School, ụlọ akwụkwọ gọọmentị na-akụzi na Fourways, Johannesburg
N'afọ 2002, Matheba mere ihe ngosi telivishọn mbụ ya na SABC 2 ụmụaka, Manhattan Fantasy Challenge mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise
Ọ pụtakwara n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi ụmụaka SABC 2
N'afọ 2007, Matheba nyochara maka oge izizi nke ihe ngosi egwu SABC 1 LIVE (nke bụ Live Amp ugbu a) mgbe ọ hapụsịrị varsity
E mechara chie ya onye mmeri nke ihe ngosi ahụ ka ya na Tbo Touch na-akwado ya
Ọrụ ngosi ya bụ nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma na nke ahụ bụ aha nna ya 'Queen B'
E gosipụtara ihe omume ikpeazụ ya na 31 Ọgọstụ 2012 ka ọ mara ọkwa na ọ na-ahapụ ihe ngosi ahụ
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị LIVE, ọ kwadoro ọtụtụ ihe ngosi ndị ọzọ gụnyere Clash of the Choirs SA, Afternoon Express, Top Billing na KFC Taste Kitchen
Matheba anabatala ọtụtụ ihe ngosi onyinye na ihe omume ndị a ma ama dịka MTV Africa Music Awards 2016, Miss South Africa 2018, ma kwado ihe ngosi tupu 2014 MTV Europe Music Awards na BET Awards 2016
N'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2018, Matheba so mee ihe nkiri Global Citizen Mandela 100 n'akụkụ onye na-eme ihe ọchị Trevor Noah, onye na-ese onyinyo Naomi Campbell na ndị ọzọ a ma ama

N'afọ 2008, Matheba mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na ihe ngosi SABC 1, InterSEXions ebe ọ na-eme Nurse Seipati Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2019, Matheba gosipụtara ma soro mepụta ihe nkiri Public Figure, nke gosipụtara na Machị, 9 na Manchester Film Festival
Matheba guzobere ụlọ mmepụta ihe ya akpọrọ Bonang Matheba Entertainment n'afọ 2017
Ngalaba mmepụta ahụ nwere otu ihe ngosi, nke bụ ihe ngosi eziokwu nke 1Magic, Being Bonang nke na-elekwasị anya ma gosipụta ndụ kwa ụbọchị nke Matheba
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2022, ọ kwadoro Africa Magic Viewers' Choice Awards
Ka ọ na-erule ngwụcha ọnwa Mee afọ 2021, Matheba nwetara ọrụ nke Queen Nandi yana onye isi mmepụta nke Shaka Ilembe na-abịanụ
N'afọ 2012, Matheba sonyeere onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ na onye na-agba diski Euphonik
E boro Euphonik ebubo mwakpo mgbe o gosipụtara na ọ wakporo ya
O wepụrụ ebubo ahụ mgbe di na nwunye ahụ mere ka ha dịghachi n'otu
Ka ọ na-ewepụ ebubo ahụ, ndị mmadụ nwere ebubo na Matheba ghaara ụgha banyere ihe merenụ
Matheba gbaghaara nkwupụta ndị a, na-ekwu, sị 'Atụbeghị m na a ga-emeso m ihe ọjọọ mgbe akụkọ gbasara nkewa m pụtara
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ahụmahụ ndị na-egbu mgbu na mgbe ụfọdụ ejighị m n'aka otú m si lanarị', ihe gbasara ya n'akwụkwọ ya, From A To B
O wepụrụ ihe ahụ na mbipụta nke abụọ nke akwụkwọ ahụ
Site na ngwụcha afọ 2015 ruo 2017, Matheba na onye na-eti egwu AKA

Mmekọrịta ha jupụtara na esemokwu ka ha nwere ihe omume, mgbe AKA na-eme mkpapụ ma na-eme ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri diski DJ Zinhle dị ime, onye kpughere ihe ha na-eme n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2015, mgbe ha kewara
Site n'oge a gaa n'ihu, Matheba edebewo ọtụtụ n'ime ndị mmekọ ya na ndụ onwe onye na nzuzo, ọ bụghịkwa ọtụtụ ihe ka a maara banyere ya

Bongeka Gamede (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1999) bụ onye ọgba egwuregwu bọọlụ South Africa nke na-agbara Mahadum nke Western Cape (UWC) na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị South Africa bọọlụ dị ka onye nnọchiteanya nchekwa goolu
Obodo Gamede bụ Ixopo na KwaZulu-Natal

Onye bụbu onye South Africa n'ogo ndị dị afọ iri na asaa n'afọ iri abụọ, e tinyere ya na ndị otu South Africa maka 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup n'agbanyeghị na ọ nọchitebeghi anya ndị otu mba ahụ na ọkwa okenye na mbụ
Ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ na-agụ gbasara njem nlegharị anya na Mahadum nke Western Cape, maka nke a ọ kwụsịrị ule afọ mbụ ya iji pụta na asọmpi ahụ

O gbara egwuregwu izizi ya na mba ụwa na egwuregwu enyi na enyi tupu iko mba ụwa megide Norway N'abalị abụọ nke ọnwa June 2019, na-mkpọba dị ka onye nnọchi anya na mmeri ọkpụ asaa asatara abụọ nke South Africa
Àtụ South Africa squad 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup
Bongi Makeba (site na mkpụrụ Ụbọchị iri abụo na onwa Disemba n'afọ 1950 – mkpụrụ Ụbọchị iri na asaa nke ọnwa Maachị n'afọ 1985) bụ onye South Africa na-abụ abụna na onye na-ede abụ
Ọ bụ naanị otu nwa nke nwoke na-agụ egwú Miriam Makeba na di mbụ ya, James Kubay
A mụrụ Angela Sibongile Makeba na South Africa n'afọ 1950, mgbe nne ya dị afọ irí na asatọ
Aha Bongi nke ejiri mara ya bụ ụdị mkpirisi nke aha etiti ya Sibongile, nke pụtara 'Anyị nwere ekele'

N'afọ 1959, ọrụ nne ya mere ka ọ gaa New York, bụ ebe ọ nọgidere na mba ọzọ mgbe a machibidoro ya ịlaghachi na South Africa, n'afọ 1960, Bongi sonyeere ya, bụ onye ya na ndị enyi ya nọ mgbe nne ya na-eme njem n'ụwa

``````````````````````````````````````````````````N'afọ 1967, ya na Judy White, ada Josh White, bịanyere aka na Buddha Records dị ka 'Bongi na Judy', ntọhapụ mbụ ha bụ 'Runnin' Out' na 'Ka Anyị Jikọọ'

Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, Makeba zutere di ya onye America bụ Harold Nelson Lee, onye ya na ya na mmalite ruo n'etiti oge afọ 1970s o mere ndekọ abụọ asaa' dị ka 'Bongi na Nelson', na-egosipụta egwu mkpụrụ obi abụọ nke George Butcher haziri 'Nke ahụ bụ `````````````````````````` ahụ
nke ịh=ụnanya' kwadoro 'Enwere m Obi ụtọ' (France Syliphone SYL 533), na 'Ihe niile, Maka Ịhụnanya M' na 'Ị Cheta, Malcolm?' (France Syliphone ``` 532)
Ọ dekọtara naanị otu ọba egwu, Bongi Makeba, Blow On Wind (pläne-records), n'afọ 1980
Enwere ike ịnụ ụfọdụ n'ime egwu ya ọtụtụ afọ ka e mesịrị n'ime akụkọ nne ya
Abụọ n'ime ha, 'Malcolm X' (1965, 1972) na 'Lumumba' (1970), na-eto ndị isi ojii egburu egbu
Makeba nwere ụmụ atọ Nelson Lumumba Lee (amụrụ n'afọ 1968), Zenzi Monique Lee (amụrụ n'afọ1971), na nwa nwoke, Themba, onye nwụrụ mgbe ọ bụ nwata
Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ iri atọ na anọ n'afọ 1985 site na nsogbu na-esochi ọmụmụ nwa e wee lie ya na Conakry, Guinea, ebe nne ya kwagara mgbe ọ lụsịrị dị Stokely Carmichael n'afọ 1968

Bongi Ndaba (amụrụ na 10 Febrụwarị na afo 1972) bụ onye South Afrika na -emepụta ihe na onye ode akwụkwọ maka telivishọn, yana onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ede egwuregwu
Site na afo 2012 ruo afo 2014 ọ bụ onye isi edemede na onye na-emepụta ihe maka South Afrika soap opera , na-arụ ọrụ n'azụ ihe nkiri maka mmemme ahụ afọ asatọ gara aga na iri na otu na mkpokọta
Dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, a maara ya nke ọma maka ihe ngosi ya dị ka Goneril na SABC1's King Lear mini-series (emegharịrị dị ka Izingane Zobaba ), nke ewepụtara na afo 2008
Ọrụ ya kachasị ama dị ka onye na-ede egwuregwu bụ Shreds and Dreams, nke e dere na afo 2004, bụ nke a na-emegharị na obere usoro nke otu aha ahụ
Obere usoro agbagoro site na afo 2010 na SABC1
Mgbe ọ bụ nwa agbọghọ, ọ nwetara ihe ịga nke ọma dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri maka Ụlọ ọrụ Playhouse dị na Durban, nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri Themi Venturas họpụtara
Ọ gara n'ihu mụọ nka nka nka na Durban University of Technology na dịka nwa akwụkwọ, zụlitere mmasị ya n'ịde egwuregwu
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akara ugo mmụta nke abụọ na Education na UKZN, Ndaba kwagara Johannesburg n'ihi ohere dị na telivishọn dị na obodo
Ememme Odeakwụkwọ Ọhụrụ nke Market Theatre hụrụ ihe odide ya, wee nye ya ohere iso onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ, onye na-ede uri na onye na-ede egwuregwu Zakes Mda rụkọọ ọrụ
Ka o nwechara usoro nhọpụta ọnwa isii na-asọ mpi maka nkuzi maka ncha opera Generations, ya, n'etiti mmadụ asato ndị ọzọ, a goro ya n'ọrụ n'ime otu 230 nwere olile anya
A họpụtara ya onye isi ode akwụkwọ na afo 2012 wee jee ozi na ọrụ ahụ ruo mgbe ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na afo 2014
Na afo 2016-2017 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi ode akwụkwọ Isidingo, ihe nkiri telivishọn South Afrikaa ama ama
Otu n'ime ihe ndị na-esekarị okwu o dere maka ihe nkiri a bụ ihe omume 29, nke ewepụtara na 26 Eprel na afo 2017
Emere ihe omume a nanị otu ụbọchị tupu 27 Eprel, bụ nke mere afọ 23 nke nnwere onwe na South Afrikaa
Ihe omume a mere ka Bongi Ndaba pụta ìhè dị ka onye na-enweghị mgbagha, onye ode akwụkwọ telivishọn South Afrikaa nwere obi ike
N'ime ihe omume a, isi agwa nke ihe nkiri ahụ na-asọpụrụ ebe nna ya nọ n'ugbo
Mgbe ahụ, ndị ikom abụọ na-acha ọcha na-akparị agbụrụ gakwuuru ya, ndị na-amalite ịkpọ ya aha mkparị
Ndị ikom abụọ ahụ liri nwoke ahụ ná ndụ n’ili na-emighị emi

Ihe omume a sochiri usoro nke mmemme atọ ndị ọzọ ewepụtara na 1, 2 na 3 Mee afo 2017, bụ nke ewepụtara na Mgbasa Ozi Mgbasa Ozi nke South Africa (BCCSA); e kwuru na ha bụ, n'etiti ndị ọzọ, na-akwalite ime ihe ike na ịkwalite okwu ịkpọasị, si otú a na-ekwu na ihe nkiri ma ọ bụ ihe nkiri ndị a megidere nkebi nke 4 (1) na 2 nke Usoro Omume nke Free-to- Air Code of Conduct for Broadcasting Service
Onye isi oche BCCSA, HP Viljoen na mgbasa ozi nke emume ndị a emegideghị nkeji 4(1) ma ọ bụ (2) ma ọ bụ nkebi ahịrịokwu ọ bụla ọzọ nke Usoro Omume na ya mere ọ nweghị mkpesa a kwadoro

N'oge ya dị ka onye isi edemede nke Isidingo, ọkwa Isidingo na-arị elu ka ha ruru ihe kachasị elu, na ndị na-ekiri 16 nde, na-ebuga ọnụ ọgụgụ kasị ukwuu nke ndị na-ekiri Isidingo hụtụrụla, ma si otú a na-eme ka ndị nwụrụ anwụ dịghachi ndụ
Ihe ngosi TV
N'ụzọ dị mwute, mgbe ọ hapụrụ Isidingo, ọkwa nke ihe nkiri ahụ nọgidere na-adaba
Ugbu a, ọkwa nke ihe ngosi ahụ na-anọdụ ala na ndị na-ekiri 095 puku
Na afo 2017, Bongi Ndaba dere usoro ihe nkiri mbụ WhatsApp South Africa akpọrọ Uk'shona Kwelanga
Ọ bụ Sanlam mepụtara ya
Ukshona Kwelanga bụ usoro ihe nkiri mgbasa ozi mkpuchi na-emebi emebi, nke ezubere iche maka ndị ọrụ WhatsApp South Africa, dị ka usoro nkwukọrịta kacha ukwuu
N'afọ 2017, Bongi Ndaba meriri WRITING CRAFT GOLD sitere na Loeries maka ide edemede ya na 'Uk'Shona Kwelanga'
Loeries bụ ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe kacha ewu ewu na onyinye nzikọrịta ozi maka Africa & Middle East
Na March afo 2018, usoro nke ịkọ akụkọ na mgbasa ozi nke ngwaahịa mkpuchi site na WhatsApp, hụrụ Bongi Ndaba na-emeri ihe nrite abụọ na #Bookmarks2018 Awards maka ide ya na Uk'shona Kwelanga
Ngwaahịa Sanlam Uk'shona Kwelanga meriri SILVER maka Mgbasa Ozi Ngwakọta Ngwakọta Ngwakọta yana GOLD maka Bots, Ozi & Ọchịchị Ọchịchịrị na #BookMarks2018 Awards
Bongiwe ma ọ bụ Bongi Dhlomo-Mautloa (amụrụ n'afọ 1956) bụ ónyé na-ebi akwụkwọ na Zulu South Africa, ónyé nchịkwa nka na ónyé na-eme ihe ike
A mụrụ ya na Vryheid, KwaZulu-Natal, ma gụọ akwụkwọ na St Chad's School na Ladysmith na Inanda Seminary School
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ óbíbí akwụkwọ na Rorke's Drift Art and Craft Centre wee nweta diplọma na nka márá mmá
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na African Art Centre na Durban (1980-1983), mgbè ahụ na Grassroots Gallery n'otu ọbọdọ ahụ, tupu ọ kwaga Johannesburg ebe ọ na-ahụ màkà ihe ngosi na FUBA Gallery na Goodman Gallery
Ọ bụ ónyé guzobere na onye nhazi ọrụ nke Alexandra Art Centre na Johannesburg
Ọ bụ ónyé nhazi ọrụ mgbasa ozi na mmepe nke 1995 Johannesburg Biennale, nke a kpọrọ Africus, ọ bụkwa ónyé nchịkwa nke ihe omume 1997, nke akpọrọ Trade Routes History and Geography

O kwuru na nnupụisi Soweto nke 1976, mgbè ọ dị afọ iri abụo, mèrè ka ọ bụrụ ónyé ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, a kọwakwara ihe odide ya dị ka 'ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mgbè niile, na-edekọ ihe omume akụkọ ihe méré eme dị ka nnupụụisi Soyton nke 1976 yana ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-enweghị isi dịka ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ'
Ọrụ ya apụtala na magazin Staffrider
Ọ lụrụ ónyé na-ese ihe nkírí bụ Kagiso Mautloa
Bongiwe Gangeni (amụrụ c
1976), bụ onye South Africa na- eme ihe gbasara ọgwụ, nwanyị ọchụnta ego na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ, onye bụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ a họpụtara na Standard Chartered Bank, na-ahụ maka Africa, Middle East na Europe
Ọ ga-amalite ọrụ ya na Maachị 2022
Ọ ga-adabere na Dubai, na United Arab Emirates
Tupu nke ahụ, ọ jere ozi dị ka onye so na kọmitii ndị ịsị nke Absa Bank Limited, na-ejikwa ọkwa osote onye isi oche maka ụlọ akụ azụmaahịa na azụmaahịa, yana onye isi ụlọ akụ mmekọrịta
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Absa afọ iri na anọ, dabere na Johannesburg, South Africa
A mụrụ ya na South Africa na njedebe 1970s
Bongiwe tolitere na Thembisa, mpaghara ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Johannesburg
Mgbe ọ gachara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke sekọndrị dị n'ógbè ahụ, a nabatara ya na Mahadum Witwatersrand, bụ ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke Pharmacy
Ọ gara n'ihu nweta diploma diploma na Management na Wits Business School, ụlọ akwụkwọ azụmahịa nke otu mahadum ahụ
Ugo mmụta ya nke Master of Business Administration bụ Gordon Institute of Business Science, ụlọ akwụkwọ azụmahịa nke Mahadum Pretoria nyere ya
Bongiwe mechakwara mmemme nchịkwa dị elu na Harvard Business School
Mgbe akara mmụta mbụ ya gasịrị, Bongiwe rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ere ọgwụ afọ ole na ole
Ọ mechara chọtar ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka njikwa na Accenture, na-arụ ọrụ ebe ahụ afọ abụọ
Ọ sonyeere Absa Bank Limited na 2007, na mgbe Barclays Africa Group bụ onye nwe oke
Mgbe otu afọ na Johannesburg gasịrị, a kpọgara ya na London, United Kingdom n'isi ụlọ ọrụ Barclays ka ọ nweta ọzụzụ nchịkwa ụlọ akụ
Bongiwe laghachiri na South Africa na 2009 wee were ọrụ na-abawanye nke nta nke nta
N'oge ọ hapụrụ Absa, ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke Retail and Business Banking na Absa Bank Limited
Asụsụ Bongo–Bagirmi ma ọ bụ Sara–Bongo–Bagirmi bụ ngalaba bụ isi nke ezinụlọ asụsụ Central Sudan nwere ihe dị ka asụsụ iri anọ
Otu ndị isi gụnyere asụsụ Bagirmi dịka asụsụ Naba na asụsụ Sara
A na-asụ ha n'ofe CAR, Chad, South Sudan na mba ndị dị n'akụkụ
Asụsụ Bongo–Bagirmi ka amụchaghị nke ọma, ọ nweghịkwa nkwekọrịta dị nta gbasara nhazi nke ime ha
Tebụl dị n'okpuru ebe a bụ n'aka Lionel Bender, dị ka a chịkọtara na Blench (2000)
Sinyar na Fongoro nwere ike ọ gaghị abụ Bongo–Bagirmi ma ọ bụ ọbụna asụsụ Central Sudanic
Boyeldieu (2006) ekewapụta asụsụ Sara-Bongo–Bagirmi dịka ndị a
Boyeldieu (2006) tụlere ala nna (Urheimats) nke otu asụsụ dịka ndị a

Asụsụ Bongo-Bagirmi dị n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ dị nso na asụsụ Central Sudanic ndị ọzọ, ebe asụsụ Sara dị n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ agbanweela karịa site na profaịlụ ụdị Central Sudanic n'ihi kọntaktị na Ubangian na asụsụ ndị ọzọ
Aha osisi Proto-Sara–Bongo–Bagirmi
Aha azụ Per-Sara-Bongo-Bagirami
Ihe ndị dị na Sara–Bongo–Bagirmi na-abụkarị n'asụsụ French
Àtụ Central Sudanic languages
Boniface Mwangi (amụrụ na Julaị 10, 1983) bụ onye Kenya na-ese foto, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye na-eme ihe ike na-etinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
A maara ya maka foto ya nke ime ihe ike na-eme mgbe ntuli aka gasịrị nke dakwasịrị Kenya na 2007 na 2008
A mụrụ Mwangi na Taveta, Kenya, n'ókè ya na Tanzania
Nne ya bụ onye ọchụnta ego na-azụ ahịa gafee n'ókèala
Mwangi malitere ibi na nne na nna ya ochie na Nyeri, Central Kenya, mgbe ọ dị afọ isii
O mechara soro nne ya biri na mpaghara dị ala nke Nairobi nke Ngara, mgbe ahụ ọ bụ ụlọ elu dị na Majengo, Githurai 45, tupu o mechaa biri na Pangani
Mwangi na-abanye ma na-apụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ n'oge a ma nyere nne ya aka ire akwụkwọ
Mgbe nne ya nwụrụ na 2000, Mwangi, onye dị afọ iri na asaa n'oge ahụ, kpebiri na ọ ga-agbanwe ma ọ bụrụ na ọ gafere ndụ
Ọ sonyeere ụlọ akwụkwọ Bible na ebumnuche nke ịghọ onye ụkọchukwu, ma nweta diplọma na ọmụmụ Bible
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, ọ malitere inwe mmasị na foto
Onye Kenya na-ese foto bụ Mohamed Amin nwere mmetụta n'ebe ọ nọ
N'agbanyeghị na ọ nweghị agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Mwangi jisiri ike nweta ọnọdụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ odeakụkọ onwe onye
Iji kwado agụmakwụkwọ ya, ọ ga-anọgide na-ere akwụkwọ n'okporo ámá, mana n'oge na-adịghị anya ọ malitere inweta ahụmịhe dị ka onye na-ese foto
O bipụtara foto na akwụkwọ akụkọ mba The Standard, na 2005 nke meriri ihe nrite foto mbụ ya
N'ime afọ atọ, ọ natara nkwado mba ụwa dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-ese foto kachasị mma n'Africa
E nyere ya onyinye 2008 na 2010 CNN Africa Photojournalist of the Year Award
Otú ọ dị, o kwụsịtụrụ ọrụ foto ya, iji rụọ ọrụ na ikpe ziri ezi nke Kenya
Mwangi hapụrụ ọrụ odeakụkọ mgbe ọ hụchara ma dekọọ ihe ike na-eme mgbe ntuli aka gasịrị na Kenya na 2007 dị ka onye na-ese foto akwụkwọ akụkọ
Ọ nwere nchekasị na ịda mbà n'obi (ọ na-emetụtakwa ya n'onwe yadika ọ kwagara nwa oge mgbe a na-eyi ndị obodo ya egwu)
Nke ka mkpa, o nwere nkụda mmụọ na ọ ga-ekpuchi otu ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ahụ kpaliri ime ihe ike mana enweghị ntaramahụhụ
Ihe mbụ o mere bụ ọrụ Picha Mtaani, Swahili maka 'foto n'okporo ámá', na-egosi foto nke ime ihe ike na 2007 mgbe ntuli aka mba gasịrị, n'etiti agbụrụ dị iche iche
E gosipụtara ihe ngosi okporo ámá a na-agagharị agagharị gburugburu mba ahụ maka ndị mmadụ iji kwurịta nkwekọrịta ma kwalite ọgwụgwọ mba
Ihe karịrị mmadụ pụkụ narị isii hụrụ ihe ngosi ahụ
Nke a mechara gbakwunye site na akwụkwọ akụkọ Heal the Nation, nke a na-egosi karịsịa na mpaghara ndị ogbenye

N'ịgbaso atụmatụ ndị a, Mwangi malitere ịzụlite nguzo siri ike nke ikike mmadụ n'ọrụ ya na ịlụ ọgụ (ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ụlọ ọrụ), na-ekwu okwu megide ndị isi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọjọọ na ndị rụrụ arụ, yana ịkwalite ozi udo maka ntuli aka a haziri maka 2013 na atụmatụ a na-akpọ MaVulture na Team Courage
Team Courage bụ otu ndị na-akwado ndị na-arụ ọrụ na Nairobi nke na-agba mbọ ime ka ụmụ amaala na-ahụ mba n'anya mee ihe siri ike ma dị irè n'iwu Kenya ọhụrụ
Ihe ọhụrụ ọ malitere bụ Pawa 254 nke a malitere na 2011, ebe na oghere maka ndị na-ese ihe na ndị na-eme ihe iji rụkọọ ọrụ ọnụ maka mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ịkwalite ikike mmadụ na Kenya
Ndị uwe ojii jidere Mwangi na Mee 2019 maka ebubo na ọ na-ahazi mgbanwe na Kenya
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2016, Mwangi jikọtara William Ruto na ogbugbu nke onye na-akatọ gọọmentị Jubilee, Jacob Juma na-ekwukwa na Ruto chọkwara ka ọ nwụọ
N'otu ọnwa ahụ, Ruto gbara Mwangi akwụkwọ maka nkwutọ
N'ọnwa Disemba 2016, e boro Mwangi ebubo na ọ na-echepụta ebubo megide Ruto nke gụnyere ịzụ onye akaebe ka ọ ghara ịgha ụgha banyere ebubo gbasara ogbugbu Juma, n'ụlọ ikpe na ndị mgbasa ozi Kenya
N'otu ọnwa ahụ, Daily Nation kọrọ na otu onye si n'ọfịs Ruto si nyee Mwangi akwụkwọ ozi iji nyere ya aka n'okwu nkwutọ ya

Onye ahụ mechara gbanwee nkwupụta ya ma kwuo na Mwangi zụrụ ya ka o mepụta akụkọ banyere nkwupụta ya banyere ogbugbu Juma ma Mwangi enweghị ihe ọ bụla a ga-egosi banyere nkwupụta ọ bụla mana ọ ka chepụtara ebubo ndị na-adịghị adị na ndị a na-apụghị ịnwapụta banyere ogbugbo ahụ
O guzobere Ukweli Party ma bụrụ onye na-azọ ọkwa onye otu Starehe Constituency nke oche ndị omeiwu na ntuli aka Kenya nke afọ 2017
Ọ lụrụ Hellen Njeri Mwangi, onye ya na ya na-arụkọ ọrụ na Pawa 254
Ha nwere ụmụ atọ
Bonnie Mbuli (a mụrụ na 3 Machị 1979) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, nwanyị ọchụnta ego, na onye emume na telivishọn
A mụrụ Mbuli na Soweto, South Africa, n'afọ 1979
Ọ gara Dominican Convent School na Belgravia, Johannesburg, na Greenside High School na Greensides, Johannesburg
Onye okenye n'ime ụmụ atọ, onye na-eme ihe nkiri chọtara ya na ọdụ bọs mgbe ọ na-esi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ lọta, onye tinyere ya na ọrụ telivishọn mbụ ya na usoro Viva Families n'afọ 1992, mgbe ọ dị afọ 13
Nke a sochiri ọrụ cameo na mmepụta mba ụwa Born Free 2 na Cave Girls
Mbuli gara n'ihu na-egosi mmemme magazin dị iche iche maka telivishọn gụnyere Teleschool, Zapmag, Technics Heart of the Beat na Limits Unlimited
N'afọ 2001, ọ nwetara ọrụ dị mkpa na telivishọn Backstage, nke e mere maka ndị ntorobịa South Africa
E mechara tinye ya na ọrụ Portia na Gazlam
Nke a sochiri ọrụ na usoro ndị uwe ojii Zero Tolerance

Mbuli kwadoro ihe ngosi okwu na South Africa na SABC 1, True-Life, meriri ọrụ na obere usoro Homecoming, wee pụta na usoro telivishọn abụọ nke Canada Charlie Jade, akụkọ sayensị; na Scouts Safari, usoro njem nke e debere n'ọhịa Africa
Ọ rụzuru ọrụ dị mkpa na Home Affairs, usoro iri na atọ nke jikọtara ndụ ụmụ nwanyị ise dị iche iche, maka Penguin Films
Mbuli gara n'ihu na-eduzi ọrụ na usoro telivishọn Soul City na Hillside maka SABC 1 na SABC 2
A tụbara ya na usoro The Philanthropist maka NBC (mgbe e mesịrị na SABC 3)
Na ihe nkiri, ọ rụrụ ọrụ onye na-agụ egwu Dolly Radebe, na Drum, ọrụ ndu na ihe nkiri Danish Blinded Angels
N'afọ 2006, ọ rụrụ Precious Chamusso na Catch a Fire
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ Zindzi Mandela na ihe nkiri Clint Eastwood bụ Invictus
Ọ pụtara na Etv's Rhythm City, na usoro ihe nkiri nke Mzansi Magic dịka Dudu, na usoro nyocha mpụ nke Etv Traffic
N'afọ 2015, Mbuli so Sir Kenneth Charles Branagh mee ihe nkiri dịka onye uwe ojii Grace Mthembu na usoro Britain
Kemgbe afọ 2020, ọ na-eme ihe nkiri dịka Jasmine Hadley na usoro Britain Noughts + Crosses
Mbuli lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ahụ maka telivishọn bụ Sisanda Henna
Ha nwere ụmụ abụọ, otu n'ime ha bụ onye nkuchi
Ọ nakweere aha nna di ya
Mgbe ịgba alụkwaghịm ha gasịrị, o dere akụkọ ndụ onwe onye
Bonnie Ntshalintshali (1 Jenụwarị 1967 - 31 Disemba 1999) bụ onye South Africa na-emepụta ite na onye na-akpụ ihe ọkpụkpụ
A mụrụ Bonnie Mayvee Ntshalintshali n'ugbo dị na mpaghara Winterton nke KwaZulu-Natal n'afọ 1967
Dị ka nwa agbọghọ ọ lanarịrị ọrịa polio nke mere ka e were ya dị ka onye na-ekwesịghị ekwesị maka ọrụ ugbo siri ike, ya mere, a kụzịrị ya ihe gbasara ite na Fée Halsted-Berning na Ardmore Ceramics
Ha rụkọtara ọrụ ọnụ na 1985
Ọ gara n'ihu na Mahadum Natal n'afọ 1990
Na Ardmore, Bonnie Ntshalintshali bụ onye mmụta na mbụ, mana ka oge na-aga, ya na Halsted na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị ka ndị mmekọ
N'afọ 1988, Ntshalintshali meriri ihe nrite Corobrik National Ceramics Award
A kpọrọ ya na Halsted ndị mmeri nke Standard Bank Young Artist Award na 1990

Ndepụta maka ihe ngosi a, nke onye na-ese ihe na South Africa bụ Andrew Verster dere, kọwara arịa Ntshalintshali dị ka ndị a 'Ndị na-ese onyinyo n'ọrụ Bonnie, ụmụ anụmanụ, nnụnụ na ndị mmadụ niile bụ ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu
Otu onye na-adọrọ mmasị ha kpọmkwem n'ihi na ha bụ ndị dị ike
' N'afọ 1991, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ mepụta ihe osise ákwà dabere na arịa ya maka emume na Grahamstown
E gosipụtara ite ya na Seville Expo na 1992, na Venice Biennale na 1993, na South African Bienniale na 1995
Atụmatụ Ntashalintashali na-esikarị na omenala ọdịnala Zulu ma ọ bụ ihe ndị dị na Bible
Nwanne nwanyị dị ya, Beauty Ntshalintshali, nwanne ya nwoke Vuzi Ntshalintshala, na onye ikwu ọzọ, Somandla Ntshalintshal, sonyeere ya na Ardmore ma mụta ụdị ụlọ ahịa ahụ pụrụ iche
Bonnie Ntshalintshali nwụrụ na 1999, site na ọrịa metụtara HIV/AIDS
Ọ dị afọ iri atọ na abụọ
Iji wee mee ncheta ya, e hiwere Bonnie Ntshalintshali Museum na 2003, ebe ngosi nka mbụ na South Africa aha ya bụ nwanyị ojii na-ese ihe
Ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie ahụ dị na Ardmore Farm na Caversham, KwaZulu-Natal, ma nwee ọrụ Ntshalintshali yana ihe ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe Ardmore
E bipụtara akụkọ ndụ akwụkwọ foto maka ndị na-eto eto na-agụ akwụkwọ, Bonnie Ntshalintshali A New Way with Paint and Clay na 2006

Ardmore We Are Because of Others, akwụkwọ nke Fée Halsted-Berning nke na-akọwa akụkọ ihe mere eme nke arịa Ardmore, ma nwee ọtụtụ nkọwa gbasara ndụ na ọrụ Ntshalintshali (nke gụnyere ihe oyiyi nke arịa ya) na 2012
Bonny (nke mbụ bụ Ubani) bụ obodo ọdịnala, nke dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri na mpaghara gọọmentị ime obodo na Rivers State na ndịda Naịjirịa, na Bight of Bonny Ọ bụkwa isi obodo nke Alaeze nke Bonny
Dị ka omenala si dị (karịsịa n'etiti narị afọ nke 15 na nke 19) ọ bụ nnukwu ụlọ ahịa nke ọwụwa anyanwụ Delta, karịsịa na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ire ndị ohu
Bonny Island bụ isi ebe mbupụ mmanụ taa
Asụsụ a na-asụ na Bonny bụ Ubani, asụsụ Ijaw
Ọ dị ka Ndoki, olumba nke asụsụ Igbo

Mpaghara ahụ na-emepụta ụdị mmanụ crude nke a maara dị ka mmanụ Bonny Light Ọtụtụ n'ime mmanụ a na-amịpụta n'ikpere mmiri na steeti Rivers bụ ọkpọkọ na Bonny maka mbupụ O nwere nnukwu osisi LNG Gas na Nigeria nwere ụgbọ oloko isii (6) Ka ọ dị ugbu a, Gọọmenti etiti Naịjirịa ewepụtala atụmatụ maka ịrụ ụgbọ oloko nke asaa nke NLNG iji kwalite mmepụta gas na-atụ anya ịchị ahịa n'Africa
Bonny nwere àkwà mmiri a na-arụ site na Bodo na Gokana LGA iji mee ka ụgbọ njem ala A na-eme ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri miri emi dị ka ọrụ ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze sitere na CCECC
Alaeze nke Bonny bụ steeti nwere onwe ya na Niger Delta
Ọ bụ otu n'ime steeti ọdịnala nke Naịjirịa ugbu a
Alaeze ahụ, nke nwere ala ndị na-amaghị nwoke na mpaghara ala, bụ nke Ndoli na ụmụnne ya tọrọ ntọala tupu ma ọ bụ n'ihe dị ka AD 1000
Site na ndị isi a na ọgbọ ntọala niile nke alaeze ahụ, usoro ọchịchị nke a na-eji eme ihe ugbu a iji jikwaa steeti ahụ
Onye eze, ma ọ bụ Amanyanabo (n'ụzọ nkịtị 'onye nwe ala'), na-achịkwa usoro ndị isi nke Ase-Alapu (ma ọ bụ 'ndị isi nke ọbara eze') na Amadapu (ma ọ bụkwa 'ndị nwe mpaghara')
Alaeze nke Bonny dị ike malite na narị afọ nke 15 site na ọbịbịa nke ndị Portugal na ahia ohu Atlantic na-esote
Na narị afọ nke iri na itoolu, ọ bịara n'okpuru nrụgide na-arịwanye elu site n'aka ndị Britain iji kwụsị azụmahịa ahụ
Ọ dara n'agha obodo Bonny nke afọ 1869
Otú ọ dị, ihe fọdụrụ na ya na-aga n'ihu dị ka akụkụ nke usoro aristocratic nke oge a nke Naịjirịa
Àtụ LGAs of Rivers State
A na-akpọkwa BONO, onye a ma ama, Bron, na Boro, bụ asụsụ Conto, ma si otú a na-eme ka ndị mmadụ mara mma nke Ankan, Astean, na-amachi dị ka TWI
Ọ na-ekwu okwu site na nde 12 na Ghana, nke bụ isi na mpaghara Ghanaan nke Ghanafor nke Brong-Ahafo, na ihe karịrị 300,000 na Ivorn Iltern Overn Atht
Bono na olumba niile nke Akan na-aghọta ibe ya, mana ogo nghọta na-adabere na ebe dị anya n'etiti olumba ahụ
Bono dị nso na Asante, ya mere n'asụsụ dị nso, ebe asụsụ dịpụrụ adịpụ dị ka Fante dịkwa n'asụsụ
Ọtụtụ ndị na-asụ Bono na-asụsụ abụọ ma ọ bụ bidialectal na Asante
Tinyere echiche Fante, BONO bụ olumba kachasị na nke Akan, na-ejigide ọtụtụ atụmatụ, dị ka mkpụrụ aha nke atọ na nke atọ na nke onye ọzọ
Àtụ Languages of Ghana
Bonsu o bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere
Bonsucesso Futebol Clube, nke a na-emekarị ka ọ bụrụ Bonsucesso, bụ otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Brazil nke dị n'obodo Rio de Janeiro, n'ógbè Bonsucesso
Ndị otu ahụ na-asọ mpi na Campeonato Carioca Série B1, nke abụọ nke egwuregwu bọọlụ nke steeti Rio de Janeiro
Na August 12, 1913, e hiwere klọb ahụ
Na 1924, Bonsucesso bụ onye gbara ọsọ Campeonato Carioca LMDT (Liga Metropolitana de Desportos Terrestres)
Vasco da Gama meriri klọb ahụ n'ikpeazụ
Leônidas da Silva, Black Diamond, gbara Bonsucesso na 1931 na na 1932, nke Gentil Cardoso na-azụ ya bụ onye ekwuru na ọ webatara nhazi WM na Brazil
N'afọ 1935, onye ọkpụkpọ Bonsucesso aha ya bụ Emiliano Ramos, nke a na-akpọ China bụ onye kacha nwee goolu nke Campeonato Carioca nwere goolu iri na isii
N'afọ 1980, klọb ahụ sonyere na Campeonato Brasileiro Série B, a kpochapụrụ ya na nke abụọ
N'afọ 1983, klọb ahụ sonyere ọzọ na Campeonato Brasileiro Série B, a kpochapụrụ ya na nke mbụ

Bontle Moloi (née Modiselle) (amụrụ na 7 Ọktoba 1990) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-egosi telivishọn, onye redio, onye na-agba egwu, onye n’eti egwú, onye na-agụ egwu agu na onye nlereanya
N'afọ 2015, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri ịgba egwu Hear Me Move, nke mere ka ọ nata nhọpụta Africa Movie Academy Award maka Best Actress in a Supporting Role
A mụrụ Bontle Jade-Lee Modiselle na Percy na Grace Modiselle, na 7 Ọktoba 1990, na Soweto, Johannesburg, a zụlitere ya na mpaghara ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Johannesburg
Ọ bụ onye agbụrụ Tswana na-asụ asụsụ Bantu
Modiselle nwere ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ onye nlereanya Refilwe Modiselle na onye televishọn Candice Modiselle, ha abụọ nọkwa na ụlọ ọrụ ihe ngosiputa
Nna Modiselle bụ onye nlereanya, nwụrụ site na igbu onwe ya
Modiselle tara onwe ya ụta maka ọnwụ ya ka ọ na-arọ nrọ nke ihe ahụ tupu ya emee
Ọ gwara nne na nna ya abụọ mgbe ọ nwesịrị nrọ ọjọọ ahụ, mana ọ bịara bụrụ eziokwu nke metụtara ya nke ukwuu
Modiselle gara Mahadum nke Johannesburg ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke nka na nkwukọrịta ụlọ ọrụ
N'afọ 2007, Modiselle malitere ọrụ ịgba egwu ya site n'ịga ihe omume ịgba egwu, gụnyere klas ịgba egwu nke ndị na-agụ egwú na-eduzi
Ọ pụtara nke mbụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ dị ka onye na-eme ihe ngosi vidiyo egwu na onye na-agba egwu mgbe ụfọdụ
Modiselle pụtara na ọtụtụ vidiyo site n'aka ndị ama ama gụnyere DJ Tira, Rouge na Major League DJz
Modiselle wee pụta ìhè na oge mmeghe na usoro ihe nkiri SABC 3 Thula's Vine, ebe ọ gbara 'Lindi'
O sonyekwara na Mzansi Magic Lokshin Bioskop shot-film Lokshin FM, na-akpọ 'Meme'
Na 6 Febụwarị 2016, Modiselle pụtara na telivishọn mbụ ya dị ka onye na-elekọta usoro asọmpi SABC 2 nke Showville, dị ka onye na-akwado ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Rob van Vuuren
N'ọnwa di n’iru, o nyere onyinye na 2016 South African Film and Television Awards ya na ụmụnne ya ndị nwanyị
Na June 2017, a mara ọkwa Modiselle dị ka onye ngosi ọhụrụ nke ihe ngosi egwu etv Club 808, na-esonyere Lawrence Maleka iji dochie Boity Thulo
Ihe ngosi ahụ mere ihe omume ikpeazụ ya na 30 Machị 2018
Modiselle gara n'ihu na ọrụ nnabata ya na SABC 1 rap-battle competition series One Mic oge nke abụọ nke malitere na 7 Febụwarị 2019
Tupu ọ malite ịgba egwu, Modiselle sonyere dị ka onye na-ede egwu maka ọtụtụ ihe omume na ihe ngosi
Ọ bụ onye isi na-ede egwu maka usoro asọmpi egwu MTV Lip Sync Battle nke malitere n'afọ 2016
Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị na-agụ egwú na MTV Africa Music Awards 2016
Na 17–18 June 2019, Modiselle bụ onye isi choreographer maka ihe omume mbipụta Castle Lite Unlocks nke Meek Mill dere
Dị ka onye na-agba egwu, e gosipụtara ya na ihe omume dị iche iche gụnyere ihe omume egwuregwu Basketball National League (n'okpuru otu a na-akpọ Set If Off) na The MultiChoice Diski Challenge

Na Machị 2018, a mara ọkwa na a họọrọ Modiselle dị ka ihu ọhụrụ nke Revlon South Africa, ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Michelle Mosalakae na ndị na-egosi telivishọn Luthando Shosha na Kim Jayde Robinson N'ime mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi ha, e gosipụtara ya dị ka onye na-agba egwu na-akwalite okwu ahụ bụ 'Dance Proof' gbasara ejiji ColourStay ha
Modiselle lụrụ onye egwu Ricardo Moloi onye a maara dịka Priddy Ugly, onye ọ zutere na 2009
Na 19 Ọgọstụ 2019, ha mere ọkwa na ha na-atụ anya nwa mbụ ha site na mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi na-egosi nwa Modiselle
Ha mechara lụọ na 28 Septemba 2019, na agbamakwụkwọ ọdịnaala Afrịka
Bontle na di ya Priddy Ugly nwere nwa nwanyị, aha ya bụ Afrika Bonita Lerato Moloi
Okwu Boo na ada maka ụda dị elu, nke na-awụ akpata oyi n'ahụ, dị ka mkpu e bu n'obi iji tụọ egwu, ma ọ bụ dị ka oku ịkwa emo (lee booing)
Boo ma ọ bụ BOO nwere ike izo aka na
Élie Yaffa (French pronunciation [eli jafa]; amụrụ ya na ụbọchị 9 n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1976), nke a maara nke ọma n'okpuru aha ya bụ Booba, bụ onye French na á rap
Mgbe obere oge dị ka onye na-agba egwu ezumike na mmalite afọ 1990, Booba na enyi ya Ali jikọrọ aka wee mepụta Lunatic
Ha abụọ wepụtara abọm a ma ama n'afọ 2000 mana ha kwụsịrị n'afọ 2003
Kemgbe ahụ, Booba amalitela ọrụ naanị ya nke ọma, na-ere ihe karịrị nde diski iri n'elu ọrụ ya ma bụrụ onye na-ese ihe n'ụzọ iwu kwadoro na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke France
A na-eto Booba maka ịdị mma nke ọ na-asọ asọ na ịkụ ya mana a na-akatọkarị ya n'ihi ọdịdị esemokwu nke abụ ya
O guzobela akara rap Tallac Records, ma mepụta akara ọla
A mụrụ Élie Yaffa na ụbọchị 9 n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1976 na mpụga Paris na Sèvres
Nna ya bụ onye Senegal na nne ya bụ onye French nke Mosellan na onye Belgium
Ya na enyi ya Ali guzobere otu mmadụ abụọ Lunatic n'afọ 1994
Enweghị ike inweta nkwekọrịta ndekọ site na nnukwu labelụ n'ihi okwu esemokwu ha, ha mepụtara akara ndekọ onwe ha 45 Sayentifiki na 1999
N'afọ sochirinụ, Lunatic wepụtara abọm mbụ ya na naanị ya nke akpọrọ Mauvais œil
N'afọ 2002, Booba wepụtara abọm izizi ya Temps mort
Ọ gbasoro nke a na abọm anọ ọzọ Panthéon, Ouest Side (nke kachasị nwee ihe ịga nke ọma), 09 na Lunatic Ná ngwụsị afọ 2012, o wepụtara abọm nke isii ya bụ Futur
N'ozuzu ya, Booba nwere diski iri a kwadoro, Disques d'Or isii (abọm ọla edo), Disques de platine atọ (abọm Platinum) na otu Double disque de platine (abọm abụọ-Platinum)
N'afọ 2011, Booba meriri asọmpi 'My Youtube', n'ihu ndị na-ese ihe a ma ama dịka Rihanna, Justin Bieber, Lady Gaga, Eminem, Jay-Z, Sexion D'Assaut, Shakira, Stromae,
Booba bụkwa onye okike nke ụdị ejiji n'okporo ámá, Ünkut, otu n'ime ụdị ejiji a kachasị ewu ewu na France
Buhle Manyathi, onye a maara dịka Boohle, bụ onye South Africa na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu
A maara ya nke ọma maka egwu ya bụ'Yini Na', 'Slala Amalunde' na 'Siyathandana'
Egwú ya bụ nnke mejupụtara na Amapiano, afro-house, afro-soul, na ozioma
A mụrụ ya na obodo Vosloorus, Gauteng ebe onọ tolite
Ọ malitere ọrụ egwu ya mgbe ọ bụ nwata n'afọ 2016 mgbe ya na ụmụnne ya hiwere otu egwu ozioma atọ

Egwu ya akpọrọ 'Yini Na' ruru ọnụ ọgụgụ nke mbụ na chaatị YFM Hot 99 ya na DJ Candii ebe egwu ya ndị ọzọ dịka 'Slala Amalunde' pụtara ihe n'ikuku na ụlọ ọrụ redio dịka Jozi FM, Capricorn FM na Kasie FM
N'onwa julaị afọ 2020, o wepụtara Izibongo, abọm egwu asatọ nke gosipụtara ndị mmepụta egwu ya nọrọla ogologo oge, Tee-Jay na Elastic
Ya na JazziDisciples, Nonny D na DJ Stokie rụkọrọ ọrụ
N'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2020, ya na Josiah De Disciple rụkọrọ ọrụ na abọm egwu iri akpọrọ Umbuso Wabam’nyama
Abọm ahụ gosipụtara ndị egwu South Africa Le Sax, Chelete na Mogomotsi Chosen
N'abalị itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2021, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye egwu ọhụrụ kachasị mma nke afọ na African Social Entertainment Awards
Otu egwu ya bụ “Ngixolele” nke onye na-emepụta ihe nchịkọta ụda egwu amapiano bụ Busta 929 nọ n'ọkwa kachasị elu na The Official South African Charts
Otu a chịkọtara ihe karịrị mpụtara ngosi 778 200 gafee Spotify, Apple Music na Deezer
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2021, o ritere ihe nrite onye ọhụrụ amapiano kacha mma na nwanyị amapiano kacha mma na awọd South African Amapiano
Ụlọ Bookshop (nke a na-akpọkwa CSS Bookshop) bụ ụlọ dị na Lagos Island nke dị na Northeast part of Broad street na Odunlami street
Ọ bụ Godwin na Hopwood Architects kwadoro ya wee wuo ya na 1973
Mgbe ndị ozi ala CMS rutere Naijiria na 1850, ụfọdụ biri na Marina, Legos bụ́ ebe ha meghere otu obere ụlọ ahịa nkuku nke na-ere Bible na akwụkwọ akụkọ Ndị banyere Kraịst ndị ọzọ
Emechara zụta ụlọ a na-elekọta ụlọ ahịa ahụ ma wuo ihe owuwu ọhụrụ na 1927, Bishọp Melville Jones raara ihe owuwu a
Azụmahịa CMS mechara gbanwee aha ya ka ọ bụrụ CSS, Ndị na-eweta Ụka na Ụlọ Akwụkwọ
A kuriri ulo nke mbu nakwa nke Ikpeazu aruru n'afo 1973
Boor (nke a makwaara dị ka Bwara, Damraw) bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic nọ n'ihe egwu a na-asụ na ndịda Chad
Asụsụ ahụ nwere ihe na-erughị 100 ndị na-asụ obodo n'ụwa niile
Aha nna Booysen sitere Afrikaans, akpọkwa Booyze, Booyse na Booysens
Ọ nwere njikọ na aha nna Bekee Boyce na Boysen n'asụsụ German ndị ọzọ

Bopol Mansiamina (26 Julaị 1949 na 7 Nọvemba 2021), nke a makwaara dị ka Bopol ma ọ bụ Don Paolo, bụ onye egwu Congo na-emepụta ihe na onye a ma ama (onye na-akpọ bass, onye na-akpọ guitar dịka onye na-arọpụta egwú, onye na-emepụta egwú
O dekọrọ ma rụọ ọrụ nke ukwuu ihe karịrị afọ iri anọ dị ka onye na-agụ egwu n'onwe ya, dị ka onye otu ndị isi egwu Afrịka, yana ịkwado ọtụtụ ndị egwu Afrịka
A maara Bopol nke ọma maka ọrụ ya n'afọ 1980s na mmalite afọ 1990s dị ka otu n'ime ndị otu anọ nke nnukwu ìgwè Les Quatre Etoiles nke dị na Paris (Stars 4) na dị ka onye na-ese ihe n'onwe ya
A mụrụ Mansiamina n'ụbọchị 26 nke ọnwa Julaị afọ 1949, na Leopoldville (nke bụzi Kinshasa, Democratic Republic of the Congo) dị ka Paul Mansiamina Mfoko (ma ọ bụ M'Foko Mansiamina)
Site n'afọ 1969 ruo afọ 1978 Bopol dị na Zaire ma kpọọ egwu n'ọtụtụ ìgwè
Ọ sonyeere ọtụtụ n'ime ndị isi egwu Congo nke oge gara aga na ọgbọ ndị na-esote
Mgbe oge ahụ gasịrị, ọ kwagara West Africa maka afọ ole na ole

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, n'afọ 1969 o sonyeere Orchestre Bamboula (nke Papa Noel duziri ma gụnyekwa Madilu System; Pepe Kalle; Bozi Boziana; na Wuta Mayi, nke a maara mgbe ahụ dị ka Blaise Pasco, onye Bopol ga-arụkọ ọrụ ruo ọtụtụ iri afọ)
A họpụtara Orchestre Bamboula ka ọ nọchite anya Zaire n'afọ 1969 Festival of African Music na Algeria
Otú ọ dị, òtù ahụ kewara n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ lọtara na Algiers
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Bopol duziri mweghachi nke Orchestre Rock-a-Mambo
Ọ sonyeere Dr Nico's African Fiesta Sukisa n'afọ 1970
N'afọ 1971, o guzobere Orchestre [ma ọ bụ L'Orchestre ma ọ bụ Orchestra] Continental, nke gụnyere Blaise Pasco (mgbe e mesịrị Wuta Mayi), na Josky
Site n'afọ 1973 ruo afọ 1976 o sonyeere Afrisa, nke Tabu Ley duziri
N'afọ 1975, Bopol na Wuta nwere otu egwu, ma ọ bụ 'ọrụ,' a na-akpọ Orchestre Mamumay, nke wepụtara ma ọ dịkarịa ala ndekọ abụọ
N'afọ 1976, ya na Ray Lema na Félix Manuaku Waku malitere otu Ya Toupas
Ya Toupas kwadoro ma ọ bụ tinye onye na-agụ egwu Mpongo Love
Bopol gara n'ihu soro ya rụọ ọrụ egwu ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1990
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, Bopol kụrụ rhythm guitar na abọm ya nke afọ 1987 bụ Partager, ọ bụkwa ya dere atọ n'ime abụ isii ya (gụnyere egwu aha)
N'afọ 1978, ọ kwagara West Africa - Lome, Togo, na Abidjan, Cote d'Ivoire - wee sonye na Sam Mangwana's African All-Stars
Ndị egwu Congo ndị ọzọ nọ n'òtù ahụ gụnyere Syran Mbenza, Ringo Moya, na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Ụdị mbụ nke otu ahụ were naanị ihe dị ka otu afọ, ọ bụ ezie na, mgbe ahụ kewara abụọ, otu otu (gụnyere Mangwana, Bopol, na Syran Mbenza) kwagara Abidjan, na onye ọzọ nọrọ na Lome
N'afọ 1980, Bopol malitere ịdekọ egwu dị ka onye na-ese egwu
Ihe ụfọdụ nwere ike iwere dị ka abọm izizi ya abụghị nke a kpọrọ aha ya ha bụ atọ n'ime usoro abọm asatọ ewepụtara n'okpuru aha Orchestre Mode Succes, Innovations (vols
Mpịakọta nke 1, 3, na nke 4 na usoro ahụ gosipụtara Bopol na Baba Ley Assaka
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1982, Bopol bi na Paris ma na-edekọ abọm naanị ya
N'afọ ahụ, ya na Wuta Mayi, Nyboma, na Syran Mbenza guzobere Les Quatre Étoiles (kpakpando anọ)

Les Quatre Etoiles na-egwuri egwu ọnụ dị ka otu egwu, ma na-arụkwa ọrụ dị ka otu ndị isi nke ndị egwu nwere nkà bụ ndị na-akpọkarị egwu na ndekọ nke ibe ha, na nke ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe - dịka ọ na-apụta ìhè site na diski Bopol n'oge 1980s
O dekọrọ ma soro ndị otu ahụ rụọ ọrụ, dị ka onye na-ese egwu, na ịkwado ndị ọzọ na-agụ egwu site n'afọ 1980s na mmalite afọ 1990s
Na ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ndekọ ya, edepụtara onye mmepụta ma ọ bụ onye na-ede egwu dị ka Don Paolo, aha ọzọ maka Bopol
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1996, Bopol bi na United States

Georges Collinet kọrọ banyere mbipụta nke mmemme redio ya Afropop Worldwide nke raara onwe ya nye Les Quatre Etoiles, 'Mgbe ihe karịrị afọ iri biri na France, Bopol na Nyboma abịala US ugbu a, na-achọ ntọala ọhụrụ, n'ihi na ha na-ekwu na America, azụmahịa bụ azụmahịa, ebe na France, ndị mmadụ na-ele anya mgbe niile na agba akpụkpọ gị'

Collinet gara n'ihu, na-asụgharị site na ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Bopol na French maka mmemme ahụ, 'Bopol na-ekwu, ọ bụrụ na e nwere ezigbo ụlọ ọrụ na Zaire, m ga-ahọrọ ịrụ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ, n'ihi na enwere m ọtụtụ mkpali - ị nwere ike ịhụ ihe ndị mmadụ na-eme
Anyị na-ede abụ anyị site n'ile ndị mmadụ gburugburu anyị
Na Europe ọ siri ike; ị nwere ndụ dị iche
N'agbata afọ 2000 na afọ 2010, Bopol dekọrọ ma soro ndị omenkà ndị ọzọ mee njem, ọkachasị ndị otu Samba Mapangala, Virunga, na Ricardo Lemvo
Bopol nwụrụ na 7 Nọvemba 2021, n'ụlọ ya na Paris, site na ọrịa strok
Bopol nyere aka n'ọtụtụ egwu egwu Congolese kachasị mma mere n'oge 1980s na 90s
Ọrụ ya kachasị mma nwere ike ịbụ nke ahụ site na mmalite afọ 1980
'Manuela' bụ otu n'ime egwu ya pụtara ìhè
A na-amata ọtụtụ n'ime egwu ya dị ka ndị a na-agba egwu nke ukwuu, ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-ekwughachi ugboro ugboro
Ụfọdụ n'ime abụ ya - dị ka 'Pitie, Je Veux La Reconciliation', 'Samedi Soir', 'Bety Bety' - bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị n'ọtụtụ ebe ịgba egwú nke afọ 1980 gburugburu ụwa
N'ihe ndekọ ya n'onwe ya, ọ na-ejikarị ndị egwu mara mma gbaa onwe ya gburugburu
A kọwawo mmekọrịta guitar n'etiti Bopol na onye ya na ya na-arụkọ ọrụ ugboro ugboro, Syran Mbenza, dị ka 'akụkọ ifo'

Border Timbers bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ọhịa na ịkwa osisi na Zimbabwe
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-arụ ọrụ n'ọhịa ise na ebe atọ a na-awa osisi
Ngwaahịa ndị bụ isi gụnyere pine na eucalyptus
A na-edepụta ngwaahịa oke ala na Zimbabwe Stock Exchange na ndekọ ngwaahịa ya, Zimbabwe Industrial Index
A na-eresị ndị ahịa osisi osisi siri ike ma ọ bụ hazie ya n'otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ Border abụọ, ha abụọ dị na Mutare

Borders (French Frontières) bụ ihe nkiri na-emekọ ihe nkiri Burkina Faso-France nke afọ 2017 nke Apolline Traoré duziri ma dee ya ma bụrụ Amelie Mbaye, Naky Sy Savané, Adizelou Sidi, na Unwana Udobeong
nke onwe
Dị ka onye isi ihe nkiri ahụ, Apolline Traoré si kwuo, a chọrọ ka ndị ọrụ mmepụta ihe niile mee njem ụgbọ ala nke e gosiri na ihe nkiri ahụ 'Ọ dị mkpa iji gbaa ihe nkiri ahụ n'ụzọ ziri ezi

na ọchịchị obodo ọ bụla' O kwukwara na ọ chọrọ enyemaka ndị agha iji mee ihe nkiri 'Ebe ụfọdụ bụ ndị mwakpo ndị na-eyi ọha egwu metụtara, nke mere ndị agha ji soro anyị gaa' Ndị agha ahụ nwere ezi uche mgbe ha na-ese foto; anyị chefuru ha ruo mgbe anyị hụrụ ka ha na-apụta ọzọ na-edu anyị mgbe ọ bụla convoy anyị gawara
Akpọrọ Borders otu n'ime ihe nkiri iri abụọ kacha elu n'Africa oge niile site n'akwụkwọ akụkọ Britain bụ The Guardian
Dị ka France24 si kwuo, ọ bụ 'ohere igosi ọtụtụ ihu dị n'otu nke Africa n'otu oge na mgbagwoju anya n'otu oge' Ọrụ Apolline Traoré na ihuenyo na-aga n'ihu na-egosipụta ụdị omenala dị iche iche

Nzute ndị a abụghị ihe ndabara; ha na-eme kwa ụbọchị” Na magazin France bụ́ Jeune Afrique, a jara ọrụ onye nduzi ahụ mma, sị “Ọrụ elu dị nso na akụkọ ahụ na ọnọdụ ịgba égbè nwere mmetụta n’ezie na fim ahụ bụ eziokwu, bụ́ nke na-adịru mgbe ụfọdụ nso na fim ahụ
akwụkwọ akụkọ' Traoré, dị ka ọ na-eme na mbụ, na-elekwasị anya na anya ya na ụmụ nwanyị ndị akara aka na-eti mana ha kpebiri ịlụ ọgụ'
Onye isi ihe nkiri ahụ nwetara ihe nrite ndị na-ege ntị n'ememme World Cinema Amsterdam na Netherlands na 2017
N'otu afọ ahụ, o nwetara ihe nrite ECOWAS, Félix Houphout-Boigny, na Paul Robeson na mmemme ihe nkiri na ihe onyonyo nke Pan-African na Ouagadougou
Boris Nzebo, amụrụ na Port-Gentil na 1979, bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri nke bi ma na-arụ ọrụ osise ihe na Douala, Cameroon
Ọmụmụ ihe praịmarị Boris Nzebo mere na Libreville na Gabon
Mgbe o rutere na Cameroon, ọ malitere site na ịse ihe ịrịba ama omenala maka ịkpụ isi na ịchọ mma
Mgbe ahụ, ọ hapụrụ nke ahụ iji tinye onwe ya kpamkpam na nka na mbido afọ 2000
Ihe osise maka mgbasa ozi na mbụ ahapụla akara ya na njirimara nka ya

Dị ka onye na-ese ihe n'onwe ya, ọ nwetara ọzụzụ na Douala na ndị na-ese egwu Koko Komégné, otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke nka oge a na Cameroon, Hervé Yamguen na n'ọmụmụ ihe nke Goddy Leye haziri na ArtBakery na Bonendale dị nso na Douala, ebe o biri na 2007
N'oge obibi a, ọ na-ejikọta onwe ya na usoro dị iche iche vidiyo, foto, ntinye na arụmọrụ
O tinyekwara onwe ya n'ime ọrụ Roy Lichtenstein, Jack Mitchell, Jean-Michel Basquiat, Banksy na Takashi Murakami, onye ọ hụrụ n'anya karịsịa
N'ebe nka, ọ nyeere ndị na-ese ihe dịka Faouzi Laatiris (2007), Ato Malinda, Tracy Rose na Mariela Borello (2009), ndị gbakwunyere na agụmakwụkwọ Nzebo na mgbanwe ha, mkparịta ụka na ọrụ nka
N'ikpeazụ, ọ na-ekwu na isiokwu ya pụrụ iche bụ ịchọpụta ụdị ntutu isi n'ime obodo
N'ime ha, ọ na-ahụ ihe ịrịba ama nke ọkwa ọha na eze, nke ngosipụta nke echiche, nke ọdịbendị

Kedụ ka anyị si ghọta na gburugburu ebe obibi anyị adịghị mma dị ka isi anyị? Mgbe ntutu isi anyị na-arịa ọrịa, anyị na-elekọta ya, mana anyị anaghị eme ihe ọ bụla iji lụso nrụrụ aka ọgụ, mmebi ego, wdg

Anyị na-etinye mgbalị dị ukwuu n'ịgwọ ntutu isi anyị, gịnị mere anyị ji ghara ime otu ihe ahụ maka nsogbu ndị na-enye anyị nsogbu? Boris na-agwakọta profaịlụ doro anya nke ụmụ agbọghọ mara mma na ihe ịchọ mma nke ebe obibi dị ize ndụ

N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2008, o gosipụtara ọrụ ya nke mbụ ya n'ogige ndị na-ese ihe na Douala, ya na otu ndị omenkà isii na isiokwu Lady, Ọ na-ekwu na m bụ Lady, nke sitere na mkpali nke onye na-agụ egwu Naijiria bụ Fela Ramson Kuti banyere nnwere onwe ụmụ nwanyị
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2009, o sonyere n'ihe ngosi Jeunes Regards Urbains na doualzar, ya na ndị ọzọ na-eto eto Cameroon na-ese ihe, Landry Mbassi na Man Faust

Site na 2010, o sonyere n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi ndị ọzọ, na Cameroon nakwa na mba ofesi na 2010 Maison Revue Noire (Paris) na Savvy Contemporary (Berlin), na 2011 na Blachère Foundation (Apt), mgbe ahụ na 2011 na 2012 na Art Paris Art Fair na Ifa-Galerie (Berlin)
E gosipụtara ihe osise ya bụ Tête en l'Hair' na ngosi 30 ET PRESQUE-SONGES nke Joël Andrianomearisoa na doualńart
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi mmadụ abụọ, otu, In & Out of my head, na SUD2010 na Douala, na nke ọzọ, na mmemme Vil-Vissages, na Institut Français na Yaoundé na 2011
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2013, ndị doualzar gosipụtara ihe osise ya na ngosi nka nke oge a ART DUBAI, ebe a nabatara ha dị ka nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma
Jack Bell Gallery nke London hụrụ ya, nke nyere ya ohere n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi (na London na New York)
Born Into Struggle bụ ihe nkiri South Africa nke afọ 2004

Bose Alao Omotoyossi (amuru na abali isii nke onwaise n’afọ 1985) bụ nwaafọ Nigerian na eme ihe nkiri Nollywood
A mụrụ Bose na Lagos na ezinụlọ nmadu 5, dịka nwa nke anọ
O wee bụrụ onye a ma ama mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ na Yoruba Nollywood nkiri akpọrọ Itakun
Bose gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Command, ma gaa Gideon Comprehensive High School nke ọguchara na 2002
Ọ guru akwukwo mahadum na University of Lagos - ebe ọ gara igụ bayoloji (Okwusigodu ịgu ya be akwukwo mgbe ọ tụụrụ ime obere oge ka obidoro akwokwo
n'ihi ọtụtụ ọmụmụ, ọ nweghị ike ịlaghachi azụ na ulọ akwokwo)
Ọ gara Lagos City Polytechnic Ikeja ebe ọ nwetara akara National Diplọma na nchịkwa azụmahịa
Bose bụ Ọkachamara Nollywood onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Onye na-ese ihe nkiri, Endorsement Model na entrepreneur
Bose lụrụ Razak Omotoyossi bụ onye amuru na Naịjirịa na agba bọọlụ na obodo Benin
Ọ muru ụmụ nwanyị anọ
Awards Zafaa United Kingdom 2011 (Best Actress)

Bose Kaffo (onye a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 14 n'ọnwa Nọvemba nke afọ 1972 na Surulere,na Legos Steeti,nke Naijiria ) bụ onye egwuregwu ị pịa teniisi nke ala Naijiria nke gara asọmpi ise nke Olimpik site n'afọ 1992 ruo n'afọ 2008
Ọ bụ nwanyị Naijiria nke abụọ na-asọmpi n'egwuregwu Olimpik ise, ma a gụchaa onye ọgba ọsọ Mary Onyali
Onye ọzọ ruru ihe ogo a n'afọ 2008 bụ Segun Toriola onye egwuregwu ị pịa teniisi
Ka ọ na-eru ngwụcha nke asọmpi Olimpiki nke afọ 2008, naanị mmadụ iri na atọ na-egwu egwuregwu teniiss gburugburu ụwa pụtarala opekata mpe egwuregwu nke Olimpik ise
Ndi ya na ya gbara abuo n’egwuregwu Olimpik bu Abiola Odumosu n’afo 1992 na Olufunke Oshonaike site n’afo 1996 ruo n'afọ 2004

O nwetala ihe nrite iri na ise (ọla edo asaa) n'asọmpi o mere n’otu n’otu na ndị abụọ abụọ n’egwuregwu isii nke All-Africa Games site n'afọ 1987 rue n'afọ 2007, na-erite opekata mpe otu nrite n’egwuregwu ọbụla
N'asọmpi o mere naanị ya, o ritere ọla edo n'afọ 1995, ọlaọcha n'afọ 1999 ma n'afọ 2007, na ọla nchara n'afọ 2003
N'asọmpi ndị ha dị abụọ abụọ mee, o ritere ọla edo (ya na Olufunke Oshonaike) n’afọ 1995, n'afọ 1999, nakwazị n'afọ 2003, ọla ọcha n’afọ 1991, na ọla nchara n’afọ 2007

Na Mixed Doubles, ọ ritere ọla edo n'afọ 1991 (ya na Atanda Musa ), n'afọ 1995 (ya na Sule Olayele ), na afọ 1999 (ya na Segun Toriola ) tinyere ọla ọcha n'afọ 1987 n'afọ 2003 yana ọla nchara n’afọ 2007
Naịjirịa e meriela otu ọla edo na All-Africa Games
Bose Ogulu bụ onye Naijiria gụrụ akwụkwọ, nwanyị ọchụnta ego na onye njikwa
Ọ na-ejikwa ọrụ egwu nwa ya nwoke bụ Burna Boy wee bụrụkwa nkea ana-akpọ Mama Burna
Ogulu bụ Nwa nwanyị
onye nkatọ egwu Naijiria bụ Benson Idonije, bụ onye njikwa Fela Kuti

Site na nzere bachelọ nka n'asụsụ mba ofesi yana Masters of Arts na ntụgharị sitere na Mahadum Port Harcourt, Ogulu nwere ọrụ gara nkeọma dị ka onye ntụgharị maka Federation of West African Chambers of Commerce
Ọ na-asụ Bekee nke ọma, French, German, Italian na Yoruba
Ọ chiko bara ụlọ akwụkwọ asụsụ a na-akpọ Bridges Language, ebe ọ haziri njem imikpu omenala maka ihe karịrị otu puku mmadụ na narị asatọ na-eto eto
Na mgbakwunye, ọ kuziri French afọ iri na Mahadum Education na Port Harcourt, na-ala ezumike nka na 2018
Ogulu na-elekọta ọrụ egwu nwa ya nwoke Damini, onye na-eme dị ka Burna Boy na nwa nwanyị Nissi, onye na-eme n'aha nke ya
Ọ jikwara Burna Boy ruo 2014 wee bụrụ onye njikwa ya ọzọ site na 2017 gaa n'ihu, nweta aha Mama Burna
Ọ chịkọtala ihe nrite maka Burna Boy na mmemme dị iche iche, gụnyere All Africa Music Awards, The Headies na MTV Europe Music Award
Mgbe ọ nụrụ na Burna Boy emeriela ihe nrite MTV nke 2019 maka Best African Act, ọ kwụsịrị ihe ngosi ya iji gwa ya
Mgbe Burna Boy meriri ihe nrite anọ na 2018 Soundcity MVP Awards Festival, Ogulu nọchitere anya ya ma mee ka mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi nwee mmetụta site n'ikwu 'Na-atụ anya ara karịa'

Na 2019 BET Awards na California, Ogulu guzoro ka nwa ya nwoke nweta ihe nrite maka Best International Act wee kwuo okwu na-echetara ndị Africa-America ka ha cheta 'unu bụ ndị Africa tupu ị ghọọ ihe ọ bụla ọzọ' nke butere ikwu oto
Bose Ogulu bụ onye nchoputa na Onye ịsị nke Spaceship Collective , ụlọ ọrụ na-ejide Spaceship Records (akara ngosi ntụrụndụ) na Spaceship Publishing (akwa mbipụta)
Àtụ Infobox sportsperson
Bose Omolayo (amụrụ ya n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1989) bụ onye Naịjirịa na-eme egwuregwu ibu ike nke a na-akpọ Powerlifter n'olu bekeee
O riitere ọla edo na ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị 79 kilogram n'afọ 2020 na Summer Paralympics nke emere na Tokyo, Japan
Mgbe ọnwa ole na ole gachara, o ritere ọla edo na ihe omume ya n'afọ 2021 World Para Powerlifting Championships nke emere na Tbilisi, Georgia
N'ihe omume a, o setịpụkwara ihe ndekọ ụwa ọhụrụ nke kilogram 144
O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị +61 kilogram na 2014 Commonwealth Games ebe o ritere ihe nrite ọlaọcha
Bose Samuel bụ onye Naịjiria na-agba mgba
Ọ bụ onye nrite ọla ọcha na African Games yana onye ritere ọla nchara na Commonwealth Games
N’afọ 2018, o meriri ma rite ọla nchara n’egwuregwu igba mgba ụmụ nwanyị na Katigorị 53kg na 2018 Commonwealth Games nke e mere na Gold Coast, Ọstụrelia
N'afọ 2019, ọ nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na 2019 African Games nke e mere na Rabat, Moroko, were merie ma rite ọla ọcha n'emume mgba ụmụ nwanyị nke 53kg
N'afọ 2020, o meriri ma rite ọla ọcha na emume ụmụ nwanyị nke katigori 53kg na 2020 African Wrestling Championships nke e mere na Algiers, Ọljeria
Ọ sọrọ mpi na 2021 African & Oceania Wrestling Olympic Qualification Tournament ma nwee olileanya i ru eru maka asọmpi 2020 Summer Olympics na Tokyo, Japan

N'afọ 2014, Bosso ghọrọ ebe obibi nke ọtụtụ puku ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ gbanarị ọsọ agha na Steeti Borno

Botha (nke a na-akpọ /ˈbʊərtə/ olumba ndị na-abụghị nke Rhotic nke Bekee, Afrikaans pronunciation ) bụ aha nna Afrikaans, nke sitere na Friso-Saxon Both
Frederich Botha wetara ya na Odịda Africa n'afọ 1678
Ndị nne na nna nke agbụrụ ahụ bụ Maria Kickers, onye mbụ ya na Ferdinandùs Appel mekọrọ, na dịya bụ Frederich Botha
Tupu Maria Kickers alụa Frederich Botha Maria Kickers nwere nwa na-abụghị di ma ọ bụ nwunye nke Ferdinandùs Appel, onye ọzọ Hollander si n'ezinụlọ Amsterdam mụrụ
Nwa a, bụ nwa nwoke aha ya bụ Theunis, ka ndị Bothas mesịrị kuchie
Ụmụ ya gụnyere
Ha lụrụ di na 1714, Kickers na Botha mechara rụọ ọrụ ugbo n'etiti Stellenbosch na Somerset West
Taa, ụmụ ha iwu kwadoro dị ihe dị ka mmadụ puku iri asaa na isii, otu nari na iri abuo nise gụnyere

Botswana drinks and allied staff union (BB na AWU) bụ otu ndị ọrụ na-arụkọ ọrụ nke Botswana federation of trade union na Botswana
Botswana Central Bank Staff Union (BCBSU) bụ otu ndị ọrụ mmekọ nke Botswana federation of trade union in Botswana
Botswana Stock Exchange (BSE) bụ ụlọ ahịa dị na Gaborone, Botswana
E hiwere ahịa ahịa Botswana na 1989 wee bụrụ Botswana Stock Exchange na 1994
Ọ bụ Botswana Stock Exchange Act na-achị ya

The BSE nwere ndepụta ahịa 36 na ndepụta ngwaahịa atọ ndenye ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ (BSE DCI); Ndekọ ụlọ ọrụ mba ofesi (BSE FCI), na-ejikọta ụlọ ọrụ ndị nwere ọnụọgụ abụọ edepụtara na BSE na mgbanwe ngwaahịa ọzọ; na Index ụlọ ọrụ niile, nke bụ ọnụ ọgụgụ dị arọ nke DCI na FCI
As well as equities, bonds and Floating Rate Notes are traded
Private investors are estimated to account for under 10% of the total market capitalisation
Foreign-based mining companies make up over 90%
Oge azụmaahịa nke mgbanwe a na-adị site na 10 00 ruo 14 00 n'ụbọchị niile n'izu ma ewezuga Satọdee, Sọnde na ezumike ndị Exchange kwupụtara tupu oge eruo
Ikike inye ikike maka ndị na-ere ahịa na Botswana bụ Ministri Ego
Ndị otu nwere ike ịbụ ụlọ ọrụ ma ọ bụ onye ọ bụla
Otu ndị ọrụ ụlọ akụ mmepe mba Botswana (BNDBU) bụ òtù ọrụ aka nke Botswana Federation of Trade Unions na Botswana
Botswana Savings Bank BSB, bụ ọgbakọ ọrụ ego na Botswana
Enyere ya ikike dị ka ụlọ akụ mmepe site n'aka Bank of Botswana, onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ akụ nke mba

BSB bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ego gọọmentị nwere nke na-achịkọta ego n'ụlọ site na ịnakwere nkwụnye ego ndị ahịa, na-enye ego mgbazinye ego na usoro azụmahịa ma na-enye ọrụ ego ndị ọzọ dịka o chere na ọ dị mkpa iji gboo mkpa nke ndị Botswana
N'ịbụ nke guzobere na 1992 site na iwu nke ndị omeiwu, ụlọ akụ ahụ na-enye ndị ahịa ya ihe ndekọ ego ego, mgbazinye ego mgbazinye, mgbazinye ụgbọala na mgbazinye ego ndị ọzọ echekwara
Banklọ akụ ahụ bụ onye otu World Savings Banks Institute
Dị ka Bank of Botswana si kwuo, Botswana Savings Bank nwere ihe onwunwe nke ihe dịka US $ 73 nde (BWP 480 nde) ka ọ na-erule Disemba 2009
Ụlọ akụ ahụ nwere alaka abụọ; otu na Gaborone na nke ọzọ na Francistown
Na mgbakwunye, BSB nwere nkwekọrịta mmekọrịta na BotswanaPost iji nye ọrụ ụlọ akụ site na ihe karịrị ụlọ ọrụ nzipu ozi Otu narị na iri abụọ na mba ahụ dum
Botswana Stock Exchange (BSE) bụ ụlọ ahịa dị na Gaborone, Botswana
E guzobere ahịa òkè Botswana n'afọ 1989 wee ghọọ Botswana Stock Exchange n'afọ 1994
Ọ na-achịkwa site na Botswana Stock Exchange Act

BSE nwere ndepụta ahịa 36 na akara ngwaahịa atọ akara ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ (BSE DCI); akara ụlọ ọrụ mba ọzọ (BSE FCI), na-agụnye ụlọ ọrụ abụọ edepụtara na BSE na mgbanwe ngwaahịa ọzọ; na All Company Index, nke bụ nkezi nke DCI na FCI
Tinyere ihe onwunwe, bonds na Floating Rate Notes na-ere ahịa
A na-eme atụmatụ na ndị na-etinye ego n'onwe ha ga-abụ ihe na-erughị pasenti iri nke ngụkọta ahịa ahịa
Ụlọ ọrụ ndị na-egwupụta ihe n'ala na mba ọzọ mejupụtara ihe karịrị pasenti iri itoolu
Oge azụmaahịa nke mgbanwe a na-adị site na 10 00 ruo 14 00 n'ụbọchị niile nke izu ma ewezuga Satọdee, Sọnde na ezumike ndị Exchange kwupụtara tupu oge eruo
Ikike ikikere maka ndị na-ere ahịa na Botswana bụ Ministri Ego
Ndị otu nwere ike ịbụ ụlọ ọrụ ma ọ bụ onye ọ bụla

Boualem Boukacem (Arabic بوعلام بوقاسم ), (a mụrụ na Ọktoba 12, 1957, na Beni Amrane) bụ onye na-agụ egwu Kabyle n'ime egwu Algeria
A mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1957, n'okpuru aha Boualem Boukacem n'ime obodo Azela n'ime mpaghara Boumerdès
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, ọ malitere ọrụ nkuzi ya na 1977 na mpaghara Col des Beni Aïcha n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ nke ugwu Khachna na ala Kabylia

Ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe na egwu Kabyle malitere na 1978 ma nyefee ya mgbe a tọhapụrụ abọm mbụ ya na 1981, ọ sonyeere n'etiti ọrụ nkuzi ya na ọrụ ya dị ka omenkà ruo 1986 mgbe o kpebiri itinye onwe ya kpamkpam na egwu ọkachamara
Ọ bụ onye na-agụ egwú nke nwere ahụmahụ nke na-ejikwa ma na-eji dị ka ngwá egwú dị egwu dị ka mandola Algeria, guitar, ney, flute na violin
N'oge ndị Salafist na-eyi ọha egwu na Algeria, Boukacem gara mba ọzọ na 1992 ebe ọ nọrọ afọ asatọ tupu ọ laghachi mba Algeria n'afọ 2000

N'afọ 2020, onye na-agụ egw na bụ Boukacem mepụtara na ndepụta ihe nrite ya ngụkọta nke ihe karịrị abọm iri ise, nke onye na-agụ egwu bụ Ouardia Aissaoui bụrụ abụ 4 abọm, onye na-abụnwanyị egwu bụ Thanina Cheriet, nwa nke onye na na-agụ egwú bụ Idir bụrụ abụ 3 ndị ọzọ

N'ime ihe karịrị afọ 40 nke ọrụ nka, Boukacem nwere ihe karịrị otu narị vidiyo na iri abụọ mepụtara, ma mee ihe karịrị otu puku galas na nnọkọ na Algeria na ebe ndị ọzọ, ma sonye na ihe karịrị otu otu narị mmemme telivishọn
N'oge 2010 Africa Cup of Nations, Boukacem wepụtara abọm iji gbaa ndị otu bọọlụ mba Algeria ume n'oge egwuregwu iru eru nke 2010 FIFA World Cup na ihe omume egwuregwu Afrịka a
A tọhapụrụ abọm a na mmekorita ya na onye na-edebe goolu mba Lounès Gaouaoui, ma tinye maka oge ahụ ọtụtụ egwu iri na abụọ iji gbaa ndị otu akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ mba ume
Boukacem esorola ọtụtụ ndị omenkà ndị ọzọ rụkọọ ọrụ n'oge ogologo ọrụ ya na ọtụtụ ndị omekome na abụ abụọ
Boubacar Diallo bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Burkinabé
Nwa nke dọkịta anụmanụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ, na-amalite akwụkwọ akụkọ na-atọ ọchị kwa izu Journal du Jeudi ma na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ abụọ na nchịkọta akụkọ dị mkpirikpi
N'afọ 2005, ọ malitere ọrụ ọhụrụ dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, na-ese ihe nkiri atọ, Traque à Ouaga, ihe nkiri ịhụnanya Sofia, na ihe nkiri Danish Dossier brûlant, ihe nkiri
Site n'enyemaka ego nke Francophonie na French Foreign Ministry, o mepụtara usoro ihe nkiri TV Série noire à Koulbi, ihe nkiri mpụ na nkeji iri atọ na ise, na 2006
Boubacar Haïnikoye Soumana (ka amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 7 n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1998) bụ onye Nigerien na-agba bọọlụ na CR Belouizdad na ndị otu mba Niger
Ọ nọrọ oge na Norway na ule na Kristiansund BK na Hamkam na 2018
Na Mee 2018 Haïnikoye sonyeere Ghanaian Champions Aduana Stars FC na nkwekọrịta afọ 2 site na US Gendamerie National
Na Jenụwarị sochirinụ, onye ọkpụkpọ ahụ kwagara CR Belouizdad nke Algeria, ọzọ na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ, na-enwe olileanya inweta oge egwuregwu
N'afọ sochirinụ, onye ọkpụkpọ ahụ sonyeere NC Magra nke Algeria Ligue Professionnelle 1
A kọrọ na Haïnikoye bụ onye a na-emegbu agbụrụ site n'aka ndị isi otu na-emegide ya n'oge egwuregwu egwuregwu megide JS Saoura na 29 Mee 2021
Haïnikoye gbara egwuregwu izizi ya na mba ụwa na 13 Ọgọstụ 2017 na 2018 African Nations Championship qualification match against the Ivory Coast
Ọ gara n'ihu nye goolu mbụ ya maka ndị otu ahụ na egwuregwu ahụ, onye meriri na mmeri 2-1
Àtụ Updated
Boubacar Talatou (bu onye amụrụ na ọnwa Disemba 3, 1987 na Niamey ) bụ onye Nigerien na-agba bọọlụ
Ọ na-egwuri egwu dị ka onye na-agbara Djoliba AC bọọlụ na Mali
Diego gbara bọọlụ na AS FNIS, AS Mangasport nke Gabon na ndị otu South Africa Orlando Pirates
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger, ebe a kpọrọ ya na 2012 Africa Cup of Nations na 2013 Africa Cup of Nations
Boubagar Soumana bụ onye Nijeiria na-akụ ọkpọ
O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwoke na Summer Olympics nke afọ 1984
Bouchra Ahrich (nke a na-akpọkwa 'Hraich'; a mụrụ n'abalị 27, ọnwa Julaị afọ 1972 na Salé) bụ onye Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ọchị
A mụrụ Ahrich na Salé
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ debanyere aha na Institut supérieur d'art dramatique et d'animation culturelle (ISADAC) na Rabat, ebe ọ nọrọ afọ anọ na-amụ ihe nkiri
Bouchra Chaabi (amụrụ na 22 Septemba, na afọ 1980 na Bougargouh) bụ onye Morocco na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge nke maara nke ọma na 3000 mita steeplechase
O mere egwuregwu Olympic mbụ ya na 2000 Sydney Olympics, na-agba ọsọ na mita 10,000
N'afọ ahụ, ọ bụ onye nwetara ọla nchara na ihe omume ahụ na 2000 African Championships in Athletics
O mere n'elu iri abụọ na ọsọ dị mkpirikpi na IAAF World Cross Country Championship ọ bụla site na afọ 2002 ruo na afọ 2006
Ọ malitekwara ịsọ mpi na 3000 mita steeplechase wee bụrụ onye mmeri kọntinent na mmeri ọla edo na afọ 2004 African Championships in Athletics
O meriri asọmpi ịgba ọsọ Eurocross cross country n'afọ 2004
Chaâbi gara n'ihu merie ọla nchara mita 5000 na afo 2004 Pan Arab Games n'ikpeazụ n'afọ ahụ
Ọ gbanwere na 3000 m steeplechase maka 2005 World Championships in Athletics ma jisie ike mechie nke iri na ihe omume ikpeazụ
N'afọ ahụ, ọ bụ onye nwetara ọlaọcha 5000m na 2005 Jeux de la Francophonie n'azụ onye obodo ya Zhor El Kamch
O nwetara ọla nchara steeplechase na 2006 African Championships in Athletics
Ọ gbara ọsọ 1500 mita na 2007 World Championships in Athletics mana e wepụrụ ya na okpomọkụ
Ọ gbara ọsọ n'otu ebe ahụ maka Morocco na afọ 2008 Summer Olympics, mana ọ nweghị ọganihu gafere agba nke mbụ ọzọ
Na afọ 2009 ya gosipụtara site na nrite ọla edo 5000m na ọlaọcha 10,000m na Jeux de la Francophonie
O nwetara ọkwa nke abụọ na afọ 2010 Cross de la Constitución na Disemba, na-agwụ n'azụ Mónica Rosa
Bouchra Khalili (a mụrụ n'afọ 1975 na Casablanca ) bụ onye Morocco-French na-ese ihe
Ọ bụ onye a zụlitere n'etiti Morocco na France, ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri na Sorbonne Nouvelle na Fine Arts na École nationale supérieure d'arts de Paris-Cergy
Ọ bi na Berlin, Germany
Na-arụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri, vidiyo, ntinye, foto, na mbipụta, omume Khalili na-akọwapụta asụsụ, isiokwu, okwu, na nchọpụta ala
'Ọ na-emegharịkarị usoro ihe nkiri iji lekwasị anya na ịkọ nkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme na nnọchi anya nke isiokwu ndị mba na-ala na-adịghị ahụ anya'
A pụrụ ịhụ nke ọ bụla n'ime ọrụ ya dị ka ikpo okwu a na-enye ndị otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị nta iji kọwaa, kọọ, ma kesaa atụmatụ na okwu nke iguzogide
Ihe osise ya na-elekwasị anya na ịkọ akụkọ onwe onye nke na-emetụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị siri ike, na-emepe ụzọ dị oke mkpa na nke ziri ezi iji jụọ ụmụ amaala, obodo na ụlọ ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ na-ezute ihe ọmụmụ nka ya na njem ya na Middle East, North Africa, na Europe, na ebe njem ma na-eduzi usoro nzukọ na mkparịta ụka mbụ ka ọ na-ese ha ma na-anakọta data ya dị mkpa

Site n'itinye isiokwu ndị ahụ na ihe osise ya, ọ na-enye mmetụ mmadụ dị nro karị, na-egosi akụkọ ndụ na ihe isi ike n'ezie, ebe ndị na-ege ntị nwere ike ijikọ ma guzoro n'ịdị n'otu, na-eme ka ahụmịhe ahụ dịkwuo nso na nke onwe ya

N'ọtụtụ ọrụ ya, a naghị ahụ isiokwu ndị ahụ ma ha enweghịkwa olu; a na-ekwupụta ha ma nụ ha n'ụzọ doro anya, na-ekwu okwu n'asụsụ asụsụ ha, na-agbakwụnye ya mere na mmetụ mmadụ n'ezere nzuzo ha na ahụ erughị ala ha

Ọrụ ya adabereghị na ngosipụta rụrụ arụ, nke ọbara ọbara nke ahụ na-ata ahụhụ, ihe oyiyi a na-ebo ebubo, na ihe ngosi gburugburu iji mepụta mmetụta, kama ọ bụ na usoro ihe nkiri kpọmkwem na okpokoro edozi na mgbakwunye na ọdịdị nke asụsụ a na-asụ n'onwe ya

N'ihi ya, site n'ụzọ ziri ezi na aghụghọ, ọrụ ya na-agbagha akụkọ hegemonic banyere mbugharị na enweghị mba, yana ime ihe ike ha na-akpata ma na-eme ka ọ dị mma, ebe ọ na-agbakwa mbọ ka omume ihe nkiri nke oge a gaa n'ihu, ma n'ụzọ ziri ezi ma n'ụzọ mara mma

Khalili's documentary practice, in its incisive and exacting seriousness, can seem at once oddly traditional and, because of this, unique amid the aesthetically experimental and sometimes emotionally manipulative work that can befall the politically motivated documentary impulse

E gosipụtala ọrụ Khalili na mba ụwa dịka na 'The Mapping Journey Project' solo show na MoMA, New York (2016); 'Foreign Office', solo show na Palais de Tokyo, Paris (2015); 'Garden Conversation', solo show na MACBA, Barcelona (2015); 'Here & Elsewhere', New Museum, New York (2014); 'The Opposite of the Voice-Over', solo show na Justina M

Barnicke Gallery, Toronto (2013); 'The Encyclopedic Palace', 55th Venice Biennale (2013); 'Living Labour', solo show na PAMM, Miami (2013); 'La Triennale', Palais de Tokyo, Paris (2012); 18th Biennale of Sydney (2012); 10th Sharjah Biennial (2011); na documenta 14 (2017) n'etiti ndị ọzọ

Ọ bụ onye natara Radcliffe Institute Fellowship, Radcliffe Institute for Advanced Study, Harvard University (2017-2018); 'Abraaj Group Art Prize', (2014); 'Sam Art Prize 2013-2015', Sam Art Projects, Paris; 'DAAD Artists-in-Berlin Program' (2012); 'Vera List Center for Arts and Politics Fellowship' (The New School, New York, 2011–2013); 'Villa Médicis Hors-les Murs' (2010); 'Videobrasil Residency Award' (2009); 'Image-Mouvement Grant' (French National Centre for the Arts, 2008); 'Louis Lumière Documentary Award' (Film Office, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, France, 2005)
Boukha (Tunisian Arabic ) bụ ihe ọṅụṅụ a na-aṅụ mmiri ara ehi nke e ji fig mee
Ọ malitere na obodo ndị Juu nke Tunisia, ebe a ka na-emepụta ọtụtụ n'ime ya
Aha ya pụtara 'mmanya na-aba n'anya' na Judeo-Tunisian Arabic
A na-enweta ya site na nsacha dị mfe nke fig Mediterenian
Ọnụ ọgụgụ mmanya ya dị n'agbata pasent 36 na pasent 40
Enwere ike iri Boukha ozugbo na okpomọkụ ụlọ ma ọ bụ oyi, ma ọ bụ bụrụ ihe ndabere maka mmanya mmanya na saladi mkpụrụ osisi
Boulaid bụ aha nna North Africa
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere
Boulos Enterprises bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ekesa, na-eme mgbakọ, na ụlọ ọrụ na ịzụ ahịa maka ọgba tum tum, igwe kwụ otu ebe, tricycles, na moto ndị dị n'èzí
Ọ bụ ụmụnne Anthony na Gabriel Boulos guzobere ya
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere ọtụtụ ụdị ama ama dịka Aprilia, Moto Guzzi, na Haojue
Ọ bụ naanị onye na-ebubata ma na-ekesa Suzuki na Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ nna ha, George Boulos, onye na-akpụ ọla na Lebanọn nke kwagara Naịjirịa na afọ 1936 na-elekọta azụmahịa ọla

George na ndị ahịa ya zụlitere mmekọrịta dị mma nke gosipụtara na ọ baara azụmaahịa ahụ uru ka ọ na-etoliteIji N'etiti afọ 1950, ụmụ George, Anthony na Gabriel, gbasaa azụmahịa ezinụlọ site na mbubata ọgba tum tum Miele, Durkopp, na Göricke
Profaịlụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gbasaa site n'ebe ahụ, na-eduga n'ịbanye ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na afọ 1964

Ka ọ na-erule ngwụcha afọ 1960, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe na Oregun, Lagos, nke jikọtara ọgba tum tum Suzuki nke e ji akụkụ ma ọ bụ akụkụ niile kụtuo, si otú a bụrụ ụlọ ọrụ mbụ na Naịjirịa iji jikọrọ ọgba tum
Ọzọkwa, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere ikike ijikọta ọgba tum tum 7,200 kwa oge
N'afọ 1979, mgbe gọmentị Naịjirịa machiri mbubata ọgba tum tum zuru oke, profaịlụ Boulos ka mma, na-eme ka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụrụ onye na-ere ọgba tum na mba ahụ
N'afọ 1975, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwetara ala na Ogba Industrial estate, malite usoro nke imepụta ọgba tum tum Suzuki zuru ezu
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mepụtara usoro nkesa nke dugara n'ịmepụta ebe ọrụ na mba ahụ
Ebe ndị a nwere ike itinye akụkụ ndị ọzọ yana ịgụnye onye na-arụ ọrụ Suzuki a zụrụ azụ na ebe ọ bụla
N'afọ 1985, ezinụlọ Boulos mere ka ọdịmma ha dị iche iche na Naijiria site na ịmepụta Bel Impex Limited, onye na-emepụta akwụkwọ anụ ahụ
N'agbata afọ 2010 na afọ 2016, Boulos Enterprises nọchitere anya Piaggio India mgbe ọ na-achịkọta tricycles na mba ahụ
Boumal bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere

Bound, bụ ihe nkiri ịhụnanya nke afọ 2018 nke Frank Rajah Arase duziri ma Lilian Afegbai mepụtara Ndị ihe nkiri dị ka Rita Dominic na Enyinna Nwigwe na -ebute ụzọ ebe Joyce Kalu, Nicole Banner, Duke Emmanuel, na Neye Balogun rụrụ ọrụ nkwado
Esere ihe nkiri a n'Enugwu, Naịjirịa
Algeria bourek (Arabic), nke a makwaara dịka 'brik' n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Algeria, bụ ụdị a ma ama nke na-atọ ụtọ nke a na-ahụ na Etiti owuwa anyanwu na North Afrika
A na-ejikarị mpempe akwụkwọ phyllo, nke a maara dịka 'dyoul' na Obodo Algeria, nke a pụrụ ịzụta n'ụlọ ahịa maọbụ mee n'ụlọ
A na-ejikọta mpempe akwụkwọ ndị a na ngwakọta nke poteto, yabasị a pịrị apị, na ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ dịka cumin na paprika
Na mgbakwunye na itinye poteto, bourek Algeria nwekwara ike ịgụnye ụdị ndị ọzọ dịka tomato na anụ a pịrị apị, shrimp, ọkụkọ, maọbụ anụ ehi a gwakọtara ya na cheese
Mgbe ahụ, a na-agbakọta achịcha ahụ n'ụdị triangular maọbụ sie ya maọbụ rie ya nke ọma ruo mgbe ọ ga-abụ ọla edo ma sie ya
Bourek na-abịa n'ọtụtụ ọdịdị na nha dị iche iche, gụnyere triangles, rectangles, ya na spirals
A na-ejikarị bourek nke Algeria eme ihe dịka ihe oriri maọbụ ihe oriri, a pụkwara ịchọta ya n'ọtụtụ ndị na-ere nri n'okporo ámá na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na mba ahụ dum
A na-ejikarị ya eme ihe n'oge Ramadan dịka akụkụ nke nri iftar, nri nke na-emebi ibu ọnụ kwa ụbọchị n'oge ọnwa dị nsọ

Gecko Bouro Mpela, onye a makwaara dị ka Bouro Mpele (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 5 n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1975), bụ onye na-agụ egwú, onye na-agba egwu, na onye na-eme ihe nkiri si na Democratic Republic of the Congo
Ọ bụ onye otu Quartier Latin International, nke Koffi Olomide guzobere ma duzie
A mụrụ ya na Jean Robert Yoka Mpela na Marie Bilepo
Bouro buru oke ibu mgbe a mụrụ ya, nsogbu nke nọgidere na ndụ ya
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ na-agụ egwú nke nwere nne na nna, nne na nna na ụmụnne ma ọ bụ ndị nwere ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ma ọ bụ talent ma nwee mmasị na azụmahịa
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ dị n'ógbè ahụ ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere mahadum
Ọ bụ onye otu ukwe chọọchị ya
Mgbe nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye Alain sonyeere òtù Wenge Musica, Bouro malitere iso ya na-emegharị n'ụlọ
Ya na Willy Bula, nwanne nwoke nke otu n'ime ndị otu Alain na Wenge, mekwara nnwale
N'ihe dị ka afọ 1995, Bouro malitere ịbụ abụ ma soro ọtụtụ ìgwè egwu rụọ ọrụ, ka ọ na-aga n'ihu n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
N'afọ 1996, Bouro gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum ma mepee ohere maka onye na-agụ egwú na Quartier Latin International, n'ihi ọpụpụ Willy Bula
Bouro rịọrọ nna ya ka o nye ya ikike ịghọ onye na-agụ egwú ma nna ya kwetara
N'etiti afọ 1996 na afọ 2006, Bouro ga-esonye ma hapụ Quartier Latin ugboro atọ
Mgbe ọ nọ ebe a, o dekọrọ ma wepụta ọtụtụ egwu, gụnyere Washington na Calvarie
Ya na ndị otu ahụ mekwara njem nleta n'Africa na Europe
Ọ hapụrụ kpamkpam mgbe Koffi jụrụ ya ikike ịmepụta abọm n'onwe ya mgbe ọ bụ onye otu ahụ
Na egwu Inchallah, Bouro bụ onye nke abụọ na-abụ abụ solo ya, na-amalite ihe dị ka nkeji 2 50, mgbe Fally Ipupa gasịrị
N'afọ 2005, ya na nwanne ya nwoke bụ Alain Mpela, mepụtara abọm 'Mortel Combat'
O nwekwara ngwaahịa ndị ọzọ, gụnyere Vice De Procedure na ndị dị ka Ecole d'amour na Kwiti ya Lokoto n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Boushaki nwere ike bu
Boutaiba Sghir (amụrụ na June 4, 1945) bụ onye Algeria na-agụ egwu 'raï' na onye na-ede egwu
N'afọ 1963, o wepụtara egwu mbụ ya, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, Chetek el Berah
N'afọ 1963, o mere ihe ngosi egwu mbụ ya 'Scène d'été' na Chaabet El Ham na Aïn Témouchent
Ihe ịga nke ọma mbụ ya bịara na 1968 n'egwu El Caoucaou
Mgbe ahụ ọ bụ onye na-akpọ violin maka ndị egwú nke redio Oran site na 1967 ruo 1969
N'afọ 1969, a tọhapụrụ Raba Raba na El Fermliya ma ọha na eze ka na-enwe ekele ruo taa
Dị ka ọtụtụ ndị na-agu egwu raï nke ọgbọ ya, ọ malitere ọrụ egwu raï ya na ngwụcha afọ ndị 1960 na egwu Melhoun Bedoui (nke a na-akpọkwa ochie raï)
Ya na Boussouar El Maghnaoui, Bouteldja Belkacem na onye egwu Gana El Maghna oui, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị nna nke raï nke oge a (nke a na-akpọkwa pop Bedoui ma ọ bụ pop raï)
Boutaiba Sghir esokwawo Messaoud Bellemou, onye a ma ama na-afụ opi na Algeria
Boutaiba Sghir ga-akpali ọtụtụ ndị na-agụ egwu dịka Cheb Khaled
Cheb Khaled ga-ekwu banyere ya 'Abụghị m eze nke rai, abụ m onye nnọchi anya
Ezigbo eze bụ Boutaiba Sghir, ọ bụ ya kụziiri m ihe niile'

N'ajụjụ ọnụ maka vidiyo Algeria banyere akụkọ ihe mere eme Raï naanị na Algeria (lee njikọ mpụga), Boutaiba Sghir gwara onye nta akụkọ Algeria 'A machibidoro egwu raï na mgbasa ozi Algeria niile (radio na TV) n'oge afọ ndị 1970'
Ọ bụ ya mere na enweghị vidiyo nke ndị na-agụ egwú raï Algeria na TV Algeria ma ọ bụ ihe ndekọ redio na 70s

O kwupụtakwara na vidiyo dị iche iche na YouTube na Cheb Hasni abụghị onye na-agụ egwú Raï kama ọ bụ onye na-abụ egwú Asri nakwa na pop raï (nke a na-akpọkwa Bedoui nke oge a ma ọ bụ raï nke oge a) dị tupu ọbịbịa nke onye na-afụ opi Bellemou
Na Septemba 2010, Cheb Khaled kpọrọ Boutaiba Sghir na Maurice El Medioni, Cheb Sahraoui na Chaba Zahouania na Paris maka ihe ngosi egwu iji kwanyere Oran ùgwù, nke akpọrọ Oran Café
Bouteldja Belkacem (5 Eprel 1947 na 1 Septemba 2015 na Oran) bụ onye Algeria na-agu egwu raï, na onye na-ede egwu
Bouteldja Belkacem tolitere na mpaghara El Hamri nke Oran na Algeria
A na-ewere ya dị ka ogidi nke raï nke oge a

Otu n'ime ndị na-eme ka raï dị ọhụrụ ya na Messaoud Bellemou, n'afọ ndị 1960, ọ malitere iji accordion mee ihe n'ọnọdụ zamr, nke nyere onye na-eme ihe nkiri rai ohere ịkpọ egwu ma bụọ abụ n'otu oge ahụ
Mana ebe ọ bụ na accordion enweghị ike ịkpọ ụda nke anọ, Bouteldja gbanwere ya site n'ịgbanwe ogologo nke eriri ígwè n'ime, na-eme ka ọ kwekọọ na usoro egwu ọdịnala Algeria
N'abalị itoolu n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1965, o dekọrọ egwu na Brahim El Feth's, teepu mbụ ya, nke sochiri ya bu diski nwere egwu abụọ wuru ewụ
N'afọ 1968, onye nchịkọta akụkọ ya gara Paris, Belkacem Bouteldja iji kwanyere nkwekọrịta ya ùgwù nwere ọrụ ịga azụ na azụ iji dekọọ diski atọ
Na ngwụcha afọ 1969 ya na Messaoud Bellemou zutere iwe nke ọdịnala raï; ndekọ ha nke afọ 1974 gosipụtara ọmụmụ pop-raï
Njikọ ha gara n'ihu ruo na ngwụcha afọ 1979
Bouteldja lara ezumike nká ruo nwa oge na 1985, maka emume Rai mbụ e mere na Oran, ya na ndị nnọchiteanya nke egwu ọhụrụ dị ka Cheb Khaled, Hamid na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Na 1993, na-akọwa akụkọ ihe mere eme nke rai, Belkacem Bouteldja ga-ekwu, sị 'Ndụ dị ka nke ahụ
Maka onye ọ bụla oge nke ya Cheikh Hamada n'afo ndị 1930s, Rimitti n'afọ ndi 1950s, Bouteldja n'afọ ndi 1960s, Bellemou n'afọ ndị 1970s, Khaled n'afọ ndị 1980s, Hasni na Nasro n'afọ ndị 1990s
Bovi Ugboma bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe ọchị, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye edemede
Ọ haziela ụdị mmemme na-atọ ọchị na-ewu ewu dị ka Bovi Man on Fire n'ụwa niile
A mụrụ Bovi Ugboma na Benin City, isi obodo Edo Steeti
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị ọrụ UNIBEN maka agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya
N'afọ 1991, e debara aha ya na Government College, Ughelli na Delta Steeti
N'ihi ihe ịdọ aka ná ntị na egwu sitere n'aka ndị mụrụ ya maka mmepe ya dị ka onye ntorobịa, ewepụrụ ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi ma bufee ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ụtọ asụsụ Edokpolor na obodo Benin ebe ha bi
Ntugharị ahụ gosipụtara na ọ naghị arụpụta ihe ma ọ kwagara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke atọ ya, Boys model secondary school, Onicha Olona, ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi niile
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ nwetara nnabata n'afọ 1998 na Mahadum Delta Steeti ebe ọ gụrụ Theatre Arts
Bovi malitere ọrụ ya n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2007, na-eme ihe nkiri na sitcom Extended Family, nke o dekwara ma mepụta
Ihe ngosi a na-ewu ewu nke ukwuu, ka ọ na-erule afọ 2008, Bovi bụ onye na-apụta na ihe ngosi na ihe omume na Naịjirịa niile
O nwetara nnukwu ezumike ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe ọchị na Nite of 1000 Laughs nke Opa Williams haziri
N'afọ 2013, ihe ngosi pụrụ iche mbụ ya mere na ụlọ mgbakọ Eko a ma ama
Ọ ga-aga n'ihu n'ihu n'afọ 2014
Bovi- Man on Fire 2014 gosikwara ndị isi mba ụwa Ja Rule na Ashanti
Bovi kpọọrọ otu onye pụrụ iche gaa ọtụtụ obodo dị na United States, London, Melbourne, na Toronto
N'afọ 2017, mgbe afọ atọ gasịrị, Man on Fire franchise laghachiri Lagos ma ọ bụ nke kachasị nwee ihe ịga nke ọma
Mbipụta nke anọ na Lagos nke emere n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2019 na Bovi na-ekwusi ike na ọ bụ nke ikpeazụ n'ime nwoke na Fire franchise
Ọ na-ekwu na ihe pụrụ iche ya ọzọ ga-aga site na aha ọzọ
Bovi malitere usoro akpọrọ 'BACK TO SCHOOL' n'afọ 2018 nke ọ na-ebugote na ọwa YouTube ya
Bovi esorola ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe ọchị na Naijiria dịka I Go Dye, I Go Save, Basketmouth, Buchi, Odogwu, Okey Bakassi Julius Agwu na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Bovi gosipụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ It's Her Day n'ụbọchị 9 nke ọnwa Septemba afọ 2016
A họpụtara ya maka onyinye AMVCA dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na ihe ọchị; nhọpụta ya nke atọ kemgbe mmalite nke AMVCA na nke anọ site na ọrụ ya
O dere ma gosipụta na ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị nke 2021 My Village People
