Mbenzu Ngamboni Bokili (amụrụ na 28 Septemba, na afo 1951), nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Bozi Boziana, bụ onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu na onye ndú egwu nke Congo

Ọ nọ n'ọtụtụ nnukwu òtù soukous, gụnyere Orchestre Bamboula, Minzoto Sangela, Zaiko Langa Langa, Isifi Lokole, Yoka Lokole, Langa Langa Stars na Choc Stars, wee guzoro òtù nke ya, Orchestre Anti-Choc, nke a na-ewere dị ka otu n'ime ndị kachasị emetụta ụdị ahụ ma bụrụkwa nke a ma ama maka iwebata ụmụ nwanyị atọ na-agụ egwú n'otu oge ọ bụla (ma e jiri ndị na-agụ egwu ma ọ bụ ndị na-agba egwú na-agba egwu na-akwado) n'ime òtù a niile ghọrọ ndị ama ama ama ama n'onwe ha, omenala nke ha, Omenala nke na-aga n'ihu ruo taa
Bozi Boziana malitere ọrụ ya n'òtù afro-pop Air Marine, mana ọ nwere ihe ịga nke ọma na afo 1974 mgbe ọ sonyeere Zaiko Langa Langa, otu n'ime ndị egwu Congo kachasị emetụta
Na Zaiko Boziana nwere ohere iso ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Papa Wemba na Evoloko Jocker na-egwuri egwu
N'ihe na-erughị otu afọ mgbe e mesịrị, Papa Wemba na Evoloko hapụrụ Zaiko Langa Langa na Bozi Boziana sochiri ha n'òtù ọhụrụ a na-akpọ Isifi Lokole
Esemokwu dị n'ime obodo mere ka Papa Wemba, Boziana, Mavuela Somo na ndị ọzọ hapụ Isifi Lokole wee chọta otu egwu ọhụrụ a kpọrọ Yoka Lokole
Ìgwè a nwere ihe ịga nke ọma na afo 1976, mana na ngwụcha afọ ahụ Papa Wemba hapụrụ ọzọ iji chọta Viva la Musica
Yoka Lokole kwụsịrị ịbụ onye a ma ama ma Boziana hapụrụ n'afọ 1977
Ruo ọnwa ole na ole, Boziana na Efonge Gina, onye ọzọ so na Zaiko Langa Langa, nọ na duo, na-ede egwu ole na ole dịka Selemani (nke Boziana kwadoro) na Libanko Ya Ngai (Gina)
Na June, na afo 1977, Gina hapụrụ Zaiko Langa Langa maka Tout-Grand Libanko na Boziana were ọnọdụ ya n'òtù mbụ ya

N'afọ 1981, onye na-emepụta Verckys Kiamuangana guzobere otu egwu egwu a na-akpọ Langa Langa Stars, ya na Evoloko Jocker, Dindo Yogo na ndị ọzọ; a kpọrọ Boziana ka ọ sonye na ya, ọ hapụrụ Zaiko Langa Langa maka oge nke abụọ
Langa Langa Stars dịgidere naanị afọ ole na ole, Boziana wee kwaga n'òtù ọzọ dị na Congo, Ben Nyamabo's Choc Stars, ebe ọ nọrọ ruo na Nọvemba, na afọ 1985
Na Choc Stars Boziana dekọrọ ụfọdụ n'ime egwu ya a ma ama, dị ka Sandu Kotti, Alena, Mbuta-Mutu, na Retrouvailles a Paris
Site na Choc Stars Boziana ghọrọ ezigbo onye ama ama, ya mere o guzobere otu egwu nke ya, nke a na-akpọ Orchestre Anti-Choc (ma ọ bụ naanị 'Anti-Choc')
Ebumnuche nke aha 'Anti-Choc' bụ iji mesie ihe nketa Boziana ike site na Zaiko Langa Langa (dị ka a makwaara otu a dị ka 'Tout-Choc Anti-Choc Zaiko Langa')

Boziana's Anti-Choc ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị isi soukous bands na Congo, ọtụtụ ndị egwu nwere nkà na-egwuri egwu na band ka oge na-aga; ihe atụ bụ Fifi Mofude, Djo Nolo, Koffi Alibaba, Wally Ngonda, Rigo Star, Ngouma Lokito, Deesse Mukangi, Scola 'Nza Wissa' Miel na Betty 'Bis' Kindobika, Marthe Lamugenia, Ngimbi Yespe na Maoussi Solange

Onye mbụ na-akpọ ụbọ akwara n'òtù ahụ bụ Matou Kabangu, onye na-agụ egwú gospel taa; e mechara jiri Dodoly dochie ya (nke dịbu na Lita Bembo's Orchestre Stukas), nke a na-akpọ 'ngwunye ịkwa akwa' n'ihi ọsọ nke mkpịsị aka ya na-agagharị na fretboard nke ụbọ akù
Ụdị ejiji nke Dodoly ghọrọ otu n'ime akara ahịa nke Anti-Choc, ndị na-akpọ ụbọ akwara niile nọchiri Dodoly n'afọ ndị sochirinụ ṅomiri ya
Site na 1980s na Boziana gara n'ihu Anti-Choc yana idekọ ụfọdụ ọrụ solo na mmekorita ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 1998, abọm ya Bana Saint-Gabriel (na-akpọ ndị ọzọ bụbu ndị Zaiko Langa Langa, gụnyere Evoloko Jocker) meriri Kora All-African Award maka abọm kachasị mma na Central Africa
Bokoto bụ asụsụ Gbaya nke Central Afrikan Republic
Ethnologue na-akọ na ọ nwere ike ịbụ ihe a na-aghọta na Gbaya-Bossangoa
Bracket bụ ndị egwu afropop na R&B nke Obumneme Ali aka
'Smash' na Nwachukwu Ozioko aka
'Vast'
Bracket malitere dị ka otu egwu mmadụ atọ tupu otu onye otu a na-akpọ Bistop ahapụ
Ha abụọ bịanyere aka na Ape Planet ugbu a ma bụrụ ndị a maara nke ọma maka iwepụta egwu egwu dịka 'Happy Day', 'Yori-Yori' na 'Ada Owerri' nke natara ọtụtụ nyocha dị mma na ikuku
Vast na Smash tolitere na Nsukka, Enugu Steeti, ebe ha na-aga ihe ngosi campus mgbe ha na-etolite

Vast nwere diplọma na nzere na Mass Communication site na Institute of Management Technology, Enugu na University of Nigeria n'otu n'otu ebe Smash nwere diplọma na Social Works na nzere na Psychology mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na University of Nigeria, Nsukka
A gwakọtara akụkọ ihe mere eme banyere otú otu ahụ si malite n'ọtụtụ akụkọ na ebubo
Bistop, onye bụbu onye otu ahụ na-azọrọ na ọ bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ nke otu ahụ mgbe ọ zutere Vast n'ụlọ nkwari akụ na 1999
Ha mere ma gaa ọtụtụ ihe ngosi n'aha a na-akpọ 'Furious BV'
N'akwụkwọ mgbasa ozi, o kwuru na ọ hapụrụ otu ahụ n'ihi mbọ mmekorita nke onye na-emekọ ihe na Vast na Smash
Ọ gakwara n'ihu kwuo na Smash abụghị onye otu ahụ ruo n'afọ 2003 mgbe ọ zutere Smash site n'aka enyi ya
N'afọ 2012, Bracket natara onyinye nkwanye ugwu site n'obodo Philadelphia na African American Museum na Philadelphia
Ụfọdụ n'ime onyinye ha gụnyere
Brahim Haggiag (1934-1997), bụ onye Algeria na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onye a ma ama maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri The Battle of Algiers, Patrouille à l'Est na L'opium et le baton
N'afọ 1966, o mere ihe nkiri izizi ya na 'Ali La Pointe' na ihe nkiri The Battle of Algiers nke Gillo Pontecorvo duziri
Brandy bu onye Amerika nwayi na bu abu
Ha muru ya na afo 1979 nke 11 Februari
Brasília ( AFI [bɾaˈziljɐ] ma ọ bụ AFI [bɾaˈziʎɐ] ) bụ isi obodo gọọmenti etiti Brazil na oche ọchịchị nke Federal District
Isi obodo ahụ dị na mpaghara Midwest nke mba ahụ, n'akụkụ mpaghara ala a maara dị ka Central Plateau

Dabere na atụmatụ sitere na Institutelọ Ọrụ Geography na Statistics Brazil (IBGE) maka 2021, ndị bi na ya bụ 3 094 325 ( 4 284 676 na mpaghara mepere emepe), na-eme ka ọ bụrụ obodo nke atọ kachasị na obodo ahụ
Brasília bụkwa obodo nke ise kacha nwee ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ na Brazil
Isi obodo Brazil bụ obodo kachasị ukwuu n'ụwa wuru na narị afọ nke 20
Obodo a nwere nnukwu ngwaahịa ụlọ maka onye ọ bụla n'ihe gbasara isi obodo, nke anọ kachasị elu n'etiti obodo ndị isi na Latin America na ihe dị ka okpukpu atọ karịa nkezi ego ndị Brazil
Dị ka isi obodo mba, Brasilia bụ ụlọ ọrụ nke ikike atọ nke Republic ( Executive, Legislative and Judiciary ) na 127 ndị nnọchi anya mba ofesi

Amụma atụmatụ obodo, dị ka ebe ụlọ obibi dị na nnukwu obodo mepere emepe, iwu nke nnukwu ụzọ na-agafe obodo na nkewa ha na ngalaba, kpalitere arụmụka banyere ụzọ ndụ na nnukwu obodo na narị afọ nke iri abụọ
Nhazi obodo ahụ na-ekewa ya na ngọngọ ọnụọgụ, na mgbakwunye na ngalaba maka mmemme ekpebiela, dị ka ngalaba nkwari akụ, ụlọ akụ ma ọ bụ ndị nnọchi anya ụlọ ọrụ

Atụmatụ obodo mbụ nke isi obodo, nke a maara dị ka ' Atụmatụ Pilot ' (aha a na-enye mpaghara nchịkwa ebe ọ dị ), bụ onye nhazi obodo na onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ bụ Lúcio Costa, bụ onye, na-eji ohere nke mpaghara ahụ eme ihe, mere ka ọ gbanwee ya
Nhazi ọdọ mmiri Paranoá, tụụrụ ime na 1893 site n'aka Cruls Mission
Obodo malitere ime atụmatụ na mmepe na 1956 site n'aka Lúcio Costa, onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ Oscar Niemeyer na onye nhazi nhazi Joaquim Cardozo
Emebere ya na Eprel 21, 1960, site n'aka Onye isi ala Juscelino Kubitschek mgbe ahụ, Brasília ghọrọ isi obodo nke atọ nke Brazil, mgbe Salvador na Rio de Janeiro gasịrị

N'ile anya site n'elu, a na-akọwakarị ebe bụ isi nke obodo ahụ dị ka nke nwere ọdịdị ụgbọ elu, ma amụma mbụ Lúcio Costa bụ na ọ yiri ihe ịrịba ama nke obe, na otu n'ime axes e mesịrị arched ka ọ kwekọọ na ụgbọ elu
enyemaka nke mpaghara
Brassia caudata bụ ụdị orchid

A na-ahụ ya n'ebe niile n'akụkụ ndị na-ekpo ọkụ nke Western Hemisphere, a kọrọ ya site na ndịda Mexico (Chiapas, Campeche, Quintana Roo, Tabasco, Veracruz), Central America, ndịda Florida, Greater Antilles, Trinidad, ugwu South America
A makwaara ya site na aha ndị ama ama Brassia, spider orchid na cricket orchid
Brassica oleracea bụ ụdị osisi nke gụnyere ọtụtụ ụdị osisi, dị ka cabbage, broccoli, cauliflower, kale, Brussels sprouts, collard greens, Savoy cabbage, kohlrabi, na gai lan
N'ụdị ya mgbe a na-akọbeghị ya akọ, a na-akpọ ya cabbage ọhịa ma bụrụkwa nke a na-ahụkarị n'ụsọ oké osimiri n'ebe ndịda na ọdịda anyanwụ Europe

Osisi siri ike n'ụdị ya a na-akọghị, nnagide ya dị elu maka nnu na lime, na enweghị nnagide asọmpi site na osisi ndị ọzọ, na-egbochi ihe okike ya na ugwu mmiri limestone, dị ka ugwu chalk n'akụkụ abụọ nke English Channel, na ụsọ mmiri ikuku n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ nke Isle of Wight
Nnyocha mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa nke mmadụ itoolu bi n'ọhịa n'ụsọ oké osimiri Atlantic nke France gosipụtara mmalite anụ ọhịa ha, nke sitere na osisi ndị a zụlitere n'ubi na ubi
oleracea ọhịa bụ osisi dị ogologo nke na-adịru afọ abụọ nke na-emepụta rosette siri ike nke nnukwu akwụkwọ n'afọ mbụ
Akwụkwọ ya dị nro ma sie ike karịa ụdị Brassica chin nke na-enyere ya aka ichekwa mmiri na ihe oriri na gburugburu ebe siri ike
N'afọ nke abụọ ya, ọ na-eji ihe na-edozi ahụ echekwara iji mepụta okooko osisi dị mita 1 - 2 n'ogologo na ọtụtụ okooko osisi na-acha edo edo
Aha ya kpọmkwem oleracea pụtara 'akwụkwọ nri ma ọ bụ ahịhịa' na Latin ma bụrụ ụdị holeraceus (oleraceus)
oleracea eguzobewo dị ka ihe ọkụkụ nri dị mkpa nke mmadụ, nke a na-eji eme ihe n'ihi nnukwu nri ya, nke a chekwaara n'oge oyi na akwụkwọ ya
Ọ nwere ihe oriri na-edozi ahụ dị mkpa nke gụnyere vitamin C
A zụlitere ya n'ọtụtụ ụdị, gụnyere cabbage, broccoli, cauliflower, brussels sprouts, collards, na kale, ụfọdụ n'ime ha anaghị aghọta ha dị ka ndị otu ụdị, ma ya fọdụkwa ụdị
Ndị na-eme nchọpụta kwenyere na a na-akụ ya kemgbe ọtụtụ puku afọ, mana akụkọ ihe mere eme ya dị ka osisi a na-azụ n'ụlọ edoghị anya tupu oge ndị Gris na ndị Rom, mgbe ọ bụ akwụkwọ nri ubi a ma ama
Theophrastus kwuru ụdị atọ nke rhaphanos akwụkwọ na-agba agba, akwụkwọ na-akwọ mụrụmụrụ, na ụdị ọhịa
Ọ na-akọ na ọ na-asọ oyi na cabbage na osisi vaịn, n'ihi na ndị oge ochie kwenyere na cabbage a na-akụ n'akụkụ mkpụrụ vaịn ga-enye mmanya ahụ ụtọ ha
Nri jupụtara na akwụkwọ nri cruciferous (dịka, cabbage, broccoli, cauliflower) nwere njikọ na mbelata ihe ize ndụ nke ọtụtụ ọrịa kansa mmadụ
Dika Triangle of U theory sị dị , B
oleracea nwere njikọ chiri anya na ụdị ise ndị ọzọ nke ụdị Brassica
A na-achịkọta ụdị nke B
oleracea site na ụdị mmepe n'ime ìgwè asaa dị mkpa, nke otu Acephala ('na-abụghị isi') na-anọgide na-adị ka cabbage ọhịa n'ọdịdị

N'ebe ndị dị ka Channel Islands na Canary Islands, ebe oyi dị obere ma si otú a wepụ osisi site na oge, ụfọdụ cultivars, nke a maara dị ka Jersey cabbages, nwere ike ito ruo mita atọ (98 ft) n'ogologo
'Cabbages' ndị a na-amịpụta akwụkwọ ọhụrụ n'afọ niile, na-adịgide adịgide, ọ dịghịkwa mkpa ka e bibie ya n'oge owuwe ihe ubi dị ka ọ dị na cabbage nkịtị
A na-eme ka ahịhịa ha na-acha odo odo kpọọ nkụ mgbe ụfọdụ ma mee ka ha bụrụ ahịhịhịa na-agagharị agagharị
Site na ọbịbịa nke ọrụ ugbo na nzọghari osisi dị ọhịa na nso ụlọ, ndị bi n'ebe ugwu Mediterenian malitere ịkọ ugbo cabbage ọhịa
Site na nhọrọ aka maka àgwà dị iche iche nke phenotype, mpụta nke ọdịiche dị iche iche na osisi ahụ nwere nnukwu ọdịiche dị na ọdịdị were naanị puku afọ ole na ole
Nhọrọ maka akwụkwọ, okooko osisi, okooko ala, ogwe osisi, na okooko osisi mere ka a họrọ ụdị dị iche iche nke cabbage ọhịa n'ime ọtụtụ ụdị a maara taa
Agbụrụ Lumbee nke North Carolina ejirila akwụkwọ B
oleracea mee ihe n'ọgwụ nke ha kwenyere na ọ nwere àgwà nhicha, yana ihe na-eme ka ọ dị nro, ihe na-egbochi ọzịza, na ọgwụgwọ maka glaucoma na oyi ịba n'ahụ

Mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa TAS2R38 na-edepụta onye na-anabata protein G nke na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-anata uto, nke ligands dị ka PROP na phenylthiocarbamide na-ejikọta na onye na-anakwere ma malite mgbaàmà nke na-enye ogo dị iche iche nke nghọta uto

Akwụkwọ nri dị n'ezinụlọ brassica, dị ka collard greens, kale, broccoli, cabbage, na Brussels sprouts, nwere glucosinolates na isothiocyanates, nke yiri PROP, ya mere ọtụtụ n'ime 'obi ilu' nke akwụkwọ nri ndị a na-aga site na TAS2R38
A na-ahụkwa ndị na-anabata uto dị ilu n'ezinụlọ TS2R na mkpụrụ ndụ dị n'ime ụmụ mmadụ na ụmụ oke
Ndị na-anabata ihe ndị a na-emetụta mwepụta nke homonụ ndị metụtara ịchịkwa agụụ, dị ka peptide YY na glucagon-dị ka peptite-1, ya mere ha nwere ike imetụta iri calorie na mmepe nke oke ibu
Ya mere, nghọta ụtọ dị ilu nwere ike imetụta omume nri site n'inwe mmetụta na mmasị ụtọ na nhazi homonụ metabolic
Ụdị atọ dị na agbụrụ TAS2R38 ya bu rs713598, rs1726866, na rs10246939 na-enwe njikọ dị elu na ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ ma na-akpata mgbanwe koodu amino acid nke na-eduga n'ọtụtụ ụdị nghọta dị ilu

PAV haplotype bụ ihe kachasị; ya mere, ndị nwere ma ọ dịkarịa ala otu ụdị nke PAV allele na-ahụ mkpụrụ ndụ dị na akwụkwọ nri ndị yiri PROP dị ka iri ihe ilu, n'ihi ya, ha nwere ike ịkpata ịkpọasị na akwụkwọ nri ilu
N'ụzọ dị iche, ndị nwere haplotypes AVI abụọ bụ ndị na-adịghị atọ ụtọ
PAV na AVI haplotypes bụ ndị a na-ahụkarị, ọ bụ ezie na haplotyps ndị ọzọ dị na-enye mmetụta dị n'etiti (AAI, AAV, AVV, na PVI)
Mmetụta a nwere ike imetụta akwụkwọ nri n'ozuzu

Breaded Life bụ ihe nkiri nke Nigeria nke 2021 nke Biodun Stephen dere ma duzie ya
Biodun Stephen, Tara Ajibulu na Kayode Sowade rụkọrọ ya ọnụ
Ọ bụ gosipitara MC Lively, Bisola Aiyeola, Timini Egbuson, Bimbo Ademoye, Bolanle Ninalowo na Adedimeji Lateef
Emere ya na Eprel 10, 2021 na iMax sinima Lagos wee wepụta ya na mba niile na 16 Eprel 2021
Ọ bụ ihe nto ọchị nke ihe nkiri ihunanya nke afọ 2016, Picture Perfect ma nwee ụfọdụ ndị mere ihe nkiri a mbụ sitere na Picture Perfect
Breaded Life na- agbaso ihe omume nke nwa nwoke dị mpako na nke e mebiri emebi nke si n'ụlọ ndi bara ọgaranya na-eme ka ọ mụta nkuzi ndụ n'ụzọ siri ike
Ọ na-esote nwa okorobịa na-aghọtahieghị aghọta mana wee obi ike (Timini Egbuson) nke hụrụ onye na-ere achịcha (Bimbo Ademoye) n'anya
Nne ya (Tina Mba) na-ekwusi okwu ike na ọnọdụ ahụ
Ndụ ya na onye na-ere achịcha na-ekpughe ya na ndụ n'okpuru ụwa ebe a jidere ya
Nke a mere ka ya na nne ya nọrọ n'ụzọ agha
Dị ka Biodun Stephen si kwuo, Breaded Life bụ akụkọ ndụ n'ezie sitere n'ahụmahụ ndị gbara ya gburugburu
Mmepụta ahụ bụ mmekorita n'etiti ọrụ Shutterspeed na David Wade
Ndị otu na-emepụta ihe ga-emekọrịta ihe na Area Boys ka ha na-eme ihe nkiri na Agege Market
Onye na-enyocha Sodas N Popcorn kwuru na Breaded Life 'kụrụ ihe ndetu ziri ezi' mana o nwere ntụpọ ụfọdụ metụtara nkata na njedebe na ozi izugbe nke ihe nkiri ahụ
Onye nyocha ọzọ kwuputara na ihe nkiri ahụ ruru ego sinima mana ọ na-ekwu na Egbuson bụ ihe nkedo dịka nwata mebiri emebi ebe Ninalowo na-eme ihe nkedo dịka nwata nwoke mpaghara

Ịcha ara, nke amakwa to dị ka ime ka ara dị larịị, bụ ịkụ aka na ịhịa aka n'ahụ ara nwa agbọghọ na-eto eto, na-eji ihe siri ike ma ọ bụ na-ekpo ọkụ, iji gbalịa ime ka ha kwụsị ịmalite ma ọ bụ laa n'iyi

Omume a na-emekarị site n'aka nwanyị dị nso na onye ahụ, nke nne, nne nne, nwanne nne, ma ọ bụ nwanyị na-elekọta ya bụ onye ga-ekwu na ọ na-agbalị ichebe nwa agbọghọ ahụ pụọ na iyi egwu mmekọahụ na ndina n'ike, iji gbochie ịtụrụ ime n'oge nke ga-emerụ aha ezinụlọ, na-egbochi mgbasa ọrịa a na-ebute site na mmekọahụ dị ka nje HIV / AIDS, ma ọ bụ ikwete ka nwa agbọghọ ahụ gaa agụmakwụkwọ kama ịmanye ya ịlụ di na nwunye n'oge
A na-emekarị omume á n'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke Cameroon, ebe ụmụ okorobịa na ụmụ nwoke nwere ike iche na ụmụ agbọghọ ara ha putagoro adịla njikere maka mmekọahụ
Ihe akaebe na-egosi na ọ gbasaa na mba Kamerun, dịka ọmụmaatụ na Britain, ebe iwu kọwara ya dị ka mmetọ ụmụaka
Ihe eji eme ihe n'ọtụtụ ebe maka ịcha ara bụ osisi a na-ejikarị eme ihe maka ịkụ tubers
Ngwá ọrụ ndị ọzọ eji eme ihe tinyekwara akwụkwọ, unere, okpokoro akị bekee, nkume na-egweri, ladles, spatulas, na hammers na-ekpo ọkụ n'elu icheku ọkụ
A na-emekarị omume ahụ n'oge chi ọbụbọ ma ọ bụ ụtụtụ na mpaghara nzuzo dị ka kichin ụlọ iji gbochie ndị ọzọ ịhụ onye ahụ ma ọ bụ mara usoro ahụ, ọkachasị ndị nna ma ọ bụ ụmụ nwoke ndị ọzọ

Usoro ịhịa aka n'ahụ nwere ike ime n'ebe ọ bụla n'etiti otu izu ruo ọtụtụ ọnwa, dabere na ịjụ onye ahụ na nguzogide nke ara; n'ọnọdụ ebe ara yiri ka ọ na-apụta mgbe niile, omume ironing nwere ike ime ihe karịrị otu ugboro n'ụbọchị maka izu ma ọ bụ ọnwa ndị a n'otu oge
Enwere ike buru na achọpụtara Nchicha ara n'omume oge ochie nke ịhịa aka n'ahụ ara nweta akwa ara
Ịhịa aka n'ahụ ara na-ezube inyere aka ọbụna nha ara dị iche iche ma belata ihe mgbu nke ndị nne na-enye nwa ara site n'iji ihe na-ekpo ọkụ ịhịa ara ahụ, lee Ọgwụgwọ maka Mastitis
E depụtala omume ịcha ara na Nigeria, Togo, Republic of Guinea, Côte d'Ivoire, Kenya, na Zimbabwe
Ọzọkwa, achọtala ya na mba Afrịka ndị ọzọ gụnyere Burkina Faso, Central African Republic (CAR), Benin, na Guinea-Conakry
A na-akọ na 'na-asa ara' na South Africa
Omume a na-ejikọkarị ya na Kamerun n'ihi nlebara anya mgbasa ozi na ọkwa mpaghara nke ndị otu ruuru mmadụ
Agbụrụ narị abụọ niile nke Cameroon na-etinye aka na ịcha ara, na-enweghị mmekọrịta a maara na okpukpe, ọnọdụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ma ọ bụ njirimara ọ bụla ọzọ

Nnyocha nke ụlọ ọrụ mmepe nke Germany GIZ mere n'ime afọ 2006 nke ihe karịrị ụmụ agbọghọ na ụmụ nwanyị Cameroon puku ise nọ n'agbata afọ iri na afọ iri asatọ na abụọ mere atụmatụ na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu onye n'ime mmadụ anọ enwetala akwa ara, nke kwekọrọ na nde ụmụ agbọghọ anọ
Nnyocha ahụ kwukwara na a na-emekarị ya n'obodo ukwu, ebe ndị nne na-atụ egwu na ụmụ ha nwanyị nwere ike ịnweta mmetọ mmekọahụ
Ihe na-eme bụ pasent iri ise na ato na mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Cameroon nke Littoral
E jiri ya tụnyere ndị Kraịst na ndịda Cameroon na-ahụ maka mmụọ, akwa ara anaghị adịkarị n'ebe ugwu ndị Alakụba, ebe ọ bụ naanị pasent 10 nke ụmụ nwanyị na-emetụta
Ụfọdụ na-eche na nke a metụtara omume nke alụmdi na nwunye n'oge, nke a na-ahụkarị n'ebe ugwu, na-eme ka mmepe mmekọahụ n'oge ghara ịdị mkpa ma ọ bụ ọbụna dị mma

Nnyocha na-atụ aro na 16% nke ụmụ agbọghọ, ọkachasị na mpaghara ugwu dị anya ebe alụmdi na nwunye ụmụaka na-adịkarị, na-anwa ime ka ara ha dị larịị iji mee ka ha ghara inwe mmekọahụ na alụmdi na nwunye n'oge
Ịwụnye ara na-egbu mgbu nke ukwuu na nwee ike imebi anụ ahụ
As of 2006[update] 2006, enwebeghị ọmụmụ ahụike banyere mmetụta ya
Otú ọ dị, ndị ọkachamara ahụike na-adọ aka ná ntị na ọ nwere ike inye aka na ọrịa kansa ara, cysts na ịda mbà n'obi, ma eleghị anya na-egbochi inye nwa ara mgbe e mesịrị

Na mgbakwunye na nke a, ironing ara na-etinye ụmụ agbọghọ n'ihe ize ndụ nke abscesses, cysts, ọrịa, na mmebi anụ ahụ na-adịgide adịgide, na-akpata pimples ara, ahaghị nhata na nha ara, na ọrịa mmiri ara ehi site na ọnyá
N'ọnọdụ dị oke njọ nke mmebi, enwere ugbu a ikpe iri nke ọrịa kansa ara a chọpụtara site n'aka ụmụ nwanyị ndị a chọpụtara na ha bụ ndị a na-ahụ maka ara
Mmetụta ndị ọzọ GIZ nwere ike ịkọ gụnyere ara na-adịghị mma na ikpochapụ otu ara ma ọ bụ ara abụọ
Omume a dị iche iche n'ụzọ dị ịrịba ama na ịdị njọ ya, site na iji akwụkwọ na-ekpo ọkụ pịa ma na-asa ara ahụ, iji nkume na-egweri ihe iji kụrisịa gland ahụ na-eto eto
N'ihi mgbanwe a, nsonaazụ ahụike dịgasị iche site na nke na-adịghị njọ ruo na nke dị njọ
The Child Rights Information Network (CRIN) na-akọ banyere igbu oge nke mmepe mmiri ara mgbe a mụsịrị ya, na-etinye ndụ ụmụ amụrụ ọhụrụ n'ihe ize ndụ
Nakwa na ọ dị ize ndụ, a na-akatọ ịcha ara dị ka ihe na-abaghị uru maka ịkwụsị inwe mmekọahụ na ime ime

GIZ (nke a na-akpọ 'GTZ' n'oge ahụ) na Network of Aunties (RENATA), otu nzukọ na-abụghị nke gọọmentị Cameroon nke na-akwado ndị nne na-eto eto, na-eme mkpọsa megide ịcha ara, ma na-akwado ya site na Ministry for the Promotion of Women and the Family
Ụfọdụ akwadola iwu megide omume ahụ; Otú ọ dị, ọ dịghị iwu dị otú ahụ e mere

Ụfọdụ na-ewere omume ahụ dị ka ihe gbasara ikike mmadụ na-apụta, nke a ghọtara dị ka omume nke ime ihe ike na nwoke na nwanyị dịka ịcha ara na-emetụta ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ agbọghọ n'agbanyeghị agbụrụ, klas, okpukpe, nzụlite akụ na ụba, ma ọ bụ afọ
[nkọwa dị mkpa] N'ihe banyere mmegide na nso nso a, n'ime afọ 2000, United Nations (UN) chọpụtara ịcha ara dị ka otu n'ime ụdị ịkpa ókè ise na-agafe ma leghara mpụ megide ụmụ nwanyị anya

Site n'ihe otu onye ọka iwu Cameroon kwuru, ọ bụrụ na dọkịta achọpụta na e mebiela ara ahụ, enwere ike ịta onye omekome ahụ ahụhụ ruo afọ atọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ, ma ọ bụrụhaala na a kọọrọ okwu ahụ n'ime ọnwa ole na ole
Otú ọ dị, o doro anya ma ọ bụrụ na iwu dị otú ahụ dị adị n'ihi na enweghị ndekọ nke mmanye iwu
Nnyocha GIZ chọpụtara na n'ime afọ 2006, pasent iri atọ na itoolu nke ụmụ nwanyị Cameroon megidere ịcha ara, na pasent iri anọ na otu na-egosipụta nkwado na pasent iri abụọ na isii enweghị mmasị
Reuters kọrọ n'afọ 2014 na mgbasa ozi mba niile megide omume ahụ enyerela aka belata ọnụego nke ịcha ara site na pasent iri ise na mba ahụ

Bridgid 'Bree' O'Mara (4 Julaị 1968 – 12 Mee 2010) bụ onye akwụkwọ akụkọ Irish-South Africa, onye na-agba egwu ballet, onye na-emepụta TV na onye nnabata ikuku nke nwụrụ n'ihe mberede nke Afriqiyah Airways Flight 771
A mụrụ O'Mara na Durban, Natal Province, South Africa nke nne na nna Irish wee buru paspọtụ Irish
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Maris Stella na Durban n'oge mbido 1980s
Mgbe ọrụ mbụ na ihe nkiri O'Mara rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eje ozi ụgbọ elu maka Gulf Air tupu ọ bụrụ onye na-emepụta vidiyo na Gulf States
Mgbe ọ gafechara Canada na United States, biri nwa oge na Elkins, West Virginia, ọ gara biri na London n'oge 1990s
Ọ bi na Northamptonshire na mmalite 2000s
Na 2003 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ afọ ofufo maka Mondo Challenge na Tanzania
Ọ laghachiri n'ụlọ nwata ya na South Africa na 2005
N'oge ọnwụ ya, o biri na Kosmos, Madibeng, na di ya Christopher Leach
Onye agha Britain Mike Hoare bụ nwanne nna ya
O dere akụkọ ihe mere eme ya na-ebipụtaghị ya dị ka onye ahịa na Kongo n'oge 1960 na Seychelles na afọ mgbe 1970s
Ọ na-eme njem na ụgbọ elu Afriqiyah Airways Flight 771, nke dara na Libya, ka ọ na-aga ileta London maka nzukọ ya na ndị nkwusa
A manyere ya ka ọ gbahapụ n'emebe atụmatụ na London Book Fair site na ịkagbu ụgbọ elu na UK sitere na mgbawa Eyjafjallajökull
Sarah Babirye Kityo (amụrụ na 27 Disemba, na afo1986) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ugandan na onye nnọchi anya ndị ntorobịa a họpụtara maka Central Region na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke 10 nke Uganda
Ọ bụ onye otu National Resistance Movement nke ọ gbara ọsọ na tiketi ya na ntuli aka na afọ 2016 nke Uganda na-emeri Arthur Katongole, onye nweere onwe ya
Sarah Babirye gara Luweero SDA Primary School ma hapụ ya na afọ 1995
Ọ gara Mulusa Academy, Wobulenzi maka O Levels (UCE) na A Levels (UACE) na-ahapụ na 1999
N'afọ 2015, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na First Class Bachelor of Public Administration and Management na Mahadum Ndị Kraịst nke Uganda
Usoro oge nke ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya dị ka ndị a
N'afọ 2016, ya na ndị ntorobịa Ugandan anọ ndị ọzọ so na ndị omeiwu, Sarah Babirye nọchitere anya Uganda na International Young Leaders Assembly (IYLA) na isi ụlọ ọrụ United Nations na New York
N'afọ 2017, Sarah Babirye nọchitere anya Uganda dị ka onye isi okwu na mmemme Commonwealth Parliamentary Association Youth Program (CPA) nke Commonwealth Day 2017 na London
Na mbido afọ 2016, a kọrọ na ndị na-emegide ya na ntuli aka rịọrọ ụlọ ikpe ka ha gbochie iyi ya na-ebo ebubo na ọ karịrị afọ a kara aka

Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, a ka kọrọ na Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu dị na Masaka District amalitela ịnụ mkpesa ntuli aka megide Sarah Babirye n'ihi ịgha ụgha banyere afọ ya nke mere ka ọ ghara iru eru ịbụ onye otu ndị ntorobịa nke ụlọ ikpe dị elu nke Masaka chụpụrụ na 2019
Sarah Babirye Kityo, onye na-azọ oche Bukoto East na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke afọ 2021, lụrụ di ma bụrụ nne nke ụmụ abụọ
O sonyere na asọmpi niile nke East African Community (EAC) Inter-Parliamentary Games (2016X 2019), o nyekwara ndị otu Uganda Women Parliamentary aka inweta ọtụtụ otuto
O nwere ọtụtụ otuto onwe ya kemgbe mmalite ya na 2016
Breinigerberg bụ úhu no na odida anyanwu ala ana-kpo Jémanị
Ono n'etiti obodo Belgia na Aachen
Brenda Shey Elung bụ a Cameroonian omee ihe nkiri ma na-emeputakwa ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Cameroon (CFI)
A na-akpọkwa ya ' Madam Brenda '
Brenda abụrụla akụkụ nke ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Cameroon kemgbe 2010
O mepụtara ma mee ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri a, ' Decoded ', nke Akim Macaulay na Enah Johnscott duziri, nke ewepụtara na 2013
A gbara ihe nkiri ahụ na August 2012 na Limbe, Cameroon, na-egosi onye na - eme ihe nkiri Ghana, Van Vicker na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Cameroon dị ka Solange Yijika, Jeffery Epule na Desmond Wyte

Na mbipụta nke asaa nke ihe nrite AMVCA emere na Eko Hotels na Suites n'imeLagos, Nigeria na Machị 14, 2020 ọ bụ naanị onye nnọchi anya ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Cameroon (CFI) na ihe nrite nke hụrụ ya ka ọ na-eji ejiji mara mma
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Omega One Entertainment, ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nkiri
Ọ nọchitere anya ọdịmma azụmaahịa nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na Nnyefe TV International Nigeria nke emere na Paris (Eprel 13–14, 2018)
Brenda Tirhani Mathevula bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa nke na-anọchite anya Limpopo na National Council of Provinces
Ọ bụ onye otu Economic Freedom Fighters
Ọ ghọrọ onye omeiwu na Disemba, na afọ 2016, mgbe Emmanuel Mtileni kwụsịrị ịbụ onye otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị
N'oge ọ nọ na NCOP, ọ megidere iwu ụgwọ ọrụ kacha nta nke afọ 2018, na-ekwu na ọ dị obere ma ọ gaghị ebelata enweghị ọrụ na ịda ogbenye
Brenda Nabukenya (amụrụ na 19 Eprel 1984) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye omeiwu Uganda
Ọ na-anọchite anya ndị Luwero district dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị distrikti maka Luwero district na ndị omeiwu nke Uganda
Ọ debanyere aha na National Unity Platform party na tiketi nke a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu na ntuli aka nke 2021 Uganda
Onye isi oche National Unity bụ Robert Kyagulanyi Sentamu onye a na-akpọ Bobi wine
Nabukenya bụbu onye otu Democratic party (DP) nke ọ meriri onye isi oche nke Mahadum Kyambogo na 2005 na onye otu oche ndị omeiwu maka Luwero district n'etiti afọ 2011 na 2016
Tupu a họpụta ya dị ka nwanyị mbụ na-achịkwa Mahadum Kyambogo, Nabukenya rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ahịa akwụkwọ mahadum na Mahadum Kiambogo
Na Kyambogo, ọ gbasoro nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na nri na nri
O mechara nweta nzere bachelọ na Law na Mahadum Makerere
N'afọ 2020, ọ mara Nobert Mao, onye isi oche nke Democratic Party aka na onye isi oche DP
Na ntuli aka nke 2021 Uganda, Nabukenya meriri ntuli aka ahụ na vootu 76,801 na-emeri onye iro ya kacha nso, Mulondo Cissy nke National Resistance Movement onye nwetara vootu 40,353
Nabukenya bụ ugbu a minista onyinyo maka agụmakwụkwọ na egwuregwu na gọọmentị mmegide
Ọ bụkwa osote onyeisi oche na Uganda Women Parliamentary Association (UWOPA)
Brenda Namukuta bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ugandan, onye omeiwu na onye nnọchi anya nwanyị nke ndị omeiwu maka Kaliro District na nke iri na otu nke Uganda
Ọ nwere njikọ na National Resistance Movement (NRM)
Namukuta bụ onye na-ebu ọkọlọtọ National Resistance Movement (NRM) maka Kaliro District
O meriri na ntuli aka mba nke 2021 wee bụrụ onye nnọchi anya nwanyị nke ndị omeiwu maka mpaghara Kaliro
Ọ na-anọdụ na kọmitii mmefu ego nke ndị omeiwu na nke iri na otu nke ndị omebe iwu nke Uganda Namukuta na-eje ozi dị ka onye na-ahụ maka akụ maka Uganda Women Parliamentary Association (UWOPA)
Ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba nke ndị omeiwu nke mpaghara Busoga ndị otu ndị omeiwu Uganda

Namukuta so na ndị otu kọmitii mmefu ego nke ndị omeiwu na Nzukọ nke iri na otu nke Uganda bụ ndị gara n'isi ụlọ ọrụ FUFA iji mụtakwuo banyere ọrụ FU FA na otu esi elekọta ma na-achịkwa egwuregwu bọọlụ na Uganda
Namukuta so n'ime ndị omeiwu si n'ógbè Busoga bụ ndị kwurịtara maka ọnọdụ okporo ụzọ na mpaghara Busoga na ndị otu Uganda National Roads Authority (UNRA) nke onye isi nchịkwa Allen Kagina duziri

Namukuta anọghị n'etiti ndị otu NRM nke ndị omeiwu bụ ndị a na-ekwu na ha natara ego ekele nke nde shillings ise nke Uganda maka ịtụ vootu n'etiti Anita na Thomas Tayebwa n'oge asọmpi ndị ọkà okwu 2022 ebe Anita n'etiti meriri ntuli aka mgbe ọnwụ Jacob Oulanyah gasịrị
Cissy Namujju, nwanyị otu mpaghara nke ndị omeiwu maka Lwengo District kwupụtara na ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu NRM nke ndị natara ego ahụ

Brenda Andrea Smith Lezama (a mụrụya n'ụbọchị nke 25 n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1994) bụ onye Panama-American na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nta akụkọ, onye nlereanya na onye na-ahụ maka ịma mma nke e chiri Señorita Panamá 2021
Ọ nọchitere anya Panama na asọmupi Miss Universe 2021 na Eilat, Israel
A mụrụ Smith na Georgia, United States
Nna ya bu onye Panamá ma nne ya bụ onye Mexico
Smith nwetara BA na akwụkwọ akụkọ na Mahadum nke Missouri
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị BA ya na ọrụ nta akụkọ, ọ na-atụ anya ijikọta mmasị ya maka ọrụ nta akụkọ na ịhụnanya ya maka mba ya site na isonyere United States Air Force dị ka Ọkachamara Mgbasa Ozi
N'afọ 2015, ọ pụtara na nnekwu ihe ngosi telivishọn, gụnyere PBS NewsHour, Dr
Drew na Call na MSNBC Live
N'afọ 2018, ọ pụtara na usoro telivishọn El gordo y la flaca, República Deportiva, Nuestra Belleza Latina, ¡Wake up America!
na Los Cousins
O mekwara dịka onye na-agwọ ọrịa na obere ihe nkiri 'Reversion'
O mere Verletta Walker na obere ihe nkiri 'Little Stylist', nke ewepụtara na United States na June 1, n'afọ 2019
Smith malitere ọrụ ịma mma ya n'afọ 2012, na-abanye na Miss Georgia Teen USA 2012, ebe ọ bụ onye nke abụọ
Smith banyere ma bụrụ onye okpueze na 2013 Miss Missouri Teen USA ma Jayde Ogle nọchiri ya
O mechara na Top 16
Smith banyere ma tinye ya na onye nke mbụ na asọmupi Miss Georgia USA 2017 ma mesịa merie onye mmeri DeAnna Johnson nke Hazlehurst
Smith sọrọ mpi dị ka MxU Mexico City, otu n'ime ndị ikpeazụ iri atọ na asọmupi ịma mma nke mba ya na Mexicana Universal 2020
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa nke abụọ ma merie onye mmeri Andrea Meza si Chihuahua
Na Nọvemba 7, n'afọ 2021, Smith sonyere ma nọchite anya Panama Centro na asọmupi Señorita Panamá 2021 na Wyndham Convention Center Hotel na Panama City
Na ngwụcha ihe omume ahụ, Smith meriri aha Miss Universe Panama 2021 ma nọchie anya Carmen Jaramillo
Na Disemba 13, n'afo 2021, Smith nọchitere anya Panama na asọmupi Miss Universe 2021 na Eilat, Israel, ma mechaa na Top 16
Brenda Wairimu (a mụrụ na 3 Mee 1989) bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nlereanya
O mere Lulu Mali na ihe nkiri soap opera Mali
A mụrụ Brenda Wairimu na 3 Mee 1989 ma zụlite ya na Mombasa
Ọ gụrụ International Business Management na USIU-Africa na obere na Broadcast Media
Wairimu apụtawo n'ọtụtụ usoro telivishọn
N'afọ 2009, ọ pụtara na telivishọn mgbe a họpụtara ya dịka otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na, Changing Times
Ọ gbara Shareefah ya na ndị otu Nice Githinji na Ian Mugoya N'afọ 2011, a họpụtara ya dịla otu n'ime ndị isi na Kenya's soap opera, Mali
O mere Lulu, nwa nwanyị Gregory Mali na Mabel
Ọ gbara egwu ya na Mkamzee Mwatela, Mumbi Maina na Daniel Peter
N'afọ 2012, Wairimu pụtara na ihe nkiri Pan-African, Shuga ebe ọ mere Dala, nwa akwụkwọ nkwukọrịta dị afọ iri abụọ na abụọ
Ọ bụ onye isi na-eme ihe nkiri na Monica na-arụ ọrụ 'Monica', ihe ngosi Showmax nke na-egosikwa na Maisha Magic East, nke ewepụtara n'abalị 3 ọnwa julaị afọ 2018

Brenden Russell Aaronson (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2000) bụ onye America na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-agbachitere etiti ma ọ bụ onye na-agbara otu Premier League Leeds United na otu mba United States bọọlụ
Red Bull Salzburg
A zụlitere ya na Medford, New Jersey, Aaronson gara Shawnee High School otu afọ tupu a họpụta ya na YSC Academy nke Philadelphia Union, ebe ọ gbara bọọlụ ma gụchaa akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
N'oge ọ nọ na YSC Academy, Aaronson agbaala bọọlụ maka ndị ntorobịa Union tupu ọ banye na Mahadum Indiana ma bịanye aka na nkwekọrịta ya na Bethlehem Steel FC
Aaronson pụtara dị ka onye egwuregwu academy na-egwuri egwu maka Bethlehem Steel FC n'oge oge 2017 ha mgbe ha si na academy Philadelphia Union
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2017, Aaronson gbara bọọlụ mbụ ya maka Steel FC na mmeri ha meriri Tampa Bay Rowdies
Aaronson pụtara ugboro iri abụọ na otu maka Steel FC ma gbaa goolu mbụ ya maka ndị ọkachamara megide Atlanta United 2
Na Septemba 17, 2018, a mara ọkwa na Aaronson ga-esonyere Philadelphia Union na mbido oge 2019 ha
N'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 2019, onye ọkpụkpọ ahụ gbara goolu mbụ ya na MLS mbụ ya, na-enyere Philadelphia aka imeri Atlanta United
A na-ewere ya dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu na Union, mmerụ ahụ na nkwụsịtụ nyere Aaronson ohere ịmalite ma nwee ọganihu na otu mbụ dị ka onye egwuregwu na onye na-agba bọọlụ n'akụkụ aka ekpe
Na ngwụcha oge ọhụrụ ya, Aaronson mechara dịka onye nke abụọ maka ọkwa 2019 MLS Rookie of the year, na goolu atọ na enyemaka abụọ n'ihe karịrị nkeji otu puku, narị isii na nkeji ịrị anọ ọ gbara
Aaronson bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ kachasị nta n'ime ndị ikpeazụ ise
Oge 2020 ghọrọ afọ dị egwu maka Aaronson onye mechara oge ahụ na mpụta ịrị atọ na otu n'asọmpi niile ma nye goolu anọ
Ọrụ Aaronson n'oge ahụ mere ka o nweta ọtụtụ otuto nke gụnyere ịkpọ aha na 2020 MLS Best XI maka oge oge na MLS bụ Back Tournament
Union ji ihe ndekọ league kachasị mma mechie oge ahụ na-enweta ihe nrite mbụ nke otu ahụ, 2020 Supporters' Shield
Mgbe asịrị na-aga n'ihu, a mara ọkwa na Ọktoba 16, 2020, na Aaronson ga-esonyere Red Bull Salzburg malite na Jenụwarị 2021 mgbe oge MLS gwụsịrị
Ọ bụ ezie na e kpugheghi ego nnyefe ahụ, Philadelphia kwupụtara na ọ ga-abụ ego nnyefe kachasị elu a kwụrụ maka onye America na-agba bọọlụ si MLS
Aaronson mere mpụta nke mbụ ya maka Salzburg na Jenụwarị 25, dị ka onye nọchiri anya n'oge mmeri ha meriri Rheindorf Altach
Aaronson nyere goolu mbụ ya maka Salzburg na Febụwarị 10, 2021, na-agba goolu mmeri n'egwuregwu n'oge mmeri ha meriri Austria Wien
N'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Mee, ọ meriri ọlaọcha mbụ ya na Salzburg ka klọb ahụ meriri LASK na ngwụcha nke iko Austria
Aaronson gbara goolu nke abụọ nke egwuregwu ahụ, na nke ise ya na asọmpi niile kemgbe ọ hapụrụ Philadelphia na Jenụwarị
Na Mee 26, 2022, Leeds United kwupụtara mbinye aka Aaronson na nkwekọrịta afọ ise, malite na July 1
Sky Sports kọrọ na ego mbufe ga-abụ nde pound ịrị na anọ na puku pound narị asaa
O mere egwuregwu mbụ ya na Leeds dị ka akụkụ nke iri na otu na-amalite na mmalite oge ha na August 6, na mmeri ha meriri Wolverhampton Wanderers

N'abalị iri abụọ na otu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, Aaronson gbara goolu mbụ ya na Premier League mgbe ọ tụgharịrị na njehie nke Édouard Mendy mere ka e jiri goolu atọ a na-asaghi asa wee merie ndị na-asọmpi Chelsea, nke nyeere Leeds aka inweta mmeri mbụ ha nye ndị Chelsea kemgbe afọ 2002
Mgbe o gosipụtara oge ọhụrụ siri ike, Aaronson natara oku mbụ ya na otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwoke nke United States n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2019 maka egwuregwu CONCACAF Nations League na Cuba na Canada
O sonyeghi n'egwuregwu ọ bụla
Aaronson nwetara oku nke abụọ ya na ndị otu okenye maka ogige Jenụwarị 2020
Aaronson nwetara nke mbụ ya zuru oke na mmeri ha ji otu goolu a na-asaghi asa wee merie Costa Rica
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, Aaronson gbara goolu mbụ ya nke mba ụwa n'oge mmeri 6 na El Salvador na Disemba 2020
Nwanne ya nwoke Paxten Aaronson na-egwuri egwu maka Philadelphia Union
