Brenna Youngblood (amụrụ n'afọ 1979) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nke bi na Los Angeles bụ ónyé a maara màkà ịmepụta foto, ihe ọkpụkpụ, na ihe osise
Ọrụ ya na-enyocha okwu gbasara njirimara na nnọchite anya ndị Africa America
Youngblood nwetara BFA site na Mahadum California State, Long Beach na 2002 na MFA site na Jami'ar California, Los Angeles na 2006
Ọrụ Youngblood na-ezo áká mgbè mgbe na akụkọ ihe méré eme dị mkpa na òtù dị na akụkọ ihe nkiri Africa na America dịka ihe ọkpụkpụ ya nke 2017 MIA
nke 'na-ezo aka na Montgomery Improvement Association, otu nke Martin Luther King, Jr
haziri iji duzie ngagharị iwe nke Montgomery na 1955'
Youngblood emeela ihe ngosi onwé ónyé iri na otu site na 2006 ruo 2017
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ngosi mbụ nke Youngblood (2007 na 2008) dị na Margo Leavin [Gallery]
Ọ sokwa n'ihe ngosi otu iri na isii site na 2004 ruo 2018
E gosipụtara ọtụtụ n'ime ihe ngosi Youngblood n'ụzọ dị ukwuu na Los Angeles na New York City
A gụnyere ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nke Seattle Art Museum, A gụnyere ya na ihe ngosi njem 2019 Young, Gifted, and Black The Lumpkin-Boccuzzi Family Collection of Contemporary Art
Brent Stirton bụ onye isi na-ese foto maka ihe gbasara Getty Images, nke dị na New York
A maara ọrụ ya na-enweta ihe nrite n'ọtụtụ ebe màkà ngosipụta dị ike nke nsogbu ndị metụtara esemokwu, ahụike na nsogbu gburugburu ebe obibi
Stirton bụ ọkachamara n'ọrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ma bụrụ onye a maara maka ụzọ ọzọ ọ na-esi eme foto, gụnyere foto ọkụ n'ọhịa, na ọrụ ya
Ọ na-eme njem nkezi ọnwa itoolu n'afọ, na-arụ ọrụ naanị na ọrụ a gwara ya

Ọrụ Stirton pụtara na Newsweek, National Geographic, CNN Traveler, The New York Times Magazine, The Washington Post Magazine, The Sunday Times Magazine, Le Monde 2, GQ, Geo na ọtụtụ aha mba ụwa ndị ọzọ a na-akwanyere ùgwù
Ọ na-edekwa blọọgụ màkà Discovery Channel
N'ịrụ ọrụ iji kọwaa akụkọ, Stirton na ndị nta akụkọ si n'akwụkwọ ndị na-eduga n'ụwa na-arụkọ ọrụ

N'ime afọ abụọ gara aga, ya na ndị CNN bụ Christiane Amanpour na Anderson Cooper na-arụkọ ọrụ ógè niile n'isiokwu ndị dị ka ọdachi tsunami ma ọ bụ okpukpe, na-achịkọta ihe ngosi banyere ihe omume akụkọ okpomọkụ nke a na-ekwupụta ma na-agbasa
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ nke ukwuu màkà ọrụ ebere gụnyere HIV / AIDS, gburugburu ebe obibi, ịda ogbenye, esemokwu na mgbake mgbe esemokwu gasịrị, na nsogbu inye ụmụ nwanyị ike
Stirton na-arụ ọrụ ógè niile màkà Global Business Coalition megide AIDS na The Global Fund megide AIDS, Tuberculosis na Malaria
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ n'ọhịa maka nkwado màkà The World Wide Fund for Nature, na-agbapụ mkpọsa zuru ụwa ọnụ na mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ndị mmadụ na gburugburu ha
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ màkà Ford Foundation na Clinton Foundation
Stirton enwetala ọtụtụ onyinye na nkwanye ugwu màkà ọrụ ya, gụnyere onyinye asaá site na World Press Photo Foundation; n'afọ 2007 a kpọtụrụ ya aha dị ka onye na-ese foto na PopPhoto Magazine
Stirton nwere akara ugo mmụta na akwụkwọ akụkọ site n'obodo ya bụ South Africa, ebe ọ malitere ọrụ ya na-ese foto gbasara ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Brett Murray (a mụrụ n'afọ 1961) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nke a maara nke ọma n'ihe banyere ígwè ya na ihe ọkpụkpụ mgbidi mgbasa ozi
A mụrụ ya na Pretoria, South Africa
Murray nwere nzere masta na nka na Michaelis School of Fine Art, 1989

Onye nkatọ Brenda Atkinson zoro aka na ya dị ka 'onye isi gbara ọchịchịrị nke South African pop (art),' Murray bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na-ewu ewu na mba ahụ, na-ejikarị ihe oyiyi mgbasa ozi dị mfe nghọta na mgbakwunye nke ntụgharị na-atọ ọchị
Ọrụ Murray na-ekwu màkà ihe banyere agha nke ọdịbendị, esemokwu dị n'etiti Afrocentrism na Eurocentrism, ndị ochie na ndị ọhụrụ South Africas
'Site n'ọrụ m, enwere m olileanya na m ga-atọ ụtọ nke ọma

Site na ntụgharị uche satirical na nke dị mwute na South Africa, enwere m olileanya ịgbanwe echiche ndị mmadụ ma gbanwee uche ndị mmadụ, na-eme ebere, ndị mpako na ndị na-eme nganga dị ka nke a nwere ike ịda,' ka ọ na-ekwu
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọrụ ya enyochaala ahụmịhe ya na njirimara ya
Murray bụkwa onye guzobere ngalaba ihe ọkpụkpụ na Mahadum Stellenbosch
N'afọ 2012, Murray gosipụtara ihe osise na Johannesburg gallery nke onye bụbu onye isi ala Jacob Zuma na akụkụ ahụ ya kpughere, nke akpọrọ The Spear
Ihe osise a bụ akụkụ nke ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke akpọrọ 'Hail to the Thief II'

N'abalị iri na asatọ nke ọnwa Mee, African National Congress kwupụtara ebumnuche ya ịgba ya akwụkwọ maka nkwutọ maka eserese ahụ na ịmanye ụlọ ngosi ahụ ka ewepụ ya na ngosi, ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ya, na ihe ndị e biri ebi
Ụfọdụ ndị ọnụ na-eru n'okwu gosipụtara iwe na eserese ahụ, otu ụka kpọkwara oku ka a 'kpụọ Murray nkume ruo ọnwụ'
Na Tuesday ụbọchị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa May n'afọ 2012, n'elekere iri na otu nke ụtụtụ, ụmụ nwoke abụọ ji ite eserese banye na Goodman Gallery na Johannesburg ma mebie The Spear
Ndị otu mgbasa ozi jidere ha na igwefoto ma ndị nche ụlọ ihe nkiri jidere ha ozugbo
N'oge arụmụka nkwutọ ahụ, e mere ntụnyere n'etiti Murray's The Spear na ọrụ ibe ya na South Africa Ayanda Mabulu site n'afọ 2010, Ngcono ihlwempu kunesibhanxo sesityebi

Ihe osise a na-egosi Jacob Zuma n'ụdị yiri nke ahụ n'akụkụ Desmond Tutu, Nelson Mandela na ndị ọzọ sitere na ọgụ megide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ - ụfọdụ isi mbido jụrụ ihe agbụrụ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nwere ike ime na mwakpo Zuma wakporo Murray, onye na-ese ihe ọcha
Ebenezer Henry Brew-Riverson Jnr, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke rụrụ ọtụtụ ọrụ na telivishọn Ghana n'afọ ndi 1980s na 1990s
Nna ya nwere otu aha ya na ya (ma e wezụga jnr)
Breytenbach bụ aha nna sitere na Netherlands
Ndị ama ama nwere aha a gụnyere
Brian Alexander Morgan bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ si Wichita, Kansas, United States, nke a maara nke ọma màkà ọrụ ya na-ede ma na-emepụta ya na otu R&B SWV
Na mbido afọ 20, Morgan dekọrọ teepu ngosi ya na enyi ya n'oge ọ bụ nwata LaChelle Mathenia na ónyé nke atọ dị ka otu a na-akpọ Cachet De Vois
Onye guzobere Club Nouveau bụ Jay King chọpụtara ha, onye nwetara otu ahụ nkwekọrịta ndekọ na Warner Bros
Ihe ndekọ na 1987
Morgan na Mathenia kwagara Sacramento wee dekọọ abọm mbụ na naanị ya, Personal, nke e wepụtara na 1988
Mgbè ọ na-enweghị ike ịdepụta, a kwụsịrị otu ahụ, mana Morgan kpebiri ịnọ na California ma gbalịa ịrụ ọrụ n'onwe ya
N'oge a, ónyé na-ese ihe na onye na-emepụta ihe Robert Brookins zutere ma duzie ya

Mgbè ọ nụrụ banyere ikpe ikpe nke onye na-agụ egwu Martha Wash megide Black Box na RCA Records maka ego azụmahịa, na ịmara na ọ na-anwa inweta nkwekọrịta ndekọ, Morgan dere ọtụtụ egwu màkà ya nke edere dị ka ihe ngosi ma zigara ya site na onye nnọchi anya A&R ya Kenny Ortiz
Mgbè ọ nụrụ abụ ndị ahụ, Wash kpọrọ Morgan n'onwe ya, na-agwa ya na o nwere 'mmụọ nke Patrick Cowley', onye na-emepụta ihe a maara nke ọma maka ịrụ ọrụ na onye a ma ama na disko Sylvester
Morgan dere ma mepụta ọtụtụ egwu maka album mbụ Wash kpọrọ onwe ya, nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ede egwu na onye na-emepụta egwu
Tupu ewepụ ya na nkwekọrịta ndekọ mbụ ya, Morgan bụkwa ónyé na-agụ egwu Chanté Moore na Warner Bros
N'oge ahụ, Morgan nwèrè mmasị na Moore ma dee egwu 'Weak' nke sitere na mmetụta ya n'ebe ọ nọ
E dere egwu ahụ, tinyere egwu ọzọ, 'Right Here', maka Charlie Wilson, otu n'ime mmetụta Morgan na ndụ ya niile, ma gbasaa ruo afọ ole na ole na mbido afọ 1990 dị ka egwu ngosi
N'afọ 1991, onye na-emepụta Kenny Ortiz nụrụ egwu ahụ na cassette ma mee ka Morgan kwenye inye ikike màkà egwu R&B ya SWV
A kpọbatara Morgan ka ọ mepụta ma dee maka abọm 1992 nke otu ahụ bụ It's About Time, nke nwetara ihe ịga nke ọma na azụmahịa
N'ihe dị ka mmalite afọ 2010, DJ Khalil kpọrọ ya ka ya na ya rụọ ọrụ na ọrụ ole na ole
Ọchịchọ Khalil iso ya rụọ ọrụ méré ka Morgan si Sacramento laghachi Los Angeles
N'ihi ịkwaga ahụ, Khalil na Morgan rụrụ ọrụ na Aloe Blacc's major label debut Lift Your Spirit

Brian Astbury (ụbọchị irí na anọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1941 rụọ úbọchị isé n'ọnwa Machị afọ 2020) bụ onye South Africa na-ese foto, onye nduzi ihe nkiri, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nkụzi edemede, na onye guzobere The Space Theatre na Cape Town, South Africa
A mụrụ Brian Astbury n'ubochí irí na anọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1941 ma tolite na obodo Paarl nke South Africa
Ọ gara Paarl Boys 'High ma kpọọ egwuregwu cricket nke izizi banyere ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ tupu ọ banye n'afọ 1959 3 Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Cape Town tupu ọ hapụ usoro ahụ

Ọ zutere nwunye ya n'ọdịnihu, na Cape Argus ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ọbá akwụkwọ na onye nta akụkọ, ógè ọ rụrụ ọrụ ezumike mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ 2 Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto maka Capab, ụlọ ọrụ na-eme ihe nkiri na Cape Province
Ọ ga-eso Bryceland na Athol Fugard mgbe ndị latters na-egwu Boesman na Lena gara England n'afọ 1971

Ya na nwunye ya Yvonne Bryceland na onye na-ede egwuregwu Athol Fugard rụkọrọ ọrụ nke ọma ógè ha guzobere ụlọ ihe nkiri na-abụghị agbụrụ nke a na-akpọ The Space n'ọnwa Mee afọ 1972 na-emeghe na egwuregwu Statements After an Arrest Under the Immorality Act Dabere na ụlọ ọrụ ochie, ụlọ ihe nkiri ahụ nwere ike ịrụ ọrụ na ndị na-ege ntị na-abụghị agbụrụ n'ihi na a chọrọ ndị otu iji lee ihe nkiri na klọb ahụ

Ndị ọzọ na-ede egwuregwu nke ọrụ ha bịdọrọ na The Space, gụnyere Fatima Dike, Geraldine Aron na Paul Slabolepszy Ụlọ ihe nkiri ahụ nyere aka ịmalite ọtụtụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ndị nduzi nke gbasara ma South Africa ma n'ámá ntụrụndụ mba ụwa ma gụnye aha dịka John Kani, Winston Ntshona, Bill Flynn, Richard E Grant, Pieter Dirk Uys na Barney Simon 3

Na The Space ọ bụ onye nduzi nke The Sun King, A Thousand Clowns, The Tiger, Treats, What the Butler Saw, Children of the Wolf, Dracula, Going to Pot, Old King Cole, Play It Again, Sam na egwuregwu ndị ọzọ
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1979, ebe The Space na-agbasi mbọ ike n'ụzọ ego, a gbanwere aha ya The Peoples Space mgbe Moyra Fine na Rob Amato weghaara ya
Ọ ga-agbanye n'afọ 1984 6
Ọ kwagara London n'afọ 1979 ya na Bryceland ọ ghọrọ onye nkuzi ihe nkiri na Lamda, Mountview Academy of Theatre Arts na East 15 acting schools
Ógè ọ lara ezumike nká, o dere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ banyere nka nke ime ihe nkiri na edemede
Ọ nwụrụ ógè ọ dị afọ iri asaa na asatọ na London n'ubochí isé n'ọnwa Machị 2020 mgbe nkụchi obi na London Tube
Yvonne Bryceland nwụrụ n'afọ 1992; di na nwunye ahụ nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ 3
Brian Chikwava bụ onye odee na onye egwu mba Zimbabwe
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya dị mkpirikpi 'Seventh Street Alchemy' e nyere ya n'afọ 2004 Caine Prize maka ide Afrika na Bekee; Chikwava ghọrọ onye Zimbabwe mbụ mere ya
Ọ bụbu onye Charles Pick ibe na Mahadum East Anglia, ma biri na London
Ọ gara n'ihu na-ede na England ma wepụta abọ egwu akpọrọ Jacaranda Skits
A mụrụ Brian Chikwava na Victoria Falls, Zimbabwe 'afọ 1971
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na-ebi ebi dị na Bulawayo, na-aga n'ihu na-amụ engineering Civil na Bristol University
afọ 2004

Chikwava nwetara ihe nrite Caine nke ise maka ide ihe n'Afrika n'afọ 2004 site na obere akụkọ ya 'Seventh Street Alchemy' (nke e bipụtara na Writing Still, Weaver Press, Harare ṅ'afọ 2003), onye Zimbabwe mbụ nwetara ihe nrite ahụ
Mmeri maka ọdịnala ogologo nke Zimbabwe na-ede n'ihu ọdịnihu Zimbabwe na-ejighị n'aka!'

E bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya bụ Harare North n'afọ 2009 site na Jonathan Cape Nnyocha dị mma n'ozuzu ya, na Mary Fitzgerald nke New Statesman na-ede na 'n'ime ka nsogbu nke ndị a na-emekarị ka ha dị ndụ, [Chikwava] emeghewo ọnọdụ na-adịghị mma, ma dị mkpa ngwa ngwa, nke mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya'
Ọ na-eto 'amamihe na aro' ya, ihe Tod Wodicka, onye dere All Shall Be Well, kwenyere na ya, na-ede na 'akwụkwọ site na peeji, ahịrị site na ahịrị, [Chikwava] emeela olu akụkọ zuru oke na nke ziri ezi
jupụtara na ihe ijuanya, obere ihe na-atọ ụtọ, na ezigbo ọkụ-n'afọ
mana nke kachasị mkpa, olu ahụ na-apụta dị ka ihe na-enweghị mgbalị, ya mere eziokwu
ọ bụ nnukwu ihe rụzuru

Trevor Lewis nke The Sunday Times dere na 'Chikwava emeela ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-adọrọ adọrọ, onye Bekee na okwu ya na-agbagọ agbagọ na-eme ka ihe dị egwu, ihe na-atọ ọchị', ebe Margaret Busby dere na The Independent 'Chikwavа nwere nkà ịchọta ìhè na ihe ọchị n'ime obi nkoropụ kachasị njọ, na-adọta ọchị ọbụna site na mwute
mgbe ụfọdụ n'etiti ndị edemede otu na-abịa gafee olu pụrụ iche
nke na ọ na-ejide n'ụzọ a na-agaghị echefu echefu
N' uche m, Chikwava yiri ka ọ ga-anọ n'ụdị ahụ
Site na peeji mbụ ruo na nke ikpeazụ, akụkọ obodo nke Harare North na-ejide, na-enye nsogbu, na-akpali akpali, na-atọ ọchị
N'ikwu okwu banyere Zimbabwe na nnabata ọ kwenyere na akwụkwọ ya ga-enweta, Chikwava kwuru 'Zimbabwe m maara na ọ dịghịzi adị
A ga-ebipụta akwụkwọ ahụ ebe ahụ mana ọ nweghị onye ga-azụta ya
Ọ dịghị onye na-azụrụ akwụkwọ ugbu a
Ha abụghịzi ihe mbụ'
O sokwa na mmemme Bush Theater 's nke afó 2011 Akwụkwọ iri isii na isii nke o ji dee ibe ya dabere n'akwụkwọ King James Bible
Brian Oladapo Idowu ( onye Russia ; amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 18 n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1992) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba bọọlụ na-agba bọọlụ n'aka ekpe maka klọb Khimki na ndị otu mba Naịjirịa
A mụrụ ya na Saint Petersburg site na nna ya bụ onye Naijiria na nne ya bụ onye Russia na Naijiria, Idowu kwagara Owerri, Nigeria mgbe ọ dị obere, ma mesịa laghachi Russia
O mere egwuregwu mbụ ya na Russian Premier League maka FC Amkar Perm na 6 Mee 2012 na egwuregwu megide FC Terek Grozny
Mgbe ọ gbazinyere Dynamo St Petersburg ego n'oge 2013-14, Idowu bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ 3 ọhụrụ na Amkar na 30 June 2014, na-agbatị nkwekọrịta ya ọzọ na February 2017 ruo oge okpomọkụ nke 2020
Na ụbọchị nke iri n'ọnwa Julaị 2018, ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ 3 na FC Lokomotiv Moscow
Na 7 Ọgọstụ 2020, ọ sonyeere Khimki na mgbazinye ego maka oge 2020-21
Na 7 June 2021, ọ kwagara Khimki na ntọala na-adịgide adịgide, na-etinye aka na nkwekọrịta afọ 2 na nhọrọ mgbakwunye afọ 1 ọzọ
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2017, a kpọrọ Idowu ka ọ bụrụ onye otu mba Naịjirịa maka enyi na enyi ha na Argentina na Krasnodar na 14 Nọvemba afọ 2017
Idowu mere egwuregwu izizi ya megide Argentina na 14 Nọvemba, na-abịa dị ka onye nnọchi anya ọkara oge maka Ola Aina, ma nye goolu nke atọ nke Naịjirịa na mmeri 4-2
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2018, a kpọrọ ya aha na ndị otu egwuregwu iri abụọ na atọ nke Naịjirịa maka 2018 FIFA World Cup na Russia
Nna Idowu bụ onye Naijiria
Nne ya bụ ọkara onye Russia, ọkara onye Naijiria
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na St
Petersburg, ma e wezụga oge ọ dị afọ 3 ruo 6 mgbe ọ bi na Owerri, Nigeria
Idowu na-asụ asụsụ Russian zuru oke ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nsụgharị nke ndị otu mba Naịjirịa na ogbako mgbasa ozi tupu oge egwuregwu na Krasnodar na Nọvemba 2017
Brian Kelly McKnight (amụrụ na June 5, 1969) bụ ónyé America na-agụ egwu, ónyé na-ede egwu, onye omee, onye na'emepụta ihe ndekọ, onye na - redio na ónyé na-egwu ọtụtụ ngwá egwu
A maara ya nke ọma màkà falsetto ya siri ike, eriri dị elu na melisma
A maara McKnight maka egwu ya sitere na abọm dịka Brian McKnight (platinum debut), Anytime na Back at One
Ọrụ ya emeela ka ọ nweta nhọpụta Grammy Awards iri na isii, nke atọ naanị Zubin Mehta na Snoop Dogg maka ndekọ nke ọtụtụ nhọpụta Grammy na-enweghị mmeri
A mụrụ McKnight na Buffalo, New York na Claude McKnight, Jr
na Ruth Elaine Willis
Ahụmahụ egwu ya malitere n'oge ọ bụ nwata mgbè ọ ghọrọ ónyé otu ukwe ụka ya, nke nna nna ya duziri
McKnight nyochara ụdị egwu dị iche iche, na mbido afọ iri na ụma ya, ọ malitere ọchịchọ egwu site n'ịde ihe eji egwu egwu mgbe ọ na-amụta ịkpọ ọtụtụ ngwá egwu
McKnight guzobere otu egwu wee malite ịme egwu mbụ ya n'ebe ndị dị n'ógbè ahụ
Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, e nyere ya nkwekọrịta mbipụta
Brian Stelfreeze bụ onye America na-ese ihe na-ati ọchị n'akwụkwọ
Stelfreeze bụ onye na-ese ihe, onye na-ede akwụkwọ, onye na-ese ihe na onye na-ahụ maka agba ma rụọ ọrụ maka ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ onye ọ bụla na-ebipụta akwụkwọ ọchị nke America
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị mbụ so na Gaijin Studios nke Atlanta
Stelfreeze malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ese usoro ihe nkiri sci-fi a kpọrọ CyCops n'etiti afọ 1980

Ọ bụ ezie na a maara Stelfreeze n'oge ọrụ ya niile dịka onye na-ese ihe mkpuchi, na-ese ihe karịrị ihe osise mkpuchi iri ise maka DC Comics 'Shadow of the Bat, ọ rụpụtala ọtụtụ ọrụ n'usoro, ọkachasị n'oge na-adịbeghị anya na obere usoro Domino maka Marvel Comics na Matador maka DC Comics' Wildstorm imprint
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, Stelfreeze na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi nka maka 12 Gauge Comics ma na-enye ihe osise mgbe ụfọdụ maka usoro ha The Ride, na mbido ya, Gun Candy
A pụrụ ịhụ ọrụ ya kachasị ọhụrụ na Walt Simonson dere Demon / Catwoman feature na DC Comics ' Wednesday Comics
Stelfreeze bụ onye na-ese ihe na 2016 revival nke Marvel's Black Panther na onye edemede Ta-Nehisi Coates
Àtụ Inkpot Award 2010s
Brian Watyoka (a mụrụ n'afọ 1973) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe

A mụrụ ya na Harare, Watyoka malitere site n'inyere nwanne nna ya aka ịkpụ sandpaper, polish, na ịrụcha ọrụ soapstone ya; ọ nyekwara nwanne nna ya ọzọ aka n'ịkpụ ihe ọkpụkpụ é ji osisi akpu N'afọ 1993, ọ sonyeere otu na-arụkọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akpụ osisi; Boira Mteki ga-agafe, na-enwe mmasị n'ọrụ ya, ma otu ụbọchị kpọọ ya ka ọ bụrụ onye enyemaka studio
Watyoka na okenye nwoke ahụ nọrọ afọ abụọ, na-arụ ọrụ na Chapungu Sculpture Park
N'ebe ahụ, ọ mụtara ịkpụ nkume siri ike, dị ka serpentinite na dolomite
Ọ nọrọ otu afọ ọzọ na-arụ ọrụ na Joseph Muzondo tupu ọ ghọọ onye na-akpụ ihe nke onwe ya
Ya na Chapungu ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ
Ọrụ Watyoka dị na nchịkọta onwe ya n'ụwa niile
Willson jere ozi na US Air Force site n'afọ 1966 ruo afọ 1970, gụnyere ọtụtụ ọnwa dị ka onye ọrụ nchekwa agha na Vietnam
Ọ hapụrụ Air Force dịka Captain
O mechara bụrụ onye otu Vietnam Veterans Against the War na Veterans For Peace (Humboldt Bay Chapter 56, California, mgbe e mesịrị Portland, OR Chapter 72, na UK Chapter na England)
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Law School na Mahadum America dị na Washington, DC, ọ ghọrọ onye otu District of Columbia Bar

Willson enweela ọrụ dịgasị iche iche gụnyere onye ndụmọdụ ntaramahụhụ, onye na-akwado ikike ndị mkpọrọ, onye ọrụ ugbo mmiri ara ehi, onye enyemaka iwu, onye nyocha ụtụ isi obodo na onye nyocha ụlọ, onye na'ahụ maka ndị agha, na obere onye ọchụnta ego
Dịka onye ọka iwu na onye edemede a zụrụ azụ, o dekọrọ iwu US na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ mba iri abụọ na abụọ

Kemgbe afọ 1986, Willson amụọla iwu na ọtụtụ mba, n'etiti ha Nicaragua, El Salvador, Honduras, Panama, Brazil, Argentina, Mexico, Colombia, Ecuador, Cuba, Haiti, Iraq, Israel (na mpaghara Palestine), Japan, na Korea, ma North na South
N'idepụta usoro iwu nke ọ na-ekwu 'mebiri iwu US na iwu mba ụwa na-amachibido ime ihe ike na mpụ agha,' Willson abụwo onye nkuzi na onye na-eme ihe ike, na-akụzi banyere ihe ize ndụ nke iwu ndị a
O sonyere na ibu ọnụ ogologo oge, omume nke nnupụisi obodo na-enweghị ime ihe ike, na ịjụ ịtụ ụtụ isi yana ịdị mfe nke afọ ofufo

Ọ bụ onye na-enyere ndị mkpọrọ aka na Massachusetts State Senator Jack Backman, jere ozi na ndị agha na-enweghị ebe obibi nke Gọvanọ Massachusetts Michael Dukakis na ndị agha Agent Orange, ma soro onye isi ala Massachusetts John Kerry rụọ ọrụ na Agent Orange na nsogbu ndị agha ndị ọzọ, mesịa ghọọ onye ọrụ afọ ofufo maka mkpọsa Senatorial US mbụ nke Kerry n'afọ 1984
Mgbe mmeri Kerry gasịrị, a họpụtara Willson na kọmitii ndụmọdụ ndị agha ya
Willson bụ onye natara ọtụtụ onyinye maka ọrụ udo na ikpe ziri ezi ya, e nyekwara ya Peace Abbey Courage of Conscience Award na Kennedy Library and Museum na Septemba 26, afọ 1992
Ịzụta nwunye, nke a na-akpọkwa ịzụrụ nwunye, bụ ọrụ ma ọ bụ ahia nke ịzụrụ nwunye dị ka ụdị ihe onwunwe
Nke a na-eme ka nwanyị a na-alụ ọhụrụ nwee ike I bụ ihe aga eregharịa ma ọ bụ gbapụtahachi ya n'aka onye zụrụ ya
Omume a na-aga n'ihu na-enwe nkwado siri ike n'akụkụ ụwa dịka China, North Korea, Vietnam na Africa
Akọwapụtara nke a dị ka ka ụdị alụmdi na nwunye nke ịdị mma, omume a bụ nke iwu na-akwadoghị n'ọtụtụ mba
Otu n'ime ihe ndekọ mbụ e dekọrọ banyere ịzụ ahịa mgbere nwunye na North America nwere ike iso ụzọ nkọwa n'afọ 1619 na Jamestown, Virginia
Ndị mbụ biri na Jamestown bụ nanị ndị nwoke Europe, ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme Alf J
Mapp Jr kwenyere na nke a nwere ike ịbụ n'ihi nkwenye na 'ụmụ nwanyị enweghị ọnụ abịa na azụmahịa siri ike nke nwere ike ịkwada mwuli nke kọntinent
' Site na akụkọ banyere ụnwụ nri, ọrịa na esemokwu, ụmụ nwanyị Europe na-atụ egwu na ịhapụ England na ịga njem n'ógbè ahụ ga-abụ nnukwu ihe ize ndụ
N'ịbụ ndị na-enweghị ike ịchọta ndị nwunye, ọtụtụ ndị ikom họọrọ ịpụ n'ógbè ahụ
Iji belata mgbahapụ , ndị isi obodo zigaghachiri mgbasa ozi na Europe, na-arịọ ka ụmụ nwanyị kwaga n'ógbè ahụ
Ịgbalị ime ka ndị chọrọ ịlụ di na nwunye bịa Jamestown buụru ihe siri ike, Otú ọ dị, ihe mgbochi alụmdi na nwunye na senturi iri na asaa baara ndị ikom obodo ahụ uru
Ị nweta ụlọ na ịrụ ụlọ na Europe dị oké ọnụ ahịa
Ọ bụrụ na amụghị ha ebe akụnụba dị, ọtụtụ mmadụ ga-achọ inweta nnukwu ego tupu ha enwee ike ịlụ

Ọtụtụ ndị inyom bekee na-arụ ọrụ tụgharịrị gaa n'ụlọ ọrụ iji nweta ego dị mkpa maka ịlụ di na nwunye na mbata na ọpụpụ alụmdi na nwunye nyere ya ụzọ ọzọ maka ihe ọzọ pụtara ọtụtụ afọ irụ ọrụ dị ala maka obere ụgwọ
Ụlọ ọrụ Virginia nyere ụmụ nwanyị ndị họọrọ ịhapụ England maka nkwado nke ógbè ahụ ihe mkpali dị ka linen, uwe, ala, na nhọrọ ha nwere gbasara di ha chọrọ

Mgbe ha họpụtara di, ọ ga-akwụ ụlọ ọrụ Virginia pound ego otu narị na iri ise (70kg) nke 'ezigbo akwụkwọ' ụtaba (nke bụ ihe dị ka $5000 USD na ego taa) iji kwụọ ụgwọ maka njem nwunye ha ga-aga n'ógbè ahụ
Nke a bụ ka ụmụ nwanyị Jamestown si nwetara onwe ha aha ' ndị na-alụ ụtaba '
Otu n'ime ụdị ịzụ ụmụ nwanyị a na-ahụkarị n'oge a bụ ndị na-edobe akwụkwọ ozi
A na-eme atụmatụ na e nwere ụlọ ọrụ 'iri iteghete na-ahụ maka ire na ịzụrụ ndị nwunye akwụkwọ ozi
Ụlọ ọrụ ndị a nwere ebe nrụọrụ weebụ na-edepụta adreesị, foto, aha na akụkọ ndụ nke ụmụ nwanyị Puku iri abụọ na ise na-achọ di, ebe ndị di America bụ ndị ha kacha nwee mmasị
Ọ bụ ezie na e nwere ụmụ nwanyị ndị e depụtara na saịtị ndị a sitere n'akụkụ ụwa nile, ma ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ime ndị na-esonye na áhiá nwanyị ọhụrụ ana-eziga ozi sitere na Russia na Philippines
Dị ka ụlọ ọrụ ndị a si kwuo, pasenti iri nke ndị inyom na-ahọrọ ịghọ ndị na-alụ nwanyị ọhụrụ na-enwe ọganihu ma chọta di site na ọrụ ha
Ụlọ ọrụ ndị ahụ na-ekwukwa na e nwere ihe dị ka alụmdi na nwunye Puku iri nke ndị ezigara akwụkwọ ozi kwa afọ, ebe ihe dị ka puku anọ sonyere alụmdi na nwunye ndị metụtara ndị ikom na United States
Mgbere Ịzụta nwunye bụ omenala ochie na China
Ndị Kọmunist China kwụsịrị omume ahụ n'ụzọ dị ukwuu
Otú ọ dị, omume nke oge a 'abụghị ihe ọhụrụ n'ime ime obodo'; a na-akpọkwa ya dị ka alụmdi na nwunye mercenary
Dị ka Ding Lu nke òtù na-abụghị ndị gọọmentị All-China Women's Federation si kwuo, omume ahụ nwere ịmaliteghachi n'ihi ụbara akụ na ụba China

Site na 1991 ruo 1996, ndị uwe ojii China napụtara ihe karịrị ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka puku asato na asatọ ndị e resịrị n'alụmdi na nwunye na ịgba ohu, gọọmentị China kwukwara na ejidere otu puku na iri anọ na atọ ndị na-ere ahịa ihe metụtara ma gbaa akwụkwọ
Ụfọdụ òtù na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ na-ekwu na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị a ezighị ezi nakwa na ọnụ ọgụgụ ụmụnwaanyị a tọọrọ n'ezie ka ukwuu
a zọpụtara karịa na ahia na-aga n'ihu' Ihe kpatara ya gụnyere ịda ogbenye na ụkọ nwunye n'ime ime obodo (ụmụ nwanyị ime obodo na-aga obodo ịrụ ọrụ)

Ka ụmụ nwanyị na-ahapụ ime obodo ịchọta ọrụ n'obodo ukwu, a na-ewere ha dị ka ndị na-adịghị ike 'ịbụ ndị a ghọgburu ma ọ bụ ịmanye ịghọ ndị na-akpali ndị ikom na-achọsi ike ịlụ nwunye' Ụkọ nke ndị nwunye n'aka nke ya bụ n'ihi mmụba nke mmasị ọdịnala nke ndị di na nwunye China maka ụmụ nwoke site na amụma imụ otu nwa na 1979 na China

Ụlọ akwụkwọ nkà mmụta sayensị nke China mere atụmatụ na n'afọ 1998, e nwere ndị ikom otu narị na iri abụọ maka ụmụ nwanyị otu nari ọ bụla, na enweghị ahaghị nhata n'ime ime obodo bụ ihe dị ka ụmụ nwoke otu narị na iri atọ maka otu narị nwanyị ọ bụla
Mmụba nke ego a na-eri n'ụgwọ isi nwanyị bụ ihe na-ebutekwa ụmụ nwoke ịzụ ụmụ nwanyị maka nwunye

Ihe ndị ruuru ire mmadụ na China na-ekwu na ọ dị ọnụ ala ka nwoke zụta nwunye n'aka onye na-ere ahịa ma ọ jiri puku yuan abụọ ruo puku yuan anọ karịa ịkwụ ụgwọ ego ọdịnala, nke na-adịkarị elu karịa puku yuan iri
Maka ndị ọrụ obodo mepere emepe, ire nwunye bụ nhọrọ dị ọnụ ala, ebe ọ bụ na 1998 opekata mpe; Ndị ọrụ obodo China na-enweta ihe dịka $60 kwa ọnwa
A na-esi na mba ndị dị ka Burma, Laos, Pakistan, Vietnam na North Korea
Ndị na-azụ ahịa nwunye nwunye na-ere ụmụ nwanyị dị ka ndị na-alụ di ọhụrụ ma ọ bụ ndị akwụna dabere na ọdịdị ahụ ha
Aghụghọ a na-emekarị nke ndị na-alụ nwanyị ọhụrụ na-eji n'ịweta ndị nwunye maka ọrịre bụ inye ọrụ dị ka ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe na kama ịtọrọ ha
Ndị na-azụ ahịa nwunye nwere ike ịre nwa agbọghọ maka ọnụ ahịa $250 ruo $800 USD
US$50 ruo US$100 nke ọnụ ahịa mbụ na-agara ndị isi ntọ ebe ego ndị ọzọ ana-enweta na-agara ndị na-azụ ahịa na-ebutere onye ahịa ha nwunye
Ụmụ nwanyị China, ndị a zụrụ dị ka nwunye, ndị na-amụ ụmụ na-adịkarị mfe ịnọ n'ime alụmdi na nwunye
Fang Yuzhu nke Òtù Na-ahụ Maka Ụmụ nwanyị China kwuru na ọ bụ 'echiche siri ike nke ọrụ' nke ụmụ nwanyị China nwere, na echiche na ọ bụ ihe ihere ịhapụ di ha

Yuzhu kwukwara na ụfọdụ ụmụ nwanyị nwere ike were alụmdi na nwunye ha mmanye dị ka nhọrọ ka mma maka ndụ ịda ogbenye na ịrụsi ọrụ ike nke ha ga-agbaso mgbe ha laghachiri n'ụlọ ma ọ bụ echiche na ụfọdụ ụmụ nwanyị nwere ike ọ gaghị eche na ha nwere ike ịchọta di ọzọ, ebe ọ bụ na ha 'enwelarị otu'
Mgbere Ịzụta nwunye bụ ihe ochie n'ọtụtụ mpaghara na India
Ịzụta nwunye na-adịkarị na steeti India dị ka Haryana, Jharkhand, na Punjab
Dị ka CNN-IBN si kwuo, a na-azụta nwanyị, ree, na-akwaso ha ikọ n'ike ma lụnye nwanyị di na nwunye na-enweghị nkwenye' n'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke India
A na-esi na Bihar, Assam na West Bengal na-azụta ihe ndị a na-alụ ọhụrụ

Ọnụ ego nke nwanyị a na-alụ ọhụrụ (nke a na-akpọ paros na Jharkhand ), ọ bụrụ na azụrụ ya n'aka ndị na-ere ahịa, nwere ike na-eri n'etiti ihe dị ka puku anọ na puku iri atọ Indian rupees, nke pụtara $ 88 ruo $ 660 USD
A na-akwụkarị nne na nna nwunye ana ere ihe ruru rupee 500 ruo 1,000 (ihe dị ka $11 ruo $22 USD )
Mkpa ịzụta nwunye malitere site na oke nwanyị na nwoke dị ala
Ụdị dị ala dị otú ahụ kpatara site na mmasị ịmụ ụmụ nwoke kama ịbụ ụmụ nwanyị, na nwanyị feticide
A na-azụta ụmụ nwanyị ọ bụghị naanị dịka ndị nwunye, kamakwa dịka ndị ọrụ ugbo ma ọ bụ ndị enyemaka ụlọ
Ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị na-aghọ “ ndị ohu mmekọahụ nwoke na nwanyị ” ma ọ bụ ndị ọrụ mmanye bụ ndị e mecha eresịgharia ndị na -azụ ahịa mmadụ iji mebie ọnụ ahịa ahụ
Dị ka onye edemede Punjabi bụ Kirpal Kazak si kwuo, ire ụmụ nwanyị ka nwunye malitere na Jharkhand mgbe emechara ọbịbia Rajputs
Ebo a na-eji ihe ịchọ mma chọọ ụmụ nwanyị mma maka ire ere
Omume nke ire ụmụ nwanyị dị ka ndị na-alụ alụmdi belatara mgbe Green Revolution na India gasịrị, 'mgbasa nke ịgụ akwụkwọ', na mmụba nke oke nwoke na nwanyị kemgbe 1911
Otú ọ dị, ọnụ ọgụgụ ahụ dara na 2001
Omume ịzụrụ nwanyị ka nwunye ghọrọ ihe v'eme nanị n'akụkụ ndị dara ogbenye nke ọha mmadụ dị ka ndị ọrụ ugbo, Castes Ahaziiri, na ebo
N'ezinụlọ ndị dara ogbenye, ọ bụ naanị otu nwa nwoke na-alụ di na nwunye n'ihi ịda ogbenye na 'ozize nkesa ala enwere'
Ịzụta nwunye na North Korea bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị n'ihi oke ịda ogbenye obodo ahụ na ụmụ amaala na-etinye ọtụtụ ihe ize ndụ ịhapụ obodo ahụ

Ndị na-azụ ahịa mmadụ na-ewere nke a dị ka ohere ịzụ ahịa ụmụ nwanyị North Korea na-achọsi ike n'ofe obodo na China ọ bụghị mgbe niile ka ha n'éfè ha dị ka ndị ohu, mana tumadi ndị ụfọdụ dị ka ndị nwunye
Mgbe ha rutere na alụmdi na nwunye, a na-ekwu na ndị inyom ndị a ka ana-amanye itu ime, ma ọ bụ mmetọ mmekọahụ na anụ ahụ site n'aka ndị di ha bụ ndị China

Ọ bụ ezie na e nwere alụmdi na nwunye na-aga nke ọma, ọ na-esiri ha ike ịnote aka n'ihi iwu na-akwadoghị nke ụmụ amaala North Korea na-ngafe ókèala na-anataghi ikike, n'agbanyeghị na ụmụ nwanyị anọwo na mba ahụ ruo ọtụtụ afọ, ọ dịghị onye na-enye ha ma ọ bụ ụmụ ha ikike ịbụ nwa amaala
N’ihi ya, a na-ejide ha ma zighachi ha n’ala nna ha ma ọ bụ debe ha na China ka ha chee ihe ga-esi n’imebi iwu pụta
Ụlọ ọrụ dị gburugburu ụwa na-arịọ China ka ọ nye ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke ndị gbapụrụ na North Korea na-achọ ebe mgbaba, agbanyeghị anabatabeghị arịrịọ ahụ
Na South Korea, ịzụ nwunye anaghị adịkarị ka ọ dị na North Korea, n'agbanyeghị na ọ ka dị n'ụzọ dị iche iche

Ọtụtụ n'ime ụmụ nwanyị a na-alụ ọhụrụ zụrụ na South Korea si n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke Eshia, nke sitere na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ, na mgbakwunye na ịzụ ahịa nwanyị di ka nwunye nke mba ụwa na South Korea ka aka n'enye nkwado n'ihi na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị mmadụ na-ebelata
Mgbere Ịzụta nwunye na Vietnam agaala n'ihu ịbụ ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị, na-aghọ ụlọ ọrụ a na-ere ahịa kacha ere ahịa n'akụkọ ihe mere eme na nso nso a, karịsịa na gburugburu ógbè ugwu na China

Ụmụ nwanyị Vietnamese na- amaghị nwoke, site na afo iri na asatọ ruo afọ iri abụọ na ise karịsịa, na-enwe nkwado anya iche site na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ a maara dị ka quickie matchmaking ụlọ ọrụ maka East na Southeast Asia ndị ikom si South Korea, Taiwan, China, Malaysia na Singapore
A na-ewere Virginity bu amaghị nwoke dị ka àgwà kacha baa uru na azụmahịa a ka a na-azụkarị ụmụ nwanyị Vietnamese na- amaghị nwoke na ọnụ ahịa dị elu
Ọnụ ahịa mbuli dị iche n'etiti ụlọ ọrụ; Ọnụ ahịa ngwugwu dị n'etiti $5000 na $22,000 USD nke gụnyere agbamakwụkwọ, visa, ule nyocha ahụike na nkuzi asụsụ
Dabere na nyocha emere na Korea, pasenti iri isii na ise nke ndị Vietnamese zara gụchara naanị ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ma ọ bụ nke obere na sekondri
Enweghị agụmakwụkwọ a nwere ike ịkọwa ihe ọmụma mmekọrịta ọha na eze dara ogbenye nke na-enye ohere ka ụlọ ọrụ a na-eto eto
Ụmụ nwanyị Vietnam na- agba akwụna nye ndị mba ọzọ
Site n'ịre mmekọahụ maka visa, a na-ewebata ha n'ọrụ ọhụrụ nke gụnyere ọrụ na ohu ụlọ
Ụlọ ọrụ ngwa ngwa ndị a kpọtụrụ aha n'elu na-ejikọta umunwoke atọ ruo ise ka ha chọọ ndị nwunye Vietnamese
Otu nke ndị ahịa a nwere ike na-ewepụta uru karịa, na-echekwara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ihe dịka pasenti iri ise rụọ iri na ụgwọ e mere atụmatụ na ọ ga-abụ $85,000 USD kwa njem
Otu ihe ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ n'Africa na-ekwekọrịtaghị na ya bụ mgbere ịzụ nwanyị ka nwunye

N'Afrịka, ịzụ ụmụ nwanyị na-achọkarị ime ihe megide mmasị ụmụ nwanyị kacha mma, na-eme ka ọtụtụ ndị nwee mmetụta nke ahaghị nhata nke nwoke na nwanyị yana enweghị nkwusosike na ngalaba ikike ụmụ nwanyị
N’Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Africa, alụmdi na nwunye ụfọdụ na-agụnye ibufe ihe onwunwe ndị bara uru a na-enweta site n’ezinụlọ nke nwoke na-alụ nwanyị ọhụrụ ma nye ezinụlọ nke nwanyị a na-alụ ọhụrụ onyinye
Ụfọdụ akpaokwu dị ka ọnụahịa nwunye, ego, akụnụba nwunye, na ụfọdụ okwu ụmụ amaala ' lobolo ', 'mala', 'bogadi', na 'chiko' niile na-emejupụta koodu dị iche iche nke ịzụrụ nwunye

Akwụkwọ ndị dabara maka orure ụmụ nwanyị dị ka ndị na-alụ di gụnyere aha ndị dị ka Eho Hamara Jeevna nke onye edemede Punjabi bụ Dalip Kaur Tiwana, egwuregwu Ik Hor Ramayan nke onye na-ede egwuregwu Ajmer Singh Aulakh, Ịzụta nwunye Onye na-etinye aka na History of Mail- Order Matches nke Marcia A

Zug, Ihe Matrimony Azụmahịa dị ize ndụ nke Mail-Order Matchmaking On The Western Frontier nke Chris Enss dere, uri Vietnamese The Tale of Kieu nke Nguyễn Du dere, akwụkwọ akụkọ Tat Den nke Ngo Tat To, na akwụkwọ akụkọ Ịzụta nwunye nke Penny Wylder
Bridge Football Club bụ klọb bọọlụ Naijiria nke dị na Lagos nke e guzobere n'etiti afọ ndị 1970
N'ihi mmekọrịta ya na ụlọ ọrụ Julius Berger, a maara klọb ahụ dị ka Julius Berger Football Club ruo n'afọ 2010
Otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ahụ enwetala mmeri n'asọmpi mba ma sọọ mpi mba ụwa
Ndị egwuregwu dị ka Odion Ighalo, David Adekola, Yakubu, Taribo West, Sunday Oliseh, Samson Siasia, Emmanuel Amuneke, Rashidi Yekini, Garba Lawal, na Mutiu Adepoju agbaala bọọlụ maka klọb ahụ
Ruo n'afọ 2006, klọb ahụ na-agba bọọlụ na Njikọ Premier League nke Naịjirịa, mana ndị nwe ha kwupụtara atụmatụ imechi klọb ahụ site na afọ 2008

Otú ọ dị, onye isi oche nke ndị nduzi na-apụ apụ Mobolaji Johnson (onye bụbu gọvanọ Lagos State) kwuru n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2008 na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ emeela ka ego ha kwụsie ike ma dị njikere ịkwụ ụgwọ zuru ezu maka ndị otu ahụ na 2008/09
Ha gbara bọọlụ ikpeazụ ha n'ụlọ n'afọ 2008 na Mahadum Lagos mgbe emechiri Onikan Stadium maka oge fọdụrụnụ
Berger kwagara Abeokuta nwa oge maka afọ abụọ na 2004
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2010, mmadụ asaa zụtara ndị otu egwuregwu ahụ
A gbanwere aha klọb ahụ 'Bridge Football Club'
Bridge Football Club gosipụtara na Nigerian National League (NNL) na oge 2010/2011 na 2011/2012 wee mechie nke atọ (3rd) na nke anọ (4th) n'otu n'otu
Klọb ahụ nwere ndị ọrụ karịrị iri asaa (70) nke gụnyere ndị egwuregwu na ndị nkuzi nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ha 'BRF Academy'
Otú ọ dị, na Disemba 2012 obere oge tupu oge 2012 Nigeria National League, ndị otu ahụ gbalịrị ire oghere league ha nye Fountain FC nke dị na Ekiti
Ha hapụrụ league mgbe ha na-apụghị ire ya

Nke a mere ka ha sonye n'ọdịnihu na bọọlụ Naijiria n'enwe obi abụọ, mana ha sonyere na 2013 Lagos State Federation Cup wee sonye na Lagos Private Professional Football League 'Metro Pro League' maka oge 2013/2014 wee mechie n'ọkwa nke abụọ (2nd) na oge izizi nke otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ọkachamara
Bridge House College, nke a na-akpọ BHC, bụ otu n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ na-akụzi ihe n'onwe ya na Naịjirịa nke dị na Ikoyi, Lagos, Naịjiria
E guzobere ya n'afọ 2004 iji kwado nkwadebe maka mahadum maka ndị na-ahapụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị afọ 1519 na-atụle agụmakwụkwọ mahadum na Naịjirịa na mba ofesi
Kọleji ahụ bụ ụlọ ọrụ a kwadoro maka ule Cambridge A na ọzụzụ ndị nkuzi ihu na ihu na Nigeria

Kọleji ahụ malitere na 1, olagunsoye Oyinlola, 2nd Avenue, Ikoyi na ụmụ akwụkwọ 8 nwere mmasị ịmụ ihe na UK ruo na afọ 2007 mgbe ọ webatara ebe ndị ọzọ gụnyere US, Canada, UAE, Ireland, Ghana, Nigeria wdg
Kọleji ahụ kwagara na ogige ya na-adịgide adịgide na 2014
Kemgbe e bidoro ya, Bridge House akụziwo ihe karịrị ụmụ akwụkwọ Naijiria 2,500 na ụmụ nke ndị mba ọzọ bi na Naijiria
Bridge House na-enye usoro mmụta ndị a
A họpụtara Bridge House College n'etiti ụlọ akwụkwọ kachasị elu maka Cambridge A Level Programme na Naịjirịa dị ka Edusko, Infoguidenigeria na LegitNG bipụtara
N'afọ 2019, ihe karịrị 70% nke ụmụ akwụkwọ debara aha nwetara akara A *-B na Mee / Junn, na afọ 2019 Cambridge A
Site na mmemme Cambridge A, ụmụ akwụkwọ nwere ike ịbanye n'afọ nke abụọ na mahadum niile dị na Naịjirịa

Na British Council Recognition na Cambridge Learners Awards, Nigeria nke emere na Lagos na 2017, ụmụ akwụkwọ anọ nke Bridge House pụtara n'elu na Nigeria na isiokwu anọ; physics (International AS Level), azụmahịa (International A Level), Economics (International A level) na physics ( International A Level)

The Outstanding Cambridge Learner Awards bụ ihe omume a na-eme kwa afọ nke British Council haziri nke na-eme emume maka arụmọrụ na ihe ịga nke ọma nke ụmụ akwụkwọ na-ewere Cambridge International Examinations na mba 40 gburugburu ụwa

N'afọ 2018, kọleji ahụ nyere afọ abụọ zuru oke agụmakwụkwọ ruru nde N9 nye nwa akwụkwọ kachasị mma na Naịjirịa na May / Junn, na afọ 2018 West African Senior School Certificate Examination (WASSCE), nke West African Examination Council (WAEC) duziri
Onye ritere uru, David Okorogheye, enwetala akara A1 n'otu n'otu na isiokwu ya niile ma nwetakwara akara 332 na nyocha ya Joint Admission and Matriculation Board (JAMB)

Mahadum nke Birmingham kwupụtara n'oge na-adịbeghị anya na ụmụ akwụkwọ Bridge House ga-erite uru site na ụdị agụmakwụkwọ ọhụrụ nke ụmụ akwụkwọ Naijiria na-etinye akwụkwọ maka mmemme agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum Birmingham malite na Septemba 2020
Akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ ahụ ruru £ 2,500 ka a ga-enye ya nwa akwụkwọ Bridge House kachasị mma maka nnọkọ afọ 2019/2020
Bridge House College guzobere The BHC Alumni dị ka ụzọ isi zụlite mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ụmụ akwụkwọ kọleji ugbu a na ndị bụbu
Ndị bụbu ụmụ akwụkwọ na-enye aka n'ịtụ ndị nkuzi na kọleji

Onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji ahụ, Serena Omolamai nabatara n'ihe karịrị Mahadum US 8 na afọ 2016 wee nweta agụmakwụkwọ na afọ 1870 na Mahadum Syracuse, New York nke ruru $ 53,000 bụ nkwanye ùgwù kachasị elu nke Office of Admissions nyere
A kpọrọ ya kasị afọ 2020 Senior Marshal n'oge emume mmalite nke 166 nke Mahadum Syracuse
N'afọ 2018, onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji ahụ, Benjamin Inemugha mebiri Guinness World Record
Benjamin gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bridge House College One-Year University Foundation Programme na afọ 2015 tupu ọ gaa Mahadum Birmingham iji mụọ Electrical and Electronics Engineering

Kwa afọ, Bridge House College na-ahazi ihe ngosi mahadum kwa afọ ebe ndị nnọchiteanya si na mahadum karịrị 30 sitere na UK, US na Canada na ndị nne na nna na ụmụ akwụkwọ nke kọleji na-ezute iji kwurịta mgbanwe ụmụ akwụkwọ
Ndị bịara gụnyere ndị nnọchiteanya si Mahadum Leeds, Mahadum Birmingham, Mahadim Leicester, Mahadam Essex, Mahaduma Brock, Mahadin Steeti Louisiana wdg
The Bridge House Annual Graduation na-anabata ndị ọkà okwu ama ama na ndị na-anụ ọkụ n'obi agụmakwụkwọ na Naịjirịa kwa afọ

Ndị ọkà okwu gara aga gụnyere Onye isi oche nke First Bank plc, Mrs Ibukun Awosika, Onye guzobere, Zinox Technologies, Leo Stan Ekeh, Onye guzobere / Onye isi nke Rise Network, Toyosi Akerele-Ogunsiji, Onye isi, Alpha Reach, Japhet Omojuwa, nwunye onye bụbu gọvanọ nke Lagos State, Dame Abim Fasbolahola, onye bụbu osote gọvanọ, Lagos State, Sarah Adebisi Sosan, onye osote Kọmishọna Ukwu Britain, Ray Kyles na ihe ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 2018, Alh
Abdul Samad Rabiu, onye bụbu nne na nna nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ duziri ihe omume ahụ ma nye onyinye N50 nde na kọleji Bridge House n'okpuru BUA Foundation
Bridge House College nwere njikọ na ihe karịrị mahadum 50 na mba dị iche iche gụnyere UK, US, Canada, UAE, Ireland, South Africa, Ghana, Nigeria wdg

Kọleji ahụ bụ onye otu Council of British International Schools (COBIS), Association of International School Educators of Nigeria (AISEN), Associations of Private Educators in Nigeria (APEN) ma nwee mmekọrịta ọrụ na British Council Nigeria, Institute of Education Dublin, Ireland
Bridge House College's University Foundation Programme bụ nke Brooke House College, UK kwadoro
Bridget Boakye bụ onye ọchụnta ego Ghana, onye sayensị data na onye edemede

O mebere TalentsinAfrica, otu n'ime usoro nka na-eto ngwa ngwa n'Afrịka na ikpo okwu ewebata Ụlọ ọrụ ya so na ụlọ ọrụ iri abuo kachasị ahọpụtara na October 2019 maka Harambe Entrepreneur Alliance na Bretton Woods, New Hampshire
Ụlọ ọrụ ya pụtakwara dị ka otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ atọ kachasị elu na Oxford University Africa Innovation Fair
A mụrụ Bridget ma zụlite na Ghana Ọ kwagara United States ka ya na ndị mụrụ ya biri mgbe ọ dị afọ iri ma gụchaa akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Swarthmore College, wee gụchaa nzere bachelọ na Economics
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Swarthmore College, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na mmepe na agụmakwụkwọ tupu ọ kwaga Ghana
Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ na She Leads Africa ebe ọ na-arụrịta ụka banyere akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Africa, ụmụ nwanyị, akụ na ụba na ọchụnta ego
Na Ghana, o guzobere TalentsinAfrica na ChaleKasa

TalentsinAfrica bụ ikpo okwu na-akwado AI na-akwado iji nweta ohere maka ndị na-eto eto Afrịka, ebe ChaleKasa bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe omume ndị a haziri ahazi iji jikọta ndị Diasporans na ndị Afrịka
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere Women's Corner GH na onye na-eme atụmatụ maka ndị Afrịka na China

N'ime ụbọchị ọmụmụ nke Iri abụọ na asaa ya, Bridget jikọrọ aka na Crowdfricaorg iji mepụta Bridget Gives @ 27, ọrụ nzụlite ego nke ọ na-eji nyere aka nweta $2,000 site n'aka ndị enyi ya na ezinụlọ ya iji kwado inye ndị Ohua Ghana nlekọta ahụike
Bridget Otoo (nke onye amụrụ n'abalị iri atọ na otu nke ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1983) bụ onye nta akụkọ Ghana, onye mgbasa ozi na onye ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze
O jere ozi na ọkwa dị iche iche na TV3 Network Limited dị ka onye mgbasa ozi na onye na-ahụ maka akụkọ
Ọ bụkwa onye na-akwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị yana obodo LGBTQI + na Ghana

Otoo gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Aggrey Memorial Basic School, Sekondi tupu ọ gawa Bompeh Senior High Technical School, Takoradi, maka agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, ebe ọ bụ onye enyere ọkwa onyeisi ụmụ akwụkwọ umunwanyi
A na-akpọ ya aha njirimara “The “Headmistress”” e nyere ya aha a n’ihi àgwà ọ na egosiputa dị ka ntukwasi obi,nga n' ihu na adịghị oké nkọ
O nwetara nzere ya bụ Bachelor of Arts (BA) na Mass Communication Studies n'ulo akwụkwọ ndị nta akụkọ Ghana bụ Ghana Institute of Journalism (GIJ)
O nwekwara nzere Master of Business Administration (MBA) na Mahadum nke Ghana, Legon
Otoo rụrụ ọrụ na Ghana Ports and Harbours Authority (GPHA) ọrụrụ ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze n'oge ọrụ mba ya
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi na redio na TV na Good News FM na Sky TV n'afọ 2008
Tupu nke ahụ n'afọ 2003, ọ bụ onye nso n'olu na-edekọ mgbasa ozi nye ụfọdụ ụlọ ọrụ (Tigo, Barclays, Unilever na Ecobank)
Ọ kwadoro 'New Day', 'You and the Police' na akụkọ oge na TV3 ruo oge ụfọdụ
Bridget, nwa Francis Otoo na Agnes Arthur, nwere ụmụnne isii (6)

N'afọ 2021, O kwupụtara nguzo ya banyere LGBTQ wetara ọtụtụ esemokwu O kwusiri ike na ndetu Twitter na-ekwu na ọ dị njikere ma na-enweghị ọdịmma onwe ya ịkwado usoro LGBTQI na Ghana n'agbanyeghị ihe ndị okpukpe na-ekwu banyere ha
O kwuputakwara na ọ bụrụ na ịkwado LGBTQI bụ ụzọ kachasị ngwa ngwa ma dị mfe ime mmadụ aga ọkụ mmuọ, ọ dị njikere maka nkwado n'ihi na ọ chọrọ izute ekwensu
Bridget Pitt bụ onye odee South Africa, onye na-akwado gburugburu ebe obibi na onye nkuzi nka amụrụ na Zimbabwe ma biri na Cape Town
N'afọ 1987 ọ nwetara akwụkwọ mmụta British Council iji mụọ mgbasa ozi na Mahadum London
Edemede izizi ya bụ maka akwụkwọ akụkọ sitere n'ala, nke bụ akụkụ nke mgba mgbochi ịkpa ókè agbụrụ n'oge mgbe afọ 1980s
Ọ sekwara mpempe katuun maka ozi izu ụka
O dere akwụkwọ nkuzi maka NGO na akwụkwọ ọgụgụ, yana uri na akụkọ ifo
O bipụtala abụ na magazin The Thinker, akụkọ mkpirisi, na akwụkwọ akụkọ
Akwụkwọ akụkọ akụkọ ifo ya bụ The Unseen Leopard bụ onye ahọpụtara maka ihe nrite Commonwealth Writers' n'afọ 2011, yana maka afọ nke 2012 Wole Soyinka Prize for Literature in Africa
Bridget A
van Kralingen (amụrụ 1963) bụ onye isi azụmaahịa amụrụ na England wee zụlite na South Africa
Malite na 2016, ọ jere ozi dị ka Senior Vice President nke ụlọọrụ IBM Global Industry Platforms na New York City, ugbu a ọ bụ Senior VP nke IBM Global Markets
Tupu ịbanye IBM na 2004, ọ rụrụ ọrụ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri na anọ maka Deloitte n'ọtụtụ ọkwa nchịkwa
N'ịbụ onye gụrụ akwụkwọ na South Africa, e deputara aha ya na ndepụta nke Fortune ' s maka ụmụ nwanyị iri ise kachasị ike kemgbe 2005
Van Kralingen nwetara nzere bachelọ na azụmaahịa na Mahadum Witwatersrand na 1984, wee mechaa nweta akara ugo mmụta nsọpụrụ na azụmaahịa sitere na Mahadum Johannesburg na 1985
Ọ nwetara nzere masta na azụmahịa na akparamaagwa na Mahadum South Africa na 1990
Van Kralingen malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nyocha dị elu maka Council for Science and Industrial Research na South Africa site na 1986 ruo 1989
Ọ kwagara Deloitte na South Africa, ebe ọ nọ na-elekọta Onye Mmekọ maka Strategy na Development Organisation site na 1989 ruo 1997
Na 1997 ọ kwagara New York City ka ọ rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye mmekọ nchịkwa mba maka ọrụ ego na Deloitte Consulting, ọkwa nke o jigidere ruo afọ 2004
N'April 2004 van Kralingen sonyeere IBM Global Services na New York City dị ka onye mmekọ njikwa ego zuru ụwa ọnụ
Na Nọvemba 2006, ewelitere ya ịbụ onye isi njikwa nke IBM Global Business Services maka Northeast Europe, Middle East, na Africa
Site na Jenụarị 2010 ruo Jenụarị 2012, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi njikwa maka IBM North America
Na 2012, a kwalitere van Kralingen ka ọ bụrụ osote onye ịsị oche nke IBM Global Business Services
Dịka onye ji ọkwa osote onye isi oche, van Kralingen lekọtara ihe karịrị otu narị puku ndị ndụmọdụ na ndị na-enye ọrụ na mba otu narị na iri asaa
Site na 2012 ruo 2019, o duuru IBM's Industry Platforms, guzobe IBM dị ka onye ndu na blockchain ụlọ ọrụ, na-ebupụta nyiwe ụlọ ọrụ na ndị ahịa yana ijikwa ike nke ụlọ ọrụ IBM na akaụntụ kacha ukwuu
N'April 2020, a kpọrọ van Kralingen osote onye isi oche nke IBM Global Markets, na-achịkwa otu ndị ahịa IBM, ndị mmekọ azụmahịa, mmepe azụmahịa na ike ụlọ ọrụ n'ụwa niile
N'ime ọrụ a, ọ bụ ya na-ahụ maka ego IBM nwetara, uru na afọ ojuju ndị ahịa n'ụwa niile
Na 2011 Van Kralingen sonyeere ndị isi oche nke Royal Bank of Canada
Ọ bụkwa onye otu bọọdụ ndụmọdụ nke ọgbakọ anaghị akwụ ụgwọ nke a kpọrọ Partnership for New York City
Akpọrọ Van Kralingen na ndepụta Fortune ' maka ụmụ nwanyị iri ise kachasị ike maka afọ ise na-esochi afọ 2010 (2010-2015)
Ọ ghọọrọ onye nke iri atọ na itoolu na 2011, onye nke iri abụọ na atọ na 2012, onye nke iri abụọ na asatọ na 2013, onye nke iri atọ na asaa na 2014, na onye nke iri atọ na ise na 2015
Akpọrọ ya aha otu n'ime Top 25 Consultants na 2006 site na Consulting Magazine, na otu n'ime mmadụ otu nari kachasị enwe mmetụta n'ihe gbasara Ego na 2005 site na Euromoney

Bridgette Radebe (née Motsepe ) bụ nwanyị South Afrịka na-achụnta ego onye sitere na agbụrụ Tswana na nwanne nwanyị onye ọchụnta ego South Africa Patrice Motsepe na nwunye onye isi ala South Africa, Tshepo Motsepe
A mụrụ ya na 26 February 1960
Radebe malitere dị ka onye na- egwuputa ihe na 1980s; ijikwa ọrụ ngwuputa ihe nke onwe na imepụta ihe maka ọrụ ngwuputa ihe bụrụ ibu na South Africa mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'okpuru nkwekọrịta
O bidoro Mmakau Mining ; ụlọ ọrụ na-egwupụta ihe nke na-amalite nyocha ma na-enyere aka ịmepụta platinum, ọla edo na chrome
Radebe bụ onye isi otu South African Mining Development Association ebe di ya Jeff Radebe bụ minista n'ọkwa onye isi ala na mba South Africa
Ọ bụkwa onye otu New Africa Mining Fund ma na-eje ozi na bọọdụ Sappi
Bridgette akatọọla 'ụdị ngwupụta ego nke onye isi obodo' n'ihi na 'ọ na-ewe ala iji eme ihe ndị ahụ, mbupụ ahụ na-emepụta obodo ndị mmadu na-ebighi, ọrụ na-agakwa mba ofesi
' Mgbe e megharịrị South Africa pasent iri asatọ na atọ nke ihe ndị sitere n'okike bụ nke obere agbụrụ (ndị ọcha)
Taa, pasent iri itoolu na otu nke ihe onwunwe ahụ bụ nke ụlọ ọrụ onwe nwere
Ọ na-atụ aro atọ iji dozie nsogbu ahụ 1) arụmọrụ ngwuputa ahụ ga-abụriri nke mba ahụ ga na-achikwa, 2) ka steeti goghara arụmọrụ ngwuputa n'aha nke inye ndị ịsị ojii ikike, 3)
imekọ ihe ọnụ ije n'etiti ọha na eze nrs n'el nke onweu
ichikwagna ihazi arụmọrụ ngwuputa na Africa
Radebe nwetara ihe nrite “International Businessperson of the Year Award” na Mee 2008 site n'aka Global Foundation for Democracy
Ihe nrite a na-achọpụta ndị ọchụnta ego megoro mgbanwe n'ụwa nke mgbanwe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na gburugburu ebe obibi
Na 1–2 Julaị 2011, Radebe rụrụ ọrụ enyemaka na emume agbamakwụkwọ nke Prince Albert II nke Monaco na onye bụbu Charlene Wittstock
N'afọ 2019, a họpụtara Radebe ka ọ bụrụ onye otu BRICS Business Council
Keitumetse Bridgette Tlhomelang (amụrụ na 28 Disemba 1975) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa nke na-eje ozi dị ka onye African National Congress Member of Parliament si North West
Tlhomelang bụ onye otu African National Congress
Ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke asatọ na ndepụta ANC nke ndị omeiwu si North West maka ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke Mee 8, 2019
ANC meriri 6369% nke ngụkọta vootu na vootu mba na mpaghara ahụ, na-enye ya ohere itoolu n'ime oche mpaghara iri na atọ na National Assembly, ụlọ nke ala nke ndị omeiwu
A họpụtara Tlhomelang ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu nke mba ahụ ma ṅụọ iyi n'oge nnọkọ mbụ nke National Assembly mgbe ntuli aka ahụ gasịrị na 22 Mee 2019
A họpụtara Tlhomelang ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na Kọmitii Portfolio na Small Business Development maka Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke isii (20192024) na 27 June 2019
N'abalị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Julaị, a họpụtara ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na Kọmitii Na-eduzi nke nwere mmadụ ise nke Multi-Party Women's Caucus
Àtụ Current MPs of South Africa
Bridgitte Ellen Hartley (amụrụ na 14 Julaị 1983) bụ onye na-agba ọsọ na South Africa nke na-asọmpi kemgbe ngwụcha afọ 2000
O ritere ọla nchara na ihe omume K-1 1000 m na 2009 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships na Dartmouth
Afọ atọ ka e mesịrị, na 2012 Olympic Games na London, Bridgitte ritere ọla nchara ọzọ, n'oge a na K-1 (Kayak Singles ː Women) 500m
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2014, ọ mepụtara ụdị egwuregwu Olympic ya, na ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships na Moscow, ọ nwetara ihe nlereanya ọla nchara nke atọ na asọmpi mba ụwa
Hartley ghọrọ onye mbụ si South Africa na kọntinent Afrịka iji nweta ihe nrite na ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships
Hartley sonyekwara na asọmpi K-2 500 m na 2008 Summer Olympics na Beijing, mana e wepụrụ ya na ọkara ikpeazụ
Hartley sonyere na 2016 Summer Olympics na Rio de Janeiro
Na asọmpi K-1 200m nke ụmụ nwanyị, ọ gwụchara n'ọnọdụ nke iri na atọ
Na asọmpi K-1 500m nke ụmụ nwanyị, ọ gwụchara n'ọnọdụ nke iri na isii
A mụrụ Hartley na Sandton, mpaghara dịpụrụ adịpụ nke Johannesburg
Ezinụlọ ya kwagara Richards Bay n'oge ọ bụ nwata, ebe ọ malitere ịnya ụgbọ mmiri
Ọ gara Pretoria High School for Girls ebe ọ pụtara nke ọma n'egwuregwu
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Hartley gara Mahadum Pretoria
Bright Chimezie (onye amụrụ n'abali mbụ n'ọnwa iri n'afọ 1960) bụ otu n'ime ndị ọgụ egwu nke ala Naijiria
A bịara mara ụzọ egwu ya dị ka Zigima Sound

Bright Tetteh Ackwerh bụ onye Ghana na-ese ihe na-atọ ọchị nke na-eji ngalaba nke nka a ma ama, nka n'okporo ámá, eserese, na ihe atụ iji kwuo ma dekọọ nkwenye ya
O gosipụtala n'ọtụtụ ebe na Ghana na West Africa, na-ewu ụdị dika onye na-ese ihe n'oge a na Ghana na nkà nke mpaghara West African

A mụrụ ya na Accra, Ghana, Bright gara Accra Academy ma gụọ Visual Arts maka agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, tupu ọ gaa Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology (KNUST) iji mụọ maka nzere BFA na MFA n'ihe gbasara
Ọ malitere site n'igosi ihe osise ya site na mgbasa ozi ọha na eze ma na-ese ihe na mgbidi n'okporo ámá Accra
O gosipụtala n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi nka na Ghana na mba ofesi
Ụfọdụ ndị a gụnyere Art X Lagos Exhibition na Nigeria, ihe ngosi nke Blaxtarlines na Kumasi na Chale Wote Street Art Festival na Accra
N'afọ 2016, o ritere Kuenyehia Prize for Contemporary Ghanaian Art na ihe omume emere na Ringway Estates na Accra
Bright ejirila mgbasa ozi ọha na eze na-ekerịta ọrụ ya ma na-akpalite mmetụta dị ike gburugburu isiokwu ndị ọ na-enyocha na ihe osise ya na eserese ya
O sonyekwara na ihe ngosi otu na Accra, Paris, Johannesburg na Los Angeles
N'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2017, ọ pụtara na mbipụta Ọktoba nke CNN African Voices Ọ nọkwa na ndepụta Barclays L'Atelier Art Competition nke afọ 2017 nke ndị nka iri kachasị elu
Ụdị ya bụ mmegharị mkpa ọchị nke okwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na okpukpe Ghana n'ụzọ dị egwu nke na-akpalite mkparịta ụka, na-akpali arụmụka ma na-akpali nzaghachi
Ọ na-enweta nnukwu mkpali site n'aka Fela Kuti na ndị dike Afrịka ndị ọzọ dị ka isiokwu nke ọrụ ya na-egosi ụzọ na-enweghị mgbaghara n'ịgbasa ozi ya

O kwenyere na ọdịbendị egwu nwere ikike ụfọdụ iji metụta ma kpalie ndị mmadụ ma a na-eji okwu abụọ na okpukpu atọ eme ihe mgbe niile nke na-enye ebe ntinye n'ime ụfọdụ mkparịta ụka nke ihe osise ahụ na-emepụta
Brigitte Affidehome Tonon bụ onye nyocha Beninois, onye edemede bụbu onye na-agba bọọlụ basketball na onye isi nchịkwa nke otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwoke nke mba Benin
N'ịbụ onye zụrụ Benin na mpaghara 2017 FIBA Ntozu AfroBasket, Tonon ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ n'Afrika zụrụ otu egwuregwu basketball nke ụmụ nwoke
A mụrụ Tonon n'aka Pierre Coffi Tonon, onye na 2017 bụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Federation Beninoise de Basketball (FBBB)
O nwere PhD na Na-emega ahụ Physiology site na Mahadum Abomey-Calavi (UAC)

N'afọ 2017, a họpụtara Tonon ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa nke otu egwuregwu basketball nke ụmụ nwoke Benin n'afọ 2017 ma bụrụ onye na-elekọta otu ahụ n'oge 2017 FIBA Afrobasket ruru eru na Cotonou ebe ọ zụrụ ndị otu ahụ na mmeri 69-61 na Burkina Faso
Tonon na-arụ ọrụ na Benin Ụlọ ọrụ egwuregwu na Porto Novo dị ka onye nkuzi, onye nkuzi
Dị ka onye nwere PhD na Na-emega ahụ Physiology, Tonon bụ onye edemede bipụtara n'otu isiokwu ahụ
Hụkwa

Brigitte Omboudou (bụ onye amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na itoolu nke onwa Julaị afọ 1992) bụ onye Cameroon na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-agba dị ka onye ọnọ n'etiti nye Amazone FAP na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị Cameroon
Omboudou agbaala egwuregwu bọọlụ na mba ya nye ndị otu egwu bọọlụ bu Louves Minproff
Na mata na Cameroon, ọ pụtala na klọb Belarusian Premier League FC Minsk na klọbu Nigerian Women Premier League Delta Queens FC
Omboudou gbara bọọlụ nye Cameroon na ọkwa dị elu na 2015 African Games n'afọ 2020 CAF Women's Olympic Qualifying Tournament (agba nke anọ)
Brigitte Sossou Perenyi (amụrụ na Togo na 1990) bụ onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na Ghana

Ọ biri n'okpuru ọnọdụ nke ịgba ohu mgbe a tọọrọ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa ma ziga ya n'ebe nsọ Ghana ebe Trokosi, ma ọ bụ nwunye chi, bụ omume ụwa nke na-eziga ụmụ agbọghọ ịrụ ọrụ mmanye iji gbapụta mmehie nke ndị ikwu ha
Mgbe ọ dị naanị afọ asaa, a tọọrọ Brigitte ma kpọga ya n'ebe nsọ Ghana iji kwụọ ụgwọ maka mpụ ịkwa iko nke nwanne nna ya mere, dịka omenala Trojan si dị
Omume a adịgidewo ruo ihe karịrị afọ nari atọ ma mesịa bụrụ mpụ na Ghana na 1998, ọ bụ ezie na a gara n'ihu na ọ dịghị onye ụkọchukwu e kpere ikpe
Ruo taa, ụfọdụ obodo dị na Ghana, Benin, na Togo ka na-eme Trokosi
N'afọ Brigitte banyere n'ebe nsọ ahụ, mba ahụ nwere ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ agbọghọ pụkụ ise na
N'afọ 1997, mmemme US nke nkeji iri isii nke CBS gosipụtara ụwa ọnọdụ Brigitte biri na ya site na ihe ngosi a kpọrọ My Stolen Childhood
Site n'enyemaka nke NGO International Needs, Kenneth Perenyi kpebiri ịga Ghana iji weputa ya
O nwere ike ịweputa kuchie, ma zigara ya na United States, ebe ọ nọrọ afọ iri na atọ sochirinụ
N'ihe dị ka afọ iri abụọ mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya, Brigitte laghachiri Togo izute ezinụlọ ya
Brik (/briːk/ BREEK; بريك), ma ọ bụ n'ebe ugwu Afrịka nke borek, ihe a na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ihe a na'ime ya nke a na-esikarị ya esi
Ụdị a kacha bụ brik ákwà, àkwá dum n'ime akpa achịcha triangular nwere yabasị, tuna, harissa na parsley
N'inwe ọdịdị dịtụ iche, mana nwere otu ihe na usoro nkwado ya mara brik na mba Algeria na Libya dị ka bourek (بوراك)
Brik na-ewu ewu na Israel, n'ihi ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke ndị Juu Tunisia n'ebe ahụ
A na-ejikarị àkwá na ahịhịa ma ọ bụ tuna, harissa na oliv jupụta ya ma na-enye ya mgbe ụfọdụ na pita
A makwara nke a dị ka boreeka
A na-eme achịcha brik site na ịpị ụyọkọ ntụ ọka na-arapa n'ahụ n'elu ihe na-ekpo ọkụ na-enweghị mkpịsị aka na okirikiri na-ekpuchi iji mepụta nha achọrọ ma sie ya maka obere oge
A na-akpọ mpempe akwụkwọ ntụ ọka brik malsouka ma ọ bụ warka
Ihe ndị a na-ejikarị eme ihe gụnyere tuna, anụ a gwakọtara agwakọta, àkwá a na-esighị esi, ọkụkọ, ma ọ bụ anchovies e ji harissa, capers, ma ọ dị ka cheese chọọ mma
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-esiri ike ịchọta mmalite nri ahụ kpọmkwem, ọ malitere ma ọ dịkarịa ala afọ 500 gara aga
Na mgbakwunye na mmalite ya na-edoghị anya, a maghịkwa ya otu aha; gafee Middle East ọbụna ugbu a, a pụrụ ịkpọ nri a ma ama 'bric, börek, burek, warqa ma ọ bụ malsouka'

Ihe ndị a na-ahụkarị na brik ọ bụla - n'agbanyeghị otú a na-akpọ ya - gụnyere mkpo achịcha siri ike na protein (dị ka tuna ma ọ bụ àkwá) dị n'ime mkpuchi ahụ, dị ka ntụgharị asụsụ French a mara dị ka brik a l'oeuf

Iji kwadebe Brik Tunisian mara mma, mmadụ ga-agbakọta achịcha dị n'èzí n'ụdị triangle, tinye ihe ndị a gwakọtara agwakọta n'ime mkpuchi ahụ, wee kpoo ha ọkụ n'ime pan na-esi nri maka nkeji abụọ ruo atọ n'akụkụ nke ọ bụla
Brila FM bụ ụlọ ọrụ redio egwuregwu nke Larry Izamoje guzobere na Ọktoba 1, afọ 2002, dị ka ụlọ ọrụ redio mbụ na naanị egwuregwu na Naịjirịa
Brila FM nwere ụlọ ọrụ anọ, na Lagos, Abuja, Onitsha, na Port Harcourt; ọ na-agbasa ozi na Kaduna
N'oge 2014 FIFA World Cup, a họpụtara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị ka otu n'ime ndị mmekọ mgbasa ozi atọ site na Optima Sports Management International
Brila FM na-elekwasị anya na mmelite egwuregwu na nyocha
N'afọ 2012, ha bịanyere aka na mmekọrịta mgbasa ozi na talkSPORT iji gbasaa nkọwa egwuregwu Premier League ruo n'afọ 2014
Briouat ma ọ bụ briwat (Arabic) bụ achịcha na-atọ ụtọ ma ọ bụ na-atọ ezigbo ụtọ
Ọ bụ akụkụ nke nri nde Morocco
A na-eji anụ (karịsịa ọkụkọ ma ọ bụ nwa atụrụ) ma ọ bụ azụ na shrimp jupụta na Briouats, gwakọta ya na cheese, lemon na ose
A na-ekpuchi ha na warqa (akwụkwọ dị nro) n'ụdị triangular ma ọ bụ cylinder
Briouats nwekwara ike ịdị ụtọ, jupụta na almond ma ọ bụ ahụekere paste ma sie ya, wee tinye ya na mmanụ aṅụ na-ekpo ọkụ nke nwere mmiri oroma
A na-esi briouats esi ma ọ bụ sie ya ma mesịa jiri ahịhịa, ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ na mgbe ụfọdụ na shuga (powdered)
Brisote (nkè a na-akpọkwa brisole) bụ ifufe azụmahịa nkè ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ na Cuba mgbè ọ na-efegharị ike karịa ka ọ na-emebu
Ike nké ifufe a bụ 9 m s−1; ihe ọ bụla na-afụ na ọnụego siri ike nwéré ike ịkọwa dị ka brisote
A na-ejikọta brisote na oké ifufe na-ekpo ọkụ na-agafe n'ébé ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nkè agwaetiti ahụ
Brita GmbH bụ ụlọ ọrụ Germany nke naemepụta nzacha mmiri
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị na Taunusstein nso Wiesbaden na Hesse, Germany
Ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe dị na China, Germany, Switzerland, Italy, na United Kingdom
A naekesa ngwaahịa Brita na mba 69
Brita naemepụta ite mmiri (BPA-free, nke e ji styrene methyl methacrylate copolymer mee), kettles na tap attachments na integrated disposable filters
Enwere ike imegharị nzacha ahụ
Usoro nzacha ha bụ carbon na-arụ ọrụ na resin mgbanwe ion
A na-emepụta carbon naarụ ọrụ site na mkpokoro akị bekee
Dị ka Brita si kwuo, nzacha ahụ nwere mmetụta abụọ
Na United Kingdom, Hinari na Breville naere kettles eletrik naetinye teknụzụ Brita
Heinz Hankammer guzobere Brita na 1966
Aha mbụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ AquaDeMat tupu o mechara gụọ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ aha nwa ya nwanyị
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwetara ikike mbụ maka iji nzacha mmiri nụlọ na 1970s
Nafọ 1988, ụlọ ọrụ Clorox, nke dị na Oakland, California, banyere na nkwekọrịta ikikere na nkesa na ụlọ ọrụ Germany maka North na South America
Nafọ 1995, ọ gbakwunyere ikike ndị Canada site ninweta Brita International Holdings nke Canada
Nafọ 2000, Clorox nwetara naanị ikike nke akara ahụ na Amerịka ma Brita kwetara na nkwekọrịta naabụghị asọmpi ruo n'afọ 2005
Nafọ 2008, Brita laghachiri nahịa North America nokpuru akara Mavea, naanị ịpụ ọzọ na 2016
[isi iyi Otú ọ dị, a ka naere ngwaahịa na US nokpuru aha Brita
Àtụ Clorox
