British International School Lagos (BIS) bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ mba ụwa nke Britain na Oniru Private Estate na Victoria Island, Lagos, Nigeria
N'ịbụ nke meghere n'afọ 2001, ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na-enye usoro mmụta ndị Britain maka ụmụ akwụkwọ na-ebi ebi dị afọ 1118
Enwere ọtụtụ IGCSE na A Level maka ọmụmụ ihe
Ụmụ akwụkwọ ahụ gụnyere ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ nwoke sitere na ezinụlọ Naijiria na ndị mba ọzọ
Klas dị obere ma enwere usoro ihe omume zuru oke mgbe ụlọ akwụkwọ gachara kwa ụbọchị
Ogige ahụ buru ibu, na ụlọ nkuzi gbara ogige egwuregwu gburugburu, n'ime nke a nwere ike ịchọta ọdọ mmiri yana ụlọ ikpe tennis na basketball
Ndị ọrụ nkuzi gụnyere ma ndị nkuzi si mba ọzọ na ndị ruru eru n'ógbè ahụ
Onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ ugbu a bụ Kelvin Donnelly, onye sonyeere ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na afọ 2021 ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ na US, Malaysia, Cameroon na UK
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ natara akụkọ nyocha magburu onwe ya site na COBIS n'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 2018
E hiwere ya na afo 2001, ebumnuche ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ bụ ịmepụta ụmụ akwụkwọ ga-enye aka na 'echi ka ukwuu', na-akụnye ụmụ akwụkwọ ha nkwụsi ike, iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe na akọ na uche ọha na eze
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ no na-eto eto n'akụkọ ihe mere eme ya niile
N'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, agbakwunyere blọk nkuzi ọhụrụ na ụlọ egwuregwu
N'afọ 2018, e webatara ụlọ sayensị ndị ọzọ iji kwado uto nke Ụdị nke Isii na n'afọ 2019 ụlọ nke ngalaba isi malitere
E meela nnukwu itinye ego n'ụlọ obibi ụlọ akwụkwọ ise ahụ
BIS na-agbaso British National Curriculum
A gbanwere usoro mmụta a, ebe o kwesịrị, iji hụ na a haziri ya iji gboo mkpa nke ụlọ akwụkwọ mba ụwa dị na West Africa

A na-akụziri ụmụ akwụkwọ na-eto eto asụsụ Yoruba na ndị ọrụ na-ahụ maka ahụ na a na-enye ohere iji gbasaa ekele ụmụ akwụkwọ nwere maka akụkọ ihe mere eme, ọdịbendị, ala na akụ na ụba nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ dị
Ogige ahụ gụnyere ụlọ nzukọ nwere ọtụtụ ebumnuche; ọdọ mmiri; ụlọ ihe nkiri; na ụlọ maka kọmputa, egwu, na nkuzi
Encomium Weekly kọwara ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ dị ka 'nke kachasị ọhụrụ na Lagos'
N'ime afọ ndị na-adịghi anya, a na-agbakwu mbọ ka ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ mee ka ụmụ akwụkwọ nwere obere njem sonye n'ụzọ zuru ezu na ndụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
N'ihi oke ogige egwuregwu ya, a na-ejikarị ala ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ eme ihe iji kwado ihe omume egwuregwu n'etiti ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ nwere akụkọ ihe mere eme nke nsonaazụ ule magburu onwe ya
N'afọ 2019, ụmụ akwụkwọ nwetara ọnụọgụ 93% na IGCSE na ọnụọgụgụ 93% n'ọkwa A
Ọtụtụ ụmụ akwụkwọ na-aga n'ihu na Sixth Forms na UK, USA na Canada na BIS Sixth Formers na-enweta ọnọdụ na mahadum ndị a họọrọ nke ukwuu na Canada na UK
Kwa afọ ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na-enye iko 'Dux Litterarum' na onye ọkà mmụta kacha nwee onyinye agụmakwụkwọ
Ụmụ akwụkwọ na BIS nwere ihe ndekọ nke ihe ịga nke ọma n'egwuregwu
N'afọ ndị na-adịghị anya, ha abụwo ndị mmeri mpaghara na ndị mmeri rugby n'ọtụtụ afọ na okike
Davido - onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ
Brittle Paper bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ederede dị n'ịntanetị nke ahaziri dị ka 'blọgụ agụmagụ Africa' nke a na-ebipụta kwa izu n'asụsụ Bekee

Ihe lekwasịrị anya ya bụ na 'wulite' ihe nkiri agụmagụ Africa dị egwu' Ọ tọrọ ntọala site Ainehi Edoro Kemgbe ntọala ya na 2010, Brittle Paper ebipụtala akụkọ ifo, uri, edemede, akụkọ ifo na foto sitere na ndị odee na ndị na-ese ihe n'Africa na-abịa na kọntinent na gburugburu ụwa

Otu onye otu The Guardian Books Network, akọwara ya dị ka 'obere obodo nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Africa', dị ka 'akwụkwọ akụkọ edemede nke Africa', yana dịka 'otu n'ime ndị Africa kachasị na bọọlụ na-ekwu maka ya
akwụkwọ edemede'
Na 2014, a na-akpọ blọgụ ahụ Go-To Book Blog site na ndị na- ebipụta kwa izu, bụ ndị na-akọwa ya dị ka 'isi iyi dị mkpa nke akụkọ banyere ọrụ ọhụrụ nke ndị edemede nke agba na-abụghị United States'
Akwụkwọ Brittle na- ebipụta ọdịnaya izizi nke ndị odee nyefere, yana nyocha enyere, ajụjụ ọnụ, edemede na ọrụ agụmagụ ndị ọzọ

N'ịbụ onye tolitere ghọọ 'obodo na-eme nke ọma nke ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ na ndị odee nwere mmasị n'ihe niile gbasara akwụkwọ Africa', na-ewere blọgụ ahụ dị ka nnukwu ikpo okwu mgbasa ozi maka akwụkwọ ọhụrụ nke ndị edemede Afrka
Brittney Grimes bụ onye na-ede abụ, onye odee ama ama, onye edemedi, ihe nlereanya na ọkà okwu na-akpali
Akwụkwọ mbụ ya, Poetry For A Child By A Child, sochiri The Poetry for A Child By a Child Workbook, Ice Cream Dreams, na The True Glory of the Christmas Story
Ọ ekwuola okwu na CNN Person of the Day, ABC 7, NBC, Good Morning America, UPN na Nickelodeon Nick News
Ọrụ ya dị na magazin Ebony, The New York Times, magazin Scholastic, Newsday na akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ
Ọ na-eme ihe ngosi maka ihe nkiri na mbipụta azụmahịa, gụnyere JBS Hair Ad, na Vibe Vixen of the Day

Dị ka onye edemede, Brittney enwetala ọtụtụ ihe nrite, gụnyere National Organization for Women (NOW) 'Young Achiever's Award', National Council of Negro Women (NCNW) Award for Achievement, Zora Neale Hurston Literary Award nke Zeta Phi Beta nyere, na Dr
Martin Luther King, Jr
Humanitarian Award
N'afọ 2005, e debere aha Brittney na Wall of Tolerance na Montgomery, Alabama, iji sọpụrụ Rosa Parks 'National Campaign for Tolerance
N'afọ 2007, e nyere ya onyinye ọrụ afọ ofufo nke onye isi ala site na Kansụl Onye isi ala na Ọrụ na Ntinye aka obodo
Ọ natara ihe nrite ọlaọcha na akwụkwọ ozi sitere n'aka Onye isi ala George Bush
N'afọ 1998, Brittney kwughachiri uri ya 'Children of the World' na It's Showtime na Apollo Theater na Harlem NY, na Amateur Night, wee bịa n'ọnọdụ mbụ
N'afọ 2002, o kwuru okwu na McDonald's Gospelfest, emume egwu na nkà gospel kwa afọ
Ọ kwughachiri uri o dere ma merie n'ọnọdụ mbụ na asọmpi mbụ nke Gospel Poetry Category
N'afọ 2015, Brittney bụ onye natara ihe ncheta aka site na Wells Fargo Bank 'Untold Stories Collection' maka uri ya
N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2006, e gosipụtara Brittney na magazin Ebony n'otu isiokwu akpọrọ 'Terrific Teens'
N'afọ 2007, ọ bụ onye mmeri Grand Prize nke magazin Seventeen na asọmpi mba Avon Makeup 'Avon Make your Mark', nke na-asọpụrụ nwa agbọghọ na-eme akara ya site na ọrụ afọ ofufo na obodo ya
E gosipụtara ya na mbipụta October 2013 nke Long Island Woman Akwụkwọ ya ọzọ na-apụta n'oge opupu ihe ubi 2014
Ọ bụkwa onye edemede maka blọọgụ Huffington Post
Broad Street na Lagos Island, Lagos, Nigeria, bụ ebe azụmahịa dị n'otu n'ime mpaghara azụmahịa etiti obodo ahụ
N'etiti ndị bi na ya ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ Bagatelle, Christ Church Cathedral Primary School, Eko Boys High School, Newswatch (Nigeria), na St
Mary's Private School
E wuru ụlọ 'Secretariat' na afọ 1906
na telekomunikasonu, brọdband bụ nnyefe data obosara-bandwidth nke na-ebufe ọtụtụ akara n'ọtụtụ ugboro na njikọ ịntanetị
The ọkara nwere ike ịbụ coaxial cable, optical fiber, wireless internet (redio) gbagọrọ agbagọ ụzọ, ma ọ bụ satịlaịtị

N'ihe gbasara ohere Ịntanetị, a na-eji bandwidth eme ihe iji gosipụta ịnweta Intanet ọ bụla dị elu nke na-amalite mgbe niile ma ngwa karịa nnweta iraye si ipe lori afọwọṣe ibile tabi awọn iṣẹ ISDN PSTN

Ezigbo netwọk nkwukọrịta nwere njirimara ndị a bandwidth, multi-media, multippoint, multiple-rate na mmejuputa akụ na ụba maka ọrụ dịgasị iche iche (ọtụtụ ọrụ)t awọn àsopọmọBurọọdubandi ese awọn iṣẹ oni nẹtiwọki (B-ISDN) iji nye njirimara ndị a
A kwalitere Asynchronous Transfer Mode (ATM) dị ka teknụzụ a chọrọ maka izute ihe ndị a
A na-etinye ụkpụrụ dị iche iche maka 'obosara' n'ọnọdụ dịgasị iche na n'oge dị dịtụ iche

Mmalite ya dị na physics, acoustics, na injinia usoro redio, ebe ejirila ya mee ihe n'echiche yiri 'obosara', ma ọ bụ n'ihe gbasara usoro mbelata mkpọtụ, mgbe ọ gosipụtara otu band karịa usoro usoro ọtụtụ-audio-band nke compander
Ka e mesịrị, site na ọbịbịa nke nkwukọrịta dijitalụ, a na-ejikarị okwu ahụ eme ihe maka nnyefe n'ọtụtụ ọwa

Ọ bụ ezie na a na-agbanwe mgbaàmà passband ka o wee nwee ike ịnọ n'otu ọwa (ma e jiri ya tụnyere mgbapụta baseband nke ejikọtara ya na njedebe kachasị ala nke spectrum, lee koodu akara), ọ ka na'ime otu ọwara

Isi ihe dị iche bụ na ihe a na-ewere dị ka mgbaàmà bandwidth n'echiche a bụ mgbapụta nke na'ime ọtụtụ (na-abụghị masking, orthogonal) passbands, si otú a nye ohere maka nnyefe dị elu karịa otu onye na - ma nwee mgbagwoju anya ọzọ na transmitter / receiver circuit
Okwu a ghọrọ ihe a ma ama site na 1990s dị ka okwu ahịa maka ịnweta Ịntanetị nke dị ngwa karịa ịnweta dial-up (akpọ oku na-ejikarị 56 kbit / s)
Nkọwa a nwere njikọ dị anya na nkọwa mbụ ya

Kemgbe afọ 1999, Wiwọle intanẹẹti Broadband ti jẹ ifosiwewe ninu eto imulo gbogbo eniyanN'afọ ahụ, na Nzukọ Nzọụkwụ Mba Nile nke a na-akpọ Ngwọta Ego maka Nchịkọta Digital na Seattle, e webatara okwu ahụ bụ Broadbandwidth maka ndị isi ụwa, nke dugara n'ịrụ ọrụ nke mmegharị iji mechie nkewa dijitalụ
Akụkụ ndị bụ isi nke mmegharị a bụ ịtụ aro na nkesa ziri ezi nke broadband bụ ikike mmadụ bụ ihe dị mkpa
Kọmputa onwe onye mere ka ọ dị mfe ịnweta, njikwa, nchekwa, na mgbanwe nke ozi, ma chọọ nnyefe data a pụrụ ịdabere na ya
Ikwurịta okwu akwụkwọ site na ihe oyiyi na ojiji nke ọdụ ụgbọ elu dị elu nyere usoro mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya karịa iji olu na data naanị
Mkparịta ụka vidiyo na-eme ka mmekọrịta otu dịkwuo anya
Vidio ntụrụndụ dị elu na-eme ka ogo foto dị mma, mana ọ chọrọ ọnụego nnyefe dị ukwuu
Ihe ọhụrụ a na-achọ maka nnyefe data nwere ike ịchọ ụzọ ọhụrụ maka mgbasa ozi ọzọ karịa ụdị redio jupụtara ugbu a
Netwọk nkwukọrịta nke oge a (dị ka netwọk netwọk bandwidth) ga-enye onye ọrụ ọrụ ahụ ọrụ dị iche iche (ọtụtụ ọrụ)
A na-eji nkwurịta okwu ekwentị eme ihe
Ọrụ nke oge a nwere ike ịbụ
A na-enyocha akụkụ ndị a n'otu n'otu na ngalaba atọ na'okpuru
Ọkpụkpọ mgbasa ozi nwere ike ịgwa ọdịyo, data, ihe oyiyi, ma ọ bụ vidiyo zuru oke, ọ bụkwa njikọta ọ bụla nke mgbasa akụkọ ndị a
Onye ọ bụla nwere ihe dị iche iche achọrọ maka ogo nkwurịta okwu, dị ka
Ihe ọmụma nke mgbasa ozi ọ bụla nwere ike imetụta ozi sitere na mgbasa akụkọ ndị ọzọ
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, enwere ike ịdepụta olu n'ime data site na njirimara olu, na iwu data nwere ike ịchịkwa ụzọ a na-egosi olu na vidiyo
Mmekọrịta ndị a na-emekarị na ọdụ nkwurịta okwu, mana ọ pụkwara ime n'ime netwọk
Ọkpụkpọ olu ọdịnala bụ ọkpịsị aka abụọ, na-achọ njikọ isi na isi site na iji naanị olu
Iji nweta ozi pictorial na nchekwa data dịpụrụ adịpụ ga-achọ njikọ isi na isi nke na-eziga ajụjụ dị ala na data data na vidiyo dị elu site na database
Ngwa vidiyo ntụrụndụ bụ njikọ isi na ọtụtụ isi, na-achọ nkwurịta okwu otu ụzọ nke vidiyo zuru ezu na ọdịyo site na isi iyi mmemme gaa na ndị na'ekiri
Mkparịta ụka vidiyo na-agụnye njikọ n'etiti ọtụtụ ndị otu, na nkwukọrịta olu, vidiyo, yana data
Inye ọrụ n'ọdịnihu chọrọ njikwa mgbanwe nke njikọ na arịrịọ mgbasa ozi nke ọtụtụ isi, ọtụtụ mgbasa akụkọ nkwukọrịta
Ụdị okporo ụzọ ndị a hụrụ na netwọk netwọk bandwidth sara mbara (nke nwere ihe atụ) na ihe ha chọrọ na-agbakọta na Tebụl 1
A na-ejikwa eriri ike maka ụdị nkwurịta okwu data dị iche iche
Ọ bụ ezie na usoro ụfọdụ maka njikwa dịpụrụ adịpụ dabere na mgbaàmà band dị warara, usoro ọsọ ọsọ nke oge a na-eji mgbapụta band sara mbara iji nweta ọnụego data dị elu

Otu ihe atụ bụ ọkọlọtọ ITU-T Ghn, nke na-enye ụzọ iji mepụta netwọk mpaghara ruo 1 Gigabit / s (nke a na na'ewere dị ka ọsọ dị elu ka nke 2014) site na iji azụmaahịa ụlọ na wiring ụlọ dị ugbu a (gụnyere eriri ike, kamakwa eriri ekwentị na eriri coaxial)
N'afọ 2014, ndị na-eme nchọpụta na Ile-ẹkọ giga ti Korea ti ilọsiwaju ti imọ-ẹrọ ati imọ-ẹrọ mere ọganihu n'ịmepụta ngwá ọrụ anya na'ebe dị omimi
N'ihe gbasara ohere ịntanetị, a na-eji okwu ahụ bụ 'broadband' eme ihe n'ụzọ na'enweghị isi iji pụta 'inweta nke na - na ngwa ngwa karịa ohere dial-up ọdịnala'
E nyela nkọwa dị iche iche nke ọsọ n'oge ụfọdụ, gụnyere
A na-emeso ma ọ bụ na'elekọta ọrụ ịntanetị Broadband na United States dị ka ihe enyemaka ọha na eze site na iwu nnọpụiche net ruo mgbe FCC kwụsịrị ya na Disemba 2017
Ọtụtụ ndị na-achịkwa mba na mba ụwa na'etiti njikọ netwọk dị iche iche dabere na ọsọ na nbudata, kwuru na Mbit / s (megabits kwa sekọnd)
Na Australia, Australian Competition & Consumer Commission chọkwara ka ndị na-enye ọrụ ịntanetị kwuo ọsọ n'oge abalị na oge ọrụ
N'akụkọ ihe mere eme, a na-ekesa bandwidth n'ụzọ na'ahaghị nhata n'ụwa niile, na ntinye aka na oge dijitalụ
N'akụkọ ihe mere eme, ọ bụ naanị mba iri kwadoro 7075% nke ikike nkwukọrịta zuru ụwa ọnụ (lee ihe osise dị n'aka nri)
N'afọ 2014, ọ bụ naanị mba atọ (China, US, Japan) na-anabata 50% nke ikike bandwidth nke nkwukọrịta zuru ụwa ọnụ
tụfuru idu ndú ya zuru ụwa ọnụ n'ihe gbasara bandwidth arụnyere na 2011, China nọchiri ya, nke na-akwado ihe karịrị okpukpu abụọ karịa bandbroad nke mba na 2014 (29% megide 13% nke ngụkọta ụwa)
Mba kpọmkwem
Broccoflower na-arutu aka na nke ọ bụla n'ime osisi abụọ a na-eri eri nke ụdị Brassica oleracea nwere isi akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ
Akụkụ a na-eri eri bụ isi okooko osisi na-eto eto (inflorescence) nke osisi ahụ
Broccoli na cauliflower bụ ụdị dị iche iche nke otu ụdị ahụ, n'ihi ya, ha na-agbakọta kpamkpam site na mmịpụta aka ma ọ bụ mmịpụta okike
E nwere ụdị abụọ nke Brassica oleracea nke a nwere ike ịkpọ broccoflower, nke a na-ewere dị ka ụdị cauliflower (Brassica oleraceae var
botrytis) n'ihi na ha nwere meristems na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ karịa okooko osisi mgbe a na-ewe ha n'ụbị
Otu na-adị ka cauliflower nkịtị, nke ọzọ nwere ụyọkọ okooko osisi na-apụta apụ, nke na-agba gburugburu
Ha na-ekerịta ụcha curd nke yiri nke broccoli
Ụdị mbụ nke broccoflower nwere ahụ nke cauliflower na-acha ọcha, mana ụcha curd bụ lime-green
E nwere ọtụtụ ụdị cauliflower na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ n'ahịa, na ntọhapụ mbụ bụ 'Green Ball' na nne na nna nke ma broccoli na caulifloor
Ụlọ ọrụ California Tanimura & Antle gosipụtara okwu 'Broccoflower' maka cauliflower na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ nke ha na-ere
Ụdị nke abụọ bụ Romanesco broccoli, nke a na-eji ihe dị ịrịba ama na nke a na-adịghị ahụkebe nke isi okooko ya mara
Ọ nwere ụcha odo ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ
Samuel Animashaun Perry (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1993), nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Broda Shaggi, bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe ọchị, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-ede egwu na onye egwu
Ọ bụ nwa afọ Ishagamu na Ogun Steeti mana a mụrụ ya na Ikene na Ogun steeti
Mgbe ọ dị obere, o nwere mmasị n'ime ihe nkiri dị ka nna ya nwụrụ anwụ bụ onye nkuzi ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onye ama ama maka egwuregwu ikwaemo ya nke o kesara na Instagram mana ọ bịara na ihe nkiri parody ya 'Jesu in Mushin'
Broda Shaggi bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Creative Arts na Mahadum nke Lagos, nna ya nwụrụ anwụ bụ onye nkuzi Drama na Junior School, Ikenne, Ogun steeti
Ọ malitere ime ihe ọchị ọtụtụ afọ gara aga mgbe ọ nọ na mahadum
O mere ọtụtụ ihe odide tupu o mesịa dozie aha Broda Shaggi
A hụla Broda Shaggi na azụmahịa ahụ maka ihe ọchị ya na àgwà pụrụ iche
O nwere ihe nrite dị iche iche, dịka ọmụmaatụ, The Future Awards Africa Nigeria Prize for Comedy na City People Music Award for Comedy Act of the Year
Bromoureides bụ ọgwụ sedative-hypnotics dị na Europe, gụnyere acecarbromal, bromisoval, na carbromal na ụdị nke dị ka (Horowitz, 1997)
Ha bụ obere ezinụlọ nke ureides (acylureas)
Bronwyn Katz (a mụrụ n'afọ 1993) bụ onye South Africa na-akpụ ihe mà bụrụ kwá onye na-ese ihe
Ọ bụ onye guzobere iQhiya Collective, netwọk nke ụmụ nwanyị ojii na-eto eto na-ese ihe na Cape Town na Johannesburg, South Africa
A mụrụ Katz na 1993 na Kimberley, South Africa
Ọ gara Mahadum nke Cape Town, South Africa ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 2015 na BFA
E nyere ya Simon Gerson Prize na Mahadum nke Cape Town
Ọrụ Katz gụnyere ihe ọkpụkpụ, ntinye, vidiyo na arụmọrụ
N'iji echiche nke ala dị ka ebe nchekwa nke ebe nchekwa, ọrụ ya na-egosipụta echiche nke ebe ma ọ bụ ohere dị ka ahụmịhe dị ndụ na ya mere ikike nke ala icheta ma kwurịta ncheta nke ọrụ ya
N'afọ 2016, e mere ihe ngosi ya nke akpọrọ Groenpunt na Blank Projects na mbà bCape Town
Katz emeela ihe ngosi ise naanị ya ma sonyekwa na ọtụtụ ihe ngosi otu gụnyere;
Katz bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Johannesburg
Brooke Kazuko Elby (amụrụ na Mee 24, 1993) bụ onye America bụbu onye na-agba bọọlụ n'etiti / onye na-echebe bụ onye ikpeazụ gbara bọọlụ maka Chicago Red Stars na National Women's Soccer League (NWSL)
Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke abụọ nke NWSL Players Association
Ọ gbara bọọlụ na Boston Breakers na Melbourne Victory nke Australian W-League
Elby bụ onye otu Boston Breakers mgbe ha kwụsịrị na Jenụwarị, 2018
Ọ bụ Utah Royals FC họpụtara ya na Boston Breakers Dispersal Draft Na June 18, 2018, e rere Elby na Chicago Red Stars
Na Disemba 16, 2019, Elby kwupụtara ezumike nká ya na bọọlụ ọkachamara
N'afọ 2019, a họpụtara Elby dịka onye isi oche nke National Women's Soccer League Players Association (NWSLPA), na-anọchi Yael Averbuch
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na bọọlụ ọkachamara, Elby weere ọrụ onye isi nchịkwa na NWSLPA
N'ọnwa Eprel 2021, Meghann Burke nọchiri Elby dị ka onye isi nchịkwa NWSLPA

Kevin Danell Mann (amụrụ na Jenụwarị 10, 1970), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Brotha Lynch Hung, bụ ónyé America na-eti egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ si Sacramento, California ónyé a kọwara dị ka 'ónyé okike nke egwu egwu rap'
Ọ bụkwa onye bụbu onye otu 24th Street Garden Blocc Crip nke bụ otu ndị otu Crip nke dị na Meadowview, Sacramento
Mann tolitere na Sacramento
Ọ ghọrọ ónyé na-akwado ndị na-eti egwu n'ụsọ oké osimiri dị ka Rakim na Slick Rick
Ọ malitere ịgba egwu rap Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na atọ
Ọ ghọrọ onye otu 24 Street Garden Blocc Crips mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii n'afọ ndị 1980
A gbagburu ya n'otu ógè n'akụkụ mgbè ọ nwara imebi esemokwu dị n'etiti Crip na Blood na oriri n'ụlọ; ewepụghị mgbọ ahụ
A na-ekwu na Garden Blocc Crips nwere akụkụ atọ 21st Street, 24th Street na 29th Street

A na-ekwu na ha na ndị Meadowview Bloods nwèrè esemokwu n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke o doro anya na ọ rịrị elu na mbido afọ 1990 nke kpatara ọtụtụ igbu ọchụ na na 1992, afọ 31 nke mkpọrọ màkà ónyé na-eti egwu Meadowview, onye otu 24th Street na enyi Mann; X-Raided

Ọ bụ ezie na a na-ekwukarị na ọ bụ onye isi ọsụ ụzọ na ọbụna ónyé isi okike nke ụdị egwu egwu rap, Mann n'onwe ya ekwuola na ụdị ya abụghị nke a na-ahụkarị ma kama ọ dabara kpọmkwem n'okpuru ụdị ya pụrụ iche ma ọ bụ obéré ụdị nke rap a na-akpọ īRipgutī nke na-emesi ike (na-emekarị ihe ngosi) ime ihe ike

A na-akọ na ụdị Ripgut n'onwe ya sitere n'ịhụnanya ya màkà anụ mana a na-ewere ụdị abụ a mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka nke jikọtara ya na ma ọ bụ jikọtara ya n'echiche na mmetụta ndị a na-ahụkarị mgbè ụfọdụ n'oge uche na / ma ọ bụ ime ihe ike nke o ji ọgwụ ụfọdụ iwu na-akwadoghị dịka phencyclidine (PCP) mee
Broughtonia bụ ụdị orchid (ezinụlọ Orchidaceae) nke sitere na Bahamas na Greater Antilles
A na-eme ka ụdị ahụ dị mkpirikpi Bro na akwụkwọ akụkọ azụmahịa
Dị ka e guzobere ugbu a (May 2014), Broughtonia nwere ụdị okike isii a nabatara tinyere otu ụdị a ma ama
Ọnụ ọgụgụ haploid chromosome nke otu ụdị, B
sanguinea, ekpebiela dị ka n = 20
Callicebus brunneus Wagner, 1842
Plecturocebus nọ n'ime obere ezinụlọ nke titi a na-akpọ Callicebinae
Ụdị ndị ọzọ gụnyere n'ime obere ezinụlọ a bụ Cheracebus, Callicebus, na Plecturocebus; nke niile ka dị ugbu a
Xenothrix, Antillothrix, Paralouatta, Carlocebus, Lagonimico, na Tremacebus nke Callicebinae ano zi hien
Mgbalị nchekwa ugbu a iji chebe ụdị a na-adịghị ike gụnyere agụmakwụkwọ na nchedo ebe obibi
Mgbalị agụmakwụkwọ nwere ụdị gụnyere na iwu mba ụwa ma ha na-adabere na njikwa ahia na njikwa mba ụwa
Maka nchedo ebe obibi ha, enwere ebe nchekwa na-arụsi ọrụ ike ma enwere ndị mmadụ n'ime ebe nchekwa
Brown Ifeanyi 'Browny' Igboegwu (amụrụ na 30 August 1976 na Ozubulu, Anambra Steeti ) bụ onye Igbo-Nigerian na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọrụ ya na 'Nollywood' malitere n'afọ 2005
Igboegwu gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na All Hallow Seminary skull Onitsha
Ọ gara n'ihu gụsịa akwụkwọ na Mahadum Naịjirịa, Nsukka na nzere na nchịkwa ọha na eze na mmekọrịta mba ụwa
N'afọ 2005, ọ gara leta enyi ya, onye nduzi Oke Ozubeluoko, na setịpụrụ ihe nkiri, wee chọpụta na otu onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-eme ọtụtụ njehie
Igboegwu kwuru na ọ 'nwere ike ime nke ọma ọbụna mgbe [ya] enweghị ahụmịhe dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri'; Ozubeluoko nyere ya ọrụ ahụ, ma nwee mmasị na nkà ya maka ime ihe nkiri
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2015, Igboegwu apụtala na ihe nkiri iri asatọ, site na ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Expensive Error na Hanks Anuku, ebe ọ na-eme ka onye òtù nzuzo
A maara Igboegwu nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri 2005 Marry Me, ya na Nonso Diobi na Oge Okoye, n'etiti ndị ọzọ

A kpọrọ Igboegwu onye isi oche nke iri na abụọ nke Anambra steeti nke Actors Guild nke Nigeria na ngwụcha Febụwarị 2015, na 9 Machị, e mere ya onye isi odeakwụkwọ mba, Conference of Chairmen, Actors Guill nke Nigeria
Na mbido afọ 2014, Igboegwu lụrụ nwunye ya Becky

Ọ natala ọtụtụ onyinye n'ime na n'èzí mba ahụ site na alma mata ya gaa n'òtù dị iche iche ma obere ma buru ibu, n'ime ma n'èstre ihe nkiri iji mee emume ihe ọ rụzuru na ọganihu ya maka ọganihu nke ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Nollywood na Naịjirịa

Igboegwu bụ onye isi nke ndị nlekọta maka Brownbourg Foundation nke ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi ya Brownbourg Koncept, ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya gụnyere ileta ogige ụmụ mgbei dị iche iche ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ kwa ọnwa na ịnye ihe enyemaka
Bruce Arnott (Ụbọchị iri na ise n'onwa Septemba afọ 1938 rụọ úbọchị irí na itoolu n'ọnwa Julaị, n'afọ 2018) bụ onye South Africa na-akpụ ihe, onye nlekọta, onye nkuzi na agụmakwụkwọ
Ọ bụ prọfesọ nke Fine Arts na Mahadum nke Cape Town's Michaelis School of Fine Art
A mụrụ Arnott n'ubochí irí na isé n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1938 na KwaZulu-Natal Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Cape Town, ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke sochiri nzere masta na Fine Arts
Arnott bụ onye na-akpụ ihe na mbà South Africa, na-emekarị ihe ọkpụkpụ ọla nchara
O jikwa 'lead, resin, fibreglass, stone and wood'

A na-anọchite anya ihe ọkpụkpụ Arnott na nchịkọta ụlọ ọrụ na South Africa na n'ụlọ ngosi nka ọha na eze na mba ahụ, tinyere Iziko South African National Gallery (Cape Town), Johannesburg Art Gallery, Durban Art Gallery, Pretoria Art Museum, Tatham na Pietermaritzburg na nchịkọta nke NAPAC (Durban) na PACOFS (Bloemfontein)

A ga-ahụkwa ọrụ ya na ogige nke Mahadum nke Cape Town, Mahadum nke Western Cape, na Mahadum nke Witswatersrand, yana nchịkọta nke afọ 1820 Foundation (Grahamstown), Rembrandt (Stuyvesant) Foundation (Stellenbosch), Oppenheimer Foundation (Brenthurst Library, Johannesburg)

Arnott rụrụ ọrụ na Iziko South African National Gallery na Cape Town, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ọkachamara mbụ nke ụlọ ihe ngosi nka tupu ma jee ozi dị ka osote onye nduzi ya site n'afọ 1970 ruo afọ1972
Ọ bụ prọfesọ nke Fine Arts na Mahadum nke Cape Town's Michaelis School of Fine Art site n'afọ 1978 ruo afọ 2003, ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi ya n'otu oge
Arnott lụrụ Mari Lecanides-Arnott, onye ya na ya nwere nwa nwoke
O nwere nwa nwoke na nwa nwanyị site n'alụmdi na nwunye ya nké gara aga
Arnott nwụrụ na Julaị 19, 2018
Bruce Gilley (July 21, 1966) bụ Prọfesọ Sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum Portland State

Gilley nwetara otuto mba ofesi mana ọ bụkwa oke nkatọ maka ndị ọgbọ ya na- arụrịta ụka - enyochala akụkọ 'The Case for Colonialism', nke e bipụtara na mbipụta ịntanetị nke akwụkwọ akụkọ sayensị 'The Third World Quarterly' na 2017
Mmadụ iri na ise so na bọọdụ magazin ahụ gbara arụkwaghịm n'ihi akụkọ Gilley
Gilley nwetara Bachelor of Arts na akụnụba na mmekọrịta mba ụwa na Mahadum Toronto na 1988
Site na 1989 ruo 1991 ọ bụ Ọkammụta Commonwealth na Mahadum Oxford, ebe e nyere ya nzere Master of philosophy in Economics na 1991
Site na 1992 ruo 2002, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ na Hong Kong wee dee akwụkwọ akụkọ 'Eastern Express' wee dee akwụkwọ akụkọ 'Far Eastern Economic Review'
ebe O kpughere nnyefe teknụzụ na-akwadoghị nke onye prọfesọ Stanford nyere ndị agha China
Gilley bụ onye ọkà mmụta Woodrow Wilson na Mahadum Princeton site na 2004 ruo 2006, nke ọ nwetara PhD na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na 2007
Dị ka Gilley si kwuo, colonialism bụ ma uru nke ọma (uru ya karịrị ọghọm ya) na n'ụzọ ziri ezi (nke nnukwu akụkụ nke ndị obodo nabatara ya)
N'ihi ya, onye edemede ahụ na-akpọ maka mweghachi nke colonialism
Edemede ahụ bụ arụmụka ma maka arụmụka ya na maka mgbagha ya na-esote, wee rụpụta arụmụka gbasara ụkpụrụ agụmakwụkwọ na 'nyocha ndị ọgbọ '
Ndị otu iri na ise so na bọọdụ Academic Journal hapụrụ arụkwaghịm maka okwu a
E mechara wepụrụ akụkọ ahụ site na nkwenye Gilley wee bipụtaghachi ya n'April 2018 n'ime akwụkwọ akụkọ na-agbanwe agbanwe Academic Questions of the National Association of Scholars

Mgbe a jụrụ ya ma ọ bụrụ na ọ ga-abụ ụkpụrụ ọma ibipụta otu isiokwu na-akwado mgbukpọ, Gilley kwuru, sị ' Echere m na onye ọ bụla ga-ekwenye, 'mgbukpọ' bụ njehie omume ', ma na o kweghị na colonialism bụ njehie omume
N'oge opupu ihe ubi nke 2022, Gilley zara ọtụtụ n'ime ndị nkatọ ya na edemede nke abụọ akpọrọ 'Ihe gbasara Colonialism Azaghachi nye Ndị nkatọ M'
Jonathan Bruce Hemphill (amụrụ June 1963) bụ onye ọchụnta ego South Africa
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Old Mutual, otu mba ụwa na-echekwa ogologo oge na ụlọ ọrụ FTSE 100, kemgbe 1 November 2015, na-anọchi Julian Roberts

Bruce Hemphill Amụrụ Jonathan Bruce Hemphill Ọnwa Isii 1963 Obodo South Africa Ọrụ Onye ọchụnta ego Aha Onye isi ala Old Mutual plc Oge 2015 - dị ugbu a Onye bu ụzọ Julian Roberts Onye nọchiri anya Onye nọ n'ọchịchị Jonathan Bruce Hemphill mụrụ na June 1963[] Hemphill bụ onye isi oche nke Liberty Holdings Limited, wee bụrụ onye isi akụ, mkpuchi na ọrụ ego na-abụghị ụlọ akụ na Standard Bank Group[]

Bruce McNeil (Amụrụ n'ọnwa Febụwarị 13, afọ 1939 na New York City - rụọ ọnwa Mee 16, afọ 2019 na Washington, DC) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto nke ọma na gburugburu ebe obibi nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ foto nke edekọla ụzọ mmiri Washington, DC
Kemgbe ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ, foto gburugburu ebe obibi ya lekwasịrị anya karịsịa n'idepụta Osimiri Anacostia
The Washington Examiner na The Washington Post akpọwo ya Osimiri Man na Osimiri Washington Man

Ọ bụ onye nhazi nke Anacostia River School of Photography, 'otu ìgwè ragtag nke ndị na-ese foto ọkara iri na abụọ bi ma ọ bụ na-arụ ọrụ na agbata obi ma na-etinye onwe ha n'ịgba egwu osimiri na gburugburu ya

Mc Neil bụbu onye na-ese foto, onye na-eme ka ọkụ na ụlọ gbara ọchịchịrị, na onye na-emepụta ihe ndị a na-etinye na McCord Museum na William Notman Photographic Archives, na onye enyemaka nke onye na-ede ihe na onye na'ese foto maka MacDonald Steward Foundation
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Smithsonian Anacostia Community Museum, Sandy Spring Museum, Reginald F
Lewis Museum of Maryland African-American History & Culture, George Washington University Museum, Parish Gallery, Hill Center Galleries na Old Naval Hospital, na Anacostian Art Center
McNeil bụ onye natara East of the River Distinguished Artist Award n'afọ 2016, ọrụ ya dịkwa na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke obodo Washington, DC
N'ịtụle foto McNeil na Honfleur Gallery nke obodo ahụ n'afọ 2012, onye edemede Washington Post kwuru na 'ọrụ McNeil·s na-elekwasị anya na uto nke agbata obi site na iji foto nke Osimiri Anacostia
' N'ịtụleghachi otu ihe ngosi ahụ, onye na-enyocha nka nke Post gbakwunyere na 'Bruce McNeilãs ːa River Divide ːa Tale of Two Cities, dịka ọmụmaatụ, bụ foto na-adọrọ mmasị nke ìhè na Anacostia
Amụrụ Bruce Obomeyoma Onobrakpeya (n'ubọchị iri atọ nke ọnwa Ọgọstụ nʼafọ 1932) Ọ bụ onye Naijiria onye nke na-ebi akwụkwọ, na ese kwa ihe osise ma na akpụ kwa ihe
O gosipụtago na Tate Modern na London, National Museum of African Art nke Smithsonian Institution na Washington, DC
na Malmö Konsthall na Malmö, Sweden
National Gallery of Modern Art, Lagos nwere ihe ngosi nke ihe osise mara mma nke Onobrakpeya
A mụrụ Bruce Onobrakpeya na Agbarha-Otor na Delta State, nwa nke onye na-esi osisi akpụpụta ihe na Urhobo
A zụlitere ya dị ka Onye na-ekpere Kristi, mana ọ mụtakwara nkwenye ọdịnala
Ezinụlọ ya mèchàrà kwaga na Benin City, Edo State, mgbe ọ bụ nwata
Ọ gara akwụkwọ na Western Boys High School, ebe Edward Ivehivboje kụziiri ya nka, n'etiti ihe mmụta ndị ọzọ
Ọ gakwara klas ise ihe na British Council Art Club na Benin City
Mmasị Onobrakpeya nwere ihe osise sitere na ihe osise nke ụdị kọlọ mmiri dị ichè ichè nke Emmanuel Erabor
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, e nwere Onobrakpeya n'ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi nka na ihe osise na Western Boys High School site (1953 Xi56)
N'afọ 1956, ọ garawara Ondo, ebe ọ kụziri ihe na Ondo Boys High School otu afọ
N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1957, Onobrakpeya banyere na kọleji nka, sayensị na teknụzụ nke Naịjirịa, bụ nke ana-kpọ zí Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria
Gọọmentị etiti bụ ndị zụrụ ya na akwụkwọ, a zụrụ ya na ihe gbasara ọdịnala ọdịda anyanwụ nke nka na ihe osise nnọchiteanya
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ malitere ịnwale ụdị ndị gbasara akụkọ ọdịnala, akụkọ ifo na akụkọ mgbe ochie nke Naijiria
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya na-eji ụdị n'ụdị ihe ịchọ mma na ihe gbasara omenala ịkpụ ihe na ihe ndị sitere na ọdịnala Afrịka na nka n'ụzụ ịchọ mma

Ka ọnwa Ọktoba dị mkpụrụ ụbọchị iteolu n'afọ 1958, Otú ụmụ akwụkwọ na ndị na agụ nka na ihe osise na koleji ahụ bụ ndị Uche Okeke bụ onye ndu ha guzobere otu ndị nka ana-kpọ Zaria Arts Society, nke e mechara kpọwa ndị nnupu isi Zaria ebumnuche nke otu ụmụ akwụkwọ nka na kọleji a ndị Uche Okeke bú onye ndu ha bụ 'decolonizing' nka anya dị ka ndị ọcha si mba Europe si-akụzi ya
Onobrakpeya kwuru na kọleji nyere ya nkà na ụzụ mana Zaria Arts Society, otu mkparịta ụka, kpụrụ echiche ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe
Ndị otu ahụ nyere ya obi ike nkwenye na onwe ya ịchọ okwu na-egosipụta onwe ya
Ọ gbatịkwara ọnụọgụ onyinyo ya, leghara anya n'etu ndị mmadụ si ahụ ihe ma kpọlite ike nke mmụọ site na ihe ịchọ mma na-edoghị anya
Bruce Wayne Talamon (amụrụ n'ọnwa Julaị 31, afọ 1949) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto
A maara ya nke ọma maka ise foto R&B na ndị na-agụ egwú mkpụrụ obi n'oge afọ ndị 1970s na 1980s, yana maka ọrụ nchịkọta akụkọ ya dị ka onye nkwekọrịta na onye na-ese foto
A mụrụ ya na Los Angeles n'ọnwa Julaị 31, afọ 1949, Talamon bụ nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ nwoke abụọ James na Clelie Talamon mụrụ
Ọ malitere ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị n'afọ 1963 na Catholic Verbum Dei High School, wee gaa n'ihu na-amụ sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Whittier College na California

Mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na mba ofesi na Berlin, Germany n'afọ 1970, ọ zụrụ igwefoto mbụ ya, Asahi Pentax, wee gaa n'ihu na-ese foto Miles Davis na Dexter Gordon na ya na Copenhagen n'oge ọ nọ na mba ofesi
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1971 na Bachelor of Arts na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ kwụsịrị ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu ma kama kpebie ịchụso ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto
Talamon malitere imepụta foto n'afọ 1975

Dị ka onye na-ese foto nkwekọrịta maka ABC Television, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe ngosi ndị dị ka Laverne & Shirley, Taxi, American Bandstand, na Charlie's Angels na, n'afọ 1980, Don Cornelius were ya n'ọrụ ka ọ bụrụ onye na-se foto nke Soul Train

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ọtụtụ nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri n'ime afọ iri atọ sochirinụ, gụnyere Staying Alive (1982), The Golden Child (1986), Beverly Hills Cop II (1987), Devil in a Blue Dress (1995), Space Jam (1996) na Larry Crowne (2011)
Talamon nwere nwa nwoke
Bruce Wayne Smith (amụrụ n'ubochí isii n'ọnwa Septemba, 1961) bụ ónyé Africa-America animator, ónyé na-emepụta ihe, ónyé nduzi ihe nkiri na ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri telivishọn

A maara ya nke ọma dị ka ónyé okike nke Disney Channel's The Proud Family na The Proud Family Louder and Prouder, yana ónyé na-elekọta animator nke Kerchak na Baboons & Baby Baboon na Tarzan, Pacha na The Emperor's New Groove, Dr
Facilier na The Princess and the Frog and Piglet, Kanga na Roo na Winnie the Pooh
Smith tolitere na Los Angeles, California
Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri, o mèrè ihe nkiri mbụ ya na-eme ihe nkiri dabere na atụmatụ nke otu narị na otu ndị Dalmatian

Smith gụrụ animation na mmemme Character Animation na California Institute of the Arts O mechara kwuo na mgbè ọ nọ na CalArts, ọ matara na enweghị ndị Black na ihe nkiri animated nke kpaliri ya ịmepụta usoro animated nke ya

N'afọ 1984, ọ bụ onye isi na-enyere onye na-eme ihe nkiri aka na TV nke Garfield in the Rough N'ime afọ ndị ahụ na-eso ụzọ ọ ga-abụ onye edemede na ihe omume nke usoro TV ThunderCats N'afọ 1987, ọ ga-abụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri maka Pinocchio na Emperor of the Night
Ọ sonyeere Walt Disney Studios dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Who Framed Roger Rabbit Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na obere ndị ọzọ dị iche iche nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mepụtara
N'afọ 2022, Smith kwuru na 'nnukwu osisi ochie Afro' nwere egbugbere ọnụ bụ ihe na-atọ ọchị banyere onwe ya nke o sere mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ihe ngosi ahụ
Na Disemba 2020, ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta zuru oke na Disney na Farquhar
N'April 18, 2022, Disney+ megharịrị The Proud Family Louder and Prouder maka oge nke abụọ
Smith bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye otu oge mmepụta maka ihe nkiri indie animated steampunk na-abịa n'ihu nke akpọrọ Hullabaloo
Brukina, nke a makwaara dị ka Burkina, bụ ihe ọṅụṅụ ma ọ bụ ihe ọṅụঁanya Ghana nke e ji ọka na mmiri ara ehi pasteurized mee
A na-emepụta Brukina nke kachasị ewu ewu na mpaghara ndị dị n'ebe ugwu nke Ghana
A makwaara ya dị ka 'Deger'
A na-ewere Brukina dị ka nri zuru oke n'ihi ike ya na ihe oriri dị elu
Ọ na-agụnye ọka, nke bụ otu n'ime ọka kachasị ochie n'ụwa, na mmiri ara ehi
A na-akwadebe Brukina site na iji ọka, mmiri ara ehi ma ọ bụ mmiri ara ehi, nnu, mmiri na shuga
Iji kwadebe Brukina
Millet na Brukina nwere magnesium, manganese, calcium, phosphorus, Vitamin B dzg
Mmiri ara nwere Vitamin D na Calcium
Bruno Catalano (a mụrụ n'afọ 1960) bụ onye France na-akpụ ihe, nke a ma ama maka ịmepụta ihe ọkpụkpụ nke ọnụ ọgụgụ nwere akụkụ dị ukwuu na-efu
N'ịbụ onye Morocco, Catalano bụ nwa nke atọ na nke ikpeazụ nke ezinụlọ Sicily
N'afọ 1970, ezinụlọ Catalano hapụrụ Morocco gaa France
N'afọ 1982, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Société Nationale Maritime Corse Méditerranée
Ọ nọrọ ebe ahụ afọ anọ
Ọ na-arutu aka na ahụmịhe ya dị ka onye ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri dị ka isi ihe n'ike mmụọ nsọ ya
Ọ bụkwa onye na-ahụ maka ọkụ eletrik
Catalano maara ịkpụ ihe na 1981 na Marseille ebe ọ debanyere aha na klas Françoise Hamel
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ afọ abụọ, o mepere ọrụ nka nke ya n'afọ 1985 wee nweta oven nke ọ ga-eji sie ụrọ mbụ ya
Ka oge na-aga, Catalano malitere ime nnukwu ihe ọkpụkpụ ọla nchara
Ọrụ mbụ ya bụ nke a na-ahụkarị mana usoro ndị ọzọ bịara n'ihu na-aghọwanye ndi pụrụ iche
N'afọ 2004, ntụpọ n'otu n'ime ihe odide ya - ihe ngosi nke Cyrano - kpaliri ya igwu ma gwuo obi
Ụzọ ọrụ ọhụrụ na-esochi

Ihe ngosi nke ihe ọkpụkpụ Catalano nke akpọrọ Les Voyageurs mere na Marseille na Septemba 2013, iji mee ememe ọnọdụ ya dị ka Isi Obodo Europe nke Omenala na ihe ọkpụkpụ iri dị ndụ gosipụtara n'ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Marseille
Bruno Ecuele Manga (amụrụ na 16 Julaị 1988) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ nke Gabon nke na-agba maka Ligue 2 club Dijon, onye ọ bụ onyeisi, na ndị otu mba Gabon
A maara ya maka ịbụ onye na-agba ọsọ siri ike
Mgbe ọ malitere ọrụ ya na FC 105 Libreville na mba ya, ọ sonyeere otu France Bordeaux na 2006
Ọ gbara bọọlụ n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke klọb ahụ ma nọrọ oge na mgbazinye na Rodez nke dị ala mana ọ bụ naanị otu ugboro maka ndị okenye, tupu a tọhapụ ya na 2008
O mechara sonye n'akụkụ Ligue 2 Angers, na-eme ihe karịrị 50 pụtara n'ime oge abụọ tupu ọ banye Lorient na 2010 maka ego nke € 25 nde
O mere Ligue 1 mbụ ya na Lorient wee gaa n'ihu na-eme ihe karịrị 100 pụtara na ọkwa kachasị elu nke bọọlụ French
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi klọb tupu oge 2012 na 13 ma nọgide na ọrụ ahụ ruo 2014 mgbe ọ bịanyere aka na Cardiff City maka € 5 nde
Ọ nọrọ oge anọ na nkewa ahụ tupu o nyere klọb ahụ aka inweta nkwalite na Premier League mgbe ọ gwụchara dị ka onye na-esote asọmpi Championship na oge 2017 na 18
Manga mere nke mbụ ya na mba ụwa maka Gabon na 2006 ma nwee okpu 87 ruo ugbu a, na-anọchite anya akụkụ ahụ na asọmpi iko mba Afrịka anọ
Ecuele Manga malitere ọrụ ya n'ala nna ya na FC 105 Libreville, tupu Alain Giresse onye bụ onye njikwa nke otu mba Gabon tụọrọ ya aro ka ọ gaa na French Ligue 1 Girondins de Bordeaux

Mgbe ọ sonyere na egwuregwu egwuregwu nke klọb ahụ n'okpuru onye njikwa Laurent Blanc, Ecuele Manga mere asọmpi mbụ ya maka Bordeaux, na-amalite nke mbụ ya, na Matchday Six, na mmeri 3 South2 na Panionios
Otú ọ dị, ọ dịghị mgbe ọ gbara bọọlụ league maka klọb ahụ, ma nọrọ oge na mgbazinye na Rodez
Na ngwụcha nkwekọrịta ya, Angers bịanyere aka na ya na nkwekọrịta afọ atọ, nke na-adịgide ruo n'afọ 2011
N'ebe ahụ, ndị obodo Gabon abụọ, Arsène Do Marcolino na Fabrice Do Marcoline sonyeere Ecuele Manga
Ecuele Manga mere nke mbụ ya na Angers n'egwuregwu mmeghe nke oge ahụ, na 0 na 0 draw megide Bastia
Ọ gbara goolu mbụ ya maka klọb ahụ na 24 Ọktoba 2008, na mmeri 2 na Tours
Na 3 Machị 2009, Ecuele Manga bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọhụrụ na klọb ahụ, gbatịkwuo nkwekọrịta ya ruo n'afọ 2012
Nke a bịara mgbe usoro ngosi dị egwu na Angers dọtara uche site na ọtụtụ klọb ndị ọzọ
N'oge mbụ ya na Angers, Ecuele Manga pụtara ugboro iri atọ, gbaa bọọlụ ugboro abụọ
Tupu oge 2009 na 10, Ecuele Manga nọ n'ọnụ ịbanye na Rennes na nkwekọrịta ruru € 4 nde
Otú ọ dị, ọpụpụ ahụ emeghị
Ecuele Manga anọghị na mbido oge ahụ ma ọ pụtara na mbụ ya na 0 0 draw megide Strasbourg na 2 Ọktoba
N'egwuregwu nke abụọ ya n'oge ahụ megide Strasbourg na 5 Machị 2010, Ecuele Manga gbara akara mbụ nke ọrụ ya, na mmeri 2 Xia1
N'oge nke abụọ ya na Angers, Ecuele Manga pụtara ugboro iri abụọ na asatọ, na-agba bọọlụ ugboro atọ
Mgbe ọ nọ na Angers, Ecuele Manga ghọrọ akụkụ dị mkpa nke nchebe ha guzobere, na-eguzobe onwe ya na otu mbụ
O mechara kọwaa ọpụpụ ya na Angers
N'oge mgbanwe oge okpomọkụ nke afọ 2010, ọ sonyeere FC Lorient maka € 25 nde, wee bụrụ onye otu mbụ na Ligue 1 dị ka onye nọchiri Laurent Koscielny onye hapụrụ Lorient gaa Arsenal
Ecuele Manga mere nke mbụ ya na Lorient n'egwuregwu mmeghe nke oge ahụ, na-amalite nke mbụ ya, na 2 na-agba na Auxerre
N'oge na-adịghị anya, a hapụrụ Ecuele Manga mgbe ọ merụrụ ahụ n'ọkpụkpụ ụkwụ ya na ọzụzụ, mmerụ ahụ nke mere ka ọ hapụ egwuregwu abụọ na ngwụcha Nọvemba
Oge ya kara njọ n'etiti ọnwa Febụwarị mgbe ọ merụrụ ahụ n'apata ụkwụ ya
Mgbe ọ laghachiri na 3 na-aga n'ihu megide Arles-Avignon na 12 Machị 2011, Ecuele Manga gbara goolu mbụ ya na Lorient, na mmeri 3 na 1 megide Montpellier na 11 Mee 2011
N'oge mbụ ya na Lorient, Ecuele Manga gbara otu ugboro n'ime egwuregwu iri atọ na otu maka klọb ahụ

Oge nke abụọ nke Ecuele Manga na klọb ahụ malitere mgbe ọ gbara dị ka onye na-agbachitere etiti na egwuregwu iri na abụọ mbụ (gụnyere ịgba goolu mbụ ya n'oge ahụ megide Brest na 29 Ọktoba 2011) ruo mgbe ọ na-anọghị n'ihi mmerụ ahụ na nkwụsị
Mgbe ọ nọ n'akụkụ, Ecuele Manga bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọhụrụ na klọb ahụ, gbatịkwuo nkwekọrịta ya ruo n'afọ 2015
Ọ laghachiri na mbido Disemba, na mmeri 4 na Montpellier
N'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 2012, Ecuele Manga gbara goolu nke abụọ ya n'oge ahụ, na mmeri Brest

Ọ bụ ezie na ọ gbara bọọlụ ugboro abụọ n'ime egwuregwu iri atọ na abụọ n'oge nke abụọ ya, onye nnọchi anya Ecuele Manga mara ọkwa na Ecuele Manga ga-anọ na klọb ahụ na-agbaso mmasị ndị klọb dị gburugburu Europe

Bruno Vogel (Amụrụ n'ọnwa 29 Septemba 1898 ruo n'ọnwa 5 Eprel 1987) bụ onye Germany na-eme udo na onye edemede
A mụrụ Bruno Vogel n'afọ 29 Septemba 1898 na Leipzig
Ọ nọrọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Bohemia
N'afọ 1916, ọ lụrụ agha n'Agha Ụwa Mbụ, nke mbụ n'ókè nke alaeze Austria-Hungary, mgbe ahụ na Baltic, na Flanders site n'afọ 1917
Bryan Washington (amụrụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1993) bụ onye edemede America
O bipụtara nchịkọta akụkọ mkpirikpi mbụ ya, nke a kpọrọ Lot, na 2019 na akwụkwọ akụkọ, Memorial, na 2020
A mụrụ Washington n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1993 na Kentucky wee kwaga Katy, Texas mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ
Ọ maara na ọ bụ nwoke na-edina nwoke ibe ya mgbe ọ dị obere mana ọ pụtaghị n'ụzọ doro anya, na-atụ egwu nke ịkpa ókè
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na James E
Taylor High School na 2011
Washington gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Houston wee nweta nzere BA na Bekee, wee gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na Mahadim New Orleans ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ nwere MFA
Lot, usoro akụkọ mkpirikpi jikọtara ọnụ na Houston, nke Riverhead bipụtara n'afọ 2019
Akwụkwọ ahụ na-elekwasị anya na Nicolás, nwa okorobịa nke agbụrụ ndị Africa America na Latino America nke na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ezinụlọ ya mgbe ọ na-anabata mmekọahụ ya
Akwụkwọ ahụ bụ ihe mmeri nke 2019 Ernest J
Gaines Award for Literary Excellence, 2020 Dylan Thomas Prize, na 2020 Lambda Literary Award for Gay Fiction
E bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ nke Washington nke a kpọrọ Memorial, na Ọktoba 27, 2020
Tupu mbipụta ya, A24 zụrụ ikike iji gbanwee akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ maka telivishọn, ebe Washington na-agbanwe akwụkwọ akụkọ ya
Washington na-ekwu okwu n'asụsụ Bekee na Mahadum Rice, ebe na Julaị 2020 e mere ya George Guion Williams Writer in Residence and Scholar in Residence for Racial Justice
Bryce Hudson (ubochí irí abụọ n'ọnwa Machị, 1979, Rabat, Morocco) bụ ónyé Moroccan-American Neo-plasticist (De Stijl) na-ese ihe
Ihe osise geometric mbụ nke Hudson na-enyocha agbụrụ na stereotypes site na ụdị geometric abstraction
Ka ógè na-aga n'ọrụ ya, n'ihi mmetụta nke echiche nke Constructivism, ihe osise na ihe ọkpụkpụ mgbidi na-ezo aka na ihe owuwu na oghere
Ihe osise ya jikọtara mmegharị na akụkọ ihe méré eme dịka Minimalism na Rococo

Ya na ndị ọgbọ ya bụ Pierre Clerk na Ilya Bolotowsky, Hudson na-arụ ọrụ n'ime obéré ónyé na-ese ihe na-arụkọ ọrụ n'ụdị Neo-Plastic - na-agbasoghị iwu siri ike, kama na-enyocha omimi na ọdịnihu nke nkà geometric abstract
A mụrụ Bryce Hudson na Rabat, Morocco ma kuchie ya n'ezinụlọ America dị ka nwa ọhụrụ
Ọ gụrụ ihe osise, nkà mmụta akparamàgwà mmadụ, na ihe ọkpụkpụ na Kent State University School of Fine Art
N'ihe ngosi 1999 na Speed Museum, ọ nyochara agbụrụ na mmetụta uche nkè agbụrụ na njirimara na ọha mmadụ nke ógè a
Bsisa (Arabic, Berber aḍemmin Hebrew) bụ nri a na-eri na Mediterenian, nke dabeere na ntụ ọka bali e siri esi nke malitere n'oge ndị Rom
Bsisa bụ ngwakọta dịgasị iche iche nke ọka a siri esi na fenugreek na aniseed na cumin na shuga
A maara ụdị nri a na Tunisia na Libya niile

Ahịhịa na ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ a na-agbakwunye na ngwakọrita ahụ nwere ike ịdịgasị iche, a pụtakwaraara iji ngwakọta ahụ mee ihe dị ka mmiri mgbe agbakwunyere ya na mmiri ara ehi ma ọ bụ mmiri, na-emepụta ihe ọṅụṅụ siri ike a na-akpọ Rowina
Ihe a na-ejikarị eme ihe maka bsisa bụ ịgwakọrita ha na mmanụ oliv n'ime ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ
A na-eri nke a na ụbọchị ma ọ bụ fig maka nri ngwa ngwa nke bara ọgaranya ma nwee ahụike
'Howira' bụ ngwakọta yiri nke Bsisa, agbanyeghị na ọ na-agba ọchịchịrị ma nwee ihe ndị yiri ya

Ndị Tunisia na ndị Libya na-eri ya n'oge dị iche iche, ọkachasị n'ụbọchị mbụ nke ọnwa Hibru nke Naịsan dịka nke a bụ ụbọchị e guzobere Mishkan (ụlọ oriri) (n'ọnọdụ a, a na-akpọ nri ahụ bsiset el-marquma ma ọ bụ naanị Bsisa)
Nri ahụ bụ ntụ nke nwere ọka wit na ọka bali, nke na-anọchite anya ụrọ e ji wuo Mishkan
Tụkwasị na nke a, nne ezinụlọ ahụ na-etinye mgbaaka ọla edo ya n'ime Bsisa, na-echeta ọla edo nke e jikwa mee ihe n'iwu Mishkan

Tupu o rie bsisa, nna nke ezinụlọ ahụ na-agọzi ya n'asụsụ Arabic ka ọ na-agwakọta Bsisa site na iji mkpịsị ugodi ụlọ ya na mmanụ, na-echeta mmanụ e ji mee Mishkan Nke a na-anọchi anya 'emeghe' nke 'afọ ọhụrụ' Nna na ezinụlọ na-aloghachi n'otu n'otu

Bu-Ninkada (Ibut, Abu, Jida) bụ asụsụ Plateau nke Naijiria
Asụsụ abụọ ahụ, Bu na Ninkada, dị iche iche n'agbụrụ
Ihe dị ka mmadụ puku año na-asụ Bu n'obodo nta anọ nke Nakere, Rago, na Abu
Ọ nwere njikọ chiri anya ma dị iche na Ningkada (Jidda)
Ihe dị ka mmadụ puke abuo na-asụ Ningkada na obere obodo abụọ nke Ningkada (Jidda) na Lago
Àtụ Platoid languages
A na-asụ asụsụ Bua (a na-akpọkwa Ba) n'ebe ugwu nke osimiri Chari gburugburu Korbol na Gabil na Chad
Na 1993, ihe dị ka mmadụ 8,000 kwuru ya
Ọ bụ onye kachasị n'otu obere asụsụ Bua yana Farian nwere ike ịghọta ya
Kawãwãy (Korom) nwere ike ịbụ olumba ma ọ bụ asụsụ di iche
Bua bụ asụsụ obodo na Korbol Canton, n'ihi mmetụta akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Korbol Caliphate kemgbe ngwụcha 1700s na 1800s
Ndị na-ekwu okwu bikwa gburugburu Gabil (na mpaghara Guéra), yana na Sarh na N'Djamena
Korom bụ ihe dị ka mmadụ 60 na-asụ n'ime obodo 3 ma ọ bụ 4 na mpaghara Moyen-Chari na mpaghara Guéra nke Chad
A na-akpọ isi obodo ndị na-ekwu okwu Kawãwãy, nke nwere obodo ndị na-eji oji na Tili Nugar (Tilé Nougar), obodo Fania
Florian Lionnet na R

Akpọrọ ha 'G13' na atụmatụ asụsụ Adamawa nke Joseph Greenberg
Ha bụ ndị ezinaụlọ Niger–Congo n'ikpeazụ, ma nwee mmetụta dị ukwuu na Laal

Onye mbụ hụrụ myirịta dị n'etiti Bua na Niellim nke e bipụtara bụ Gustav Nachtigal, na 1889
Maurice Gaudefroy-Demombynes gbakwunyere Tunia na 'Mana' (ikekwe aha ọzọ maka Fanian) na 1907, na-etolite 'Groupe Boa'

Johannes Lukas (1937) kọwara n'otu aka ahụ 'Bua-Gruppe' nke nwere Bua, Niellim, na Koke, na na nhazi nke Joseph Greenberg nke 1963 The Languages ​​of Africa, a na-etinye asụsụ atọ ahụ ọnụ na subphylum Adamawa dịka otu akpọrọ Adamawa-13
Mgbe e mesịrị, Pairault (1965, 1969) gbakwunyere asụsụ Gula ndị ọzọ dị n'ebe ugwu, Fanian, Koke, na Bolgo, na-enye ohere Samarin (1971) kọwapụta kpọmkwem ndị otu asụsụ Bua/Adamawa-13 dị ugbu a

Asụsụ Bube, Bohobé nke anakpọkwa BubeʹBenga (Bobe, Bubi), sitere Bantu nke ndị Bubi, ndị Bantu a mụrụ na, na otu ndị bi na, Bioko Island na Equatorial Guinea
E si na kọntinent Afrịka weta asụsụ ahụ na Bioko ihe karịrị puku afọ atọ gara aga mgbe ndị Bubi malitere ịbịa n'àgwàetiti ahụ
Buchi Atuonwu, onye a maara dị ka Buchi, bụ onye na-agụ egwu reggae na Naijiria

Buchi bụ sokwa n'otu nke Christ Embassy's LoveWorld Music and Arts Ministry

Ọ malitere nhọpụta na mahadum na njedebe nke usoro ihe omume ya iji kwuo okwu ma na-eduzi usoro PhD

Florence Onyebuchi 'Buchi' Emecheta OBE (amuru ụbọchi iri abụọ na onwa Julaị nke afọ nari itoolu iri anọ na anọ rue ubochi iri abụọ na ise onwa Jenụwarị puku abụọ na iri na asaa) bụ onye edemede a mụrụ na Naijiria, nke bi na UK site na afọ nari itoolu iri isii na abụọ, onye dekwara ihe nkiri na akụkọ ndụ onwe onye, yana ọrụ maka ụmụaka

Ọ bụ onye dere ihe karịrị akwụkwọ 20, gụnyere Second Class Citizen (afọ nari itoolu iri asaa na anọ), The Bride Price (1976), The Slave Girl (1977) na The Joys of Motherhood (afọ nari itoolu iri asaa na itoolu)
Allison na Busby bipụtara ọtụtụ n'ime akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, ebe onye nchịkọta akụkọ ya bụ Margaret Busby
Isiokwu Emecheta banyere ịgba ohu ụmụaka, ịbụ nne, nnwere onwe ụmụ nwanyị na nnwere onwe site na agụmakwụkwọ nwetara nkwado site n'aka ndị nkatọ na nsọpụrụ

O nwere oge ọ kọwara akụkọ ya dị ka 'akụkọ nke ụwa, ebe ụmụ nwanyị na-eche nsogbu zuru ụwa ọnụ nke ịda ogbenye na mmegbu ihu, na ogologo oge ha na-anọ, n'agbanyeghị ebe ha si na mbụ, nsogbu ndị ahụ na-aghọ otu

William Lewis 'Buck' Clarke (Ọktoba 2, 1933 Ọktoba 11, 1988) bụ onye America na-akụ egwu jazz nkè yá nà Freddie Hubbard, Herbie Hancock, Les McCann, Russ Freeman, Gerald Albright, Jimmy Smith na ndị ọzọ na-egwuri egwu
Ọtụtụ ụdị egwu Clarke gụnyere mkpụrụ obi, funk na jazz nke oge a, ya na echiche Afrocentric
A mụrụ Clarke na Washington, DC na October 2, 1933

Nnà nkè otu n'ime ndị isi ya bụ nwa nwanne Duke Ellington, ya mèrè Clarke malitere ige egwu egwu jazz site n'aka ndị egwu dịka Duke Ellington

Ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ gbalịrị ịgba Clarke na-eto eto ume ịkpọ 'ezi ngwá egwu,' mànà ọnọdụ ya bụ ịgbà bongo
Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na isii ma ọ bụ iri na asaá, ya na Charlie Parker gbàrà egwu
Clarke kwupụtara mmetụta ya n'ịrụ ọrụ na ndị otu Wess Anderson The Washingtonians nké gụnyere, Eddie Jones na Charlie Parker, na-ekwu na ọ nwèrè Clarke 'na-ama jijiji ma na-ebugharị uche'

BudgIT bụ òtù obodo Naijiria nke na-etinye teknụzụ maka itinye aka ụmụ amaala na mmelite ụlọ ọrụ iji mee ka mgbanwe ọha na eze dị mfe

Na Co-Creation Hub ha chepụtara echiche maka ịnweta data mepere emepe nke mmefu gọọmentị maka ihe ọmụma ọha na eze, na-eduga na mmalite BudgIT

Buhari Bala (amụrụ n'ụbọchị abụọ nke ọnwa Julaị afọ 1958) bụ onye na -edekọ ego na onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria nke jere ozi dị ka Mịnịsta Steeti Naịjirịa na -ahụ maka ihe ndị si mba ofesi site n'afọ 1997 ruo mgbe ọ gafere n'ọchịchị obodo n'afọ 1999

Bala bụ onye natara ugwu mba Order of the Federal Republic (OFR) nke onye bụ onye isi ala gara aga Goodluck Jonathan nyere ya na nturu ugo nke abụọ kachasị elu nke mba Libya- ọla nke obi ike, na ncheta nke ọtụtụ onyinye ya na ngalaba ndọrọndọrọ
Ọchịchị mba na mmekọrịta ya maka ịkwalite mmekọrịta mba abụọ Naịjirịa -Libya

Bala nwekwara Diplọma dị elu na Ndekọ Ego na Mahadum Luton na United Kingdom
Bala malitere ọrụ ya na Ụlọ ọrụ ozi maka ego na steeti Sokoto ochie, ebe o biliri bụrụ onye njikwa ego maka ministri ahụ nwere oke ọrụ nke mmejuputa mmefu ego

N'afọ 2021, ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị iri abụọ na otu a họpụtara maka ọzụzụ na ịchọpụta na ịkọ akụkọ gbasara ime ihe ike gbasara mmekọahụ na okike (SGBV) site na The Wole Soyinka Centre for Investigative Journalism (WSCIJ)
Dị ka gọvanọ nke Kwara, Saraki duziri mgbanwe na ọrụ ugbo, akụrụngwa, ahụike, agụmakwụkwọ, mmepụta ike na iwu gburugburu ebe obibi
Otu n'ime ihe ndị dị mkpa ọ rụzuru bụ ịkpọ ndị ọrụ ugbo ọcha si Zimbabwe gaa Kwara State ma nye ha ohere ịkọ ugbo
Nke a dugara n'ịmepụta mmemme Shonga Farms, nke a na-emegharị ugbu a na Naịjirịa
A họpụtakwara ya dị ka onye isi oche nke nzukọ ndị Gọvanọ Naịjirịa
N'okpuru Saraki, Kwara ghọrọ steeti mbụ mezue Nigeria Independent Power Project

Site na mmekorita ya na Power Holding Company nke Naịjirịa, Saraki weghachiri Ganmo Power Station na Ilorin, ma jikọta ihe karịrị obodo 3750 dị n'ime ime obodo na grid mba site na mmepe na ntinye nke 725 transformer na 7 substations
Kwara rụzuru ọrụ eletrik anọ nke pụtara na ike kwụsiri ike 18-22 awa n'ụbọchị
90% nke ndị bi na Kwara nwere ike ịnweta ọkụ eletrik, ma e jiri ya tụnyere nkezi mba Naịjirịa nke 30%
N'afọ 2007, Saraki ghọrọ Onye isi oche nke Nzukọ Ndị Gọvanọ Naịjirịa
Dị ka onyeisi oche, Saraki mụbara mmetụta mba ya ma duzie mbọ maka mmekọrịta dị n'otu na ndị gọvanọ steeti ndị ọzọ
Nzukọ ahụ mepụtara ọgwụ mgbochi ọrịa polio ka mma na nke sara mbara na Naịjirịa
Ịbịanye aka n'ọtụtụ Memoranda of Understanding (MOUs), na ọtụtụ òtù mba ụwa gụnyere Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, World Bank, DFID, GAVI, UNICEF, UNDP
N'afọ 2011, mgbe ọ gwụchara oge abụọ ya dị ka Gọvanọ nke Kwara Steeti, Saraki gbara ọsọ maka Senator na-anọchite anya Kwara Central Senatorial District
Ọ meriri, nọchiri nwanne ya nwanyị, Gbemisola Saraki-Forowa
A họpụtara ya dị ka Onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Senate na gburugburu ebe obibi na gburugburu ebe dị ndụ ma bụrụkwa onye otu Kọmitii Senator na Capital Markets na Finance
Senator Saraki emeela mkpọsa zuru oke banyere ahụike, nchekwa nri, agụmakwụkwọ na gburugburu ebe obibi - na-arụ ụka maka iwu siri ike maka nhicha mmanụ
N'afọ 2010, Saraki tinyere aka na nsogbu nsị na Zamfara Steeti n'afọ 2010
Saraki kwalitere mmegharị na Senate iji kwụsị usoro enyemaka mmanụ na Naịjirịa, nke bụ nnukwu mmebi nke akụ na ụba mba ahụ
Mgbalị ndị ọzọ na ụgwọ ndị otu onwe ya ọ kwadoro gụnyere National Oil Spill Detection and Response Agency Amendment Bill 2012, Gas Flaring Prohibition Bill 2012 na Climate Change Commission Bill 2013

N'afọ 2013, Saraki guzobere GLOBE Nigeria dị ka onye mmekọ nke Global Legislators Organisation for a Balanced Environment (GLOBE International), na-eguzobe ikpo okwu maka ndị omeiwu iji kwalite iwu gburugburu ebe obibi na mmepe na-adịgide adịgide na Naijiria
Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye isi ala GLOBE Nigeria
Saraki ekwuola ma mee mkpọsa na mba ụwa n'okwu ndị dị ka ọchịchị ka mma, mgbukpọ ọhịa na mmepe akụ na ụba
Mgbe a họpụtara ya ọzọ na ntuli aka n'ozuzu nke afọ 2015, a họpụtara ọ na 9 June 2015 n'enweghị onye na-emegide ya dị ka onye isi oche nke Senate site na njikọ aka nke PDP na APC Senators
Saraki zutere mmegide siri ike site n'aka Senator Ahmed Ibrahim Lawan onye bụ onye otu ndị omeiwu a họpụtara n'ime APC họpụtara
Onye osote ya, Senator Ike Ekweremadu, pụtara mgbe ntuli aka siri ike gasịrị

Onye isi oche Senate Bukola Saraki na ndị nnọchi anya ndị Senate gara Maiduguri, Borno State na 3 Ọgọstụ 2015 iji nweta nyocha n'ala nke mmebi nke ndị na-eyi ọha egwu Boko Haram mere n'akụkụ ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa ma nye ndị na-enweghị ebe obibi olileanya
Ndị nnọchiteanya ahụ bụ ndị mbụ n'ụdị ya site n'aka ndị isi Senate kemgbe nnupụisi ahụ malitere
N'oge ọ bụ onye isi ala, Senate n'okpuru idu ndú ya agafeela Senate niile gara aga n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Naịjirịa, na-agafe iwu 201 ma na-ewepụ mkpesa ọha na eze 138
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari jụrụ Iwu Gọọmentị Ụlọ Ọrụ Petroleum nke Senate Naijiria kwadoro na-ekwu na ọ na-ebelata ike Onye isi ala
Nzukọ nke Mba Naijiria agafeela iwu ahụ iji kwalite nghọta na ịza ajụjụ na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
N'abalị isii n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2019, Saraki kwuru okwu ikpeazụ na nnọkọ ikpeazụ nke Senate nke asatọ
N'afọ 2011, Saraki kwupụtara na ọ bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala n'òtù ndị mmadụ na-azọrọ ọkwa onyeisiale, mana o mechara kwụsị iji kwado onye na-akwado onyeisiala Atiku Abubakar
Saraki bụ onye otu People's Democratic Party (PDP) ugbu a ma bụrụkwa onye otu All Progressives Congress (APC)
Ọ hapụrụ All Progressives Congress na 31 Julaị 2018, ụbọchị ole na ole mgbe ndị Senate 14 hapụrụ ndị mmegide People's Democratic Party (PDP)
O boro mgbapụ ya ụta maka enweghị nnwere onwe nke ndị nwere mmetụta nke pati mbụ ya
Saraki kwupụtara mkpọsa onye isi ala ya maka tiketi onye isi ala nke PDP na ntuli aka 2019, mana Atiku Abubakar meriri ya na primaries
E mechara mara ọkwa ya dị ka onye nduzi ukwu nke mkpọsa onye isi ala Atiku Abubakar maka ntuli aka onye isi ala nke afọ 2019, nke onye isi ala nọ n'ọkwa Muhammadu Buhari meriri
N'ime òtù O na Ge, Dr
Ibrahim Oloriegbe nke APC tụfuru oche Kwara Senatorial ya
O nwetara ngụkọta nke vootu 68,994 megide vootu 123,808 nke Oloriegbe na mpaghara gọọmentị anọ nke Kwara Central Senatorial District, na-ahapụ oke nke vootu 54,814
Na Jenụwarị 2022, Saraki kwupụtara na ọ na-agba ọsọ maka ọfịs onye isi ala n'okpuru nchebe nke People's Democratic Party (PDP) maka ntuli aka nke 2023

Atiku Abubakar meriri ya bụ onye nwetara vootu kachasị elu na vootu 371, Nyesom Wike sochiri ya na vootu 237 na Saraki na vootu 70 na ntuli aka onye isi ala nke People's Democratic Party (PDP) nke e mere na MKO Abiola National stadium, Abuja na 28 na 29 Mee 2022

Dr Bukola Saraki anọgidewo na-alụ ọgụ ma jụ nkwupụta niile nke nrụrụ aka megide ya, ma merie ọtụtụ ikpe ụlọ ikpe maka nke ahụ - Ọ kọwakwara ebubo ndị ahụ dị ka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na 'ịchụ nta ndị amoosu' N'adịghị ka ọtụtụ n'ime ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya, Saraki bara ọgaranya nke ukwuu n'ihi na ọ nwetara nnukwu akụ na ụba site na azụmaahịa na-aga nke ọma tupu ọ banye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'afọ 2000
Site na 1990 ruo 2000, Saraki bụ onye nduzi nke Société Générale Bank Nigeria (SGBN) Ltd

A ga-emecha boo ndị isi nke Societe Generale Bank ebubo na ha ejighị ego ndị na-etinye ego mee ihe n'ụzọ na-ezighi ezi site n'aka Onye isi oche nke Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC) Nuhu Ribadu, onye e mechara wepụ n'ọfịs
N'afọ 2012, na-eso usoro ikpe ụlọ ikpe SGBN gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Heritage Bank, nke bụ otu n'ime ụlọ akụ kachasị na Naịjirịa nwere ihe karịrị US $ 15 ijeri na akụ
O mekwara ka o doo anya na e nwere atụmatụ aghụghọ iji mee ka ụlọ akụ ahụ daa iji mee ka onyinyo Saraki ghara ịdị mma
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2017, nyocha nke International Consortium of Investigative Journalism mere kwuru aha ya na ndepụta nke ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị aha ha bụ na ebubo 'Paradise Papers'

Dabere na data e wepụtara dị ka akụkụ nke Panama Papers, Landfield International Developments Limited na Renocon Property Development Limited bụ ndị Bukola Saraki na-achịkwa mana n'oge mkpughe ndị a, ọ dịghị nke ọ bụla n'ime ihe ndị a dị n'èzí ka a kọrọ na nkwupụta akụ nke Saraki
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2018, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Naịjirịa tọhapụrụ Saraki n'ebubo niile Gọọmentị Naịjirị wetara ya - na-ekwupụta na nkwupụta akụ Saraki n'oge niile ọ na-arụ ọrụ ọha na eze bụ 'ezi na ezi'
A kọrọ na EFCC boro ndị enyemaka nke Onye isi oche Senate, Bukola Saraki ebubo na ha na-ezu ohi ihe ruru ijeri N35 site na Paris Club Loan Refund
E gosipụtara nyocha EFCC nye Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari na akụkọ e nyere na 10 Machị, ụbọchị ise tupu Senate ajụ onye isi oche EFCC, Ibrahim Magu
N'ụbọchị nke ise n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2018, ndị ohi ji égbè wakporo ụlọ akụ azụmaahịa ise na obodo Offa, Kwara State, na-egbu ọ dịkarịa ala mmadụ iri atọ, gụnyere ndị uwe ojii
Ndị uwe ojii Naịjirịa kpọrọ Saraki maka ajụjụ ọnụ - n'ihi atụmatụ nke Inspector General of Police iji tinye ya
Otú ọ dị, e mechara wepụ ebubo niile e boro ya
Afọ atọ ka e mesịrị, ndị mmadụ abụọ na-ebo ebubo na ndị isi nke Special Anti-robbery Squad (SARS) a chụpụrụ ha ka ha tinye Bukola Saraki na izu ohi nke 2018 Offa site na ịta ahụhụ
N'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2020, ụlọ ikpe dị elu nke gọọmentị etiti dị na Lagos gbanwere iwu ka gọọmentị gọọmentị nyeghachi ya ụlọ Ilorin, Kwara State, nke Saraki

N'ọnwa Mee 2021, Kọmitii Ikpe nke Nnyocha na ahịa nke Kwara State Government Assets n'etiti Mee 1999 na Mee 2019, kọmitii nke Gọvanọ Kwara State AbdulRahman AbdulRazaq guzobere, boro Saraki ebubo na ọ na-ere ihe onwunwe steeti na ọnụahịa dị ala nye ndị enyi ya ma tụọ aro Saraki na onye nọchiri ya dị ka Gọvanor Abdulfatah Ahmed maka ikpe
A na-ekwu na Saraki, tinyere Ahmed na ndị ọzọ, rere ihe onwunwe gọọmentị n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị na mpụga steeti ahụ ma na-ejighị Shonga Farms na ihe onwunwa ndị ọzọ
Saraki gọnahụrụ njikwa ọjọọ ma kwuo na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ akpọghị ya ka ọ zaghachi
Saraki kwukwara na ndị ọrụ ahụ nwere ajọ mbunobi na naanị mgbalị AbdulRazaq 'imebi' ndị bu ya ụzọ

Bukola Saraki ghọrọ onye isi oche Senate mbụ na Naịjirịa ka e nyere akwụkwọ ikike ijide ya, mgbe Danladi Umar, Onye isi oche nke Code Of Conduct Tribunal, nyere akwụkwọ ikike njide megide Saraki na 18 Septemba 2015
The Code of Conduct Bureau kwuru na ebubo iri na atọ mbụ nke nrụrụ aka megide Saraki na 2015
E mechara mụbaa nke a ruo ebubo iri abụọ na abụọ
Ebubo ndị ahụ metụtara nnweta ya mgbe ọ nọ n'ọchịchị na nkwupụta ụgha banyere akụ ya

Iwu Naijiria na ndokwa omume anaghị egbochi ndị ọrụ ọha na eze ịkwụ ụgwọ ma ọ bụ ịzụta ihe onwunwe na Naijiria ma ọ bụ ná mba ọzọ, ebe a nabatara Saraki dị ka onye ọchụnta ego mba ụwa bara ọgaranya tupu ọ banye n'ọkwa ọha na eze, dịka ụlọ ọrụ Code of Conduct Bureau kwadoro nkwupụta akụ ya tupu ọ banye na ụlọ ọrụ ọha na ụba

N'abalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 2016, Kanu Godwin Agabi, onye isi ndụmọdụ Saraki na onye bụbu onye ọka iwu ukwu nke Naịjirịa, duuru ndị nnọchiteanya nke ndị ọka iwu iri asaa na itoolu gbachitere Saraki n'ụlọ ikpe

Na Wednesday, 14 June 2017, Code of Conduct Tribunal (CCT) nke nọ na Abuja tọhapụrụ ma tọhapụ Saraki na ebubo iri na asatọ nke nrụrụ aka na nkwupụta ụgha nke ebubo nke akụ nke gọọmentị etiti wetara megide ya na Septemba 2015
Site na ntọhapụ a, CCT wepụrụ esemokwu niile gbara nkwupụta ụgha nke Saraki, na nkwupụta na dị ka onye na-arụ ọrụ ọha na eze, ọ na-arụkọ ọrụ na akụ ndị dị n'èzí
Ọ bụ ezie na ikpe CCT wepụrụ Saraki na ebubo iri na asatọ niile n'ihi na ndị ọkàiwu ahụ egosighi ebubo ya n'enweghị obi abụọ, Gọọmentị etiti nke Naịjirịa, tinyere akwụkwọ mkpegharị na mberede
Ụlọikpe mkpegharị ikpe wee nye iwu ka ụlọ ikpe ahụ kpee Saraki ikpe na atọ n'ime ebubo 18 a gbanwere agbanwe nke na-emetụta nkwupụta ụgha nke ihe onwunwe nke Gọọmentị etiti wetara megide ya
Ụlọikpe mkpegharị ikpe ahụ kwupụtakwara na ndị na-ebo ebubo ahụ enyeghị ihe akaebe iji kwado ebubo iri na ise a họọrọ megide Saraki
Na Fraịde, 6 Julaị 2018, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Federal Republic of Nigeria jụrụ ebubo iri na asatọ niile nke nrụrụ aka na nkwupụta akụ na ụba ụgha nke gọọmentị etiti wetara onye isi oche Senate, Dr
Abubakar Bukola Saraki, mgbe a họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi oche Sanate

N'ikpe e mere n'ụbọchị isii n'ọnwa Julaị, otu ndị otu ise nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu, nke Justice Dattijo Mohammed duziri, kwenyere na mkpebi ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị ikpe kwekọrịtara na ụlọ ikpe n'otu ume ma nye iwu ka Maazị Saraki laghachi na CCT n'otu oge ọzọ, bụ 'nnyocha ikpe'
Ya mere, ụlọ ikpe ahụ kwadoro mkpebi June 2017 nke Code of Conduct Tribunal nke kpebiri na ndị ọkàiwu ahụ egosighi ikpe megide Dr
Saraki
E mere Saraki Turaki nke Fulani emirate nke Ilorin n'oge ọ bụ gọvanọ
Turaki bụ onye ọrụ n'ụlọ ikpe na usoro ọchịchị nke alaeze Hausa-Fulani
Ọtụtụ afọ ka e mesịrị, Emir nke Ilorin buliri ya n'ọkwa Waziri (ma ọ bụ Praịm Minista) nke Ilorin
Ọ bụ nna ya nwere aha ahụ n'oge gara aga
Bukonla Adebakin bụ onye isi azụmahịa na ọkà okwu na Naijiria
Ọ bụ Group Chief Operations Officer nke RED for Africa
Ọ bụkwa onye ndu otu maka The Future Project nke na-ahazi The Future Awards Africa
Adebakin bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Science and Technology Education na Mahadum nke Lagos, Nigeria
Bulelwa Madekurozwa (a mụrụ n'afọ 1972) bụ onye Zambia amụrụ na Zimbabwe na-ese ihe na onye na-ebi akwụkwọ
A mụrụ Madekurozwa n'afọ 1972
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Harare Polytechnic na Zimbabwe ebe o mechara sonye na ngalaba ụlọakwụkwọ ahụ
Dị ka nwa akwụkwọ, Madekurozwa nwere mmetụta site na ọdịiche ọ chọpụtara n'etiti nnọchi anya nke ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị na eserese
Nlebara anya a mere ka ọ tinye aka na isiokwu ndị na-agbagha echiche ọdịnala nwoke na nwanyị

Madekurozwa ejikọtala ugboro ole ụmụ nwanyị na-anaghi esonye na nka Zimbabwe na ọdịmma nke ndị na-azụ ahịa si mba ọzọ bụ ndị na-achọkarị ma na-atụ anya ịzụta ihe ngosi nke Africa, nke ndị na-ese ihe n'obodo n'aka nke ha na-enwe nrụgide imepụta
Ọ kọwara n'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Inter Press Service n'afọ 1998 na 'Ọ bụrụ na ị naghị ere ihe, ị naghị adị ndụ, ị naghị eri nri
Ọtụtụ oge ị naghị emepụta ihe ị ga-achọ
Nke ahụ na-enyekwa ndị mba ọzọ ikike dị ukwuu banyere ihe nka Zimbabwe bụ
N'afọ 1997, Madekurozwa sonyere na mmemme mgbanwe ngalaba na ọgbakọ Commonwealth Mahadum Virginia
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, o nwere ebe obibi na Gasworks Gallery na London ebe o mepụtara ọrụ nke lekwasịrị anya na 'mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị na n'etiti ndị mmadụ na ọha na eze'

A kọwara ọrụ Madekurozwa na The Queer Encyclopedia of the Visual Arts dị ka nke 'na-akọwa esemokwu dị n'etiti atụmanya ọha na eze, echiche nwoke na nwanyị, na mkpa onwe' Banyere ọrụ nke ya, Madekurozwa kwuru, sị, 'M na-eji nka m eme ihe iji mepụta ụwa n'ụzọ nke m; a na-ekpughe ihe ndị a na-ezo ezo ma na-eme ka ihe zoro ezo pụta ìhè
N'ọrụ m, ụmụ nwanyị bụ ihe karịrị naanị anụ ọhịa na-enweghị ike nke ibu arọ ebe ahụ nwoke na-aghọ ihe emebere maka obi ụtọ nke onye na-ekiri ihe
Joyce M
Youmans na-arutu aka na 'Heavens' (1997) dị ka ihe atụ nke otu Madkurozwa si emegide ire ahụ nwanyị, site na ịtụgharị nlele anya n'ebe ndị ikom nwere ikike
A na-egosi isiokwu ahụ, onye uwe ojii na-eto eto, nke yi uwe ya, nke Youmans na-akọwa dị ka ọ na-akpọ ndị nlele anya ndị na-ekiri ka ha 'gafee n'ime ebe ahụ ma metụ ahụ nwoke'
Sunday Afternoon (1997) jiri usoro yiri nke ahụ, na-egosi ndị uwe ojii nwoke abụọ, otu na-eyi naanị uwe, na-ekerịta makụọ nwoke idina nwoke, mgbe ọ na-eche onye na-ekiri ya ihu
E nyere ya Mobil Overall Award of Distinction
N'ide maka Gallery, onye nyocha Chiedza Musengesi toro usoro na isiokwu nke ihe osise ahụ, na-ekwu na ọ na-agba ndị na-ekiri ume 'ịtụleghachi echiche ọdịnala anyị banyere mmetụta mmadụ na mkpa onwe'
N'otu ihe osise ahụ, Carol Magee na-ekwu na 'mgbatị sara mbara na-enyere aka ịmepụta ike mmetụta uche, ike na esemokwu, dịka o ji ụcha ndị bara ọgaranya, ndị gbara ọchịchịrị
N'afọ 1995, Madekurozwa gosipụtara onwe ya n'ihu ọha dị ka nwanyị na-edina nwoke

BULI, ma ọ bụ Kanjaga, bụ asụsụ Gur nke Ghana bụ nke a na-ekwu na mpaghara Builsa, nke dị na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke mba ahụ
Ọ bụ asụsụ SVO ma nwee 200 000 ndị na-ekwu okwu
A naghị eme nnyocha nke ọma n'asụsụ Buli ma na-ekwu maka asụsụ ndị a bụ ihe na-ekwekọghị
Otu olumba bụ Chuchuliga, nke a na-asụ n'akụkụ ugwu nke Ghana dị nso na Navrongo
Asụsụ a sitere na Kasim, nke bụ asụsụ Gur ọzọ a na-asụ na mpaghara Upper East nke ugwu Ghana na Burkina Faso
Chuchuliga nwere ihe ndị a kapịrị ọnụ dịka enweghị diphthongs, ọdịdị aha bara ọgaranya na enweghị ụda dị ala, nke yiri ụdị ndị ọzọ nke Buli
Dị ka Ethnologue si kwuo, Buli anaghị egosi ọdịiche dị n'asụsụ dị iche iche ma a na-akọ na ọ dị ka Konni, nke a na-asụ na mpaghara Nangurima na Yikpabongo
Ọzọkwa, Buli yiri Mampruli (77%)
E nwere ọkwa ụda atọ na Buli, ya bụ elu, etiti na ala, na ụda ụda dị mgbagwoju anya
Okwu na-esi n'usoro ụda ha pụọ mgbe ha na-apụta na usoro syntactic

Ọnụ ọgụgụ Bulk Richardson (BRN) bụ ihe atụ nkè ọnụọgụ Gradient Richardson
BRN bụ ọnụọgụ na-enweghị akụkụ na ihu igwe metụtara oriri nkè turbulence nké kewara site na mmepụta shear (ọgbọ nkè turbulance kinetic energy kpatara site na ikuku shear) nké turbulency
A na-eji ya egosi nkwụsi ike na mmepụta nke ọgba aghara
A na-eji BRN eme ihe ugboro ugboro na meteorology n'ihi data rawinsonde (nkè a na-akpọkarị radiosonde) na amụma ihu igwe nké na-enye ikuku na okpomọkụ n'ébé dị íchè íchè na mbara igwe
N'okpuru ébé a bụ usoro màkà BRN
Ébé g bụ ọsọ ọsọ, Tv bụ oke okpomọkụ, Δθv bụ ọdịiche dị n'etiti okpomọkụ dị n'ofe ọkpụrụkpụ Δz (omimi kwụ ọtọ), na ΔU na ΔV bụ mgbanwe na ihe ndị dị n'akụkụ ikuku gafee otu okpomọkụ ahụ
Ọnụ ọgụgụ dị elu na-egosi ébé ndị na-adịghị akwụsi ike na / ma ọ bụ ebe ndị na'adịghị ike; ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ala na-egosi enweghị ike na / ọ bụ ike ịkpụcha
N'ozuzu, ụkpụrụ dị n'agbata irí nakwa irí ise na-atụ aro ọnọdụ gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi dị mmá màkà mmepe supercell
Na njedebe nkè ọkpụrụkpụ nké na-aghọ obere, ọnụọgụ Bulk Richardson na-eru nso ọnụọgụ Gradient Richardson, nkè ọnụọgụ Richardson dị oké égwu bụ ihe dịka Ric= 025
Ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị na-erughị uru a dị oke egwu anaghị akwụsi ike ma nwee ike ịghọ ma ọ bụ nọgide na-agbagwoju anya
Ọnụ ọgụgụ dị oke egwu nkè 025 na-emetụta naanị maka gradients mpaghara, ọ bụghị màkà ọdịiche dị ichè íchè gafee nnukwu ọkwa
Ka ọ na-esiwanye ike, o yikarịrị ka anyị ga-emezi nnukwu gradients na-eme n'ime obere mpaghara nke ihe na-adọrọ mmasị

Nke a na-eme ka ejighị n'aka banyéré amụma anyị banyéré ihe na-eme, ma ugbu a, mmadụ ga-eji uru buru ibu nke ọnụ ọgụgụ Richardson dị oke egwu iji nye nsonaazụ ezi uche dị na ya site na iji gradients anyị dị nro
Nke a pụtara na ka ọ na-adịkwu arọ, otú ahụ ka uru ahụ na-eru nso na echiche ahụ
Bulu bụ asụsụ Bantu nke ndị Bulu nke Cameroon
Asụsụ ahụ nwere mmadụ otu narị na iri asaa na puku anọ na asụụ ya n'afọ 1982, na ihe dị ka ndị n'asụ asụsụ nke abụọ narị puku asatọ n'afọ 1991
Asụsụ ya gụnyere Bene, Yelinda, Yembana, Yengono, na Zaman

Ndị na-achị ala ọzọ na ndị ozi ala ọzọ na-eji Bulu eme ihe n'oge gara aga dị ka asụsụ a na-asụ n'ógbè ahụ maka azụmahịa, agụmakwụkwọ, na ebumnuche okpukpe, ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-aghọwanye ihe a na-adịghị ahụkebe n'ọ́tụ̀ ndị ahụ
Bulu so n'òtù asụsụ Beti ma nwee ike ịghọta ya na Eton, Ewondo, na Fang
Ndị na-asụ Bulu ka wee nọrọ na mpaghara ndịda nke Cameroon, ọnụ ọgụgụ ha kachasị na Ebolowa na Sangmélima
Ụfọdụ ndị na asụ asụsụ a bi na ngalaba Nyong-et-Mfoumou nke etiti na ngalaba Haut-Nyong nke ọwụwa anyanwụ
Dị ka ALCAM si kwuo (2012), a na-asụ Bulu na ngalaba Mvila na Dja-et-Lobo (mpaghara ndida), ma n'ebe ndịda nke ngalaba Haute-Sanaga (Mpaghara Etiti) ebe a na- asụkwa olumba Yezum nke Ewondo
Tinyere asụsụ Yébékóló na Omvan, a na-asụkwa ya n'ebe ugwu nke ngalaba Nyong-et-Mfoumou (Mpaghara Etiti) na akụkụ nke ngalaba Haut-Nyong n'ebe ndịda nke obodo Nguelemendouka Mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ)
Ndị ozi ala ọzọ Presbyterian mbụ rutere Cameroon dere asụsụ Bulu
Ha mere ya asụsụ ntụziaka na ozizi Protestant n'oge ọchịchị ndị ọchịchị
Asụsụ a nwere akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu (French-Bulu/Bulu-French) otu n'ime ndị dere ya bụ Moïse Eyinga
Akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ e dere na Boulou bụ Nnanga Kôn
Mkpụrụ edemede Bulu nke ụka Presbyterian nke Cameroon nwere mkpụrụedemede iri abụọ na anọ a, b, d, e, f, g, h, i, j, k, l, m, n, ñ, o, ô, p, s, t, u, v, w, y, z
é na è bụ ụdị e dị na mkpụrụedemede a
PROPELCA ejirila mkpụrụedemede Bulu mee ka ọ bụrụ mkpụrụedemede dabere na General Alphabet of Cameroonian Languages

Asụsụ Bung bụ asụsụ Cameroon nke fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ nke na-adịghịzi adị, nke mmadụ atọ na-asụ (na 1995) n'obodo Boung na Adamawa Plateau
Otu onye na-asụ ya nke mụtara asụsụ ahụ mgbe ọ dị obere na-echeta ya nke ọma, ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụghị asụsụ nne ya
Ndepụta okwu na-egosi na o yiri asụsụ Ndung nke asụsụ Mambiloid Kwanja, ọ bụ ezie na nke ahụ nwere ike ịbụ n'ihi na nke a aghọwo asụsụ kachasị n'obodo ebe ndị ikpeazụ na-asụ Bung bi
O nwekwara okwu ndị yiri asụsụ Mambiloid ndị ọzọ dị ka Tep, Somyev na Vute, ebe ọtụtụ mmalite okwu ka na-edochaghị anya (ma eleghị anya Adamawan)
N'ihi enweghị data, a naghị ekewapụta ya kpamkpam

bunkie bọọdụ bụ ihe nkwado matarasị dị nro nke e bu n'obi maka àkwà bunk
E mepụtara ya na mmalite narị afọ nke 20 iji nye nkwado ikpo okwu dị arọ karịa igbe-springs, yana nkwado dị mma karịa slats
A DIY bunkie bọọdụnwere ike ịnwe (3⁄4 in) plywood, mana a pụrụ iji osisi ma ọ bụ ígwè nwoke ikike asụsụ obodo ndị mee ụdị azụmahịa, a na-ekpuchikarịkwa ya na akwa

Bunmi Kayode (amuru na afor 13 Eprel 1985) bu onye ama ama umu nwanyi Naijiria nke na-egwu egwu dika onye mgbachitere
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ akụkụ nke otu na 2003 FIFA Women's World Cup
Àtụ Nigeria squad 2003 FIFA Women's World Cup
Festus Bunmi Olusona (amụrụ na 2 June 1965) bụ onye Naijiria na-ahụ maka ikike mmadụ na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Olusona gụsịrị akwụkwọ nweta nzere Bachelor na Philosophy ya na Honours na Mahadum nke Ibadan, na Naijiria n'afo 1992
Reverend Bunmi Olusona nke a makwaara dị ka 'Beyond Jordan' n'etiti ndị ọrụ ibe ya bụ onye na-eme ihe gbasara ikike nke ụmụ akwụkwọ
Ọ malitere ọrụ ụmụ akwụkwọ site na Kwara State College of Technology na 1984/85 nke a na-akpọzi Kwara State Polytechnic
Ọ ghọrọ osote onye isi nke Reformers Academy' otu nzukọ nke Prọfesọ Osam Edim Osam guzobere na Mahadum Ibadan, UI
Ọ zọrọ ma bụrụ onye isi oche otu umu akwukwo nke Mahadum Ibadan na 1989/90 n'okpuru ọchịchị Prọfesọ Ayo Banjo, onye isi mahadum n'oge ahụ
Ka ọ na-erule 1991/92 Bunmi Olusona ghọrọ onye isi Zone D nke National Association of Nigerian Students (NANS) nke gụnyere mahadum niile di na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke Nigeria

Mgbe agbachara ogba aghara anti-SAP n'afo 1989, e jidere Bunmi Olusona na ndị isi ụmụ akwụkwọ ole na ole ndị ọzọ nke NANS n'ụzọ iwu adịgboroja, jide ha ma jikọta ha na ndị omempụ siri ike na ụlọ mkpọrọ Ikoyi nke Niajiria na Kirikiri n'okpuru iwu nke 2 nke afọ 1984
Iwu nke a ama ama bụ iwu onye bụbu onye ọchịchị aka ike nke ndị agha Naịjirịa, General Ibrahim Badamosi Babangida guzobere
Ná ngwụsị nke ọgba aghara ahụ, ndị uwe ojii gburu ihe karịrị narị abụọ ndị Naijiria, meruo ụfọdụ ụmụ akwụkwọ ahụ

E jidere Bunmi Olusona n'ụzọ iwu adịgboroja ma jide ya na ụmụ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ bụ Christian Akanni, Kayode Olatunji, Late Barrister Bamidele Aturu, Barrister Opeyemi Bamidele, Barrister Barrister Abdul Aminu Mahmud, Emmanuel Nwanzu na Nasir Kura

Ya na ụfọdụ n'ime ndị na-eme ihe gbasara ikike umu akwukwo na Mahadum ha oge ruru ọnwa anọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ SSS dị na Ikoyi, e mechara kwaga ha n'ụlọ mkpọrọ di na Ikoyi na Kirikiri nke kachasị elu n'okpuru Iwu Mkpọrọ nke Ndị Mmadụ No
2 nke 1984 dị ka emegharịrị
Ọ bụ njide n'enweghị ikpe sonyere ya

A hapụrụ ya na ndị isi ndị o wu ya na ha ( otu NANS) mgbe Nigerian Bar Association (NBA) nke Barrister Alao Aka Bashorun duziri na Civil Liberties Organisation (CLO) nke Barrister Olisa Agbakoba duziri
Bunmi Olusona tụfuru oge agụmakwụkwọ n'ihi mkpọrọ ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Ikoyi
Bunmi Olusona na ụmụ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ a tụrụ mkpọrọ bụ ndị Amnesty International kwupụtara na ha bụ ndị mkpọrọ akọ na uche na 1991/92
Ụmụ akwụkwọ Mahadum Ibadan (UI) hụrụ Bunmi Olusona n'anya nke ukwuu maka ihe ndị ọ rụzuru mgbe ọ bụ Onye isi oche nke nzuko umu akwukwo bu 'Students Union'
Ufodu n'ime ha bụ
Reverend Bunmi Olusona, onye nwere nzere bachelọ na Philosophy lụrụ Elizabeth Aderonke Olusona
Ọ nọ obere oge na Civil Liberties Organisation dị ka Field Research Officer for Women Rights Project
Na CLO, o mekwara nnyocha banyere nhụjuanya nke ndị ọrụ Najiiria Railway make ọtụtụ ụgwọ ọnwa e ji ha
Aha akwụkwọ nta ya bụ Dying in Agony
Rev

Bunmi Olusona gara mba ọzọ na Europe n'oge ọchịchị ndị agha a ma ama nke General Sani Abacha, Dị ka 'onye ọrụ kampeenu' na Campaign for Democracy (CD) na onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Kọmitii maka Nchedo nke Ihe Ndị Ruuru Mmadụ (Human Rights), CDHR, o sonyere n'ọtụtụ ngagharị iwe megide ọchịchị General Sani Abacha

Ọ gbapụrụ na Naịjirịa n'afọ 1996 mgbe o nyechara CNN ohere maka ajụjụ ọnụ na redio na-akatọ ọchịchị Sani Abacha maka ogbugbu jọgburu onwe ya nke Kudirat Abiola, nwunye onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naịjirịa a ma ama bu Chief MKO Abiola
Bunmi Olusona na ụfọdụ ndi mmadụ si na Naịjirịa nke ọrụ ha gbasara ikike mmadu enweela mmekọrịta chiri anya

Ụfọdụ n'ime ha bụ; Barrister Femi Falana SAN, Late Beko Ransome Kuti, Chief Frederick Fasehun, Late Baba Omojola, Late Alao Aka Bashorun, Late Gani Fawehinmi, Barrister Osagie Obayuwana, Comrade Gbenga Awosode, Comrade Wale Adebisi, Comrade Abiodun Aremu, Comrade Wale Adeniran, Comrade Odion Akhaine, Comrade Jiti Ogunye, Comrade Opeyemi Bamidele, Comrade Popoola Ajayi, Gbenga Toyosi Olawepo, Comrade Rotimi Obadofin, Comrade Joe Okey Odumakin, Comrade Abdul Aminu Mahmud, Comrade Wale Okuniyi na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa, ọ banyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị site na isonyere Alliance for Democracy (AD) wee bụrụ onye na-azọ ọkwa gọvanọ Kwara Steeti na 2007
Omerighiị na ntuli aka ahu
Onye meriri bu n'aka Gọvanọ nọ n'ọkwa nke Steeti, Senator Bukola Saraki

Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2011, ọ zọrọ ọkwa Irepodun/Oke-Ero/Ekiti/Isin na ulo ndi ome-iwu na Naijiria site na otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ndi Action Congress of Nigeria (ACN) omerighị ntuli aka ahụ n'agbanyeghị na-enwe ọnọdụ esemokwu
E kwenyere na e mere ntuli aka ahụ megide ya

Reverend Bunmi Olusona bụ ezigbo oyi onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Barrister Mohammed Dele Belgore, Onye ọka iwu kachasi elu na Naijiria bụbụ onye na-azọ ọkwa gọvanọ nke Action Congress of Nigeria, (ACN) n'afọ 2011 na Kwara Steeti
Bunmi Olusona ghọrọ onye otu Kwara State Caretaker Committee nke Action Congress of Nigeria (ACN) na All Progressives Congress (APC) n'etiti afọ 2013 na 2014
O mechara bụrụ onye isi oche nke Kwara Steeti nke All Progressives Congress, (APC), ọkwá emachara nye Alhaji Ishola Fulani
N'etiti afọ 2014 na 2015, Rev
Bunmi Olusona bụ onye isi kampeenu Mohammed Dele Belgore - onye chọburu ịbụ gọvanọ site na nke a akpoorọ Orange Revolution
Ọ ka na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị ka onye otu siri ike nke All Progressives Congress, (APC) bu otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naịjirịa
Rev
Bunmi Olusona ugbu a bụ onye na-enye onye isi oche Kọmitii mpụ ego ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche gbasara nke akpooro 'Media and Illicit Financial Flows'
Bunny chow, nke a na-akpọkarị bunny, bụ nri nri na-egbu oge nke South Afrika nke nwere oghere oghere nke achịcha ọcha jupụtara na curry
Ọ malitere n'etiti ndị India South Africa nke Durban

N'ime obodo dị iche iche nke South Afrika, mmadụ nwere ike ịchọta ụdị dị iche iche na bunny chow, nke na-eji naanị otu ụzọ n'ụzọ anọ nke achịcha ma dabere na akụkụ nke mba ị nọ na ya, a na-akpọ ya scambane, kota ('akụkụ') ma ọ bụ shibobo mgbe ụfọdụ; ọ bụ aha ya na sphatlho, nri South Africa nke sitere na bunny Chow
E mepụtara bunny chow na Durban, South Afrika
Ọ bụ ebe obibi nke nnukwu obodo ndị India
A na-arụ ụka banyere mmalite nke nri ahụ, ọ bụ ezie na e mepụtara ya na afo 1940 ha
A na-erekwa ya na Gwelo, Rhodesia (nke bụ Zimbabwe ugbu a), n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ ma ka na-ere ya n'obodo Kadoma dị nso, nke a maara dị ka Gatooma

Otu akụkọ na-atụ aro na ndị ọrụ India kwuru na ha bịara rụọ ọrụ n'ubi okpete nke KwaZulu-Natal (Port Natal) chọrọ ụzọ ha ga-esi buru nri ehihie ha gaa n'ọhịa; achịcha a gbawara agbawa bụ ụzọ dị mfe iji buru curries akwụkwọ nri ha
Ihe ndị e ji anụ mee bịara mgbe e mesịrị

A pụkwara ịkọwa iji achịcha na-acha ọcha eme ihe n'ihi enweghị achịcha roti ọdịnala yana ọdịdị ya na-adịghị ike; ya mere, achịcha dị ọnụ ala, nke a na-enweta n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ahịa dị n'ógbè ahụ, ga-abụ ihe kachasị mma maka curry

Otu akụkọ na-ekwu na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ South Afrịka nke Banias (otu ndị India) na-achịkwa bu ụzọ mepụta nri ahụ na ụlọ oriri-n'ụlọ oriri na ọṅụচল, nke a na-akpọ Kapitan's, na nkuku Victoria na Albert Street na Durban
'Chow' na bekee ndị mba Ndida Afrika bụ nanị slang maka 'nri' yana ngwaa 'iri'
Nri ọdịnala ndị India bụ roti na agwa, mana roti na-adaba dị ka ihe a na-ewepụ
Iji dozie nke a, ha [onye?] gwuru akụkụ etiti nke achịcha ọcha ma jupụta ya na curry, wee jiri akụkụ ahụ a tụrụ atụ kpuchie ya
A na-akpọ ụdị nri nri a mgbe ụfọdụ 'beans bunny'
Ihe ọzọ, ọ bụ ezie na o yighị ka ọ ga-abụ, sitere na mondegreen nke 'bun' na 'achar' (Indian pickles), ọ bụ ezie n'oge a anaghị etinye nke ikpeazụ na efere (ma e wezụga dị ka ihe eji eme ihe)
Bunny chows na-ewu ewu n'etiti ndị India na agbụrụ ndị ọzọ na mpaghara Durban
A na-ejikarị curries eme ihe site na iji usoro nri ọdịnala sitere na Durban nwa atụrụ ma ọ bụ nwa atụrụ curry, chicken curry, trotters na beans curry, na beanscurry
Ụdị ndị ọzọ a na-ahụ n'ofe mba ahụ na-eji nri ọdịnala Durban-Indian na-agụnye chips na curry sauce, sausage fried, cheese, àkwá na polony
Ihe ndị a niile bụ ihe ndị a ma ama; chow bunny mbụ bụ akwụkwọ nri
A na-ejikarị salad nwere carrot, chilli na salad yabasị na-eri Bunny chows
A maara nke ọma dị ka sambals, nke a gụnyere tomato, yabasị, na chilies na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ nke a na-enye na vinegar ọcha
Akụkụ ndị ọzọ gụnyere pickles nke India, dị ka mango pickle, lime ma ọ bụ lemon pickle, akwụkwọ nri pickles na ụdị oge ndị ọzọ a na-eme ka ha dị mma
A na-ahụ isi ihe na-adọrọ mmasị nke bunny chow mgbe ofe sitere na curry na-abanye na mgbidi nke achịcha
Ịkekọrịta otu bunny chow abụghị ihe a na-ahụkarị
Bunny chows na-abịa na nkeji iri na ise, ọkara na achịcha zuru ezu

Mgbe ị na-atụ aro ụgbala na Durban, okwu mkparị dị n'ógbè ahụ na-ekwu na ị ga-arịọ naanị maka 'otu ụzọ n'ụzọ anọ nke ụgbala' (ma ọ bụ ụtọ na ogo nke nhọrọ gị); n'ụzọ mkparịta ụka, ndị mmadụ ga-asị, 'M nwere otu ụzọ n'ime ụzọ n'ọnụ ụzọ n'afọ?' A na-ejikarị mkpịsị aka eri Bunny chows; ọ bụ ihe a na-adịghị ahụkebe ịhụ ndị obodo na-eji arịa mgbe ha na-eri nri a
A na-etinye Bunny chows n'akụkọ ihe mere eme na akwụkwọ akụkọ ụbọchị gara aga
Nke a abụghịzi ihe a na-ahụkarị, a na-erekwa bunnies na 'boxes bunny' nke na-ejigide okpomọkụ ma gbochie nsị si na curry
Bunny chows dị n'ọtụtụ obere takeaways na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ndị India na Ndịda Afrịka dum

Ọnụahịa ahụ sitere na R (US $ 104) maka otu ụzọ n'ụzọ anọ nke bunny ma ọ bụ dhal, ruo R ( $ 346) maka otu ụzọ na anọ nke bunton, n'ozuzu, mmadụ nwere ike ịbawanye ọnụahịa nke otu ụzọ n'ụzọ anọ site n'etiti 3 na 4 iji nweta ọnụahịa nke bunny zuru ezu

Kwa afọ, a na-eme 'Bunny Chow Barometer' na Septemba n'akụkụ ndịda nke Osimiri Umgeni, n'elu Blue Lagoon (ebe a ma ama na Sunday picnic maka ndị India Durban), na-adọta ọtụtụ ndị na-abanye site na mpaghara Durban Metro iji sọọ mpi maka aha onye na-eme bunny kacha elu
Bura-pabir (nke a makwaara dị ka Bura, Burra, Bourrah, Pabir, Babir, Babur, Barburr, Mya Bura, Kwojeffa, Huve, Huviya) bụ asụsụ Chadic nke ndị Babur na Bura na-asụ na Naịjirịa
Asụsụ ndị a bụ Pela, Bura Pela, Hill Bura, Hyil Hawul, Bura Hyilhawul, na Plain Bura
E kwuru na Bura na-eme ka ọdịiche dị n'etiti ụda olu na-enweghị ụda, nke a na-adịghị ahụkebe
Ya mere, e nwere ʎ̝̊ ụzọ ise na Bura [l ʎ ɬ ɮ ʎ̝̊] ʎ ɬ ː ʎ ː ː ̊], ọ bụ ezie na enwere ike nyochaa ʎ ̊ dị ka fricative palatalized, //ɬʲ//
Ewezuga nke a, ngwongwo ya dị ka usoro dị mgbagwoju anya nke Margi

Buran na-ewere ụdị abụọ n'oge okpomọkụ, ọ bụ ifufe na-ekpo ọkụ, nke na-eme ka mmiri na-efe efe; n'oge oyi, ọ na-ajụ ezigbo oyi ma na-esokarị snow
