A na-ejikarị snow jupụta n'eluigwe, nke na-agbagharị ma na-ebelata anya ruo ihe fọrọ nkè nta ka ọ bụrụ efu mgbé ụfọdụ
N'Alaska, a maara oké ifufe a na-esi n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ dị ka burga ma na-eweta snow na ice pellets
Ihe omume mbara igwe Soviet kpọrọ otu klas nké ụgbọ mbara igwe site na buran (lee mmemme Buran)
Bure bu asusu eji kwa bubure were mara, ọ bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic nke sitere n'òtù Bole-Tangale nke alaka West di na Chadic
A na-asụ ya na n'obodo nta Bure di na Naijiria (10°31 Ájá, 10°20 Ájá, Gọọmentị Obodo Kirfi, Bauchi Steeti, Naijiria) na ụfọdụ obere obodo ndị dị nso
A di mmadu ole na ole na asu asusu a, nke ọgbọ nne na nna nna ochie
Ewezuga Hausa, nke bụ lingua franca n'ógbè ahụ, asụsụ Chadic ndị ọzọ dị ka Gera, Giiwo na Deno (Bole group) gbara Bure gburugburuI jiri ya tụnyere asụsụ ndị ọzọ nke otu ìgwè ahụ (dịka
Bole ma ọ bụ Karekare), ihe ize ndụ nke Bure bụ nke kachasị njọ
Burger bụ aha nna sina West German
Burger bụ okwu Dutch na Afrikaans maka 'onye nweere onwe ya' ma ọ bụ 'nwa amaala' (German Bürger, Low German Börger) na aha nna ya bụ aha nna Bekee Burgess
Na mba ndị na-asụ Dutch na German ọ nwere ike ịbụ aha nna, na-egosi mmalite site na nke ọ bụla n'ime ọtụtụ obodo na-agwụ na -burg
Ndị ama ama naza aha nna gụnyere
Burger King bụ mba na-ere nri ụwa zuru ụwa ọnụ nke na-ere
Ụlọ ahịa mbụ e mepere emepe 1954, Miami, Florida
Otu n'ime mba Burger kachasị amasị ya bụ hamburger a na-akpọ 'Onye na-egbu'
Mgbe Eze Burger kpebiri ịgbasawanye ọrụ ha na Australia, ha maara na onye na-agba ọsọ nke obere ụlọ nri na-ere ahịa ha
N'eziokwu, aha mbụ nke Australian nke Burger King Coporation, nke e guzobere na Perth, ka a kpọrọ 'Matelaina Jack' n'ụzọ ziri ezi ',' weghachite aha na inwe aha Jack Cowin
Jide n'aka na Jack na-ere ihe ndị burgers dị ugbu a, nakwa ọkachamara Australia, Burger Aussie
Ejeri a na-adabere na uto nke Australian nke kacha amasị ya na cream, tinyere nsen, anụ ezi, eyịm na beetroot na anụ, ihe oriri, na tomato
Asụsụ Burji(aha ọzọ Bembala, Bambala, Daashi) bụ asụsụ Afro-Asia nke ndị Burji na Etiopia na-asụ na ndịda Ọdọ Chamo
Enwere ihe karịrị ndị ọkà okwu 46,000 na Etiopia, yana ndị ọzọ na-ekwu okwu 10,400 na Kenya
Burji bụ nke otu Highland East Cushitic nke ngalaba Cushitic nke ezinụlọ Afro-Asiatic
Asụsụ ahụ nwekwara usoro okwu SOV (isiokwu–ihe – ngwaa) nke ezinaụlọ Kushit na-enwe
Ngwaa morphology na-amata ọdịiche na-agafe agafe na nke etiti, yana ihe kpatara ya
Mgbakwunye ọnụ na-aka onye, ​​ọnụọgụgụ, na okike nke isiokwu ahụ
E bipụtakwara Agba Ọhụrụ ahụ n'asụsụ Burji n'afọ 1993
Nchịkọta ilu Burji, nke a sụgharịrị n'asụsụ Bekee, French, na Swahili, dị na Weebụ
Burkina Faso bu otu obodo no na Afrịka

Damini Ebunoluwa Ogulu (amuru na abali abuo nke Julai 1991), onye ama ama Burna Boy, bu onye oti egwu na onye na ede egwu nke ndi Naijiria
O bilitere bụrụ onye a ma ama na 2012 mgbe o wepụtara 'Like To Party', egwu izizi si na LIFE (2013)
N'afọ 2017, Burna Boy bịnyere aka na nkwekọrịta Bad Habit / Atlantic Records, nakwa Warner Music Group mba ụwa
Ewepụtara album ya nke atọ Outside na 2018A tọhapụrụ album nke anọ ya African Giant na July 2019
Burna Boy, onye nke tipụtere egwu wụrụ ewụ dika 'Ye', 'On The Low', 'Anybody', ritere nturugo BET International Act n'afọ 2019
A mụrụ Damini Ogulu na Port Harcourt, Naịjirịa
Nna ya na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ịgbado ọkụ ma nne ya na-arụ ọrụ dịka onye ntụgharị
Nna nna ya Benson Idonije bụbu onye njikwa Fela Kuti
Ogulu toro na (5)Naijiria ebe ọ malitere iwepụta egwu nke ya site na enyemaka nke Fruity LoopsỌ gụchara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị dị nso na Lagos wee gawa London maka agụmakwụkwọ ọzọ
Aristokrat Records weputara efere egwu izizi Burna Boy bụ LIFE na ọnwa Ọgọọst 12, 2013
Ọ na-edochi mixtape nke abụọ ya bụ Burn Identity nke pụtara n'afọ 2011
LIFE rere nkeji puku iri ano n'ụbọchị izizi ya
Aristokrat Records mechara resi Uba Pacific ikike efere egwu ahụ na ọnụ ihe dịka nde naira iri
E ji egwu dika 'Like to Party', 'Tonight', 'Always Love You', 'Run My Race' na 'Yawa Dey' were kwado ọba egwu ahụ
Nke Leriq mepụta, enwekwara ndị otiegwu ọzọ pụtara na LIFE dịka 2face Idibia, MI, Timaya, Olamide, Reminisce na Wizkid
Ọ ghọrọ nọmba 10 na ndepụta Nigerian Entertainment Today nke ọbaegwu iri na abụọ kachasị mma na 2013
LIFE nwere ụdị ụtọ dị ka egwu Fela Kuti, King Sunny Ade na Bob Marley
Anabatakwara ya nke ọma ma too ya maka ụda ya
E depụtara ya maka ọbaegwu kachasị mma n'afọ na mmemme 2014 Nigerian Entertainment Awards
N’ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2013, LIFE ruru nọmba 7 na eserese Billboard Reggae Albums
N’afọ 2014, Burna Boy gbara arụkwaghịm na Aristokrat Records
Ka afọ abụọ gasịrị, n’afọ 2015, o kpughee ụlọ ọrụ egwu ya akpọ Spaceship Entertainment
Ọ wepụtara ọbaegwu nke abụọ ya On a Spaceship na 25 Nọvemba 2015
Na Septemba 2016, ọ wepụtara EP nwere egwu asaa akporo Redemption
Isi egwu ọbaegwu ahụ bụ 'Pree Me' banyere na Noisey
Na Jenụwarị 2018, e gosipụtara Burna Boy na 'Sunshine Riptide', egwu si na MANIA, ọbaegwu asaa nke Fall Out Boy wepụtara na 2018
Ọ weputara ọbaegwu nke atọ ya Outside na Jenụwarị 26, 2018
Na 21 Maachị 2019, Burna Boy weputara EP nwere egwu anọ anakpọ Steel & Copper, nke ọ mere, ya na ndi otu egwu elektrọnik si Los Angeles DJDS
N'ọnwa Juunu 24, 2019, Burna Boy ritere nturuugo onye otiegwu mba ụwa kachasị mma na nturu ugo BET
Ọ mere 'Ja Ara E' nke pụta na ọba egwu Beyonce bụ The Lion King The Gift
Ọ bụ ya bụ naanị otu onye otiegwu nwere egwu ya n'efere egwu ahụ
A tọhapụrụ ọba egwu nke anọ ya African Giant na July 2019
E ji egwu dika 'Gbona', 'On the Low', Killin Dem', 'Dangote', 'Anybody' na 'Pull Up' wee kwado ya
Ọ malitere irụ ọru n'ọba egwu ahụ n'afọ 2018
Ọ gwara akwụkwọ akụkọ Billboard na ọba egwu ahụ bụ nke kachasị dị ya mkpa
O buru ụzọ kpughee atụmatụ ịwepụta ọba egwu ahụ na Eprel 2019 ma wee nwee nnọkọ ige ntị na Los Angeles
E kesara foto na vidiyo si na nnọkọ ige ntị ahụ na soshal midia
E buru ụzọ kọwa African Giant dị ka ọba egwu nwere egwu iri na isii
Iji kwalite ọba egwu ahụ, Burna Boy bidoro njem nlegharị egwu akpọrọ African Giant Returns, ngalaba nke abụọ nke njem African Giant
Burna Boy tiri 'My Money, My Baby', nke ejiri mee ihe egwu na-akụ n'okirikiri na fim ahụ Queen & Slim
Burna Boy na-akpọ ụdị egwu ya, Afro-Fusion
Ụdị nke na-agwakọta afrobeat, dancehall riddims, reggae, rap na R&B
August Brown nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Los Angeles Times kwuru na ụda Burna Boy mara mma ma di ohụrụ mana mbọ niile ọ na-agba emeputa egwu na-ewu ewu anaghị adọpụ ya uche
Burton Clarke bụ ónyé na-ese ihe nkiri ọzọ nké Africa na America

A maara ya màkà ònyínyé ya na ịrị elu nke ndị na-eme ihe ọchị LGBT na ilekwasị ányá na ịnọchite ányá ụmụ nwoke na-eme nwoke nke agbụrụ na klas niile na nka ya, na-eji ngwakọta nkè eziókwu na échichè efu iji dozie nsogbụ dị mgbagwoju ányà dị ka ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na homophobia
A mụrụ Clarke na Plainfield, NJ
Ọ natara nzèrè bachelọ ya na ihe nkiri na Mahadum Syracuse, nzèrè masta ya na ímé ihe nkiri na Florida State University
Mgbè afọ anọ gachara na Asolo State Theatre nke Sarasota, Clarke kwagara New York

N'ihi ihe isi ike nke ịchọta ọrụ siri ike dị ka ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri ojii, o mechara kpebie ịlaghachi azụ na nkà ya dị ka onye edemede, na-achụso mmasị onwé ónyé n'ịgbasawanye nnọchite anya nwoke na nwoke na mgbasa ozi
E bipụtara ihe ọchị Clarke 'Cy Ross na SQ Syndrome' na mbụ na New York Native (1980), wee bipụtaghachi ya na Gay Comix #2 (1981), na Meatmen Vol1 (1986)
O nyèrè áká na ihe osise mkpuchi Gay Comix #3, na ihe ọzọ na-atọ ọchị, 'The Satyr', na Gay Gomix #10
A makwaara ya maka mbipụta na Playguy, First Hand, na Christopher Street magazine
Clarke ekwuola na ụdị nke ya na-emetụta nke Leonard Star

A maara Clarke màkà eziókwu na nkọwa nke ụdị nka ya, ojiji ya siri ike nke onyinyo / ìhè na ihe ọchị ojii na-acha ọcha, na màkà ịnagide nsogbụ ndị dị nro dị ka njikọ agbụrụ na mmekọahụ, yana ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na homophobia
Na 'Cy Ross na SQ Syndrome' ọ na-eche ihu na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ dị n'ime nke na-abịa na ịbụ 'eze nwanyị snow', ebe 'The Satyr' na-eche ụzọ homophobia nwèrè ike isi duga n'ime ihe ike
A matara ọrụ ya màkà mkpà na ụkọ nke isiokwu ya n'oge ahụ, yana ojiji ya na mkparịta ụka banyéré ọdịnaya ihe na-akpali agụụ mmekọahụ na ego gọọmentị màkà nyocha ọrịa AIDS
Ndị ógè ya dị ka Jerry Mills na Howard Cruse gosipụtara mmasị na nka Clarke na ọchịchọ ịhụ ka ọ na-arụpụta ihe na mmepụta ya
Clarke na-arụsi ọrụ íke na mmata ọrịa AIDS ma na 1987 nyèrè áká na ọrụ GMHC 'Safer Sex Comix' na 1987, mgbalị ịgbasa mmata banyéré ọrịa AIDS na eroticize omume mmekọahụ dị nchebe dịka iji condoms
Buru na Angwe mejupụtara asụsụ nke Southern Bantoid nwere ike ịdị iche iche nke a na-asụ na Sardauna LGA, Taraba State nke Nigeria
Buru bụ asụsụ obodo dị nso obodo a na-asụ Batu, n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Baissa
Echebu na Angwe bụ Batu, asụsụ Tivoid, mana ọ bụ otu asụsụ ahụ dị ka Buru
E nwere ihe yiri Tivoid, ọ bụ ezie na ewezuga ịkekọrịta ụfọdụ okwu na Northwest Tivoid، ikekwe n'ihi kọntaktị, enwere obere ihe akaebe iji kewaa ya
Blench na-emeso ya dị ka ihe dịpụrụ adịpụ n'ime Bantoid (2016)
Àtụ Languages of Nigeria
Buruku bụ ọchịchị ime obodo na Benue State, Nigeria
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Buruku

Ihe karịrị 80% nke ndị okenye nọ n'ime ime obodo a na-arụ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nri mana ezinụlọ ọ bụla na-ejikwa ụfọdụ anụ ụlọ na ubi citrusNdị ọrụ ugbo na-amịpụta ji, akpu, soyabean, osikapa, ntụ ọka, mkpụrụ sesame (beniseed), agwa, ọka Guinea, millet, akị bambara, ginger, okpete na ọka
Buruku bụ ọchịchị ime obodo nke dị n'osimiri nwere nnukwu mpaghara dị na Osimiri Katsina-Ala ebe a na-akụ okpete n'ahịa ahịa
A na-emepụtakwa osikapa n'ụdị azụmahịa n'akụkụ mmiri mmiri Katsina-Ala na iyi na iyi ya
Ahịa obodo na-ewu ewu na Buruku LGA bụ Ityowanye, Adi, Abwa, Buruku, Adogo, Kur, Usen, Agwabi, Ortese-Mbashian, Gbanyam, Ugah, Jingir, na Dogo/Wuna
Buruku nwere nnukwu ahịa citrus na agwa soya na Ityowanye
Burundi bu otu obodo no na Afrịka

Burutu bụ ọchịchị ime obodo na Delta State, Nigeria
Ọ dabere n'ụsọ osimiri Niger Delta n'akụkụ abụọ nke Osimiri Forcados, ọwa mmiri Niger, kilomita 30 (kilomita 20) n'elu ugwu site na Bight of Benin
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka njikọ n'etiti njem osimiri na oké osimiri mgbe Royal Niger Company guzobere ntọala ebe ahụ na njedebe narị afọ nke 19
Ndị bi na mpaghara a bụ ndị agbụrụ Ijaw ka ukwuu
Busa, ma ọ bụ ikpoya Bisã, Busa bụ asụsụ Mande nke Bussa Emirate mbụ na Naịjirịa
A na-akpọ ya Busanci na Hausa, a na-akpọkwa ya Zugweya

Asụsụ Busa nwere mkpụrụedemede ịrị atọ na abụọ (Aa, Ãã, Bb, Cc, Dd, Ee, Ee, Ɛɛ, Ɛ̃ɛ̃, Ff, Gg, Hh, Ii, I, I, Jj, Kk, Ll, Mm, Nn, Nn, Oo Ɔɔ, Ɔ̃ɔ̃, Pp, Rr, Ss, Tt, Uu, Uũ, Vv, Ww, Y gwy, Zz) na digraphs iri abụọ na ise gbara mkpi (Aa aa, Ãa ãa, Ee ee, Ẽe ẽe, Ɛɛ ɛɛ, Ɛ̃ɛ ɛ̃ɛ, Gb gb, Ii ii, Ĩi ĩi, Kp kp, Oo oo, Ɔ̃ɔ ɔ̃ɔ, Uu uu, Ũu ũu, gw, mb, mp, nd, ng, nk, ns, nt, nz)

Bukawa (amakwaara dị ka Bukaua, Kawac, Bugawac, Gawac) bụ asụsụ Austronesian nke Papua dị na Guinea Ohụrụ
Ihe dị ka mmadụ puku iri abụọ na-asụ Bukawa (na afọ puku abụọ iri na otu) n'ụsọ oké osimiri nke Huon Gulf, Morobe Mpaghara, Papua New Guinea

Asụsụ a na-ahụkarị nke aha ahụ na obodo na gọọmentị bụ Bukawa (Eckermann 2007 1), ọ bụ ezie na ọ sitere n'asụsụ Yabem, nke jere ozi dị ka ụlọ ụka na ụlọ akwụkwọ lingua franca na mpaghara ndị dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri gburugburu Gulf maka ọtụtụ narị afọ nke 20

Aha a, nke na-akọwa ndị na-asụ Bukawa ugbu a n'ozuzu ya, sitere na aha obodo Bugawac a ma ama (nke pụtara 'River Gawac', ọ bụ ezie na o yighị ka osimiri dị otú ahụ dị) na Cape Arkona n'etiti ụsọ oké osimiri ugwu
Bushong (Bushoong) bụ asụsụ Bantu nkè mpaghara Kasai nkè Democratic Republic of the Congo
Ọ bụ asụsụ nkè Alaeze Kuba
Áhà ndị ọzọ bụ Bushongo, Busoong, Shongo, Ganga, Kuba, Mbale, Bamongo, Mongo
Á na-ekwu ná asụsụ ndị ahụ bụ Djembe, Ngende, Ngombe (Ngombia), Ngongo, Pianga (Panga, Tsobwa, Shobwa, Shoba)
Pianga (Shuwa) bụ asụsụ dị iche, n'ime otú Tetela
Ndị Bushong ná ndị Kasai Twa nwere mmekọrịta dị n'etiti
Bushra Rozza (a maara dị ka Bushra; amụrụ n'October 5, 1981), bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu
O nwetara ihe nrite Best Actress na Dubai International Film Festival maka ọrụ ya n'ihe nkiri 678
A mụrụ Bushra na Cambridge, England, nye odee Ijipt bụ Ahmed Abdalla Rozza, ma nne na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ maka mmepe mmadụ, na-echegbu onwe ya maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị
Bushra bịara Cairo, Egypt mgbe ọ dị afọ iri
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye mgbasa ozi na telivishọn satellite wee gaa mee ihe nkiri na 2002
Ọrụ mbụ ya bụ na sitcom Shabab Online (Youth Online)
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịgasị iche iche na ihe nkiri
O ritere ihe nrite mbụ maka ihe nkiri ya nke afọ 2004 bụ Alexandria
New York, nke Youssef Chahine duziri
O weputara abọm egwu, gụnyere Makanak (Your Place) na Ehki (Talk), yana vidiyo egwu Cobra, nke katọrọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Mohamed Ramadan
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere ElGouna Film Festival, emume e guzobere iji kwalite mmekọrịta ọdịbendị
Banyere nsogbu nke iyi egwu mmekọahụ, o kwuru na 'Ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị naanị anaghị eweta mgbanwe
Nke a bu oge dị mma ka anyị ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ndị na-emepụta ihe nkiri ka anyị sonye
Ọ lụrụ onye injinia na onye ọchụnta ego Siria, Amr Raslan, site na 2010 ruo 2015, onye ya na ya nwere ụmụ abụọ
Ọtụtụ akwụkwọ kwuru na amụrụ ya na 1976, mana o mechara kwuo na amụrụ na 1980s
Ụbọchị azụmahịa, nke e guzobere na 2001, bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ azụmahịa kwa ụbọchị dabere na Lagos
Ọ bụ naanị akwụkwọ akụkọ Naijiria nwere ụlọ ọrụ dị na Accra, Ghana
O nwere ma mbipụta kwa ụbọchị na Sọnde
A na-ekesa akụkọ a na Nigeria na Ghana
Onye bipụtara Businessday, Frank Aigbogun, onye bụbu onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Vanguard
Onye ndezi akwụkwọ akụkọ kwa ụbọchị bụ Tayo Fagbule
Lolade Akinmurele bụ osote onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke ọtụtụ ndị na-enye aka na-akwado
Chuks Oluigbo bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ n'ịntanetị ebe onye nchịkọta akụkọ Sunday bụ Zebulon Agomuo

Akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ nwere ndị odee ihe dị ka Iheanyi Nwachukwu, Onyinye Nwachukwu, Jumoke Akiyode, Chuka Uroko, Ifeoma Okeke, Hope Moses Ashike, Olusola Bello, Odinaka Anudu, Obinna Emelike, Teliat Sule, na Chuks Oluigbo, na ndị ọzọ
A na-ebipụta Business Hallmark na Lagos, Nigeria na webụsaịtị ya, hallmarknewscom bụ ọkachamara na azụmahịa, amụma na akụkọ gbasara ego
Saịtị ahụ bidoro na Maachị 2009 na-enye ngwakọta nke akụkọ metụtara azụmahịa yana mmasị izugbe
Ọ nwere mmasị na-agụ akwụkwọ na mpaghara azụmahịa na n'etiti ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, n'ihi ozi dị iche iche gbasara azụmahịa, amụma na ego, dị na webụsaịtị
Ike nke akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ dị n'ime ederede nyocha nke ọma nke jikọtara ya na eziokwu ndekọ ọnụ ọgụgụ
Na 10 Febrụwarị 2011, akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ malitere ọrụ 'Most Influential Nigerians 2010' na nnọkọ akụkọ na Lagos

Agbanyeghị, Business Hallmark agbanweela aha ya ka ọ bụrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ Hallmark A na ahụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ lekwasịrị anya na azụmaahịa ebe, ọ na-enye nyocha miri emi na echiche banyere azụmahịa na ekowaputa ego, SMEs, ahụike, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ntụrụndụ na mmasi ma ugbu a ha na-ebipụta kwa ụbọchị
Busisiwe Paulina 'Busi' Shiba bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa bụ onye bụ Mpumalanga MEC ugbu a maka Ọrụ Ugbo, Mmepe Ime Obodo, Ala na Mmekọrịta Gburugburu Ebe Obibi

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Mpumalanga MEC maka Gọọmentị Nkwado na Ihe Omenala site na 2021 ruo 2022, dị ka Onye isi oche nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Mpumalanga site na 2019 ruo 2021 nakwa dị ka MEC maka Mmepe Ọha site na 2016 ruo 2019
Shiba bụ onye otu African National Congress (ANC)

Shiba bụ onye isi obodo nke Chief Albert Luthuli Local Municipality na Carolina tupu onye bụbu onye isi ala nke Mpumalanga na onye osote onye isi ala ugbu a bụ David Mabuza gbanwere ụlọ ọrụ ya ma mee Shiba MEC ọhụrụ nke Social Development n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ntuli aka gọọmentị ime obodo nke August 2016 gasịrị
A họpụtakwara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọkọ nke Mpumalanga African National Congress Women's League (ANC)
Àtụ Mpumalanga MPLs
Busisiwe Tshwete (amụrụ na 7 Mee 1981) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na onye otu National Assembly of South Africa maka African National Congress (ANC)
A họpụtara Tshwete ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu mba na ntuli aka South Africa nke afọ 2019
Ọ bụ onye otu National Assembly's Portfolio Committee on Agriculture, Land Reform and Rural Development ugbu a
Àtụ Current MPs of South Africa
Busiswa Gqulu ( bụ onye amụrụ na 8 Nọvemba 1988), nke a maara dị ka Busiswa ma ọ bụ Busi, bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu na South Africa
A mụrụ ya na Mthatha, Eastern Cape, South Africa, ọ nwetara nkwado ọha na eze maka njirimara ya na egwu DJ Zinhle, 'My Name Is', mgbe onyeisi oche Kalawa Jazmee bụ Oskido chọpụtara ya
Mgbe ya na DJ Zinhle rụkọchara ọrụ nke ọma, ọ wepụtara egwu egwu gụnyere; 'Ngoku', 'Lahla', ma gosipụta ya na egwu Bhizer, 'Gobisiqolo'
Na 8 Disemba 2017, ọ wepụtara abọm izizi ya, Highly Flavoured, nke otu, 'Bazoyenza' bu ụzọ
N'oge niile ọ na-arụ ọrụ, Gqulu enwetala ọtụtụ otuto
N'afọ 2014, aha ya so ná ndị akpọrọ na Mail & Guardian 200 Young South Africans
A mụrụ Busiswa Gqulu n'abalị nke asatọ nke ọnwa Nọvemba 1988 na Mthatha, Eastern Cape
Mgbe ọ dị obere, ezinụlọ ya kwagara Durban n'ihi ọrụ nne na nna ya
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 15, Gqulu malitere inwe mmasị n'ide uri
'A na-ede uri kemgbe afọ 2004 mgbe m nọ na Grade 11', ka ọ chetara
O mere uri mbụ ya n'ememe olili ozu nne nne ya
N'afọ 2005, ọ sonyeere otu Young Basadzi Women of Poetry
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ na-eme uri ya na mmemme ụlọ ọrụ, oge uri, ihe ngosi nkà, na ememme
Ọ kwadokwara ihe omume uri ya kwa ọnwa nke a na-akpọ '1st Word Sessions' na Bat Centre na Durban
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Gqulu dere uri ya mgbe ọ na-agbalị ịchọta ọrụ kwesịrị ekwesị
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ nka iji kụzie nka ụmụaka ụlọ akwụkwọ
Nne na nna Gqulu kwadoro nhọrọ ọrụ ya n'ihi na ha enweghị ego iji kpọga ya na mahadum
Mgbe ọ na-eme ihe nkiri na ọgụgụ uri, ọ zutere enyi ya nke mere ka ọ mata Sir Bubzin
Sir Bubzin kpọrọ ya mgbe ọ na-emepụta egwu 'Syaphambana'
Mgbe ahụ, ọ tụrụ aro ka ọ gosipụta ya na-eme uri ya na egwu ahụ
Gqulu na Sir Bubzin mechara bịanye aka na Kalawa Record site n'aka onye isi oche, Oskido, mgbe ọ nụrụ abụ ahụ
E mechara wepụta egwu ahụ na nchịkọta Kalawa Jazmee Dance nke mbụ na 2011
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, Oskido kpọrọ Gqulu ka ọ dekọọ 'My Name Is Busiswa' nke DJ Zintle mepụtara
Njikọ ahụ mere ka Gqulu dee akwụkwọ
Mgbe o dekọrọ egwu ahụ na 2011, ọ kwagara Johannesburg na ịbịanye aka na Kalawa Jazmee Records
Abụ ahụ bụ ihe na-ewu ewu ma ọ nwetara nnukwu ikuku na ụlọ ọrụ redio South Africa kemgbe a tọhapụrụ ya
Gqulu nwetara egwu na ọtụtụ mba, gụnyere Zimbabwe, Angola, na Namibia
Egwú ahụ nwetara ndị a họpụtara na Channel O Africa Music Video Award gụnyere Most Gifted Dance Video na Video of the Year
Egwú ahụ nwetara nhọpụta ọzọ na South African Music Award maka Record of the Year
A tọhapụrụ 'Ngoku' na 11 Machị 2013 dị ka otu egwu na-abụghị album na iTunes
Egwú ahụ so vidiyo e wepụtara na YouTube
'Ngoku' ghọrọ egwu egwu na-adọrọ mmasị ya
Ụzọ ahụ nwetara ọtụtụ ikuku ma nwee ọganihu azụmahịa
Gqulu kwalitere egwu ahụ site n'ịrụ ya na ihe ngosi egwu etv Club808, ya na Oskido
Na 2014 Channel O Africa Music Video Award, abụ ahụ meriri Most Gifted Dance category ma ọ kụrụ egwu ahụ mgbe e mesịrị na mmemme onyinye ahụ
Na Nọvemba 2013, Gqulu wepụtara otu egwu, 'Lahla' nke gosipụtara Dj Bucks na Uhuru
Vidio egwu ahụ nwetara 1 nde+ nlele na YouTube
Gqulu tinyere Dj Bucks, kụrụ egwu ahụ na ndụ na SABC1 music show Live Amp
Ọ kụrụkwa egwu ahụ na 2015 Metro FM Awards
Na ọnwa Septemba 2016, Gqulu sonyeere oge nke anọ nke Clash of the Choirs, dị ka onye na-eduzi ukwe na Kelly Khumalo, Anele Mdoda, JR, Bucie, Sifiso Ncwane na IFANI
Ọ bụ onye nduzi ukwe nke KwaZulu-Natal
E wepụrụ ndị otu ya mgbe ha lụchara ọgụ na ndị otu Western Cape nke IFANI duziri
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2017, Gqulu kwupụtara na abọm izizi ya ga-abụ Highly Flavoured
N'ime ihe fọdụrụ na 2017, Gqulu gosipụtara na ọtụtụ egwu gụnyere Tipcee 'Isichathulo' na Dj Maphorisa 'Vuvushka' na 'Midnight Starring'
A tọhapụrụ 'Bazoyenza' dị ka onye isi egwu maka abọm ahụ
Gqulu wepụtara abọm izizi ya Highly Flavoured, nke gosipụtara DJ Maphorisa, Busi N, DJ Athie, Da Fre, DJ Toxic, Nokwazi, Moozlie, Lando na Yasirah
A họpụtara abọm ahụ na South African Music Awards maka Best Kwaito Album na maka Best Female Artist

Gqulu kwupụtara ntọhapụ nke abọm studio ya nke abụọ, Summer Life, na akaụntụ Instagram ya; a tọhapụrụ abọm ahụ na 12 Nọvemba 2018, n'onwe ya, n'okpuru Ngqulu ọhụrụ, ụlọ ọrụ nke ya Busiswa Entertainment
N'abalị iri atọ na otu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, Prince Kaybee wepụtara 'Banomoya' nke gosipụtara Busiswa na TNS
N'afọ 2019, Ngqulu nwetara nhọpụta abụọ na 25th South African Music Awards, na Best Dance Album category maka album ya a ma ama Summer Life na Best Female Category
Ọzọkwa na 2019, Busiswa gosipụtara na Beyoncé's The Lion King The Gift album, na egwu 'My Power'

N'afọ 2020, ya na onye egwu Amapiano nke South Africa, Gaba Cannal rụkọtara ọrụ na otu Umhlaba Wonke N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ wepụtara abọm studio nke atọ ya nke akpọrọ My Side Of The Story nke e ji egwu AmaPiano wuo, ọpụpụ ya na egwu ya na ụda Gqom na-agafe AmaPiano
Abọm ahụ nwetara nkwado abụọ, 'Sbwl' nke gosipụtara Kamo Mphela na 'Makazi' nke ọ gosipụtara Maazị JazziQ
Na MTV Africa Music Awards, ọ natara nhọpụta maka Best Female act
Gqulu nọrọ n'afọ izizi ya n'okpuru nlekọta na nduzi nke nne ya nwụrụ anwụ na nne nne ya bụ ndị nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu n'ịkpụzi àgwà ya siri ike
Na 8 Nọvemba 2017, ọ kpughere na ọ dị ime na akaụntụ Instagram ya
Na 8 Jenụwarị 2018, Gqulu mụrụ nwa nwoke, Lakhanya Gqulu
N'ọnwa Machị 2021, ihe ngosi mere eme nke ya 'Her Majesty Busiswa' gosipụtara na BET Africa

Na mgbakwunye na egwu na uri ya, Busiswa na-arụkwa ọrụ maka Art for Humanity (AFH) ebe ọ na-enye ụmụ akwụkwọ ogbako, dị ka ụzọ isi nyere aka zụlite ekele maka uri na nka anya
Gqulu na-arụkwa ọrụ na Ngalaba Mmụta nke Ndị Ntorobịa nke Umlazi District, na-akụziri ndị mmụta okwu n'ihu ọha, arụmụka na uri arụmọrụ
Bussa, ma ọ bụ Mossiya, bụ asụsụ Cushitic a na-asụ na Dirashe pụrụ iche woreda nke Southern Nations, Nationalities, na People's Region dị na ndịda Etiopia
Ndị mmadụ n'onwe ha, nke dị puku iri na asatọ dịka ọnụ ọgụgụ 2007 si dị, na-akpọ asụsụ ha Mossittaata
Blench (2006) weghachiri Bussa site na Dullay gaa na alaka Konsoid nke Cushitic, mana ọ hapụrụ Mashole, Lohu, na Dobase (D'oopace, D'opaasunte) dialects na Dullay dị ka asụsụ Dobase
Ọ na-ewere Mashile (Mashelle) dị ka asụsụ dị iche n'ime Konsoid
Asụsụ Kushitic na Omotic gbara ya gburugburu na-emetụta Bussa na ekwesịrị ka e were ya dị ka ihe egwu dịka Gurmu (2005) siri kwuo
Ndị na-ekwu okwu nke North Bussa dị iche iche na-atụgharị gaa na Oromo, Dirasha ma ọ bụ Amharic, ebe ndị na-asụ ụdị West Bussa dị iche iche na-atụgharị gaa na asụsụ Omotic Zargulla, Zayse na Gamo
Ihe ndị dị mkpa maka mgbanwe asụsụ na-aga n'ihu gụnyere ịlụ di na nwunye na agbụrụ ndị ọzọ na mmekọrịta siri ike na ndị agbata obi

Buyelwa Patience Sonjica (Amụrụ n'ụbọchị 23 Machị 1950) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa onye jere ozi dị ka Minista nke Mmiri na Mmekọrịta Gburugburu Ebe Obibi site n'ọnwa Mee 2009 ruo ọnwa Nọvemba 2010
Sonjica nwetara nzere na Mahadum Vista na Mahadim Rhodes
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka nọọsụ ụmụ akwụkwọ na onye nkuzi
N'afọ 1976, ọ sonyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ụmụ akwụkwọ na East London
Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike megide ọchịchị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na UDF na SADTU mgbe African National Congress megidere iwu na South Africa
Mgbe a nabatara ANC ọzọ, ọ malitere ịrụsi ọrụ ike maka ya na Port Elizabeth
Kemgbe ntuli aka nke afọ 1994, Sonjica bụ onye otu ndị omeiwu South Africa
Ọ bụ osote minista na Ngalaba nka na ọdịbendị

N'afọ 2004, a họpụtara ya dị ka Minista na Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Mmiri na Ọhịa, n'afọ 2006 dị ka Minera na-ahụ maka Minerals na Energy, na n'afọ 2009 dị ka Minna na-ahụ Maka Mpaghara Mmiri na Gburugburu Ebe Obibi
Buys bụ aha nna obodo Dutch

(Ọ bụghị asụsụ Bemba nke Zambia) 'Songa' bụ agbụrụ ọzọ na-asụ asụsụ Buyu kama ịbụ asụsụ dị iche

Ndị Bwatiye nke a na-akpọkarị Bachama bụ ndị a na-ahụ na Numan, Demsa na Lamurde mpaghara na Ndịda akụkụ nke Steeti Adamawa na n'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke mba Cameroons Republic
Enwere ike ịchọta mmalite ndị Bwatiye na ndị Gobir

Ọ bụ emume ịkụ azụ ụbọchị abụọ nke na-adọta ọtụtụ ndị ọkụ azụ gburugburu mba ahụ iji gosipụta nkà ịkụ azụ ha

Ọ bụ emume ụbọchị anọ nke na-ejikọ Demsa, Mbula, Numan na Lamurde n'ofufe chi ha na ikwupụtakwa ọrụ ugbo
Ọ bụ otu n'ime nnukwu emume nke ndị Bwatiye nke gụnyere ịbụ abụ, ịgba egwu na igosi ọtụtụ ihe ịchọ mma

Bwela, ma ọ bụ Lingi, bụ asụsụ Bantu Congolese á na-amaghị nkè ọma nkè ejighị n'aka njikọ (ọ bụ ezie na edepụtara yá dị kà Mpaghara C40 site na Guthrie)
O nwere ike ịdị nsọ nà Tembo

Byarugaba Grace Isingoma (amụrụ na 15 Julaị, na afọ 1962) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda nke jere ozi na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke itoolu nke Uganda n'okpuru otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement na-anọchite anya Isingiro District
Ọ bụ Kọmitii Ọrụ Ọha na Gọọmentị Obodo bụ onye duziri nzukọ ahụ ma tụọ aro ka ndị omeiwu jụ akụkọ nke kọmitii ọrụ ọha na eze na gọọmentị ime obodo na-atụle arịrịọ Lord Mayor Lukwago ọzọ

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka kọmitii na-ahụ maka ihe onwunwe nke sitere n'okike bụ ndị so n'ime ndị omeiwu na-eyi egwu igbochi mmefu ego maka Ministri nke Mmiri na Gburugburu Ebe Obibi ọ gwụla ma a obidoro akpa polythene, nke a maara n'ógbè ahụ dị ka (Kavera)
Nke a bụ n'oge nyocha nke nkwupụta iwu ndị minista maka afọ ego afọ 2011/2012 nke emere na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu
Ndị omebe iwu (MPs) ji nchegbu kwuo na mmebi nke iji Kavera na-aga n'ihu na-akpata na gburugburu ebe obibi
Asụsụ Byep, ma ọ bụ (Mgbago ugwu) Makaa, bụ asụsụ ndị Bantu nke Cameroon
Ọ bụ ezie na ndị Makaa na-asụ ya ma nwee njikọ chiri anya, ọ naghị aghọta ya na Ndịda Makaa
C&I Leasing Group PLC bụ ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri ọha na eze nke Naijiria
E guzobere ya na afọ 1990 dị ka ụlọ ọrụ onwe onye, a gbanwere ya ka ọ bụrụ ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze edepụtara na ụlọ ahịa ahịa Naịjirịa na afọ 1997
A na-achịkwa ụlọ ọrụ ọrụ ahụ n'ụzọ azụmaahịa atọ

C & I Fleet Management nke a na-achịkwa ya na ikike ịgbazite ụgbọ ala Hertz na Naịjirịa na-akwado nke ọma site na ụlọ ọrụ ọrụ C & I na-akwụ ụgwọ na ihe ngwọta Citracks Telematics ha na-eme ka azụmahịa Fleet Management bụrụ akara otu nkwụsị maka ọrụ njikwa ụgbọ mmiri
Ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka Ghana nke otu ahụ; Leasafric Ghana PLC bụ onye na-eweta ọrụ njikwa ụgbọ mmiri kachasị na Ghana

Ngalaba C & I outsourcing bụ ọkachamara na outsourcing nke akụ mmadụ, ọrụ recruitment, ọrụ ịkwụ ụgwọ na usoro azụmahịa outsourcing maka òtù blue chip yana ụlọ ọrụ ọzụzụ SDS nke na-ele anya na mmepe ikike mmadụ maka ndị ahịa outsourcing dị ugbu a na ndị ọzọ
A na-ahazi C & I Marine Unit iji nye ọtụtụ ọrụ dị n'ụsọro oké osimiri na n'ụsoro oké osimiri iji nweta ohere dị na iwu ọdịnaya mpaghara Naịjirịa
Ọ na-akwụ ụgwọ ma na-arụ ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri na nkwekọrịta site na obere oge ruo ogologo oge
Ọ na-akwụ ụgwọ ụgbọ mmiri ndị dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri na ụgbọ mmiri ndị nche nche, na-arụ ọrụ na Gulf of Guinea na osimiri Bonny
Dị ka ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ya si kwuo, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-ewe ihe dị ka mmadụ 4,500 n'ọfịs isii dị na Port Harcourt, Benin, Enugu, Lagos, Abuja na Ghana
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ na Ghana site na enyemaka ya Leasafric Ghana Limited na United Arab Emirates site na enyemaka Epic International FZE

Cäcilia (Cillie) Rentmeister (a mụrụ n'afọ 1948 na Berlin) bụ onye mba Germany na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme, ọkà mmụta sayensị ọdịbendị na onye na-eme nchọpụta banyere ọnọdụ ọdịbendị nke ụmụnwanyị na nke nwoke na nwanyị
Na mgbakwunye na ịmụ ihe dị iche iche nke ụmụnwoke na ụmụnwanyị bi na ya, ọ na-echegbu onwe ya banyere ọchịchị nwanyị
Rentmeister gụrụ akwụkwọ na Free University of Berlin na University of Cologne Art History, Archeology na American Studies
O nwetara PhD ya n'afọ 1980 na Mahadum Bremen

Rentmeister bi na Berlin na Brandenburg, ebe ọ bụ n'afọ 1994 na-akụzi na Mahadum nke Applied Sciences Erfurt [de] na ngalaba nke Applied Social Sciences 'Cross-cultural Gender Studies' na 'Interactive Media'
Rentmeister tinyere aka kemgbe mmalite afọ 1970 dị ka onye na-eme ihe ike na nke abụọ nke ụmụnwanyị
Site n'afọ 1974, o dere isiokwu na edemede banyere akụkọ nka nke ụmụnwanyị, nkà mmụta ihe ochie na ọmụmụ ọdịbendị, nke e bipụtakwara n'asụsụ ndị ọzọ
Site na 1977 gaa n'ihu, ọ kụziri ihe n'ụlọ akwụkwọ nka, kọleji ndị nkụzi na mahadum dị na Berlin, Hamburg, na Bremen

Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị malitere mmemme oge okpomọkụ nke ụmụnwanyị ('Frauen Sommeruniversität') na Mahadum Teknụzụ nke Berlin na Mahadum Free University Berlin, nke ihe dị ka ụmụnwanyị 30,000 gara site na 1976 ruo 1983, ma nye ume na-adịgide adịgide maka ọmụmụ ụmụnwanyị na nyocha nwoke na nwanyị na ọzụzụ sayensị niile
Cäcilia Rentmeister bụ keyboardist nke Flying Lesbians, ndị inyom mbụ rock band na kọntinent Europe
O gosipụtara mkpa egwu ụmụnwanyị pụtara n'ihe odide ya banyere emume na ememme ụmụnwanyị

N'afọ ndị 1970 nakwa 1980, Rentmeister bipụtakwara edemede dị oke mkpa banyere ọdịdị nwanyị na nka ụmụnwanyị, na-akpalite esemokwu, nke ya na Valie Export, Marlite Halbertsma [nl] , Ulrike Rosenbach na Lucy Lippard na mkparịta ụka na mkparịta ụka na mkparịta ụka nke De Appel 'Feministische Kunst International' haziri na Stedelijk Museum, Amsterdam, Netherlands

N'afọ ndị 1980, o bipụtara dị ka onye edemede sayensị maka redio ọha na eze nke Germany, - n'etiti okwu ndị ọzọ gbasara ebumnuche ndị nna ochie nke mmụba ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ na akụkọ ihe mere eme na ugbu a, na otú New Age movement
Kemgbe afọ 1973, ya na onye ọrụ ibe ya, onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye edemede Cristina Perincioli na-arụ ọrụ
Ha dere ihe nkiri maka 'Anna na Edith' - ihe nkiri mbụ banyere mmekọrịta nwoke na nwanyị na telivishọn German ZDF n'afọ 1975
Site na 1985 na Rentmeister na Perincioli tụgharịrị gaa n'isiokwu 'kọmputa na okike'

Ha mepụtara ihe nlereanya maka ọrụ nka na agụmakwụkwọ na multimedia, bipụtara ma kụziere echiche ndị a n'ebumnobi ịmasị ụmụ nwanyị maka teknụzụ dijitalụ ọhụrụ, ebe n'afọ ndị 1980 na ụlọ akwụkwọ German, àgwà kọmputa na-enyo enyo ka dị

Site n'afọ ndị 1990 Rentmeister rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ na onye njikwa ọrụ nke weebụsaịtị na isiokwu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke Cristina Perincioli dere ma mepụta (Abụọ n'ime ha dịkwa na nsụgharị Bekee)

Dị ka onye na-anya ụgbọelu nke onwe ya na onye otu ụmụnwanyị na-anya ụgbọelu Ninety Nines International Organisation na Federation of German Women Pilots Rentmeister na-agba mbọ ịkwalite ọganihu nke ụmụagbọghọ na ụmụnwanyị na ụgbọelu, site na nkuzi, mgbasa ozi na site n'ịhazi ihe omume maka ụmụ akwụkwọ na Ụbọchị Ụmụagbọghọ
Melanie Katzenberger na-ede, sị 'Ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke mbara igwe bụ ndị akwụkwọ ọgụgụ, na-akpọ Caecilia Rentmeister
Ụmụ agbọghọ aghaghị inwe mmetụta Ọ bụrụ na o nwere ike, enwere m ike'

N'ihe banyere mwughachi ihe mgbe ochie nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke matriarchies, ọkachasị dị ka egosiri na nnabata narị afọ nke iri na itoolu na mmalite narị afọ nke iri abụọ, Rentmeister mepụtara usoro echiche ya dị oke mkpa
Otu ihe atụ maka usoro a ziri ezi - na-emegide ndị esoteric - bụ edemede ya na 'Why Are There So Many Allegories Female?' site na 1976

N'ime edemede ọzọ dị oke egwu, ọ jụrụ n'afọ 1980 'Olee otú e si eji echiche nke ọchịchị Ụmụnwanyị nke a kpọrọ matriarchy n'asụsụ bekee mee ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị?' ma katọọ, n'aka nke ọzọ, ịgọnahụ matriarchy site n'aka ndị European feminists nke oge a
N'isiokwu ya 'The Squaring of the Circle

The Seizure of Power by Men over Architectural Forms', nke e bipụtara n'afọ 1979 na ihe pụrụ iche na 'Women in Architecture - Women's Architecture?' na mba German bauwelt, Rentmeister wughachiri ụkpụrụ ụlọ-igwe nke matriarchies na Europe oge ochie

N'ime edemede ọzọ ọ jụrụ n'afọ 1980 'Olee otú e si eme ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị site na echiche nke matriarchy?' ma katọọ, n'aka nke ọzọ, ịgọnahụ matriarchy site n'aka ndị nkwado ụmụnwanyị nke mba European nke oge a

A sụgharịrị ihe odide ihe ndị a na ihe mgbe ochie ndị ọzọ nke Rentmeister sụgharịrị n'ọtụtụ asụsụ; a tụlere ha ma zoo aka na ha na okwu mba ụwa na nke dị iche iche nke afọ 1970 nakwa 1980, gụnyere ndị na-ewu ụlọ dị ka Margrit Kennedy na Paola Coppola Pignatelli, na ndị na-ede akwụkwọ dị ka Christa Wolf
Sabine Herzog na-akọwa ụzọ Rentmeisters “” Ọkà mmụta ihe ochie na ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme Cillie Rentmeister bipụtara ọtụtụ ọrụ n'ihe gbasara akụkọ ọdịbendị nwanyị na nkatọ ọdịbendị
N'akwụkwọ ya Women's Worlds - Men's Worlds of 1985, ọ na-akọwa ọdịiche dị iche iche nke matriarchy n'oge gara aga na ugbu a
Ya mere, nkọwa nwere ike igosi naanị usoro matriarchal bụ isi
Rentmeister
depụtara ụfọdụ njirimara nke matriarchies Na mgbakwunye na matrilineality na matrilocality na avunculate na akụ na ụba ezinụlọ agbatị bụ njirimara, yana ikpebi onwe onye nke ụmụnwanyị n'elu ahụ ha”
Rentmeister kọwara n'oge 1980 okwu ahụ bụ 'matriarchy' n'ụzọ doro anya ọ bụghị dị ka usoro ntụgharị maka patriarchy
Dị ka Rentmeister si kwuo “
e nwere ma nwee n'ezie ọtụtụ ụdị nke matriarchy, dị ka e nwere ugbu a - na n'otu oge ahụ - ụdị nke patriarchy
N'afọ 1985, ọ na-ekwusi okwu a ike banyere nchọpụta agbụrụ
N'afọ 1988, Rentmeister nyochara 'Debate on Matriarchy' nke narị afọ abụọ gara aga na Germany, ọkachasị na ihe ha pụtara maka afọ iri na ise mbụ nke mmegharị ụmụ nwanyị nke abụọ na Europe

Ọ na-eme ka ọdịiche dị iche, n'ụzọ na-enweghị isi, oge atọ n'etiti afọ 1973–1988, na - nke njem ya na obodo ndị nne na nna n'afọ 1980s - ụfọdụ 'anụ ọkụ n'obi maka matriarchy' na 'mmelite nke emume matriarchal' na mba Germany
Ajụjụ banyere ịdị adị n'ezie nke oge a, matriarchies nke oge a mere ka Rentmeister site n'afọ 1980 ruo ugbu a iji lekwasị anya na nchọpụta nchọpụta anthropological
Ọ gara leta obodo ndị nne na nna, gụnyere Minangkabau na West Sumatra na Nayar na Kerala, South India

N'ebe ahụ, ọ natara - n'agbanyeghị mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na nsogbu - nkwupụta nkwenye na obi ike nke ụmụ amaala nke àgwà pụrụ iche, ọbụnakwa uru na nkewa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ụlọ ọrụ nne na ụzọ ndụ maka nwoke na nwanyị
Otú uru ndị a si ejikọta ọnụ ọgụgụ na ọkwa dị elu na Human Development-Indicators and Reproductive Health, Rentmeister na-akọwa 2007 na edemede ya 'Development is female'

N'ihe atụ nke obodo Minangkabau na Nayar, ọ na-egosi na ike, agụmakwụkwọ na ihe onwunwe n'aka ụmụnwanyị na-enye aka n'ụzọ dị ukwuu n'ịmụ nwa dị ala, na - ma e jiri ya tụnyere obodo ndị nna ochie dị nso - obere ime ihe ike n'ụlọ, na maka ọha mmadụ n'ozuzu ya enwere ike ịhụ obere ịda ogbenye na ọnọdụ ahụike ka mma
Cécile Bayiha bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri si mba Cameroon

A maara ya nke ọma maka ịrụ ọrụ nke Pygmy Likola a dọọrọ n'agha na ihe nkiri Franco-British-South African nke afọ 2005 Man to Man, nke a na-egosi ndị Pygmy abụọ e jidere na narị afọ nke iri na itoolu nke ndị Britain
Bayiha abụghị onye Pygmy n'onwe ya, kama ọ bụ onye dị mkpụmkpụ ma ọ bụ 'onye dị mkpụikpi'
Cécile Guéret-Séreguet (amụrụ n'afọ 1954) bụ onye na-eme ihe ike na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Central African Republic
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi obodo Bangui site na 2000 ruo 2003
Onye na-ahụ maka ọrụ na onye na-akwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị, ọ bụbu onye isi oche nke General Union of Central African Workers na nzukọ ụmụ nwanyị OFCA
Guéret sonyeere ndị ọrụ Central African na 1979 wee ghọọ onye ndú a ma ama
Dị ka onye otu ụlọ ọrụ mba nke Union of Central African Workers (USTC), e jidere ya ma jide ya n'ebughị ụzọ kpee ya ikpe na July 9, 1991, maka ọrụ ya n'okpuru ọchịchị onye isi ala André Kolingba
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche nke General Union of Central African Workers (UGTC) n'afọ 2000
Ọrụ ọrụ Guéret gụnyere ịgagharị na mba ahụ niile iji gbaa ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ ume ịhazi
Mgbalị ya maka ụmụ nwanyị mere ka a họpụta ya dịka onye isi oche nke Organisation des Femmes de Centrafrique (OFCA) n'afọ 2015
N'otu afọ ahụ, Onye isi ala Catherine Samba-Panza họpụtara ya na kọmitii nkwadebe nke Bangui National Forum
Onye isi ala Ange-Félix Patassé họpụtara Guéret ka ọ bụrụ onye isi obodo Bangui, isi obodo Central African Republic, na Febụwarị 2000, na-esonyere naanị ụmụ nwanyị ole na ole ruru ọkwa ahụ na mba ahụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi obodo ruo afọ atọ, ruo n'afọ 2003, mgbe Onye isi ala François Bozizé malitere ọrụ ma họpụta nwa nwanne ya nwoke Jean-Barkès Gombé-Ketté [fr] n'ọnọdụ ya
A tụrụ Guéret mkpọrọ ọnwa ole na ole mana a tọhapụrụ ya
